1b1('dul ba): /'dul ba gno/bam po nyi shu gnyis pa//sdom la/smyug ma'i la
1b2('dul ba): mgo zhin dang //rjes su gnang dang bsrung phyi ro dang //de bzhi ni gseg ji su bcing
1b3('dul ba): ba dang //rtse mo rnyed pa spu gu can//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing gi
1b4('dul ba): mchil lham btsang bar mi bya'o//zhes gsungs nas de dag smyig lo'i mtshal lham
2a1('dul ba): /'chang ba dang /de nyid nyes dmig su gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/smag
2a2('dul ba): lo'i mchil lham bachang bar mi bya'o//de dag rtsa muno dzi'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang /de nyid nyes demig su ci
2a3('dul ba): gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rtse mun dza'i mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o//de dag sred
2a4('dul ba): bu'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang /de nyid nyes dmigasu gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/srad bu'i
2a5('dul ba): mchil lham chang bar mi bya'o//dge slong dag drag gis btab ste de dag shu bi byung bas ko ba'i mchil lham rlan par gyur
2b1('dul ba): pA'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ka' stsal pa/dreg gis thebs pa grang /
2b2('dul ba): yin pa des/srad bu'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o//gang gis tshe gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rab tu byung ba de'i tshe de'i rkang mthil la gser gyi
2b3('dul ba): kha dog 'dra ba'i spyi sor bzhi tsam yod pa de/drug sde dag gis mthong //mthong nas kyang de dag gis smras pa/dga' bo nye dga' re shig mar sar gyi
2b4('dul ba): gong bu 'dra ba 'di gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ci zhig byed ces smras pa/des thos so//des thos nas nga rgyal skyes te/tshe
2b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i drung du song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gaN+DI
2b6('dul ba): tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la ting nge 'dzin yon du gnas par gsungs pa gang lags/tshe dang ldan pa gro zhon skyes 'chags pas thob pa yin//
3a1('dul ba): nade bas bu'i rgyul n+ti dur khyod du myong nas 'chags bzlas s+ho//de 'chags pan stu ga ser gyi kha drug 'dra bsgor
3a2('dul ba): bzhi tsam po dag kyang zud do//de'i 'og tu lpags pa rdol de'i 'og tu khrag byung ste/de ji srid 'chag sa'i mgo gcig nas cig shisu song gi
3a3('dul ba): bar du de'i 'chag sa'i mgo cig na yang khwa dag khrag 'thung la gnyis pa na yang 'thung //chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
3a4('dul ba): bzhugs shing 'tshal gzhes pa ni dus du su chu bor rgyu ba spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyus par bya ste/skabs 'dir ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
3a5('dul ba): gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing gshegs po yin pas/tshe dang ldan po glo zhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pa'i gtsug lag khang gang na bo der gshegs pa
3a6('dul ba): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu ba'i 'chag sa gzigs gzigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin rnyed
3b1('dul ba): ba yin pas/mkhyen bzhin du rmed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/kun dga' bo gcig tu brtson pa'i chag sa 'di dge slong gang ki yin/
3b2('dul ba): glo zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i lags so//kun dga' bo de lta bas na/rjes su gnang ste gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o//
3b3('dul ba): rim gnyis pa ma yin/rim gsum pa ma yin no//gal te rdol bar gyur na/lhan pos btab ste bcang bar bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshe dang
3b4('dul ba): ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste/son nas tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu paM la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shes par gyis shig/
3b5('dul ba): ston pas khyod lo mchil lha ma rim gcig pa rjes su granang ste/rim gnyis pa ma yin/ri mo gsum pa ma yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro//btsun pa kun dga' bo
3b6('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad la 'am/'on te bdag 'ba'o zhig la khyod 'ba' zhig la'o//btsun pa kun dga' bo ston pa'i bka' mi gcog no//gal te bdag gis bcangs na
3b7('dul ba): gzhi des bdag la tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa dag e ma'o//gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rab tu byung nas ltog pa shig rnyed//gang yang yul tsam pa thun mong ma yin pa dang /
4a1('dul ba): glang po che bdun gyi tshogs spangs te/rab tu byung la/de da mchil lham theg gi ba tsam la chags pa lta zhes gleng bar gyur te/de
4a2('dul ba): lha mod kyi gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag las ltos te/dge 'dun thams cad la rjesu gnang na/bdag gis de bzhin du bcang bar bgyi'o zhes pa'i
4a3('dul ba): skabs de bcom ldan 'das le tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyas par gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rje su gnang
4a4('dul ba): ste/gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la ltos nas dge 'dun thams ca kyis rim gcig pa'i rma chil lAm bcang par bya ste/rim gnyis pa ma ya ni zhes
4a5('dul ba): rgyas par sbya ro//bocom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na rgan zhugs mchil lham can gzhan zhig 'chag par byed pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
4a6('dul ba): slong de la 'od skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong phar spong nge'i spyan snga na ma 'dug shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnam la bka' stsal pa/
4a7('dul ba): dge slong dag re shig 'jig rten thams cad kyis zang zing dang /'dres pa'i ston pa gang yin pa/ston pa de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'di ltar myur ba
4b1('dul ba): myur bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i brtul zhugs mi spyod na/nga 'jig rten thams cad kyi zang zing dang bral bar gnas pa'i lta smod kyang ci dgos/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
4b2('dul ba): nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de na dge slong dag mchil lham 'chang ba yin te/de lta bas na dge slong gis mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
4b3('dul ba): slong gis mchil lha me bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /gar mkhan gzhan zhig rab tu byung ba de'i snod chags nas/de rkang pa bkru ba'i gnasu rkang pa bkrus nas kha'i
4b4('dul ba): nang du chus bkang ste/rma bya'i 'gro su song ba de drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas/de rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag rol mo'i sgra med par dge slong gar byed kyis rol mo'i
4b5('dul ba): sgra bya'o zhes de rnams kyis khas rol mo'i sku ba bar brtsams//de rnams la dge slong dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag ci ma grangs pa byed dam/de rnams kyis smras pa 'di la
4b6('dul ba): me grangasu ci zhig yod khyed kyis rol mo'i sgra ma bor dge slong gar byed pa mthong ngam zhes pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
4b7('dul ba): 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/mkhyen bzhin rmed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la smras pa/dge slong khyod kyis bsam pa ci zhig gi/
5a1('dul ba): lta bu byas/btsun pa gnas mal srung slad du'o//dge slong 'di gnas mal srung ba'i phyir de lta bur byed pa la ltung ba med do//de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/gnas
5a2('dul ba): mal srung ba'i phyir rim gcig pa'i mtshol l+h+wam bcang bar bya'o//rim gnyis pa ma yin/rim gsum pa mi yin/gral te rdol par gyur na/lhan pas btab ste bcing bar
5a3('dul ba): bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis rim gcig po'i mchil lham bcad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig la khyim bdag cig dad par gyur to//de nang par sngar
5a4('dul ba): langs te mchil lham med par mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhug so//de mchil lham med pa khyim bdag de mthong ngo //mthong nas smras pa/'phags pa la mtshal lham ma mchis
5a5('dul ba): sam+ba/tshur spyon lham mkhan gyi drung du bzhud mchil lham nig 'bul du stsal to//de lham mkhan gyi drung du song nas/des lham mkhan la smras pa/kye nang rje 'phags pa 'di la
5a6('dul ba): mchil lham cig phul cig ces bsgo nas song ngo //de'i tshe dge slong rnams dang /shi ba rnams dang gnyis kyi phyir mchil lhum rim bya gcig pa dag byaso//dge slong de yang dang yang/
5a7('dul ba): du lham mkhan gyi drung du song yang ma byin no//dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag des yang dge slong mchil lham med pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang smras pa/'phags pa khyod la
5b1('dul ba): lham mkhan gyis mchi lnga lham ma phul lam khyim drug lham mkhan la bden par smra ba dkon pa khyod kyis ma thos sam/yang dang yang du song yang ma bya no//des smras pa/
5b2('dul ba): 'phags pa tshur spyon khyim du bzhud des de khyim du khrid nas kha zas bskyod pas tshim par byas te/rIm pa mang po can gyi mchil lham zhig byin no//dge slong gis smras pa
5b3('dul ba): khyim bdag bcom ldan 'odas kyis rje su mu gnong ngo //des 'phags pa snoms te/bzhud lo rim gcig pa'i mchil lham mdzod la gsol cig/des da khyer te gnas khang
5b4('dul ba): du song nas des de dang gri blangs te/shing drung du 'dug nas bral bar brtsim so//bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs drer byon nas/dge slong ci byed bcom ldan 'das kyis rim
5b5('dul ba): pa mang po can gyi mchil lham bgag na/bdag la rim pa mang po can 'di lta bu grub ste/rim+ba ci go pAr bgyis la bcang bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di
5b6('dul ba): snyam du e ma'o//nga'i nyan thos rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis rim pa mang po'i mchil lham skyer ba mAnyamA du dgongs nas/de lta bas na rjesu
5b7('dul ba): gnang ste/mchil lham rim pa mang po can khyim po'i dman ma yin phan chad bcang bar bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus te zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/
6a1('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mchil lham rim pa mang po can khyim pa'i dman ma yin phan chad bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/btsun pa ji
6a2('dul ba): tsam gyis na/khyim pa'i dman ma legs par brjod par bgyi/nye ba 'khor tha na/gom pa bdun nAm brgyad bgos par gyur na yang yin no//gleng gzhi ni yangs
6a3('dul ba): pa can no//de'i tshe yangs pa can na 'di lta bu'i mchil lham dag byed de/'di lta ste khrig khrig tshig tshig chem chem zhes zer ba lug ru 'am/byang chub kyi shing gi
6a4('dul ba): lo ma lta bu khra ba bo kar sha pa na lnga ri ba dag byed do//drug sde dag gis mchil lham dag gyon pa zhig mthong nas de dag gis rting pa rkang pa'i the bong mnan nas
6a5('dul ba): lhag pa nas phul te/khyod kyis sbyin pa 'di phul bas sems kyi rgyan dang sems kyi yo byad dang /rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid thob par
6a6('dul ba): gyur cig ces byas nas/blangs pa dang /phyogs kun tu 'phags pa dag ni lha ma de lta bus 'phrog go zhes sgra grag go/rgan mo zhig gis rmag pa zhig 'ongs pa
6a7('dul ba): dang de la des mchil lham zhig byin nas 'phags pa dag mchil lha ma 'phrog gis ji nas kyang 'phrogs par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces bsgo'o///
6b1('dul ba): spyo snyoms pa zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa/des mthong nas de khyim zhig tu zhugaso//de yang de nyid du zhugs pa dang /dro khyim de nA byung nas khyim gzhan zhig du zhug so//
6b2('dul ba): bsod snyoms pas kyang de nyid du zhugs pa dang /des smras pa/'phags pa khyod don ci'i phyir kho bos rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ci mchil lham 'di 'phrog
6b3('dul ba): par bzhed mod bzhin bzangs khyod kyi mchil lham kho bo mi 'phrog ste/'on kyang kho bos sod snyoms kyi phyir zhugaso//des smras pa/'phags pa/'phrog kyang rung mi 'phrog
6b4('dul ba): kyang rung ste/'on kyang phyogs kun tu 'phags pa khyed cag mchil lham 'phrog go zhes sgra grag so//zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
6b5('dul ba): de nasnga bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/nyes dmigs gang cing byung ba de ni/dge slong dag mchil lham khrig khrig ces bya ba nas/de lta bas na dge slong gis
6b6('dul ba): mchil l+h+wam khrig khrig zer ba bcing par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par sbyar ro//de lta bu bcang bar mi bya'o//dge slong gis de lta bu'i mchil lham bcangs
6b7('dul ba): na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//gleng gzhi nas nyan yod na'o//de'i tshe dge slong rnams mchil lham gyis rkang pa'i bol la rma byung ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
7a1('dul ba): kyis mthong nas khyed cag gis zhabs kyi bol ji zhig gis rma byung bar gyur mchil lham gyiso//ci khyed cag gis bsogasasu bcings nas ma bcings sam
7a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas
7a3('dul ba): na rje su grenang ste/bsogasu bcings nas bcang bar bya'o//dge slong rnams bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzegs pa na/rkang pa'i mthe bong rma byung ngo //de dag bram ze dang khyim
7a4('dul ba): bdag gis mthong nas smras pa/khyed cag gi zhabs kyi mthe bong ci zhig gis rma byung /bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa na'o//ci khyed cag gis mtsho la lham gyi rtse mo
7a5('dul ba): sbu gu can ma bcangs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su ma gnang dro zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
7a6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas rjes su gnang ste/dge slong gris mchil lham gyi rtse mo sbu gu can bcang bar bya'o//dge slong rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri las babase pa nu
7a7('dul ba): rkang pa'i rting pa rma byung ba/bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/'phags pa khyed cag rnams kyi zhabs kyi rting po ci zhig gis rma byung /bya rgod kyi
7b1('dul ba): phung po'i ri las bzlas pa na//ci khyed cag gis mchil lham gyi rting pa sdu gu can ma bcangs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su m+b+ha gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan /
7b2('dul ba): la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/dge slong gis mchil lham gyi rting pa sbu gu can bcang
7b3('dul ba): bar bya'o//sdom la//mgul chad dang ni yu'u thung lham/khwa khrod dag tu sgro gu can//don gyi lpags pa gnang ba dang /sbrang bu 'breng bu chu gri'o//gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//dge
7b4('dul ba): slong rnams rtse'i myu gus rkang pa rma byung ba dag bram ze dang /khyi me bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/smras pa/'phags pa dag khyed cag gi zhabs ci zhig gis rma byung /rtswa'i myu gus so//
7b5('dul ba): ci khyed cag gis lham mgul chad ma bcangs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su ma snang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol po dang /
7b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rje su gnang sti/lham mgul chad bcang bar bya'o//gung gi tshe ru'i myu gus tsher skyes pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyi
7b7('dul ba): rkang pa de bas kyang rma cher byung ba bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/khyed cag go zhabs ci zhig gis rma byung /de rnams kyis smras pa/rtswa'i myu gu
8a1('dul ba): dag cher skyes pas bdag cag gi rkang pa de bas kyang rma cher byung ngo //'phags pa rnams ci khyed cag gis lha mA yu'u thung ma bcangs sam/bcom ldan
8a2('dul ba): 'das kyis rje su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bas na rje su gnang
8a3('dul ba): ste/lham yu'u thung bcang bar bya'o//gang gi tshe skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams khe btab pa na/de dag las kha cig nub phyogasu dong ba
8a4('dul ba): nas/kha cig bal yul gyi bar du dong ngo //mnyan yod pa'i don 'thun dag zong thogs te/bol yul du lhags pa dang /de dag gis de rnams mthong nas smras pa/shes ldan
8a5('dul ba): dag khyed cag gang nas da 'dir lhags/de rnams kyis smras pa/mnyan yod naso//bdag cag gi gnyen 'phags pa kun dga' bo yod na/lan 'ga' yang 'phags pa kun dga'
8a6('dul ba): bo 'odi ri 'ongs te bdag cag la gtam ma dris so//de rnams kyis smras pa/bdag cag gis 'phags pa/kun dga' bos drung du song la sbran par bgyi'o//de rnams kyis zong
8a7('dul ba): rnams bsgyur ba'i zong dag khyer te mnyan yod du lhags nas/de rnams kyis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/'phags pa kun dga' bo khyod kyi gnyen bal yul na mchis
8b1('dul ba): te/de dag khyed mthong bar 'chalo//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni gnyen la gdung ba yin pas/de gnyon dag lta ba'i phyir bal yul du song ba las de lkugs pas lag pa dang /rkang
8b2('dul ba): pa ser ga byung ba dang /de lta dge sbyong rnams kyis skyes pa/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo//pud+ma'i mdab ma ral ba bzhin du khyod kyi lag pa dang rkang pa ci zhig ser ga byung bar gyur/de
8b3('dul ba): smras pa lhags pas so//khyod kyi gnyen dag ni lha mo sgro gu can ci ste 'chang /khyod ci'i phyir mi 'chang /bcom ldan 'dis kyis rje su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan
8b4('dul ba): 'das la dge sbyong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/yul kha be tsan rnamasu lham sgrog gu can bcad par bya'o//
8b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yul kha btsun rnams lham sgrog gu can brkyang bar bya'o zhes gsungs
8b6('dul ba): pa gang lags pa/btsun pa ji rjem gyis yul khya ba can du brjod par bgyi/ bur 'khor gdun snong du chu la ga pa yin//dge slong gzhan zhig la rngon pa zhig dad par gyur
8b7('dul ba): nas/rngon pa des dom lpags shig rnyed pa dge slong de la phul ba dang /des ma blang so//des dge slong de'i phye bzhi ni 'brang zhing smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis dom lpags rnyed
9a1('dul ba): pa khyod la 'bul gyis bzhes shig/dge slong des ma blangaso//bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen
9a2('dul ba): bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/mkhyen bzhin du rmed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/kun dga' bo dge sbyong 'o na'i phyi bzhin du rngon po pha 'i
9a3('dul ba): ci ste 'bring /btsun pa rngon pa des dom lpags shig rnyed nas/des dge slong 'o ni la stsal pa las/dge slong gis de ma blangs pa dang /rngon pa de dge slong 'o na'i phyi bzhin 'chi'o//bcom
9a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka'i skyel pa/kun dga' bo rngon pa dad pa can ni dkon te/gal te brgya 'am stong zhig dang phrad na/thams cad gsod pa yin pa na blan gal te rngon pas dom lpags
9a5('dul ba): byin na blang bar bya'o//kla nas dri gtsang khang gi sgo 'am/rkang pa'i 'og tu gding bar bya ste/dom lpags thams cad ni mig la phan no//dge slong gzhan zhig gi mchil lham ral
9a6('dul ba): nos/de lha ma rol nas/d+he snum mkhan gyi drung du song ste ston nas/smras pa/bzhin bzangs bdag gi mchil l+h+wam rul pa rgyus te/bdag la byin cig lham mkhan gyis bsams
9a7('dul ba): pa shAkya'i sras kyis dge slong rnams ni rngan pa med par 'tshol gyis yul ring du bskyangs pa dang /rang gi blo slar log par 'gyu ro snyam nas/'phags pa bdag brel gyis sang
9b1('dul ba): skyon cig/dge slong de yang dang yang du lham mkhan de'i drung du song yang des bskyangs pa dang /dri mdza' bshes dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas de la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa ci de
9b2('dul ba): nokhyod kyis zas sbyor ba'i khyim yod dam/'on te gnyen gyis khyim yid des smos de na bdag gi zas sbyor ba'i khyim yang med/gnyen gyi khyim yang myed mod kyi bdag gi mchil
9b3('dul ba): lham ral nas/bdag gis de la brgyus te byin cig ces smras nas/des bskyang so//de smras pa/'phags pa lham mkhan la bden par smra ba dkon par khyed kyis ma thos sam/
9b4('dul ba): 'on kyang bdag gis shes kyis gal te/bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su gnang na/bdag gis de la brgyus te/khyod la sbyin no zhes pa'i skabs te/bcom ldan 'das la da
9b5('dul ba): slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/dge slong gang zhig shes pa yod na/des gang du gzhan gyis mthong na mi dad par mi 'gyur ba dben
9b6('dul ba): pa'i phyogasasu 'dug ste brgyu bar bya'o//de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su gnang gis brgyus shig/des smras pa/ci 'di de bzhin du brgyur rung snyam
9b7('dul ba): 'am/de la re shig sbyang du dang dri gri dang /'brang bu yang dgos so zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
10a1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong gang zhig shes pa yod na/des smyung bu dang 'breng bu ni bcang bar bya'o//gri gri ni bcang bAr mi bya'o//kau lpags kyi
10a2('dul ba): gzhi rdzog so////sman gyi gzhi bsdus pa'i sdom la/sman dag dang ni sde can dang //rgyal po khab dang 'od mo tshal//shing mkhan id tsa nang ga la/ka ma pi la
10a3('dul ba): drang sngon rgyal po'i//gzhon nu 'phel dang nad pa dang /gtam du gyur dang sder bsdus pa'o//sdom la/sman ni rjesu gnang ba dang //tshil dang g.yan pa mig sman dang //smyon pa dang
10a4('dul ba): pi len ni de//num gru dang ni sgyur khu'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/mgron med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe dge slong
10a5('dul ba): rnams ston ka'i nid kyis thebs te/de rnams ston ka'i nad kyis btab pas skya bo bsong bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /nyam chung ba dang /na bas nyams dmas par gyur
10a6('dul ba): to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin rmed pa ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/kun dga' bo ci'i
10a7('dul ba): phyir da ltar dge slong 'di rnams skye bo bseng ba song por gyur cing rid pa dang /nyam chung ba dang ne bas nyams dmas par gyur//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa//
10b1('dul ba): btsun pa dge slong 'di rnams ston ka'i bro nad kyis btab ste/'di rnams ston+da ka'i brond kyis btab pas/skya bo bsod bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /nyam chung ba dang bro 'tshal bas nyams
10b2('dul ba): dmas par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/dge slong gis sman so so bsten par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
10b3('dul ba): gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /de rnams dus su za ba yin pas dus su bsten par byed kyis/dus las yul bar ston par mi byed pas/de rnams skya bo bsed
10b4('dul ba): bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang /na bas nyams dmas par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/sangs rgyas btsos kyis tshe dang
10b5('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo larmag/kun dga' bo ngas dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o//zhes bka' stsal na 'on kyang da ltar dge slong 'di rnams skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang
10b6('dul ba): nyam chung ba dang /na bas nyams dmas par gyur ta mi/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong gos sman so sor bsten par bya'o//zhes
10b7('dul ba): gsungs pa 'di dag dus su 'tshal ba lags par dus su bsten par bgyid kyi/dus las yol bar mi bsten te de'i slad du skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /nyam chung ba
11a1('dul ba): /dang blo 'tshal bas nyams danas par gyur lag sa//kun dga' bo das lta bas nan su gnang ste/do//slong rnams kyis spyan nam pa ngan ga/dus su rung ba dang /dza/
11a2('dul ba): tshod du rung ba dang /zhag bdun pa dang /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba so so re bsten par bya'o//de la dus su rung ba ni/'ad gu dang 'dras can dang /zan dron dang /sha dang snum khur/
11a3('dul ba): thun tshid du rung ba ni btung ba rnam pa brgyad po shing rtog rtse tse'i btung ba dang /chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang /rgya shugs gi btung ba dang /a shwad tha'i btung ba dang /u dum hA
11a4('dul ba): ri'i btung ba dang /pa ru shi kwa'i btud ba dang /rgun 'bru'i btung ba dang /'bri gro'i btung ba dang /bar sdom la/tso co chu shing rgya shugs dang /a shwad u dum bA rA dang /bA ruM sha
11a5('dul ba): ka nu 'bru dang /brgyad pa yang ni 'bra go yin//zhag bdun pa ni mar dkar dang //til mar dang /bu ram gyi dbu ba dang /s+t+rair+b+ha dang /sha khar ro//'tsho'i bar du bcing ba nI/rtsa ba'i sman
11a6('dul ba): dani sdong bu'i sman dang /lo ma'i sman dang /me tog gi sman dang /'bras bu'i sman dang /thang chu lnga dang /thal bA lA dang /lan d+hal+yA dang /bsdu ba lnga'o// la rdza ba'i smyan ni glu skang
11a7('dul ba): da /shu dag dang/yung dang /spre'u gsher dang /bong dkar po dang /gzhan yad rtsa ba'i sprin gyi nang du gtogs pa/zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o//sngon nun
11b1('dul ba): nitsan+da dan dang /dbyibye mo dang /shugs pa dang /thang shing dang /skye tres dang /sbyor ba dang /gzhan yang sdong bu'i spun gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang man pa'o//lo ma
11b2('dul ba): spyan ni to la'i lo mo dang /ba shu ka'i lo me dang /nim pa'i lo ma dang /kau shr-i ta kA'i lo ma dang /swAb te ba ne'i lo ma dang /gzhan yang lo ma'i spun gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi don du
11b3('dul ba): mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o//me tog gi sman ni/me tog lnga pa/ba sha ka'i me tog dang /nim pa'i me tog dang /d+hA da ka'i me tog dang sha ti'i me tog dang /pad ma ke sa ri'i m+me ti dang
11b4('dul ba): gzhan yang me tog gi sman gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o//'bras bu'i sman ni/a ru ra dang /skyu ru ra dang /ba ru ra dang /na lde sham dang /pi pi ling
11b5('dul ba): dang /gzhan yang 'bras bu'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa zlas kyi don du mi 'gyur bya gang yin pa'o//trang chu ldi ni shing kun dang /smar+No dang /rgya skags dang /spra tshil dang /drod sman no//
11b6('dul ba): la shing kun ni shing kun gyi shing gi trang chu'o//swad+hi ni shing sa li'i tra tshwa'o//rgya skegs ni rgyu skegs s+ho//sgra tshul ni sgra tshal lo//drod sman ni/de dag las gzhan pa'i bu'i shrI
11b7('dul ba): rnams kyi trang chu'o//thal ba lnga gang zhe na/nas phyi thal ba dang /nas kyi phung ma'i thal ba dang /shing sau rdzi ka'i thal ba dang /til gyi thal ba dang /shing 'ba' shig ka'i
12a1('dul ba): thal bcwo//lan tshwa lnga gang zhe na/rgyu mtshwa dang /lan tshwa dang /lan tshwa skrag blo dang //bA ru chu dang /lan tshwa dang /rgya mtsho'i ldan tshwa'o//bstsu lnga gang zhe na/
12a2('dul ba): Am+b+ha'i bka ba dang /nim pa'i bska ba dang /'dzam bu'i bska ba dang /shi ri shrI'i bsku ba dang //ko sham pa'i bska ba'o//de la dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang /thun tshod du rung ba gang
12a3('dul ba): yin pa dang /zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba de dus su rung ba dang /'dres par gyur na/dus su spyad par bya'i dus ma yin par
12a4('dul ba): yongs spyod par mi bya'o//dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang /thun chod du rung ba gang yin pa dang /zhag 'drin po gang yin pa dang /'tsho ba'i gling du btsong ba gang yin pa de gal te thun
12a5('dul ba): tshod du rung ba dang /'dres par gyur na/thun tshod la yongasu spyad par bye'i thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o//zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /'tsho ba'i bar du bcung ba
12a6('dul ba): gang yin pa de zhag bdun pa dang /'dres par gyur na/zhag bdun du spyad par bya'i zhug bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o//'tsho ba'i bar du bcad pa ni 'tsho ba'i
12a7('dul ba): bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlabs nas yongasu spyad par bya'o sbyin gyis brlab pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/zan ma zos pa'i mdun du lag pa gnyis bkrus nas byin len byas te/
12b1('dul ba): dge slong zhig gis 'dun du 'dug nas/'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/bdag mying 'di zhes pa'i sman 'di bdag dang chungs pa mtshungs par
12b2('dul ba): spyod pa rnams kyi don du'i tshe ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis bladrabo bo//de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod do//'tsho byi'i bar du brdung bar byin gyis brlab pa ji lta
12b3('dul ba): bo de bzhin du thun tshod du rung ba dang /zhig bdun pa yid byin gyis brlab par bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod ni'i//des dge slong gzhan zhig rlung nod kyis thebs nus sman ni
12b4('dul ba): drung du song ste/bzhin bzungs kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab na/sman ston cig des smras pa/'phags pa tshil sten cig dang /khyod sosde bar 'gyur//dge sbyong gis smras pa/
12b5('dul ba): bzhin bzangs ci kho bo 'dre yin nam/sman pas smras pa/dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus zhes pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'dis la
12b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/gal te sman pa na re dge slong gi sman 'di yin te/gzhan gyi ni sos par mi nus so zhes
12b7('dul ba): smras ni/tshol bsten par bya'o//dge slong dgra gis ma shes nas sman po la dris pa dang /des smras pa/'bigs pa khyed cag gi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyis//
13a1('dul ba): de kho na'i drung du bzhud la zhus shig/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshil
13a2('dul ba): lnga so sor bsten par bya ste/lnga gang zhe na/nye tshal dang /sbal pa dkar po'i tshil dang /chu srin byis pa bsod kyi tshil dang /do mchil dang /phag gi tshe lo/tshil 'di lnga dus ma yin
13a3('dul ba): par bcos pa dang /dus ma yin par btsugs pa dang /dus ma yin par sbyin len bya ba dang /dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na longs spyad par mi bya'o//dus su btsos la
13a4('dul ba): dus ma yin par btsags/dus ma yin par sbyin len byas dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na longs spyod par mi bya'o//dus su btsos dus su btsugs la/dus ma yin
13a5('dul ba): par sbyin len byas/dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na spyad par mi bya'o//dus su btsos dus su btsags/dus su sbyin len byas la/dus ma yin par byin gyis brlab
13a6('dul ba): na spyad par mi bya'o//dus su btso sa/dus su btsags/dus byin gyis brlabs na til mor la spyod pa bzhin du zhag bdun du spyod par bya'o//de nas dge slong des tshil
13a7('dul ba): longs spyad na so sos par gyur to//de sos par gyur pa dang /de tshil gyi lhag ma dag bor ro//ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhog de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas/de yang
13b1('dul ba): sman pa'i drung du song nas smras pa/bzhi bzangs kho bo la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab kyis sman ston cig/des de la yang tshil bstan pa dang /de dge slong de'i drung du song nas smras pa/tshe dang /
13b2('dul ba): ldan pa khyod kyis tshil spyad pa/kho bo la yang sman pas bstan na/tshil lhag pa lta chung zad kyang yod dam/des smras pa/bdog bdog pa las/bdag gis de bor ro//ma legs
13b3('dul ba): ba zhig byas zhes pa'i skabs te/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyi gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong gris tshil ljongs spyad pa'i lhag ma bor
13b4('dul ba): bar mi bya ste/'on kyang bcang bar bya'o//nges dge slong tshil 'chang ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/tshil 'chang ba'i dge slong gis tshil spyad pa'i lhag ma dge slong gzhan la
13b5('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o//gal te ma byin na sman khang du bzhag par bya ste/su 'dod pa des blang por bya'o//tshi la 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs
13b6('dul ba): nas/'jug par mi byed na/'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhug so//de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhig gau yan pa'i nad kyis thebs nas de sbran pa'i drung du song
13b7('dul ba): ste/bzhin bzangs kho bo g.yan pa'i nad kyis thabs kyis sman ston cig des smras pa/'phags pa bska ba sten cig dang khyod sos par 'gyur/bzhin bzangs ci kho bo 'dod pa la spyod
14a1('dul ba): pa yin nam/des smras pa/dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/gzhan gyis ni sos byar mi ma zhes pa'i skab snad bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis
14a2('dul ba): gsol pa dang zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du ste/khyod kyi ston pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas de kho nas mkhyen par 'gyur ro//zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge
14a3('dul ba): blong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bska bo ni lnga ste/a sgra'i bska ba zhes bya ba nas/gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong des bsgru ba dag 'di
14a4('dul ba): dur byes te/lus la byugs pa las rma mched nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal paM/phye mi bya'o//dge slong dag gis rlon pa la btab pi se ra lcer gyur pa dang /bcom
14a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bskum par bya'o//de dag gis nyi ma la bskams pa dang /mthu nyams par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyi ma la
14a6('dul ba): bskam par mi bya'o//de dag gis grib ma la bsgoms pa dang /'on kyang rul par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyi ma'i grib mas bskams par bya'o//
14a7('dul ba): dge slong gis poslabs lus byugs nas bkrus te 'an kha'i bya ba mi byed do//bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/lag pas rje tsa mchog gi bar du la nas smras phyi/
14b1('dul ba): bkrus nas slar yang bska byas bzlas pas bska ba'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro//dge slong des bska bas bskus pa dang /nad zhi bar gyur to//des bska ba'i lcug ma bor ro//ji tsam na dge
14b2('dul ba): slong gzhan zhig de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas de yang spyan pa'i drung du song ste zhes bya ba nas/gong ma bzhin du ste/kho bos de ni bai dA ro//mA legs pa zhig byas zhes pa'i skabs de/
14b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /zo tsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nges bsku ba 'chang ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya
14b4('dul ba): ste/bsgre ba 'chung ba'i dge slong gis/bska ba spyad par lhag ma dge slong su slong ba de lnga sbyin par bya'o//gal te ma byin na/sman khang du bzhag par bya'o//bsdu ba 'chang
14b5('dul ba): ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcos pa yang dag pa blangs ste 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur//gleng gizhi ni mnyan yod na'o/de'i tshe dge slong
14b6('dul ba): glozhan zhig mig nad kyisde thobs nas/de sman pa'i drung du song ste/bzhin bzangs kho bo myig nad kyis thebs par gyur na/kho bo la sman ston cig/des smras pa/'phags pa
14b7('dul ba): mig sman so sor ston cig dang /khyod sos par 'gyur ro//bzhin bzangs ci kho bo 'dod pa la la longs spyod dam/'phags pa khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/gzhan gyis ni
15a1('dul ba): sos par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gal
15a2('dul ba): te sman pa na re sman 'di yin te gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes zer na/mig sman bsten par bya'o//dge slong dag gis mig sman gang bsten par bya ma
15a3('dul ba): shes nas/de dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang /des smras pa/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyis zhes bya ba'i skabs de/bcom ljon 'das
15a4('dul ba): la dge slong rnams kyisi gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mig sman ni lta ste/me tog gis mig sman dang /khu ba'i mig smen dang
15a5('dul ba): phye ma'i mig sman dang /ri lu'i mig sman dang /btsag yug snam gyi mi ge sman no//de nas dge slong des mig sman de bste ni nas sos par gyur to//des
15a6('dul ba): mi ge smyan gyi lhag ma gar bab bab tu bzhag pa las de chud zod par gyur to//ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig mig nad gyis thebs nas/des kyang sman pa la dris pa
15a7('dul ba): dang /des de la yang mi sman de nyid bstan to//de dge slong de'i drung du seng nas/tshe dang ldan pa kho bo yang mig nad gyis btab par gyur na/khyod la mig
15b1('dul ba): sman gyi lcug ma cung zad yod dam/de btsal bar brtsams pa las ma rnyed nas/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa mig sman de bdag bdod ste/gzhan pa las de stor to zhes 'dra ba'i skabs
15b2('dul ba): de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal//dge slong gis mig sman gar bab bab tu bzhugs pA mi bya'o//ngas mig sman
15b3('dul ba): 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis mig sman rnams so sor phye la bzhag par bya ste/me tog gi mig sman ni snod kyi rlung
15b4('dul ba): du'o//khu ba'i mig sman ni gob tshe'i nang du'o//phye mi'i mig sman ni dong du'i nang du'o//rI lu'i ming sman dang btsag yug snom gyi mig sman ni skyu ru 'am//thun por srid bas bcing
15b5('dul ba): la/zung nga la gdags par bya'o//mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs nas/'jug par mi byed na 'gal
15b6('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro//gling gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa bye mo skyes sems 'khrugs te/smyos par gyur nas/de de dang de dag tu 'phyan pa/ji tsam nu bram
15b7('dul ba): ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong ste/de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di su'i bu zhig yin/gzhan dog gis smras pa/khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi'o//de dag
16a1('dul ba): gis smras pa/shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong mgron med rnams kyi nang du rab tu ma byung na/'di gnyen rnams kyis gsos par gyur pa zhig ces pa'i skabs
16a2('dul ba): de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dang de lta bas na/dge slong bye ma skyes kyi dpyang sman pa la
16a3('dul ba): dris la byos shig sman pa'i drung du dong nas bzhin bzangs dge slong zhig 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis de'i sman sngon cag/des smras pa/'phagos po drag sha rlon 'tshal du
16a4('dul ba): gsol cig deng sos par 'gyur ro//bzhin bzangs de ci/'dra yin nam/'phags pa de'i sman 'di lags te/gzhad kyis ni smos par mi nuso zhes pa'i skabs de bcom
16a5('dul ba): ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gal te sman pa na de'i sman 'di yin te/gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nu so zhes
16a6('dul ba): zizer na/sha rjen pa sbyin par bya'o//dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byin pa dang /de zar mi btub po/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/mig ras kyis bkab la sbyin
16a7('dul ba): par bya'o//de dag gis byin to byin ma thag tu ras phye ba dang /des log pa la reg pa mthong nas/de zhe logs pas skyug so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/maud
16b1('dul ba): la rAs dbye bar mi bya ste de lta mod kyi bca' ba bzang ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag mdun du bzhag nas gang gis tshe lag pa bkrus pa de'i tshe de dbye bar bya'o//de sos par gyur pa dang /de de nyid
16b2('dul ba): la srid par gyur pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang gi tshe sos par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/bslab pa ji
16b3('dul ba): ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/'jug par bya'o//longs spyod na 'grel tshabs can du 'gyur ro//gleng bzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o//tshe dang ldan pa pi lan da'i bu gang gi tshe
16b4('dul ba): rab tu byung ba de tshun chad rtag tu na ba dang /zug zer mang por gyur pa dang /de la dge slong dag gis skyes pa/gnas brtan khyod kyis snyun gyi zo ji lta/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
16b5('dul ba): dag bdag rgyun tu na pa dang /zug zer mang bas theg pa'i skabs med do//gnas brtan khyod sngon ci zhig 'chang bar byed/des smras pa/sman gyi mtshan khug go/de ci'i phyir mi
16b6('dul ba): bcang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge
16b7('dul ba): slong dag de lta bas na/rje su gnang ste/dge slong gis sman gyis mchan khug bcang bar bya'o//dge slong dag gis rtsa ba dang /me tog dang sdong bu dang /'bras bu'i smyan
17a1('dul ba): rags pa dag de'i nang du bcug pa dang /de dag rul nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/de dag snyam pa 'amakham por byas te bzung ngam
17a2('dul ba): bdag par bya'o//de dag dus nas bco ma ldan 'das kyis b+haka' stsal pa/dus dus su bresnyem pAr b+ha'o//de dag gis nyi ma la bskams pa dang /do //mthu chu bya
17a3('dul ba): gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o//de dag gis grib ma li bskams pa dang /na kyang rdul par gyur na ga bai ma
17a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/grib ma l-i bskum par mi bya'o//de dag gis gting nas dong ba dang /char pa dang /rlung byung ste/mi sdus nas btsom 'das kyis
17a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/bsdu bor bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /de dag gri rdza bsdu ba me shes nas/bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal
17a6('dul ba): pa/khyim pas khyim pa med na dge sbyong gis//dge sbyong med ni dge slong nyid kyis bsdu bar bya'o//dge slong gis basmras pa dang /'dres par gyur nas/'dres
17a7('dul ba): zhes mo zos pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol po/so sor phye nas longs spyod par bya ste/de la 'gyid par mi bya'o//ngas ni bdag la rje su gnang
17b1('dul ba): bA gang yin pa de thams cad min pa'i gnas skabs na spyod par mi bya'o//spyod na 'phrul tshabs can du 'gyur ro//gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//tshe dang ldan pa nam gru gur yang som
17b2('dul ba): nyi za bas/de'i ming nam gru som nya can nam gru sdom nyi tsan zhes bya bor grags//de snga dro sham thabs bgos/chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod
17b3('dul ba): snyoms la zhugs te/de rim gyi sna bu ram byed pa'i grong du phyin pa dang /ji tsam nu 'bras phye dang /bu rAm 'bru bar byed pa mthong nas/des smras pa/shes ldan dag bu ram 'bras
17b4('dul ba): phye dang ma smra shig/'phags pa skye bar bgyid pa gzhan 'ga' mkhyen nam/kho bos spyi bo gzhan yang mi shes mod kyi bdag cag dus ma yin par longs spyod dgos so//'phags
17b5('dul ba): po dus su 'am dus ma yin par gsol yang rung ste/de'i spyi ba ni 'di lags te/gzhan gyis ni mi 'brus so//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/dge 'dun gyi boca' ba bu ram drag rnyed
17b6('dul ba): pa ni des ma zoso//de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /nye gnas dag gis smras pa/slon dpon dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed gyis longs spyad du gsol/des smras pa/bzhin bzang
17b7('dul ba): zas dang 'a'o//de de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang /de rnams la dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi bco' byi bu ram zhig pa rnyed na/ci ste long
18a1('dul ba): ma spyad/de dag gis smras pa/mkhan po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres zhes gsung ngo //de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad do//'khor phal po che dang /dge
18a2('dul ba): 'dun ril las kyang phal po ches longs ma spyod pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zas kyis
18a3('dul ba): zas kyi bya ba mi byed pa ni mi rnyed pas 'byung khring yongasu dag pas longs spyod par bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//glang gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//tshe dang ldan pa nam gru
18a4('dul ba): snga dro sham thabs bgos chos gos dang /lhung bzed thogs nas/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/rim gyis sang zhig tu phyin pa dang /des spos 'tshong zhig
18a5('dul ba): phyi la reg nas bu ram la reg par byed pa mthong nas des smras pa bzhin bzang phye la reg nA bur ma la reg par ma byed/dus ma yin par yang bdag cag gis longs spyad dgos so//des
18a6('dul ba): smos pa/'phags pa bdag la yang dang yang du sug chab gtong ba su zhig mchis/dus gzhan zhig na dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed pa dang /de so longs ma spyad///
18a7('dul ba): lhan cig gan+da pa dang /nye gan dag gri smras pa/slob dpon dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram dag rnyed na/ci ste mi gsol/des smras pa/bzhin bzangs 'di zas dang 'dres so//
18b1('dul ba): de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang /de rnams la dge slong dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed na/ci ste mi za de rnams kyis smras pa/mkhan
18b2('dul ba): po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres so zhes gsung ngo //de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad do//'khor phal po che de dang /dge 'dun ril las kyang phal tshes longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de/
18b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zas kyis zas kyi bya ba mi byed pa mi rnyed kyis/khyim pas yongasu dag pas longs
18b4('dul ba): spyad par bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rlung nad kyis thebs nas/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dogal gyis bu chen pos bsams
18b5('dul ba): po/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/bdag rang gi blos rim gro ni lan mang du byas mod kyi lan 'ga' yang sman pa las ma dris kyis ma le da ni sman pa la dri'o//snyam nas/de sman
18b6('dul ba): ba'i drung du spong ste/bzhin bzangs tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs par gyur na/de'i sman ston cig/des smras pa/'phags pa skur khu'i nang du lan tshwa skyil
18b7('dul ba): la gosal cig dang /sos par 'gyur ro//des skyur khu ni rnyed na/lan tshwa med nas/de lan tshwa btsal bar btsems pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa pi lin de'i bus smras pa/tshe dang
19a1('dul ba): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod la lan tshwa rA gang 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang par byin gyis brlabs pa zlo bla yod kyis/gapA te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang/
19a2('dul ba): na sbyin no zhes smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus thos nas des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgol gyi bu chen po kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba
19a3('dul ba): dus su rung ba dang /longs spyad par mi dbang ngo snyam mo zhes pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa dang /bcom
19a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/mo'u dgal gyi bu mi dbang ste/dus su rung ba grang yin pa dang /thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang /zhag bdun pa gang yin pa
19a5('dul ba): dang /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/gal te dus su rung ba dang /'dres par gyur la gal te byin gyis kyang ma brlabs na/dus su rung ba dang 'dres
19a6('dul ba): pas/dus su spyad par bya'i/dus las 'das par mi bya'o//thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang /zhag 'dron pa gang yin pa dang /'tsho bya'i bar du bcang ba gang
19a7('dul ba): yin pa de gal te/thun chod du rung ba dang 'dres par gyur la/gal te byin gyis ma brlabs //thun tshed da rung ba dang /dris pas thun tshod du spyad par bya'i/
19b1('dul ba): thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o//zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/zhag bdun pa dang /'dres pAr gyur nA/
19b2('dul ba): zhag bdun pa dang 'dres pa zhog bdun du spyod par bya'o//zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o//'tsho ba'i bar du bca' ba gang yin pa de ni/ji srid 'tsho'i bar
19b3('dul ba): du spyad par bya ste/gzhan du spyod ni 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro///sdom l-I/sde chen sha dang gzhing 'brum dang /rlung nas can dang gang po dang //
19b4('dul ba): me sau byin dong ni be'i ra to//sprin chen bya rog rnams yin no//sangs rgyasra bcom ldan dA yule ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing /gshegs pa ni/bA rA na ser byon nus/b+hU
19b5('dul ba): ra na so nu drang song srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nang na bzhugaso//bA ra na se na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba/longs spyod che ba zhig gnos so//de'i
19b6('dul ba): chung ma ni sde chen ma zhes bya'o//de chung ma dang bcas te/dad pa bzangs pa dge ba'i bsam po can yin te/dus bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi zhes bya ba nas
19b7('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/bA ra na ser byon nas bAr na ser drang srong smra ba ri dgas na bzhugaso//zhes thos so zhes nas kyang yang 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan
20a1('dul ba): 'das bdag khyim du lan mang du spyan drangs te/zhal zas ni gsol nas/yo byad thams cad kyis ma bstabs kyis ma la bdag gis da bcom ldan 'das
20a2('dul ba): la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs par bya'o snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
20a3('dul ba): byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde tshon la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad
20a4('dul ba): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang
20a5('dul ba): dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/cang mi gsungs //de nas khyim bdag sde chen//
20a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do//rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga na pa de
20a7('dul ba): log su thel mo sbyar ba btud to/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la dgung zla gsum du na bza'
20b1('dul ba): drung /chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun spyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams 'bul na/bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das
20b2('dul ba): kyis khyim bdag sde chen la cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo //de nas khyi ma dag sde chen bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod derjesu~M yi rang nas/bcom ldan 'das
20b3('dul ba): kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/stan las langs te sod do//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu khyim bdag sde chen gyis zla ba gsum
20b4('dul ba): du na bza' dang chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang snyun gsos kyi rkyen sman dang yi byad rnams bsnyen bkur khi ni byas naso//khyim bdag sna chen gyis kun tu spyod pa ni nad
20b5('dul ba): par sngar langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la bgo bos phyag 'tshal te/dge slong rnams la lta bar byed pa las/dge slong na ba nad che bas che ba sdug bsngal ba'i nad
20b6('dul ba): pa gzhan zhig yod pa de la/smin pas shasu 'thungs shig ces bston to//de na sa khyim de dag sde chen dge slong de gang na ba der song ste ston nas/rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos bya
20b7('dul ba): byas te/dris pa/'phags pa sman pas ci stan des smras pa/sha khu 'thung shig lo//de nas khyim bdage sde chen rang gi khyim du song ste chung ma la smras pa/slob dpon che ge mo
21a1('dul ba): zhes bya ba la sman pas sha khu 'thung shig ces bstan gyis sbyor la skur cig/des bu mo zhig la rin bskur nas tshong 'dus su btang ba ltas/de'i nyin mo
21a2('dul ba): rgyal po'i sras bstam nas/do dril srog su bcug ste/sus kyang srog bcad par mo byi'o//gang gA srog cad na chad pas chod par bcad do zhes bsgo'o//de nas rin gyis kyang tshong
21a3('dul ba): 'dus su sha ma rnyed nas de nas bu mo des de ltar gyur pa dag/khyim bdag sde chen la myos par brjod pa dang /khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsams pa/sangs rgyas la
21a4('dul ba): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag cag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na gal te dge slong zhig sman med pas shi bar gyur na ma leg so zhes de snyam du dpyad na
21a5('dul ba): gi rnon po blangs te/khyim du zhugs nas/brla'i sha l-is bcad de/bu mo la byin nas bu shra'i da khu bar byos la 'phags pa chen ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig/des
21a6('dul ba): de khyer nas dge slong gis longs spyad pa las sos par gyur to////'dul ba gzhi////bam po nyi shu rtsa gsum pa//dge slong des 'di ltar
21a7('dul ba): bdako la khyim bdag gi chung ma'i 'dis rang gis shes bsnyen bskur byas par rig nas de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas/glos phab ste 'dug
21b1('dul ba): pas na rigs pa ma yin gyis/ma la dag gis ma thob pa thob par bya bar dang /ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /mngon gsum du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson par
21b2('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/de brtson 'grus brtsams par brtsams te/de brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang /brtsal ba byas pas/'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i che lnga po g.yo ba dang //mi g.yo ba
21b3('dul ba): 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis minan nas/nyon mongs pa thams
21b4('dul ba): cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/dgra bcom par gyur te/khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba bong ba dang /gser du mnyam pa/na mkha' dang
21b5('dul ba): lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems/ste'u dang tson dan du mnyam pa/rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so sor yang dag
21b6('dul ba): par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang bkur bsti la rgyab kyis phyogs/dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjod par bya ba dang /
21b7('dul ba): mngon du smras par bya ba gyur to//skabs de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/thugasu ma chud pa 'am/rnam par mi
22a1('dul ba): mkhyen pa chung zad kyang mi mnga'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs bsnabs/lhung bzed drang chos gos bsnams nas/dge slong go rlog
22a2('dul ba): kyis yongasu bskor cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas te/khyim bdag sde chen gyis khyim gang na ba der gshegs te/byon nas dge slong gi drage 'dun gyis
22a3('dul ba): gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sngo chen la bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag khyim bdag gi chung ma sde chen
22a4('dul ba): ma mI snang na ga re/bcom ldan 'das spyod lam rdo mi thogs pas phugs na mchi so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tsho ba'i bdag nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab
22a5('dul ba): pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gong gis na rma de mdog 'dra ba dang /lpags pa 'dra ba dang /spu 'dra bar gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlab so//de nas khyim bdag sde chen
22a6('dul ba): gyi chung ma dang ba skyes te/sgor byung nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ci khyim bdag gis chung ma 'di/byang chub sems dpa'i spungs nyam su myong bar byed dme//
22a7('dul ba): des tshig su bcad de gsol pa/sgrim mi gos par 'khor ba na//lus ni shin tu rnyed par bla'i//bskal pa bye ba stong rnamasu//sbyin gnas shin tu rnyed par dka'//de nas khyim
22b1('dul ba): bdag ste chen gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong dri dge 'dun bde bar gshegs par rig nas/gla tsang zhing bsod pa bza' ba dang /bca' ba rnams rang gi lug nas stobs shing
22b2('dul ba): tshim par byed do//rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bze' ba dang /bca' ba dag rang gi lag gis bstabs shing tshim par byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas
22b3('dul ba): phyag bcangs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
22b4('dul ba): khyim bdag sde cheni la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang drag par ston par mdzod/yang dge bar 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/yang dag par
22b5('dul ba): rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i btam gyis yang dag par snyan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par bzedang bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga'
22b6('dul ba): byar mdzad nas/bdan las bzhengs te gshegaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsugs lag du gshegs nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gudan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs
22b7('dul ba): so//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag sha rnams kyis nang na ni/'di lta ste/mi'i sha tha tshod yin no//de lta bas na dge slong gi
23a1('dul ba): m-ig b.ra' bar mi bya'o//dge slong gis m-i shA na ltung ba sgom dor gyum/gzhan snang dus /wAn hU~Mganas brdzun sa da spyong kyi kun tu spyad
23a2('dul ba): pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/dge 'dun myo gnas brnyan gyis dge slong gi shi 'drim par byed na 'di ni rl-i sha zhes dri bar bya'o//gol te dge 'dun gyi gnas brten gyis mi
23a3('dul ba): na/gnas brtan gnyis pas dri bar bya'o//dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/'jug par mi byed na 'gal
23a4('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyuraro//dge sbyong thams cad the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa khyim bdag sde tshon gyi mchis
23a5('dul ba): brang gis rang gro shas dge slong 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyis la/dge slong 'dis kyang sde tshan ma la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du
23a6('dul ba): gyis pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang /dge slong 'di la rang
23a7('dul ba): gis shes bsnyen bkur byas te/'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa/de shin tu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shog dang
23b1('dul ba): bshad do//dge slong dag sngon byung bA ran sa'i grong na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de'i chung ma sde chen ma zhes bya'o//ji tsam na bram ze tshogs 'don du bcug
23b2('dul ba): ba gzhan zhig bram ze'i bu lnga brgya tsam la/bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'dug/de la khyim bdag sde chen dad pa skyes te/des de 'khor dang bcas pa
23b3('dul ba): la yo byad thams cad kyis bsgrubs te/khyim bdag sde chen gyis bram ze dri 'khor dang bcas pa la bkur ba sti kho ni byas so//khyim bdag de'i kun tu skyed pa ni nang par sngar langs
23b4('dul ba): te/nod pa rnams la lta bar byed pa las/ji tsam na bram ze'i khyi'u gzhan zhig na bsdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bar gyur nas/de la sman pas sha khu 'thong shig ces bstan to//de
23b5('dul ba): nas khyim bdag sde chen bram ze khye'u gang na ba der song ste son nas phyag byas te/dris pa dang bram ze'i khye'u khyod la sman pas ci bstan/des smras pa/sha khu 'thung shig lo//de
23b6('dul ba): nus khyim bdag sde chen khyim du song nas chung ma la smras pa/bramo ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba la sha khu 'thung shig ces sman pas bstan gyis de sbyor la bskur cig/des bu mo
23b7('dul ba): zhig lo rin bskur te/tshong 'dus su btang //de nyid kyang nyin mo rgyal po'i bu btsas nas/des dril sgrogasu bcug ste/sus kyang srog bcad par mi bya'o//gang gis srog bcad
24a1('dul ba): par gyur na/de chad pas chod par bcud du zhes bsgo'o//de nas tshong 'dus rin gyis kyang shA m+b+ha rnyed do//de nas bu mo des de ltar gyu ba dag/khyi
24a2('dul ba): bdag sde chen gyi chung ma la rgyas par smras pa dang /khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsams pa/bram ze 'khor dang bcus pa 'di la bdag gAcag gis yo byad thams
24a3('dul ba): cad bstobs na gal te bram ze'i khye'u zhig sman med pas dus byas par gyur na mra legasaso zhes de snyam du dpyad nas gri rnon po blangs te/khyim gyi nang du zhugs nas/brla'i
24a4('dul ba): sha las bcad de bu mo la byin nas/bu sha 'di khu bar byos lnga/bram ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig/des khyer nas bram ze'i khye'u des longs spyad nas
24a5('dul ba): sos par gyur to//bram ze'i khye'u des 'di ltar byadago la khyim bdag gi chung me des rang gi shos bsnyen bkur byas par rig nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bod //
24a6('dul ba): da pas byin pa yongasu longs spyod nas/bdag blos phab s+ho/'dug pa ni rigs pa ma yin gyis/me la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /mi rtogs pa rtogs
24a7('dul ba): par bya ba dang /mngon sum du ma byis pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir/bdag gis 'bad par bya'o snyam nas/de nas de zhi ba'i phyogasu song ste/mngon par shes pa lnga mngon
24b1('dul ba): sum du byas//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyis khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba'i chung ma grang yin pa de ni khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma 'di nyid yino//de'i
24b2('dul ba): tshe de'i dus kyis bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni/dge slong 'di nyid yin+de te/de'i tshe yang 'dis dge slong de la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas te/'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par
24b3('dul ba): shes pa lnga mngon sum du byis//da ltar yang 'dis dge slong 'dri rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byaso//dge slong 'dis kyang 'di la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom
24b4('dul ba): pa mngon sum du byas//dge slong dag de lta bus ni/las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyis rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin/las cig tu dkar ba rnams kyis ni
24b5('dul ba): gcig tu dkar po yin/'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no//dge slong dag de lta bus na/du phyin chud las gcig tu gdug pa rnams dang 'dren mo ni spangs la/lus gcig
24b6('dul ba): tud//dbyel badralnga bar bya ste/dge slong dge khyod kyis de lta phu la bslab par bya//gleng gzhini mon+dan yod nano//de'i tshe yul ka sa la'i rgyal po gsol rgyal gyi glang po che cho dag
24b7('dul ba): kha ny+tsa do//mu he'i dus byung bas/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis glang po che'i sha za bar brtsamaso//drug sde'i dge slong dag snga dro sham thabs dgos/lhung bzed dang chos da
25a1('dul ba): thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugaso//ji tsam na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis glang po che'i sha 'phru bar bcug ste/'tshod cing 'dug pa'i khyim der
25a2('dul ba): de dag zhugs pa dang /khyim bdag gis chung mas smras/'phags pa dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyis bzhud cig/de dag gis smras pa/phru ba 'di'i nang na 'tshod cing 'dug na//
25a3('dul ba): 'phags pa 'di ni glang po che'i sha lags ni/ci khyed cag kyang glang po che'i sho gsol lam/kho bo cag ni 'tsho ba khyed cag la rag las pa yin pas gal te/khyed za na kho bo cag
25a4('dul ba): la yang byin cig/de dag la phul nas/de dag gis lhung bzed kyi snod bkang ste/phyir byung ba dge slong gzhan dag cig bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de dag gis mthong //mthong nas dris pa/
25a5('dul ba): e ma drug sde dag lhung bzed kyi snod khengs na ci yin te/de dag gis smras pa/glang po che'i sha cung zad rnyed do//ci khyed cag glang po che'i sha yang za 'am/tshe dang ldan pa dag mu
25a6('dul ba): ge'u dus byung ba la/gal te gzhan ma rnyed na/ci kho bo cag lhogs te 'chi'am zhes pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
25a7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rgyal po'i glang po che tshe dgu kha tag la gal te/khyed kyis glang po'i she zos pa rgyal pos thos na/khyed la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /
25b1('dul ba): klu dang mi dang /mi ma yin pa gzhan dag kyang yod pas/'phags pa dag glang po che'i sha za ste/des nas bdag gi glang po rgya tshe dgu kha trug go zhes sems par mi 'gyur ram/ngan
25b2('dul ba): slong de lta bas na/dge slong dag gis glang po che'i sha longs spyad par mi byi'o//longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//glang po che'i sha ji lta ba bzhin rtag sha yang de dang 'dra'o//
25b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom 'das yul tsam pa na/drang srong gar gi'i rdzing 'gram na bzhug so//yul tsam pa'i klu dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can de tshes brgyad dang /bcu bzhi la
25b4('dul ba): gnas nas byung ste/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen granas blangs nas/gnas snang bar lus chen por byas te/lus btang nas 'dug cig 'jig rten na sems can
25b5('dul ba): dag gnas pa dag la cung zad kyang gnod pa'i ma skrag par mi byed//mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang /lug rdzi rnams dang /rtswa thun rnams dang /
25b6('dul ba): shing thun rnams dang /lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang /lam grol bas 'tsho pi'i me rnams kyis/klu'i sha la dum bu dum bur bcad nas longs spyad par brtsams//drug sde
25b7('dul ba): dge slong dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang /chos gos dag thogs nas/bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ji tsam na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis klu'i sha phre
26a1('dul ba): bar bcug ste 'tshod cing 'dug pa'i khyim der de dag zhugaso//khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/'phags pa dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyis bzhud
26a2('dul ba): cig/de dag gis smras pa/phru pi 'di'i nang na 'tshod cing 'dug ni/'phags pa 'di ni klu'i sha lags na/ci khyed cig kyang klu'i sha gsol la mo//khro bo cag ni 'tsho ba khyed cig
26a3('dul ba): la rag las pa yin pas gal te khyed cag za na/kho bo cag la yang byin cig/de dag la phul nas/'phags pa rnams kyang longs spyad do zhes phal mo che spyad par brtsamaso//
26a4('dul ba): de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma 'di snyam du sems te/'phags pa 'di dag kyang klu'i sha la longs spyad pas/skye bo'i tshogs phal mo chos longs spyad na/bdag gi khyim thabs
26a5('dul ba): kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal mnags dgos/bdag gis 'di'i phyir 'di kho na bya'o//snyam mo/de nas rtse mo pa'i klu'i chung ma de mtshan mo 'das nos kha dog 'phags pas
26a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der srong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs cig tu 'dug go de'i tshe na tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma'i kha
26a7('dul ba): dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing gi nye 'khor r-i k+sha ba rgya chen pos khyab par byaso//tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
26b1('dul ba): gsol to//btsun pa bdag gis sdum thab dad pa brdung ba/dge ba'i bsam pa can de tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung ste/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gran+da
26b2('dul ba): blangs nas/lus btang ste mchis la/'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa dang /skrag pa cung zad kyang mi bgyid pa/mu ge'i dus byung bas las le mi blta ba'i mi
26b3('dul ba): phyug rdzi rnams dang /lug rdzi rnams dang /rtswa thun rnams dang /shing thun rnams dang /lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang /lam gol bas 'tshe ba'i mo rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum
26b4('dul ba): bur bkum nas/'tshal ba 'phags pa dag gis gzigs nas 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang gsol bar brtsamaso//'bags pa rnams kyis gsol pa de dag gis kyang
26b5('dul ba): phal cher bkum zhing 'tshal bar brtsams nas/bdag gis sdum thab kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal mnags 'tshal/kye ma bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba
26b6('dul ba): nye bar bzung ste/gang gi phyir 'phags pa dag klu'i sha mi gsol bar dgongs pa'i rgyu cung zhig bca' bar gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma
26b7('dul ba): la cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo /de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung mas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcing mi gsungs pas gnang bar rigs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
27a1('dul ba): la bgo bos phyag byas te/de nyid mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan ma 'das nas/dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis gung
27a2('dul ba): la gdan shams pa nyid la bzhugaso//bzhugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ma dang gsum pa'i spyan sngar tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma
27a3('dul ba): mtshan mo 'das nas/kha dog 'phags pas nga gang na ba der 'ongs te/phyin nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig te 'dug
27a4('dul ba): nas/yang de'i tshe tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar gau'i rdzing gi nye 'khor thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byaso/tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma phyogs gcig
27a5('dul ba): tu 'dug nas/nga la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag gi sdu ma thab ded pa bzangs pa dag pa'i bsam pa can de tshe so brgyad dang /bcu bzhi la rang gis ga nA~M nas byung ste/ya na///
27a6('dul ba): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas/lus btang ste/mchis la 'jig rten na sems can dang gnas pa la gnod pa dang skrag pa cung zad kyang mi bgyid pa mu ge'i
27a7('dul ba): dus byung bas las la mi blta ba'i mi phyugs rje rnams dang /lug rdzi rnams dang /rna thun rnams dang /shin thun rnams dang /lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang /lam gol
27b1('dul ba): byas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum bur bkum nas 'chalo//de dag gis 'chal ba dang /'phags pa dag gis kyang gsol bar brtsam so//'phags pa rnams kyis gtsa/
27b2('dul ba): to zhes de dag gis cher bkum zhing /'tshal bar brnams nas/bdag gis sdum thab yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal ba nags 'tshal/kye ma bcom ldan 'das thugs rtse ba nye bar
27b3('dul ba): bzung ste/gang gi phyir 'phags pa drag klu'i sha mi gsol bar dgongs bIN+ya cung zhig bca' bar gsol zhes zer nas/ngas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma la cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo //
27b4('dul ba): de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung mas nga bcang mi gsungs pas gnang bar rig nas/nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//gang la da lta lha dag kyang
27b5('dul ba): kya'i sras kyis dge sbyong de rnams ni dge ba'i chos rnams las nyam so zhes smod par byed phyar ka btong bar byed/kha zor bar byed pa 'di ni bzang po ma yin rigs pa ma yin te/dge slong de/
27b6('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong dag gis klu'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o//zan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das yul mau ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byin
27b7('dul ba): nas/rgyal po'i khab 'on me'i tshil bA ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhug so//ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs
28a1('dul ba): rgyu zhing gshegs te/rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal byaka la na dag gan pa na bzhugs so//zhes thos//thos nas kyang 'di
28a2('dul ba): snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lan mang du spyan drangs te/zhal zas gsol na/la ni 'ga' yang zla ba gsum du yo byas thams cad kyis ma bstabs
28a3('dul ba): kyis/ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs shing /sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyang dbul lo snya mo//de nas rgyal po'i
28a4('dul ba): 'byor pa dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na bo der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lo mgo bos byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug//
28a5('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i btam gyiso yang dag par ston
28a6('dul ba): por mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzing stong par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos dang
28a7('dul ba): ldan pa'i gtam gyi yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod//yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //de nas
28b1('dul ba): ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das
28b2('dul ba): gang na ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu dgung zla gsum
28b3('dul ba): du bsod snyoms dang /na bzo'o chos gos dang /gzims cha dang /snyun spyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams dang /sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'bul na/bdag la gnang bar
28b4('dul ba): mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de na sau ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
28b5('dul ba): can snying pos/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsungs pas gnod par rig nas/stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo //bcom
28b6('dul ba): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po zlab gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzim cha dang /spyan
28b7('dul ba): dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyis yo byad thams cad dang /sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rim gro kho na byas so//yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
29a1('dul ba): thabs gcig tu/ma gra d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos yo byad thams cad dang /sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed bstab so zhes thos//thos nas kyang 'dra
29a2('dul ba): snyam du sems te/de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin/bdag kyang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yon la/de'i sman pa'i rgyal po ni 'tsho byed yin
29a3('dul ba): la/bdag gi sman pa'i rgyal po ni rgyun shes kyi bu yon gyis/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na byon pa de'i tshe/bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyis dge 'dun
29a4('dul ba): dang thabs gcig la/yo byad thams cad dang /sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu bstabs par bya'o snyamo//ji tsam na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar zhugs nas/dbyar gyi zla ba
29a5('dul ba): gsum 'dras nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas/lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gis tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing /dge slong gi
29a6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis bltas nas/mnyan yod du byon nas/mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/rim rgyu zhing gshegs pa nas/mnyan yod du byon nas/mnyan yod na rgyal
29a7('dul ba): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhug so//ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/mnyan
29b1('dul ba): yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshe la mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//zhes thos//thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der srong ste/phyin
29b2('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po
29b3('dul ba): gsal rkyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzod/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stong par mdzad/yang dag par rab
29b4('dul ba): tu dga' bar mdzad de rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i btam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng stong/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
29b5('dul ba): mdzad nas/cang mi gsungs ngo //de nas ko mA la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gtsug tu gzar nas pus mo grayas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom
29b6('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thul mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gri dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la dgung
29b7('dul ba): zla gsum dun bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams dang /sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyis bu dbul na/
30a1('dul ba): bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bus gnang ngo //de nas kau sA la'i rgyul/
30a2('dul ba): po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bya gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas song //bcom
30a3('dul ba): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig kro sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad dang /sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bus/rim
30a4('dul ba): gri kho na byas//ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi kun tu spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byis nas/dge slong nad pa la blta ba
30a5('dul ba): yin no/ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig go zhung 'brum gyis thebs nas de skye bo bseng bsdeng por gyur cing rid pa dang /nya mo chung ba drang /na bas nyam dmas par gyur
30a6('dul ba): pa de/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong nas smras pa/'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir skya bo bsed bsdeng por gyur cing ring pa dang nyam chung ba dang /na bas
30a7('dul ba): nyam dmas par gyur/lha bdag gzhang 'brum gyis theb so//de nas rgyal pos sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu la bsgo ba dge slong 'di'i dpyad byos shig/de
30b1('dul ba): lha bka' bzhin 'tshul de ma dad pas/de ma byas so//d+hI tsamya na rgyal pos yang dge slong de mthong nas dris pa/'phags pa khyod rgyun shes kyi bus dpyad ma bgyis
30b2('dul ba): sa mya/lha ma bgyis//de nas rgyal po khros to/rgyun shes kyi bu pho nyas bkug nas/bsgo ba gal te khyod kyis dge slong 'dri'i dpyad byos ni/de lta na legs/gal te ma byas
30b3('dul ba): na khyod kyi dbang thang bcad do//de rang bzhin gyi dang po zhig pas ches 'khrugs nas dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i phyir lhas bdag gi dbang thong gcod par 'gyu ro zhes/des dag
30b4('dul ba): slong de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi sgor gzo bcos byas nas/de dang de nas mtshan gyi laso bya bar brtsam so//de nas dge slong de nyam nga ba dang dog pa dang /gnod pa thob cing
30b5('dul ba): sdug bsngal rtsub pa tsho ba mi bzad pa/yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyamasu myongs nas bsdams pa nyam nga ba dog pa gnod pa thob pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgo
30b6('dul ba): po lha zhig skabs de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/thugasu mi chud pa 'am/rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi
30b7('dul ba): ma'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bskul nas/phyogs der gshegs pa dang /sman po'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bus/bcom ldan 'das phyogs
31a1('dul ba): der gshegs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang kun nas dkris pa drag pos/bcom ldan 'das la smras pa/dge sbyong bran mo'i bu tshur shog/nyan thos
31a2('dul ba): rkub phye ba la ltos/de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid nas slar log ste/gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas/gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//bzhugs nas bcom ldan
31a3('dul ba): 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni chos nyid yin te/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po
31a4('dul ba): dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dag 'byung zhing /kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng tu 'gro'o//gang dag 'og tu song ba dag ni yang sos dang thing nag dang /bsdus gzhom
31a5('dul ba): dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer ba dang /
31a6('dul ba): a chu zer ba dang /ud pu lhar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po rnamasu song ste/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la ni bsil bar
31a7('dul ba): 'bab bo//grang po'i sems can dmyal ba rnams gang dag yin pa de dag la ni dro bar 'babo//des sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par dag so sor zhi bar
31b1('dul ba): bAr byas//de rnams 'di snyams du sems te/shes ldan drag ci bdag cag 'di nas shrI 'phos par gyur tam/'on te gzhan du skyes par gyur snyam pu la/de rnams dad pa bskyed pa'i
31b2('dul ba): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa zhig btang ngo //de rnams kyis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan dag bdag cog ni 'di nas shi 'phros pa med la
31b3('dul ba): gzhan du skyes pa med kyis kyang /sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnams so sor zhi bar byaso zhes de rnams sprul pa la sems
31b4('dul ba): mngon par dad por gyur pas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/gang du bden pa rnams mthong ba'i snod du gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor
31b5('dul ba): ba mtshams sbyor ba bzung /grong dag steng du song ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan
31b6('dul ba): 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i bdun no 'don pa dang /tshangs pa chen po dang /'od chung dang /tshad mid 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad
31b7('dul ba): me dge dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu che dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang dang /shin tu mthong dang /'og min
32a1('dul ba): gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i dbyangs sgrogs cing tshigasu bcad pa 'di gnyis kyang
32a2('dul ba): bsgrag so//brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya'o//sangs rgyas bstan la 'jugs par bya//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sngon gzhom par bya//gang zhig
32a3('dul ba): rab tu bag yod pas/chos 'dul 'di la brtson 'gyur na//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab tu spongs nas/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis skyong
32a4('dul ba): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams byul nas//bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'gro'o//de la gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las
32a5('dul ba): rnams lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su nub par 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdum log su nub par 'gyuraro//dmyal bar
32a6('dul ba): skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyuraro//dus 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par nub par 'gyuraro//yoM dgas
32a7('dul ba): su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bo nub par 'gyur//mir skye ba ro yung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi pus mor nub par 'gyur//stobs kyi 'jo
32b1('dul ba): gyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par zhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil du nub par 'gyur to//'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i
32b2('dul ba): mthi la du nub par 'gyur//lha rnamasu lung ston par bzhed na ni/sku'i lte bar nub par 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal-I gyi nang du nub par
32b3('dul ba): 'gyuraro//ring byang chub tu lung sbyin par bzhod na ni/mdzod spur nub par 'gyur ro//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tu
32b4('dul ba): nub par 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'dis le lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthil du nub po/de nas bcom ldan
32b5('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thul mo sbyar nas zhus pa/kha doka sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi//tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur la//ji ltar gdug
32b6('dul ba): ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//yang tshig su bcad pa bdag gsol ba/rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi//
32b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par//rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mdzad//de slad bstan pa nyid klos dus
33a1('dul ba): bakhyen nas//rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog/nyan par 'tshal ba'i nyan pa po rnams kyi//thotsam skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang //
33a2('dul ba): dum pa bzang po dag gis bsol du gsol//tshwa chu ri bo lta bur brtan po'i mgon//rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams blo bur 'dzum mi ston//brtan po ci slad 'dzum pa bston mdzad pa/
33a3('dul ba): skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/de de bzhin ni//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
33a4('dul ba): don par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi ston te/kun dga' bo sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu nyams shing chud zos par gyur te/des de bzhin
33a5('dul ba): gshegs pa mang pos bskor ba'i gdung brgyud nas bzung ste/spyod pa skyon mi mnga' ba la bla na ma'i bu zhes smras so//de de nas zhag bdun ni khrag dron du spyugs te/dus byed
33a6('dul ba): par 'gyur te//lus zhig nas/sems ce ni dmyalta ba rnams skyo bar 'gyur//dge slong dag de bsnun/rgyun shes kyi bu'am/rgyun shes kyi bu 'dra ba la bsnyen bkur byeng du
33a7('dul ba): ma bzhugs shig/gzhang 'brum yang bcang bar mi byi'o//'on kyong gzhang 'brum gyi dbyed ni rnam pa gnyis kyis byi ste/gsang sngags dang /sman gyis so//dge slong gis gzheng
33b1('dul ba): 'brub gnod dum rgyun shes kyi bu 'dra ba la bsnyen bkur byung du 'jug nu 'phrul tshogs can du 'gyur//dge slong de rgyun shos kyi bus ji ltar gnod pa de nyid kyis dus las 'das bung
33b2('dul ba): de ltar bya'o//de nas phrin po dag gri rgyal po gas pa rgyal la smras po/lha rkyen shes kyi bus ni bcom ldan 'das la yang bran mo'i bu zhes tshig tu smras la/dge slong de yang ji ltar gnod pa de nyid
