33b3('dul ba): kyis dus las 'das pa de lta de ltar bgyis//de nas rgyal po che thang du khros nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag ngas sman po'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu yongasu btang zin
33b4('dul ba): gyis dang shig/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha gum lags pa de dgum ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge bdun ni khrag drim du skyugs nas dus byed par 'gyur te/lus
33b5('dul ba): zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//zhes lung bstan lags//rgyal pos smras pa/gal te de ltar rgyur n+te/de'i yul nas sbyinas shig de dag gis ni
33b6('dul ba): skyugs nas/yul gnos bcas zhes bya bar phyin no//yul gnas bcas na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi skye dur ti mug gang gi phyir khyod khams gsum gyi mgon po lha/bran
33b7('dul ba): mo'i bu zhes tshig tu smras pa/khyod 'dir gan su gau la rung zhes mang du spyos nas bskrad do//de de nis bA ra ni sor song ngo //de nas kyang bskyed nas yangs pa can du song ngo //de nas
34a1('dul ba): kyang bskrad nas yul tsam par song ngo //de nas kyang bskrad nas/rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo //de nas kyang bskrad nas shing drung zhig na gnaso//de nas kyang
34a2('dul ba): shring la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis bskrad nas/'bab chu dang mtsho dang 'tshe'u dag gi 'gram zhig tu song ba dang //der yang skabs me rnyed nas/des bsams pa/'dzam bu'i
34a3('dul ba): gling 'di na/re shig waM dag gis kyang bskabs rnyed na/bdag gis skabs shing drung dang mtsho dang 'tshe'u dag na yang med do snyam pa dang /de la gang gis na khrag dron po skyugs
34a4('dul ba): nas/dus las 'das pa de lta bu'i kun nas dkris pa skyeso//dus las 'das ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyeso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
34a5('dul ba): byung ba de la tshigs bcad pa dag gsungs pa/mi zhog skyes par gyur pa yi//kha nas ste re tshigs byung ste//nyes par smra ba sgra tshig des//bdag nyid la ni gracod
34a6('dul ba): phyir byed//grang zhig slad 'os skye bo bsngags byed cing //bsngags 'os skye bo rnam par smod byed pa/de ni khaM yi nyes pa grang gis na//bde ba 'thob mi 'gyur ba'i nyes pa
34a7('dul ba): sogaso//'dir ni brgyan pos rong gi nir yal pa//'di ni phung be cung zad tsam yin te//bdo gshegs rnams la yid kyis gdugs bsams pa//gang yin de ni phung
34b1('dul ba): ba chen po yin//'phags la smod byed lus dang ngagra gi las//sdig to byas nas chu bur rdol rnams//lo 'bum dag dang chu bur can du'o//bzhi khri chig stong gang yin dmyal
34b2('dul ba): der 'gro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shI nas ljongs rgya zhing gshegs pa ni/grong rdal mtshams ma bcad pa gzhan zhig tu dgongs btab nas bzhug so//de nas bcom
34b3('dul ba): ldan na chu nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis rang gi blos ni rim gro lan mang du byas
34b4('dul ba): nAM/sman pa lnga lan 'ga' yang ma dris kyis/ma la bdag gis da ni smin pa la dri'o//snyam te/de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin bzangs/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu spyan
34b5('dul ba): gyis thibs kyis sman ston cig/des smras pa 'phag pa gru gsum cheb mar med pa stsal pa sgrol la gsil gcig/snyun gdangs par 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
34b6('dul ba): dga' bo rang ny-id kyis byas te/sa nas/bcom ldan 'das la phra mo//spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/sangs rgyas bcom
34b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bo la rmas pa/kun dga' bo 'di ci yin/des gsol pa btsun pa bdag go glo ba la bsams na/bcom ldan 'das la bdag
35a1('dul ba): gis rang gi blos ni rim gro lan mang du bgyis na/sman pa la lan 'ga' yang ma dris kyis/ma la bdag gis da ni sman pa la drisa'o snyam bgyid nas/bdag
35a2('dul ba): gis sman pa la rmas pa/de'i mchis nas gru gsum chab ma mang pos stsal pa/sgrol la stsol cig dang /snyun gdangs par 'gyur ro//zhes mchi nas/de nas bdag gis
35a3('dul ba): bgyis te/bskal pa lagaso//kun dga' bo gang du btsos/mtshams kyi nang du'o//gang du gzhag mtshams kyi nang du'o//sus brtsos/bdag gis mtshams kyi nang du sa kun dal
35a4('dul ba): bomachis kyi nang du btsos la//mchis kyi nang du bzhag kyang 'ag lon pa longs spyad par mi bya'o//mtshams kyi nang du btsos la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu zhag lon pa yang longs spyad par mi bya'o//mtshams
35a5('dul ba): kyi phyi rol tu bcos la mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa yong longs spyod par mi bya'o//mtshams kyi phyi rol du bcos la mtshams kyi phyi rol du zhag len na yang longs spyad par
35a6('dul ba): mi bya'o//kun dga' bo mtshams kyi nang yang rung mtshams kyi phyi rol tu yang rung ste/dge slong gis btsos pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyad par mi bya'o//bcom ldan
35a7('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong gis btsos pa'i thams cad kyis thams cad du longs spyad par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /gnyen yod na khyim bdag gzhon zhig yod pa de/bcom ldan
35b1('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug//phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos dang ldan pa'i/
35b2('dul ba): gtam gyis yang ga par ston pa mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzang stod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/rnams grangs du ma ro zhes bya ba nas/yang dge
35b3('dul ba): par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/cang mi gsungs ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de nas khyim bdag de stan las langs te/bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das
35b4('dul ba): gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig sang bdag gi sbrum par gdug
35b5('dul ba): tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/gnong bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/rgyas par sbyar te/ji tsam na spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa btsun pa gdugs tshod lags na/bcom ldan
35b6('dul ba): 'dasad de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol/de nas dge slong gri dge 'dun snga gro shams thabs bogs/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas/khyim ga la ba der dong ngo //bcom
35b7('dul ba): ldan 'das ni bsod snyoms bzhes nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i khyim ni bzhug so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms bzhos nas rgyu lngas rdzas kyis
36a1('dul ba): bsgrubs pa'i khyim na bzhugs te/lnga gang zhes na nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang /gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang /nang du yang dag
36a2('dul ba): 'jog la bzhugs par bzhed pa dang /lha rnams la chos ston par zhes pa dang /nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslabs pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa yin no//skabs
36a3('dul ba): 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la brlab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pas bsod snyoms bzhed nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i khyim na bzhug so//tshe dang ldan
36a4('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod snyoms nod pa yin te/ji tsam der 'bras chan ma chos pa zhig phog pa dang /de nas tshe dang ldan po kun dga' bo 'di snyam
36a5('dul ba): sems te/bcom ldan 'das snyun gdangs nas/ring po ma lon la/'bras chan 'di yang ma chos pa zhig pas 'di gal te longs spyad na sbyin slar ldang bar 'gyur srid
36a6('dul ba): kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gra nang yang /'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas/gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/dres chu snod blangs te chus btab nas ji srid
36a7('dul ba): chos pa de srid du bcos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/sangs rgyas bcom
36b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/kun dga' bo ci dge 'dun thams cad kyi 'bras can yang 'di 'dra 'am/btsun pa ma lags te/'on kyang ma dral ba
36b2('dul ba): leg so//'o na 'drig la 'ongs/des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo legaso legs so//ngas
36b3('dul ba): rjesu gnang ba gang yin pa de yang khyod kyis sheso//de lte bas na rje su gnang ste/dge slong gis ma tshos pa byin len byos la/bcos la longs spyad par bya'o//bcom ldan
36b4('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong gis mchos pa byin len byos la/bcos te longs spyad par bya'o//zhes gsungs pa dang /drug sde rnams kyis 'bras skam byin len byas te/bcos
36b5('dul ba): nas longs spyad par btsums pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/'bras chan sum cha chos
36b6('dul ba): pa byin len byos la bcos te/longs spyad par bya'o//tshed ma dang me tog dang /'bras bu dang /nya dang sha dag ni kha dog gyur na/byin len byas te longs spyad par bya'o//'o mA
36b7('dul ba): lo sogs po'i rjes kyis khu ba rnams gang gri tshe lon gnyis lan gsum du bskol bar gyur pa de'i tshe byin len byas te/bskol nas spyad par bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi
37a1('dul ba): bya'o//'di las gzhan du longs spyad na 'gul tshabs can du 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
37a2('dul ba): ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe grong khyer slo ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni/khyim bdag 'byor pA zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/yongasu bzungs pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i
37a3('dul ba): nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis mgrin pa zhig gnaso//des rigs monyam pa lngas chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur
37a4('dul ba): spyod par byed do//de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to//de zla ba brgyad dmo dgu 'das nas/khye'u
37a5('dul ba): gzugs bzung ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas nas/de ny+dzi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i bac+doMswa ston rgya cher byas nas/ming 'dogs par byed do//
37a6('dul ba): khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags nye du rnams kyis smras pa/khye'u 'di khyim bdag 'byor pa'i bu yin pas/de lta bas na khyi'u'i ming 'byor len zhes bya bar gdag so zhes khyi'u de'i ming
37a7('dul ba): 'byor len zhes bya bar btag so//yang rtse bar byed dga' bor byed/dga' dgu ro spyod par byed pa las khye'u bcas nas/de'i ming ni 'byor skyob ces bya bar btag so//yang de'i khye'u
37b1('dul ba): zhig bcas te/de'i ming ni 'byor dga' zhes btag so//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag 'byor pa nad kyis btab par gyur nas/de shin tu tshig rtsub por smra ste/des na chung ma dang
37b2('dul ba): bus kyang yal ba ro//de'i mingag gzhug byed pa'i bu mo zhig yod pa des bsams pa/bdag gi ngo bos thabs brgya stong du mas longs spyod rnams bsags na de nad kyis thebs
37b3('dul ba): par gyur pa dang /chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar boraro//bdag gis rje bo yal bar dor ba ni bdag la rig pa ma yin no//snyams nas/des sman pa'i drung du song ste jo bo khyod kyis
37b4('dul ba): khyim bdag 'byor pa mkhyen tam/shes so//de ci bya/de 'dri 'dra ba'i bro nad cig gis thebs te/de chung ma drang bus kyang yal bar bor na/de'i sman ston cig/des smras
37b5('dul ba): pau/chung ma dong bu dag gis kyang yal bar bor ro zhes khyod nyid zer nas/'o na de la su zhig rim gro byed/de'i rim gro badrag gis bgyi mod kyis ci nas kyang sman rin chung ba
37b6('dul ba): zhig skyon cig/des de'i sman ni 'di yin no zhes bstan to//de nas des bdag rang gis rgyags las kyang cung zad sbyar/khyim de nyid nas kyang cung zud brkus nas/reme glo
37b7('dul ba): byas te de song bar gyur to//des bsams pa/bdag gi chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor te/'di ltar bdog gson por gyur pa ni bu mo 'di'i mthu yin gyis/'di
38a1('dul ba): la phran gradags par bya'o snyam nas/des de smras pa/bu mo kho bo ni chung ma dang /bus kyang yal bar bor ba las/khro bo cung zed cig gson
38a2('dul ba): pa de thams cad ni khyod kyi ming yin na/khyod mchog ci 'dod pa sbyin gyis smros shig/gal te jo bo bdag khyod kyi thugasu 'thad par gyur na/dag khyod dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'tshal//
38a3('dul ba): dede smras gang dung phyod lhan cig 'grog parba byas/kar sha pa ni lnga brgya byin la dran lha gyo bar bya'o//des smras pa/jo bo bdag rgyangs bkum par mchis kyang bran mo kho na lags pa ri bas te/
38a4('dul ba): gal te rje'i sras khyod dang lhan cig 'grogs na/de lta na bran mor mo 'gyur lags so//des gal gyis chu bar shes nas smras pa/bu mo gang gi tshe rung zhing zla mtshan
38a5('dul ba): dang ldan par gyur po de'i kho bo la sbron cig/des dus gzhan zhig na rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur nas/des de la sbran to//de nas khyim bdag 'byor pa dang /de
38a6('dul ba): prAnyis dga' dgur spyad pas/de sems can dang ldan par gyur to//gang gi nyi ma la sems can zhugs par gyur pa'i nya ni de kho na nas bzung nas/khyim bdag 'byor
38a7('dul ba): pi'i skor thams cad dong las kyi mtha' thams cad yong su rdzogs par gyur to//de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas/khye'u gzugs bzangs pa mdzes par blta na sdug
38b1('dul ba): pa 'dog gasder 'dra ba/mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring bya dbral ba'i dbyes che ba/smin ma 'dzar ba/sna'i gzangs mtho ba/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad
38b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa zhig bac+doM so//de btsas nas lhag par khyim bdag 'byor pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang /las kyi mtha' thams cad yongasu rdzogs par gyur to//de nyi ma bdun
38b3('dul ba): gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bcos pa'i bcos ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de zhes bya ba nas/gang po zhes bya bar gdag so zhes de'i ming gang bro zhes btag so//zhes
38b4('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong mu bzhin//khye'u gang po mA ma brgyad la rje su btud de/dri ma 'phyi ba'i mo ma gnyis dang /zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyor te/rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma gzhin du myur
38b5('dul ba): du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang rmyis dang /grangs dang /lag rtsis dang /dbyung ba dang /gzhug pa dang /gzhag pa li nye bar zhugs
38b6('dul ba): shong gtag pa brgyad po gzhi brtag pa dang /res brtag pa dang /rin po che brtag pa dang /shing brtag pa dang /glang po che ba rtag pa dang /rta brtag pa dang /zhon nu brtag pa dang //
38b7('dul ba): gzhon nu ma brtag pa la shin tu byang zhing brtag pa gzhan yang byed pa dang /klog pa mkhas pa dang /spyod pa gsel bar gyur to//gnas khyim bdag 'byor bram 'byor len
39a1('dul ba): la sogs pa bu rnams rim bzhin du khyim phub pa dang /de dag chung ma la lhag par chags pas/'tshon ma yal bar byor te 'jo sgeg lhur len cing
39a2('dul ba): 'khod do//de nas khyim bdag 'byor pa lag pa la 'gram pa gtod nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa de bu rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/yab khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad
39a3('dul ba): nas sems khongasu chud cing bzhugs/des smras pa/bu dag nga ni ji srid gasder 'bum ma rnyed pa/de srid du khyim ma phub bo//khyed cag 'tshon ma yal bar bor na chung ma la lhag
39a4('dul ba): par chags pas 'ji sgeg lhur len cing 'khod de/nga shi nas khyim mya ngan gyis grang bar 'gyur na/ji ltar sems khongasu chud par mi 'gyur/'byor len gyis rin po che'i
39a5('dul ba): rna rgyan thogs pa phral nas/shIng gi rna brgyan cig btags te/bdag gis ji srid gser 'bum ma grub pa de srid du rin po che'i rna brgyan gdags par mi bya'o zhes dam bcas
39a6('dul ba): so/gcig gis ni rgya skegs kyi rna ba rgyan to//gcig gis ni zhwa nye'i rna brgyan no//de dag gi ming 'byor lan dang /'byor slob dang /'byor dga' zhes gang yin pa de dag nub par
39a7('dul ba): gyur nas/shing gi rna brgyan dang /rgya skegs kyi rna rgyan can/zha nye'i rna brgyan can zhes bya bar ming brag so//de rnams zong thogs te/rgya mtsho chen por dong pa dang /gang pos
39b1('dul ba): smras pa/yab bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen por mchi'o//des smras pa bu khyod bus pa yin gyis 'di nyid du 'dug la tshong khang gis bya ba dag byos shig/ces de ni de nyid du 'dug go/de rnam
39b2('dul ba): kyis kyang gru bo che grub nas lhags te/lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas smras pa/yab bdag cag gi zing 'di brtsir gsol/brtsis nas re res kyang gser 'bum 'bum rnyed par
39b3('dul ba): gyur to//gang pos kyang de nyid du chos dang /'thun par bsgyur ba ga sder 'bum lhag cig rnyed nas/gang pos kyang pha'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/yab bdag gi tshang khang
39b4('dul ba): nas bsgyur ba'i rdzas kyang brtsir gsol/des smras pa/bu khyod 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug na/khyod la ci zhig brtsir yod/des smras pa/yab 'on kyang brtsir gsol/mkhyen par
39b5('dul ba): 'gyuraro//brtsis nas gang po yang rigs par bsgrubs pa bzhi po nyid ma gtogs pa/gser 'bum lhag cig byung ngo //khyim bdag 'byor pa dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes te/bsam
39b6('dul ba): pa sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig lta ste/'dris 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du gser 'bum rnyed cig grub po snya mo/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig ni/khyim
39b7('dul ba): bdag 'byor pa nad kyis btab par gyur nas/des bsams pa/bdag shi ba dang /'di dag 'bye bar 'gyur gyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/des de dag la
40a1('dul ba): smras pa/bu dag shing skam po dag lta gon gyis shig/de rnams kyis shing dag sta gon dag byas pa dang /des smras pa/me bus shig/de rnams kyis me
40a2('dul ba): bus pa dang /des smras pa/mgal ba re re nas phyung shig/de rnams kyis mgal ba re re nas phyung ba dang /me do shi bar gyur to//des smras pa/bu dag khyod kyis mthong
40a3('dul ba): ngam/yab mthong lag so//des tshig su bcad pa dag smras pa/mgul ba tshogs pas mi 'bar ltar/spyan tshogs pa yang de bzhin no//mgayo ba phral na shi
40a4('dul ba): 'gyur ba//mi rnams kyang ni de dang 'dra//bu dag nga shi nis khyed cag gris bud med kyi tshigs mnyan par mi bya'o//bud med kyis ni mdza' dag 'byed//sngar ma rnams ni
40a5('dul ba): ngag gis 'byed//ngan la smras pas gsung tshig 'phel//'dod pa yid ni mdza' ba shas 'byed//de dag gzhan ni dong ngo //'byor len de nyid na 'dug pa dang /des smras
40a6('dul ba): pa/bu khyod kyis ji ltar gyur kyang gang po gtang bar mi bya ste/sems can 'dri ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pA yin+da no zhes bsgo ste/bsags pa kun gyi
40a7('dul ba): mtha' zad cing //mthon po rnams kyis mtha' ltung 'gyur//phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste//gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin zhes smras nas/dus kyi chos dang
40b1('dul ba): ldan par gyur to//de rnams kyis de ras sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams kyis lcogs brgyan te/bkur bsti cher byas nas dur khrod du khyer te gasreg so//
40b2('dul ba): de nas mya ngan gsang ba byas nas smras pa/gang gris tshe bdag cag gri pha gson pa de'i tshe ni srog de la rag las na/da de dus las 'das na gal te de 'tsho nam yel
40b3('dul ba): bar bor te/'dug na khyim zhig par 'gyur zhing /nye du rnams kyis dpyas par 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag cag zong thogs te/yul gzhan du 'dong ngo //gang pos
40b4('dul ba): smras pa/gal te de lta bdag kyang mchi'o//de rnams kyis smras pa/khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la tshong khang gi bya ba dag byos shig/kho bo cag kho na 'dreng ngo zhes de rnams
40b5('dul ba): kyis zong khyer te yul gzhan du do ////'dul ba gro zhi//bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/gang po la ni dgos pa thams cad gtad nas de nyid na gnas so//chos
40b6('dul ba): nyid kyis phyug pa'i khyim dag na nyin re zhing 'god pa 'brog pa yin pas de dag gis chung mas bran mo dag mdags te 'god pa nod du btang ba las/gang po ched pa dang /tshong dponu dang /
40b7('dul ba): des dpon dang /gzhon yang rje su 'tsho bdag gis yongasu bskor cing 'dug ste/de dag gis skabs ma rnyed do//ji tsam na de dag langs te/dong bar gyur pa de'i tshe/de dag la nyin par
41a1('dul ba): gyi 'gyod pa phog go//bu mo de dag ring zhig yon te 'ongs dang /kye mu bu mo khyod cig rang zhig ci thogs shes spyod pa las/de dag gis smras pa/gang po tshong pa
41a2('dul ba): dang /tshong dpon dang /ded dpon dang /gzhan yang rje su 'tsho ba dag gas yongasu bskor cing nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bur gzi brjid 'bar zhing bzhugs te/gang gi mi tshe de dag langs te mchis
41a3('dul ba): pa//de'i tshe phrog go/de dag gis smra so//gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu dag dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur ro//'byor len gyi chung mas bran mo la smras pa/
41a4('dul ba): ring mo zhig tu ci'i phyir thogs/des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang /des smras pa khyod 'od che'o//khyod kyis dus shes par byos la song shig/des dus shes par byas nas song ba
41a5('dul ba): dang /myur du thob po//gzhan dag ni ring du thogs par gyur nas de dag gis de la dris pa khyod ni ci ste/myur bar 'khor des thams cad smras nas/de dag kyang de dang lhan cig 'dor
41a6('dul ba): bar brtsam so//gang po yang tshong pa dang /tshong dpon dang /de dpon dang /gzhan yang rje su 'tsho ba rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing 'dug pa las/de dag kyang dong nas des de la nyin
41a7('dul ba): bar gyis 'god pa phog po//de dag gis kyang myur du thob bo//de dag gi jo mo dag gis smras pa/myur du 'khod pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/de dag gis smras pa/jo mo thu mo snyun mi mnga'
41b1('dul ba): bar gyur cig/gang gi tshe de'i bran mo mchis pa de'i tshe phog lags kyis bdag cag de dang 'grogs te mchi'o//de dag mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu
41b2('dul ba): dag dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyuraro//ci tsam na dus gzhan zhig nu 'byor len dang /'byor skyob dang /'byor dga' rnams lhan cig tu dga' zhing 'thun
41b3('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen po nas grub ste 'ongaso//'byor len gyi chung mA la dris pa/bzang mo gang pos khyod legs par bskyangs som/des smras pa/ji ltar ming po 'am/dus bgyi ba bzhin
41b4('dul ba): du legs par bgyis//gzhan dag lo khyim thab dag gis smras pa dang /de dag gis smras pa//gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu dbang phyug la dbang bgyis pa de dag la yongasu yang
41b5('dul ba): de ltar 'gyur lagaso//de dag gis bsams pa/bud med drag ni mdza' bshes kyi dbyen du 'gyu ro snyam mo//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nA ka shi ka'i ras kyis tshong khang gi sgo phye ma
41b6('dul ba): thag tu 'byor len gyi bu 'ongs nas/gang pos de la ka shi ka'i ras yug cig bskon no//mna' ma dag gis mthong nas smras pa/bu 'di sus byin des slas ga khu gus byin no//gzhan
41b7('dul ba): dag gis mthong nas kyang rang rang gis bu btang ba dang /ka shI ka'i ras kyis tshang khang gi sgo ni bcad ras sbom po drag yod pa'i tshong khang gi sgo phye ba la de dag kyang steng te phyin
42a1('dul ba): nas/de dag la glang pos ras sbom po dag bskono//de dag gis mthong nas khyim thub drug la smras pa/khyed cag gris gzigs sam/kha cig la
42a2('dul ba): ni ka shi ka'i ras yug stsal la kha cig lA ni ras sbom po dag go/de dag gis lan btab pa/ci gdon mi za bar 'di ltar kau shi ka'i tshong khang gi ras kyi sgo ni bcad la/
42a3('dul ba): ras sbom po'i sgo phye ba la bab pa zhig ma yin grang /de dag gis smras pa/da dung yang rtag par bgyi'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na sha kha ra'i tshong khang gi sgo phye ba na 'byor/
42a4('dul ba): len gyi bu 'ong nas/des shra ka ra'i phor bu gang thob ste/des de khyer nas khyim du song pa dang /mna' ma dag gis mthong nus smras pa/bu 'di sus byin/des smras
42a5('dul ba): pa khu gus byin no//de dag gris kyang rang rang gis bu btang ba dang /shra ka r-i'i tshong khang gI sgo ni bcad/bu ram gyi tshong gi sgo phye ba dang /de dag kyang ma stes te/bu
42a6('dul ba): ram gyi tshe ngo gang gi sgo phye ba'i khwar 'ongs nas/de dag gisnga bu ram zhig thob po//de dag gis smras pa/khyod kyis gzigs som/gcig la ni sha khar stsal la/
42a7('dul ba): gzhan la bu ram stsa'o//de dag gis de mthong ste/ji ltar khyim bsgo ba byed par stsol ba de ltar khyim thab/dag bye nas de dag phan tshun gros byas pa/bdag cag gi
42b1('dul ba): khyim gtan zhig gisu bsgo bar bya'o//gcig gos smras pa/phru bo chen po sbran pa snyam/cig gis smras pa/ro shrIg ji lta ba sgo bur spyad do//gAnyis kyi rang gi blos
42b2('dul ba): dpyad pa cig gis ni khyim na yod pa dang /zhing na yod pa'o//cig gis ni chang khang nu yod pa dang /yul gzhan nu yod pa'o//cig gis ni glang po'o//gal te phye 'o
42b3('dul ba): chen pos khyim na yod pa dang /zhing na yod pa blangs na bdag cag gis tshong khang na yod pa dang /yul gzhan na yod pas rang 'tsho bar nuso//'on te tshong khang na yod pa
42b4('dul ba): dang /yul gzhan na yod pa blangs na/'on kyang bdag cag gis khyim na yod pa dang zhing na yod pas rang 'che bar bya zhing gang po yang mnar bar nuso snyam nas/de gnyis
42b5('dul ba): kyis de ltar gros bcag ste/'byor len gyis drung du song nas sbyin zhig par 'gyur gyis bdag cag khyim bgo'o//des smras pa/khyim 'jig par byed pa ni bud med
42b6('dul ba): dag yin pas/legs par brtogs te bya ba snyam de gnyis kyis smras pa/bdag cag gis brtags zin gyis 'gro'o//des smrasta~M pa/gal te de lta nA gzo bo mi
42b7('dul ba): lnga zhig pos shig/de gnyis kyis smras po/bdag cag gis snga mo zhig tu bgo zan na/gzu bo mi lnga ci dgos kyis gcig ni khyim na yod pa dang /zhing na yod pa
43a1('dul ba): dag go//gcig gis tshod khang na yod pa dang /yul gyis mtha' na yod pa'o//gcig gis ni gang yin pa'o//des smras pa/ci gang po la bskal pa mi sbyin nam/
43a2('dul ba): de gnyis kyis smras pa/bran mo'i bu de la bgo skal sus sbyin/nges ma snongs kyi de nyid bdag cag gis bgo'o//gal te khyod bzhed na khyod nyid snoms shig/des bsams pa/
43a3('dul ba): nA re bdag khyod kyis bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang yang gang po btang bar mi bya'o zhes bsgo bas/gang po glang bar bya'o//snyam du bsams nas/smras pa/gal te de lta na gang
43a4('dul ba): po ni kho bos bkur ro//khyim na yod pa dang /zhing na yod pa dbang ba gang yin po de ni rings par khyim du song nas smras po/mnar mthu mo byung shig/de'i phyir byung ba dang /slar yang
43a5('dul ba): ma 'jug shig/ci'i phyir bdag cag gis khyim du gtogs pa bgos zin to//tshong khang na yod pa dang /yul gzhan na yod pa dbang ba gang dag de yang de mo thag tu tshong khang du song nus
43a6('dul ba): smras pa/glang po mar bobs shig des 'bebs pa dang /da ban chad ma 'jog shig/ci'i phyir bdag cag gis khyim bgos te/yul gzhan na yod pa dang /tshong khang na yod pa ni
43a7('dul ba): bdag gis yino//des smras pa/bdag gi bgo skal byin cig/des smras pa/khyod bran mo'i bu yin na khyod la ci'i phyir bgo skal byin/der ma zad khyod nyid kho bo cag gis
43b1('dul ba): bgos te/phu bo chen pos thob po//'byor len gyi chung ma gang po dang lhan cig 'grogs te/gnyen zhig gi khyim du dong ba na/ngus pa sa nas ngu bar brtsam so//des smras pa/glang po dus
43b2('dul ba): bdag la g.yar srus stsol cig/des smos pa/kar sha pa na pog shig/des smras pa khyod kyis gser 'brum rnyed kyis spogs byas nas/bus pa dag gis dbyer snas ma mchis pa /
43b3('dul ba): ci kho bos khyod cag gis khyim 'di 'dra ba 'khosu 'bebs par 'gyur bar shes sam gal te/kho bos shes par gyur na/gser 'bum phrag tu ma spags po shig/bud med kyis gos
43b4('dul ba): kyi mtha' mo sha ka sgyu macan dag thum po byed pa de ni chos nyid yin te/des ma sha ka sgyu ma can zhig phog ste/g.yar srus snoms te sbyin cig/des de khyer te tshong du su song ba
43b5('dul ba): las/mi zhig gis rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bdas pa'i shing las khur cig khyer to/grang bas sbrebs nas 'drang zhing 'ang ba do des mthong nas dris pa/kye nang rje ci'i phyir
43b6('dul ba): de ltar 'dar/des smos pa/bdag gis kyang ma mtshal te/cung zad du ni shing khur 'di thogs nas bdag 'di 'dra bar grang bar gyur to//de shing brtag pa la mkhas
43b7('dul ba): pas/des shing de brtag par brtsams pa dang /de na can don sa mchog yod par mthong nas/des de la smras pa/kye nang rje rin ji tsam du btsong /kar sha pa na lnga brgyar
44a1('dul ba): ro//des des shing khur de blangs nas con dan snga mchog phyung ste/tshong 'dus song nas/srog las dum bu bzhir gshegs te/dum bu de
44a2('dul ba): rnams kar sha pa na stong du brtsod nas/de nas de la ka ra sha pa nA lnga brgya byin te/'di skad ces smraso//khyi mi ga ge mo zhes bya ba na 'byor len gyi chung ma 'dug gis/der
44a3('dul ba): shing khur 'di khyer laM gang pos bskur ba yin no//zhes byos shig/des de khyer nas ji ltar gyur pa dag smos pa dang /des bring brdungs nas smras pa/'di ltar de nor
44a4('dul ba): 'khyams na/shes rab kyang 'khyams sam/ci brtse ba 'tshol du btang na/btso rgyu gang yin pa de nyid med par bus pa bskur to//ji tsam gzhan zhig na grong khyer slo ma lta
44a5('dul ba): bu'i rgyal po che ba'i rims chen pos thebs nas/myog myog par gyur pa de la sman pas can dun sa mchog bstan to//de nas blon po rnams kyis tsan dan se mo chog btsal
44a6('dul ba): bar brtsams pa dang /de rnams kyis tshong 'dus su brgyud pa las thos nas/de rnams gang po'i drung du song ste/tsan dan sa mchog yod dam yod do//rin ji tsam du
44a7('dul ba): gcong kar sha pa na stong ngo //de rnams kyis kar sha pa na stong gis nyos nas rgyal po la byugs pa dang /sos par gyur to//rgyal pos bsams pa/gang gi khyim na
44b1('dul ba): tsan dan sa mchog med pa'i rgyal po de ci 'dra ba zhig yin snyam nas/rgyal pos blon po rnams la rmas pa/'di ga las 'ongs/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha gang po
44b2('dul ba): las so//gang po 'dir khug shig/der pho nya song nas smras pa/gang po lhas bka' stsal to//des spyad par brtsams pa/rgyal po bdag la ci'i phyir bka' stsol//des
44b3('dul ba): yang bsams pa/de tsan dan sa mchog gis snyun gdangs par gyur pas de'i phyir bdag laM bka' stsal gyis can dan sa mchog thams cad khyer te/'gro'o snyams nas/des
44b4('dul ba): tsun da na sa mchog gis dum bu gsum ras kyi nang du dkris te/gcig leg tu thogs nas rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang /rgyal pos smras pa/gang po can dan sa mchog cung zad
44b5('dul ba): yod dam/des smos pa/lha 'dir mchi so//'di lnga rin ji tsAm/gser 'bu mo/gzhan yod dam/lha mchis so zhes des dum bu gsum char bstan pa dang /rgyal
44b6('dul ba): pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/gang po lnga gser bzhi 'bum byin cig gang pos skyes pa/lha gsum gyi ni rtsol cig/gcig gi ni lha la skyes 'bu'o//gsum gyi byon
44b7('dul ba): nas/rgyal pos smras pa/gang po khyod nga'i thug su 'thad kyis mchog ci 'dod pa gsol cig dang sbyin no//lha gal te thugs dang 'thad par gyur no/lha'i yul du sus kyang
45a1('dul ba): mi gan+d+he bar mchis par gsol//rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag deng sbyin chad khyed kyis partson nu rnams la bsgo bar bya'o//
45a2('dul ba): gang po la ni ma yin no//ji tsam na tshong balnga brgyargya rgya mtsho chen po'i gru char grub nas/grong khyer skyo ma lta bur lhag sa//tshong po'i tshogs kyis nang khrims su bcas pa/bdog
45a3('dul ba): cag sus kyang gcig pus tshogs las gar te/tshod pa'i drung du 'gro bar mi bya'o//gal te song na de la kar shas na drug cu dbab po//blangs kyang tshogs 'dus te blangs par bya'o//
45a4('dul ba): zhes bcas so//kha cig gis smras pa/gang po yang sbran pa snyam//ba cig gis smras pa/bkren pa de la sbran na ci yod//de'i tshe gang po phyir byung ba na/des tshong pa lnga brgya
45a5('dul ba): tsam rgya mtsho chen po nas grub nas grong khyer sgrom lta bur byi no//zhes thos nas de grong khyer du ma zhugs pa nyid de dag gi drung du song ste/dris pa shes ldan dag rdzas 'di dag ci yin/de
45a6('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/'di dang 'di dag yin no//ri ni jo tsam ded dpon gar phyin yang khyod kha ni dri bar bso//des smras pa/gang te de yin yang 'on kyang rin thang smros shig/dri
45a7('dul ba): dag gis gser sa ya dang brgyad 'bum du rin btab bo//des smras pa/shos ldan dang /thog cad pa'i gser sum 'bum khyer cig cig zod 'di dag ni kho bo'i yin no//lhag ma ni
45b1('dul ba): nang du phyin nas spyanato//de bzhin du 'bya'o zhes pa dang /des gser sum 'bum yang blangs nas/thag bcad pa'i phyir byin/rang gri rgyus kyang btab ste song ngo //de nas tshong pa'i
45b2('dul ba): tshogs kyis tshod pa'i g.yog gi mi dag rdzas ci sod ltos shig ces mngags nas/de dag song ste dris pa/rdzas 'di dag ci yini/'di dang 'di dag yin no//bdag cag la 'di 'dra
45b3('dul ba): bas ni mdzod dang bang bgang bar 'dug go/de rnams kyis smras pa/gang yang rung ma gang yang rung ste/'on kyang 'di brjongs zin to//su zhig la/gang po la'o//gang po la bco
45b4('dul ba): na chen mo zhig khugs med/de rnams kyis smras pa/des thag bcad par byin pa gang yin pa de khyed kyis rin du yang yi sbyin no//des thag bcad par ci byin/gser sum
45b5('dul ba): 'bum mo//des phu po de dag las brkus yang dag go/de rnams slar log ste tshong pa'i cho gasra l-I smras pa/rdzas de dag ni btsongs zin to/su zhig la/gong po la'o//gang
45b6('dul ba): po la btsongs na chen mo zhig khugs med//des thag bcad par byin pa gang yin pa de khyed kyis rin du yang mi byin no//des thag bcad par ci byin//srang sum 'bum mo//
45b7('dul ba): des sngun de dag la bskus yang dag go/de rnams kyis de bos nas smras pa/gang po tshong pa'i tshogs kyis khrom su bcad pa sus kyang gci go pus zong mi blangs gi tshong pa'i
46a1('dul ba): tshogs kho na blangs par bya'o zhes bcas nas/khyod kyis ci'i phyir blang /des smras pa/shes ldan dag gang gi tshe khyed kyis khrimasu bca'
46a2('dul ba): ba byas pa/de'i tshe ci kho bo 'am/kho bo'i pho nu po dag la bsgo 'am/khyed kho nas khrimasu bca' ba byas/khyod cag gnyis bsrung shig de nas tshong ba'i tshogs khros nas/
46a3('dul ba): kor sha pan drug cu'i phyir bzung ste/nyi ma la bzhag pa rgyal po'i mi gang gis mthong ba de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa rgyal pos bsgo bshes ldan dag de rnams khug shig/
46a4('dul ba): de dag gis de rnams bkug pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag gis ci'i phyir gang po bzung ste nyi ma la bzhag/lha chod pa rnams kyis khrimasu bcas
46a5('dul ba): bsus kyang gracig pus zong 'jal tshong mi bgyi'o zhes bcas pa las 'di cig pus 'jal tshong bgyis pas so//des smras pa/lha gang gis tshe 'di dag gis khrims
46a6('dul ba): bca' ba bgyis pa de'i tshe 'di dag gis ci bdag gam/bdag gis phu nu bo dag la bsgo'am/zhes rmar gsol/rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan gdag gang po'i
46a7('dul ba): shags bzang ngo //de rnams skyengs nas de btang ngo //ji tsaman dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po la rdzas shig gi dgos pa byung nas/des tshong pa'i tshogs bkug ste
46b1('dul ba): smrog/shes ldan dagla lA rdzas chog mo zhes bya ba zhig dgas kyis dngul phul cig de rnams kyis smras pa/lce gang po lha mchos//des smras pa/dud la bka
46b2('dul ba): mi stsol gyis khyod nyid kyis de nyos la dra la phul cig/de dag gis gang po la pho nya btang ste/tshong ba'i tshogs 'bod do zhes byas so//des smras pa/kho bo mi 'ong ngo //de nas tshong
46b3('dul ba): pa'i tshigs thams cad 'dus te/de'i khyim du song nas/sgor bsdad de/de la phrin pa btang nas/gang po tshong pa'i tshogs sgo na sdod kyis byung shig ces spring ngo //de nga rgyal dang nyam
46b4('dul ba): bu shen dang bcas pa'i dregs pas byung ba dang /tshong pa'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ded dpon ji ltar nyos pa bzhin du zong byin cig/des smras pa/gal te ji ltar nyos pa bzhin zer
46b5('dul ba): byin na kho bo tshong pa chen po yin mod/de dag gis smras pa/rin gnyis 'gyur gyis byin cig dang /tshong ba'i tshogs mchod par 'gyur ro//des bsams pa tshong pa'i tshogs
46b6('dul ba): mchod par bya ba yin no snyam nas/des sa ya dang /lnga 'bum rin nyid 'gyur du byin no//lhag ma ni khyim du sbas nas des bsams pa ji ga zil ba'i thigs pas bum pa dgang
46b7('dul ba): bar nus sam rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ngos grong khyer bla ma lta bur dril sgogasu bcug pa/shes ldan grong khyer sgo
47a1('dul ba): ma lta bu na gnas pa'i tshong pa dag nyon cig/ded dpon gang po rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'gyur gyis/khyed cag las gang dag ded dpon gang po dang
47a2('dul ba): lhan cig sho gam med pa dang /la gcan pa'i gla med pa dang /gru bcas med par rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par spro ba de dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byos shig/
47a3('dul ba): tshong pa lnga brgya tsam gyis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas so//de nas ded dpon gang po dge mtshan dang /bkra shis dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dag bya ste/'khor tshong pa
47a4('dul ba): lnga brgya dang /rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa la gru bo cher grub nas/grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'khor to//de lta bur lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las gru bo che grub nas
47a5('dul ba): slar 'khod to//phyogs kun tu gang pos lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las gru bo cher grub nas slar 'khod to//zhes sgra grags pa dang /mnyan yod pa'i
47a6('dul ba): tshotshing ba dag zong thogs te/grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'dod nas/de dag lam gyis drub pa ngal sos nas/ded dpon gang na ba der dong ste/lhags nas smras pa/ded dpon rgyu
47a7('dul ba): mtsho chen por bzhud do//des smras pa/shes ldan dag lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen po nas gru po cher grub ste/slar 'khor ba las bdun par 'jug par khyed cag gis
47b1('dul ba): mthong ba 'am/thos pa 'ga' yod dam/de dag gis smras pa/glang po bdag cag shul ring po nas khyed kyi ched du lhags te/gal te mi 'jug na/khyod nyid chad ma yin no//des
47b2('dul ba): bsams pa bdag la ni nor gyis cung zad kyang mi mchog pa med na/'di dag gi don du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/de de rnams dang lhan cig tu rgya mtsho chen por cho so//de dag gis nam
47b3('dul ba): tho rangs kyi dus su ched du brjod pa dang /pha rol 'gro byed dang /bden pa mthong ba dang /gnas brtan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /gnas brtan mi tshig su bcad pa dang /rig gnas
47b4('dul ba): pa'i tshig su bcad pa dang /thug pa'i tshig su bcad pa dang /don gyi tshoms kyi mdo dag gsang bstod de/bton pa dang /des de dag thos nas smras pa/shes ldan dag glu bzung
47b5('dul ba): po zhig gis long shig/de nams kyis smras pa/des de dag ni glu ma lag so//'o na ci de ni sangs rgyas kyi'o//des sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas/bai spre'i
47b6('dul ba): khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas/gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa shes ldan dag sangs rgyas shes bya ba de su zhig yin/de rnams kyis smras pa/shAkya'i sras dge
47b7('dul ba): sbyong go'u ti ma shAkya'i rigs las sgo dang kha spu brags nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/dad pa kho nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/de bla na med pa yang dag/
48a1('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de ded dpon de ni sangs rgyas de ni sangs rgyas shes bgyi'o//shes ldan dag
48a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang nu bzhugs/ded dpon mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bran bzhugaso//des de snying la bzungs
48a3('dul ba): nas de rnams dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te/grubo cher grub nus slar lhogaso//de'i phu bo 'byor len gyis bsams pa/'di rgya mtsho chen po 'gro bgro bas drub par
48a4('dul ba): gyur gyis 'di khyim dbub por bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa/khyod kyi don du tshong pa dang /tshong dropon dang /ded dpon gang gi bu mo blangs pa phu bo la smros shig/des
48a5('dul ba): smras pa/bdag 'dod pa mi 'tshal gyi gal te gnang na rab tu 'byung ngo //des smras pa/grang gi tshe bdag cag gi khyim gyis 'tsho na ma la ma zhugs pa de'i tshe rab tu mi
48a6('dul ba): 'byung bar/de ci'i phyir du rab tu 'byung /des smras pa/de'i tshe ni mi rigs lags so//da ni rigs lag so//des de gdon mi za bar gal gyi 'chu bar shes nas/gnang ngo //
48a7('dul ba): des smras pa/phu bo rgya mtsho chen po na nyes dmigs ni mang la/mnog ni chung ngo //der 'jug pa ni mang la slar 'khor ba ni nyung bas khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad du rgyu
48b1('dul ba): mtsho chen por 'jug par mi bya'o//khyod la rigs pas bsgrubs pa'i nor phal mo che yod la/khyod kyi nu bo dag la rigs pa ma yin pas skyabs pa yin pas/gal te de
48b2('dul ba): dag na re lhan cig 'khod par bya'o zhes zer na 'dug par mi bya'o zhes smras nas/rim glo ba gcig khrid de mnyan yod du song ste/mnyan yod kyi bskyed mos tshal du 'dug
48b3('dul ba): nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la phrin pa gtang te/khyim bdag ded dpon gang po khyim bdag lta bar 'dod nas bskyed mos tshol na sdod do zhes spring pa dang mgon med
48b4('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/gdon mi za bar chu'i bzhin pos du ba da ni thang gi gzhon pos 'ongs snya mo//de nas dris pa kye nang rje zong ji snyed cig khyer/de la zong ga la
48b5('dul ba): yod rom gro ba dang gnyisu ste/de dang bdag tu bas so//mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/gang bdag gis skyes bu dam pa de la bskur sti ma byos par khyim du bod pa
48b6('dul ba): ni bdag rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no snyam nus/des de bkur bsti chen pos khyim du bos nus/bsku mnyes byas te/khrus byas te/zan byin te dga' bo gtam byos te 'dug nas//
48b7('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis dris pa ded dpon dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/khyim bdag bdag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge
49a1('dul ba): slong gi dngos po 'tsha lo//de nas khyim bdag mgron med zas sbyin gyis ro stod stong nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste ched du brjod pa kye ma'o sangs rgyas/kye ma'o//
49a2('dul ba): chos/kye ma'o//dge 'dun/kye mdo chos legs par gsungs pa nyid de la ni da skyes bu gtso bo 'di lta bu yang rung gi skye bo dang /gnyen bshes kyi tshogs rgya chen po dang /mdzod dang /
49a3('dul ba): bang ba dang /mdzod rgyas pa rnams kyang spangs nas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod par gyur to//de nas
49a4('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ded dpon glang po khrid de/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo //de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs
49a5('dul ba): nos chos 'chad do//bco mo ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin skyes dang cha sA te 'ongs pa gzig so//gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong
49a6('dul ba): dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin skyes dang chas te de ltar 'ong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di lta bu med de/'di lta ste 'dul ba'i skyes bu'o//de na khyim bdag mgon
49a7('dul ba): med zos sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'din gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ded dpon gagong po dang lhani cig phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/khyim
49b1('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa ded dpon gang po 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba lnga rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs
49b2('dul ba): par dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/de bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
49b3('dul ba): la cang mi gsung ba gnang ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon gang po la bka' stsal pa/dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
49b4('dul ba): stsal pa'i mod kho nar de sgra byi ba dang /snam sbya re gyon par gyur te/skra dang /kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /lag na lhung bzed dang bye ma du ma thog pa dang /dge slong bsnyen par
49b5('dul ba): rdzogs nas lo brgya lon po'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog gsungs pas de/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /mod la
49b6('dul ba): dbang po rab zhir gyur te/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gang na bi der song ste/phyin
49b7('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di
50a1('dul ba): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos pa ji lta bus gcig pu dbyen pa bag yod pa dang /
50a2('dul ba): lhul ba dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong cing gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa legs par bshad du gsol//gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa dang /rtun pa dang /
50a3('dul ba): ldan la bdag nyid la gtod cing gnas na/rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir sgra dang /kha spu bregs nas/gros ngur smrig bgos te/yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas/
50a4('dul ba): khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung bar bgyid pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla nA ma mchis pa de mthong ba'i chos de nyi dri la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te
50a5('dul ba): bisgrubs nas/bdag gi skye ba ni zad do//tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do//bya ba ni byas so//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar bgyid pa'o//de skad ces
50a6('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po pa di skad ces bka' stsol to//gang po legs so lag so//gang po gang khyed 'di skad du srid pa 'di las
50a7('dul ba): gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba nas de lta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa legs par bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar smra ba ni yang leg so zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te de'i phyir
50b1('dul ba): rab tu nyon la yid la bzung shig dang bshad do//gang po mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang /chags pa dang /dga' ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /'dod
50b2('dul ba): pa dang ldan pa dang /kun tu chags par 'gyur ba yod la/de dag gal te/dge slong gis mthong nas mngon par dga' ba dang /mngon par bstod pa dang /lhag par
50b3('dul ba): chags pa dang /lhag par zhen cing gnas na/de dag la mngon par dga' ba dang /mngon par bstod pa dang /lhag par chags pa dang /lhag par zhen cing gnas pa de la
50b4('dul ba): kun tu dga' ba 'byung ngo //kun tu dga' ba yod na dga' ba dang /yid bde bar 'gyur ro//dga' ba dang yid bde ba yod na kun tu chags par 'gyur ro//kun tu chags pa yod
50b5('dul ba): nu kun tu sbyor bar 'gyur te/dga' ba dang kun tu chags pa dang /kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i dge slong ni gang po mya ngan lasu 'das pa las ring du gyur pa
50b6('dul ba): zhes bya'o//glang po rna bas rnam pAr shes par bya ba'i sgra dang /snas rnam paro shes par bya ba'i dri dang /lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro dang /lus kyis rnam par
50b7('dul ba): shes par bya ba'i reg bya dang /yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa dang /chags pa dang /dga' ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /kun tu
51a1('dul ba): chags par 'gyur ba rnams yod la/de dag gal te dge slong gis mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/mya ngan las 'das pa lngas/ring du gyur pa zhes bya'o/
51a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no//gang po mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang /tshogs pa dang /dga' ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /'dod pa
51a3('dul ba): dang ldan pa dang /kun tu chags par 'gyur ba yod na/de dag gal te dge slong bris mthong nis/mngon par mi dga' ba dang /mngon par mi bstod pa dang /lhag par
51a4('dul ba): mchags pa dang /lhags par mi zhen cing gnas nas de dag la mngon par mi dga' ba dang //mngon par mi bstod pa dang /lhag par ma
51a5('dul ba): chags pa dang /lhag par ma zhen par gnas pa de la kun tu dga' ba mi 'byung ngo //kun tu dga' ba med na dga' ba dang /yid bde ba med par 'gyur ro//dga' ba dang yid
51a6('dul ba): bde ba med pa na/kun tu ma chags par 'gyur ro//kun tu chags pa med na kun tu sbyor ba med par 'gyur//kun tu sbyor ba med na dga' ba dang /kun tu chags pa dang /kun
51a7('dul ba): tu sbyor ba dang /mi ldan pa'i dge slong ni gang po mya ngan las 'das pa las 'das po la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o//gong po rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra dang /snas
51b1('dul ba): rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri dang /lce'i rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro dang /lus kyi rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya dang /yid kyi rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa
51b2('dul ba): dang /chags pa dang /dga' ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /kun tu chags par 'gyur ba yod la/de dag gal te dge slong dag gis mthong nas zhes byas
51b3('dul ba): nas/de ni mya ngan las 'das pa la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//gang po ngas mdor sdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis khyod la ga tA mas na/gang du gnas
51b4('dul ba): par 'dod/gang du gnas bca' bar 'dod/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis bdag gtams lags pas/gro zhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi
51b5('dul ba): mthar mchis par 'tshal lags so//gang po gro zhi ni skyes granas pa'i yul gyi mthe'i mi rnams ni gtum pa/gzu lums can/rtsub pa/gi she bo/spro thung ba/'phya ba yin/
51b6('dul ba): te/gang po gal te khyod la gro zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtho'i mi rnams mngon sum du sdig pa tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshogs rtsub pos gshe bar byed/zher 'debs par byed/
51b7('dul ba): 'phya bar byed na/de lo khyod ji snyam du byed/btsun pa gal te gre zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams bdag la mngon sum du sdig pa tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshigs rtsub pos
52a1('dul ba): grwa she bar 'gyid/zher 'dengs par bgyid/'phya bar bgyid na/de la bdag gis 'di snyam du semaswA te/e ma'o gro zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtshan
52a2('dul ba): mi rnams ni rung bdag yin no//e ma'o gro zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/de dag bdag la sdig pa tshogs par mI dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub bos
52a3('dul ba): gshi bar byed/zher 'debs par byed/'phya bar byed kyang lag pa 'am/bong byas ma brgyu ba sgyu mo//gang po gro zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni gtu ma~M prA zhes
52a4('dul ba): bya ba nas 'phye bar byed pa yin no//zhes bya ba'i bor gong mu bzhin to//gang po gal te glo zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtho'i mi rnams kyis dbyug pa 'am/mtshon gyis
52a5('dul ba): dri rgyab na de l-i khyod ji snyam byed/btsun pa gal te bdag lnga gro zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis dbyug pa 'am/mtshon gyis brgyab par gyur na/de la bdag
52a6('dul ba): gis 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma'o gre zhun skyes gnas pa'i mthi'i mo rnams ni rung ba dag yin no//kye ma'o gre zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin
52a7('dul ba): te/de dag bdag la dbyug pa 'am/mtshon gyis brgyab kyang /thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral bar mi byed de snya mo//gang po gro zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i
52b1('dul ba): skyernams ni gtum pa zhes bya ba nasu 'phya bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du s+ho/bal te gang po gzhon skyes gnas mi rnams kyis khyod thams cad kyi thams cad du
52b2('dul ba): sgrog drung bral bar byed na/de la khyod ji snyam byed/btsun pa gal te bdag le gro zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtho'i mi rnams kyis thams cad du srog dang bral bar bgyid na de la bdag
52b3('dul ba): nyid 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos lus rtag can 'dis spyod pa dang /ngo cha dang /rnam par smod pa gang dag ma tshon rjes kyang 'debs par byed drug rgyu
52b4('dul ba): zla bar byud theg pas kyang 'gregs te 'chi bar byed/g.yangs nas kyang mchongs te'i chi bar yod na/kye ma'i gro zhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no//
52b5('dul ba): kye ma'o gro zhin skyes gun+da bI mthi'i mi rnams blo dang ldan pa yin te/de dag bdag gis lus rnag can 'di las/tshogs chung ngus grol bar byed do snyam bA sa ma par bgyi'o/
52b6('dul ba): klo pa legs legs gang po khyod bzod pa dang des pa 'di dang ldan par gro zhan skyes gnas yul gyis mthar grinas par nus pA ni khyu yang leg so//gang
52b7('dul ba): pa song la ma bsgral pa rnams ni sgrol cigs grol ba rnams ni grol ba rnams ni la cig/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dkrugs shin/yong su mya ngan las
53a1('dul ba): pa rnams ni yongasu mya ngan las zlo shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bston cing rje su yi rang nas/bcom
53a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyug byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nus snga dro sham thabs
53a3('dul ba): bgos te lhung bzed dang /chos go sa thogs te/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi zas kyi bya ba byas nas/zas phyi mi'i bsod bsnyoms
53a4('dul ba): las slar log ste/gnas mal ji ltar longs spyod ma mkho su phrab nas lhung bzed dang /chos gos thogs te gro zhin skyes gnas po'i yul gyis mtha' gangan pa der chas tre
53a5('dul ba): rim gyis rgyu zhing sang ba na gro zhan skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar phyin to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa glang po lnga dro shra me thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/gro zhin
53a6('dul ba): skyes gnas pa'i mthar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/rngon pa zhig mda' gzhu lag tu thogs te ri dag so 'tshor du 'gro ba 'gro ba des mthong nas/des bsams pa/dge
53a7('dul ba): skyong mgo reg 'di mthong ba ni khaM rjes ma rung bar byas so//snyam du bsams nas/gzhu rna drung bkang ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang na ba der brgyugs pa dang /de nas tshe
53b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa gang pos de mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bla gos bsnyil te smras pa/bzhin bzangs dag dka' ba 'di'i don du zhugs pas 'di la snyun cig tshigasu bcad de yang smras pa/
53b2('dul ba): gang gi don du mkha' la bya rgyu ri dadwags snyeng zin gyur//g.yul der mda' mdung mda' bo cha thogs mi rnams 'chi 'gyur la/bkren pa nyon mongs yul ngan rgyu zhing mchil pas nya
53b3('dul ba): zin pa/sdig pa rab mang lha 'dir khyod kyis tsham rings mda' 'phongs shig/des bsams pa/rab tu byung ba 'di ni 'di lta bu'i bzod pa dang /nges pa dang ldan pa yin na ci'i
53b4('dul ba): phyir ra 'di la na da' 'phang snyam du bsams nas/de sems mngon par dad par gyur to/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos de la chos bshad de skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i
53b5('dul ba): gzhi rnams la bzhag pa dang /des ri khrod der gzhan lnga brgya ni dge bsnyen du byas/lnga brgya ni dge bsnyen mar byas nas gtsug lag khang lnga brgya rtsig tu btsug ste/khri dang
53b6('dul ba): khri'u dang /spyan nang tshangs can dang /sngas nang tshangs can dang /gar thab sru borgya phrag du me 'bul du bcug go/zla ba gsum pa de 'das pa dang /des rig pa gsum lus
53b7('dul ba): kyis mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te/khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis
54a1('dul ba): mchod par bya ba dang rjud par bya ba dang /mngon sum du smra ba bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//ji tsam dus glunan+d+ha zhig na shrIng blo rna cha can
54a2('dul ba): gyi nu bo gnyis/longs spyod srabasau shing yongasu zad la gtugs par gyur nas/de gnyis kyis smras pa/byur lta bu de bdag cag gi khyim nas song gris tshur shog
54a3('dul ba): lhan cig gnas par bya'o//des smras pa/byur lta bu de gang zhig yin/gang po yin mod de ni kho ba'i khyim nas dpal byung ba yin gyi/de byar lta bu'i ni ma yin no//
54a4('dul ba): de gnyis kyis smras po/dpal yang rung byur yang rung /tshur shog lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o//des smras pa/khyed cag gi nor ni rigs par bsgrubs pa ma yin la
54a5('dul ba): kho bos ni rigs par bsgrubs yin pas/khyed cag dang kho bor lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o//de gnyis kyis smos pa/bran mo'i bu des rgya mtsho chen por yang song
54a6('dul ba): nas khyod kyi longs spyod dge bsgrubs pa khyod do spyad pas/rgyagasu zad khyod kyis ni rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par ga la nus/de de gnyis las nga rgyalnga bzung nas/des
54a7('dul ba): bsamos pa/bdad kyang rgya mchi chen por 'jug par bya'o snyam nas zhes bya ba nas/rgya mtsho chen por zhug so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//ji tsam na gru bo che de
54b1('dul ba): rjesu 'thun pA'i rlung gis can dan sa mchog gi tshul du 'drab so//sa mkhan gyis smras pa/shes ldan drag tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal zhes brags pa gang yin
54b2('dul ba): pa de ni 'di yin gyis 'di las 'doms la long shig/de'i tshe can dan sa mchog gi tshil gyi dbang po gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba yin te/de yang gnod
54b3('dul ba): sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyis mdun sar song ngo //de nas tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis gcad par brtsamaso//gnod sbyin mi dga' ba zhes bya bas
54b4('dul ba): tson dan sra mchog gi tshol sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis gcod pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen
54b5('dul ba): po la 'di skad ces smras so//dpon po mkhyen par mdzod cig/can dan sa mchog gi tsha la sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis 'gums na/khyod kyi phrin las sam bgyi ba bang lags
54b6('dul ba): pa de mdzod cig/de ni gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po gnod sbyin gyi mdun ma byas nas/mi bzod pa skyes te/rlung nag po chen po 'jig su rung ba bslang nas/tsan da nas mchog gi chal
54b7('dul ba): gang na ba der cha so//sa mkhan gyis smras pa/shes ldan 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i tshong pa dag nyon cig rlung nag po chen po 'jigs pa 'jigs pa zhig yod do//zhes grags pa gang
55a1('dul ba): yin pa de ni 'di yin gyis ngo lon soms shig/de nas tshong pa'i tshogs de rnams 'jigs skrag phongs te ba spu khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas
55a2('dul ba): lha rnams la gsol bar byed par brtsem ste/zhi ba dang ni chu lha lus dran nor sgyogs dang //lha mi lto 'phyi gnod sbyin lha min dbang po rnams//bdag cag shin tu nyam thag 'jigs
55a3('dul ba): par gyur lags kyis/brnyings bral de ring bdag cag rnams kyi mgon mdzod cig/mi rnams kyi ni khro cig bde sogs khyod la 'dud//gzhan dag tshangs dang khyab 'jug lha chen
55a4('dul ba): dang //sar rten shing dang tshal la rten pa la//sha sing+ga rlung gis zin pas skya bas tshol 'dud//shing gi rna cha can semos las chu dus 'dug pa dang tshong ba rnams kyis smras pa
55a5('dul ba): ded dpon bdag cag ni sdug bsngal mi zad pa nyam dra bar gyur na/khyod ci'i'o phyir sems las chung ngur 'dug/des smras pa/shes ldan dag kho bo la nu bos bsgo ba/phu bo
55a6('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen por zhugs bai ne ga nog chung la nyes dmigs mang ba ste/sred pos ldongs pa phal tshor 'jug pa ni slar 'khor ba nyung bas khyod kyis rnam pa grang gis kyang rgya mche
55a7('dul ba): chen por 'jug par mi bya'o zhes bsgo ba las/kho bos des tshig ma mnyan te/rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pas de ci byar yang med do//khyod kyi nu bo gang yin/gang po yin no//
55b1('dul ba): tshong pa'i tshogs rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag 'phags pa gang po de ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin gyis de nyid la bdag cag skyabasu 'gro bar bya'o zhes/de
55b2('dul ba): thams cad kyis tshig su 'thun par 'di skad ces 'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tsha lo/'phags pa glang po de la phyag 'tshalo//phyag 'tsha lo zhes smras//de nas tshe dang ljon pa gang po
55b3('dul ba): la mngon par dga' ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang na ba der song ste byin nas/tshe dang ldan po gang po la 'di skad ces smras//'phags pa khyod kyi gcen ni
55b4('dul ba): sdug bsngal mi zad pa/nyam nga bar gyur gyis dgongasu gsol/des bsams te/de de nas sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag pa ni/gro zhi ni skyes gnas pa'i mtha' nas mi
55b5('dul ba): snang bar gyur to//rgya mtsho chen por gru'i dngor skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//de nas rlung nag po de ri rab la phog ste/rdugs
55b6('dul ba): pi bzhin du slar log par gyur to//gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen pos bsams pa/sngon chad ni rlung nag pos gru gang la reg pa de shing bal gyi mda' bu bzhin 'phangs pa dang //
55b7('dul ba): 'jig par 'gyur na/nga rlung nag po de ri rab la phog ste/rdugs pa bzhin du slar log par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas/phan tshun du brtag par brtsams pa las
56a1('dul ba): ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa gang po gru'i dngor skyil mo grung bcas nas 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang des smras pa/'phags pa gang po mtho brtsams te
56a2('dul ba): ci bgyi/gang pos smras pa/rga ba'i chos can/kho bo nyid mtho 'tsham myam/gral te ngas 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs ma thob par gyur na/khyod kyis nga'i bu bo ming lus
56a3('dul ba): par 'gyur ro//dbang phyug chen pos smras pa/'phags pa can dan sa mchog 'di ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dron du srung lagaso//gang pos smras pa/dpon po ji snyam
56a4('dul ba): du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po gang che/'phags pa ci bcom ldan 'das
56a5('dul ba): 'jig rten du byung ngam byung ngo //gal te de lta na/da gang ma gang pa de khong shig/de nas tshong ba'i tshogs de rnams srog byin te/tshe dang ldan pa gang po la sems mngon
56a6('dul ba): pApar dad nus gru daM tsAn dAn sa mchog gis bkang ste chus pra dang rim gyis grong khyer slo ma lta bu rA phyin to//de nas gung pos phu bo la smras pa/gang gi ming gis gru bo
56a7('dul ba): cher gru'i nor grub ste 'ongs pa de ni de dbang bas khyod kyis rin po che ni tshong ba 'di rnams la gos shog/bdag gis ni tsan dan sa mchog 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
56b1('dul ba): kyi phyir can dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzangs brtsigs go//des tshong ba de rnams bgos so//de nas gang pos tsan dan sa mchog gi kha bzangs zhig brtsigs par brtsams te/des badz+ra
56b2('dul ba): po dag bkug nas/smras pa/shes ldan dag ci nyi mA re re zhing /kar shra pa lnga brgya len nam/'on te can dan sa mchog gi phye ma pho sum gang len/de dag gis smras pa/'phags
56b3('dul ba): pa can dan sa mchog gi phye ma po sum gang 'cha lo//ji tsam na ring po ma thogs par can dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzangs brtsigs te/byi dor thams cad zin par gyur to//de na zhogs
56b4('dul ba): ma dang phye ma'i lhag ma grong yin pa de dag kyang btags nas de nyid la zhal zhal du byugaso//des spun de rnams phan tshun thams cad bzod pa gsol du bcug nas smras pa/sangs
56b5('dul ba): rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drongs la zhul zas gsol cig/'phags pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs/mnyan yod na'o//lamA Ni
56b6('dul ba): tsa ma mchis/mnyan yod du dpag tshad brgya lhag tsam mo//re shig rgyal po la brtags par bgyi'o//de bzhin du gyis shig/de dag rgyal po'i drung du dong nas lha bdag cag ni
56b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te/zhal zas gsol bar 'tshal na/lhas bdag cig la bstan du gsol//rung gi de bzhin du bya'o//de nas
57a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa gang gau khang steng du 'jigs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal log su kha bltas te/pus mo ltung gnyis sa la bcug te 'dug nas me tog
57a2('dul ba): gis tor/bdug pas bdug nas khyim pa zhig gser gyi bya ma bum 'dzin du bcug ste/gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa/tshul khrims rname dag shin tu
57a3('dul ba): rnam dag blo//zhal zas dus rtag tu don gzigs pa/megon med gyur pa rab tu gzigs nas ni//shin tu thugs brtsis mdzad de gshegs par gsol//de nas
57a4('dul ba): me tog de rnams sangs rgyas rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthong /lharnam gyi lha'i mthus/me tog gi khang bzangs byas te/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du rgan rims bzhin du gnas
57a5('dul ba): par gyur te//gdugs pa ni sprin ltar ltar srungaso//chu ni bai DUr+ya'i phur ma lta bu gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas pa yin pas thal mo
57a6('dul ba): sbya ru ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa spyan 'dren pa gang nas mchis kun dga' bo grong khyer sgo ma lta bu nas so//btsun pa grong khyor slo ma lta bur ji
57a7('dul ba): srid ci ga mchis/kun dga' bo dpag tshad brgya lhag tsam yod kyis song la/dge slong rnams la khyed tsog las gang dang gang sang grong khyer slo mo lta bur song nas
57b1('dul ba): naza bar spro bar tshul shing long shig sgo shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la many+dzun nas/rdul shing smras to//
57b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gadru ga na gan brtan rnams kyis tshul shing blang so//de'i tshe yul chu mig can na gan DI gnas rgyun tshe dang
57b3('dul ba): ldan pa gang po shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des kyang tshul shing blang bar brtsams pa dang /de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos slar
57b4('dul ba): tshog su bcad de smras pa//tshe dang ldan pa blan 'di ni//ko stsal bdag pi'i pho brang ngam//rab sbyin khyim dang ri dgas kyi//khyim kyi zas yang me lag so//grong khyer sgo
57b5('dul ba): ma zhes bya ba//dpag tshad brgya ldeg mchis pa der//rdzu 'phrul gyis ni 'askyed 'phrul byas//gang po khyod ni ma gsungs bzhugs//de shes rab kyi sa rnam par grol
57b6('dul ba): ba yin//des rdzu 'phrul ma skyes pas de 'di snyam du sems te/gang gi phyir bdag gi nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mtha' drug rtul tsang bor la spangs shing sor ste san dag pu
57b7('dul ba): can dang thun mong po'i rdzu 'phrul la sgyid lug ga ma snyam nas/des brtson 'grus la gnas te/rdzu 'phrul bskyed pas ji srid tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas pad+hi
58a1('dul ba): gsum pa la rdul shing ma byin pa de'i bar du des lag pa glang po che'i sku lta bu brkyang nas tshul shing blungs te/de nas tshogasu ban pas smras pa/
58a2('dul ba): tamya 'di na mngon shes drug po nyid//grags pa dang ni thos pas 'dreb min la//chen gyi yon tan rnams dang ngag dang ni//yid skyon chen pos kyang ni ma yin gyi//bdag 'bru
58a3('dul ba): yongasu rtogs par byed pa rnams//rga bas dar yal gyur kyang zhi ba dang //tshul khrims lcug mthong stobs dang bsam gtani stobs//rnam par du mas mngon shes drug ldan
58a4('dul ba): 'gyur/de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong 'di ni nga'i dge slong rnams kyi mchog yin te/nga'i nyan thos mchod pa'i tshul shing blang po lA de
58a5('dul ba): bo'o//rdul shing len pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan glang po mchog yino//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' byo la
58a6('dul ba): kA' stsal pa//kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la//ngas dge slong dag khyed kyis dge ba mi spyom pa dang /sdig pa mi brgyab par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad mod kyi 'on kyang
58a7('dul ba): grong khyer de na mu btigs pa rnams gnas pas khyed las gang gis rdzu 'phrul gong thob pa de/des grong khyer sgom lta bur song la zan bza' bor bya'o zhes bsgo shig/btsun pa
58b1('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
58b2('dul ba): skad ces dus dge slong rnams kyis dge ba mi sbyim pa dang /sdig pa mi bcab par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad mod kyis zhes bya ba nas song la zin bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar go
58b3('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o//rgyal pos grong khyer slo ma lta bu rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo rnams sel du bcug ste/tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/dri zhimo po'i pog phor sna tshogs
58b4('dul ba): bshams/dar gyi chun 'byung maung po dpyangs/me tog sna tshogs chal bar bkram ste/dga' dga' ltar byas so//grong khyer slo ma lta bu la sgo bco brgyad yod la rgyal po de la
58b5('dul ba): yang bu bcu bdun yod de/grong khyer gyi sgo ra r-I so sor rgyal po'i bu rnams 'byor pa mchog dang bkod do//sgo chen po ru ni slo ma lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal po//rgyal po'i 'byor pa
58b6('dul ba): chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /shing gis rna cha can dang /rgya skegs kyi rna cha can dang /zha nye'i rna cha can 'dug go/dza tsam na lo ma 'dri ma dang /shwang tshe 'dri mu pa dang /
58b7('dul ba): snod spyad 'dri ma bdag rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags pa rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa ci btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/des smras pa/'di dag ni lo ma 'dri
59a1('dul ba): ma dang /shing che 'drim pa dang /snod spyad pa 'dri ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das ma lag so//ci tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas
59a2('dul ba): brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa rnam pa du mis lhags pa dang /rgyal pos yang dris pa/ci btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/
59a3('dul ba): des smras pa ma lags te/'di dag ni dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa/rnam pa du mas lhags pa lagaso//de nas
59a4('dul ba): dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigasu bcad de smras pa/kha cig seng ge stegs dang glang po che rta klung dang khyu mchog bzang po bcibs//kha cig rin chen gzhal med khang dang re
59a5('dul ba): dang shing mdzes shing rta 'bar la brten//zhan dag na mkha'i ngos las chu 'dzini glog gi phreng bas rgyan pa lta bur ni/rab tu dgyes bzhin lha yi pho brang lta bur rdzu 'phrul dag
59a6('dul ba): gis gshegs par brtson//kha cig sa brtol gyen du 'byung //kha cig na mkha'i dkyil nas 'bab//kha cig stan las sprul par byed//rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mthu la
59a7('dul ba): ltos//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te/gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas gdan bai shams pa nyid la bzhugs
59b1('dul ba): te/sku drang por bsrang nas dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go/ji tsam+ba na bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang /bcas pa'i zhabs kyis drig cang khang du
59b2('dul ba): bzhag pa na/sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos//kun tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos//chem tsham rab tu chem che ma
59b3('dul ba): kun tu dbutu chem chem te/shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/byang phyogs mtho na lho
59b4('dul ba): phyogs dma'/mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o//rgyal pos tshe dang ldan pa gang po la dris pa/'phags pa gang po 'di zhig lags/des smras pa//
59b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa des ni/sa rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur pa lagaso//de nas bcom
59b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gser gyi 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od bkye ste/des 'dzam bu'i gling gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to//yang rgyal po de mtshar du gyur pas mig phye nas
59b7('dul ba): dris pa 'phags pa gang po 'di ci lags/des smras pa/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer kyo ba lag so///
60a1('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/bam po nyi shu lnga pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba zhi pa 'khor zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs
60a2('dul ba): gcig tu sgo ma lta bur gsheg so//de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha des bku la'i yal gzhig blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la grib ma byed ni rjes bzhin
60a3('dul ba): rjes bzhin du song ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khyams dang /rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
60a4('dul ba): rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/thos nas lha de 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
60a5('dul ba): mngon sum du byas par gyur te/ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig na/yugs sa mo lnga rgyu tsam gnas pa de dag gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sgra skyes bu chen
60a6('dul ba): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/dpe byang bzang po brgyad nus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga'
60a7('dul ba): ba rin po che'i ro bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong ma thag tu ying de rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dang pa chen po skyes//'di ni chos nyid yin te/dza
60b1('dul ba): ltar dge ba'i rna ba bstsags pa'i rgyu can gyis sems can gyis dang por sangs rgyas mthong ba lhur lo bcu gnyi su ni gnas kyi sems goms par byas pa dang /bu med pas bu rnyed pa dang //
60b2('dul ba): dbul pos gter mthong ba dang /rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob pa ni de ltar nyams dga' ba skyed pa ma yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/de
60b3('dul ba): rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
60b4('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de sems kyi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen
60b5('dul ba): nas zhes bya ba nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched/
60b6('dul ba): du brjod po/btsun pa bdag cag la 'di lta bu ni mas ma bgyis/phas ma lags/rgyal pos ma lags/lhas ma lags/sdug pas ma lags/rang gi skye bo dang /
60b7('dul ba): gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/khrag dang
61a1('dul ba): mchi ma'i rgyu mtshon rnams/rus pa'ir bo las ni bsgyul/ngan song gi skyon ma/thar pa dang /mtho ris kyi snron+da nas bdag cag lta dang
61a2('dul ba): mi rnams ni bkod de/btsun pa bdag cag 'phyags//mngon par 'phags so//bdug cag bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyab su ma
61a3('dul ba): lags kyis bdag cig dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/de dag stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de lag smra thal mo sbyar bye brgyad nas/bcom ldan 'das
61a4('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol te//TI ma~M bcom ldan 'dus bdag cag cung zad cig stsol cig dang /de la bdag cag bgyi ba dag 'gyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
61a5('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu skra dang /sen mo bregs te byin no//de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu sgra dang /sen mo'i mchod rten zhig brtsig so//de nas rgyal bu rgyal
61a6('dul ba): byed kyi chal na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des myi chod rten dri'i 'khor sar+yA bkI la'i ye lnga ga de bskyed de/bcom snyan 'dus la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag
61a7('dul ba): ni mchod rten 'di la bgyi ba ba byed cing mchis so zhes de de nyid na gnas so//de la kha cig gis ni yugs sa ma'i mchod rten zhes bya bar shes so//kha cig dri ni
61b1('dul ba): ni bku la'i 'khor sa zhes bya bar shes te/mchod rten la phyag byed ba'i dge slong dag da dung yang phyag byed do//bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang /ji tsam nu dAs+t+ri gnas
61b2('dul ba): gzhan na drang srong lnga brgya gnas te/dro dag gis ni bsti gnos de me tog dang /'bras dri dang /chu phun sum tshogs pas/de dag des rgyags nas ci yang mi sems//
61b3('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'dri tha~M sa kyi dul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/bsti gnas der gshegs te byin pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyis bsti gnas de'i me tog dang 'bras
61b4('dul ba): ni blugs chu ni sems/ni'u gseng rnams ni grogs/'dug gnas dag ni brtib bo//de nas drang srong de dag leg pa 'gram phyir gtad nas sems khongasu chud cing
61b5('dul ba): 'dug gro/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/ci'i phyir sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/de rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi
61b6('dul ba): gnyis khyed 'dir ga shegs nA/dag cag nI b+hU sgyus dusu 'di dU h+ma r+dz+dzabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/drung srong dge bsti gnas mi tog dang /
61b7('dul ba): bung /tshutshun su rgyags snyam runasbyin m+b+ha dzam+b+ha/de bzhin du ma/ma ldani 'dis mdzad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gyu//
62a1('dul ba): brtul ba dang /sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to//de nas de dag mchog tu yang mtshan du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par
62a2('dul ba): dad pa skyeso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sde drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis bsams pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/de dang 'thun
62a3('dul ba): pa'i chos bshad pa 'dzad de/de thos nas de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/de nas bcom ldan
62a4('dul ba): 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcomo ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cag legs bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
62a5('dul ba): ba rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen por rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par
62a6('dul ba): bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog 'tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod la sgra
62a7('dul ba): dang kha spu byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang /skra dang kha spu zhage bdun skyes pa tsam yang /dge slong bsnyen
62b1('dul ba): par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/skra byi snum sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //mod
62b2('dul ba): la dbang po rab zhir gnos gyur te/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur//de dag gis 'bad pa dang /brtsal bar brtson po grus brtsam pas 'kho ba'i gakhor lo cha lnga bags
62b3('dul ba): ba dang /mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de dag la 'doms par byed pa'i
62b4('dul ba): drang srong gang yin pa des gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi cha byed 'dis kye bo'i chags chen po bsdus pa de dog je dad pa skyed par bgyis la slad kyis rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'o///
62b5('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'dra drang srong lnga brgya dang /sngon gyi dge slong rnams kyis zla ba khams pa lta bur bskor nas de nyid rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gri na mkha' las gshegs te/rim gyis
62b6('dul ba): bdun ri la drang srong shing gos can zhes bya bye zhig glanas te/drang srong des bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mitshoni sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig bya ba nas/kun nu
62b7('dul ba): mdzes pa rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par gyur te/de dad pa bskyes nas
63a1('dul ba): / ma ldan sa kyis de'i bsam pa nga/ sa bdu/ /na rkyen nas na /
63a2('dul ba): na si~Md+d+ha m+b+har tu //zhes ba dang / san+na pA y-i s+ya pas sus gzugs pa/sa par nga ma /
63b1('dul ba): can no//de nas bcom 'das dge slong stong gis yongasu bskor te/cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing grong khyer sgo ma lta bur gsheg so//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
63b2('dul ba): gal te sgo cig nas zhug nas gzhan du gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas/me la nga rdzu 'phrul kho nas 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las grong khyer
63b3('dul ba): slo ma lta bu'i dbus su gshegaso//de nas slo ma lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal po dang tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /shing gi rna cha can dang /rgya skegs kyi rna cha tsan dang /zha nye'i rna cha can dang /
63b4('dul ba): rgyal po'i sras bcu bdun po de dag kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo /de nas bcom ldan 'das srog chags
63b5('dul ba): stestong phrag du mes zham ri ma byas shing can dan gyi khrang ba'i khang bzengs gang na ba de'i gshegs te/byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gang na shams pa nyid la bzhugs te/
63b6('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs chen po des bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ngo //btsan dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzangs zhig la thug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/gal te tsan dan gyi phreng
63b7('dul ba): ba'i khang bzangs zhig par gyur na/sbyin bdag rnams kyis bsod nams kyi bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la ngas 'di shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul par bya'o snyam nas/bcom ldan
64a1('dul ba): 'das kyis de ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs des sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur bar shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul to//de nas 'khor de dag gi bsam
64a2('dul ba): pa dang brag la nyal ba dang /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de nas thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po dag
64a3('dul ba): rtogs te/kha cig gis ni thAr pA'i chu dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ma cig gis ni deg par 'byung ba'i cha dang 'thun pa/btsug gis ni sbyin tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
64a4('dul ba): mngon sum du byas/kha cing gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad
64a5('dul ba): spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas/kha cig gos ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o//kha cig gis ni bla na med
64a6('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o//'khor de la phalnga cher sangs rgyasna la gzhol ba dang /chos la 'bab pa dang /dge 'dun pa bab par bkod do//de nas shing gi
64a7('dul ba): rnacha can dang /rgya skags kyi rna cha can dang /gnye'i rna cha can gyis/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas gdan bshams te/nor du'i chu snod
64b1('dul ba): bzhag nas/bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus chod gsol pa/btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shig mchis nas/bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol//
64b2('dul ba): de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag pi dang /'ge'u ta me zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa gnyis kyis bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer slo ma lta bu na chos 'chad kyis dong nas
64b3('dul ba): mnyan par bya'o snyam mo/de nas de gnyis kla lnga brgya'i 'khor dang grong khyer slo ma lha bur chu bo lnga brgya phab nas chas so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsrel
64b4('dul ba): ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/klu'i rgyal po nag po dang 'go'u ta ma 'di gnyis gal te gong khyer slo ma lta bur 'ongs par gyur na/yul
64b5('dul ba): phung bar byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rings pa'i bsod
64b6('dul ba): snyoms longs shig/mo 'udugal gyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/rings pa'i bsod snyoms ni lnga ste gang zhe na/glo bur ba dang 'gro bar chas pa dang /nad pa dang /nad g.yog dang /dge
64b7('dul ba): skos so//skabs 'dir ni/bcom ldan 'das dge skos su dgongs te/bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de nyid nas steng gi na mkha' las gshegaso//bcom ldan
65a1('dul ba): 'das dang mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis klu'i rgyal po nagu po dang /'go'u tam gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/klu'irI dbang po grong khyeng/
65a2('dul ba): slosgom lta bu la soms la/yul phung bar ma bya shig/de gnyis kyis gsol pa/btsun pa bdag cag gang srog chags breg sbur la yang gnod pa mi bgyid pa de ste
65a3('dul ba): bu'i dad pas mchis na sgo ma lta bu na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po nag po dang 'go'u ta ma la de
65a4('dul ba): lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de thos nas sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal
65a5('dul ba): zas gsol ba'i mdzad par rtsams pa dang /kA re re nas bsams pa kye ma'o//bcom ldan 'das la bdag gi chu'i btung ba gsolo snya mo//bcom ldan 'das kyis
