65a6('dul ba): dgongs pa bral te/gcig gi chu gsol nu ni/des na gzhan dang gzhan du sems par 'gyur byas thabs shig ba sham par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/de nas bcom
65a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis mu dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal ba/mo'u dgal gyi bu song la gang na chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de las chus lhung bzed khong la
65b1('dul ba): khyer te shag shig/btsun pa bkra' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyis bu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gang du chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa/
65b2('dul ba): dri nas chus lhung bzed bkang nas khyer te/bcom ldan 'das gden pader song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed bkung ba'i chu phul ba dang /bcom ldan 'das
65b3('dul ba): kyis pa zhes te gsol lo//tshe dang ljon pa no'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bsams paM/bcom ldan 'das sngon bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag pha dang /mas ni bu gaskyes/bsring/
65b4('dul ba): daskyed de nu mas bsnun/'dzam bu'i gling gi sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin pas shin tu dga' ba byed pa ste/bus phrag pa gcig la ni ma bzhag/cig shos la ni
65b5('dul ba): ba bzhag nas lo brgya chang par khur du thogs sam/sa chen po 'dra'i nor bu dang /mu ta gi dang /bai DUr+ya dang /man shel dang /byi ru dang /dngul dang /gser dang
65b6('dul ba): rdo'i snying po dang /spug dang /pad+ma rA ga dang /dung gas su 'khyil ba ste/de lta bu'i dbang phyug la bdag por bcug kyang bus pha ma la de tsam gyis phan thogs pa
65b7('dul ba): 'am/lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi gang gis pha ma dad pa med pa dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du lu drug la/'dul zhing 'dzud de/so sor 'god/
66a1('dul ba): par byed pa dang tshul khrims 'chal pa/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /shes/
66a2('dul ba): rab 'chal pa shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/'dul zhing 'dzud de/so sor 'god par byed na/de tsam gyis bus pa dang ma la phan 'dogs pa
66a3('dul ba): dang lan lon pa yin no zhes gsungs na/bdag gi ni ma la lan ci yang ma lon gyis/ma la bdag gis bdag gi ma gang du skyes pa bsam mo snyam nas/bsam pa la zhugs
66a4('dul ba): pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes par mthong ngo //de na de su'i gdul ba yin par brtags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis yin par mthong nas de 'di snyam
66a5('dul ba): du sems te/bdag lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs pas/ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la don 'di gsol snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
66a6('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong dag pa dang ma ni bu la shin tu dga' ba byed pa yin no zhes gsungs na/bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes to//
66a7('dul ba): de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nyer bar bzung ste 'dul bar gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis
66b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis dong /bcom ldan 'das bdag pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ri rang kyi rtsa
66b2('dul ba): mo la gom pa bor zhing gshegs pa dang /zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer n+dan du byin to//bu mo bzang mo des tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu rgyang ring po kho na nas
66b3('dul ba): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/kye ma'o yun ring po zhig ljon nas bu mthong ngo //kye ma'o yun ring mo ring mo zhig lon nas bu mthong //
66b4('dul ba): de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos smras pa/shes ldan dag rab tu byung ba 'di ni rgan na/ji lta bu mo 'di de'i ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/shes
66b5('dul ba): ldan dag kho bo'i lus 'di 'dis bskyed de/des ni kho bo'i mi yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang
66b6('dul ba): rung bzhin mkhyen nas/de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs pa 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de thos nas bu mo bzang mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
66b7('dul ba): ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum gyis ched du brjod
67a1('dul ba): pa ched du brjod do zhes bya ba nus/lha dang mi rnams su rab tu bzhag ces bya ba'i bar bong ma bzhin no//yang smras pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa
67a2('dul ba): bzad pa'i/ngan song lam ni khyod kyi mthus bcad do//mtho ris 'gro ba bsod nams bzang ldan phye/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/khyod la brten
67a3('dul ba): nas shin tu rnam dag mig/nyes dang bral bas dag pa deng 'dir thob//'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phyang zhi thob nas//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol bdag gis rgal//'gro/
67a4('dul ba): bar lha min+da lha dang mis mchod pa//skye rga 'chi dang na dang rnam bral ba//srid pa stong du rnyed par rab dka' ba//thub pa khyod mthong der 'dir 'bras bur bcas//btsun
67a5('dul ba): ba bdag ni 'phags shing mngon par 'phags te/bdagra bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi legs kyis dge bstan du gsol/deng sman
67a6('dul ba): chad ji srid 'tsho'i bAr du ngasam pa thag pas skyabasu mchi bar mngon par sgo lagaso//bcom ldan 'das myo'u dang/la gyi bu chen po dang thabs gcig tu der bsod
67a7('dul ba): snyoms sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldani 'das kyis bu mo bzang bye dri la car mi de sung bras gnang //nas chu mo bzang mos bcom
67b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gnad par rig ste/bcom ldan 'das dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gdan la bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/gtsang zhing bzod
67b2('dul ba): pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag rung gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba drug rang gi lag nas
67b3('dul ba): bslabs shing tshim par byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/phyag gnyis bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/stan dma' bzhig blangs te/bcom
67b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sbyar bting nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad do//bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed tshe dang ldan pa
67b5('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos blangs te lhung bzed 'khru bar byed pa ni/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyis bu 'dong ngam/bcom ldan 'das gshegs so//su'i
67b6('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyis//bcom ldan 'das kyi'o//gal te de lta na rgyal byed kyi tsha la soms shig/bcom ldan 'das 'o skol byon lags sam/mo'u dgal gyi bu yu'u phyin zin
67b7('dul ba): to//de nas ngo mtshar du dad pa'i yid kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rdza 'khrul 'di'i ming ci legs/mo'u dgol gyi bu yid mgyogs yin no//btsun pa sangs rgyas
68a1('dul ba): kyi chos zab mo de lta bu ni bdag gi glo bar mchud do//gal te bdag gi glo bar chud par gyur na/bdag gi lus til gyi phye ma ltar brdzis kyang bla na mad
68a2('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/da ni shing tshig pa bzhin cir bgyir yang ma mchis so//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/
68a3('dul ba): the tsom thams cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gang pos las ci zhig bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa nor myong ba
68a4('dul ba): longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skyes lags/las ci zhig bgyis na des bran mo'i mngal du skyes shing rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa mngon
68a5('dul ba): sum du bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gang po nyid las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon
68a6('dul ba): mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba drag byas shing bsags pas/gang pos las byas shing bsngags pa bdag gzhan su zhig gris so sor myong bar 'gyur dge slong dag lus shing
68a7('dul ba): bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chug khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams pa mi 'gyur gyi/'di
68b1('dul ba): lhur las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang //khams dang skyes mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/lus rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/chud
68b2('dul ba): mi zab 'dra tshogs dang dus//rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/sten
68b3('dul ba): pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med
68b4('dul ba): pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de grong khyer bar na ser nye bar brten tsong bzhug so//de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu
68b5('dul ba): byung na//sde snod gsum par gyur to//chos bzhin gyi dge 'dun gyi zhal tab byed do//ri shig cig na dgra bcom pa zhig la dge bskos bab ste/des gtsug khring phyag dar bya bar
68b6('dul ba): brtsams pa deng /rlung langs pos phyag dar phan tshun du khyer bar gyur te/des bsams pa re shig rung zhi bar gyur gyi bar du bzhago snyam pa las/ji tsam na gtsug lag khang de
68b7('dul ba): ma byas pa zhal ta pa des mthong nas/de kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba/bran mo'i bu zhig dge bskos byed/dgra bcom pa des mthong nas/des bsams
69a1('dul ba): ba 'di kun nas dkris pa yin pas re shig bzhag la phyis go bar bya'o//snyam nus gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe de'i drung du song ste smras pa/khyod kyis
69a2('dul ba): kho bo su yin shes sam/des smras pa/shes te khyod dang kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin//des smras pa/gol te
69a3('dul ba): de lta yin mod kyi kho bos ni rab tu byung ba'i bya ba byas so//kho bo ni 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol ba yin la/khyod na 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin pas/khyod kyis
69a4('dul ba): ngag rtsub po'i las phyung gis nyes pa las nyes pa shogs shig dang /des na las de srabs pa dang /yongasu zad pa dang /gtugs par 'gyur ro//des nyes pa las nyes par bshags
69a5('dul ba): pa/sems can dmyal bar skye zhing bran mo'i bur 'gyur ba las de sems can dmyal bar ma skyes par/tshe rab lnga brgyar bran mo'i mngal du skyes te/da ltar gyi bar du srid
69a6('dul ba): pa tha ma la yang bran mo'i mngal du skyes par gyur to//gang yang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/phyag pa dang /nor mang ba dang /longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skyes so//
69a7('dul ba): gang yang de na blags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang /khams la mkhas pa dang /skye mched la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par byas
69b1('dul ba): pa des na/nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byaso//dge slong dag de lta bas na las cig tu gnag pa rnams
69b2('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pa cig tu gnag pa yin/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par sbyin pa ni gcig tu dkar po yin/'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yino//dge slong dag de
69b3('dul ba): lta ngas na las cig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dgra khyed kyi de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//bcom
69b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//gleng bzhi ni rgyal po'i khyab na'o//de'i
69b5('dul ba): tshe rgyal po'i khab na/klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang /ri bo gnaso//de nyid kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang rtag tu 'bab la chu mig dang /mtsho dang mtshe'u rnams kyang
69b6('dul ba): skam par mi 'gyur/lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/lo tog rnams kyang lhag par legs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal
69b7('dul ba): po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang gnyis brtul ba ni de gnyis ri ba kyi bang rim nas/nyo ma ro re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do 'ong ngo //de nas klu'i rgyal po
70a1('dul ba): grog mkhar dang /ri bo 'di snyam du sems te/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga' bo 'di gnyis ri rab kyi bang rnying nas/nyi ma re re zhing
70a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'ong na/bdag cag 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni bzang po ma yin gyis
70a3('dul ba): ma lnga bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang nA de dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
70a4('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la de 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de
70a5('dul ba): thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la skyabaso dong zhing chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu dong nas/bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las bskyabasu 'gro ba dang /
70a6('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe lus dang longs spyod lhag pa ro 'phel bar gyur to//de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das
70a7('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu mchis shing /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams
70b1('dul ba): minas pa de'i tshe/lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur lag so//bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu gnang na bdag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug lags//
70b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i dbang po dag khyed rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa yin gyis rgyal po la rtogs shig/de gnyis kyis bsams pa dang /don gyis na bdag cag bcom/
70b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis rje su ma gnang ngo zhes smras nas//de nyid na gnas//klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang /ri bo'i kun tu spyod pa ni/gal te nub mo bcom ldan 'das bltar 'gro
70b4('dul ba): na ni/lha'i bu'i cha byad kyiso//'on te nyin par ni ni khyim bdag gi cha byad kyiso//de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas shing nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do//
70b5('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi kun du spyod pa ni/de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'gro ba de'i tshe/'ga' zhig mthong na/ldang bar/
70b6('dul ba): mi byed pa med grang zhes mi gnang chen gtong bar byed de/des mi gnang chen zhig mngags te/kye nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dgra bsnyen bkur byed ltos shig/de
70b7('dul ba): song ba las ji tsam na/khyim bdag gnyis shig mthong nas des bsams pa/'di gnyis ni lha'i yul na gnas pas ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed snyam nas/des rgyal po la
71a1('dul ba): smras pa/lha khyim bdag gnyis shig mchis pa ni/lha'i yul nyid na gnas pa lag s+ho//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bsams pa/de gnyis
71a2('dul ba): kyigyis bdag mthong na ci'i phyir lding bar mi byed kyis 'gro'o snyam nas de na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang /klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang /ri 'os rgyal po gzugs can
71a3('dul ba): snying po mthong //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can+da snying po mchis na/ci re shig rgyal po la sti stang
71a4('dul ba): bgyi 'am/'on te chos la bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i dbang po dag chos la sti stang byos shig/dam pa'i chos la ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
71a5('dul ba): 'das rnams kyang bla mar byed la/chos la ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyang bla mar bya'o//tshig su bcad de bka' stsol pa/'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang /ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin/
71a6('dul ba): padang //da ltar sangs rgyas gang yin pa/mang po mya ngan 'jom mdzad pa//bzhud dang bzhugs dang byon 'gyur ba//thams cad dam chos bla mar byed/'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin//dro bas 'dir
71a7('dul ba): bdag phan 'dod pa/bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa yis//sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te/dam pa'i chos la bkur sti bya/de gnyis kyis ldang ba ma byas//de nas rgyal po mi bzod pa skyes te/des gsol pa
71b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcud de bka' stsal pa/zhe sdang dang ni 'khrug pa dang //ma dad pa yAM sems kyis na/
71b2('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i//dam chos shes par mi nuso//gang gis khros dang bgra med pa'i//sems ni dul bar byas pa dang //'di la mnar sems spa
71b3('dul ba): pa des//legs par gsungs pa shes par 'gyur//rgyal pos bsams pa/khyim badreg 'di gnyis 'ongs pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi chos nyan pa'i bar yang //
71b4('dul ba): chad par gyur to snyam nas/de stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhobs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo //de song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/khyim
71b5('dul ba): bdag 'di gnyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba de'i tshe khyed gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces bsgo shig/de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
71b6('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ba dang /blon po bdag gis bsgo ba/lha'i zhal nas khyed cag gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces gsung ngo //de gnyis
71b7('dul ba): kyis smras pa/bka' bzhin 'tshal mchi'o//bsams pa bdag cag gnyis kyis/yun ring po zhig nas bsams pa gang yin pa de ni tshegs chung ngus grub bo
72a1('dul ba): sgyus ma//de nas 'od pa'i rgyu chen po byung nas glog mo chung ngu nang zhug so//blog mi chung du nas blog mo chen por no//drog mi chen po nas ma rdzun //rdzu
72a2('dul ba): nas chu chen por ro//chu chen po nas rgya mtsho chen po re te/gong gi tshe rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe/de gnyis phyir zhing lus dang longs spyod shin tu 'phel bar gyur to//
72a3('dul ba): tsam dus gzhan zhig ni rgyal po'i khab kyi dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang /chu mig dang mtsho dang mtshe'u rnams kyang chud pa dang yongasu zad pa dang datugs par gyur la thug/lhas
72a4('dul ba): kyang dus dus su char gyi sbyin+da legs par ma phab pas lo nyis par gyur te/mug nyam dra ba dgon pa slongs mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to//rgyal pos pasams
72a5('dul ba): pa/rgyal po'i khab 'di ni klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang grog mkhar gnas te/de gnyis kyi mthus/dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang 'bab/chu yig dang mtsho dang mtshe'u rnams
72a6('dul ba): kyang chu tsho/lhas kyang dus su tshor gyi rgyun legs par bab pa nyid kyis lo tog legs par rgyas par gyur na/da ni dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang /chu mig dang mtsho dang /
72a7('dul ba): 'tshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang /yongasu zad pa dang /gtugs par gyur la thug/lus kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phob pas lo nyes par gyur te/mu sa1
72b1('dul ba): d+hA ba dgon pa slongs mo bas zlas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur na/klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /grog mkhar she 'am/bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding gis khyer ba 'am/sbrul khas sdigs
72b2('dul ba): gyis bzung ba 'am/des 'jigs nas bris par ma gyur grang /de lta mod kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin gyis/ma le bdag
72b3('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam du bsam nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dar song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lnga mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu
72b4('dul ba): 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das l-i don de rgyas par gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol po/rgyal po chen po de
72b5('dul ba): nyis ni shi pau yir ma yin/bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding gis kyang mkhyer/sbrul khas sdigs kyis kyang ma bzung des 'jigs pas kyang ma bros mod kyi rgyal po khyod nyid kyis yul nas
72b6('dul ba): bskrad do//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de gnyis mthong bar mi dran na/de gnyis yul nas bskrad pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/rgyal po chen po ngas khyod dran par bya'o//rgyal po
72b7('dul ba): chen po khyod kyis khyim bdag gnyis shig yul nas bskrad pa dran nam/bcom ldan 'das dran lags//de gnyis ni klu'i rgyal po ra bi dang grog mkhar yin no//btsun pa
73a1('dul ba): de gnyis gang du mchis/rgya mtsho chen por dong ngo //bdag gi yul ma rung bar gyur lag s+ho//rgyal po chen po de gnyis lnga bzod byin cig dang ma rung bar//
73a2('dul ba): mi 'gyur ro//de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po na 'chis na ji ltar bzod pa stsal/de gnyis tshes brgyad dang /bcu bzhi la khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas na/nga'i zhabaso gnyis la phyag 'tshal
73a3('dul ba): du 'ongs dang /ngas rtags brtan gyi khyod kyis bzod pa byin cig/bcom ldan 'das ci bdag gis rkang pa gnyis la btug par bgyi 'am/rkang pa gnyis la btugs par mi bya ste/
73a4('dul ba): 'on kyang lag pa brkyo la klu'i dbang po bzod par gsol lo zhes smros shig dang bzod par 'gyuraro//rgyal pos de gnyis 'ongs pa la 'bad de snod cing 'dug pa dang ji tsam
73a5('dul ba): na/de gnyis khyimo bdag gi cha byad du byas nas bcom ldan 'dus kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang /de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags bston
73a6('dul ba): pa dang /rgyal pos lag pa mngon du brkyang nas smras pa/klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod par gsol lo//rgyal po chen po bzod par bgyi'o//gal te bzod par gyur na
73a7('dul ba): 'dir spyon cig rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag gis skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas de nyid kyi tshe bdag cag go lus
73b1('dul ba): dang longs spyod skyes te/gal te da che bzhin du 'dir 'ongs na yulA ma gA d+hA ru yang mi shong par 'gyur ro//'o na yulA ma ga d+ha ma rung bar 'gyur mod/ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro//
73b2('dul ba): ji ltar mi 'gyu ro/khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khang bzangs gnyis brtsigs la/zla ba drug cing dus mchod gyis shig dang /kho bo cag gi 'khor bzhug la/dus mchod kyi tshe
73b3('dul ba): yang 'du bar bya'o//rgyal pos de bzhin du byed pa dang /de gnyis kyis 'khor dag kyang bzhag la/dus mchod kyang rang nyid nyamasu myong bar byed//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de
73b4('dul ba): dag gi 'khor bag med par gnas pa na/klu gdugs pa dag gis glags rnyed nas/de dag gis se ra ba dbab par brtsamaso//rgyal po'i kha bo na bram ze ser ba'i sngags la mkhas
73b5('dul ba): pa gzhan zhig yod de/des de bab cing byab pa dag bcad pa dang /de la yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye'o tshogs kyis dbang thang byin no/lho phyogs na bran ze mes byin zhes bya ba
73b6('dul ba): ser ba'i sug ga la mkhas pa zhig yod pa des/byang phyogs na yul nus pa rtsan zhes bya ba dag yod de/de na rgyal po sde mchog ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/
73b7('dul ba): de'i yul ne klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yod do//do na sman mthu che ba pha rol gnon po yod par thos nas/de'i ched 'gro'o zhes de chos te rim gyis rgyal po'i khabs
74a1('dul ba): tu phyin nas/bram ze ser ba'i sngags 'chang ba de'i gan su zhugs pa dang /ji tsam nu sne rU ba chen po 'bab pa bram ze gnyug mar gnas pa des
74a2('dul ba): bcad par ma nus nas/de phyir byung nang du zhugs par byed pa dang /bram ze mes sbyin gyis dris paM/mkhan po ci'i slad du mkhan po 'di phyir byung nang du zhugs par mdzad//
74a3('dul ba): des smras pa/bu ser ba chen po bab pa bcad pa ra ma nus pas mod/bdag gis dgu mo/bu leg so//de chu nyung zhig la zlas te gtor bas tshal pa brgyar gye so//rgyal
74a4('dul ba): po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams mchog tu ngo mtsher du gyur nas rngan pa thogs te/bram ze de'i khyim du dong nas smras pa/mkhan po rgyal po'i khab kyi skye
74a5('dul ba): bo'i tshogs mngon par dga' bar gyis rngan pa longs shig/ci'i phyir/khyod kyis ser ba chen po khums pa'i slad du'o//des smras pa/kho bos ni ma bcad de/'o ni
74a6('dul ba): kyang bram ze 'dis bcod//de dag bram ze de'i drung du dong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug shig dang dbang thang sbyin no//de bzhin du gnas par bya'o zhes de gnaso//
74a7('dul ba): des ser ba de dus tha gi tsam zhig gi bar du sngags kyis bgegs te mi 'bab par gyur to//rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/
74b1('dul ba): shes ldan dag bdug cag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis sor ba mi 'bab na/ci'i phyir de lho dbang thung sprin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do//bram ze des sngags brtul nas
74b2('dul ba): yul nus pa can du song ba dang /phyir yang ser ba 'bab par gyur to//de rnams bram ze de'i drung du song ste smras pa/mkhan po bram ze'i khye'u dgar mchis/des smras pa/
74b3('dul ba): khyed cag gis de la bkur bsti ma byas pas de song ngo //mkhan po gal te mchis ni bdag cag la sbron cig/de bzhin du bya'o//de yang rim gyis rgyal po sde mchog gang na ba der
74b4('dul ba): song ste phyin nas/rgyal po sde mchog la rgyal ba dang /tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa/lha khyod kyi yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis pa de'i gnas na/mod la
74b5('dul ba): mthu skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sman mchis kyi sgra snyed ston cig dang /lha'i skal ba ya dbul bar bgyi'o//rgyal pos smras pa/kye bram ze klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes ni gtum po yin pa sa des khyod rlag par
74b6('dul ba): mi byas grang lha re shig bdag la sngags kyi mthu dang sman gyi mthu mi chas te/gal te klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes dang 'dra ba'i klu rnams kyis 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dri lta ste/bu ram shing ga tshil lam/
74b7('dul ba): 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin gang bar gyur kyang /bdag ge ba spu gcig kyang bskyod pa'i tshe mi thog na/klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/'on kyang lha'i mi dgu ma
75a1('dul ba): ba la thug pa 'ga' mchis sam bram ze yod do//lha de sgri shig dang /des de'i gnas ston par 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal pos mi de la bos te bsgrog
75a2('dul ba): nAnang rje bram ze 'di la klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas ston cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi bya des rgyal po ri ltar mnyan nas bram ze de khrid do chas so//ji tsam na mi ring ba
75a3('dul ba): zhig tu bsdud nas de la smras pa/bram ze tshal sngo zhing sngo ba dag sbrengs pa pha bi mthong ngam/mthong ngo /de ni klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yin no//de song ste des der mod
75a4('dul ba): la mthu bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman las khur du dregs na sa de thogs te/yul nus pa can du song nas rgyal po sngo mchog gi skal pa byin te/rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin
75a5('dul ba): nas/bramo ze de nyid kyi khyim du zhugs so/de nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la sbran pa dang /de dag mchod yon thogs te lhags nas/bram
75a6('dul ba): ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug shig dbang thang sbyin/des smras pa/khyed cag gis bku sti ma byas pas kho bo mi 'dug go//de rnams kyis de gzhag par gal gyis 'chu bar
75a7('dul ba): brtsamos te/gsil ba btab pa dang /khas blangs nas de dag gis 'tsho ba'i rigs bcad do//'jig rten ni phun sum tshogs pa 'dod gyi rgud pa dang mi me thu
75b1('dul ba): byas/des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed//dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/dka' dgur
75b2('dul ba): spyod par byed pa na/khye'u zhig btsas te/des de'i myido bo can zhes bya bar btogaso//de yod rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dge'i dgur spyod par byed pa na bu mo zhig bcos
75b3('dul ba): to/de'i mo ni sne ra po zhes bya bar brtag so//bram ze mo ni 'khor bral zhes bya'o//mna' ma ni klog ces bya'o//des bsams pa/yang dang yang du ser ba gcod cing ci
75b4('dul ba): las med las byed zer/yun ring rab tu sngags kyis bgag par bya'o zhes des yun ring por sngags kyis bgag pa byas te bzhag pas ser ba mi 'bab par gyur to///
75b5('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/bdag cag kho ni'i bsod nams kyi mthus ser ba mi 'obab na/ci'i phyir dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnam
75b6('dul ba): kyis bcad do//bram ze de phrag dog gis zil gyis non bras bu yang sngags kyi tshig rnams 'dzin ma bcugo/bde ba la chags pos kha don yang ma byas la/
75b7('dul ba): smrar yang snyam du me bcugo/des sngags kyi tshig rnams ni bsams na brjed/sman ni mi bskams pas rul par gyur to//de rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim
76a1('dul ba): bdag rnams la snying na ches nas/de rnams la klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mu stegs kyi gnas dang /dka' thub kyi tshal de dang de dag tu song nas dris pa/shes/
76a2('dul ba): ldan dag gi gang bsams pa dang /gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro ba'i thabs lta mI skrod/de na kha cig gis smras pa/mer zhugs shig kha cig gis smras
76a3('dul ba): pa dug zo shig/kha cig gis smras pa/g.yang sa nas bdag nyid mchongs shig/kha cig gis smras pa/bdag rang gi skal thag pas thogs te/shing gri yal ga las 'phyang du chug
76a4('dul ba): shig ces thams cad kyis 'tsho ba'i thabs bstan gyi nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni ma yin pas/de ring gyis 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo //des dge slong zhig mthong nas dris pa/'phags
76a5('dul ba): pa gang gis gang bsams pa dang grang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta 'ga' mchis sam/de smras pa/bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung
76a6('dul ba): shig/der ci zhig bgyi/der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yang spyad par bya/bsam gtan dang gnod pa dang ldan par yang gnas par bya ste/gal te re shig
76a7('dul ba): mthong ba'i chos nyid la kun shes pa thob pa na/des na de nyid khyod ni sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin pa yin no//'on te sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin dus byed na/gang bsams/
76b1('dul ba): pa dang /gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//'phags bya de ni rngo mi thog na/gzhan yang cung zad ji mchis/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
76b2('dul ba): spyan drangs la gdugs tshod gsol to//de yang rngo mi theg na gzhan bstan du gsol/bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan dongs lnga gdugs chod gsol te/sgron lam
76b3('dul ba): thob shig dang /gang bsams pa dang gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grib//'phags pa de ni rdo thog gis bgyi'o zhes bum pa bzod pa lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drangs la
76b4('dul ba): gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag de skye zhi ga/sa rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces
76b5('dul ba): btab po/de la chung mas dris pa/rje'i sras smon lam ji zhig btab/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i granas nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi
76b6('dul ba): rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo//legs te bdag kyang khyod kyi chung mar skyu re cig/dus smras pa bdag kyang khyod kyi bur gyur cig/de bzhin du bu mong
76b7('dul ba): smras pa/bdag kyang khyod kyi bu mor gyur cig/de bzhin du mna' mas smras pa/bdag kyang man mar gyur cig ces byas nas/de rnams khyim ring ba zhig tu zhugs te nyal ba
77a1('dul ba): dang /sprin kha dog lnga pa las char babs te/rtsig pa 'gyel bas non te kha trag go//klu rab mdzes shi 'phos nas 'khor drug khri dang skyes nas/de yang rab madz+ra/
77a2('dul ba): zhes bya bar gragaso/chung ma 'khor bral zhes bya'o//bu ni ri bo can zhes bya'o//bu mo ni ser ba zhes bya'o//mna' ma ni klog ces bya'o//chos nyid kyis klu 'am/klu'i bu mo skyes
77a3('dul ba): nas ring po ma lon par gsum dran par 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /gang du skyes pa dang /las gang gis yin pa'o//des bltas na mi las shi 'phos//gang du
77a4('dul ba): skyes sha na klu rnams su'o//las gang gis she na smon lam gyi dbang giso//ci'i phyi ro snyam na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa bya ba'i phyiraro//des bsam
77a5('dul ba): po/ci lo tog ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa la bya na mo rnams kyi sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ram/'on te mo skyes pa rnams la 'gyur snyam na/des ji ltar skyes pa la byas
77a6('dul ba): pa ltar ma skyes pa la ni de ltar ma yin par mthong nas/des 'khor rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan tshur shog/yul ma ga d+ha ra deng la char pas lo tog thams cad
77a7('dul ba): skrun cig/de rnams kyis lo tog thams cad bskrun pa dang /de nas drug stong gi 'khor dang /shol mda' tsam gyi char gyis rgyun gyis ji ltar yul ma ga d+har srog ma
77b1('dul ba): yang khyer ba de lta bu'i char gyis rgyun dbab par brtsams so//de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa srog ma yang klu 'dis phrog so zhes dri'i ming sog ma med ces bya bar thog so//sdom
77b2('dul ba): la rgyal po'i khab dang lan da//'od ma'i dbyug pa dmar bu'i grong //chu bo gang gi sprin bairtsegs dang //sgra chen yangs pa tha ma yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
77b3('dul ba): khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ku gnas pa na bzhugaso//gang gi tshe gzhon nu ma skyes dgra lhas sbyin gyis sbed nas/pa chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa bas de rang nyid kyi
77b4('dul ba): cod pa Na bcings nas/rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa mdo po bya bar brtsams te/dgrongs pa man chad bya ba'i phyir glang po che nor skyong
77b5('dul ba): rang khyim gtum po za ba dog spad pa dang /de'i ma lus 'phags mas smras pa/bu bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti ma yin pa ma byed cig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
77b6('dul ba): rnams ni bkur bsti ma yin pas bsgrengs pa yin gyis/rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de/gnod par gyur ta re/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yul ang ga dang /mang ga d+ha
77b7('dul ba): rnams 'byor ci de nyams dga' ba yino//snying rnyog pa can des smras pa/ci gang na bcom ldan 'das med pa'i yul de dag zhig pa dang /stongs par gyur tam/de mas
78a1('dul ba): /rnams kyi thams cad du rtog gyu pa grunas/ldan sa su glongs su gan nub skyes / 'asod nams ma smin dA
78a2('dul ba): yang du sgrogs kyis ngas khyed ga ni med pa'i dad pa la bzhags du ri shrIg dus la mA babe blas mnyan yod du gsheg so snyam nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
78a3('dul ba): dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan yod gdun pa der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa ni mnyan yod du byon nas/gnyen yod na rgyal bu rgyu lta byed kyi tshal
78a4('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//mtho rgyal phran dag gis bcom ldan 'das la ma skyes dgras bkur bsgom yin pa byas pas de bkur ba sti ma yin pas
78a5('dul ba): bsnyengs nas rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon to//zhes thos nas/de dag 'di snyam du semos te/re shig rgyal po sdig can des pa chos kyi rgyal po chos dang
78a6('dul ba): ldan pa bas na/des kyang mchog nas bcom ldan 'das lho dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyis mchod pa de la yang bkur bstim yin pa byas te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
78a7('dul ba): 'das rnams ni bdakur bsti ma yin pas bsgrengs pa yin pas de nis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon par gyur pas de yod ye rgya
78b1('dul ba): srid las dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas de dag gis phan tshun pho nyas 'dugs nas blo gros gcig tu byas te/dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon pa glang po che'i tshogs dang rta ba'i
78b2('dul ba): tshogs dang /shing rta bi'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang /rgyal po'i khab tu dong ste lo btsem nas phru mar bskor de 'khod do//klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis kyang ser ba'i
78b3('dul ba): rgyun phab pas lo tog lhag ma rnams ma rung bar byas so//dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang /chu mig dang /mtsho dang /mtshe'u rnams skams la thugs pas mu ge byung bar gyur to//
78b4('dul ba): chu lhag ma gzhan dag kyang mtha' rgyan phran dag gi dge ma rung bar byaso//de nas ma skyes dgra sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub nyam nga bar gyur pa la mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de
78b5('dul ba): rma la thal bas btab pa ltar mi ngas byung ste/khyogaso dang khyogs 'drung par gyur to/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra gnod pa brgya phrag du ma snying dkrugs pas lag pa 'gram pa la gtang de
78b6('dul ba): sems khongasu chud cing 'dug go/de nas lus 'phags mas smras pa/bu ci'i phyir sems khongasu chud yum gnod pa brgya phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to//bu kho mos sngar khyod la
78b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti ma yin pa ma byed cig//'al ba gzhi//rim po nyi shu dag pa//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur bausti ma
79a1('dul ba): yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyis/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de/gnod par gyur ta re zhes ma smras sam/de ni 'di yin no//
79a2('dul ba): yum de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/bu bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol cig/yum bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i rngo mi thog lag so//bu khyod kyis
79a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni can dran dang sgye'ur mnyam pa/khong khro ba dang /rje su chags pa spangs pa yin no zhes ma thos sam/gal te 'ga' zhig gis
79a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dpung pa gcig la ste'u yis 'jog par byed la/cig shos la can dran sa mchog gis nyug par byed na de la bcom ldan 'das rjesu chags pa
79a5('dul ba): yang mi mnga' khong khro bo yang mi mnga'o//de nas lus 'phags mra'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi zhig la smras pa kyi nang rje tshur shog/khyod bcom ldan 'das gang
79a6('dul ba): na ba der song la son nas/kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/gnod pa chung ngam/nyam du bo nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang
79a7('dul ba): ngam/'tsho 'am/gnod pa mi mnga' 'am/stobs dang bde ba la reg par bzhugs sa mo zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/btsun pa lus 'phags
79b1('dul ba): mA'i bu yul mA ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mchid nas/btsun pa bu ngan pa ni mchis kyi pha dan pU ni mu mchis pas/bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung
79b2('dul ba): ste/rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gsol/gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer stongs te ming lus
79b3('dul ba): par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+he'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas chas te/rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das
79b4('dul ba): gang nA ba dar song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bros phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des/bcom ldan 'das
79b5('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po mi skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/gnod
79b6('dul ba): pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/zhes bya ba nas bde ba la reg par bzhugs sa mo/zhes snyun gsol lag so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//kye mi khyod dang /
79b7('dul ba): lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bde bar gyur cig/btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma gda'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mchis nas/btsun pa bu ngan pa
80a1('dul ba): ni mchis kyi pha ngan pa ni ma mchis pas/bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bas nye byar bzung ste/rgyal po'i khab tu gshegasu gsol/gal te
80a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na/zhes bya ba nas ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i ba gong ma bzhin du'o//bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs pas mi de la gnang ngo //de
80a3('dul ba): nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs pas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das ji srid bzhed gyi bar du mnyan
80a4('dul ba): yod du bzhugs naste/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i khab gang na ba de rgyu zhing gshegs te/rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yul ma ga d+hAr byon to//
80a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni dug gi ma rung bar byas pa'i chu de dag bskams so//char pa 'bebos pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni yan lago brgya
80a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ngo //lha rnams ni char pa 'bebs pa la zhugaso//sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis ni rgyal po'i khab nas mi ma yin pa rnams bskrad
80a7('dul ba): nas mi ngas zhi bar gyur to//mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong nas grong khyer bskor ba btang ste dong ngo //tshong pa rnams kyis ni zong dge
80b1('dul ba): bkra mo/bzo phal ba gzhan dag gis ni rang rang byed par brtsam so//yul so so na gnas pa'i tshong pa rnams dang /ded dpon rnams ni zong dang 'jug par brtsam so//lo ni legs
80b2('dul ba): par gyur to//lam po che dang /srang dang sum modo dang /bzhi mdo rnamasu ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid chen po sgrogs par gyur to//mu stegs pa ni bag 'khums par gyur
80b3('dul ba): to//skye bo'i tshogs rnams ni rab tu dga' bar gyur to//lus 'phags ma'i bu yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra sra//bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+har gshegaso zhes thoso//
80b4('dul ba): thos nas kyang snying dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba rgya chen po dang /yid bde ba skyes nas/blon po rnams la smras pa shes ldan dag deng la/bcom ldan
80b5('dul ba): 'das kyi phyir dpag tshad phye dang gsum gyi lam bltar ba dang /grong khyer dag bzang por byos shig/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad kyang rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo
80b6('dul ba): sol to//can dran gyi chus chag chug thob la dar gyi chun 'phyang meng pi sbyong shig/dri zhimi pog por dag shoms la/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dag tshugs shig/bar bar me
80b7('dul ba): tog gi gzhal med mdzes padag byos shig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hi ri rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas thams
81a1('dul ba): cad rgyas par byed du bcugo/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yung ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pa dang /rgyal po chen
81a2('dul ba): po'i mthus/bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang gsur song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das dul po 'khor du la/zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/grol ba 'khor grol ba//
81a3('dul ba): dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang //
81a4('dul ba): bral ba/mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lte bu/glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/seng ge mche ba can
81a5('dul ba): gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/na mkha' lding mdab chags kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu bram ze slob ma'i tshogs
81a6('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/dpa' ba dmag gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/lam mkhan 'dron pa'i tshigs kyis bskor
81a7('dul ba): ba lta bu/nged dpon tshong ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/tshong dpon rang gi skyes pos bskor ba lta bu/rkyal dran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/'kho
81b1('dul ba): po bsgyur ba bu skyong gis bskor ba lta bu/zla ba d+hA skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/nyi ma 'odra zer skyong gas bskor ba stu bu/yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis
81b2('dul ba): ba lnga buM/lus 'phags blo grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/no sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lte bu/
81b3('dul ba): thag bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu/brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu
81b4('dul ba): rgya mtsho mi go yo ba lta bu sbyin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/glang po che dam pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas ma g.yengs pa'i spyod pa can/sku skyes bu chen
81b5('dul ba): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/sku 'di 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong gi 'od zer
81b6('dul ba): bas lhag pa/rin po che'i ri blo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes po/stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa gsum dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /thugs
81b7('dul ba): rje chen po dang ldan pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang po dang lus 'phags me'i bu yul b+ha ga bla'i rgyal po ma skes dgra dang /lha brgya stong brag du mas zham ring byis
82a1('dul ba): te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du gshegs so//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas/
82a2('dul ba): grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshes rnam drug tu g.yos par gyur te sa chen po 'di g.yos/rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ldeg rab tu
82a3('dul ba): ldog/kun tu rab tu ldeg cing /shar phyog mthon nub phyogs dma'/nub phyogs mtho na shur phyogs dma'/lho phyogs mthen byang phyogs dma'/byang phyogs mtho ni lho phyogs
82a4('dul ba): dmed/mtha' mtho na dbus dpa'/dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur to//'jig rten 'di 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas pa tha mu pa snod snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to//
82a5('dul ba): lhas kyang bar snang la rnga brdungs so//na mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /a
82a6('dul ba): ka ru'i phye ma dang /rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /gu gum gyi phye ma dang /ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang /lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dang /gos dag 'thor bar bye di de/bcom ldan
82a7('dul ba): 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/de lta bu'i yam tshon dag byung bar gyur to//gzhan yang dog pa dag ni yangs par gyur to//dma' ba dag ni mtho par gyur to//mtho
82b1('dul ba): ba dag ni phyi la bar gyur to//glang po che dag ni skad 'byin par gyur to//rta dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to//khyu mchog dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to//khyim gyi nang na bzhug pa'i snod sna
82b2('dul ba): tshogs dag ni ma brdungs par rang sgra 'byin par gyur te/long ba rnams kyis ni mig thob par gyur to//'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos par gyur to//lku gos pa rnams ni smra nus par gyur
82b3('dul ba): to/dbang po lhag ma mtshang ba rnams ni dbang po so sor thob par gyur to//chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to//dug mthungs pa dag zhi bar gyur to//phan
82b4('dul ba): tshun 'khon byung ba rnams ni mdza' bar gyur to//sbrum ma dag ni bde bar bcas par gyur to//btson du bcings pa dag ni thar bar gyur to//nor med pa dag ni nor rnyed par gyur to//
82b5('dul ba): de lta bu'i 'byor pa de mthong nas/dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigasu bcad de smras pa/yul gang zhig tu 'jig rten gtso bor gshegs pa der//lo nyes mi ngas dang ni phyi dgra'i 'jigs
82b6('dul ba): pa med//lha rnams char 'bebs skye bo bsod nams rab tu byed//dir ni ya mtshan brgya phrag gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs
82b7('dul ba): te/skye bo'i tshigs dbugs phyung nas/rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/'od ma'i tshal du gshog so//de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hI'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan
83a1('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgro bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dun/
83a2('dul ba): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po me skyes dgral chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzod/yang dag par 'dzin
83a3('dul ba): tu 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad ces bya ba nas/yang dog par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de
83a4('dul ba): nas lus 'phags mI bu yul ma gu d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod de/rje su yi rang nos stan las langs te/bla gros
83a5('dul ba): phrag pa gcig tu gzer nas/bcom ldan 'das gong na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong
83a6('dul ba): gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang bsod pasnyoms dang /bzims cha dang /snyan spyad kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad
83a7('dul ba): 'bul zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gso la/bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags mi'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgro la cang mi gsung bas gan do//
83b1('dul ba): de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
83b2('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te/spyan las langs te song ngo //bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/zla ba
83b3('dul ba): gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so//de nas sangs rgyas la mngon
83b4('dul ba): par dga' ba'i lha rnams kyis/mi ngas de bskrad nas rgyal po'i khyab nas byung nas sgra sgrogs zhes byi ba'i nang du byung ste/yangs pa can du 'dug nas/yadra pa can gyi skye bo'i chog
83b5('dul ba): la mi das byung gyur te/khyogs dang khyogs 'drud par gyur to//yangs pa can bram ze mdun na 'don mda' bo chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i rmi lam na/yangs pa can
83b6('dul ba): na gnas pa'i lha zhig gis smras pa/gal te mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog/shAkya'i rigs dga' ba yi bcom ldan 'das//yangs pa can du gshegs par 'gyur na ni//
83b7('dul ba): gnod pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur//des nam nangs nas yongs pa can gyi li tse byi rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'di pa zhig mthong ngo //de
84a1('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/da bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar po nya su zhig btang zhes phan tshun 'phro bar
84a2('dul ba): brtsams pa dang /mdun na 'don mda' bo che 'di nyid thams cad du nus pa yin la/bdag cig la yang byams pa yin gyis btang ngo //de la de dag gis smras pa/bcom ldan
84a3('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song la phyin nas/bdag cag tshigs gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lo mgo bos phyag byos la gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas
84a4('dul ba): snyun gsol pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/btsun pa yangs pa can gyis tshogs kyi mchid nas/bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs
84a5('dul ba): su gsol/gal te bcom ldan 'das yungs pa can ma gshegs na/ring po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing mying lus par 'gyur zhes gsol cig/des smras
84a6('dul ba): pa/shes ldan dag lus 'phags mI'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal ba ma skyes dgra ni khyed la yu ring du gnod pa byed pa'i phyir rgol ba dgra por gyur pa yin pas bdag la gland
84a7('dul ba): pa byed par mi 'gyur phrang /de dag gis tshig su bcad de smras pa/yul 'khor gzhan dang 'gyid par yang /bo nya mi gsod ces grag na/khyod ni rgyal ba'i pho nya
84b1('dul ba): yin/kun gyis mi gsod smos ci dgos//de nas mdun na 'don mda' 'o tshe dag mchod dang bkra shis dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dag byas te/rim gyis rgyal ngo'i khab tu skyon
84b2('dul ba): nas/de lam gyis dub pa bsal te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag byor dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /yang dang //
84b3('dul ba): par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bdun na 'don mnga' bo ches bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
84b4('dul ba): gsol to//kye go'u ta ma yangs pa can gyi tshogs bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to//gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga nyung ngam/bskyod pa
84b5('dul ba): yang ngam 'tsho 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/stobs dang bde ba la rig par spyod dam zhes nyan gsol log so//mda' bo che khyod dang yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur
84b6('dul ba): cig/kye go'u ta ma yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/bcom ldan 'das yongs pa can du gshegasu gsol//gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ma gshegs
84b7('dul ba): na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming tsa ma lus par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mda' bo che 'dir nga nyan thos kyi
85a1('dul ba): dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pas rgyal
85a2('dul ba): po la rtogs shig/gal te rgyal pos gnas dang de bzhin du gshegs par bya'o//des yongs pa can du bcom ldan 'das ni 'di skad ces gsung ngo zhes spring ngo //de rnams
85a3('dul ba): kyis kyang spring pa de nyid kyi phyir khong lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song la son nas bdag cag gi tshogs gis lus 'phags ma'i bu
85a4('dul ba): yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dag la gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/po skyod pa yang ngam 'tsho 'am/gnod pa mchis sam/stobs dang /bde ba la reg
85a5('dul ba): par gnas sam zhes kyang dris la 'di skad ces lha bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rje su gnang par mdzad du gsol/lhas gal te
85a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la rje su gnang na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes smros shig/de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches bsams
85a7('dul ba): ba/ci re shig rgyal po la bsnyen par bya'am/'on te blon po rnams la bya snyam du bsams pa dang /de 'di snyam du sems te 'ga' zhig bsnyen par mi bya ste/'on kyang
85b1('dul ba): bsnyen par byed pa la bsnyen par bya'o zhes 'byung bas/mdor n+ya blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya'o snyam nas/des blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya bar brtsams so//de nas blon
85b2('dul ba): po rnams kyis smras pa/mdun na 'don dngos pa ci zhig la 'ongs//dris smras pa/shes ljon dang kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha la gsol ba 'drib su mchis kyis/
85b3('dul ba): khyed cag gis grogs mdzod tsog/de rnams kyis smras pa/de bzhin du byas kho bo cag gis ji tsam na bos pa de'i tshe khyod shog cig/de nas de dag gis skabs shes nas
85b4('dul ba): bos pa dang /de nas mdun ni 'don mda' ngo tsha lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma gau d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dag gang na ba der song ste son nas/lus 'phags mi'i bu yul ma gA d+ha'i
85b5('dul ba): rgyal po ma skyes dgra la rgyal ba dang /tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs glacig tu 'dug nas/mdun na 'don mda' bo ches lus 'phags ma'i bu
85b6('dul ba): yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes ngadra la 'di skad ces smras so//lha yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchis nas/lha la gnod pa chung ngam/reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba rgyas
85b7('dul ba): snyun gsol//mda' bo che khyod dang yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur cig/lha yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/'di skad ces lha bcom ldan 'das yangs po can/
86a1('dul ba): du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rje su gnang ba mdzad du gsol/lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das rje su ma gan na/ring ngo mi thogs pa/
86a2('dul ba): nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur zhes mtsho'o//rgyal pos smras pa/mdor bo che kho bos yun ring mo zhig naste/kye mi yongs pa can gyi gnas stongs kyi
86a3('dul ba): marung snyam du bsnams te/gal te yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs par gyur ni/kho bo yad la bsams pa tshogs chung dus rdzogs par ma gyur tam/de skad ces smras pa dang /
86a4('dul ba): mdar ba rgya ming ngo //blon po rnams kyis smras pa/sku bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gcig kyang so su btang ba lta mchis sam/sa ldan dag med do//de stan
86a5('dul ba): lhas bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti mya legs pa bgyiso//lhas bcom ldan 'das la rje su gnang yang rung /mu gnad yang rung ste/bcom ldan 'das ni yangs pa can
86a6('dul ba): b+h+rUM sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gshegs par 'gyur ba nyid do//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag kho ngas ma shes kyis/gral te de ltar na khrug shig/de
86a7('dul ba): kyis mang sa me gris nas rgyal pos smras pa/ma 'i ma ris dam pa'i /com ldan las rjesu gnang bar bya'o//gas te kha rdzas jicom ldan 'das ma
86b1('dul ba): pa dang /bsnyen bkur ci 'dra ba byas pa de kho na 'dra bar yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis bya na/de lta na kho bos rje su gnang ngo //des yangs pa can pa rnams la rgyal pos 'di skad ces
86b2('dul ba): gsung ngo zhes spring ngo //de rnams kyis smras pa/rgyal po mi gcig pur gyur paso bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang /bkur bsti byed na bdag cag tshegasu gyur pas ci ste mye bya
86b3('dul ba): zhes de dag gis bcom ldan 'das gshegasu gsol cig dang /bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang ches khyad par 'phags pa'i mchod pa dang /bkur bsti bgyi'o zhes
86b4('dul ba): spring ngo //de nas mda' bo ches de dag rgyal po la rig par byas//de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom
86b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/lus 'phrugs ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom
86b6('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /thabs gcig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /bsod bsgoms
86b7('dul ba): dadeng /gzims che dang /bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par sgro lags mod kyi/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba
87a1('dul ba): gnang bar mi 'gyur lags na/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rjes chod kyi gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das
87a2('dul ba): kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dag la cang me gsung bas gnang //de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma gA d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom
87a3('dul ba): ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas ston las langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo /de nas lus 'phags ma'i
87a4('dul ba): bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po mra skyes dgagras de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas zhes bya ba nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas
87a5('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//gser gyi bya ma bum blangs tau bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa btsun pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis klu
87a6('dul ba): gdugs pa dang /gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang /de rnams ni btul lags na btsun pa/klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'di yun ring mo zhig nas/bdag cag la sha kho na ma
87a7('dul ba): mi ches par ni sha kho na bgyid/mgran zla ma mchis par ni mgran zlar gyur/gnod pa ma mchis par ni gnod pa bgyid par gyur te/lo tog gang dag skyes shing
87b1('dul ba): skyes bu rnams chud gzon par bgyid lags na/bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/klu'i rgyal po sogs ma med legs par gdul bar gsol/bcom ldan//
87b2('dul ba): 'dis kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul mA ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dag le cung mi gsung bas glenang //dri nas bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags mi'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma
87b3('dul ba): skyes dgra la yon bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs te/gtsug log khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
87b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang phyogasuM klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo //byang phyogs na ni phan yon lnga yod de/lha ged zhe na/me
87b5('dul ba): tog phun sum tshogs pa dang /'bras bu phun sum tshogs po dang /chu phrin sum tshogs pa dang /bsod snyoms mos pa dang /skye bo'i tshogs drang po yod do zhes gsungs
87b6('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jig gi phyir gtsug lag khung du bzhug so//de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po'i khab nas
87b7('dul ba): chu bo gang ga'i bar gyi lam dang grong khyer dag che thad du skor du bcug ste/la me rdo ba dang gsegs ma dang gyo mo thams cad gsal nas/tsan da ni bye tshu'i chag chag btab
88a1('dul ba): dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi pog phor dag bshams/dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po sbyangs/bar bA du me tog gzhal med khang dag byaso//yangs pa can
88a2('dul ba): gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis/chu bo gang gA nas yangs pa can gyi bur du de bas lhag par khyad par du 'phags por lam dang grong khyer dag stor du bcug go/de nas bcom ldan
88a3('dul ba): 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo na l-in da gang na ba der 'dong ngo /btsun pa bka' bzhin
88a4('dul ba): 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nasra/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang /yul ma ga d+hi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa ni/na lan dar
88a5('dul ba): byon nas/nA lan da na a bri'i tshal dgrag dbye can zhes bya ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe na na la nad na rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa zhes bya ba rgas pa 'khogs pa gtugs pa btsas nas lo brgya
88a6('dul ba): nyi shu lon pa zhig gnas pa la/na lan 'di bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams bkur spyi byed/bla mar byed ri mor byed/mchod par byed de dgra bcom par bkur ro//de nas kun
88a7('dul ba): tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa'i sngon gyi grogs po dang /blon po dang /gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mchem su gyur pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/gal te bdag gis kun tu
88b1('dul ba): rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba la 'di skad ces drang srong khod tshur shog bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces smra na/gang yang bdag gis tshigs mi snyan pa de srid
88b2('dul ba): pas ma la bdag de'i drung du song ste/yid kyi dri ba 'dzin tu gzhug go bame nas/de nas lce de kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshwa ba gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/kun tu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di
88b3('dul ba): skad ces smras so//drang srong tshur shog/kho bo las yid kyi dri ba long la kun chub par gyis shig/ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar
88b4('dul ba): bya/ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya//ci'i phyir spong /ji ltar nad med pa 'thob/drang srong gang zhig khyod kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'du byas pa
88b5('dul ba): 'di dag tshig gis lung bstan par sems rangs par byed pa de'i thad du khyod tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces smras nas/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas kun tu rgya 'dam
88b6('dul ba): bu'i tshong pa lha de las yid kyi dri ba bzung ste/kun chub par byas nas/'od srung rdzogaso byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'od srung rdzogs byed kyi drung du/yid kyi dri ba yid
88b7('dul ba): kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin po la mdza' bo ltar bcas po yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas/ji ltar nad med pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya
89a1('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//'od srung rdzogs byed kyis de'i yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes rnam par mi shes na lan klan pa
89a2('dul ba): smos kyang ci dgos/de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshod pa 'dra snyam du sems te/'od srung rdzogs byed kyi bdag gi yod kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi
89a3('dul ba): shes/rnam par mi shes nA la ni klan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam nas/de kun tu rgyu gnag ltos kyi bu dang /sgra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba tsun dang /myi 'phags/
89a4('dul ba): skra'i la ba can dang /ka ta'i bu nog can dang /gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu dang ni ba der song ste phyin nas/gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i mdun du yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par
89a5('dul ba): 'dus byas pa/ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par lta bar bya zhes bya ba nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gyis kyang /bdag gris yid
89a6('dul ba): kyi dri bo yid kyis mngon par 'dus byasmra ba rnams kyang mi shes rnam par mI shrIs na/ljon klan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
89a7('dul ba): de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i cheng po 'di snyam du sems te/gang la yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i tshig gis lung snyan pa mi thob pa de 'dra ba
89b1('dul ba): rab tu byung bas bdag la ci zhig bya/bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya cher yod pas/ma l+ya bdag 'dug la 'dod pa la yang longs spyod cing sbyin pa yang btang
89b2('dul ba): bsod nams kyang bya'o snyam mo//yang de'i blo skyes pa/ma la bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma gang na ba der 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas de chas pa dang yang bsoms pa/re shig dge sbyong
89b3('dul ba): dbram ze rgan rabs gang yin pa 'di lta ste/'od srung rdzogs byed nas gtsub pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gong ma bzhin te/de rnams kyis re shig yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus pa
89b4('dul ba): rnams kyang mi shes na/dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gzhon pa gas ru bu rab tu byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsams te slar ldog par 'dod pa las yang de 'di snyam du sem
89b5('dul ba): te/sngon gyi kun tu rgyu rnying pa rgan po//'khogs pa spyod pa'i slob dponi drag las bdag gi dge slong gzhon nu la brnyas par mi bya dge slong gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par
89b6('dul ba): mi bya ste/dge slong gzhon yang de ni dbang che ba/mthu che bar gyur pa yin no zhes tho so snyam du bsams nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom
89b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga mi gyim du ba mngon par 'dus byas pa ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'jos
90a1('dul ba): ces bya ba'i bar gong mya bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis kun tu rgyu 'angam bu'i tshong ba'i bsam pA na khyen nas/de'i tshe tshigasu bca/
90a2('dul ba): de bka' stsal pa/mdza' bo gzhon la rnam par smos byed cing //de ni bdag tu zad dri zhes smral//las kyang blo dgu 'dim zhing byed pa de//bdag gi ba shis ma yin par shes byar
90a3('dul ba): bya/gang zhig bden pa ma yin tshig/mdza' bo dag la sgo byed cing //sbru la lasu mi byed pa 'dra//mkhas pa rnams kyis yongasu shes te//de lta bu ni mdza' bo ma yin la mdza' bo ltar
90a4('dul ba): bcos pa yin par shes par bya/ji ltar bdag dang 'dri ba'i mje' ba yin pa rnyog par bya zhe na/gang zhig rtag tu bag med dbye ba yi//bsamos pas klags lta de ni mdza' min
90a5('dul ba): gyi//gang zhig 'dir ni snying dang 'odra gyur pas//gzhan gyis mi phyed de ni mdza' bo yin//de lto bu ni bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya'o//ci'i phyir spong zhe na/skyes bu
90a6('dul ba): gces bu mthar 'byin cing //'bras bu'i blta bar byed pa ni//rab tu dga' ba snyed pa'i gnas//rab bsngags 'dren pa'i zhi ba bsgom//de don tu gnyer bar bsgrim mo//
90a7('dul ba): ltar nad med 'thob can//rab tu dben pa'i ring ni//nye bar zhi ba'i ri shes nas//chos la dga' ba'i ro 'thung /nad med sdig pa mang byar 'gyur//de ltar na meng me
90b1('dul ba): bo//de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshod pa 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i thugs kyis ni bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen no snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
90b2('dul ba): to/go'u ta ma bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa ldan/bcom ldan 'das dge slong ko'u ta mI'i spyan sngar bdag
90b3('dul ba): ges tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul bya lta rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/de ltar
90b4('dul ba): rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa des shes bya ba nas/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
90b5('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong 'dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to//
90b6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu dmar bu can gyi grong khyer dang /rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can na nub mo nye bar ba
90b7('dul ba): cing bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga dang /khyed cagu kho nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag ma shes ma mthong khong du ma
91a1('dul ba): chud sngo sor ma rtogs pas/lam ring po 'drar rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to//bzhu po da ga dang zhe na/nga dang khyod cag kho nas zhes bya
91a2('dul ba): nas sdug bsngal 'byugs pa'i bden pa ma shes ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes bya bas nas sdug bsngal kun 'byung bdag sdug ngasnga mo shog pa
91a3('dul ba): da sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'gro ba'i lam ma shas ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//ngas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bdenA~M ba rje su rtogs shing so sosar rtags pas srid pa'i sred
91a4('dul ba): babacad pas 'khor ba'i skyes bzad de da ni srid pa gzhan med/ngas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ngame/sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro
91a5('dul ba): ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rje su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zed de ni srid pa gzhan medzo//bcom ldan
91a6('dul ba): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/dre bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yong 'di skad ces bka' stsal/nga dang khyed cag
91a7('dul ba): kho na yis/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag/ji lta ba bzhin ma mthong pos/lam ring du ni 'khor bar 'gyur/bden pa de dag mthong
91b1('dul ba): nus ni//srid pa'i sred pa cang nas//'khor ba'i skye ba zad pas na//da ni srid pa gzhan med do//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs
91b2('dul ba): te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs po la mngon par bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi gang gang
91b3('dul ba): na bar 'dod ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshalo//zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dang /yul ma gad+hA ljongs
91b4('dul ba): rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/dmar bu can gyi grong du blun ta dmar bu can gyi gling gi dam bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhug so//dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis
91b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing ga shigs nas dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te/dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhug so zhes thos//thos nas kyong tshogs nas cho ga dang /
91b6('dul ba): blunas khyar phyed cing 'dus nas/dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'di sa gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo ngos phyag
91b7('dul ba): byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can mi grong gi bram ze dang /phyi mi bdag rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsol to//
92a1('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dag ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dag yin te/lnga gang zhe na/bram ze dang khyim bdag ngag 'di la bag med
92a2('dul ba): pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyas longaso spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas po'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las
92a3('dul ba): nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs lnga po yin no//bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs
92a4('dul ba): dang phyogs mtsham su sdig pa dang /bsngags pa ma yin pa dang /grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang /tshigasu bcad pa grags par 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag
92a5('dul ba): bag med pa bgra med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/phyogs dang phyogs mtshem su sdig pa dang bsngags pa ma yin pa dang /grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang tshig su bcod pa grags par
92a6('dul ba): 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gnyis pa yin no//bram ze dang khyime bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyas rgyal rigs kyi
92a7('dul ba): 'khor du 'ang rung bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung khyim bdag dag gis 'khor du'ang rung /dge sbyong gi 'khor du'ang rung /'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor de dang der
92b1('dul ba): zhum zhum por gyur nas dga' ba med pa dang /bag cha bas 'gro bar 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas brag tsha bas
92b2('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gsum pa'o//bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa thig med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/yid la
92b3('dul ba): bcagos bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la bcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag
92b4('dul ba): med pa'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa yin no//bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa le gnas pa'i rgyus/lus zhig nas shi bi'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log
92b5('dul ba): par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyas lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro
92b6('dul ba): ldog par lhung ba sems can dmyal po rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs lnga pa yin no//bram ze dang khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dge
92b7('dul ba): ni bag yod pa'i phan yon te/lnga gang zhe na/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag ngag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i chus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur te//
93a1('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag
93a2('dul ba): yod pa'i phan yon dang po yin no/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnos pa'i rgyus phyogs mtsham su dge ba dang /grags pa dang sgra dang
93a3('dul ba): tshig su bcad pa rgya chen por grags par 'gyur to/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshem su dge ba dang /grags
93a4('dul ba): pa dang sgra dang tshig su bcad pa brgya chen po grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no//bram ze dang khyim bdag dgra gzhan yang
93a5('dul ba): bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyas/rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rang /bram ze'i 'khor du 'ang rung /khyim bdag gi 'khor du 'ong rung /dge slong gi 'khor
93a6('dul ba): du'ang rung /'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der zhum zhum por ma yin pa dang /dga' ba dang bgra che ba med pas 'go bar 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag
93a7('dul ba): bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pi'u rgyas zhes bya ba nas/bag che ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon go sum pa yin//
93b1('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag dgra gzhan yang bag yod pa dag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcugs pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur te/bram ze dang /khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag/
93b2('dul ba): yod pa la gnos pa'i rgyus yid la gcags pa med par mchi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni ngag yod pa'i phan yon bkri pa yin no//bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan mang bag yod pa pa
93b3('dul ba): yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams skyes par 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa pog yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig
93b4('dul ba): nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnamasu skyes par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon lnga pa yino//de nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams
93b5('dul ba): stan las lengs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das glal ba der log su thul mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
93b6('dul ba): ldan 'das bdag gi gni su do med bzhugs par gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de
93b7('dul ba): nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdeg rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang par rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo ngos phyag 'tshal te/
94a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dbyar byed kyis dge sbyong po'u tam/ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/
94a2('dul ba): dmar bu can gyi grong du gshegs nas/dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs te/de la dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur
94a3('dul ba): bsti byas zhes thos so//thos nas kyang rta rgod ma dang ldan pa'i shing rta thams cad nas dkar po'i nang du zhugs nas/gser gyi bya me bum dang /ril po spyi blugs thog te bram ze'i khye'u
94a4('dul ba): mi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing bram ze'i tshogs kyi mdun gyis bltas nas dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bye ba'i phyir
94a5('dul ba): song ngo //de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pa las babs te/rkang pas kun dge' ra bar zhugs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin nos/bcom
94a6('dul ba): ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig
94a7('dul ba): tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi so yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag
94b1('dul ba): par gzeng stod par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
94b2('dul ba): bstan/yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/cang mi gsung ngo //de nas ma ga d+ho'i sna chen po la gtogs
94b3('dul ba): pa bram ze dbyar byed stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar na/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
94b4('dul ba): to//bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs ched sbyor zhing mchis na/gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom
94b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis me ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze da par byed la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas ma gi dro'i ma chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed kyis bcom ldan
94b6('dul ba): 'das cang mi gsung byas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'odas kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtog po bramo ze dbyar byed song
94b7('dul ba): nas/ring po me lon par thug su chud nas 'dug gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas 'dug gnas kyi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus te/'dug gen su zhugs nas
95a1('dul ba): gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/skyil mo bkrung bcas nas sku drang por srang ste dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go/bcom ldan 'das 'dug
95a2('dul ba): gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na/lha'i skyon rnam par dag pa ma'i las 'phags par dmar bu can gyi grong na/mi che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'dres
95a3('dul ba): gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te/'dug gnas nas byung na/'dug gnas kyi gling ma la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gden
95a4('dul ba): bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig par
95a5('dul ba): brtson pa su yin ci thos/btsun pa bdag gis ma gu d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed lags par thos so//kun dga' bo legaso leg so//mo ga d+ha'i sna
95a6('dul ba): chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed ni mkhas pa yin te/'di ltar sum cu rtsa gsum po'i lho rnams dang lhan gcig 'gres pa lta zhig/kun dga' bo 'di nang 'dug
95a7('dul ba): gnas na/nyin par gyi gnas pos bzhugs pa na/lha'i spyan rnam par dge pa mi'i las 'das pas/dmar bu can gyi grong ni mthu che ba mithu che ba'i lha rnams gnas
95b1('dul ba): snro 'bri ba gzugs//kun dag daphyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas skyes thos pa'i phyogs deng 'din+d+ha s+t+waM/klan kyai d+h+ye mthu che mthu che ba'i smirnams
95b2('dul ba): kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur roskyos gang du lta bair me dang phal bas gnas kyis skyes pa'i phyogs der ni 'di lta ste/gnas kyi phyir mi bo mA~M dang /dal po rnams kyi sems
95b3('dul ba): gzhol bar 'gyur ro//kun dag 'obo phyogs 'di ni mthu che ba mthu che pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyis bres pas phyogs 'dir 'di lta ste/gnas kyi phyir dbang che bar grags pa dang
95b4('dul ba): che bar brags de'i mi rnams kyi sems go zhol bar 'gyur te/kun dga' bo ya rabs kyi gnas kyi gnos dang /ya ras kyi tha snyad ji stod pa dang zong 'groms pa rnams
95b5('dul ba): nang na yang 'dim ste/dam rgyucan b+hi gled khyer 'di ma rdzub tu 'bye//kun dru di lta bar ched gsum 'gyu bar rig padun/mye dang chu dang nang lce khrug /
95b6('dul ba): d+hIn su me ga d+hA s+t+wa~M ts+tshin po la gtogs pa'i khyi ma tha dbyu bye nyid kyi rlo mo nas tsong zhing bsod pa'i zhes byu nas phyug byin pas te lhung hrI dganas zhes bya ba'i bar gong
95b7('dul ba): bizhin te/giser gyi rgya ma bu ma thogs te gsil ba 'odongaso shing spyan sder 'dug go//'di skad ces kyang gsol te/kye goru te ma sbyin pa 'di las gsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /
96a1('dul ba): dge ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /bde ba'i bzhi ci mchis pa de dmar bu can na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du yon bsdu
96a2('dul ba): ba mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/skyes bu gang zag dad pa can//gang zhig lha rnams mchod byed pa//ston pa'i bka' bzhin
96a3('dul ba): byed pa ste//de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags//mkhas shing yid ni gzhungs pa yis//gang gi phyogasu gnas 'cha' ba//tshul khrims ldan pa bshos gsol nas//de yi
96a4('dul ba): 'og tu yin bsngo bya//de rnams rjed pas rjed de 'gyur zhing //mchod pas kyang ni mchod par 'gyur//de nas lto nas byung ba yi//bu la ma bzhin 'di la brtse//lha rnams brtse'i skyes
96a5('dul ba): byas ni//bde ba bzang po mthong bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i btam gyis yang dag par gtam
96a6('dul ba): gyis yang dag par brtan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bor mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs te gshegaso//de nas
96a7('dul ba): ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis der rgyus lhag gang yin pa de thams cad sbyin par btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di
96b1('dul ba): sgyum du sems te sems las mngon par 'du byed de/bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo gang nas phyir gshegs pa de ni bdag gis go'u ta ma'i sgo zhes bdag so//chu
96b2('dul ba): bau gang gi'i 'jug ngogs gang na rgal ba de yang go'u ta ma'i 'jug rdzogs zhes gdagaso snya mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis ma gad+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar
96b3('dul ba): byed kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi dbus thog thag gshegs nas byang phyogasu rgyu ste/chu bo gang ga gangan par gshegs so//de nas lus 'phags me'i bu mo ga
