96b4('dul ba): d+hi'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di snyam du sems te/ma la bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bye ba la lhag par spro bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i
96b5('dul ba): gdugs lnga po rgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ba dang /yangs pa can gyi l-i tsaM byi rnams kyis bsams pa/lus 'phags ma'i du ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes
96b6('dul ba): dgra 'di bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la rab nyid lhag par spro bar gyur na ci'i phyir bdag cag gis spro bar mi bya snyam nas de rnams kyis kyang /rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga
96b7('dul ba): brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo //klu rnams kyis bsams pa/re shig mo 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba lhag par spro bar gyur
97a1('dul ba): na bdag cag klu rnam nI rnar ltung ba'i lus can yin na/ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsus
97a2('dul ba): gi steng du bzung //rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi bsams pa/re shin mi bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong ba 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar gyur na//
97a3('dul ba): mngon sum du mthong ba bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/de dag gis kyang brtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bu'i gtsugi steng du bzung //sum cu
97a4('dul ba): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsams pa/lha dang mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la spro bar gyur na/bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam na/de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdug/
97a5('dul ba): lnga brgya bcos kyi dbu'i gtsug steng du bzung //bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ji ltar 'di dag phyir zhing dad pa mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab po snyam nas/de nas bcom ldan/
97a6('dul ba): 'das kyis ji ltar re re'i yid la bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng na bdag gdugs 'dzin to snyam pa de ltar byin gyis brlab te de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par
97a7('dul ba): byang chub la gdug nyis stong lnga brgya lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo //dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad
97b1('dul ba): gcod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis drin las ci zhig mdzad na/de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub la
97b2('dul ba): gdugs gnyis stong lnga brgya lha dang mo rnams kyi debu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
97b3('dul ba): kyis sngo ni tshe rabs gzhan na/las byas shing bsags pa/tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhi no//dge slong dag
97b4('dul ba): sngon byung ba'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/rgyal po de la
97b5('dul ba): bu stong du gcig gis ma tshong ba zhig yod do//rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni bu btsas shing bcas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid de lakhyam par byed do//btsun mo rnams kyis bsams pa/rgyal
97b6('dul ba): bo 'di'i kun tu spyod pa ni sras bcas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid nas la byam par mdzad pas bdag cag bu yod bzhin du blo med pa dang 'dras/da ni ning khrims zhig bcas te/gal
97b7('dul ba): te bdag cag las 'ga' zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur na/des rgyal po la gdags par mi bya'o zhes bcas//ji tsam na btsun mo gzhan zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur
98a1('dul ba): nas/de de dag gis phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag ste/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba lta na sdug pa mdzes pa/lpags
98a2('dul ba): pa'i 'dog gser 'dru ba/mgo gdug lta buM/lag pa ring ba/dpral ba'i dbyes che ba smin ma 'dzur gi sna'i gzeng mtho bi/yan lag dang nying la gi thams cad dang ldan
98a3('dul ba): zhig bcos//ji tsamachen por gyur pa dang /btsun mo de dag thams cad khye'u de la bu'i sdug pa skyes/'dul ba gzhi//bam po nyi shu bdun pa/
98a4('dul ba): de nas dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal bu legs mthong chen po sher gyi lus 'phagros kyi gling nis rin po che sna bdun gyis sna dang shing khams kyi rgyal phran stong gis yongasu bskor te/bu
98a5('dul ba): stong du gcig gis mtshang bas zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor na/gzi brjid nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhag par sba zhing 'ong /gzhon nu khang bzang gi steng ni 'dug pa de mthong
98a6('dul ba): nas de/mya la dris pa/yum mchi ba pa bi su ligs/bu khyod kyi yub rgyal po legs mthong chen po yin no//yum de 'das na bdag rgyal por 'gyur rama?/bu rgyal
98a7('dul ba): de'i sras stong du gcig gis mtshang ba zhig yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bu bo gang yin pa de de 'das na/rgyal por 'gyur na/khyod ni thams cad kyi nu bo yin no//des smras
98b1('dul ba): pa/yum gal te de 'das na bdag rgyal por mi 'gyur na/gnang bar mdzod cig dang /bdag dad pa yang dag pa khyo nas khyim nas med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o//btsun mo
98b2('dul ba): de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/bu khyod la bdag cag gi bu'i sdug pa nyam su myong bas de ltar ma byed cig/yum gdon ma'i tshul bA ra rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o//de dag gis de
98b3('dul ba): gdon mi za bar gal gyis mchu bar shes smras pa/bu gal te de lta na dam zhig bcas nas gnong bar bya ste/gang yang khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs chung zad rtogs na/de
98b4('dul ba): khyod kyis bdag cag la smros shig/de bzhin du bgyi'o//de dag gis gnang nas/de mtha' gcig tu song ste/mkhon po dang slob dpon med pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
98b5('dul ba): sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas//rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/bdag gis ma de rnams la mkhas blangs pa sgo dgos pas/song la
98b6('dul ba): sngon gyi dam bcas pa mthar dbyung ngo snyoms nas/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni dgra gis chos mi ston gyis lus kyi yin pas des de rnams kyi mdun du 'bar ba dang /gsal
98b7('dul ba): ba dang /char 'bebs pa dang /glog 'byin bdag gi tshe 'argal dag bya bar bcim so//so so skye bo ni rje 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas/de dag shing
99a1('dul ba): rtsub nas bcad pa bzhin rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtog so//'phags
99a2('dul ba): pa khyod ni bsod snyoms pa bzhed pa lags la bdag cag kyang bsod nams 'tshal ba lags na/khyod 'di nyid du bskyed mos chel du bzhugs shig dang /bdag cag gis
99a3('dul ba): rgyun du bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o//rang sangs rgyas des khas blangs nas/de dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms kyis basbyin bkur bya bar brtsams so//
99a4('dul ba): rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/bdag gi lus rnag can 'dis bya ba gang yin pa de ni byas kyis/ma la bdag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan los 'das pa'i dbyingasu
99a5('dul ba): 'jug go sgom nas/de nas de ngang pa'i rgyal po mdab ma brkyang bA lhor steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang /char 'bebs pa dang /glog
99a6('dul ba): 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bstan nas/phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bzhi pa'i dbyingasu zhug so//de nas de dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cadra spangs
99a7('dul ba): to/spungs nas bsregs te/me'i phung po de'o mas bsad nas/rus pa de dag gser gyi bu mo bi'i nang du bcug ste/bskyed mos tshal de nyid du rus pa'i mchod
99b1('dul ba): rton brtsigs te//mgul gdub dang /gdun+d+ha bur+d+hanA n+dan dang /gzhan yang rgyun rnam pa sna tshogs kyis cing gdugs dang /rgyul mtshan dang /ba dan drug bcugan//
99b2('dul ba): de nas dus gzhan zhig ni rgyul bI legs mthong chen po btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nis so si ka'i dus lnga bab pA ni/me tog gau shrIng rnams kha 'dus shing dang po dang /
99b3('dul ba): khyud khrung dang /rma bya dang /ne tshe dang /ri stegs dang /bya go kI la dang /shing shwa tretwe'u skad 'byin pa'i tshul bseb tu bskyed mos tshal gyis gzhir song napa de bskyed
99b4('dul ba): sa tshol du 'khyam pa las dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten de mthong ngo //de bskyed mos tshul srung ba'i me li smras po/kwa'i nang rje 'dri ci yon/des smras pa/lha bdag gisan
99b5('dul ba): mi 'tshal te/'on kyang 'di'i don ni btsun mos 'tshal to//de nas des btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa dang /de dag gis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/lha
99b6('dul ba): mi 'jigs pa sbrul du gsol/des smras pa/de bzhin du sbyin no//de dag gis skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/khyed cag gis bu rgyal srid
99b7('dul ba): la mngon par dga' na de kho bod la me gsol ba bzang po mo sna zhig byas//gal te gsol bar gyur pa dang /kho bo de kho na la rgyal srid dbang bskur bar dbang bsku
100a1('dul ba): bar 'gyur bzhig/'on kyang ngas bdag nyid chen po de mya ngan las 'das phyur myur kyang /gladugs dang cod pan dang /thor tshugs gdag so zhes de nas do du
100a2('dul ba): la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten de la gdugs dang cod pan dang thor tshugs rnams btab so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po chen po legs
100a3('dul ba): mthong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//gang yang ngas de na bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la gdugs dang cod pan dang thor tshugs btags te/las de'i rnam par
100a4('dul ba): smin pas/ngas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgya po nyis stong lnga brgya byas//las de kho na'i lhag mas da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na/lha dang mi rnams kyis rtsibs brgya dang
100a5('dul ba): ldan pa'i gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur to//gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu ma rtogs par gyur na/gzhan du yang ngas 'khor lo sgyur
100a6('dul ba): de'i rgyu po nyis stong lnga brgya byed par 'gyuraro//de lta bas na nga'i bstod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can gang yin pa de dus nyan thos rnams kyi longs spyod du rnam par smin par bsngos to//
100a7('dul ba): gal te mu tig bri gang gis 'bras bre gang khugs kyang 'on kyang nga'i nyan thos rnams ni bsod snyoms kyi phongs par mi 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de lci bas na/yis gcig tu gnag
100b1('dul ba): pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya bri ba gong ma bzhin du'o//bcom/
100b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag rAng te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs po la mngon par bstod do//lus 'bagos ma'i bu yul ma gau d+hA rgyal po
100b3('dul ba): ma skyes dgras glu zam 'dzug su bcug pa dang /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gru zam gtsug so//klu rnams kyis bsams pa/bdag
100b4('dul ba): tsag+ho klu rnams ni rnam par sdud pa'i lus can yin pas ma la bdag gis gdengs ka'i zam pas/bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang ga bsgral bar bya'o snyam nas de rnams kyis gdings
100b5('dul ba): ka'i zim pa gtsugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag kyid cag la po gang zhig lus 'dagos ma'i bu yul me gra d+ha'i rgyal po ma
100b6('dul ba): skyes dgra'i gru ba ma las chu bo gang ga brga la bar spro ba de ni de las rgol cig/gang zhig yangs pa can gyi lo ba~M rnams kyis klu zam gtsugs pa las spro ba gang yin pa de yang nga
100b7('dul ba): waM rgol cig/nga yang dge slong kun dga' bo dang thabs cig/klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las chu bo gang gi brgal bar bya'o//de na kha cig ni lus 'phags mA bu yul ma
101a1('dul ba): gra d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i glu zam las rgal to//kha cig ni yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnam kyang glu zam laso//bcom ldan 'das kyang tshe dang ldan
101a2('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo dang thabs gcig klu rnams kyi godangs ka'i zom pa lus rgyal to//de nas dge bsnyen zhig gi ngo tshe tshig su btsud de smras pa/kha cig zam pa btsugs nas chu bran
101a3('dul ba): bor te rgya mtsho rgal//skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye bo rnamasu brgal//sangs rgyas bcom ldan bram ze rgal bar gyur nas skam la bzhugs//dge slong
101a4('dul ba): dag 'dir khrus byed nyan thos rnams ni gzings 'cha' na//gal te kun na chu yod khron pa'i chus ni ci zhig bya//sred pa'i rtsa ba bcad nas su zhig spyod pa tshol bar byed//bcom/
101a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi sau sa phyogs gzhan zhig na/mtho zhing mtho ba'i sa phyogs zhig gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga'
101a6('dul ba): bo khyod rgyal po sgra chen gyi lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la/sbomasu 'dom drug cu yod pa thams cad gser las byas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig yod
101a7('dul ba): de/sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dge byas nas chu bo gang ga'i nang du bor ba gang yin pa de blta bar 'dod dam/bcom ldan 'das de blta ba de'i dus la bab lagaso///
101b1('dul ba): bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mchod stong de bskrad na/dge slong rnams blta bar 'gyur lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
101b2('dul ba): 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang /dri bas 'brel pa bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa phyag gis
101b3('dul ba): sa la reg par mdzad pa dang /klu rnams kyis bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir se la rig par mdzad snyam na/mchod sdong gzigs par bzhad par mthong ngo //de nas
101b4('dul ba): de dag gis bsgrengs pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis mchod sdong blta bar brtsamaso//tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni 'dod pa chung ba yin pas mtha' gcig tu song nas/phyag
101b5('dul ba): dar khrod pa dge 'tshem mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dge mchod stong nub par gyur gyis rtags zung shig ces pa las
101b6('dul ba): de nub par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/btsun pa dge slong rnams mchod stong la lta ba bgyid na/tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan
101b7('dul ba): ni 'dod pa chung bas mtha' gcig tu mchis nas phyag dar khrod pa 'tshim pa la gzigs/ci lags re shig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du 'am/'on te sngon bsten pa'i
102a1('dul ba): /smad du 'azlas/pAl tA zhig 'ad chugs dang blab hrI da du lags nAn/kuzhan yang 'od chags bral bzhi ma dris la grus //'on te tron/
102a2('dul ba): sten pa'i slad du lags na ni/'dis gang du stan lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yang yin la/sngon yang
102a3('dul ba): bsten pa'i phyir yang yin no//'dis sngon gang du bsten lags/dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po rab sgrogs zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang grogs por
102a4('dul ba): gyur to//de bu 'dod kyang bu med nas leg pa la 'grim pa btang de/sems khang du chud cing 'dug ste/nor rdzaso mang po zhig bsags na bdag la bu med pas/bdag shin
102a5('dul ba): rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur ro snyam mo//de nas brgya byin gyis mthong nas dris pa/grogs po khyod ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa btang nas/sems khongasu chud cing
102a6('dul ba): 'dug/des smras pa/ko'u shi ka nor rdzas 'di snyed cig bsags na bdag la bu med pas/bdag shi nas rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur bso//brgya byin gyis
102a7('dul ba): smras pa/phrogs pos khyod sems khong du chud par ma byas so//gal te lha'i bu 'ga' zhig 'chi 'phos pa'i byung bar gyur na/de khyod kyi bu bskor bar bya'o//chos nyid kyis
102b1('dul ba): lha'i bu 'chi 'pho ri 'byung ba la ni ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/gos ma rnyings pa rnams rnyings par 'gyur ba dang /me tog gi phreng ba mu rnyings pa dag rnyings par 'gyur ba dang /lus
102b2('dul ba): las dri mi zhim pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /mchan khung gnyis nas rdul 'dzeg pa dang /rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o//ji tsam na lha'i bu zhig la snga lhas byung bar gyur nas/
102b3('dul ba): de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/grogs po rgyal po rab skyugs kyi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor cig/des smras pa/ko'u shi ka de ni bag med pa'i gnas
102b4('dul ba): yin te//ko'u shi ka rgyal po rnams ni nyes pa mang po byed pa yin pas tshes ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas/sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur na mi rung ngo /brgya byin gyis smras
102b5('dul ba): pa/grogs pa khyod la ngas dran par bya'o//ko'u shau kA rgyal po rnams ni dga' ba mad pos bag med pa yin no//grogs po de ni bden na 'on kyang khro bos khyod la dran par bya'o//
102b6('dul ba): de nas rgyal po rab skyugs kyi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyar to//gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams blangs pa de'i nyi ma khyen la skye bo'i tshogs tshon po la sgra phyung bar
102b7('dul ba): gyur to//de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig bcas te zhes bya ba des/sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no//de'i nye du dag 'dus shing tshogs nas ming
103a1('dul ba): 'dogs par byed de/khye'u'i ming cir gudags/gnyen rnams kyis smras pa/gang gi nyi ma kho na la khye'u 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyi ma kha
103a2('dul ba): na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung b.raro gyur paso/de bas na khye'u'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar ga dag so//zhes de'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar btags te/khye'u sgra chen
103a3('dul ba): ma mo brgyad la rjesu gtang nas zhes bya ba nas/brtag pa brgyad dang /dbye ba dang klog pa la mkhas shing shes nyen can du gyur to zhes bya bI bA dong ma bzhin du'o//de rgyal
103a4('dul ba): rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur cing /yul gyi dbang phyug dang mthu dang /brtson 'grus thob pa sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan nas gnas pa rnams kyi gzo'i
103a5('dul ba): gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /rta la zhon pa dang /shing rta'i thabs dang /ral gri'i thabs dang /mda' gzhu dang /
103a6('dul ba): phyir bsnur ba dang /mdun du brdur ba dang /lcags kyus skyer thabs dang /zhags pas gdab pa dang /mda' bo che 'phen pa dang /dbyug pas rdeb pa dang /'dzin
103a7('dul ba): stongs dang /gom stangs dang /gcad pa dang /dral ba dang /dbyug pa dang /rgyang nas phog pa dang /sgra drag par phog pa dang /gnang du phog pa dang /mi 'chor
103b1('dul ba): ra phog pa dang /tshabs che ba dag ste/gnas lnga po de rnams la shin tu byang bar gyur to//chos nyid kyis re shig pa ji tsam gson gyi bar du bu'i ming mi grags pa yin no//dus
103b2('dul ba): gzhan zhig na rgyal po rab sgrogs shi nas//sgra chen rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang /des the ge tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug nas/chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal
103b3('dul ba): srid byed du 'jug par gyur to//de nas brgya byini gyis smras pa/grogs po kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi bu ra bsgos te/chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig/sem///
103b4('dul ba): can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgo 'am/des the go tsam zhig chos bzhin gyi rgyal srid byed du bcug nas/slar yang chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid du byed du 'jug
103b5('dul ba): par gyur to//lan gnyisu yang brgya byin gyis smras pa/grogs po kho bo khyod rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi bur bskos te/chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig/sems can
103b6('dul ba): dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ta re zhes ma bsgo 'am/des smras pa/ko'u shri ka bdag cag rgyalnga po rnams ni dga' ba mang pos 'gra myed pas skad cig brjod par 'gyur gyis
103b7('dul ba): bodag la//khyod kyis kyis mtshan ma zhig zhog shig dang /bdag gis mthong nas nges par sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag bgyi'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu
104a1('dul ba): /las thams cad pa la bsgo ba/las thams cad pa song la khyod kyis rgyal po sgra chen gyi gan su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang /lha'i mchod sdong srid
104a2('dul ba): du 'dom stong yod pa/sbomasu 'dom drug cu yod pa/thams cad gser las byas shing rin po che sna tshogs kyi spras pa zhig sprul cig/de nas lha'i bu las thams cad pas rgyal
104a3('dul ba): paposgra chen gyi granas suM lha'i 'khor gyis khyams dang /lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dro mo stong yod pa/sbom su 'dom drug cu yod pa/thams cad gser las byas pa rin po che sna tshogs
104a4('dul ba): kyis spras pa zhig sprul to//de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis mchod sbyin gyi khang pa rtsig tu bcug nas/rang gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba mdong gi zhal tra bor bzhag go//de nas mchod/
104a5('dul ba): sdong la 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mI thams cad blta bar spro bor lhag nas/zan zos shing mchod sdong lta bas rang gi las bsgrub par mi byed do//de nas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams
104a6('dul ba): bar chad byas pas rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'thu bar gyur to//blon po rnams kyis dpya nyung ngu phul ba dang /rgyal po sgra chen gyis smras pa/shes ldan dag ci'i phyir dpya nyung zad
104a7('dul ba): cig dbul/lho 'dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs mchis nas 'chis ma 'tshal cing mchod sdong la lta zhing mchis te/rang gi las grub par ma bgyid pas/zhing las/
104b1('dul ba): kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis/dang thung bzhin mi 'dulag go//rgyal pos smras pa/mchod sbyin gyi khang pa drol cig/de rnams kyis de dral na yang de bzhin du skye bo'i chags
104b2('dul ba): de rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas za zhing mchod stong la rtogs cing 'dug ste/rang gi sdes sgrub par mi byed pas/zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar cang byas pas de bzhin rgyal po'i
104b3('dul ba): dpya zad bzhin mi 'dre bar gyur to//rgyal pos dris pa/shes ldan drag mchod sbyin gyi khang pa dral na ci phyir da dung drag nyung bar gyur/blon po rnams kyi smras pa/lha skye bo'i
104b4('dul ba): tshogs kyis rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas 'tshal zhing mchod stong la rtog cing mchis te/rang gi las sgrub par mi bgyed pas/zhing las kyi mtha' rnams bar chad bgyid pas
104b5('dul ba): des na dpya nyung bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dag byas ni pa mchod sdong de chu bo gang ga'i nang du bor ro//dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems
104b6('dul ba): rgyal po rob sgrogs kyi zhing po mya ngan med ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni/dge slong legs ldan 'di nyid yin te 'dis sngon 'di bsten to//btsun pa mchod spong 'di gang du zhig par
104b7('dul ba): 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag me 'ongs pa na mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur te/mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi rgyal po dung
105a1('dul ba): zhes bya ba yang dag par sdom pa 'khor lo sgyur bu mtha' bzhir rnam gyur rgyul ba/chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po rgyu sna su su zhig 'byung bar
105a2('dul ba): 'gyur ro//de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dge 'byung bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /
105a3('dul ba): bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun pa ni blon po rin po che nyid do//de lta bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa yan lag chog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol
105a4('dul ba): gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang par 'byung bar 'gyur te/de rgya mchi la thug pa'i sde chen po ma lus par gnod par bsngo ba myed cing 'tshe ba myed cing 'drab sde pa'i
105a5('dul ba): chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa med la chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro//rgyal po dung gi mdun na 'don bram ze chings
105a6('dul ba): pa'i tshe zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/de'i chung ma ni tshangs ldanA mu zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ngo //de byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas pas/bu byams
105a7('dul ba): pa zhes bya bo zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro//bram ze tshangs po'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go//des bram ze'i khye'o
105b1('dul ba): rnams mas pasgyu k+Sha nas/zlum+ba kA n+d+ra m+bu ma d+heSh+T+rISh+T+rI dU d+hA du la/pU ts+tshe nas du rgyug klog tu 'jug s+ho/de nas rgyal po rgyun po b+h+rUM rnams
105b2('dul ba): gyis gtor chen po bzhig/ka ling ka nus da ma si //mi thi la na po smra ro//sa 'dzin nas ni e lce'i 'ag/b+hUM ni so'i spyong na du //mchud sdong 'di yang
105b3('dul ba): khyer nas rgyal po dung la dngul bar 'gyur ro//rgyal po dung gis kyang bram ze rmongs pa'i tshe la sbyin par 'gyur ro//bram ze chings pa'i chos kyang bram ze'i bye ru byams pa lAl+lo/
105b4('dul ba): blom ze'i khye'u byams pas kyang bram ze'i khri'u de rnams la'o//de nas zlum ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis mchod stong de dum brur bcad nas 'ged par 'gyur ro//du nas bram ze'i
105b5('dul ba): khye'u byam sa pas mchod snong de'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas de nyid kyis m+b+ha ba skyes nas nis suM 'gro bar 'gyur ro//gling gi nyi ma kha na la nag su song ba kho na'i nyi ma la byams
105b6('dul ba): potshod med pa'i yan lags d+d+has pAr byas nas/blan med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ mtshan blan med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa/
105b7('dul ba): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//gang gi nyi ma khon la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas/blo na med pa'o
106a1('dul ba): ye shes mthob par 'gyur ba de kho na'i nyi ma la rgyal po dung gi rin pa che sna bdun nub par 'gyuraro//rgyal po dung yang khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri'i 'dur
106a2('dul ba): dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung ba'i dz+haiM su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur//de'i chung ma rin po che sa ga zhes bya ba yang bud med brgyad khri'i 'khor
106a3('dul ba): dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung ba'i rje su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyuraro//bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe maung bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri'i 'khor
106a4('dul ba): dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung ba'i rjesu rab tu 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa 'khor
106a5('dul ba): dge slong 'bum phrag dgu brgya rtsa drug dang /ri byu gago rkang gang na ba der gshegs par 'gyuraro//de nas dge slong 'od srung gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa 'dug pas/rI d+ya
106a6('dul ba): gag rkeng bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la kha skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang sa rgyas byams ngas/dag
106a7('dul ba): 'od srung gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa phyag g.yas pas blangs nas/phyag g.yon par bzhag ste/nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dpo skye dgu rnams kyi tshe la brgya
106b1('dul ba): thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba de'i nyan thos rnams las chog shes pa dang /'dod pa chung ba dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mchog ni 'od srung yin no zhes
106b2('dul ba): bstan pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin te/shAkya thub pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das nus/de'i bstan pa yang 'dis yang dag par bsdu so zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro//de rnams kyis
106b3('dul ba): mthong nas skyo ba skyes te/'di 'dra ba'i lus kyis ji ltar 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs thob par gyur snyam nas/de rnams skyo ba skyes pa de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed
106b4('dul ba): par 'gyur to/'bum phyag dgu cu rtsa drug dgra bcom pa nyid dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan mngon du bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro//mchod stod de ni der zhig par 'gyuraro//btsun pa
106b5('dul ba): rgya gang dang rkyen gang gis dkon mchog gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/smon lam gyi dbang giso//bcom ldan
106b6('dul ba): 'dab bang du smon lam btab lags/dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul dbus su rgyal po gos sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang
106b7('dul ba): skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go//de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang /lhas ngas dus su char kyi rgyan legs par bab pas la
107a1('dul ba): par lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur to//byang phyogs na rgyal po nor ldan zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang //dade ba dang /lo lag
107a2('dul ba): pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos rab tu gang na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/de'i shing rnams me tog dang /'bras bu rtag pa dang /lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par
107a3('dul ba): phab pas lhog par lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur to//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nu/rgyal po gos sbyin gyi mdun na 'don las khye'u spyi gtsug rin po ches brgyan
107a4('dul ba): pa zhig btsas te/de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/de'i ming rin chen gtsug tor can zhes btag so//de dus gzhan zhig na/rga bo dang /na ba dang /'chi ba yang
107a5('dul ba): dag par mthong nas skyo ba skyes te/nags su song ngo //gang gi nyi ma kho na zhagasu song ba de kho na'i nyi mo la/des bla na med pa'i ye shes thob nas de'i ming yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
107a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas rin chen gro tsug gtor can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug gtor can zhes bya bar gyur to//de nas gzhan zhig na rgyal po nor ldan snying gri
107a7('dul ba): khang bzangs kyi gzhar song ste/blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug go/des blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag nga'i ci 'dra ba de ltar rgyal po gzhan 'ga'i yul
107b1('dul ba): na 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang /mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dang /shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang /lhas dus dus su char gyi
107b2('dul ba): rgyun legs par phab pas lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba lta yod dam/yul dbus nas tshong pa zong thogs traM/byang phyogs su 'ongs pa de rnams kyis smras pa/lha
107b3('dul ba): yul dbus na rgyal po gos sbyin zhes bgyi ba tsa zhig mchiso//rgyal po nor ldan gyis thos ma thag tu mi bzod pa chen po skyes te/de ma bzod pa skyes nas blon po rnams la smras
107b4('dul ba): ba/shes ldan dag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon cig dang yul 'khor gzhom par bya'o//de nas rgyal po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/glang po che'i
107b5('dul ba): tshogs dang /rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/yul dbus su dong nas chu bo glang ga'i lho phyogs 'gram du 'khod do//rgyal
107b6('dul ba): po gos sbyin gyis/rgyal po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs
107b7('dul ba): go bskon nas/yul dbu su 'o sa te/chu bo gang ga'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram nA 'khod do zhes zos so//thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshog
108a1('dul ba): dang /rtswa ba'i tshogs dang /shi rtsa ba'i chags dang /dpung bru rlung gi tshogs po ban nas/chu bo gang gA'i byang phyogs kyi 'gram n+ta
108a2('dul ba): 'dug go/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis de gnyis kyi 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas chu bo glang gA'i 'gram du nub mo nye bar rten cing
108a3('dul ba): bzhugaso//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom
108a4('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyen pa de'i tshe/brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi sems kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
108a5('dul ba): pa shes par 'gyu ro//de nas blargya byin dang tshangs pa la srogs pa lha rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nAs yang
108a6('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin tshon gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/de rnams kyi khri dog gi mthus snang
108a7('dul ba): ba rgya chen po byung bar gyur pa/rgyal po nor ldan gyis mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la dris pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul na/snang ba
108b1('dul ba): tshon po byub 'di ci'i yin/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tworA rdzun b+h+yang ste/de la blta ba'i phyir/
108b2('dul ba): brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa mchis pa des na snang ba chen po 'di 'byung ste/de'i rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba lags pas/'di ni de'i mthu lagasaso//rgyal po
108b3('dul ba): nor ldan gyis smras pa/shes ldan drug gang gi yul du ging la brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba'i rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing de lta bu byung
108b4('dul ba): ba de la bdag gis gnod pa ci 'dre ba zhig bya zhes/des de la pho nya btang ste/grogs po khyod la bdag chung zad kyang mi byed kyis tshur sbyin/khyod ni bsod nams kyi mthu
108b5('dul ba): chen po can zhig pas khyod kyi yul na gang la brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
108b6('dul ba): rgyas rin chen+da gtsug tor can bzhug so//'on kyang khyod kyi mgul nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/de lta na bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur ro//zhes spring ngo //
108b7('dul ba): skyil po gos sbyin yid mches nas de yang dag par rdzog so pa'i sangs rgyas rin cheni gtsug tor can gang na pa der song ste/byin nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
109a1('dul ba): chen gtsug tor can gyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal po gos sbyin
109a2('dul ba): gyis/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdog la rgyal po ner ldan gyis spring pa/grogs po
109a3('dul ba): sdug pa khyod la bdag cag ci yang mi byed kyi tshur sheg/khyod kyi mgul pa nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/de lta na bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur zhes mchi
109a4('dul ba): ba ni/de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin tshon gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal ba/rgyal po chen po song shig
109a5('dul ba): dang /khyod la legs par 'gyuraro//bcom lan 'das ci bdag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi 'am/rgyal po chen po rgyal po dpung chen po rnams la
109a6('dul ba): ni gtug por bya dgro so//de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
109a7('dul ba): phyag byas nas chos te/rgyal po nor ldan gangan ba der song ste phyin mya rgyal po nor ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la gdugaso/den rgyal po nor ldan gyi mgul pa nas 'khyud de yid gcugs par byas te btang ngo //
109b1('dul ba): de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba dor song ste phyin nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug ter
109b2('dul ba): can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nos/rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
109b3('dul ba): rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/btsun pa rgyal po thams cad kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa'i rgyal po gang lags/rgyal po chen po 'khor lo
109b4('dul ba): sbyar ba yin no//de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba
109b5('dul ba): de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
109b6('dul ba): dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdug tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mjed du gsol/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis
109b7('dul ba): rgyal po gos sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas
110a1('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi sman snga nus dang ngo //de nas rgyal bu gos sbyin gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gzung
110a2('dul ba): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag sta gon byas te/nang par sngar lang nas gdan bshams te/nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
110a3('dul ba): chen gtsug tor can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/btsun pa gdugs chod bshams lags shing mchis na/bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par dgongasu
110a4('dul ba): gsol/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can snga dro sham thabs ba nabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis
110a5('dul ba): yongasu bskor cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas nas rgyal po gas sbyin gyi bkadra sa ga na ba der gshegs te/byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la
110a6('dul ba): gdan pa shams pa nyid la bzhug so//de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor con la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde
110a7('dul ba): bar bzhugs par rig nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'
110b1('dul ba): ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bsgrubs shing tshim par byaso//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas/phyag gnyis bcabs te
110b2('dul ba): lhung bzed gyur par rig nas zhabs gnyis la btugs te/smon lam btab par brtsams pa/btsun pa sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
110b3('dul ba): gyur cig ces smras nas/de ma thag tu drung yang buso//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po gos sbyin la 'di skad ces bka'
110b4('dul ba): stsal to/rgyal po chen po khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//de nas skad chen po'i sgra dag byung ngo //rgyal po nor ldan
110b5('dul ba): gyis ca co'i sgra dag thos nas/blon po rnams la rmas pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po gros sbyin gyis yul na ca co'i sgra grag pa de tsa zhig yin/de rnams kyis legs par brtags
110b6('dul ba): nas smras pa/lha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po gos sbyin 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs dga' ba
110b7('dul ba): dang mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' bas/des na ca co'i sgra grags pa lag so//de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can
111a1('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis zhabs gnyi la mgo bos phyag byas te
111a2('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal po nor ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol
111a3('dul ba): to//btsun pa 'khor lo sgyur ba thams cad kyis dang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi ba gang legs/rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
111a4('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin//de nas rgyal po nor ldan stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
111a5('dul ba): rgyas rin chen gtsug tror can gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
111a6('dul ba): gcig sang bdag gi sum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis
111a7('dul ba): rgyal po nor ldan la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas
111b1('dul ba): glanang bar rig nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgro bos phyag byas te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
111b2('dul ba): rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dge sta gon byas nas rnam
111b3('dul ba): par sngar langs te bdan bshamos shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhug nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol
111b4('dul ba): pa/btsun pa gdug chod bshams lags shing mchis na/bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
111b5('dul ba): sngangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can snga dro sham thabs banabs lhung bzed dang /chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing /dge slong
111b6('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas te/rgyal po nor ldan gyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshebras te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi bung la gdan bshams pa nyid la
111b7('dul ba): bzhugaso/de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin tshe ni gtsug tor can la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs
112a1('dul ba): par rig nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gis lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/rnam pa du mar gtsang
112a2('dul ba): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin tshon gtsug tor can gyis gsol
112a3('dul ba): nas phyag bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas
112a4('dul ba): nas/smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi ston pa/de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
112a5('dul ba): su gyur cig ces btab bo//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyed skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa
112a6('dul ba): nun de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//dge slong dag de lta na smon lam gyi dbade gis dkon mchog gnyis
112a7('dul ba): cig car 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan po kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo grong spyil bu can zhes bya ba gang
112b1('dul ba): na bar dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed ces bya ba nas
112b2('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /grong spyil bu can du byon te/grong spyil bu can gyis grong gi byad phyog kyi shing shra ba'i tshal na bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams lnga
112b3('dul ba): bkra' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di dag ni tshul khrims yin no//'di ni ting 'dzin yino//'di ni shes rab yin no//dge slong dag tshul khrims goms par byas na/ting
112b4('dul ba): 'dzin yun ring du gnas par 'gyuraro//ting 'dzin goms par byas na/shes rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro//shes rab goms par byas na 'di lto ste/'dod
112b5('dul ba): chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug dag las sems yang dag par kho nar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa'i
112b6('dul ba): nyan thos kyis ni bdag gi zag pa ni zad do//tshangs par spyod pa ni bstan to//bya ba ni byas so//'di las srid pa gzhan mi sheso zhes yang dag pa kho nar shes par 'gyur/
112b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//de nas bcom ldan
113a1('dul ba): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo sgra can gang na ba drer dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshalo zhes tshe dang
113a2('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhur mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gsheg pa dang sgra can du byon nas/sgra can gyi drang
113a3('dul ba): srong sgra sgrogs kyi gnas na bzhugaso//de'i tshe sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi nges byung nas/de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang /brtson
113a4('dul ba): pa'i khyu mchog dang /mdzes pa dang /nye mdzes dang /yid 'ong dang /nye bar yid 'ong dang /bzang po dang /shin tu bzang dang /grags pa dang /
113a5('dul ba): grags byin dang /dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o//de nas dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgros lhung bzed dang /chos gos thogs te/sgra can
113a6('dul ba): du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so//dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bas sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung ste/de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan
113a7('dul ba): pa yang shi nye ba dang lhog par brtson dang /brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang /mdzes po dang /nye mdzes dang /yid 'ong dang nye bar yid 'ong dang /bzang po dang /shin/
113b1('dul ba): tu bzang dang /grags pa dang /glags sbyin dang /dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o zhes thos so//thos nas kyang sgra can du bsod snyoms la brgyus te/zas kyi
113b2('dul ba): bya ba byas nas/zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing lhung bzed dang /chos gos mkho su phab nas rkang gnyis bkrus te/bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der dong nas
113b3('dul ba): lhogs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/dge slong rab tu mang pos
113b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang pos 'dir snga dro shram thabs 'tshal/lhung bzed dang chos gos
113b5('dul ba): thogs nas sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/sgra can 'dir skye bo'i tshogs
113b6('dul ba): la mi ngas byung nas/de'i tshe dge bsnyen bstan pa yang gum nye dang lhag par brtson dang /brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang /mdzes pa dang /nye mdzes dang /yid 'ong dang
113b7('dul ba): nye bar yid 'ong dang /bzang po dang /shin tu bzang ba dang /grags pa dang /grags sbyin dang /dge bsnyen dgrags mchog kyang gum mo zhes thos lags na/
114a1('dul ba): btsun pa de rnams kyi 'gro ba ni gang skye ba ni gang mngon du 'gro ba ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge bsnyen bstan pa ni tha
114a2('dul ba): ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas rdzus te skye te/de yongasu mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar
114a3('dul ba): 'gyur ro//nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang /brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang /mdzes pa dang /nye mdzes dang /yid 'ong dang /nye bar yid 'ong dang /bzang po dang shin tu bzangs
114a4('dul ba): dang /grags pa dang /grags sbyin dang /dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas brdzus te skyes te der yongs mya ngan las
114a5('dul ba): 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro//dge slong dag sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen nyis brgya lnga bcu lhag cig shi ba de dag kyang
114a6('dul ba): tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas brdzus te skyes te/der yongasu mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong
114a7('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro//dge slong dag sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen sum brgya shi ba de dag ni kun tu sbyor ba sum yang spangs la/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug dag kyang
114b1('dul ba): bsrabs pa'i phyir lhan cig phyir 'ong ba yin te/'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag grong khyer sgra can 'di nyid dge
114b2('dul ba): bsnyen lnga brgya lhag cig shi ba de dag ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgyun tu zhugs pa/rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gzhol ba re ltar thogs
114b3('dul ba): nAn srid pa bdun pa yin te lha dang /mi rnams kyi ning du lan bdun du nyid mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas/sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag khyed dus las 'das shing
114b4('dul ba): shi bar gyur pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa la mtho 'tsham pa yin te/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar mi 'gyur ro//'on
114b5('dul ba): kyang skye ba yod na 'chi ba'i dus byed pa yin na ngo mtshar ci zhig yod/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /ma byung yang rung /chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /chos gnas
114b6('dul ba): pa nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa ste/de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi mngon par mkhyen pas/mngon par byang chub nas gsungs te/'dogs par mdzad/
114b7('dul ba): rab tu 'jog par mdzad/rnam par 'byed par mdzad/rnam par 'grel bar mdzad/gsal bar mdzad/'chang por mdzad/yang dag par rab tu 'chad par mdzad pa
115a1('dul ba): na to/'dim+b+ha/med pas da /'di sgyus pa m+b+ha bar g+hu /d+hIm+b+ha /mngag pa na sa d+hA r+m+ma nus/su
115a2('dul ba): rgyun gyis rnam byung shes pa/rnam nga shes pa'i rten gyis rnying dang gzugs/sgyid dung gzugs kyi rgyun gyis sbyi ma rnyed //spyi marnyed drug gi rkyen gyis dregasas
115a3('dul ba): ga byin gyis sred pa med pa'i rkyen gyi sa len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis sring pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ga/skye ba'i rkyen gyis/rga shI /m+b+ha dAn dang skye sngags
115a4('dul ba): pa dang /sdug rdzu pa dang /nga mi h+ye dang /'jug pa rnams ra ra /m+b+ha b+h+rUM bcwo rlung po chen po 'ang 'jig pa
115a5('dul ba): gyu/daMts+tsham+b+ha/'di med na/'di mi 'byung la/'di gagasun 'di gag par b+hU te/ma ma pa 'gasas sa byed g+sa/
115a6('dul ba): rnam gas pa /rnam pa mel pa ga sa/ming dang gzums g+sa/nga dang gtsugs gas pas/skyemached /'am/
115a7('dul ba): chid drug 'gadas pas/rag pa gagi//reg pa gags pas/tshor ba 'gag/tshor ba 'gags pas/srid pa 'gag/sred pa'i gags thos/len pa na
115b1('dul ba): ljon pa 'gags pas/srid pa 'gag/srid pa 'gags pas/skye ba 'gag/skye ba 'gags pas/rga shrI dang /mya ngan dang /smre stegs 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /
115b2('dul ba): yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/de lta na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag 'on kyang khyed la chos
115b3('dul ba): kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyis/de legs par rab tu nyan la yid la zung shig dang bshad do//chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/sangs rgyas
115b4('dul ba): dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa ni chos kyi me long gi chos kyis rnam grangs yin no//'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi me longagi chos kyi
115b5('dul ba): rnam grangs yin te/ngas khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyis rnam grangs bshad do//zhes gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni de yin no//A mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das
115b6('dul ba): spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gau shegs pa ngan sgra can du byon nas sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrogs kyi granas na bzhugaso zhes thos so//thos nas kyang A mra skyong ma de lnga/ne tsa
115b7('dul ba): bzhin rgyas shes bya ba mi skad shes bzhin yod de/ne tse bzhin bya la 'di skad ces smras so//bzhin rgyas tshur shog khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin nas/
116a1('dul ba): /kho ma 'tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag b+h+yos la/gnod pa chung ngam/nyam du ba nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/
116a2('dul ba): 'tsho'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/stobs dang /bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes skyon gsol la 'dri skad ces Amra skyong ma'i mchis nas/btsun+do pa bcom ldan
116a3('dul ba): 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe/thugs brtse bar dgongs te/thog mer bdag gi Amra'i tshal du gshegs par gsol zhes kyang gsol cig/de nas na
116a4('dul ba): cotso bzhin rgyas kyis Am+b+ha skyong ma'i ltar mnyan nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi'i khye'u dag gis mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa/shes
116a5('dul ba): ldan dag ni co 'gro ba 'di ni smad 'tshong mi'i yin no zhes de dag gis de lnga mda' 'phangs par brtsams pa na/de yang de dag gi steng du babs so//de nas na tsa des tshigasu bcad
116a6('dul ba): de skyes pa/yul 'khor gzhan yang 'gyed par yang //pho nya mi bsod ces brag na/bdag lta rgyal ba'i pho nya bas/lus can kun gyi ga la sod//de rnams kyis
116a7('dul ba): kyang tshig su bcad de smras pa/khyod kyi tshig gis mnga' 'phangs pa'ang //ldog na bdag cag smos ci dgos/khyod ni rdzu 'phrul ches skyengs pas//'jigs pa med
116b1('dul ba): par 'gro bar gyis//de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba drer song ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das
116b2('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la I mr-i sbyang ma mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/gnod pa chung ngam/nyi ma do pa nyung ngam/bskyed pa
116b3('dul ba): yang ngam/'tsho 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/stobs dang /bde ba la reg par gnas zhes snyun gsol leg so//zhin brgyam byed dbasnam sgyong ma bde ba gyur ci gdun pa sam sbyod mAH
116b4('dul ba): srabacom ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/thog mar bdag gi Amra'i tshal du ga sheg su gsol//zhes de skad mchi lags so//
116b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ne co bzhin rgyas la cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo //de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom
116b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhangs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de bcom ldan 'das la dang ba bskyed nas song ba las ring po ma lon pan
116b7('dul ba): 'ol bas srog dang bral te/dus byas nas/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams skyeso//chos nyid kyis skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i lha'i bu 'am/lha'i bu mo ni
117a1('dul ba): sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /gang du skyes pa dang /las gang gis yin pa'o//des ltas na/dud 'dra/
117a2('dul ba): las shi 'phos pa dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pas so//de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam
117a3('dul ba): du sems te/bdag zhag lon nas/bcom ldan 'dus la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag rigs pa ma yin gyis/ci nas kyang bdag zhag ma lon pa khro nar bcom
117a4('dul ba): ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam nas/de nas sden ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub khor dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs shing /se mo do dang /do shal gyis lus
117a5('dul ba): brgyan nas de nyid kyi nub mo lha rnams kyi me tog ut+pa le dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man da ra ba'i me tog gis thu bA bkang nas/shin
117a6('dul ba): tu 'phags shing mngon par 'phyags pa'i kha dog gis de'i nub mo bI com ldan 'das gang na der sing ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/bcom
117a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de'i tshe sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen pos sgra sgrogs kyi 'dug ginas thams cad gsal bar gyur to//
117b1('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi//bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon na tso byung ba'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang //
117b2('dul ba): rang bzhin mkhyen nas/de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de thos pas ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bus 'jig
117b3('dul ba): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du
117b4('dul ba): brjod pa ched du brjod pa/btsun pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la mas ma bgyis te/phas ma lags/sdug pas ma lags/rang gi skye bo dang /gnyen gyi tshogs kyis
117b5('dul ba): ma legs/rgyal pos mA lags/lha rnams kyis ma lags/snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags
117b6('dul ba): pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs lha dang mi rnams la ni rab tu bzhag/'khor
117b7('dul ba): ba las ni ring du mdzad/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/rus pa'i ri ba~M las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo rnam ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo
118a1('dul ba): rnams ni bya/thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs/
118a2('dul ba): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis lags te/btsun pa bdag ni 'phag so//mngon par 'phag so//bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu
118a3('dul ba): mchilags kyis/bdag dge bsnyen du gzungs du gsol/deng slan chad ji srid mtsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/skyebasu mchi bar mngon par dad lag so//de nas sngon ne
118a4('dul ba): tso byed pa'i lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rje su yi rang nas/tshod pa zong rnyed pa lta bu dang /zhing pa lo legs pa lta bu dang /dga' bo
118a5('dul ba): g.yul dor rgyal ba lta bu dang /nad pa nad thams cad las yosu thar pa bzhin du/'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi
118a6('dul ba): gnasu song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/kun dga' bo yangs pa can glang na po der dong ngo //btsun pa dka' bzhin 'tshal
118a7('dul ba): zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/yangs pa can du byon nas/
118b1('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi a mra'i tshal na bzhug so//a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas/yangs pa can gyis bdag gi a
118b2('dul ba): mra'i tshal kho na na bzhug so zhes thos//thos nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/bud med kyi 'khor gyis yongasu bskor te/bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas yangs pa can nas byung
118b3('dul ba): ste/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song te/des ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/gzhon
118b4('dul ba): pa las babs te/rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugaso//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gud la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa na/bcom ldan
118b5('dul ba): 'das kyis a mra skyong ma rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/a mra skyong ma pha bi 'od gis/brtson 'grus dang shes bzhin
118b6('dul ba): dang /dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig/ngas rje su bstand ni 'di yin no//ji ltar na dge slong brtson 'grus la gnas pa yin zhe na/'di la dge slong gis sdig
118b7('dul ba): pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do//'bad do//brtson 'grus rtso mo//sems rab tu 'dzin to//rab tu 'jog go//sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma
119a1('dul ba): skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do//'bad do//brtson 'grus brtsom mo//sems rab tu 'dzin to//rab tu 'jog go//dag pa'i chos
119a2('dul ba): ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do//'bad do//brtson 'grus tso mo//sems rab tu 'dzin to//rab tu 'jog go/dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams
119a3('dul ba): gnos pa dang /nyams par mi 'gyur po dang /goms par yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang /phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba dang /ye shes rgya chen po mngon sum du bya ba'i
119a4('dul ba): phyir 'dun pa skyed do//'bad do//brtson 'grus rtso mo//sems rab tu 'dzin cing /rab tu 'jog pa ste de ltar na dge slong brtson 'grus zho yino//de lta na dge slong shre bzhin can yin zhe na/'di la
119a5('dul ba): dge slong gis 'gro ba dang ldog pa la shes bzhin gyis gnas shing lta ba dang /rnam par lta ba dang /bskum pa dang /brkyang pa dang /snem sbyar dang /chos gos dang /
119a6('dul ba): lhung bzed thogs pa dang /'gro ba dang /'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal ba dang /gnyid ma log pa dang /smra ba dang /mi smra ba dang /gnyid kyis snyom pas
119a7('dul ba): dub pa rnams la shes bzhin gyis gnas pa ste/de ltar na dge slong shes bzhin can yin no//ji ltar na dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhe na/'di la dge slong nang gi
119b1('dul ba): lus la lus kyis rje su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang /shes bzhin dang /dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang /yid mi bde ba spangs nasu gnas so//phyi'i lus
119b2('dul ba): dang nang dang phyi'i lus dang /nang gi tshor ba rnams dang /phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang /nang dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang /nang gi sems dang /phyi'i sems dang /nong dang
119b3('dul ba): phyi'i sems dang /nang gi chos rnams dang /phyi'i chos rnams dang /nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang /shes bzhin dang /dran pa dang
119b4('dul ba): ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/de ltar na dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa yin//dge slong ngas a mra skyong ma pha bi 'od gis brtson
119b5('dul ba): 'grus dang /shes bzhin dang dran pa dang ldan pas gnas pas gyis shig ngas rjesu bstan pa ni 'di yin no zhes nges gsungs pa bshad pa ni do yino//de nas a mra
119b6('dul ba): skyong ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu
119b7('dul ba): 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzodayang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug por mdzad/yang
120a1('dul ba): par gzeng stod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag
120a2('dul ba): par 'dzin tu bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cing ma gsung //de nas a mra skyong ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
120a3('dul ba): gcig tu gzar nas/com ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
120a4('dul ba): 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mo chis na gnad pa mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang //
120a5('dul ba): de nas a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
120a6('dul ba): sbyar nas song ngo //yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /yangs pa tson du byon te/yang se ba can gyi oM mra
120a7('dul ba): skyong ma'i 'tshal na bzhugaso zhes thos so//thos nas kyang so so nA shing rta dang rta rnams la zhon te khe cig ni rta sngon po dang /shing rta sngon po dang /srab skyogs dang /
120b1('dul ba): lcag sngon po dang /thor tshugs dang /gdugs dang /ral gri shubs sngon po dang /rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /gos dang rgyan dang /byug pa sngon po dang /'khor sngon po//kha
120b2('dul ba): cig ni rta ser po dang /shing rta ser po dang /srab sgyogs dang /lcug ser po dang /thor tsugs dang /gdugs dang /ral gri shubs ser po dang /rdu yangab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /
120b3('dul ba): gos dang rgyan dang byug pa ser po dang /'khor ser po/kha cig ni rta dmar po dang /shing rta dmar po dang /srab skyogs dang /lcag dmar po dang /thor tshugs dang gdugs dang
120b4('dul ba): ral gri shubs dmar po dang /rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /gos dang rgyan dang /byug pa dmar po dang /'khor dmar po/khwa cig ni rta dkar po dang /shing rta dkar
120b5('dul ba): po dang /srang skyogs dang /lhag dkar po dang /thor tshugs dang gdugs dang /ral gri shubs dkar po dang /rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /gos dang rgyan dang /byug
120b6('dul ba): pa dkar po dang /'khor dkar por chas te/skad mthon pa dang /skad chen por slar khyed srang khyed ces zer zhing yangs pa can nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba
120b7('dul ba): dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sprin sngar dong ngo /bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzig so//gzigs
121a1('dul ba): nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dgu khyed cag las sus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bskyed mos tshal gyi gnasu 'gro ba
121a2('dul ba): ma mthong ba de yangs pa can gyi li tsA byi rnams la ltos shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi ya ba can gyi li tsa byi dag bzhin
121a3('dul ba): du/rdzu 'phrul 'di dang 'byor pa 'di dang cha lugs 'dis bskyed mos tshul gyi gnas su 'gro'o//ji tsam gzhon pa'i si'i bar du gzhon pas song nas/bzhon pa las babs
121a4('dul ba): te rkang pa kho nus kun dga' ra bar zhug so//de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
121a5('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la chos
121a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu
121a7('dul ba): dga' bar mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang
121b1('dul ba): dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsungs ngo //de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dug par gyur to//de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser
121b2('dul ba): skya'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phyag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na bi de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
121b3('dul ba): to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni spobs lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de nas bram ze'i khye'u
121b4('dul ba): ser skya'i bu de'i tshe tshigasu bcud de bsnol pa/ang ga'i rgyal po nor bu'i go 'tshang ba//mu ga d+ha yi rgyal pos rnyed pa rab rnyed de//de'i yul du byung ba'i sangs rgyas ni/
121b5('dul ba): grags pa'i sgra drag grangs kyi ri bo bzhin//ji ltar pad+ma bzang po legs 'khrungs pa/dgongs ka kha byedri zhim ldan pa bzhin//bar snang la ni nyi ma lhag ge bor//
121b6('dul ba): snang ba lta bu de nyi ma'i rgyud la ltos//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab stobs//ji ltar mtshan mo me 'bar lta bu ltos//de ni mig byed snang bar byed
121b7('dul ba): pi ste/lhags pa rnams kyi the tsom rnam par 'dul//li tsa byi lnga brgyas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so//bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs
122a1('dul ba): par smras so zhes bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir byin no//de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byin rnams stan las langs te/bla gros
122a2('dul ba): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyor ba btud do/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge
122a3('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum pa gdugs tshod sbyor zhing michis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol//gnas 'jog dag nga sngar A mra skyong mas
122a4('dul ba): spyan drangs//btsun pa am+ba skyong mu dman pa shes rab dman pa des bdag cag bslus lags te/des ni bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das thog ma nyid du blta ba
122a5('dul ba): drong /bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi ba'i rngo ma thog mod kyi da dung yang bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das
122a6('dul ba): kyis de dag la gnas 'jog de ni legs par smra sngo zhes bka' stsal to//dri nas yangs pa can gyi li tsai byi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste
122a7('dul ba): rjesu yi rang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas deng ngo //bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu ni de nyid du 'du'o//
122b1('dul ba): de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus yangs pa can gyi lcen b+hi rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par+ya shes nas stan lngas langs nas bla glos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das
122b2('dul ba): glang na ba der ldog su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa 'dir bdag la l-i tsuM byi lnga brgyas bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i
122b3('dul ba): phyir stsal ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brje be nye bar bzung ste bzhisu gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u sor skya'i bu la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/
122b4('dul ba): blo gos lnga brgya bzhes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ster spyi'i bu la bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po
122b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/ser skya'i bu 'di la ston pa de bzhin gshegs
122b6('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul po'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi
122b7('dul ba): rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bac+doMs 'jig rten du 'byung zhing de chos thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po//tshig 'bru bzang po me 'dres pa/yongasu
123a1('dul ba): rdzogs pa yongasu dag pa/yongs byang ba tshangs par spyod pa/ston par 'gyur te/ser skya'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
123a2('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang po yin no//gang dag chos de zhes dang bcas pas nyan cing bya/
123a3('dul ba): mar byed dam par byed/yid la byed cing sems rtse gcig tu rna blags nas sems thams cad bsdus nas nyan par byed pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
123a4('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gnyis pa yin no//chos de gang dag gis thos nas de lta de ltar sgrub par
123a5('dul ba): byed pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gsum
123a6('dul ba): pa yin no/chos de gang dag gis thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba rgya chen po 'thob pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dag
123a7('dul ba): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba bzhi pa yino//chos de gang gis thos nas don zab mo'i
123b1('dul ba): gzhing las gad kyis so sor rtogs par byed pa 'dri ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos//
123b2('dul ba): 'jig rten du 'byung bsnga ba yin no//ser skya'i bu skyes bu dam pa dag ni byas pa gzo ba dang /byas pa tshor ba can yin no//de dag cung zad tsa ma byas na yang chud gzon par mi byed na
123b3('dul ba): mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos/de lta bas na ser skya'i bu khyod kyis 'di ltar byas pa gzo ba dang /byas pa tshor ba can du bslab par bya ste/cung zad tsom byas na yang chud mi gzon na/
123b4('dul ba): mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te ser skya'i bu khyod kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o//de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/
123b5('dul ba): yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas a mra skyong mas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang
123b6('dul ba): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/nong par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te/nor bu'i chu snod dag bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis
123b7('dul ba): dus tshod gsol pa/btsun pa gdug chod bshams lags na/bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gso la/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thobs brdebs
124a1('dul ba): lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos dag bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas nas/a mra skyong
124a2('dul ba): ma'i bkad se gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//de nas a mra skyong mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dag
124a3('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing
124a4('dul ba): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag rang gis lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur par
124a5('dul ba): rig nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'du 'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong mas sbyin pa phul ba de la
124a6('dul ba): rje su yi rang pas rje su yi rang bar mdzad de/sbyin la dga' 'gyur skye bo sten byed na//snyan pa thob cing de yi dwags pa 'phel//ser sna med cing tshogs por 'gro ba dang /
124a7('dul ba): zhum par mi 'gyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro//de lta bas na mkhasau pa bde 'dod pas//ser sna'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa gtong //de dag yun ring sum cu rtsa gsum
124b1('dul ba): glanas//lha rnams dang ni skal ba mnyam par dga'/sbyin gtong dge byed de ni shi 'phos nas//rang gi 'od kyis dga' ba'i tshal na rgyu//de na de gnyis rtse zhing dga' byed pa//'did
124b2('dul ba): pi'i yon tan lnga po dag dang ldan//ma bcings skyob pa de'i gsung thos nas//bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos mtho ris dga'//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skye
124b3('dul ba): ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ston
124b4('dul ba): las langs te song ngo //dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis
124b5('dul ba): las ci zhig bgyis na/des na gal te lha rnamasu skyes na yang lha mthu che bar 'gyur la/gal te mi rnams skyes na yang mi mthu chen por gyur cing /da ltar sum cu rtsa
124b6('dul ba): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dper yang bstan lagaso/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong drog yang ba can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/rkyen
124b7('dul ba): yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing posogs
125a1('dul ba): pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing ltar bsags pa dag ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin
125a2('dul ba): par mi 'gyur//chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyis/'di ltar dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa
125a3('dul ba): dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//chud mi za ba 'ang tshogs dang dus//
125a4('dul ba): rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ston pa
125a5('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
125a6('dul ba): bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/de'i 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang grong khyer ba rau na si'i
125a7('dul ba): drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar bsten cing bzhugaso//de'i tshe bar na sa na dge snyen lnga brgya gnaso//de rnams kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zing ste gon byas te/
125b1('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rim gyis rgya tsho chen por zhugs pa dang /rjesu 'thun pa'i rlung gis rin po che'i gling du phyin to//de nas rin po che rnams kyis gru bo che yongs
125b2('dul ba): bkad nas chas pa dang /de nas rlung gis 'das nas rgya mtsho chen po'i gling zhig tu phyin to//de rnams bred cing re ba med par gyur nas//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
125b3('dul ba): gi phyir bye ma las mchod rten byas nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byaso//de nas gnyid log pa dang /lha zhig gris smras pa/khyed cag ma 'jigs par bag yod par
125b4('dul ba): byos shig dang /zhag bdun gyi nyin par dus rlabs 'ong bar 'gyur te/de nas khyed cag bde legs 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro//nam nangs nas de rnams phan tshun du smra
125b5('dul ba): zhing bros bya bar brtsams te/shes ldan dag bdag cag la lhas mi 'jigs pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mthus yin pas
125b6('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bdag cag gis rin po che phul ba dag slar blangs te 'dod pa ni mi rig so zhes de rnams kyis gdugs te/smon lam
125b7('dul ba): btab par brtsams pa/gang yang bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
126a1('dul ba): 'dis gal te bdag cag lha rnams skyes par gyur na bdag cag mthu che ba kho nar gyur cig/gal te mi'i nang du mi rnams skyes par gyur na/mthu
126a2('dul ba): che ba dang /mi rnamasu skyes na yang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lho rnams kyi dper rung bar gyur cig ces byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/dge sbyin lnga brgya po gang yin pa de
126a3('dul ba): dag ni li tsa byi lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir bye mo'i mchod rten byas shing rin po che dag gis mchod pa
126a4('dul ba): byas pas/des na mi mthu chen po rnams skyes par gyur te/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yang dper rung bar gyur to//dge slong dag de lta bas na/lus gcig
126a5('dul ba): tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin/'dren ma rnams kyi 'dren ma yin gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin no//dge slong dag
126a6('dul ba): de lta bas na/gang yang las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /'dron ma rnams ni spongs la/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtul bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed
126a7('dul ba): kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo yangs pa can gyi grong khyer du song la smra'i
126b1('dul ba): them pa la rkang pa zhog la gsung sngags kyis chog 'di dang /tshigasu bcad pa 'di smros shig/bi sa ra ta/bI sa ra t+na/bi sa ra ta/bi s+ya ra ta/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs/
126b2('dul ba): brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/slob
126b3('dul ba): pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/bden pa'i tshig smra ba thams cad kyis bsams pa/chos rnams kyis bsams pa/'dod pa'i
126b4('dul ba): dbang phyug gis bsams pa/tshangs pas bsams pa/tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/dbang po bsams pa/lhas bsams pa/lha ma yin gyis dbang pos bsams
126b5('dul ba): pa/lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/lha ma yin gyi mngag bzhug pas bsams pa/'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/bi sa ra ta/bI sa ra ta/bi sa ra ta/
126b6('dul ba): bi sa ra ta/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to//muny+tsa ta/nany+dza ta/yams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'dug par gyur cig/nir kats+tsha ta/
126b7('dul ba): nir gats+tsha ta/ni ra gats+tsha ta/ni ri gats+tsha ta/sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha lha'i bla ma bshags te/dbang po dang /bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs pa dang
127a1('dul ba): bcas pa rnams dang /dang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang /skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcus pa rnams dang /'jig rten skyong bya ban po dag
127a2('dul ba): kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro//lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang /lha mA yin dbang po rnams dang /lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro//bcom
127a3('dul ba): ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/de dag gis khyed rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur
127a4('dul ba): gyis/nir gats+tsha ta/nI rA gats+tsha ta/nir grats+tsha ta/nirA gats+tsha ta/myur du byer cig/khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni brlag par gyur
127a5('dul ba): cig/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar byed par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig/sangs rgyas
127a6('dul ba): 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//su mu sr-i mu/su mu su mu/su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/mu ru mu ru/mu ru
127a7('dul ba): mu ru/mu ru mu ru/mu ru mu ru/mu ru mu ru/mi ri mi ri/mi ri mi ri/mai r-i/mu ru mai rau/mu ru mi raM/mu ru mi rau/mu ru mi ri/mu ru mai ri/mu ru mi ri/
127b1('dul ba): s+ya ma nats+tsha/ /sgyu sgom ldan rlos su /na m+bu /rlu na te/ /rnam na sna na
127b2('dul ba): ho sau/mi re mo ri ti/mi rI mai rI/sI sl-i mi/kad ka ra/ka ka rat+na/ka ka rA tA/kang ka rA ta/ka kr-i ret+taM/kai tsU kang kA rA ka ka rA/kang kA rA/klang kaR+Sha/
127b3('dul ba): kanga? ka rA/kang ka rA/kAng ka R+Sha/keng ka rA/kang ka rA ti/ku rI shaM/kang ka rI ne/krang kaR+Shi she/ri ri ri ra ri/ri pA sA ri/ri pu ri pu/ri pu ri pu ri pu
127b4('dul ba): pu ri pu/nA thA nA thA thA/rI pu ri puM/nA thA thA nir gan+d+he ta/ri pu ri pu ni gats+tsha ta/pa la ya te/ri pu'i phul la sang sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can sems can thams
127b5('dul ba): cad la phan par lhag par dgo dris pa/byams pa lnga gnas pa/thugs rje dang dga' ba lI gnas pa/btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs te/lha thams cad
127b6('dul ba): dang /'byung po thams cad kyi bla ma sangs rgyas kyis chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi gsung sngags kyi tshig grub pa grub pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag sungaso//gang gi sred
127b7('dul ba): pa'i chags pa dang //rnam par bcom nas 'bral badzad pa//thugs ni gnod pa mi mnga' de//khyed la de legs mdzad par 'gyur//'dren pa gang zhig
128a1('dul ba): /'gro ba rnams//thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing //chos rnams thams cad ston pa de//khyed la bde lags mdzad par 'gyur//
128a2('dul ba): ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten//sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//skyob pa gang zhig/
