128a3('dul ba): byams pa yi//thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun//bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor
128a4('dul ba): bau yi//sems can kun gyi skyob gyur pa//gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de//khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig chos kun mngon sum 'gyur//
128a5('dul ba): gtsang zhing sgru ba mi mnga' //gsung gtsang gcing bar mdzad pa de/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas//phun sum
128a6('dul ba): tshogs don 'byor gyur cing //don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig skyes byas sa rnams dang //nags tshol bcas
128a7('dul ba): par rab g.yos nas//sems can thams cad rab dga'i de//khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//byang chub snyid por gang zhig gis//sa rnams
128b1('dul ba): rnam drug g.yos gyur cing //bdud yid mi bdur gyur pa de//khyod la byede logs mdzad par 'gyur//rjes kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na//'phags pa'i bden pa
128b2('dul ba): gsung pa gang //thub pa grags pa 'byung ba de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig chos kyi yid 'phrog pas//mu stegs byed rnams pham mdzad la/
128b3('dul ba): gas kun dang du mdzad pa do//khyed la bde legs mdzod par 'gyur//sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad//brgya byin lhar bcos bde legs dang //'byung
128b4('dul ba): po kun gyi bde legs na//khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig/sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang //lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yi//khyed rnams don 'dod
128b5('dul ba): gang yin pa//don de de ring grub gyur cig//rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/rkang bzhi khyed cig bde legs shog/khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs
128b6('dul ba): shog/phyir 'od drag kyang bdi legs shog/nyin mo bd-i legs mtshan bde legs//nyi mo'i gung la gnas par shog/khyed cag kun la bde legs
128b7('dul ba): shong //khyod cag sdig par ma gyur cig/sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis//yongasu bskor te gshegs mdzod kyis/sdang sems can rnams byer gyur cig/
129a1('dul ba): snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod//sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis//'jig rten mi ngan
129a2('dul ba): byed pa rnams//grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig/sems can kun dang srog chags kun//'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/dpa' bA shig ldan gyur cig/thaMd nad ni med gyur cig/kun gyi
129a3('dul ba): bzang po mthong gyur cig/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing //sa 'o ma 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams//skye dgu rnams la rnyog tu
129a4('dul ba): byams byed cing //nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ces brjod cig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhur
129a5('dul ba): mnyan nas/yangs pa can du song ste/grong khyer gyi them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas/gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang /tshig su bcas pa 'di dag smras so//bi sar
129a6('dul ba): te/ba sar ta/bi sa ra te/ba~M sar+ya te/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa//rang sangs
129a7('dul ba): thams cad kyis dgongs pa/dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/bden pa'i
129b1('dul ba): tshig smra ba thams cad kyis bsams pa/chos rnams kyis bsams pa/'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/tshangs pas bsdams pa/tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/
129b2('dul ba): dbang pos bsams pa/lhas bsams pa/lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/'byung
129b3('dul ba): po thams cad kyis bsams pa/bi sa ra ta/bi sa ra ta/bi sa ra t+na/bi sa ra ta/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal te/muny+tsa ta/muny+tsa ta/
129b4('dul ba): yams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'dug par gyur cig/nir gan+d+haM ta/nir gats+tsha ta/nir gats+tsha ta/nir gats+tsha ta/sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha lha'i bla ma gshegs te/dbang
129b5('dul ba): po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang /skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /'jig
129b6('dul ba): rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro//lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /lha mo yin brgya stong phrad du ma dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur
129b7('dul ba): ro//bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya snying mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/de dge gos khyed rnams la gnod pa
130a1('dul ba): byed par 'gyur gyiste/ni gar+b+hA ta/nir guts+tsha ta/ni gar+b+ha ta/nir gur+b+hat+ya/myur du byer cig/khyed cag las gang dag sdang
130a2('dul ba): ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni brlag par gyur cig/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/srung ba byed par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/
130a3('dul ba): dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//su~M mu/su mu/su mu/su mu
130a4('dul ba): su mu ru/su mU ru/sum+bA ru/mu ru mu ru/mu ru mU ru/mu ru mU rU/mu rU mU ru/mu ru m+bA ru/mi ri mau ri/mi ri ma ra/mi ri mU ru/mi rI mu ru/mi ri
130a5('dul ba): smAng+ku/miR+YAm+mAR+YA/mAM rom+bAR+Ya/mr-i m+b+ha ru/mU rI m+bA ru/m+b+hirI mr-i r+ra/m+b+hi r-I m+b+hir+ya/saud+l-i m+buR+Ya/mAM ri muR+YA/mI ri mu ru/m+b+hi ri mu ru/mi ri mu ru/
130a6('dul ba): spyi ti/r-i ri re re ra ra/rI rI rI rA r-I ti/mir mi ri/mir mi ri/mi ri mi ti/ha si mi ri mi ti/maur mo'i/sa so/kaM da ka ra/kr-i/
130a7('dul ba): /kA kA k+Sha kArA/ki r+b+he ki~M kArA/ka Sh+ma/ka kAR+Sha/kA kaNA~M/ka kaR+Sha/kaM kAR+sha/kAR+Sha/ka kAr+m+mar+m+ma///
130b1('dul ba): klang kA rI she kA kAR+ShI kai ri ri rI ri rI rI/re b+hU stA ri/ri pu ri pu ri pu/ri prA/ri pu/ri pu/ri pu/nU thA thA/ri pu ri bu/nU b+hU thA/nir gan+d+ha ta/ni gan+d+ha ta/nair gats+tsha tA/
130b2('dul ba): nir gats+tsha te/pa la ya thA/ri pu ri pu/pa la ya thA/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/sems can thams cad la phan por lhag par dgongs pa/byam
130b3('dul ba): pa la gnas pa/thugs rje dang dga' ba la gnas pa/btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs te/lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad kyi bla ma/sangs rgyas kyis
130b4('dul ba): chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig grub pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so//gang gi sred pa'i chags pa dag/rnam par bcom nas 'dul mdzad pa
130b5('dul ba): thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams//thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing //chos rnams thams
130b6('dul ba): cad ston pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten//sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//gang gis bde ba mang mdzad de/khyed la
130b7('dul ba): bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun//bu gcig bzhin du brtag bskyangs te/khyed la bde legs
131a1('dul ba): mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi//sems can kun gyi stob gyur pa/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de//khyed
131a2('dul ba): la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur//gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' ba//gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa skye//khyed la bde logs
131a3('dul ba): mdzad par 'gyur//dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas//phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing //don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//
131a4('dul ba): gang zhig skyes pras rnams dang /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos nas//sems can thams cad rab dga' de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//byang chub
131a5('dul ba): snying por gang dag gis//sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing //bdude yid mi bder gyur pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
131a6('dul ba): ni/'phags pa'i bden pa gsung pa gang /thub pa grags pa 'byung ba de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//gang gis chos kyi yid 'phrog pas//mu
131a7('dul ba): stegs byed rnams pham mdzad la/tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de //khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad//brgya
131b1('dul ba): byon lhur bcas bde legs dang //'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig/sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang /lha rnams kyis ni bas dang /
131b2('dul ba): po yis//khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa//don de de ring grub gyur cig/rkang gnyis khyod cag bde legs shog/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/khyed cag lam 'gro
131b3('dul ba): legs shog/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs//nyin ma'i gung la gnas par shog/khyed cag kun kyang bad+ma legs shog
131b4('dul ba): khyed cag sdig pa ro ma gyur cig/sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis/yongasu bskor te gshegs mdzad gyis//sdang sems can rnams byer gyur cig/snying
131b5('dul ba): rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod//sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /dgra bcom pa yi bden tshigs gri/'jig rten mi phan byed po rnams/grong khyer 'di
131b6('dul ba): ni gtong gyur cig/sems can kun dang srogro chags kun/'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun//bde ba 'bra' shig ldan gyur cig/thams cad nad ni mid b+hair
131b7('dul ba): cig/kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur cig/sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas
132a1('dul ba): /pa rnams/spyod ku rnams la rtag tu byams byed rjong //nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ces brjod pad+ma/der sangs rgyus
132a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus mi ngas zhi bar gyur to//sdom la 'od ma dang ni dbus kyi grong //mi thi lo dang
132a3('dul ba): lus 'phags dang /sA la khron po dran sbrang bu//ngur smig gtsug phud bsngags ldan dang //gnag lhas dang ni sdig can dang //ku sha'i grong khyer tha ma
132a4('dul ba): yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal/kun dga' bo 'od ma can gyis grong gang na bar 'dong ngo //btsun po bka'
132a5('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /
132a6('dul ba): 'od ma can gyi grong du byon nas/'od ma can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi grong shing sha pa'i 'tshal na bzhugaso//de'i tshe mr-i ge nyam de ba dgon pa spobs me pas zas
132a7('dul ba): rnyed par dka' bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'dir mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slongs mo
132b1('dul ba): byas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung gres/dge slong dag chur khyed las smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang /gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang /'grogs pa shes ji lta
132b2('dul ba): yod pa de dag ni yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor gyi spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam chos shig/nga yang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang /'od ma can gyi grong
132b3('dul ba): 'di nyid dbyar gnas par dam btsa snyan thams cad bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur grang /btsun pa dka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan
132b4('dul ba): 'das kyi lhar mnyan nas smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang /gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang /grogs bshes ji lta bu yod pa dag na/yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor
132b5('dul ba): spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam bcaso//bcom ldan 'das kyang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang /'od ma can gyi grong de nyid du dbyar bzhugs
132b6('dul ba): bA ra dam bcaso//dbyar gyi gnas der bcom ldan 'das snyun chabs chen po'i bzod pa drag po grongs la thug pa zhig gis thebs so//de nas bco mo ldan 'das
132b7('dul ba): 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdag nad tshabs chen po me bzad pa re drag po shi la thug pas thebs la/dge slong gis dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na/dge slong gi
133a1('dul ba): dge 'dun 'thor ba na/bdag yongasu mya ngan lus 'das pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ma la bdag gis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus
133a2('dul ba): kyis bcil la/mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyi ting 'dzin mtshan ma med pa lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs te/gnas par bya'o snyam du dgongaso//
133a3('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil nas/mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad pas/sems kyi ting 'dzin mtshan ma med pa
133a4('dul ba): skusmras mngon du mdzad de/bsgrubs nas bzhugs te/des na bcom ldan 'das lhag par spyod pa dang /lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
133a5('dul ba): bi dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs
133a6('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'dras snyun
133a7('dul ba): tshabs chen po mi zad po drag pa grongs la thug pas thebs pa glo bar chud nas/bdag gi lus dug 'tshal ba bzhin du phyogs kyang bslad bdag gis this pa'i chos rnam
134a1('dul ba): bod de bzhin gshegs pa la ni grang zhig gzhan dag gis shes na mi rung bas/de bzhin gshegs pas bcab po snyam du dgongs pa'i slob dpon
134a2('dul ba): gyi dpe mkhyud mi mnga'o//kun dga' bo 'on kyang gang gi tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa snyun tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag pos grongs la thug pas thabs de la 'di snyam
134a3('dul ba): du sems te/bdag nad tshabs chen po mi zad pa drag pa shi la thug pas thebs la/dge slong gi dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na/dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor pa na bdag
134a4('dul ba): yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil la/mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya
134a5('dul ba): bar sems kyi ting 'dzin mtshan ma med pa lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs nas gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ngas tshor ba cig pu de brtson 'grus kyis slar btsal nas//
134a6('dul ba): mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad par sems kyis/ting 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum du bsgrubs te bzhugs te/des na de bzhin gshegs pa lhag/
134a7('dul ba): bapar spyad pa dang ldan zhing lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to//gzhan yang kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pas/sku bgres 'khogs
134b1('dul ba): gdugs par gyur te/rnam pa gnyis las rten nas 'tsho'o//dper na shing rta rnying pa rnam pa gnyis la rten nas brtan pa de bzhin du//de bzhin gshegs pa yang
134b2('dul ba): na tshid lo brgyad cu lon pas/sku bgres 'khogs gtugs par gyur te/rnam pa gnyis la brten nas 'tsho'o//de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/
134b3('dul ba): nyon mongs por ma byed cig/smre sngags ma 'don cig/skye ba dang /byung ba dang /byas pa dang /'dus byas pa dang /bsams pa gang yin brten cing 'brel
134b4('dul ba): bar 'byung ba rnam par 'gyes pa'i chos can de la mi 'jig pa de lta bu lta ga la rnyed de/de ni gnas med do//kun dga' bo gang yang ngas khyod la sdug pa dang /phongs
134b5('dul ba): pa dang /dga' ba dang /yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang 'bral ba dang /'jig pa dang 'gyes pa dang /mi ldan par 'gyur bar snga nas bshad zin to//kun
134b6('dul ba): da 'a bro de lta bas na/da lta 'am+bu/nga 'das kyang rung /bdag nyid gling dang /bdag nyid skyabs dang /chos kyi gling dang /chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par
134b7('dul ba): bya gling gzhan dang sbyangs gzhan gyi ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dka' bo de lta 'am/nga 'das kyang rung /gang su dag bdag nyid gling dang /bdag
135a1('dul ba): nyid skyabs dang /chos kyi gling dang /chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par byed kyi/gling gzhan dang /skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa de dag ni//
135a2('dul ba): 'di lta ste/nga'i nyan thos bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yino//kun dga' bo ji ltar no/dge slong gis bdag nyid gling dang /bdag nyid skyabs dang /chos
135a3('dul ba): kyi gling dang /chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i gling gzhan dang /skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhe na/kun dga' bo 'di la dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing /
135a4('dul ba): sa nga/sa bzhin dang /drod nga das/'jig rten ga nod sems dang /yid ma 'di ngasan nas ra myed /
135a5('dul ba): lus dang /nang gi tshor ba rnams dang /phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang /nang dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang /nang gi sems dang /phyi'i sems dang /nang dang phyi
135a6('dul ba): sems dang /nang gis chos rnams dang /phyi'i chos rnams dang /nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing /brtson 'grus dang /shes bzhin dang /dran pa
135a7('dul ba): dang ldan pas/'jig rten la gnod semos dang /yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/kun dga' bo dge slong 'di lta bu ni bdag nyid gling dang /bdag nyid
135b1('dul ba): skyabs dang /chos kyi gling dang /chos kyi skyabs kyi gnas kyis/gling gzhan dang /skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang /
135b2('dul ba): ljon pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dbus kyi grong gang na bar 'dong //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes chu dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
135b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
135b4('dul ba): rnams 'dzum par mdzad pa de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dag 'byung zhing /kha cig ni 'og
135b5('dul ba): tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//gang dag 'og tu song ba de dag ni yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus gzhom dang /ngu 'dod dang /ngu 'bod chen
135b6('dul ba): po dang /che ba dang /rab tu chi ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol ba dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer ba dang /a chu zer
135b7('dul ba): ba dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /paMd ltar gas pa chen po'i sems can dmyal ba rnam su song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal
136a1('dul ba): pa gang dag yin pa de dag la ni/bsil bar 'bab po/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la dro bar 'bab bo//des
136a2('dul ba): sems can de rnams kyi gnod pa'i khyad par dag so sor bci'o//de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan dag ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam/'on
136a3('dul ba): te gzhan tu skyes snyam pa dang /de rnams drang pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa zhig btang //de rnams kyis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam
136a4('dul ba): du sems te/shes ldan dag bdag cag ni 'di naso shi 'phos pa yang med la/gzhan du skyes pa med mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus
136a5('dul ba): bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnams so sor bcil lo zhes de rnams sprul pa la sems mngon par dang bar gyur pas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par
136a6('dul ba): byas nas/gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba lha dang ma rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba bzung ngo //gang dag steng du song ba de dag ni rgyal chen
136a7('dul ba): bzhi'i ris dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs
136b1('dul ba): pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs pa chen po dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas
136b2('dul ba): dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu che dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nim snang ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /'og
136b3('dul ba): min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtago ba dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i dbyangs sgrog cing tshigasu bcad pa gnyis kyis kyang bsgragaso//
136b4('dul ba): brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya//sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen ban na//'chi bdag sde ni gzham par bya//gang zhig
136b5('dul ba): rab tu ma brjod pas//chos 'dul 'di la brtson gyur na//skye ba'i 'khor la rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis//
136b6('dul ba): stong gsumi gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byung nas//bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin du 'gro'o//de l-I gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dra ba yung
136b7('dul ba): ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi sna me log su nub par 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun log su nub par 'gyur ro//dmyal ba
137a1('dul ba): rgyu bar lung ston par gzhud nani zhabs kyi mtshal du rab par 'gyur ro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhud na nags kyi rnying bar nub byar 'gyur//
137a2('dul ba): yi dag su skye bar lung ston por bzhed na ni zhaba.A kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur//ming skye bar lung sten par banod na ni zhabs kyi pus mor nub par 'gyuraro//stobs
137a3('dul ba): 'khor lo sbyor ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur//'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag
137a4('dul ba): g.yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur/sur skye bar lung ston par bzhed ni ni/lte bar nub par 'gyur//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni
137a5('dul ba): zhal gyi nang du nub par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyis byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni 'dzod spur nub par 'gyur/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
137a6('dul ba): tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dngu'i gtsug tu nub par 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan
137a7('dul ba): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa/khe nog sna tshegaso sbyong gis bkra ba ma/
137b1('dul ba): tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur pa//ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//yang tshig su bcad pa
137b2('dul ba): dag gis gsol pa/rgod bral zhum dang rgyags po spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dag thul byed rgyu ma mchis pa/rtsa lag dung
137b3('dul ba): ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad//de slad brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen nas//rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog/nyen por 'tshal ba'i nyan pa po rnams kyi
137b4('dul ba): the tsom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang //dam pa bzang po dag gis gsal du gsol//cha chu'i ri bo lta bur bstan pa'i mchog/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur
137b5('dul ba): 'dzum mr-i ston//bstan pa ji slad 'dzum pa bston mdzad pa//skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/kun dga' bo
137b6('dul ba): de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzadado//
137b7('dul ba): kun dga' bo khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di mthong ngam/'dun pa 'di mthong lag so//kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas gsum bzhugs par
138a1('dul ba): gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos myur ba myur bar bla gros bzhi ltab tu byas te btI nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
138a2('dul ba): to//bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa kha na la bzhugs shig dang /sau phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhis yongasu longs spyad par
138a3('dul ba): 'gyur lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//skad cig gcig la bzhugs nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
138a4('dul ba): pa/kun dga' bo grong khyer mi thi la gang na bar 'dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan
138a5('dul ba): to//de nas bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags kyi ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/mi thi lar byon nas/mi thi li'i lha chen po a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so//de
138a6('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mjed do//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ngo //mthong nas
138a7('dul ba): kyang /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis
138b1('dul ba): rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags//kun dga' bo de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/de bzhin
138b2('dul ba): groshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen mod par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad
138b3('dul ba): khyi thub par gyur te/mi tshe lo brgyad khri ba rnams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling 'di 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo leg pa dang /skye bo dang mi mang
138b4('dul ba): pos gang ba grong dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang gi bar bya gag gi 'phur stabs kyis chos par byung bar gyur to//mi tshe lo
138b5('dul ba): brgyad khri pa rnams la/lus kyi gnod pa ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/'di lta ste/grang ba dang /cha ba dang /dkris pa dang /skom pa dang /'dod pa
138b6('dul ba): dang /yi grwa chus pa dang /rga ba yin no//mi chu lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi bu mo ni bcas nas lo lbu brgya lon pa dang /khyo la gtong bar byed de/
138b7('dul ba): dper na da ltar gyi lo bco lnga 'am/lo bcu drug lon pa bzhin no//kun dga' bo mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na//'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
139a1('dul ba): po chen po zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa 'byung //de'i rin po che sna bdun
139a2('dul ba): ni 'di lta bu byung ste/'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun
139a3('dul ba): pa ni blon po rin po che nyid yin no//de la yang thu dpa'o brtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar byung ste/de
139a4('dul ba): rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa/'di nyid chad pa med cing /mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/chos dang 'thun zhing
139a5('dul ba): snyoms par phab ste gnas so//de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu 'dreg mkhan gyi mis 'chos pa na/'dreg mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/kye nang rje nga'i dbu la
139a6('dul ba): skye dkar po skyes pa khyod kyis mthong dang lha'i pho nya byung ba yin gyis de'i tshe nga'i snyan du gsol cig/lha bkal bzhin 'tshal zhes 'dreg mkhan gyi mis/rgyal po lha chen
139a7('dul ba): po'i ltar mnyon to//dus gzhan zhig na 'dreg mang+gam+b+hi rgyal po che bo'i sgra dang kha spu 'chos pa na/rgyal po g+ha chen po'i mgo la skra dkar po skyes pas lho'i pho nya byung
139b1('dul ba): bar mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang rgyal po lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras//lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/khyed kyi dbu la skra dkar po skyes pas lha'i pho nya byung lagaso/
139b2('dul ba): des smras pa kye nang rje khyod kyis skra dkor po de dag mi 'breg par dal bu dal bus phyung la dro'i lag tu byin cig/lha dka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'dreg mkhan gyis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar
139b3('dul ba): mnyan nas/skra dkar po de gser gyi smang tsher gyis mi drag par dal gyis phyung nas/rgyal po lha chen po'i lag par bzhag go/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos skra dkar po de
139b4('dul ba): log pa gnyis kyis drangs nas tshigasu bcad de smras pa/da ni bdag gi mgo bo la//na chod 'joms pa'i sgra skyes te//lha yi pho nya byung gyur pas//bdag gi rab
139b5('dul ba): byung dus la bab//bdag gis mi rnams kyi 'dod pa ni slad zin gyis/bdag gis lha'i 'dod pa dag btsal po'i dus la bab kyis/ma la bdag gis gzhon nu thu bo
139b6('dul ba): rgyal srid kyi dbang phyag la dbang byed du bcug la/rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par smod pa smad do//skam nas/de nas rgyal po lnga chen pos gzhon nu po nyas bkug
139b7('dul ba): nos 'di skad ces smraso//bu gzhon nu shes par gyis shig/nga'i mgo la skra dkar po skyes pos lha'i po nya byung bar gyur to//ngas mi rnams kyi 'dod pa spyad zin pas
140a1('dul ba): ngas lha'i 'dod pa dag bcul ba'i dus la brub ste/dus bu gzhon nu khyod la rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po 'di btad kyis de khyod kyis tshwas/
140a2('dul ba): gyis rje su sbyang bar bya'i chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no//'gra' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dmi 'dren mor spyod na/khyod kyis yul 'khor du gnas ma gzhug
140a3('dul ba): TIg/buM gzhon nu glang gi tshe khyed kyang mgro la sgyu dkar po skyes pa mthong ba dang /lho'i bro nya 'ongs pa yin gyis de'i tshe khyod kyis kyang gzhon nu b+hu ga//
140a4('dul ba): srid kyi dbang phyug dbang byed du chug le rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/'di lta bu gzhon nu khyod kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i
140a5('dul ba): rjes bsam par bya'o//rgyun tshad par mu byed cig/skyes bu tha shal du gyur to ri/bu gzhon nu 'ga' zhog 'di lta bu'i skyes bu bzang po rgyun tu byung ba'i dge
140a6('dul ba): ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes mi 'tsho ba gang yin pa de/de rnams kyi rgyun gcod pa yin zhing de de rnams kyi nang na skyes bu tha shul du gyur pa yin no//de lta
140a7('dul ba): bas na nga khyod la 'di skad ces gang gi tshe khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i skyes bu bzang po rgyun tu byung ba'i dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de bu'i rjes sobs la rgyun chad par
140b1('dul ba): ma byed cig/skyes bu tha shAl du gyur par ma byed cig ces smra'o//de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug nas mI thi la'i
140b2('dul ba): lho chen po'i a mra'i tshal de nyid du rgyal po drang skyong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//kun dga' bo rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo gang yin pa de rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
140b3('dul ba): la dbang byed du bcug la de'i ming yang 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lce cheno po zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas gnaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
140b4('dul ba): du'o//de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i sku dang kha spu 'jog mkhan gyis mis 'chos po na zhes bya ba nas/de de rnams kyis nang nu skyes bu tha shal du gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i
140b5('dul ba): byar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug nas rgyal po'i drong srong tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/kun dga'
140b6('dul ba): bo bu dang tsha bo dang yang cha dang gsum tshwa la sogs pa de ltar rgyad pas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong mi thi la'i lha chen po'i a mi'i tshul 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong
140b7('dul ba): gis tshangs par spyod pa skyed do//de rnams kyi tha ma rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po zhig byung ste/de 'dun
141a1('dul ba): mo dang /gzhon nu dang /blon po dang /khrom gyi rung ba dang /grong mi dang /yul mi dag dang /chos spyod de sbyin pa dag gtong /bsod nams
141a2('dul ba): dag byed cing bsnyen gnas te/tshul khrims yid dag par blangs nas 'dug go//de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i mdun sa chos bzang du/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
141a3('dul ba): 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams kyi mdun du bsngags pa brjod par byed de/grogs po dag lus 'phyags kyi mi rnams kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/lus 'phags
141a4('dul ba): mi de rnams kyi rgyal gi/mu khyud ni rgyas kyi rtul pa rgyas dang ldan pa/chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po de btsun mo dang /zhes bya ba nas tshul khyams yang dag par blangs
141a5('dul ba): 'drugro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//grogs po dag khyod cag rtul po mu khyud lta bar 'dod dam/ko'u shi ka shin tu 'tshalo//grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed cig
141a6('dul ba): sbed cig dong /kho bos re shig rgyal po mu khyud lha'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa brkyang ba 'om/brkyang
141a7('dul ba): pa bskum pa tsam gyis sum cu rtsa gsum po'i spyi rnams kyi lha'i mdun sa chos bzang nas mi snang bar gyur te/mi thi ler rgyal po mu khyud kyi khang bzang su 'dug/'di skad
141b1('dul ba): / sa/sma rgyu mnus chos ngas n+dan gsus du pa du rnams spyugs rjod d+hA/ rgyu lags smra
141b2('dul ba): grogs pa lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyis rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/'dul par byed zhes bya ba'i bar gong mo bzhin du'o//mu khyud
141b3('dul ba): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro 'dod dam/ko'u shI ka bdag sum cu rtswa gsum du'i lha rnams blto ba'i phyir mchi bar 'chilo//mu khyud de'i phyir sdod
141b4('dul ba): cig dang /re shig kho bos khyod lar+b+ha tsang shes skyong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bsgyur gyis de'i nang du khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog cig/de bzhin du bgyi'o//zhes rgyas
141b5('dul ba): bo mu khyud kyis lha'i dpung po brgya byin gyi ltar mnyan to//de nas lha'i dbang po bad+d+ha byin sum ts+tsho rgyu gsum pa lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/kha la~M sgyur bla ma la gdul smras
141b6('dul ba): mA la ga du khyod srong la myur po kho nar cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i sho d+ha shrIm sa twA/rgyal po mu khyud ga na ba der bong la byin nas 'di skad ces muM b+h+r-i
141b7('dul ba): khyod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/rta cang shes skyong ldan pa'i shing rta bsgyur ba 'di yin gyis/'dir khyod zhugs la mgo yo bar shog cig ces smos
142a1('dul ba): shig/ko'u shi ka khyod kyis gsungs pa shin tu bzang ngo zhes kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar mnyan nas/myur ba kho
142a2('dul ba): nar rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shIng rta ba shams nas/rgyal po mu khyud gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smraso//mu khyud khyod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin
142a3('dul ba): gyis rta cang shes stong drang ldan pa'i shing rta bskur ba 'di yin gyis/'dir khyed zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog cig ces zero//kun dga' bo rgyal po mu khyod rta cang
142a4('dul ba): shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i nang du mi g.yo bar zhugs pa dang /de nasau kha lo sgyur ba ma la gradus rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so//mu khyud khyod kyi
142a5('dul ba): shing rta gang log su drang /gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams myong ba log su 'am/gang
142a6('dul ba): na sems can dge ba'i lus can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa so sor nyamasasu myong ba log su drung /ma lag du de'i phyir kho bos gang du gnyi ga mthong
142a7('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba/gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyam su myong ba dog yod pa dang /gang na son dge/
142b1('dul ba): sa can rnam su las dge ba'i rnam par smyon pa so sor nyams myong ba dag 'ad pa der shing rtams shig/nganam kha lo sbyar ba ma la gdus rgyas bau m+b+ha khyud kyi shang
142b2('dul ba): rgyal po mu khyud kyis gang na sems can sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyam su myong ba dag yod pa dang /gang na sems can dge ba'i las can
142b3('dul ba): rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa so sor nyam su myong ba dag yod pa gnyi ga rgyal po mu khyud kyis ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar drang so//kun dga' ba
142b4('dul ba): rgyal po mu khyud sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/rgyal po mu khyod lha'i mdun sa chos bzang du zhugs pa dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu
142b5('dul ba): khyud la stan phyed bstabs nas/rgyal po mu khyud dang lho'i dbang po brgya byin stan phyed phyed lA 'khod do//kun dga' bo rgyal po mu khyud dang lho'i dbang po brgya byin
142b6('dul ba): sbyin phyed phyed la 'khong pa na/khyod byar ra ma~M/bsam pa 'am/tha dad du bya bo med kyis/gzhan du de lha'i dbang po byargya byin ni mig 'dzums pa mi byed do//
142b7('dul ba): de naso lho'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad ces smraso//mu khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la mu khyud khyod dga' bar spyod cig/'dod pa'i yon ten lnga 'byor
143a1('dul ba): cing ldan pa la zed mo zlos shig/dga' bar spyod cig/dga' dgur spyod TIg/de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis de'i tshe tshig su brgyad de smrasmra pa/rdzi
143a2('dul ba): ltar snod dang shing rta dag/re shig dus kyi brnyan pa ltar//gzhan dag dpung sgyur gang yin pa'i//gnas kyang de dang 'dri ba yin//'di nas mi thu lo seng la/
143a3('dul ba): dge ba mang po rnams bya ste//bsod nams byas shing 'byor byas nas//mtho sa su ni 'gro bar bya//kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus nu rtul bai chen po zhes bya ba
143a4('dul ba): phreng gis dge ba'i la mo d+his+yai pa de la zhugs shong //gong dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa la brten nas rgya chen po brgyad khri zhi stong mI thi la rI lha chen de'i um+b+ha'i tshul
143a5('dul ba): 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gri tshangs par spyod pa spyad par gyur pa byung ba gang yin pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na khyod kyis de wArar+ya mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
143a6('dul ba): kun dge' bo nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lce chun po zhes bya bar gyur te/nga nyid kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa de stsol btod cing dge ba'i las nges pa srol dong po la rten
143a7('dul ba): nas/lha chen po brgyad khyi bo ni sbyong gis mi thi la 'di nyid na lha chen po'i a mra'i tshel 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gos tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
143b1('dul ba): kun dga' bo//de'i tshe nga 'dod chags dang bcus/zhe sdang dang bcas/gti mug dang bcas par gyur te/skye ba dang rga ba dang /na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang /smre smra
143b2('dul ba): 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongasu ma grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongasu ma grol lo zhes gsung //kun dga' bo de ni
143b3('dul ba): nga nyid 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes
143b4('dul ba): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur nas/'dod chags dang bral/zhe sdang dang bral/gti mugau dang bral
143b5('dul ba): bas skye ba dang /rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongasu grol zhing sdug bsngal
143b6('dul ba): las yongasu grol lo zhes gsung ngo //kun dga' bo de ltar na yang ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa srol btod pa de la brten nas/sem can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni skye bo'i chos
143b7('dul ba): nyid las yongasu grol bar 'gyur//sems can rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smyo sngags 'den pa dang //sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi
144a1('dul ba): bde ba dang /'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs shing /
144a2('dul ba): dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa/de lnga brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can nas/sems can 'khrug pa'i chos can gyis par dag 'khrug pa'i chos nyid
144a3('dul ba): las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ba de gang yin zhe na/'di lta ste/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa yin te/'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yA
144a4('dul ba): dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag par ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i
144a5('dul ba): dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin te/'di ni ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa dge ba'i lam nges po la zhugs pa de la brten nas/sems can
144a6('dul ba): spyi ba'i chos can nas gong ma bzhin du 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ba'i bar yin no//kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang de bzhin du dge ba'i
144a7('dul ba): lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes bosab par bya ba'i rgyun chad par mi byed cig/skyes bu tha shal du gyur bar ma byed cig/kun dga' ba~M gang la
144b1('dul ba): de lta bu'i nyan thos bzang po rgyun du byung ba'i dge ba'i lAm nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes mi 'tshob pa de ni/de rnams kyi rgyun gcod pa yin na/de de rnams
144b2('dul ba): kyi skyes bu tha shul du gyur pa yin//de bas nang khyod la 'di skad du/ci nas kyang khyod kyis de lta bu'i nyan thos bzang po rgyun tu byung ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de
144b3('dul ba): lta bu de'i rjes sobs shig/rgyun chad par ma byed cig/skyes bu tha shal du gyur par ma byed cig ces smra'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun
144b4('dul ba): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo lus 'phags gang na ba der 'dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
144b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das lus 'phagasu byon nas lus 'phags kyi phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad zhes bya ba nas sangs
144b6('dul ba): rgyas bzhi'i gdan yin no zhes bya ba dang /skad cig bzhugs nas shes bya ba rgyas par grong ma bzhin no//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun
144b7('dul ba): dga' bo sa la gang na bar 'dong //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal bre tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/bcom ldan 'ad
145a1('dul ba): snong byed nas ljongs rgyu nod gshegs pa dag/sa yang byon nas su la'i bram ze grong na 'acug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das sna dron burgyu
145a2('dul ba): sham thabs banabs/lhung bzed deng chos gos bsams te/sa la ro bsed bsnyoms la zhug so//de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/dge slong
145a3('dul ba): go'u ta ma 'dis la'i bram ze'i grong na 'dug ste/snga dwe sham thubs gos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/sa yer bsod snyoms la zhugs kyis mu la bdag
145a4('dul ba): gis sa la'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag rims ji ltar dge sang go'u ta mus lhung bzed bkrus te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/bkrus pa de bzhin bsod
145a5('dul ba): snyoms kham 'ga' yang mi rnyed par phyir ldog pa de lta da ltar byin gyis brlab po snya mo//de nas bdud sdig can gyis se la'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
145a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus te/saM la ro bsod soms la zhugs pa bkrus pa de kho na bzhin du bsod soms khams 'ga' yang ma rnyed
145a7('dul ba): par slar byon pa de lha de ltar byin gyis brlabs so//de nas bdud sdig can gyis bdag nyid bram ze gi khyi'u'i tshe byang du mngon par sprul nas/bcom ldan
145b1('dul ba): 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras so//dge sbyong dge sbyong bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed dam/de nas bcom ldan
145b2('dul ba): 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/kye ma nye bar 'ongs pa 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te 'di lta ste/rnam pA dkrug pa'i las byed do snyoms du thugasu chud nas/tshigs/
145b3('dul ba): bcad de bkra' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs la khyad bsad pas//khyod kyis bsod nams min meng bsags//sangs rgyas rnams ni brgal dka' bar//
145b4('dul ba): sdig can cig mi shes sam//dge sbyong de'i phyir sngar yang sa lar bsod snyoms la bzhud cig dang /ci nas kyang bsod snyoms rnyed pa de ltar bgyi'o//de
145b5('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/nga la ci yang mi bdog pa/kye ma shin tu bder 'tsho ste/'od gsal lha rnams ji lta bar//dga'
145b6('dul ba): ba yi ni zas bza'o//nga la ci yang mi badrog pa/kye mA shin tu bder 'tsho ste//'jig tshegs lha la mi rten pas//dga' ba yin zas bza'o//de nas
145b7('dul ba): bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ge sbyong go'u ta mI sems kyis bdag gi bsam pa sheso snyam du rig nas/sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang /'gyod
146a1('dul ba): pas de nyid mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khron pa can gang na
146a2('dul ba): bar 'dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das khron pa can du byon to//khron
146a3('dul ba): pa can na bud med gzhan zhig phyung thag dang chu snod khyer te khron pa'i drung du song ba dang skyes pa gzhan zhig de la chags pa'i kun nas bkris pa'i sems kyis rjes bzhin rjes
146a4('dul ba): bzhin du 'brang ba dang /de yang lhag par de la tshogs pas de gnyis phan tshun du 'otham zhing khron par dong ngo /de'i bu khye'u chung ngu ma zhig de dang lhan cig phyi bzhin
146a5('dul ba): 'brang zhing srong ngo //de nas de skyes pa la rtog cing chu snod btang ngo snyam ste/khye'u chung de'i bgul na thag pas btags te btang ba las shi bar gyur to//de sngon
146a6('dul ba): ma thos pa'i tshig su bcad pa thos po/'dod pa khyod rtsangs shes te//rtog pa las ni 'dod pa skyes//khyod la rtog pa ma byas dang //de nas nga la mi 'byung ngo //
146a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'ad kyang mal de nas gshegs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo l-i bku' stsal pa/kun dga' bo tshig su bcu pa 'di zung zhig/
146b1('dul ba): tshogasu bcud pa 'di ni 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin te/'di'i so so'i skye bo'i lag tu 'ongs pas mi snang mi gsal rnam par mi
146b2('dul ba): gsal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ngas ji ltar sems 'di myur du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ni gcig kyang ma mthong ngo //de nas bud med de bu'i mya
146b3('dul ba): ngan gyis gdungs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /brag la nyal dang /khams dang rang
146b4('dul ba): bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de thos pas bud med des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas
146b5('dul ba): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/btsun pa bdag la 'di lta bu ni/mas
146b6('dul ba): mi bgyis te/phas me lags/rgyal pos mo lags/lha rnams kyis ma lags/snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags//dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis
146b7('dul ba): ma lags//sdug pas ma lags/rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de bdag gis dge
147a1('dul ba): sa ni /chog sa med pa'i dus nas pa 'jig tshig la lta ba rjem kyi su mtho na ma rdzos nas hU~Mn rgyu rnaM
147a2('dul ba): na na gan 'dun me phyu skyes ma ldan ma du/ skyen
