219a2('dul ba): yug cig gi smad g.yogs bgos bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa yul skyong gang na ba der song ba dang /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'a khor skong bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas/rtsig
219a3('dul ba): drung zhig tu 'dug nas zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa za bar byed po dang /de na tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so//yul
219a4('dul ba): 'khor skong khyod bang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas ring po mo lon pa zhig na ci'i phyir rang gi khyim du 'jug par mi 'dod/zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa khyod kyi bre bir yang dza
219a5('dul ba): ltar 'gro lo btub/khi mi bdag khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs na/rgya gag ma gtogasau pa sbyin pa yang ma thab/bskrad kyang ma bkad pa dang /myur ba myang bar byung //bu yul 'khor skyong
219a6('dul ba): yin pa re kho bos ma shes mod/gal te kho bos shes na de skad mi smra ba zhig/bu yul 'khor skyong bzod par gsol//khyim bdag bzod//de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
219a7('dul ba): skyong gi phas/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la/yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud pa byas nas/rang gi khyim du ston bshams pa nyid la 'dug du bcu'o//de nas tshe
219b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pas/yul 'khor skyong gi ma la 'di skad ces smras//bu yul 'khor yun ring zhig lon nas khyim du 'ongs kyis/kye re shig khyod bdag nyid kyis
219b2('dul ba): snod du chos paste gan gyis shig dang /de la bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod par 'gyuraro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi ma rang nyid kyis snod du bac+doMs nas sta gon byaso//de
219b3('dul ba): nas mi zhig gis/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mdun du gser gyo phung po chen po/gal te mi cig pha rol na 'greng na/mi cig tshur rol na 'dug pa mi mthong la/mi cig chu
219b4('dul ba): rol na 'dug na/gcig pha rol na 'greng ba mi mthong ba spung so//tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so//bu yul
219b5('dul ba): 'khor skyong khyod kyi ma la/bud med rnam kyi pad med kyi nor dang /bud med kyi bag rdzogs dang /bud med kyi khyad pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa yang 'di skad cig yod do//gzhan yang khyod
219b6('dul ba): kyi pha'i ni/mtshan mas thebs pa'i gser dang sa le sbram yang brgya phrag du ma dang /stong phrag du ma dang /brgya stong phrag du ma yod na/phal gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/buM yul
219b7('dul ba): 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la/'dod bdag la yang yongasu spyod cig/sbyin pa dag kyang thong shig/bsod na mo dag kyang gyis shig/khyim bdag gi chung ma khyod gal te kho bo
220a1('dul ba): tshig la/dad pas mnyan par bya bar sems pa lta na/bdag gi gdams shing rje su bstan to//bu yul 'khor skyong gdam ngag stsol cig/bu yul lAN+Da/
220a2('dul ba): bskyod rjesu ston cig dang /khyod kyi tshig lnga bdag dang pos mnyan par dgyi'o snyam du semaso//khyim bdag gi chung mtshur/khyod kyis shana'i ras skye sar pa byos la/gso re/
220a3('dul ba): dngos la sbyim gyis khong ste/shing rta'i nang du chug la chu bo gang ga'i rgyun shugs drag cing bting zab pa gang na yod pa der 'or cig/gzhi de las khyod kyi mya ngan dang /skye
220a4('dul ba): sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams skye bar gyur ta re/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ma 'di snyam du sems te/
220a5('dul ba): bdag gis de lta bu'i bya bas kyang bu yul 'kho skyong bzlog pa bya ba ma nubo d+ha mo de nr-i tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas/mna' ma la bcol ba/kye bag sa ra re shig ji lta bu'i mnyes
220a6('dul ba): bre rnams kyis mnyes pa dang /khyis rnams kyis bkrus pa dang /dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang /gos rnams bskon pa dang /rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /'dug pa rnams
220a7('dul ba): kyi bdugs pa dang /phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/buM yul 'khor skyong de sngon khyim par gyur pa na/dga' ba dang /yid du 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i mnye rnams kyis
220b1('dul ba): mnyes pa dang //khrus rnams kyis bkru ba dang /dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang /gos rnams bskon pa dang /rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /bdug rnams kyis 'dug pa dang
220b2('dul ba): phye ma rnams kyis gtor bgyis la/bu yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs la/'di skad ces gang gi slad du rje'i smos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs
220b3('dul ba): par spyad pa spyod pa lha'i bu mo ji lta bu zhig ces kyang smos shig de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor gyis chung mas/ji lta bu yau mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang /khrus
220b4('dul ba): rnams kyis bkrus pa dang /dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang /gos rnams bskon pa dang /rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang /
220b5('dul ba): phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor slong /sngon khyim par gyur pa na/dga' ba dang /yid du 'ongs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnaMs kyis mnye ba dang /
220b6('dul ba): khrus rnams kyi bkru ba dang /dri rnams kyis byug pa dang /gos rnams bskon pa dang /rgyan rnams kyis rgyan pa dang /bdug pa rnams kyis 'dug pa dang /bye mi rnams kyis gtor bai
220b7('dul ba): byas nas/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces smraso//rje'i sras gang gi slad du bcom 'das kyi skyon sngar tshangs par spyad pa
221a1('dul ba): spyod pa lha mo de ji lta bu zhig lags/sring mo kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa ni/lha'i bu mo'i ched du ma yino//de nas tshe dang
221a2('dul ba): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/sngon gyi chung ma la sring mo zhes tshig tu smras pas/brgyal nas sa la 'gyel te/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gri pha dang ma la smras pa/yab
221a3('dul ba): yum gal ta/kha zos btang ba lags na/ci mi stsal tam/btang snyom su bzhag ste/ci tho ba tsam lags sam/bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod cig ces/de nas tshe dang
221a4('dul ba): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag rang gi lag nos bstabs shong tshim par byed de/rnam
221a5('dul ba): grangs du mas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag pas bskyabs shing tshim par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis zos nas/lag pa bkrus
221a6('dul ba): te/lhung bzed rgyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de smras pa/
221a7('dul ba): ltos shig lus ni nor bu dang //rna rgyan gyis ni bkra byas kyang //nad dang slu ba'i chos can de//brtan par gnas pa yod ma ya ni//skra yi lan bu brgyad lhas shing //mig ni mig/
221b1('dul ba): sman gyis bskus pa'ang //byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi//pha rol tshal ba ma yin no//dri rnams kyis ni lus bslus la//rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa yang //byis pa rmongs par byed
221b2('dul ba): nus kyis//pha rol tshol ba mA yin no//mig smin gser gyis bkra byas shing //rul po'i lus ni brgyan pa yang //byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi//pha rol tshol ba ma yin
221b3('dul ba): no//ri dgas 'tshor bas snyi bcugasra nas//ri dgas gzung po ma nus ltar//rngon pa 'o drong 'bod bcug la//zos nas gnasu 'gro bar bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khru
221b4('dul ba): skyong gas pa dang ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas
221b5('dul ba): de nyid nas/steng gi na mkha' la song ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ba ru ri'i shing zhig gi drung du/nyin par gnas
221b6('dul ba): par bya ba'i phyir 'dug go/de'i tshe rgyal po ke'u rab bya/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor slong gi snyan pa yang sgrogs shing gnas te/nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor sbyang
221b7('dul ba): mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam mo//de nas rgyal po ko'u rob
222a1('dul ba): byas/tsha la srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/kA'e nang rje khyod song la myur tu bar mdzod stug po can gyi tshal phyag drar byos shig/sang nga der bskyed mos
222a2('dul ba): tshal gyis sar 'gro'o//lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/skyes pa des rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas/bang mdzod stug po can gyis tshal thams cad phyag dar byed pa na/mi
222a3('dul ba): des tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi dong na/nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/rgyal po ko'u
222a4('dul ba): rab bya gang gi snyan pa yang dang yod du sgrogs shing gnas te/nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/nam zhig na gral te zhu ba lung
222a5('dul ba): bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni 'di yin te/bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig
222a6('dul ba): tu phyin gyis ma la bdag gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya la sbran par bya'o snyam nas/de nas skyes pa de rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/rgyal po ke'u rab
222a7('dul ba): bya lo 'di skad ces smras so//lha gang gi snyan po yang dang yang dro sngags shing bzhugs lo/nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar
222b1('dul ba): 'gyur/nam zhig nu gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phyen bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni de lags te/bang mdzod stug po can
222b2('dul ba): gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu mchis lags te/lha de'i dus la babo par dgongasu gsol/de nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas mi gzhan zhig lo bsgob/ke'u nang rje tshur/bzhin pa bzang po
222b3('dul ba): myur du bsdogs shig/de la nga zhon nas/deng kho nas shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ba lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o//lho dka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po ke'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas/
222b4('dul ba): gzhon pa bzang po myur du bsdogs te/rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di skad ces smraso//lha bcibs pa bzang po bsdogs lag
222b5('dul ba): te/lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol/de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nus/bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khri/
222b6('dul ba): skyong la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sdong nas/de dzi tsam gzhon pI s+ya'i byar du/gzhon pas skyong ste/gzhon pa las babs nas/rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar
222b7('dul ba): zhugaso//tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba 'thod//mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smraso//rgyal po chen po byon pa le gso chur
223a1('dul ba): spon/rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul lags pas/bzhed na bdag kyang bstan la gla yar drongs shig/kye yul 'khor skyong bdag gi yul lags mod
223a2('dul ba): kyi/'on kyang bdag yul 'khor kyong gis bdag ston la g.yar drang bar 'tshalo//rgyal po chen po gdan mchis kyis gral te bzhed na bzhugs shig/de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya/tshe
223a3('dul ba): dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig/mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug
223a4('dul ba): go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal po ko'u rab byas/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smraso//shes ldan yul 'khor gal te rigs dman pa 'am
223a5('dul ba): longs spyod rnams yongasu zad pa 'am/gtugs par gyur na/skra dang kha spu bregs to gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par
223a6('dul ba): rab tu 'byung ba yod na/bdag cag rigs ni ko'u rab bya yin la/longs spyod ni rgya che ba yin gyis/'di ltar kho bos shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la longs spyod kyi bskal
223a7('dul ba): pa bdag la bgo bsha' byas/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong tshur/khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yongasu spyod cig/sbyin pa dag thong sho gi/bsod nams dag
223b1('dul ba): gyis shig/rgyal po chen po che ma lhag pa'i slad 'gron du 'bod pas bdag mgron du 'brod kyi/'tshams pas ni ma lagaso//khyod lta bus bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di lta bu'i
223b2('dul ba): mgron du yang mo 'bod cig/bdag gis shes ldani yul 'khor skyong dang 'tsham pa'i mgron du bod pas 'gron du 'bod pas ji lta bu zhig lags rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/khyod kyis
223b3('dul ba): 'di skad ces/kye yul 'khor skyong 'kho bos yul 'byor cing gnod pa med pa/sngo ba med cing /'tshe ba med la/slong ba po'i bsod snyoms rnyed sla ba yin gyis/shos ldan yul
223b4('dul ba): 'khor skyong /bang mdzad stug po con 'dir mnos shig dong /bdag gasri shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin gyis bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bya'o zhes bgyi ba lag
223b5('dul ba): na/rgyal po chen po sems mngon par dad pa gang lags pa de tsam gyis bgyis lags te 'tshalo//gzhan yang gal te zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/shes ldan
223b6('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong la bdag zhu lagasaso//rgyal po chen po gsungs shig/thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o//kye yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni yongasu nyams pa legs
223b7('dul ba): te/de dag gis yongasu nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dag/skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
224a1('dul ba): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rga bas yongasu nyams pa dang /nad kyis yongasu nyams pa dang /nye dus yong su nyams pa dang /longs
224a2('dul ba): spyod kyis yongasu nyams pa'o//kye yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongasu nyams pa gang zhe na/'di la rigs kyi bu rgas 'khogs gtugs par gyur nas/de 'di snyam du sems
224a3('dul ba): to/da ni bdag rgas 'khogs gtugs pas/bdag gis re shig 'dod pa bdogs kyang longs spyod par bla ba ma yin na/mi bdog na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ma la bdag
224a4('dul ba): skra dang kha spu bregs la/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung snyam nas/dri rga ba'i yongasu nyams pas/yongasu nyes///
224a5('dul ba): pas skra dang khe spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgros nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nasau khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/'di ni rga ba'i yongasu nyams pa zhes bya'o//
224a6('dul ba): ldan yul 'khor skyong rga ba'i yongasu nyams pa ma yin na skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngu ro smig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byang
224a7('dul ba): de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni gzhon nu thor bu lang tshol bab pa skra gnag pa/na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan pa yin te/gong gis tshe/rtsed ma
224b1('dul ba): dang /dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /cha ba dang /brgyan pa'i gnas la brtson pa dang ldan pas gnas par bya ba de'i tshe/nye du rnams mchi mas brnangs shing du bzhin dang bcas prasnga ma rangs
224b2('dul ba): bzhin/skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag po kho nas khyam nasau khyim med par rab tu byung na/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shre
224b3('dul ba): mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas/gos ngur smrig mgos te/dud pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med pa rab tu byung /de la ni kho bros rangs pa ma yin
224b4('dul ba): te mi bzod do//kye shos ldan yul 'khor skyong nad kyis yongasu nyams pa gang zhe na/'di la rigs kyi bu no ba sdug bsngal ba/nad tshabs che byar gyur na dri 'di snyam du sems te/
224b5('dul ba): bdag ni na ba sdug bsngal ba nAd che bra che bas/bdag gis re shigi 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyad par bla ba ma yin/mi bdogs nu lta smos kyang ci dgos/ma la bdag
224b6('dul ba): s+ya dang khe spu bregs nas/gos ngur smrig bgos nas shes bya ba nas/rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'o bar grong ma bzhin du'o//de nad kyi yongasu nyams pas sgra dang khyu spu bregs
224b7('dul ba): togos dung smrig bgos nas/zhes bya ba nis/rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//'di ni nad kyi yongasu nyams pa zhes bya'o//shes ldan yul 'khor skyong na na/
225a1('dul ba): kyis yongasu nyams pas yongasu nyamus pa ma yin na/sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/drad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya ba
225a2('dul ba): nas rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gnod pa med cing /nad med pa'i rang bzhin can dang /ran par 'ju
225a3('dul ba): ba'i drod dang ldan pa ste/ha cang bsil bas ma yin pa dang /ha cang dro ba ma yin pa dang /khamaso snyoms pas gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyis zos pa dang
225a4('dul ba): 'thungs pa dang /'chos pa dang myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur na/shes ldan yul 'khor de la ci zhig shes mthong zhes bya ba nas/rab tu 'byung
225a5('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te/mi bzod do//kye yul 'khor stong nye dus yongs nyams pa gang zhe na/'di la rigs kyi bu'i nye du
225a6('dul ba): rnams rabs chad/nye du rnams kha tag nus/de 'dri snyam du semasA te/bdag gi nye du rnams rabs tshad nye du rnams kha rtag pas ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs
225a7('dul ba): nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nye du'i yongasu nyams pas//yongasu nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bye ba nA/
225b1('dul ba): rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//'di ni nye dus yongasu nyams pa zhes bya'o//shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni nye dus yongasu nyams pas yongs nyams pa
225b2('dul ba): ma yin no/skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te/ngang pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/yul 'khor skyong
225b3('dul ba): gi nye du ni/ko'u rab byi'i rigs nas bzung ste brgyud pa/pang mdzod stug po can 'di nyid na/rgyad par yod na/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes mtho
225b4('dul ba): bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de la ni kho bos rangs pa ma yin te/mi bzod do//kye yul 'khor skyong longs spyod kyis yongasu nyams pa gang
225b5('dul ba): zhe na/'di la rigs kyi bu'i longs spyod srabs pa dang /yongasu zad pa dang /gtugs par gyur nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis longs spyod ni srabs pa
225b6('dul ba): dang yongasu zad pa dang /gtugs par gyur gyis//ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas/zhes bya ba nus/rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de longs spyod yongs
225b7('dul ba): nyams pa yongasu nyams pas skra dang khaM spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//'di ni longs spyod kyis yongasu nyams
226a1('dul ba): bya zhes bya ba/shes ldan yul 'khor spyang ni longs spyod sngo sr-i nyam+b+has pas oM su nyams pa ma yin na zhes bya ba nas ra tu byung zhes bya bar//
226a2('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o//shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni dang mdzod stug po can 'di ni/rigs mchog dang rigs bzang po yin pas 'di lta ste/longs spyod chen po dang /
226a3('dul ba): ldan pa yin na/'di la shes ldan yul 'khor skyong zhig/ci zhig nas mthong blos rtogs nas/sgra dang kha spu bregs te gros ngur smrig bgos nas/drod pa yang
226a4('dul ba): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu 'byung /de la ni khro ba ra ba ma yin te/mi bzod do//rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dge bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
226a5('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des yid 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs te/yid 'byung ba de dag gis yid byung nas
226a6('dul ba): rigs kyi bu rnams sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med pA ra rab tu 'byung byar 'gyur te/rgyal po
226a7('dul ba): chen po 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni drabs nye bar khrid pa yin/'jig rten 'di ni rje su 'gro ba med pas skyang so med pa yin/'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro
226b1('dul ba): bar 'gyur pas bdogs pa med pa yin/'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes te sred pas 'khol bas chog mi shes pa yin par bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas sgra
226b2('dul ba): dang khwa spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgros nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //bdag gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par ma phye
226b3('dul ba): ba 'di'i don rgyas par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gas don de nyid ci nas bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor gyis mdor sdus te gsungs shing rnam
226b4('dul ba): bA ra ma phye ba 'di ni don rgyas par 'tshal bar 'gyur bar rgyas par bshad du gsol/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga ngas nye bar
226b5('dul ba): khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungaso/de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod
226b6('dul ba): pe bzhin lan thob shig/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/gang gi tshe khyod lo nyi shu 'am/nyi shu rtsa lnga lon por gyur pa na/na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tse la bab
226b7('dul ba): pa/skra gnag pa nyam rtsal ba 'do ba dang ldan pa de dang da ltar gyis lus su 'di lta ste/tshe'am kha dog gam stobs sam smra dang grwa saM srid du'am sbom su mnyam
227a1('dul ba): zhing mchod pa mthong ngam/kyai yul 'khrur sgyun pats+tsha bdag many+tsa shu'am/ny+tsa shur+N+Na lnga lon par gyur pa man tshod kyis gzhon nu thor du lang
227a2('dul ba): la bab pa/sgra gnags pa nyam tsa li bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang da ltar gyis lusu 'di lta ste/tshe'am kha dogs gam stabs sam/shugs sam/srid du 'am/sboms su
227a3('dul ba): 'am/sgra dang gsu mnyam zhing mtshungs par ma mthong ste/da ni bdag na tshad kyis lo brgyad cu lon pas rgas 'khogs gtugs te bar 'ga' ba dag 'dug pa dang /langs pa
227a4('dul ba): yang gzhan gyis bya dgoso//rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des
227a5('dul ba): 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no//zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas sgra gda' spu bregs nas//
227a6('dul ba): gos ngur spyag bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/de la ni 'dug rangs te bzed//shes ldan yul 'khor skyong glang la
227a7('dul ba): rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod/gong yang shos ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni rje su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no zhe
227b1('dul ba): gsungs pa/bdag la ni bu dang chung mu dang bran dang las bgyid pa dang bzhad gad pa dang /sku mkhan dang khrus mkhan dang /'dul sbyong mkhan dang /glang po che la zhon pa dang /
227b2('dul ba): rkye dang /shing rta pa dang /beshin thogs dang gzhu 'dzin pa dang /'drol bu dang /gau re long bgyid pa dang /bro gar len pa rnams dang /rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/
227b3('dul ba): rab tu gnon chen po che chen po dang ldan pa grang dag bdag gi gshed ma phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba dag mchis pa slar 'joms par bgyid pa mchis na/'on kyang shes ldan yul
227b4('dul ba): 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/'jig rten 'di ni rje su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin//zhes gsungs pa de/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gi ci la dgongs te gsungs/rgyal
227b5('dul ba): po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/rgyal po chen po da ltar khyod la lus kyi gnod pa 'ga' mchis sam/kye
227b6('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong bdog la mchis te/da ltar rlung gi rgyab tu gnod do//rgyal po chen po gang gis tshe rung gis rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe/bdag gi bu dang chung ma
227b7('dul ba): dang /bran dang las byed pa dang bzhad gad pa dang ske mngon dang khrus mkhan dong 'dul skyong mkhan dang /glang po che la non pa dang /d+hai N+ya dang /shing rta pa dang /bshen rdog
228a1('dul ba): dang /gzhu 'dzin dang /'drol bu dang /go re long byed pa dang /bro gar len pa dang /rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa rab tu gnon chen po che chen
228a2('dul ba): po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshu re/bdag la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzod pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams chom shig ces bgyis na
228a3('dul ba): 'grub bam/kye yul 'khor skyong ma lagaso//gong gi tshe rlung gis bdag gi rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe/bdag gi bu dang chung ma dang /bran dang /las bgyid pa dang /
228a4('dul ba): gzhong gad pa dang /skra mkhan dang /'khrus mkhan dang /'dul sbyong mkhan dang /glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /rta rgyu dang /shing rta pa dang /bshan thogs dang /gzhu
228a5('dul ba): 'dzin dang /'drol bu dang /go re long bgyid pa dang /bro gar len po dang /rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul pod pa rab tu gronon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa chur
228a6('dul ba): bdag la byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub bre che ba mi bzod pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams chom shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi de'i tshe bdag 'ba'
228a7('dul ba): shig sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa che ba mi bzod pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong ngo //rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
228b1('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa de 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'dren rjesu 'gro ba med do sbyangs med pa yon zhes gsungs pa de dag gis shi mthong thos rtogs nas//
228b2('dul ba): sgyu dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nis khyim med par rab tu dbyung ste/de la ni bdag rungs te bzang //shes ldan yul 'khor
228b3('dul ba): skyong bdu la rangs te bzod pa de la bdig cag kyang rangs te bzod do//gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur
228b4('dul ba): bos bdogs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/kye yul 'khor skyong bdag cag la bu dang chung me dang dran du lwa bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba nas/rgyal po'i bu rnams mchis te/zhes bya ba'i
228b5('dul ba): par gong ma bzhin du'o//gang drag bdag mchi ni rje bzhin 'brong la/'greng na 'greng ba dang /nyal nu zhugs tshe bgyid pa dag mtshos na/'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor
228b6('dul ba): skyod 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad porA ti/'gro bar 'gyur byas bdog pa med pa yin zhes gsung ba de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis lus dgongs
228b7('dul ba): te gsungs/rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa med pa de bzhin du phan rdzob shig/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems//gang gis tshe skye bo mang
229a1('dul ba): po la mi sdug pa/skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong
229a2('dul ba): 'di lta ste/'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chosra de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang chung ma drang bran dong lnga byed pa zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu dag tshur zhes bya ba'i byer
229a3('dul ba): du'o//gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin sheg shig ces bgyis ni 'grub po ma/kye yul 'khor skyong ma lag so//kye yul 'khor skyong
229a4('dul ba): gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/skye bo mang po la mi 'dod pa/skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ongs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di
229a5('dul ba): lta ste/'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/badrog gi bu dang chung ma dang bran dang /las bgyid pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas/rgyal ba'i bu'i bar
229a6('dul ba): gang dgra yin pa tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//bdag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'chi ba'i phyi bzhin sheg shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste/bdag
229a7('dul ba): 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nos 'jig rten pha rol tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro//rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
229b1('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing /gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas/'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas/bdog pa med pa yin zhes gsungs
229b2('dul ba): pa de/bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas/skra dang kha spu bregs nas/gos ngur smrig bgos te/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/de la ni bdag
229b3('dul ba): rangs te bzod/shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la radra te/bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do//shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gong yang 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms
229b4('dul ba): mi shwe shi sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/kye yul 'khor skyong bdag sgra ngan rgyas pa 'di nyid la yongasu spyod cing /btsun mo mang po dang /mdzo dang //
229b5('dul ba): bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs long smod na/'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni/ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi
229b6('dul ba): shes pa yino zhes gsungs pa/de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar
229b7('dul ba): bzod pa de bzhin du la na srog shig/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/khyod 'di na sgra ngan rgyas pa las yongasu spyod cang /btsun mo mang po dang /mdzad dang /bang mdzod/
230a1('dul ba): rgyas pa la yongasu spyod pa las/shar phyogs nas mi yid bcugs pa/yid ches pa brtan po/'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas/de la 'di skad
230a2('dul ba): ces/lha bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir mchi ba na/de na bdag gis ljongs 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dag
230a3('dul ba): cig mthong ste/lha ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dpung dang /'di lta bu'i dbyig dang /'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs te/gzhon pa dang /choms nas rnal du dgod par rung zhes
230a4('dul ba): smra na/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/khyod yul der dra ma drangs zhing /drangs nas btsem ste/rnal du dgod dam/khyod ljongs de dag 'dod dam/kye yul 'khor skyong gal te
230a5('dul ba): bdag gis ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang /'di lta bu'i dpung dang /'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs pa dang /dra ma drangs nas tshams pa dang /bcom nos rnal du
230a6('dul ba): dgod du rung bar shes na/ljongs de dag tu dra ma drang zhing /dri ma drangs nas bcom la/bcom nas rnal du 'god do//bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tsha lo//'dul ba gzhi//
230a7('dul ba): bam po sum cu lnga pa//rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/
230b1('dul ba): las dgongs nas/'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas dkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de dag gis mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu glegs nas
230b2('dul ba): gos ngur smrig bgos te/dad pa yang dag pa kho na nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do//shes ldan yul 'khor spyod khyod gang la rangs te bzod pa de la
230b3('dul ba): bdag kyang rangs te bzod de//tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de skad ces smras nas/gnas brtan dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smraso//'jig rten dag na nor dang ldan
230b4('dul ba): pa'i mi//de dag chags dang bcas pas sogs byed cing /nor rnams rnyed na sa gtong bar mi byed la//phyi re zhing 'dod pa don du gnyer ba mthong //mi dbang rgya mtsho mtha' yis gtugs
230b5('dul ba): pa'i sa//thag bcug bcom ste cham du phab nas ni//rgya mtsho tshun chad kyis kyang mi chog ste//mgos pas pha rol don du gnyer bar 'bad//mi dbang de bzhin mi gzhan mang
230b6('dul ba): po dag/yongasu gzung la ngoms pa yod min pas//tshog mi shes pas rang gi lus por ti/sred dang mu bral bar ni 'chi bar 'gyur//srog ni ther zug ma yin tshe thung ste//
230b7('dul ba): rga bas gzir ba la na skye bas yod min//'chi ba na ni nor rjes 'brang mi 'gyur//nye du ma yin grogs min bu ma yin//spun dang srin mo de bzhin grogs kun dang //snying du
231a1('dul ba): sdug pa'i tshogs 'di 'dus nas ni//kye ma kye hud 'di ni rlugs gyur ces//skra bshig mchi ma can gyis gdong gi nguka/da ni ras kyis dkris te phyung nas ni//
231a2('dul ba): me 'bar nas ni de nas sreg par byed//rang gi las kyis sems can de khrid nas//de yinar rnams bgo skal spyod pas phrogs//'di ni skye ba na yang gcig pu skyes//'chi ba na
231a3('dul ba): yang gcig pu 'chi 'gyur zhing //gcig pus sdug bsngal nyam su 'dir myong 'gyur//skye bo 'khor bar grogs yod mo yin no//phyug po 'am yang na bkren pa 'am brtan po 'am//du
231a4('dul ba): pa de bzhin gnyis kas reg myong nas//brtan po de yis nams kyang yogs mi 'gyuraro//bus pa bus pa yin phyir rtag tu g.yo//blo chung mi mkhas rje su slob byed cing //de nas
231a5('dul ba): las rnams gsum po byed 'gyur zhing //mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur//kho na dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal las mi 'grol/shes rab nor rnams kun gyi
231a6('dul ba): mchog tu gsungs//de yis bdag nyid shes pas bdag nyid rig/srid dang srid min bdag nyid me gtogs pas/blun po sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa yin//phran chog
231a7('dul ba): thabs sam yang na/chos min pa 'am//mthu yid gzhan dag las ni gang 'brog pa//nyes byas las byed 'khor ba la brten na//nying tor brgyud pas grol bar
231b1('dul ba): 'gyur ma yin//ji ltar rkun po khyim 'big bzung nas ni//sdig pa'i las can rang gi las kyis bcom//de bzhin skye dgu nyes byed 'di dang ni/'jig rten pha rol rang gi lus
231b2('dul ba): kyis bcom//shing las shing thog bzhin du mi rnams ni//gzhon dang bar ma rgan po rnams kyang ltung //'dod pa sna tshogs stug cing yid 'ong ba//rang bzhin de lta bu yis
231b3('dul ba): sems rab 'joms//'dod pa rnams kyis 'di 'ching chags par 'gyur//'dod pa yod na kho na dang 'jigs pa ste/de ltas rgyal po 'di nas rab byung ste//dge sbyong nyid ni nyams
231b4('dul ba): ba med mchog yin//de nas rgyal po chen po ku'u rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa la mngon par dga' ste/yi ring nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te
231b5('dul ba): stan las langs nas song ngo //bcom ldan 'das glang po che'i grong rdal du byon pa dang /bram ze zhig gis/bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
231b6('dul ba): kun nas brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag pa/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang
231b7('dul ba): ba de/rgyang ring po kho nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas/tshigasu bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa/gser gyi mdog can mig tu
232a1('dul ba): sdug pa dang /dga' ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun dang ldan//mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lha yi m+b+ha//srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byon pa lags/de nas
232a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa na zhes bya ba nas/mdzod spur nub par gyur te/
232a3('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar grong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus pa/kha dog sna tshogs stong gis dag bo 'o/
232a4('dul ba): bya ba nis kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o//kun dga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i///
232a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzod//kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigasu bcad pas bstod pa gang yan pa
232a6('dul ba): mthong ngam/bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso//'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskol pa nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/'on kyang lha dang mi rnamasu nyin
232a7('dul ba): mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang /skye gnas phye ma dang /lus la phyi ma dang /bad gi gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la/rang sangs rgyas bstod 'od zhes bya/
232b1('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu
232b2('dul ba): bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byang chub tu lungs bstun po la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig/
232b3('dul ba): tu ma zad kyi/ji ltar 'das 'das pa'i dus ni yang nga la tshig suM bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ngas grong mchog lnga byin pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig
232b4('dul ba): dang bshad//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA ra na se'i grong khyer du/rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu
232b5('dul ba): gang ba la rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/de lhag par snyan dang gis lo dga' bar gyur to//bA'u ra no se na bram ze snyan dngags mkhan gzhan zhig yod pa de la/bram ze mos
232b6('dul ba): smras pa/bramo ze grong ba'i dus la bab gyis rgyal po de'i spyan sngar song la rje su 'thun pa'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byas dang /gal te na grang ba'i skyabs chung zad 'thob
232b7('dul ba): par 'gyur ro//de song ba las je tsam na rgyal po glang po che lo zhon nas byung //bram ze des bsams pa/ci bdag gis rgyal po la stod dam/'on te gleng ngo tsha dam pa
233a1('dul ba): la mA / sgyum sa /klu chung ma pa 'a ni/garten rnams sa m+b+hag nga yad du spyod du smon lnga/rgyu
233a2('dul ba): la ni da par du minA pas smrig byung po rjo ma pa mngon par ni stong ngur phyi//ma nas/ tshig su bcad de nam g+ha/sa s+yA sa
233a3('dul ba): sbyar//mnan mchog ldan pa'i gzugs ni kun sum tshogs//midag ched kyis lus kyi gzugs legs pa/glung rten da pa bkra shis rab tu bsdug
233a4('dul ba): dri nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas/tshigs da de smras pa/mang+ku b+hU chen+da rmA da d+h+ri d+ha dzu g+h+ra/mAM nAm sa mig 'phyogs sgyur bya skye
233a5('dul ba): dul da kyis bskyed pa'i chog smras sa/khyod la grong gi mchog ni lnga sbyin no// dag de dIr sa kyi gleng ba rnas b+ha glang min ni
233a6('dul ba): de tshong 'dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni/bram ze 'di nyid sbyin te/de ni yang ngal 'dis tshigasu bcad pa
233a7('dul ba): bstod pas/ngas 'di la grong mchog rdzi byin//dbyar yang ngal 'dis tshigasu bcad pa gcig gis bstod ras/ngas yang 'di 'ang bya chub
233b1('dul ba): bstan to//grong khyer chen por gshegs nas grong khyer chen por sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba'i ror rgyas par gong mo bzhin du'o//yul srug nur gshogs pa
233b2('dul ba): dang /yul sreg nor bram ze dbang po rgyu bya ba gzugs dang /lang n+do dang /thos pas rgyags par gyur nas/bdag dang 'dra' ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes sgrogs shing
233b3('dul ba): rnam par sgrogaso//bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dgung la gdan bsham pa nyid la bzhugs te chos 'chad do//bram ze dbang
233b4('dul ba): po zhes bya ba/dge sbyong go'u ta ma yul srog nar byon to zhes thos nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhes
233b5('dul ba): thos kyis ci bdag las lhag par gzugs bzang ba yin nam 'on te ma yin/ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de byung ba dang /ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen
233b6('dul ba): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa//do 'dom gang gis rgyan pa/'od zer nyi mo stong pas lhag
233b7('dul ba): pa/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang po mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/bdag pas gzugs lhag par
234a1('dul ba): bzang mod kyi/tshad ni lhag par ring ba ni ma yin no snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug tor blta bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na ma mthong /
234a2('dul ba): nas/de phyogs shin tu mtho ba zhig la 'dzegs ni 'on kyang ma mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/bram ze dbang po la bka' stsal pa/bram ze nyon mongs kyis thong
234a3('dul ba): zhig/gal te ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzegs te bltas kyang 'on kyang ches nyon mongasu zad kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ni mthong bar mi 'gyuraro//gzhan yang khyod
234a4('dul ba): kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro bas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor mi mthong ngo zhes thos sam/'on kyang gal te de bzhin gshegs
234a5('dul ba): pa'i sku'i tshad mthong bar 'dod na/khyod kyis khyim na mo'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na/can ngan sa mchog las byas pa'i mchod sdong nyid yod kyis/de phyung la gzhol
234a6('dul ba): cig dang de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum las 'khrungs pa'i sku'i tshad ni de yino//bram ze dbang pos bas mos bya/de yang ngo mtshor zhig ste bdag gis lan 'ag
234a7('dul ba): yang ma thos na song ste blta'o snyam nas/de rings pa ri rings par song nas me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i thab kyi 'og tu brko bar brtsams pa las de thams cad du de bzhi
234b1('dul ba): du gyur to//de mngon par dad par gyur nas bsam pa/dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyis/song la bsnyen bkur bya'o//snyam nas/do
234b2('dul ba): dad pa smos te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon tu yong dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /yang dag par mgu
234b3('dul ba): bar 'gyur bI gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang
234b4('dul ba): bzhin thugs chud nas zhes bya ba nas/thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun
234b5('dul ba): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phag so//mngon par 'phagaso//bdag bcom ldan
234b6('dul ba): 'das dang /tshes dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skabasu mchi lags kyis bdag dge snyen du gzung du gsol/de bslan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skabs/
234b7('dul ba): mchi bar mngon par dad lagaso//de nas bram ze dbang po stan las langs te bla gis phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logasu thol
235a1('dul ba): mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag gis cen dAn+ta sa mchog
235a2('dul ba): gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/bram ze gnang gis song la shoms shig/de nas des sa phyogs dben
235a3('dul ba): pa bskabs yod pa zhig tu/rim gro chen pos mchod sdong de bsgreng nus dus mchod chen po bsham so//bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan dag gis kyang /rten dge
235a4('dul ba): bar gyur cig ces bya bar rigs nas/rtsa ku shas btags te bram ze dbang pos mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams pas na/dbang po'i dus mchod ces bya bar
235a5('dul ba): gragaso//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du/cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas/mu stegs can rnams ni sma bkong /lha dang mi rnams ni dgo' bar
235a6('dul ba): mdzad/skye bo dam pa rnams ni yi rangs par mdzad pa de'i tshe/mu stegs can rnams bros nas mtha' khob tu gnas shing kha cig ni bram ze'i grong zhes bya bar
235a7('dul ba): dang nas gon so//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa ni/bram ze'i grong du gsheg so//mu stegs can rnams kyis/dge
235b1('dul ba): sbyong glo'u ta ma 'ong ngo //zhes thos so//thosa? nas kyang rings pa ridri par bram zla dang /khyim badrag rnams kyi khyim du dong ste lcug+na nas smras pa/chos thob par
235b2('dul ba): gyur cig chos thob par gyur cig/de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag de'i zhig/kho bo cag gis khyed kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni mthong gis/ji srid rgud pa mi mthong
235b3('dul ba): ba de'i bar du 'go bar bya'o//de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag bdag cag gi rgud pa gang lags/shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /
235b4('dul ba): spu gri'i ser ba 'bebos shing 'ong ste/bu dang bcas pa dum bu med par 'gyur ro//de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag gang gi tshe kho nas bzhugs shing grogs bgyi
235b5('dul ba): ba la thug pa de kho na'i tshe bzhud pa ni bzang po ma lags te/bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma rung ngo //de rnams kyis smras pa/dam zhig bca' ste/gal te dge sbyong go'u
235b6('dul ba): ta ma gsad na ni 'khor bar bya'o//bzhugs shig bsad par bgyi'o zhes/de rnams lag na dbyug pa dang /gzhu thogs/khu tshur bcangs go bgos te byung ba dang /
235b7('dul ba): lam gyi dbus na shAkya rgan po zhig 'dug pas mthong nas smras pa/shes ldan dag gang du 'dong /de rnams kyis smras pa/dgra gsad pa'i phyir ro//khyod cag gi
236a1('dul ba): dgra su yin/dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o//shes ldan dag gal te/brdos dgra yin na/byas pa gawA ci 'dra ba zhig yI/shrI ldan dag slar log shig/de rnams
236a2('dul ba): ldog tu ma btub pa dang /des bsams po/'di dag ni chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig bya'o snyam
236a3('dul ba): nas/des ri brag su zhugs nas me btang ba dang /ri brags kun tshig nas/ca tso dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sngangs te smras pa/shes
236a4('dul ba): ldan dag bdag cag dang dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni thag ring po kho na yin gyis/ri bregs 'dir ni phung ba chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brags bsregs kyis/me gsad
236a5('dul ba): kyis slar ldog go zhes de rnams kyis bsad par brtsams pa dang /bsad par ma nus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon nas bka' stsal pa/gnas 'jog dag 'di
236a6('dul ba): ci byed/bcom ldan 'das ri brags rnams zhugs kyi zhig na/dgum par rngo mi shog lagaso//ngas bsad dam/bcom ldan 'das mgum du gsol//bcom
236a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gsung phyung mi thag kho nar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams lha'i mthus me de zhi bar gyur to//de rnams mngon par
236b1('dul ba): dad par gyur nas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci zhig gi slad du gshegs lags/khyed cag kho na rje su gzung ba'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsau//
236b2('dul ba): pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/thog ma med pa'i
236b3('dul ba): dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
236b4('dul ba): bzhin du'o//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa shAkya rgan po 'dis nyi du la chags pas/
236b5('dul ba): bsod nams ma lags pa mang du bsagos te/ri brags bsregs pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad de/ji
236b6('dul ba): ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang gnyen la chags pas/bsod nams ma yin pa myang du bsogs te/ri brags bsregs pa de/legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
236b7('dul ba): shig dang bshad do//dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ri brags zhig na spre'u lnga brgya'i tshogs gnas pas/lo tog skyes shing skyes pa rnams chu dag zan to//ri brags na
237a1('dul ba): gnas pa'i smra ba'i tshogs 'dus nas phan tshun du gros bya bar btsems pa/shes ldan dag spren+da rnams kyis lo tog la gnod pa byed na du la
237a2('dul ba): ji ltar bsgrub par bya/gzhan dag gis smras pa/spre'u rnams gsad mod/de rnams ji ltar gsad par bya/ri brags kyi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad de/shing tin
237a3('dul ba): du ka gcig pu zhig bzhag la nye 'khar rnams tsher mas bskor btang /de la bza' ba'i phyir spre'u rnams 'jog par 'gyur te/de ltar gyur tAng der de rnams gsad par
237a4('dul ba): bya'o//de nas de rnams kyis ri brags kyi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de/shing troni tu kA gcig pu gzhag nas nya kor rnams tsher mA'i ra bas bskor te/srungs
237a5('dul ba): ma pa'i mi bzhag nas/bsgo ba khyed kyis gang gi tshe spre'u rnams tshogs pa gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la sbran cig/de nas dus gzhan zhig na shing tin tu ka'i me tog
237a6('dul ba): dang 'bras bu chags te smin pa dang /spre'u rnams kyis sde dro bon+da la smras pa/sde dpon shing tin tu ki smin cing mchis kyis gsol du gshegaso//de nas sde dpon
237a7('dul ba): 'khor lnga brgya dang /shing tin tu ka de la 'dzegs te shing tin tu ka la bza' bar brtsam so//da ninas srungs ma'i mis ri bregs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs la
237b1('dul ba): smras pa/shes ldan dag shing tin tu ka la spre'u thams cad/'dzegs nas/za bar byed kyis khyed cag gi bya ba 'amu byed pa gang yin pa de gyis shig/de nas ri brags na
237b2('dul ba): gnas pa'i skye bo'i chags lag na mda' gzhu deng /dgra sta thogs/khu tshur bcangs te rings par song nas/shing tin tu k+Sha gcad par brtsams pa dang /de nas spre'u de
237b3('dul ba): rnams bred de mchong rgal shing ka phan tshun rgyu bar byed do//sde dpon ni sems las chung ngur za bar byed pa dang /spre'u de rnams kyis de lnga smras pa/ste dpon bdag cag ni sdug
237b4('dul ba): bsngal me 'azad pa nyam nga ba thob cing mchis te/phan tshun du rgyu lags na/khyod ci'i slad du thugs khral chung ngur bzhugs/des tshig su bcad de smras pa/bya ba med pa'i
237b5('dul ba): mi rnams la//bya ba min pa'ang de dang 'dra//shing gi 'phro ni ming yod pa//sems las bskyungs te bza' bar gyis//de nas yang sde dpon gyi phyi gu zhig ri brags
237b6('dul ba): de ni bcings te 'dug pa de log pa 'gram pa lnga btu nas/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug po dang /ji tsam na spre'u bzang po zhig phyog snga der 'ongs pa/de sems
237b7('dul ba): rje su chud pa mthong nas/smras pa grogs po ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gted nas/sems khongasu chud/des smras pa/da ltar ri brags ni gnas pa'i skye bo'i
238a1('dul ba): tshogs thams cad kha bo'i nye du gsod du dong na/ci'i phyir sems khongasu chud par mi 'gyur/ci'i phyir khyod kyis pha rol gnon pa ma byas/bcing
238a2('dul ba): nA dzI ltar pha rol gnon par bya//khyo bos khyod dgrol lo zhes/des de dkrol ba dang /de nas der bregs de me btang ste/ri brags kun tshig byas/tsi tsA dang ku
238a3('dul ba): tso'i sgo chen po byung bad rnams kyis zos nas sbrengs te smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag dang spre'u rnams ni thag ring po kho na yin gyis/phung po chen po gzhan 'di byung ste
238a4('dul ba): ri brabs bsregs kyis mi bsad kyi slar ldogo zhes/de rnams me bsad pa'i phyir brgyugs pa dang /spre'u rnams kyang /shing tin tu kaM las babs nas bros so//dge slong
238a5('dul ba): dag ji snyam sems/spre'u'i phru gu gang yin pa de ni/shAkya rgan po 'di nyid yin te/de ni yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brags bsregs la/da ltar yang 'dis nye du la chags
238a6('dul ba): pas ri bregs bsregs so//nug po'i grong du gshegs nas/nag po'i klong khyer du/sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o//ro hI ta
238a7('dul ba): kar byon nas/ro hi ta ka na gnod sbyin gleng chen stobs kyi gnas na bzhun so//de'i tshe gnod sbyin glang chen stobs gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar song
238b1('dul ba): ba dang /gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis/bcom ldan 'das bskyed par byon nAs ro hi ta kA na/bdag gi gnas kho nan bzhugs zhes thos//thos nas kyang /bcom ldan
238b2('dul ba): 'drag la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lo mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug gi/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan
238b3('dul ba): 'das kyis gnod sbyini gling chen stobs lnga/tshes dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag por ston por mjed/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/yang dag
238b4('dul ba): par rab tu dga' bor mdzad nas cang mi gsung zhes bye ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
238b5('dul ba): gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyor ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de mod bdag gi gan su bzhugs
238b6('dul ba): pArar+ya gnang bar mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen sgribs la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo //de nas gnod sbyin glang chen gyis/bcom ldan 'das

246b5('dul ba): phyi'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsom ldan 'das kyi klu gdug pa dang /gnod sbyini gdug pa de dang de rnams ni btul lags na/btsun pa gnod sbyin
246b6('dul ba): mo mdung can zhes bgyi ba 'dri bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas sha ma mchis par sha khron du bgyis/bgran zla ma lags par ni mgran zla bgyid glags ma btsal
246b7('dul ba): bar ni glags tshol bar bgyid de/byis pa bcas shing bcas pa rnams 'brog par bgyid lags na/kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/gnod
247a1('dul ba): sprin mo mdung can gdul bar gsol/de'i tshe gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor de nyid du 'dus shid 'dug par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das
247a2('dul ba): kyis gnod spyan mo mdung can l-I bka' stsal pa/mdung can khyod kyis zlos sam/bcom ldan 'das ba dag gis thos lag so/mdung can khyod kyis thos sam/
247a3('dul ba): bde bar gshegs pa bdag gA grol gso//dam pa mi yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log shig/btsun pa dum zhig bcus te/gal te 'di dag bdag cag gi skad
247a4('dul ba): dudrugatsug lag khang rtsig par bgyid na bdag ldog par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdung tsan+d+ra gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams lnga bka
247a5('dul ba): skyel pa/bram ze dang khyim bdag khyed kyis thos sam/bcom ldan 'das thos ldeg so//khyed cig gis je lhor bsgrub par bya/bcom ldan 'das brtsig lag
247a6('dul ba): so//bde bar gshogs pa brtsegs lag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor dang bcas tI brtul nas gshegaso//'bru
247a7('dul ba): gocan du gshegs pa dang /'bra go nA na byis pa chung ngu dag cig rdul gyi mchod rten la spro bar byed do//bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa chung ngu dag rdul
247b1('dul ba): mchod rten la rtse ba gzig s+ho//glu bigs nas kyang /yang gdod sbyin lag na rdu la bak+Sha stsal pa/lcag na rdo rje khyod kyis byas pa chung ngu rdul gyi mchod rten la rdzo ba dag
247b2('dul ba): mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so//lag na rdo rje nga yongasu mya ngani las 'das nus lo bzhi brgya lon pa dang /'dir ku sha nA'i rigs kyi rgyal po ka nis ka zhes
247b3('dul ba): bya ba 'byung ba 'gyur ba des phyogs 'dir mchod rten brtsigs par 'gyur te/de'i ming ka nI skra'i mchod rten zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing /nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das na yang
247b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyis bya ba byed par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro ha ti ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma mod kyi gnas kyi bar du srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang
247b5('dul ba): 'bum phrog bdun btu l-i nas/r-i ha ta kar gshegs te/gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas/nang du yang dag bzhag/bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang /
247b6('dul ba): dge 'jog las bzhed nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dang po'i rgyal srid gang gang na bar 'dong //da nas bcom ldan 'das
247b7('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces go sol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ni 'di skrod ces/kun dga' bo byang phyogasu klu'i rgyal po sog ma med
248a1('dul ba): 'brug du 'dong /byang phyogs nA ni phan yon rnam pa lnga yod do zhes gsungs la/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du kun dga' bo dang ngo
248a2('dul ba): rgyal srid gang na ba deng 'dong ngo zhes gsungs na/de ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dge' bo nga gnod sbyin lag ni rdo rje dang thabs gcig
248a3('dul ba): tu byang phyogasu gshegs nas/ta ma sa'i tshal rnams lung bstan to//zhes bya ba nas/rdul gyis mchod rten lung bstan to//zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//kun dga' bo ro hI ta ka nas
248a4('dul ba): klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pas/srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang /'bum phrag bdun btul to//byang phyogs na ni nyes dmigs lnga
248a5('dul ba): yod//mthon dman can dang /sdong du ma dang /tsher mas gang ba dang /rdo ba dang /gsogs ma dang /gyo mo mang ba dang /khyi za ba dang /bud med gan+da ngan len kun tu spyod
248a6('dul ba): pa'o//sdom lnga/dang po'i rgyal skyed rta bzangs dang //bcom brlag dang ni o la ta'i//kun dga' ra ba dag mtha' dang //tshugs par dka' dang gang+gA'i chu//yi dgaso dus
248a7('dul ba): dpog phyi ma yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das yul dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/dang po'i rgyal srid du gshegs nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das
248b1('dul ba): kyis rgyu dang ldan pa kun dga' blo lnga bkA sprul pa/kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bkur ba/dang por rgyu lta srid kyi dbang bsgyur bas dbang bad+mar
248b2('dul ba): bya de ni dang po'i rgyal po yin no//de'i phyir 'di dang ba'i rmyi lha skyed ces bya bar glagaso//d+hU bzung stsa gshegs nas/de na co ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dge'
248b3('dul ba): bo la bka' stsal pA/kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bskur ba'i rta bzang po rin po che byung ste/de'i phyir 'di rta bzangs zhes bya bar glegaso//de nas
248b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo bcom brlag gang na der dong /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tsha lA zhes/tshe dang ldan
248b5('dul ba): pa kun dka' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/de nas bcom ldan 'das bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na/
248b6('dul ba): tshalnga ste zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis tshal spro zhing spro ba sbyangs
248b7('dul ba): pa'i mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so//kun dga' ba de nimatshan zhes bya ste/nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas po brgya lon pa dang /das brla/
249a1('dul ba): nas gar mkhan dang /dpa' bo zhes bya ba spun gnyis kyis de la gtsug lag khang brtsig par 'gyur te/de ming gar mkhan dpa'/
249a2('dul ba): bo zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing lhag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi rjesu 'thun pa'i gnas mal rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo bcom brlag 'dir spos 'tshong gi khye'u
249a3('dul ba): sbas pa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/de'i bu nye sbas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi mtshan med pa zhig byung ba de/da yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang
249a4('dul ba): bstan pa l-i rab tu byung nas/sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyuraro//dge slong kun dga' ba'i lhan cig gnas pa nyi mo'i gung zhes bya bas nyo spras de rab tu 'byin par
249a5('dul ba): 'gyur te/gdams ngag ston pa rnams kyi phyi ma ni nya sbas yin par 'gyuraro//gar mkhan dpa' bo de la phug srid du 'khru btsa brgya dang /zheng du khru gnyis pa/'phang
249a6('dul ba): du khru bdun pa zhig yod par 'gyur te/de so gang dang gang dag la gdams ngag bstan nas/des bcom pa mngon sum du byas pa de dang de rnams kyis/thur ma sor bzhi
249a7('dul ba): tsam par re phug de'i nang du 'dor bar bya'o//gang gi tshe phug te/dgra bcom pa'i thur mas gang bar gyur pa de'i tshe/nye sras yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/de yod
249b1('dul ba): su mya ngan las 'das nas dgra bcom pa'i thur ma de dag nyid spungs nas/de rnams kyis sreg par byed//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad bcod pasangs/
249b2('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'dra la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa nA skye bo meng po la snying brtse ba tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas lung bstan pa la gzigs/bcom ldan
249b3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de'i tsher ma zud/ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na/kyi bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa de legs par rab tu nyon
249b4('dul ba): la yid la zung shig dang bshad do//dge slong dag ston byung ba ri rtse mthon po nyid kyi dngos gsum la rang sangs rgyas dang /drang srong dong spre'u rnams gnas te/ngos gcig
249b5('dul ba): na ni rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya'o//gnyis pa la ni drang srongad lnga brgya'o//gsum pa la ni spre'u lnga brgya'o//spre'u'i sde dpon gyi kun tu spyod pa ni spre'u'i phru gu btsas pa dag
249b6('dul ba): gsod par byed pa yin no/de nas spra mo de dag phru gu'i mye dron gyis non pas/phun tshun bres bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan sgra mo dag nyon cig/bdag cag gi phru
249b7('dul ba): gu brtsas shing btsas pa dag sde dpon 'dis gsod par byed kyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya ste/bdag cag lase sgra mo gang zhig sbram par gyur na/des
250a1('dul ba): sde dpon la brjod par mi bya'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na sgyu mo zhig sbrum par gyur nas/de de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig
250a2('dul ba): du sbas nus rtsu ba dang 'bras bus snyed sbru'u'i phru gu byung nas/de yang de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu bsnun gsos bskyed do/de gang gi tshe chen por
250a3('dul ba): gyur pa de'i tshe/des sde dpon de rang gi khyu nas bskrad nas/ri bo rtse mthon na phan tshun du 'khyam bar brtsams so//de 'khyam pa no rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra thos
250a4('dul ba): nas/de de rnams kyi drung du song ste/gang gi cha bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/de rnams la rtsa ba dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /sro shing dag
250a5('dul ba): 'dul bar byed do//de rnams kyis kyang de la lhung bzed kyi lhag pa dag 'dor bar byed par byed do//rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni zod shing zos
250a6('dul ba): nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go//spre ru des kyang de rnams kyi spyod lam mthong nas//skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug go/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs
250a7('dul ba): rgyas de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag gi lus rnag can 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa ni thob zin gyis/bdag cag gis mya ngan las 'das hUM
250b1('dul ba): dbyingasu 'jugo snyam nas/de rnams 'bar ba dang /gsal ba dang /char 'bebs pa dang /glog 'byin pa'i tshe 'phrul dag byas nas/phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
250b2('dul ba): 'odra bI dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de rnams ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de'i tshe mi ldang nas/spre'u de rnams ma mthong bas mi dga' bar gyur to//ji tsam na
250b3('dul ba): spre'u de phyog tu zhugaso nas/rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyi chos gos rnams nas bsig pa brtsam so//de nas phug de na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te//
250b4('dul ba): spre'u 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi sku bshig no mi rung ngo snyam nas rdo lebra chen pos sgo bcad nas 'dug go/de nas spre'u de mya dran dang /sdug bsngal dang /smre sngags
250b5('dul ba): bton te song nas/ri bo rtsi mthon la kun nas 'khyim pa na/mi rnams 'dod pas mi dga' bar gyur te/rna ba gtod cing mi'i sgra thos pare 'dod pa lis/des
250b6('dul ba): drang srong de rnams smra ba'i sgra dag thos nas//de 'don pa lamra stor ba bzhin du rings pa rings par de rnams kyi drung du song ngo //drang srong de dag kyang dka' thub drag pos
250b7('dul ba): gdung bar byed do//kha cig ni lag pa bsgreng nas 'dug go//kha cig ni rkang pa ya cig giso//kha cig ni gdung ba lngas//gdung bar byed do//gang gi tshe spre'u de de rnams
251a1('dul ba): dang lhan cig bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/drang srong de rnams la rtsa ba dang /la ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /so shing dag sbron
251a2('dul ba): bar byed do//de rnams kyang de la zas kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do//des de rnams kyi spyod lam bkrugs shing /rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam ston par byed do//de
251a3('dul ba): na gang dag lag pa bsgreng ba de rnams kyi lag pa dag phab nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste sbran nas/mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go//gang dag rkang pa ya gcig pa de
251a4('dul ba): rnams kyi rkang pa phab nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug/gang dag gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed pa de rnams kyis me bsad nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste/mdun du skyil
251a5('dul ba): mo krung bcas te 'dug go/de nas drang srong de rnams kyis gdams ngag 'bogs pa la smras pa/mkhan po spre'u 'di bdag cag gi dka' thub la byar chad bgyid do//
251a6('dul ba): zhes de rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang /des smras pa/shes ldan dag spre'u de dag ni dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/gdon mi za bar 'dis drang srong kha cig gi spyod
251a7('dul ba): lam de lta bu mthong gis/khyed cag gis kyang skyil mo krung chos la 'dug shig/de rnams kyis skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang /de rnams sngon gyi dge slo
251b1('dul ba): rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur nas/de rnams kyis mkhan po dang /slob dpon med pa'i shes pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'thun pa'i chos bskyed nas/rang
251b2('dul ba): byang chub mngon sum du byaso//de nas de rnams spre'u de la chos las byung ba'i dad pa skyes nas/de rnams kyi ljongs nas bsod snyoms lo thog sar pa dang /'bras bu sar
251b3('dul ba): pa dang /dus sar gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams las de la thog mar byin nas//bdog nyid longs spyod par byed//ji tsam du gzhan zhig na spre'u de dus las 'das so//de rang
251b4('dul ba): byang chub de rnams kyis/yul khams dang phyogs sna tshogs na yod pa'i shing dri zhim po rnams blangs te/shing dri zhim po thams cad kyi su phung por spungs nas bsreg so//
251b5('dul ba): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/rang byang chub rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas pa'i spre'u gang yin pa de ni nye sras 'di nyid yin te/'di de'i tshe yang skye bo mang po la phan pa'i
251b6('dul ba): phyir zhugaso//da ltar na yang ngas 'di skye ba mang po la phan pa dang /snying brtse bar lung bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa
251b7('dul ba): no bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang /bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis/dge slong gau'u ta ma bcom brlag tu phyin nas de shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag pa/
252a1('dul ba): 'dod de/'chad par byed/'dogs par byed/rab tu 'jog par byed/rnam par 'jog par byed/byed brag du 'byed par byed/gsal bar
252a2('dul ba): byed/ston par byed/yang dag par rab tu bston par byed do//zhes thos nas/gal te de bcom brlag tu 'dug nAM/bodag gi rnyed po dang /bkur bsti'i bar
252a3('dul ba): tshod du 'gyur la/de ni bkur bsti ma yin pas skrag ces grag gis/gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur bsti ma yin pa byas na/de lta na de bcom brlag tu 'dug
252a4('dul ba): par mi 'gyur ro//gal te de la mi smad rims kyis bkur bsti ma yin par byas na ngo mtshar du ma yin pa byas ni ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin gyi/gal te de la skyes bu
252a5('dul ba): gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur bsti ma yin pa byas na/des ni legs par 'gyur na/bdag cagau gi nang na skyes bu gtso bo su zhig yod snya mo//de'i
252a6('dul ba): tshe bcom brlag na bram ze sngor tshwa bya ba ri byed/rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed pa/pha rol gyi rgol ba tshar gcod par
252a7('dul ba): nus pa/de'i tshig bden pa'i rje su 'brang ba zhig yod do//de nas bcom brlig gi bram ze rnam 'dus shing tshogs te/sngor gyur gyi drung du song nas/
252b1('dul ba): mkhan po 'dir dge sbyong gau'u tA ma mchis nas/de shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba nus yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do zhes thos shes bya ba ni
252b2('dul ba): bar grong ma bzhin du'o//de na bkur bsti ma yin pas skrag/zhes gda' na/gal te 'ga' zhig gis bkur bsti ma ljags pa bgyis na/de lta de bcom bai rlag
252b3('dul ba): tu mchis par mi 'gyur ro//gal te dri la mi smad rims kyis bkur bsti ma lags bu bgyis na/ngo mcher du mi 'dzin gyi/grul te de la skyes bu gtso ba 'ga'
252b4('dul ba): zhig gis bkur bisti ma lugs pa bgyis na/legs par 'gyur na bdag cag gi skyes bu gtso bo mkhan po ma lagasA pA su zhig mchis/khyed kyisra de la
252b5('dul ba): bkur bsti ma lags pa'i tshig gis rgya lcag gi spyo bar gsol/sngor gyur gyis smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag gi lce 'di ni bden pa'i rje su 'brang ba yin te/
252b6('dul ba): gal te smyo bar 'os pa zhig na spro'o//'on te bstod par 'os pa zhig na bya stod do//de nas bram ze sngor gyur/bcom brlag na gnas po'i bram ze rgan rabs
252b7('dul ba): dran yas rnams kyis mdun du bdor nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba na/bram ze sngor gyur gyis rgyang ring po kho na nis/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes
253a1('dul ba): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis
253a2('dul ba): brgyan pa/'od zer nyi ma sbyong bas lhag pa/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun bzang ba/shing drung zhig na rten cing zhi ba'i spyod lamau gyis bzhags pa mthong //mdzo
253a3('dul ba): nas kyang ya mtshan skyes te mig baglang de bltas nas bstod par brtsams pa/lus dang ngag dang dbang por bcas pa yi//yid kyis tshul bzhin rtse gcig bgyis
253a4('dul ba): nas ni//yon tan+da rang bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho che//khyod kyi yon tan phyogs gcig brjod par bgyi//smra ba rnams kyi dam pa rab mchog lags//
253a5('dul ba): skyon med dbang po shin tu mnyam par bzhag/pha rol rgol ba brtson pa thams cad kyis//don dam thugasu tshu da la bskyod mi nus//khyod kyi spyod pa shin tu
253a6('dul ba): rdzogs pa nyid//brtul zhugs bsgrub pas brtul zhugs shin tu rdzogs//stobs ldan khyod kyi ting 'dzin zad med pas//sred mi dbu dang ri yi rgyal
253a7('dul ba): pi bzhin//skyes bu khyi mchog khyod la gnod mi mang //mi zhum bsnyings pa me mnga' dubo mo mnga'//'byung po rnams la'ang mi bzod 'ga' mi mnga'/
253b1('dul ba): khyod nam chags 'thab pa gA la mnga'//brtags pa med cing ha cang zhum mi mnga'//gdung ba med cing dgyes pa dang yod mi mnga'//ri yi bdag po lhun po rab brtan ltar/
253b2('dul ba): khyod kyi thugs ni rtags tu dge ba nyid//thub pa skyes mchog khams rnams thams cad nas//khyod kyi ye shes yangs pa sgrib mi mnga'//skye mched rnams pa sde chags
253b3('dul ba): dag yi ni/ma thogs nyams shing zad pa med por 'jug/thub pa khyod la gang la'ang som nyi med//yid gnyis yod min the tshom yod mo yin/khyod nyid kyis ni
253b4('dul ba): mchog dang mchog min pa//rigasas thug su chud nas thams cad mkhyen//mthong na dgra' bar 'gyur la mthong na lugs//mthong na legs pas mthong na mkhas
253b5('dul ba): bdaga'//khyod la dga' dang mi dga' mnyam pason/rtag tu dga' bo'i spyod lam de bzhin mdzad//khyod ni snyam pa'i spobs par ldan pa lags//'dzum pa'i
253b6('dul ba): gsung dang dran ldan bsnyengs pa med//mkhas rnams 'dod pa rab tu 'chad pas na//'jig rten gsum du khyod kyi grags pa 'byung //mi dang lha dang lha mi ne gnod
253b7('dul ba): sbyin dang /srin po mang dang 'jig rten 'dir mkhas dag/thub pa'i drung du yang dang yang lhag nas//khyod la yang dang yang zhu mi bzod med//khyod ni snyam pa'i gsu
254a1('dul ba): gis dga' mdzad pas//mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang //srin po yid gnyis bsal rnams thub pa che/khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal slar
254a2('dul ba): mchi'o//bzhengs dang bzhugs dang gshegs dang bzhud pa dang /mnal dang mi gsung yang na gsung ba'am//'on te lhung bzed chos gis bsnams po dag/go'u
254a3('dul ba): ta ma khyod kyi thams cad mdzes pa nyid//thogs pa med mtha' mi myur mnyam pas na//gsung ni snyan pa'i yon tA ni rnams dang ldan//mi yi mchog ni dus su
254a4('dul ba): gsung bas na/gsung gi zlos pa rnam par spangs pa lags//'jig rten na ni stobs dang ldan par grags/skyes bu mkhyen pa skyes bu khyu mchog gci//'jig/
254a5('dul ba): rten lhar bcas 'di ni mtha' dag la//nga rgyal mi mda' khyad du gsad mi mdzod//mdzelnga ba dang ni mdza' be ma lagos dang //'thun pa dang ni 'thun po ma lags dang //
254a6('dul ba): g.yo dang mi g.yo rang bzhin gnas pa la//ngo mtshar 'dzin pa na mA yang mi mnga'o//smre sngags 'don cing snying brtser smra ba dang //kha chu 'jig pas nyam thag
254a7('dul ba): skad 'byin dang //yongasu gdungs dang rnam par gdung ldan dang //'jigs dang rims nas mya ngan gyis nyen po/sdug bsngal rnam pa brgya yi gtses pa dang //yun//
254b1('dul ba): ring nas nI mgon med bde ba med//srid pa'i sred par zhugs shing mun bsgribs pa'i//'gro ba 'khrugs bA la ni rab gzigs nas//bdag nyid rnam mi sna tshogs
254b2('dul ba): mthu dag gis/thub pa thugs rje chen po 'jug mdzad cing /shAkya skyes kyi mchog ni khyod nyid kyis//phongs padz+ra gyu ri rnams dgrol phyir brtson pa mdzod//srid pa'i sdug
254b3('dul ba): bsngal rgyu dang bcas 'di dang //srid pa'i sdug bsngal zad la gang yin dang //srid po'i sdug bsngal 'gog por 'gro bya yi//lem+bu ni mchud pa med pa khyod kyis bshAd//
254b4('dul ba): rnam par 'dren pa chen po brtson 'grus che//rab mchog pha rol smra ba rnams kyi mchog/'jig rten gsum na khyod mtshungs ma mchis na//khyod las lhag par
254b5('dul ba): lta zhig ga la mchis//khyod la khong khro rje su chags mi mnga'//thub pa khyod la yongasu zad mi mengs sdug+h+r-i nan+de 'grel dring rtsod pa brtul bzhugs bzang /khyod
254b6('dul ba): la mi mnga' rtag tu mi mnga' l-igs//thub pa sdug dang mi sdug bde ba dang //sdug bsngal mnyam dngo de bzhin mi mnyam spangs//dga' dang mi dgal ba dag bad+mo///
254b7('dul ba): mdzad do//yang dag bsdams shing 'di na nyer zhi spyod//smad pa byas kyang gnod pa mi mngare la//rab tu bsngags pas khengs par mi 'gyur bas/grags pa
255a1('dul ba): grags pa ma yin khyod la mnyam//grang chen mtsho bar ldan pa 'phul do ru//'dor ba drag du 'phyangs pa'i mda' dag ltar//skye bo sdig can
255a2('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa yi//tshigs ngan tshi gau rtsub dag kyang bzod par mdzad//drang srong khyod snyan gsung zhing tshig kyang bzod//shin tu ngan du smras kyang mi bzod med//smad
255a3('dul ba): par smras sam dge bar smras kyang rung //thug pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa lags//mchod 'os rtag par mi dang lha dag dang /lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams dang
255a4('dul ba): ni/drang srong bdag nyid chen pos rtag mchod na//khyod ni thugs brtan gzhan du 'gyur mi mnga'//'di bas bdag mchog ces kyang rlom mi mnga'//'di bas
255a5('dul ba): bdag chung zhes kyang rlom mi mnga'//bdag ni 'di dag mnyam zhes mi rlom pas//khyod la nga rgyal rnam pa ga sum mi mnga'//brtan dang ldan la bong ba gser
255a6('dul ba): dang mtshungs//bai DUr+ya dang gseg ma gyo mor mtshungs//thub pa chen po lha dang bcas pa yi//'gro ba 'di ni rtswa shing 'dra bar spyod//zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer dang
255a7('dul ba): phran nas//grang dang che ba'i rlung dag langs na yang //ri yi dbang po lta bur bzod mdzad//thugs brtan khyod la rab tu gnod mi mnga'//bzims cha dang
255b1('dul ba): ni smad gnan bshos dang ni/bla gos sham thabs rnam pa sna tshogs dag/thub pu zug med sor brtags nus ni//de yi don tu ston par mdzad pa lags//mgon po
255b2('dul ba): bdag la med ces thugs dran mong //ma bcings legs gsungs bdag gir mdzan mi mnga'//glanod pa sna tshogs dag lasayongs su g+hol//brnyed pa brnyed na'ang
255b3('dul ba): dgyes pAr mi 'gyur la//de me brnyed pas kyang ni zhum mi 'gyur//khyed du gsod pa gzod pa mdzad cing 'dir//bkur byesti dag la'ang chags pa mi mnga' legs//lta
255b4('dul ba): gnas ri yi ngos las 'khrungs pA yi//khrag ltar dmar ba'i tsan dan mchog dag drang /mda' dang ral gri rnon pos khyed kyi thugs//lan 'ga' yang ni 'gyur
255b5('dul ba): ba mnga' lagasra//don med gtam ni gsung bar mi mdzad gang /skye bo ngan pas bstan pa'i gtam ma lags/rnyed pa'i gtom mi ni zang zing bcas grata ma min ba dag
255b6('dul ba): nyid che rnams mi 'dod mi lags kyis//gtam gang bar dben bde ba skyed byed cing /rab tu zhi ba 'ga' zhig rab brjod pa/lha las 'das pa'i gtam ni gang dag
255b7('dul ba): cigagasung na sdig pa rnam par 'dul ba gsung //snyan pa rnams dang 'brel pa dang //legs par bshad dang snying por ldan pa yi//rnam par nges pa'i
256a1('dul ba): gtam dag thub pa che//'gro bI don slad rab tu gsung bar mdzad//mi mkhas dgu dang log par lha rnams dang /gzu lums can dang dga'
256a2('dul ba): bar ldan rnams dang //phra ma can dang tshig rtsub rgyu can gang //de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen//mi ni gang dag drang zhing sgyu med pa//bden la
256a3('dul ba): dga' zhing dbang po thul ba dang /rtag tu legs par brtags nas byed pa ni//de dang lhan cig bcomo ldan khyod mi rkyen//chos mkhyen luge snga mkhyen gang zag
256a4('dul ba): mkhyen pa dang //drug po mngon mkhyen khyed la rtag phyag 'tshal//thub pa zhi mkhyen mchog dang mchog min mkhyen//tshul dang tshul min mkhyen khyod mgos phyag
256a5('dul ba): 'tshol//khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rgya chen legs mthong nas//bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig yongasu brjod par bas//'phags pa khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i
256a6('dul ba): pha rol ni//rtogs par rngo thog 'gro ba'i nang na mi ma michis//de lta bu la sogs pa bstod pa lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/de ltar mngon par dad par
256a7('dul ba): gyur pa dang /bcom ldan 'ad kyi sngor gyur ji ltar stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i cho se bshad pa mdzad do//de nas bram ze sngor gyur
256b1('dul ba): gyis bcom ldan 'das la bskyod nas skyong ste/de lam du zhugs pa na bac+doMm brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis tshig gi rgyu lcags kyis bag pa las thal ba tsam du brgyad de//
256b2('dul ba): mkhan po khyod la khro bo nAg gis dge sbyong gau'u ta ma lA bkur bsti ma yin pa byos shig ces smras ni/khyed de bzod ltar bstod bstod de 'od ngam/shes ldan dag
256b3('dul ba): khro bos sbyor kho bo'i lce ni bden pa'i rjesu 'byung ba yin te/gal te smad par 'os pa zhig ni smad la/bstod par 'os pa zhig na bstod do//zhes sngar ma smras sam/
256b4('dul ba): dge sbyong gi'u ta ma ni bskyod par 'os pas kho bos bstod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs banabs/lhung bzed chos gyis bsnabs nas
256b5('dul ba): bco mo brlag tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /de'i tshe bcom brlag na rgyu skare gyi nub mo la bab bo//de nas bcom brlag na ga nus pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de
256b6('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma bcom brlab tu 'ongs na/bdag gi rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bar chad byed par 'gyur snyam du bsams nas/bcom
256b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sgren mor byung nas 'dug go/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha mo shig bud med ni shin tu bkab kyang bzang ba ma yin na/sbyin
257a1('dul ba): mau lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas lha mau de skyongs nas phyogs gcig tu song ngo //de na sra bcom ldan 'das kyi l-i las gzur te/dge
257a2('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung li gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//bzhugs nas btsomya ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams lI bka' stsal pa/dge
257a3('dul ba): slong dag bcom brlag na ni nyes dmigs lnga po 'di dag yod do//lnga gang zhe na/mtho nu de man dang /sdong du ma dang /tsher mas gang ba dang /
257a4('dul ba): rdo ba dang /gseg mA dang /gyo mo mang ba dang /dgongs ka za ba dang /bud med mang ba yino//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma glashegasra par bcom
257a5('dul ba): bArlagu gi gnodA sbyin bong bu'i gnas gung na bya de ldogasu gshegs te byon nas/gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas byul te/shing drung zhig tu rten cing
257a6('dul ba): nyin mo'i gnas pa'i phyir bzhugaso//de'i tshe gnod sbyin breng bu'i gzugasu byas nas 'phyan po dang /de la khye'u dang /bu mo dgra zhon pa dang /des
257a7('dul ba): de dag rtser bcug/dgo' bar byed du bcug nas/nags thib por song nas za bar byed pas/de'i ming gnod sbyin po mugani chu ni bong puMSh+pe bya ba grag so//bcom
257b1('dul ba): brlag gi bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las/lha mo zhig gis tho brtsams pas//
257b2('dul ba): bcom brlag tu ma gshegs par gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnasu gsheg so//zhes thos so//thos nas kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba drang bca' ba dag so so
257b3('dul ba): nas snod du btsos shing bsdogs te/shing brtar bcug nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der drong ste lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la bgo blo
257b4('dul ba): phyag byis te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi sde bcom brlag gi bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can rnams
257b5('dul ba): la chos dang ldan po'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsungo zhes bya ba'i byar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bram ze
257b6('dul ba): dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams stan las longs te/bla gos phrag pA gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang no bA de log su thul mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom
257b7('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du/'dir gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bca' bo dang /bza' ba dag gri
258a1('dul ba): shing rta bkang ste 'tshal to mtshos na/bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/de bzhi su gsol/de nas bcom ldan
258a2('dul ba): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song le gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na/dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de
258a3('dul ba): dag thams cad rim gro'i gan su bsdus shig/bsod snyoms yongasu longs spyod du gzhug/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/tshe dang ldan pa kun dag
258a4('dul ba): bos bcomu ldan 'das kyi ltar many+dzan nas//gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na/dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gan su bsamra
258a5('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su song ste byon pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag bya ste phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig
258a6('dul ba): tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas ni/dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten ci
258a7('dul ba): mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnasu bsogs lags te/bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus pa bab par dgongasu gsal/de nas bcom ldan 'das rim
258b1('dul ba): gro'i gnas gal ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze dang /khyim
258b2('dul ba): byed ba dad pa can rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rigs nas zhes bya ba nas/phyag gnyis bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu bar
258b3('dul ba): rlig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khor nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po bcom ldan 'das
258b4('dul ba): kyi klu gdug po dang /gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang /de rnams ni btu lpags ni/btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu'i 'di bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas/sha kho na ma mchis
258b5('dul ba): par ni sha kho na bgyid/mo phran zla ma lags par ni mgran zla bgyid/glags mA btsal ba ni g+ha Da ro b+h+r-i d+hi bus kyang tsunra shing badz+ra shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyis lags
258b6('dul ba): na/kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/gnod sbyin bong bu btul ba ri gsol//de'i tshe gnod sbyin bor bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug
258b7('dul ba): par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin po'i tshul bka' stsal pa/bong bu khyod kyis thos sam/bcom ldan 'daskye bdag gis thos legs so//
259a1('dul ba): bong bu khyod kyis thos sam+ba/bde byar gra shogs pa bdag gis thos laglas//dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa las log shog/bcom
