259a2('dul ba): ldan 'das gal te bdag gi slad du/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs par dam 'cha' bar bgyid na bdag ldog go/de nas bcom
259a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la bka' stsal pa/bram ze dang khyim bdag khyed cag gos thos sam/bcom ldan
259a4('dul ba): 'dres thos lags te brtsig go/de nas bcom ljon 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor lnga brgya dang btul to//bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can rnams/
259a5('dul ba): de'i ched du btsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigaso//de bzhin du gnod sbyin mda' can dang /gnod sbyin nags ldan dang /gnod sbyin mo bslangs rnyed ma dang /mchu//
259a6('dul ba): rnams btul to//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis btsam bro rlag tu zhugs//zhugs nos gnod sbyin mo mgrin zla ma 'khor lnga brgya btul nas dri'i don
259a7('dul ba): du gtsug lag khA lnga rgya brtsig so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi nang dang /phyi rol du gnod sbyin nyis stod lnga brgya btul nas de'i ched du
259b1('dul ba): bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis bcug lag nyis spyang lnga brgyud rtsigs//de nas bcom ldan 'das oM tA la rA gshegs te/oM t+pa la na oMt+ta
259b2('dul ba): lce'i nags khrod na bzhugs//de nas bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu i ta le'i bu zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig gnas/zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar
259b3('dul ba): ro//dri nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' shams thubs banub sa/lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/o ta la ro bsod snyoms la zhugs po dang /phyogs
259b4('dul ba): gzhan zhig nA zhing pa lnga brgya tsam mgo bo rdul gyis yog cing shana'i rus kyis smad g.yogs nas zhing rnyed pa las zhing pa de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
259b5('dul ba): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/gzi brjid kyis mdzes par mthong ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnaMs la chos
259b6('dul ba): bshad pas zhes bya ba nas mchod pa bya ba dang /rjed pa bya ba dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de nas smod pa stong po de dag gnya' shing dang /ru dag bcad nas/
259b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su dong ste lhogs nas/bcom ldan 'das la yongasu bskor te 'dug go/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig gsum gyi
260a1('dul ba): chos bshad pa dang /rgyal cha nu bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyes nas zhes bya ba nas/bden pa mthong nas rang gi gan su dong ngo zhes bya
260a2('dul ba): ba'i bar du'o//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa zhing pa lnga brgya po
260a3('dul ba): 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/lus de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnam su gyur nas/dbul po'i khyim rnamasu skyes shing 'di rnams ni smod par
260a4('dul ba): gyur lags//dge slong dag 'di rnams kyi las byas shing bsogs pa zhes bya bar rgyas par sbyar te/'di rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
260a5('dul ba): ga bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin te/'di rnams kyis de na le los dus 'das par byas pa so las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnamasu gyur to//smon
260a6('dul ba): pA 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid la rab tu byung nas bslab pa'i bzhi phra mo phra mo rnams la gus par ma byas pas lus de rnam par smin bras dud 'gro rnams skye so//
260a7('dul ba): 'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba gang yon pa de'i las kyis rnam par smin pas nga les 'din pa
260b1('dul ba): mthong bar byaso//dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba brgyas par sbyar//bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bus oM tA la'i bus dge sbyong
260b2('dul ba): shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spyi bregs te/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par No gro bI byang chub mngon
260b3('dul ba): rdzogs bAs s+ya na/dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /o ta lar byon nas/oM ta li'i nags khrod na bzhugs te/shes ldan dge sbyong go'u ta me de'i dge
260b4('dul ba): ba dang /grags pa dang /sgra dang /tshig su bcad pa brgya chen po 'od dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshomasu grags par gyur te/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin
260b5('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i khwa lo
260b6('dul ba): sbyar ba bla na myed pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas/tshangs pa dang bcas pa 'di
260b7('dul ba): skye dgu dge sbyong dang /bram zer bcas/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa rnam la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas
261a1('dul ba): bdag gis zag pa zad do//tshangs par spyod pa sten+na to/bya ba byas//'di las srid pa gzhan mi sheso zhes go bar byed cing //de chos
261a2('dul ba): bshad pa ni thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzong ngo /ma 'dres pa/yong su rdzogs pa/yongasu dge ba/rnam par
261a3('dul ba): byung ba 'ba' zhig ston to zhes thos nas/dge sbyong dang bram ze de lta bu lta ba ni legs pa yin/nye bar 'gro ba ni legs pa yin/bsnyen bkur byed pa na legs pa yin//
261a4('dul ba): no snyams du bsams nas/shring rta rta rgod mo dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te/bram ze'i khye'u tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing /bram
261a5('dul ba): ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas/gu ser gyi khar ba dang /rI ba spyi blugs thogs te/oM ta la nA sau byung nus bcom ldan 'das la blta ba
261a6('dul ba): dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/de ji tsamyo bzhon pa'i si'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/bye zhon pa las babs te/
261a7('dul ba): rkang pa kho nas kun dgo' ra bo'i nang du zhugs nas/bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu o ta la bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su song ste phyin nas
261b1('dul ba): bcom ldan du dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam bya sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug//
261b2('dul ba): phyogs gecig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu o tA les 'di skad ces gsol to//kye go'u ta ma dbang po lnga po/spyod yul
261b3('dul ba): tha drad pa dang /yul tha dad pa can rang rang gi spyod yul dang /yul nyamu su myong bar 'gyur gyi/gzhan gyi spyod yul dang /yul gzhan nyam su myong bar mi 'gyur
261b4('dul ba): ba 'di lta ste/mig gi dbang po dang /rna ba'i dbang po dang /sna'i dbang po dang /lce'i dbang po dang /lus kyi dbang po dang /gang dag lags pa de rnams kyi spyod
261b5('dul ba): yul dang /yul nyam su myong par bgyid pa grang lags/de rnams kyi ston pa yang gang lags/bram ze dbang po dang /spyod yul tha dad pa dang /yul tha
261b6('dul ba): dad pa 'di lta ste/myig gau dribang po dang /rna ba'i dbang po dang /sna'i dbang po dang /lce'i dbang po dang /lus kyi dbang po gang dag yin pa de rnams kyi spyod yul
261b7('dul ba): dang /yul nyam su myong ba yid yin no//de rnams kyi ston pa yang yid yino//kye go'u te ma yid kyi ston pa gang lags/bram ze yid kyi rton pa ni dran pa yin///
262a1('dul ba): k+Shu kaun+na tA ma dran pa'i rton pa gang lags/bram ze dran pa'i skyon pA n+yA dan b+ha nye bar gzhag pa ban+d+ha na no//kau& tA mA dun
262a2('dul ba): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ston pa glang lags/bram ze dran pa dran pa nye bar gzhug pa bzhi'i ston pA ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yin no//kye go/
262a3('dul ba): tA ma byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ston pa/gang lags/bram ze byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi smyon pa ni rigs pa dang /rnam par grol ba yin no//
262a4('dul ba): kyi go ta ma rig pa dang rnam pa ro grol ba'i ston pa gang lags/bram ze rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i ston pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no//kye gro'u
262a5('dul ba): ta ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i ston pa gang lags/bram ze ha cang thal ches so//hA cang thal ches so//dI baM rnams kyi mtha' gzung bar mi nus te/de'i
262a6('dul ba): drung du ni yang dag parad+ma sdug bsngal zad par bya ba dang /sdug bsngal gyi mthar byA bASh+Ti phyir/tshangs par spyod pa mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba dang /
262a7('dul ba): mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa can spyod par byed do//de nas bram ze oM to la'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/'di la gnod pa ci zhig bya ste ma//
262b1('dul ba): des kyu snron dge sbyong go'u tu ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab na/des ci bsams pa dang /ci gsol ba de zlums/
262b2('dul ba): cad so sor 'thob par 'gyuraro zhes thoso//de nas bram ze o ta la'i bu stan las langs te/bla gas phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log
262b3('dul ba): su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu seng bdag gi sdum par
262b4('dul ba): gdugs tshed sbyor zhing mchis nu gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu ba rig nas zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o//
262b5('dul ba): stan chad dam+ba'o ba zhig blangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/smon la mo log par gdab par brtsams pa/bdag gau shUkya'i sras kyi nga
262b6('dul ba): skyong ji snyed cig bshos gsol ba 'di thams cad bdag gi gling du gyur cig snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bram ze o ta le'i bu'i bas
262b7('dul ba): mkhyen nas/bram ze o ta la'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bram za khyod kyi sa mi rung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni 'grub par mi 'gyur te/'di
263a1('dul ba): ltar dge slong 'di thams cad ni yang srid pa zad pa yin gyi/sems grazhan skyed cig ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das
263a2('dul ba): yon bsngo ba mdzad de gsheg so//de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//
263a3('dul ba): bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze o ta la'i bus smon lam log pas bslang ba'i sems sdig pa can
263a4('dul ba): skyed kyi/khyed cag gis zan zos nas gtsug lag khang gi tshug su bcad pa brjod cig dang /log pa'i smon lam 'grub pa mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das
263a5('dul ba): de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /yul o ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /o ta la na bran mo
263a6('dul ba): rgan mo ka tsang ga lA zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/de bum pa thogs nas chu chur khron pa'i drung du song ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der bshegs te/
263a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la rgan mo pha bi la bcom ldan 'das
263b1('dul ba): skyes kyis chu phul cig ces bsgo shig/btsun pa dga' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/rgan mo ka cang ga la gang na ba
263b2('dul ba): dor song ste phyin pa dang /rgan ma ka tsang gra la la 'di skad ces smraso//ka tsang ga la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyis chu phul cig/des smras ga'aphag pa bdag nyid 'tshal te mchi so//de
263b3('dul ba): nA ka tsang ga los chu bum pa bkang nas/rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang /ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas bcom ldani 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i
263b4('dul ba): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od mdom gang gis brgyan sa/'od zer nyi mo stong bas lhag pa/
263b5('dul ba): rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong mo thug tu yang de'i bu'i sdug pa skyes nas//des lag pa sring ste bu bu zhes/bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud///
263b6('dul ba): par brtsams pa/dge slong rnams kyis de bzlo go/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed kyis rgan mo 'di ma bzlog shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
263b7('dul ba): 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang /rtag tu nga'i yum du gyur pas/nga yi sku la reg po las/gal te 'di ni bzlog byas na/de'u re mod la khrag don dag/'di yi kha
264a1('dul ba): nas skyugs par 'gyur//bu la gdung ba 'di mthong nas//byas pa gzo ba rgyas dgongs te//thugs rje dang ni thugs btso bAs//sku la reg tu dan/
264a2('dul ba): par bya//bcom ldan 'das kyis de la mgur nas 'khyud du gnang bas/de bu la chags pa dang bral nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sder chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/de nas
264a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/bcom ldan 'das de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa
264a4('dul ba): bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de thos nas ka tsang ga las 'jig/tshogs le lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes
264a5('dul ba): bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas lan sum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/btsun pa 'di lta bu ni
264a6('dul ba): bdag la phas mi bgyis te/mes ma lags zhes bya bra nas/thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lte bal+lI raM'i rtse mo nyi shu mA
264a7('dul ba): ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyi so//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
264b1('dul ba): gis kyang gsol po//ma lA lan gsum du phan 'dogs pa'i//bu mchog gis ni bgyi ba gang //thar la sems gzhol 'gyur ba do//khyod kyis de ring bdag
264b2('dul ba): la mdzad//khyod kyis bdag ning na 'gro las//drangs de mtho ris thar la gzhag/khyod ni brtsal ba chen po yis//dka' ba legs par mdzod pa lags//ces gson/
264b3('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bros phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas dus gzhan zhig na ka tsang ga las jo bo la gsol
264b4('dul ba): btab nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig
264b5('dul ba): tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa
264b6('dul ba): dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lha na/bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par smad pa spyod par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen
264b7('dul ba): mo la gtad do//de nas des rab tu phyung /bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams dag byi na//de brtson 'grus dang /'bed pa dang /brtsal bar byas nas/nyom
265a1('dul ba): mongs pa thams cad spangs te dag bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas/dgra bcom mar gyur te/khams gsum gyi 'dod chags
265a2('dul ba): dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas/rjed par bya bar gyur to//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o////'dul ba gzhi/bam po so bdun pa//kang+ga gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
265a3('dul ba): dge slong ma rnams la bsdus te mdor bko stsal nas/gtsug log khang du nang du yang dge 'jog pa'i phyir 'jug pa mdzad pade/ka tsid ga las de rgyas
265a4('dul ba): pAr lung ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de'i nyan thos dge slong ma mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams
265a5('dul ba): kyi nang na/'di lta ste/dge slong me ka tsang ga la 'ad mchog yino//dge slong rnams the tsam skyes nas/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
265a6('dul ba): 'das la zhus pa/btsun pra ka tsang ga las ci zhig bgyis na/des na rga ste nas rab tu byung bar gyur/lhas ci zhig bgyis na/dris na dbul ba dang bran mor gyur/
265a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa tha ma pa de'i mngal du ma bzung bar gyur/rab tu byung nis kyang dag btso pa mngon sum du bgyis shing /bcom ldan 'das
265b1('dul ba): kyis kyang mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra sprul pa/dge slong dang dge slong ma ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las
265b2('dul ba): byas shing tshogs rnyed pa drag ces bya ba nas//lus can dag la 'bras bu 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhon du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dang
265b3('dul ba): skrod pa la gnas pa na/'di nga'i yum du gyur te/gang gi tshang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod po de'i tshe/'dis nga bzlog pas/wa de'i rnam par smin pos rgas nas rab
265b4('dul ba): tu byungango //nga sbyin pa gtong ba na 'dis bar tshad byas pas/des na dbul bar gyur to//ji ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo ltar 'dis bsod nams dbang che bar
265b5('dul ba): grags par 'gyur ba'i lus ma byas te/des ni nga'i srid pa tha ma 'dis mngal du ma bzung ngo //ye nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las rab
265b6('dul ba): tu byang nas/dge slong ma slob pa dang /mi slob pa rnams la bran mo zhes tshig tu brjod pas/des na bran mor gyur to//de na 'dis gang dag blags shinga'i ston pas
265b7('dul ba): phung po la mkhas pa dang /khams la mkhas pa dang /skye mched la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /gnas dang /gnas
266a1('dul ba): ma yin pa la mkhas bur byas pas/de nas nga'i snyan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid
266a2('dul ba): mngon sum du byas//rab tu 'byin pa'i mkhan po gong yin pa'i de/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'byed par
266a3('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog tu bston pa dang /des nA 'dis kyang 'chi ba'i dus kyis tshe smon la me btab pa/bdog gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan la/
266a4('dul ba): 'od srung yon gnas bla na med pa la tshe ji srid gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyod na/yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob kyi/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sra bdage
266a5('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis/bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo
266a6('dul ba): brgya thub pa//de bzhin gshegaso pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thob pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung
266a7('dul ba): bston pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas/ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
266b1('dul ba): gis mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa byed pa rna gyi mchog tu ston par gyur
266b2('dul ba): cig ces byas te/de'i smod lam gyi dbang gis/ngas da ltar mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnam bkyi mchog tu bstan to//dge slong dag de lte bas na/gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams kyi rnar
266b3('dul ba): smin pa ni/gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bak+ka
266b4('dul ba): stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bko' stsal pa/kun dga' bo yul dgra mtha' grong na ba der 'dong //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang
266b5('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang /ji tsam na kun dga' ra ba zhig na bram ze zhig khron pa nas chu
266b6('dul ba): bcus shing /kun dga' ra ba bcu par brtsam so//bram ze des rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong //mthong nas kyang bsam pa/gal te dge slong go'u te
266b7('dul ba): ma kun dga' ra ba ra zhugs na/kun dga' ra ba dang /chu ma rung por 'gyu ro snyam du bsam+ba nas/sgo bcad de/byad zag dang chu snod sbas nas 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das
267a1('dul ba): kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis kun dga' ru bar zhugs pa dang /glono du sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis khron pa de bzung nas/kun dga'al ba de
267a2('dul ba): thams cad chus yog par b+has so//de nas bram ze dge sbyong gro'u ta ma 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yino snyam du rigs nas/mngon par dad par gyur
267a3('dul ba): te gsol pa/shes ldan gro'u ta mA tshur spyon/dpyang thog ni 'di lags/chab snod ni 'di lags kyis/cha bya ci bder ba zhesu gsol/de nas
267a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/tshig su bcud de bka' stsal pa/gal te kun ni chu yod na//khron pa'i chus ko ci zhig bya//'dir ni srid pa'i rtsa
267a5('dul ba): bcud nas//gang zhig yongasu btsal bar spyod//de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga bram ze des 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag legs par gsung
267a6('dul ba): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang //bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas dge slong chur shog ces byas rab tu
267a7('dul ba): byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de bzhin gshegs pas tshur sheg bka' stsal pa//sgro byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //med
267b1('dul ba): la dbang por ba zhir gnas gyur te//sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur//de nas brtson 'grus dang /'bad pa dang /brtsal ba byas
267b2('dul ba): nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dag bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas/dgra bcom par gyur te/khAs sa gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral
267b3('dul ba): ba zhes bya ba nas/mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bye ba'i bar gong mI bzhi ni du'o//de nas bcom+ba ldan 'das dpa' sde nasu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa
267b4('dul ba): dang /yul dgra mthar gshegs te/yul dag mtha' na spu bu can gyi shing ni maM bI drung na bzhugaso//de'i tshe dag mtha' na rgyal po breme zo me sbyin zhes bya ba
267b5('dul ba): 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba ni rgyal srid byed du 'jugo/rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis dge
267b6('dul ba): spyod go'u ta ma dpa' sde nus ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /dugra mthar byon nas/dgra mtho' na spu bu can gyi shring nom pa yi drung du bzhugaso zhes tho so//
267b7('dul ba): thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/dge slong go'u ta me la ni mtha' dag gi rgyal po thams cad kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/brjed par byas/
268a1('dul ba): mchod par byas te/dug btsom par bkur lnga/gal te bAdag gis dge sbyong dgo'u tA ma la bkur bsti ma byas na//mtha'i rgyal phran rnama?//
268a2('dul ba): shes ldan dag kye ma rgyal po bram ze mo sbyin ni byis pa yin te/de'i glong dang /zhing na dge sbyong ga'u ta mu nye bar rten cing bzhugs na/bsnyen bkur ma byas
268a3('dul ba): zhes spyod par 'gyur gyis/me la bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcos pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabaso snyam du bsams nas/
268a4('dul ba): rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pa dang /rgyal po chen po'i mthus dgra mtha' nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la bya der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das dang lhan
268a5('dul ba): cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bor 'gyur ba dang /yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtim rnam pa sna tshogs byas nasau/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs
268a6('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtami gyis zhes bya ba nas/oMng dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
268a7('dul ba): nas cang mi gsungo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin stan las longs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom
268b1('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de//bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//shes ldan go'u ta mnyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la dgung/
268b2('dul ba): zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims chu dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na/bdag la gra nang bar mdzad du
268b3('dul ba): gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la cang mi gsung ba sA gon ngo //de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi bcom ldan 'dus cang mi gsung bas gnang
268b4('dul ba): bAr rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/rjesu yi rung nas stan las langs te/song ngo de rang gi khyim du song nas blon po rnams la sgo ba
268b5('dul ba): nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgyar bca' ba sna bco brgyad dang /sran tshod sna tshogase dang /tshod ma ro dang ldan pa dang /'bras chan rab tu maung por chos shig/dgra mthar dril
268b6('dul ba): sgrogasu bcug pe/dge sbyong go'u ta ma zla ba gsum du gzhan gyi gdugs tshod ma gsol cig/gung zhig gis gdugs tshod gsol na de chad par bsad do//zhes
268b7('dul ba): des de snyed du dril bsgrags nas/nub mo nyal ba dang /rmi lam na bdag gi sgyu mas dgra mtha'i grong khyer thams cad bskor bar rmi so//rmis nas kyang sngangs skrag
269a1('dul ba): byed cing spu zing zhes byed nus myur ba myur bar mal chen po nusna langs te/lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal
269a2('dul ba): srid las nyams pa 'am/srog gau khar chud du mi 'gyur gleng snyam du sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa las/de rnam nang nas bram ze mdun na 'don la
269a3('dul ba): skyes pa/mkhan po bdag gi 'di 'dra ba'i rmi lam zhig mthong na/de la ji ltar bslab par bya/bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/ji ltar lhas rma
269a4('dul ba): bzang po zhig rmi sa te/gal te bdage de dang 'thun par bsnyad na/'di lhag par yid dge sbyong go'u ta mu la dad pa skyed par 'gyur gyis/mA la bdag gis
269a5('dul ba): 'di ngan par bsnyadado//snyam du bsams nas smras pa/lha madra lam myi bzang lag so//mkhan po 'di'i 'bras bu co re 'gyur/lha gdon mi 'tshal bar
269a6('dul ba): rgyul srid las nyams pa 'am/srog gi bar chad du 'gyur lAg so//rgya la bros bsums pa/e ma'o kyi hun bdug rgyal srid las nyams pa'am
269a7('dul ba): srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams nas/bram ze 'dun na 'don la 'di skad ces smraso//gang gis na kho ko rgyal srid las nyams par
269b1('dul ba): mi 'gyur ba dang /srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po tsa yod/des smras pa/lha gal te mi dga' ba'i phyogasu zla ba gsum bzhugs na/de na lha
269b2('dul ba): rgyal srid las mi nyams shing /srog gi bar chud du mi 'gyur lagaso//de nas rgyal po zlum ze me sbyin gyis byasamos pa/gal te de lta na de bya blu bas dral
269b3('dul ba): sgrog su gzhugro snyam nas/des yul thod du dil sgrogasu gtsug pu dra la zla ba gsum du blta zhing nye bar suM yang ma 'ong shig/gang zhig 'ongs na de ni ched par bsad
269b4('dul ba): do zhes dri'i sgrogasasu bcug nas/zla ba gsum du mi snang ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug go/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/rgyal po blam
269b5('dul ba): ze mye sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba lus/ji tsam na rgyal po bram ze mi sbyin gyi zho shes 'tsho ba rnams sems lus chung ngus 'khod dag mthong ngo //
269b6('dul ba): mthong nas kyang smras pashes ldan dag ci sems las chung ngus 'khod dam/de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa ci zhig bgyir mchis/rgyal po dram
269b7('dul ba): me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyi me bstabs sam/khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod
270a1('dul ba): nas/gdugs chod kyang sta gon mi byed/gdan yang mi shom na/ci sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod
270a2('dul ba): gcod dam/de dag gi smras pa/'phags pa kun dga' bo/lhos lnga brgya rnams kyis chad du zhal zos bsod pa mang du sta zhen byos shig ni bka' stsal gyis/
270a3('dul ba): che ge mo zhig gi don du'o zhes bka' stsal lag so//shes ldan dge deng lha la zhus shig/'phags pa lhas dril sgrogasu stsal ba/nga la zla ba gsum
270a4('dul ba): du lta zhing nye bar su 'ang ma 'ong shig/gang zhig 'ongs na de chad par bsad do zhes bsgrags na/ci bdag cag la mgo bo gnyis mchis sam/bdag cag ni mi
270a5('dul ba): zhu lagaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par gsol to//
270a6('dul ba): dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan
270a7('dul ba): zhig dang dag mtha'i lam po che dang /cheng dus dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo rnam su bshes ldan dag khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
270b1('dul ba): 'dun la zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des zhal zas gsol cig ces sbron cig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
270b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/snam sbyar thogs te/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che dang /tshong dus dang /bzhi mdo dang //
270b3('dul ba): sum mdo rnamasu bsgo ga/shes ldan dag khyod cag las grang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba
270b4('dul ba): des zhal zlas gsol cig/dgra mthi'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag cagu lta zhig re res kyang bcom ldan 'das
270b5('dul ba): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas phye zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro legs mod kyi/rgyu la po sdig pa can+da 'dis dril sgrogasu stsal pa/gzhan sus
270b6('dul ba): kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te/zla ba gsum du zhal zas ma gsol cig/gang zhig gis zhal zas gsol na/de ni chad par
270b7('dul ba): bsango zhes bsgrags lag so//ji tsam du byang phyogs nas/de dpon zhig rta lnga brgya la khal bkal te/dgra mthar phyin nas des bsams pa/gal te mod
271a1('dul ba): la cha na rnams kyi smrig pa dub pas 'theng bar 'gyur zhing phom par yang mi 'gyur bas 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam nasA/de de nyid du
271a2('dul ba): 'dug nas/des rta cing shes la ni chas nas bre'u chung do rta lhag ma rnams la ni dre'u chung re re thang chad do//de nas rgyal po rtsis mgo 'di dang 'di dag byis
271a3('dul ba): so zhes thos la/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa yang thos nus/des bsas pa/bdag ni rgyal po 'di'i yul na gnas par ma yin pas/bdag
271a4('dul ba): la rgyal pos ci byar yod snyam du rigs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras//'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag gis rta cang shes la ni chas nas
271a5('dul ba): bre'u chung dorta lkog ma rnams la na bre'u chung re re'i theng lag+na nA/gal te bcom ldan 'das nas gsol bar spro na/bcom ldan 'das la ni bdug gis nus
271a6('dul ba): bri'u chung de//dge slong lhag ma rnams la ni bre'u chung re ri'i dbul bar bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bro bcom ldan 'das gangan de skyong ste phyin nas/
271a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par gsol po dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/nga nyid kyi las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba
271b1('dul ba): 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi zla bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las nga nyis kyis byas shing bsags pas nga nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis
271b2('dul ba): so sor myong bar 'gyur te/las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin pa mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/lus can dgra la 'bras bur
271b3('dul ba): 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//tshe dang ldan pa kunau dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ku ni dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la tshul shing brims te/khyod
271b4('dul ba): cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig dgra mthar zla ba gsum du longs spyad par spro ba des chur shing long shig ces bsgo shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin
271b5('dul ba): 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sna bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/tshul shong brim par brtsams pa nA/gang yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar
271b6('dul ba): dge slong gnyis kyis me chung bas tshul shing blung so//tshe dang ldan pa shA 'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bser mI'i blo nad mchis pas/dgung zla
271b7('dul ba): gsum du snang nas kyis longs spyad par mi spro lag so//tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/bdag ni 'di'i bre g.yog bgyis lagaso//de nA
272a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar dge sbyong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs gcig tu dbu mthar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes//
272a2('dul ba): dang ldan pa shU ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu na rI bo rtse gsum b+hi khar song ste dbyar gnas par khas blangs//de nas lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bdud
272a3('dul ba): rtsis bstabs/de nas de dpon gyi bcom ldan 'das la ni nas bre'u chung ngo dro 'bulo//dge slong gzhan rnamasu le ni nas bre'u chung ri ri'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
272a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga'i bo song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nus la tsi legasu byas shig/btsun pa bkra' bzhin
272a5('dul ba): 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nus/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skal blangs tI bud med rgan me gzhan zhig gang
272a6('dul ba): na yod pa der song nas byin pa dang /bud myed de lnga 'di skad ces smra so//sring mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du na sra la ci legasu b+h+yonra/khyod nus sngam/
272a7('dul ba): des smras pa/'phags pa bdag rgan mod rngo mi thog ste/'on kyang bu mo 'di bzhon lags kyis 'di la stsol cig dang /'dis ni ci logasu bgyis
272b1('dul ba): par 'gyu ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun ga' bo de'i drung du song ste/phyin nas smras pa/sring mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la cig gsu byed nus
272b2('dul ba): sam/des smras pa/'phags pa bdag dang dam zhig bca' ste/gal te bdag la tshig 'ga' gsung ba lta na ci leg su bgyi'o//des smras pa
272b3('dul ba): dor gyis shig dang sgra'o//de nas 'du zhing dris pa/'phags pas spangs rgyas shes bgyi ba ci lagasatshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsams pa/gal te
272b4('dul ba): 'di la bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod na/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zab pa yin pas/
272b5('dul ba): 'dis shes par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa yod kyis/ma la bdag gis 'di la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o snyam nas
272b6('dul ba): byasams nas smras pa/sring mo 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/rin po che sna bdun yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/bdun
272b7('dul ba): po de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /ni bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim 'angs
273a1('dul ba): rin po che dang /bdun pa ni blon po rin po che yin no//sring mo 'khor lho sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar
273a2('dul ba): 'gyur zhe na/sring mo 'di la rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la mgo 'khrus byas te sgying ba byas nas/de steng gi khang bzengs kyi gzhi
273a3('dul ba): la blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug pa na/sher phyogs nas 'khor lo rini po che lte ba dang bcas pa/ba~M sa stong dang ldan pa muM khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa
273a4('dul ba): thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa/mdzes pa/mkhan bzos ma byas pa/bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyu ro te/rgyal po rgyal rig
273a5('dul ba): spyi bo nas dbang bskur bye gang yin pa 'dis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba nas/thams cad gser las byas zhes bya ba nas/de ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i
273a6('dul ba): rgyal por 'gyur zhe nas zhes bya bri bar dong ma bzhin du'o//bdeg ni gdon mi za bar 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur snyam nas/den 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor
273a7('dul ba): po rin po che de rtag par 'dod nas bstan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar na/sa mogasu pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/'khor lo rin po che de lag pa
273b1('dul ba): gnyis kyis blangs nas lag pa gamin par bzhug ste/lhag pa g.yas pas sbyor zhing /kye 'khor lho rin po che sngon gyi 'khor lo sgyur ba/'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par rnam par
273b2('dul ba): rgyal bar gyur cig/rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig ces smra'o//de nas 'khor lo rin po che de 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos sbar bya dang steng gi nAmakha' la 'phags nas/shar phyogs su
273b3('dul ba): sngon gyi 'khor lo sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam sol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyuro//'khor la rin po tshe de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan log bzhi
273b4('dul ba): dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro//phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po che de spyod pa der 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan log bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur
273b5('dul ba): zhing /shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor lo sbyar ba rgyal po gzhi ba sod ste lhags pa dang /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po lnga 'di skad ces lha tshur gshegs
273b6('dul ba): lu byon pa legs//yul 'khor 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /mo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba gang lag sdu pa 'di ni lha'i lcags kyis lhas rjes
273b7('dul ba): bskyong du gsol/bdag cag ni lho'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lagaso//zhes smras pa dang /de'i phyir sna bo dag khyed cag rang rang gi yul 'khor chos kyis rjesu bskyang bar
274a1('dul ba): byA'i chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no//'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam/'dran mar spyod pa zhig yod na/khyed kyis de yul 'khor du ma bzhag shig/
274a2('dul ba): de lta na khyod cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yino//de nas 'khor lo rin po che des shAr phyogs mngon par phab nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas sgyur lcog ste/lho dang
274a3('dul ba): nub dang /byang phyogasu yang sngon gyi 'khor lo sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur bas/de nas 'khor lo rin po ched 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos
274a4('dul ba): sbyar ba dang /steng gi na mkha' la 'phags ni sa/byang phyogasu sngon gyi 'khor lo sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur ro//'i 'khor lo rin
274a5('dul ba): bopo che dro'i rjes bzhin du 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig 'gro bar 'gyuraro//phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po tshad sdod pa der 'khor lo
274a6('dul ba): sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gri tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur zhing /byang phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i
274a7('dul ba): rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces lha chur gau shogs/lha byon pa log so//yul 'khor 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang
274b1('dul ba): bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos gas lags pa 'di ni lha'i lags kyis lhas rje su bskyang du gsol/bdag cag ni lha'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lagaso zhes smras pa
274b2('dul ba): dang /de'i phyir smra bo dag khyod cog rang rang gi yul rnams chos kyis rje su bskyang bar bya/chos mu yin pas ni ma yin no//'gra' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam/'dren mar spyod nu
274b3('dul ba): khyod kyis yul 'khor du ma bzhag shig/de lta na khyed cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yin no//de nas 'khor lo rin po che des byang phyogs mngon par phab nas byang phyogs kyi rgyo mtsho
274b4('dul ba): chen po nas slar log ste/rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyir nas/dkor khang gi steng du sog shing btsugs pa bzhin du gnaso//sring mo 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du
274b5('dul ba): byung na 'khor lo rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sring mo 'khor lo sgyur rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/glang po rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung
274b6('dul ba): bar 'gyur zhe na/sring mo 'di la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i glang po ni thal kar me tog ku mu de'i mdog lta bu/yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa/gzugs bzang ba mdzes
274b7('dul ba): pa/blta na sdug pa yino//'khro lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'di mthong nas/sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/kye ma'o glang po rin po che bzang po zhig yin gyis/myur
275a1('dul ba): du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/de nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos glang po 'dul spyod mkhan mkhas pa/po nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces
275a2('dul ba): smras//de gaspyod kyis glang po rin po che 'di myur ba kho nar legs par dul bar byos l-i dA la grol cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po 'dul spyod mkhan mkhas pas
275a3('dul ba): gi khong lo sbyong ba'i rdul pi ltar mnyan nas/snang ba rin po che de la bskrad pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la bslob par byed/de ga nyin zhigacig l-i bsgrub pa thams cad sgo
275a4('dul ba): ban/nyon zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs nas/dper na glang po che gzhan rnams lo du ma dang /le khyud skor du mar bslab pa thams cad bslabs nas/
275a5('dul ba): bslab pa thams cad lo zla ba de bzhin du/glang po che rin po che de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad bslabs pa na/nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad longs/
275a6('dul ba): de dul bar rig nas/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar byed/lha glang po rin po che bzang po nI dul lags te/da de'i rdul la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/
275a7('dul ba): de nis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos glang po rin po che de brtag par 'dod nam/nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe glang po rin po che de la zhen nas rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen
275b1('dul ba): hU~M/rgyal bar byung du rdzun 'am tshul la 'du ste/slong mo la byor sna sa/sanaman ma rdzu na lda sgyur ba'i rgyu/
275b2('dul ba): po 'jig rten du dz+nyA nA/ts+tsha ni po ji zhig 'jig rten du byung ba shA gyur na na/slong mo de la 'khor ma ts+tshe bri'i hU~Ml bI'i d+hA ni thams cad ts+tsha ba~M mgo gnag cing rdzog
275b3('dul ba): 'jug drug/gzugs bzang mdzes pabas+thA naM smrig pa sbyin/khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos de mdzo na se mas mngon par dang par gyur nas/kye mamangon po che ba
275b4('dul ba): bo zhig in gyis myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/de nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta mkhan mkhas pa po nyes bkug ste/'di skad ces smras//des pa khyod kyis
275b5('dul ba): d+hArin po che 'di myur po khaM ni nga legs par dul bar byas langal phul cig/smr-i bak+Sha bzhin 'tsha la zhes rta mkhan mkhas pas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po las mnyan nas d+d+ha rin
275b6('dul ba): me de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob par byed/de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob na/nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad
275b7('dul ba): yobs pa na dper na rtswa bzhin rnams la du ma dang /lo khyung gor du mar bsgrub par thams cad bsgrubs nas/bslab pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du/rta rin po che
276a1('dul ba): de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad slob pa na/nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lob so//de dul byar rig nas
276a2('dul ba): 'khor sgo sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha 'bul bar byed de/g+hun+d+ha rin po che bzang po ni 'dul lhags te/khyud de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du ga sol/de nas 'khor
276a3('dul ba): m+WA phyi sl-i d+hA rin pa mi rmugs pa 'dzinasamyun+d+ha kA samin nasmra/rgyumA ma sas pa de'i sa na ra/
276a4('dul ba): ba'i pho brang de nyid du phyin pa na zhal tshul la bab ste/sring mo 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung narta rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
276a5('dul ba): sring mo 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung ni/nor bu rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/sring mo 'di la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i
276a6('dul ba): rgyal po nor bu ni zla re brgyad yod pa/byets+tshar+ya bzang po'i rigs can dang bya/gsal du rnam par dang pa yin te/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i pho bra na me
276a7('dul ba): mar gyi bya ba thams cad nor bu ni de'i 'od kyis byed do//de nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos nor bu rin po che brtag par 'dod nas/mun nag sgeg tu gyur
276b1('dul ba): lA/lhas mtshan mo char gyi rgyun dalta bu dul bus 'bebs shing glog 'gyu sgru ba'i dusu nor bu rin po che dbargya mtshan gyi rje la bzhag nas/bskyed mo'i tshal gyi nang dung du
276b2('dul ba): gi tshogs yan lags bzhi dang lhan cig dong ba dang /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po ji snyed pa thams cad dong /rgyang grags byed/
276b3('dul ba): ra khor yug tu nor bu'i 'od kyis gsal bar gyur te/sring mo 'khor lde sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/nor bu rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sring
276b4('dul ba): mo 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na btsun mo rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/sring mo 'di la 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i btsun
276b5('dul ba): mo ni gzugs bzang ba mdzes po/bag+h+nA na sdug pa/ha cang mi dkar ba/hA cang mi sde be/nya khar pa ltar spags pa 'jam pa/ha tsa nga mi ring ga ha cang mi
276b6('dul ba): 'thung ba/bong ran pa/ha cang mi sbom pa/ha cang mi sbrum+bu pa/hA cang mi cho ba/sha bli ran pa gang yin pa te/sring mo de ni grang ba'i tshe lus la reg na dro
276b7('dul ba): ba/tsha ba'i tshe lus la reg na bsil ba/yul ka ling ka'i gos ltar reg na 'jam pa'o//sring mo de'i spyi bu ga thams cad nas ni can den gyi dri 'byung ngo //kha nas
277a1('dul ba): nA ud pA la snun po'i dri'i byung ngo //de srid kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun mo rin po 'i bar du shA pang spyod kyi bu mongs
277a2('dul ba): kyang nas kyi bya ba zin nas/des rkang po gnyis le btugs to/smon lam gdab par brtsams bya/'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i btsun mo
277a3('dul ba): rin po cher gyur cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nas byi dor byas pa khyer nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa nas/bcom ldan 'das
277a4('dul ba): la 'du'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen ba zhon du rmod pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas la/kun
277a5('dul ba): dga' bo nas 'di su zhig gis byi dor byas/btsun pa bram ze'i bu mo che mo zhig gis bgyis lagaso//kun dga' bo khyod bram ze'i bu mo da dang lhan cig skabs
277a6('dul ba): kyi gtam dag byas sam/bcom ldan 'das bgyis leg so//kun dga' bo des na khyod bram ze'i bu mo de dang larla cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag
277a7('dul ba): thams cad nga lo rgyal par gsol cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dger bos bram ze'i bu mo dang ldan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad
277b1('dul ba): bAts+tshom ldan 'das la rgyas par gastsol to//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di sad ces ga/ s+yA d+h+r-i krAn+da dga' bo khyod kyis
277b2('dul ba): ci'i phyir bu mo de la sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa ma brjod//btsun pa bdag gis 'di snyam du/sangs rgyas kyi chos ni zab pa lags pas/bu mo 'dis rtogs por ma
277b3('dul ba): 'gyur ba gang lags pa'i gnas de mchi so snyam du bsams nas/de'i slad du bdag gis de la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod lagaso//kun dga' bo khyod kyis
277b4('dul ba): me legs pa zhig byas te/khyod kyis gal te de la sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa brjod pa byas pa dang /des bla na med pa ying dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
277b5('dul ba): ldog pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gunas de yod pa zhig/kun dga' bo 'on kyang bu mo de mabor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher 'gyu ro//
277b6('dul ba): kun tu bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi don nA byi dror byas pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher
277b7('dul ba): lung bsten to//zhes sgra grags pa dag bu mo sde brgyang gnyis kyis ma chang pa zhig gis thos nas/dge slong lnga brgya dge slong gnyis kyi ma tshang ba rnams kyi
278a1('dul ba): nas bye dod byas te/nas kyis kyang smon lam btab pa/bdug cag de ni 'khor du gyur ci//rdzam na bcom ldan 'das kyis nas kyi bshos gas
278a2('dul ba): bAr brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa smon dga' bo yi mug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku che brgyud pa de dang /de rnams byug dang /zhabs dang /dbu la sogs pa bcad
278a3('dul ba): sbyin pa bad+yA nas/bskul pa glengs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnyed pa de/dA nI nas rul pa'i be shos glosol bya lta zhes mchi ma dbyung bar brtsams so//
278a4('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir mi dga' zhing maN+Di ma glog/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la
278a5('dul ba): lo sbyor ba'i rig su 'khyis nas rgyal snyid smrangs nas rab tu byung ste/phyug dang /skyes dang /dbul stsogs pa 'akum zhing sbyin pa btang nas/bsgral pa gas med pa ga
278a6('dul ba): sa thams cad ma byin pa nyid brnyas pa de/da ni srang nas nipa gsol ba lta snum bgyid lags myong/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkAr stsa bu/kun dag
278a7('dul ba): bo de bzhin ga she k+She mche shrI bar nas byung ba'i nas kyi zin za bar 'dod dam/bcom ldan 'dis 'tshal lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtsho ba'i bar nos nas
278b1('dul ba): kyi zan phyung ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bza' bur brtsam so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyud
278b2('dul ba): sngon 'di lta bu'i ro myong bar dran nam/btsun pa bdag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rigasu skyes shing 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rigs las chen por gyur legs na/da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mtsho
278b3('dul ba): bye'i bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyi bshos 'di lta bu'i ro ni sngon myong bar mi dran lag so//kun dga' bo de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ro bro ba'i mchog ces bya ba ro rnams
278b4('dul ba): phrogs pa yongasu dag pa yod de/gal te de bzhin gshegs pas kha zas phal pa la longs spyad na de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ro brgya par 'gyur ro//kun du rgyal po bram
278b5('dul ba): zi me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te/mi snang ba'i phyogasu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' ni nas gsol lo
278b6('dul ba): zhes sgro grags so//mtha'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te/mi snang ba'i phyogs
278b7('dul ba): su 'jug/bcom ldan 'das ni ngag mtha' na nas gsol zhes thos nas/de rnams kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la/pho nya bting ba las de rnams nang du ma chud de sgo na sdod do//
279a1('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin gyis thos nas/'bras sa lu sogs mI sbu bur smon pa/shang rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste bskur ro//de nas bdud
279a2('dul ba): sdig can de 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma la bdag gis lan meng po zhig tho btsam par byas na lan 'ga' yang skabs ma rnyed kyis 'dir yang re zhig 'di la
279a3('dul ba): rgol bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bor bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas smras pa/shes
279a4('dul ba): ldan dag gir 'dong ngo //de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa kun dga' bo rgyal po bram ze mo sbyin gyis/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang /bcas
279a5('dul ba): pe zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te/mi snang ba'i phyogasu 'dug nas/bcom ljon 'das ni dgra mtha' na nas gsolo//de nas khyim bdag mgon med za sbyin gyis
279a6('dul ba): thos nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi don du 'bras so lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya po 'di bkur ba lagaso//des smras pa/shes ldan dag bcom ldan
279a7('dul ba): 'das la ni lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin rnams mngon par dad de/gal te na mkhe'o la bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed bzed na/de yang sum cu rtsa gsu
279b1('dul ba): ba'i lha rnams kyis lha'i bdud brtsis 'gengs par byed na/bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir gnas gsol/slar log shig/de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa kun dga'
279b2('dul ba): bo bdag cag chas legs na/da ci ste ldog mchi'o//bdud kyis bsams po/bdag gi sa'i dang /bzlog par ma nus kyis/thabs shig bshams par bya'o zhes de steng
279b3('dul ba): gi na mkha' la 'phags nas/char pa shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams te/des re shing rta de dag gi ste ba man chad nub pa tsam gyi bar du char phab po
279b4('dul ba): de nas shing rta de dag gi glang rnams bkrol te dong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis ma tshang ba dang /thabs gcig tu dgra mtha' na nas gsolo//tshe
279b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang /mo'u gal gyi bu gnyis ni ra rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas byer khas blangs nas/lha'i bdud rtsil long spyod do//de nas ded dpon des zla ba
279b6('dul ba): gsum 'das/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas po bskyed mos 'tshal du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis cang
279b7('dul ba): mi gsung bas gnangango //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mi'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ri bo rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas pa yang 'ongs//de nas ded dpon gyis de nyid kyi
280a1('dul ba): mtshan mo nus nas gtsang lding gsod pa'i bza' ba dang /ban+da' ba dag sta gon byas pa nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/
280a2('dul ba): lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar glong ma bzhin du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lo btugs te/smon lam btab par brtsams pa/dge ba'i rtsal
280a3('dul ba): 'o'adis bdag 'khor la sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cing /rta cang shes ni bu rgyal chib tu gyur cig/rta lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang bu ldi brgyar gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bu
280a4('dul ba): mo btsun mo rin po che'i lung bstan pa gang lags pa de ni bdag gi btsun mo rin po cher gyur cig/bud med lta brgyu re ginyis kyi ma tshang pa gang lags pa de ni de'i 'a
280a5('dul ba): du gyur cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ded dpon de'i bsams pa thugasu chud nas/ded dpon de la 'di skad ces bka' stsol pa/ded dpon khyod gi 'khor lo sgyur
280a6('dul ba): bai'i rgyal por 'gyur ro//rta cing shes ni khyod kyi bu rgyal chub du 'gyuraro//rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang bu lnga brgyar 'gyuraro//bu mo ni btsun mo cher 'gyuraro//bu mo bud med lnga
280a7('dul ba): brgyar gnyis kyi ma chad pa de dag kyang de'i 'khor du 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/chos
280b1('dul ba): gos zin pa dang ldan nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lnga bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo la bram ze me sbyin gyi drung du song la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/'di skad ces
280b2('dul ba): rgyal po chen po khyed kyi yul du kho bos zla ba gsumyi gnas zin tAM/'gros shes pa de bgyis shig ces smos shig/btsun pa dkra' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
280b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar menyan nus/rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi khyim gsal der song ba dang /de'i tshe rgyal po bram ze mem sbyin bkra shis 'ong bya la sdod cing 'dug/rje nas chu
280b4('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' pos skyo ba'i skyes pa la smras pa/ /khyad rnal ba dram sbyin gangan brjod sa sa sbyin nas/rtul pa bram ze me sbyin la 'di skad sa
280b5('dul ba): dge slong kun dga' bo lha mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchi so zhes smros shig/'phags po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo ba'i skyes pas tshe dang ljon pa kun dga'
280b6('dul ba): bo'i lte bar nyen nas/rgyal po bram zla mye sbyin gang na ba dang sing ste phyin nas/rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so//lha dge slong 'phogs pa kun dga' ba lha'i zhal mthong
280b7('dul ba): bar 'tshal nas sgo ni sdod cing mchis//des smras pa/kye skyes bu de bkro shis 'ong ba sdod cing 'dug gis/dge slong kun dge' bo ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang
281a1('dul ba): ldan pa yin te/de nyid nga'i bkra shi su gyur cig/de la ni bzang po lnga yod de/ming bzang bu dang /gzugs bzang bya dang /khwa dog bzang
281a2('dul ba): ba dang /spobs pa bzang ba dang /bsgrub pa yin gyi nang du spyod cig/shes ldan kun dga' bo la su zhig 'grog/sgo bas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la de bzhin du smras
281a3('dul ba): nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang du zhugs so//mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de rnams kyang de nyid dang lhan cig nang du zhugaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal
281a4('dul ba): po bram ze ma sbyin la nad med par gyur cig ces byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/rgyal po bram ze me
281a5('dul ba): sbyin la 'di skad ces smraso//rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/khyod nad med par gyur cig/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis yul du ngas zla ba gsum du
281a6('dul ba): go nas zin te/'gros shes par gyis shig/ces kyang bka' stsal to//'phags pa kun dga' po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyags 'tsha lo//'phags pa
281a7('dul ba): kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dang dzi ga yul dgra mthar dbyar bde bar bzhugs sam/bsod snyoms kyi ngo rgyal bar ma gyur grang //mtho'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de
281b1('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/lha khyod ni rgyal srid la mi rtogs par lags te/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drang te/mi snang ba'i
281b2('dul ba): phyogasu bzhugs nas/bcom ldan 'das ni zla ba gsum du nas rul pa'i bshos gsol leg so//des smras pa/'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum
281b3('dul ba): do nas rul ba'i bshos gsol ba mad dam/rgyal po chen po mad lagasaso//de rgyal nas swa la 'gyel ba dang /chu mang po zhig gtor nas//dbugs slar byung ba dang /
281b4('dul ba): blon po rnams bkug ste smras pa/shes ldan dgo ngas khyed cag rnams nyin re zhing lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba bsod pa rab tu mang po sta gon gyis shig par ma bsgo
281b5('dul ba): 'am/de rnams kyi skyes pa/lha de kho na skad bka' stsol pa mchis kyi//che ge mo zhig la stsol cig ces ni khyod kyis bkA ma stsal to//don kyang dra dung zhal zas sna
281b6('dul ba): gon kho na bgyid do//de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
281b7('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gtsog tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyal po bram ze mo sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang
282a1('dul ba): dag par ston par mdzad ces bya ba nas/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung zhes bya ba'i byar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas
282a2('dul ba): rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nongs lag so///
282a3('dul ba): bde bar gshegs po nongs lagasaso//ji ltar yang byis pa lags/ji ltar yang rmongs pa lags/ji ltar yang mi gsal ba lags/ji ltar mi mkhas
282a4('dul ba): pa lags te/'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /bcas pa dgung zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas/mi gda' ba'i phyogs
282a5('dul ba): mchis lagaso////'dul ba gzhi//bam po so brgyad pa/bcom ldan 'dis bdag gis nongs po de glo bar chud cing nongs por mthong
282a6('dul ba): lpags na/thugs rtse bar nye bar bzung ste/nongs pa la nongs par bzung du gsol/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nyes pa la nyes par khas blangs na/bden te
282a7('dul ba): ji ltar na yang byas pa yin/ji ltar na yang rmongs par yin/ji ltar na yang mi mkhas pa yin te/gang yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gsum/
282b1('dul ba): du spyan drangs nas/mi snang ba'i phyogs na 'dug gram//rgyal po chen po gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyes pa shes shing /mthong la/de mthong nas 'chags par byed nA/khyod
282b2('dul ba): spyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyims por mi 'gyur gyi/'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o//rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang yang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes shing ming+ge/
282b3('dul ba): la/de mthong la/de mthong nas 'chags shring phyir sdom par byed na/dge bo'i chos rnams nyams pa ri mi 'gyur gyi/'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o//de nas
282b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/bdag gis ji srid 'a
282b5('dul ba): ba'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis na/gnang bar mdzad du gsol
282b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ni tsho thung ngu'i dus su byung zhing gdul po'i don bya ba ni rab tu mang la mya ngan las 'das
282b7('dul ba): ba'i dus la yang 'bab pas mi snang ngo //gal te de lta legs ni/bcom ldan 'das lo bdun nas zla ba bdun dang /dgung bdun zhig gnang por mdzad du gso
283a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis der yang ma gnang ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
283a2('dul ba): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das
283a3('dul ba): kyis dgongs pa/ngas gal te 'di'i zas gcig kyang gsol bar mA gnang na/rgyal po bram ze me sbyin khrag dron du skyugs nas dus las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin
283a4('dul ba): pa de'i gnas yod du snyam du dgongs nas/bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang //de nas rgyal po bram ze mo sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas
283a5('dul ba): gnang bar rig nas/zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyeg 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/rang gos gnas gang nu ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
283a6('dul ba): blon po rnams la smras pa dang /shes ldan dag gang gis na zhal zas 'di thams cad sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i
283a7('dul ba): thabs bzang po ci yod/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha zhal zas thams cad dogs la bkra mo la/dge slong rnams kyi zhabs kyis bcags na/de de ltar na yong/
283b1('dul ba): su longs spyad par 'gyur lag so//des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dgu kha zas ji snyed yod pa/'di thams cad sa la kun tu khrom shig/de rnams
283b2('dul ba): kyis thams cad du kun tu bkra mo//de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dge sta gon byas na sA zhes
283b3('dul ba): bya ba nas/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gaud nA bsham pa nyid la bzhugaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//ji tsam na rgan zhugaso zhig mi
283b4('dul ba): bzod pa skyes te/bdag cag zla ba gsum du nas rus pa zos na/da ni rgyal po sdig can 'di'i byor pa ston te snyam du bsams nas/bza' ba dang /bca' ba sa la bkram
283b5('dul ba): pa'i stong du rdog pas bsnun pa dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/'phags pa rnams ni bza' ba dang /bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas rtsi bar byed
283b6('dul ba): do zhes smod par byed/phyir kha gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams gyis gsol pa dang /bcom lda 'das kyis
283b7('dul ba): dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba sde ni/dge slong dog bza' ba dang /bca' ba khwa gzhugasa'i zas la rkang pas reg par byed pa yin snyam nas/dge slong
284a1('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong rgan zhugs che ge mo zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bza' ba dang /bca' ba khar gzhugs
284a2('dul ba): pa'i zas sA la bkram pa'i steng du rtog pas bsnun pas/bram ze dang /khyimi bdag rnams smod par byed/phyar ka gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed/de lta bas
284a3('dul ba): na dge slong gi bza' ba dang /btsa' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas bcag par mi bya'o//bcags nu 'gal 'chubs tson du 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal po bram
284a4('dul ba): ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs pa rig nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag rang gi legs
284a5('dul ba): nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bco ldan
284a6('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dge
284a7('dul ba): par ston par mdzad/yang dag por 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng bstod por mdzod/yang dog par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/rnam grang
284b1('dul ba): du par chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par bzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/gdan
284b2('dul ba): las bzhengs te gshegaso//de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dbyar zla ba gsum pa dag 'das nas/chos gos byas pa dang ldan/chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas//btso
284b3('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gricig tu 'dug
284b4('dul ba): nas/dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag tsog gos yul dag mtha' rnamasu dgung zla gsum mchis lags
284b5('dul ba): kyis/btsun pa spyil bu gzhig lagaso//dge slong dag khyed kyis spyil bu ma zhig shig/spyil bu rnams ji srid du yun ring du gnas par gyur pa de srid du sbyin
284b6('dul ba): bdag gis bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ba nyid dang /bstod nam so bskyed par 'gyur ba nyid do/bzhi po 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang /sbyin bdag gi bsod nams/
284b7('dul ba): kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /dge ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /bde ba'i gzhi yin par rig par bye ste/gizha gang zhe na/dge slong tshul khrims dang ljon zhing dge ba'i chos
285a1('dul ba): la gnas pa zhig/gang gis tsug lags khyang na gnas shing /sems kyi ting 'dzin tshad med pa'i lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas/rdzogs
285a2('dul ba): par byas te/gnas na gzhi de la sbyin pa po dang /sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /dede d+hI mun pa de ni ga tu med par rig par bya'o//gtsug ldeg
285a3('dul ba): khang ji lta bar chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /granas mal yang de dang 'dra ste/bskyod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /dge ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /bde ba'i gzhi
285a4('dul ba): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa dang /sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyis tshad re shig bsod nams sram/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/bsod nams kyi
285a5('dul ba): 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa'i do tso mo zhes gzung bar mi nus te/'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o//dper
285a6('dul ba): na chu bo chen po lnga po 'di lta ste/gang ga dang /yA mun dang /sar su dang /gnas ldan du chen po zhes bya ba de dag 'bab cing 'dra bar 'gyur ba dro la ni/chu'i tshad chu 'am dum
285a7('dul ba): pa 'am/chu bum pa brgya 'am/chu bum pa stong ngam/chu bu mo pa brgya stong 'di snyed ces gzung bar mi nus te/'on kyang chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i tshogs chen po zhes
285b1('dul ba): bya ba'i grasu 'gro ba de bzhin du/bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /dge ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa dang /sbyin bdag gi bsod nams
285b2('dul ba): kyi tshad bsod nams sami/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes gzung ba ri mo nus te/'on kyang bsod
285b3('dul ba): nams che ba'i phyir/bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o//ji ltar rgya mtsho bkra shis gtsang la dag/rigs sa badri rIn chen 'byung gnas
285b4('dul ba): mtsho mchog dor//mi dang ri dgas tshogs kyi bsten pa yi//chu khe so so nas 'byab 'du ba ltar//de bzhin gos dang zas sgom stong pa'i mi//ma lo cha stan dang
285b5('dul ba): gding ba sbyin byed la//bsod nams rgyun ni kun nas 'du 'gyur te//dper na rgya mtshor chu klung 'bab pa bzhin//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad
285b6('dul ba): gcod po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sprin+da las ci zhig mdzad na/gang gri na phyag drong /zhabs dang /dbu la
285b7('dul ba): sogs pa bkum pa la sogs pa/bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis slongs mo pa'i skye bo tshim par mdzad de/bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du sems
286a1('dul ba): can gyis dron gyi slad du/bdag nyid 'o rtul nas mdzad pa thams cad mdzad lags pa/yul drug mtha na dge sbyong lnga bcu
286a2('dul ba): gnyis kyi ma chod pa dang /thabs gcig tu nas rul pa gsol la tshe dang ldan pa shU ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis no bdud rtsi 'tshal legs/bcom
286a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sngon gyi tshe rab gzhan rnam su las byas shing pasags pa zhes bya ba nas/lus
286a4('dul ba): can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dge sngon byu skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs
286a5('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/drade bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
286a6('dul ba): bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigasu shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de 'khor dge slong bad+yad khri darjod
286a7('dul ba): rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na nye bar brten cing bzhugaso//de'i tshe rgyal po pho brang gnyen ldan na/tshogs rnams slob par byed pa'o bram ze zhig
286b1('dul ba): lnga brgya'i tshogs la bram ze'i gsung tshig 'don du 'jug ste/'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang lhag par bkur sti byas/rim gro byas rjed par byas/ma chod par
286b2('dul ba): byas te/dgra bcom par bkur ro//gang kho na nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzugs/rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ljin du gshegs pa de kho na nus
286b3('dul ba): bzung ste/de la su yang bkur bstir bya ba dang /rim gror bya ba dang /rjed par bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba mi byed pa dang /de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
286b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa la shin tu phrag dog skyes par gyur to//rje tsam ni dge slong slob pa dang /mi slob pa
286b5('dul ba): rab tu mang po snga dro shams thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /de nas
286b6('dul ba): tshad ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /'bras can+da gyis lhung bzed bkang ste/slar log pa bram ze des mthong nas dris pAM/kye dge slong dag ji 'dra ba'i braso
286b7('dul ba): nams zhig rnyed lta'o//de dag drang po'i rang bzhin yin pas bstan pa dang /de phrag dog deng gi rang bzhin can zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas/bram ze'i
287a1('dul ba): khye'u rnams la bos te smras pa/dge slong mgo reg 'di dag ni tshong ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /'bras chun za bar 'os pa ma yin gyi/nas rdul
287a2('dul ba): pa za bar 'os pa yin no//de rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang nas/mkhan pa de de lta lags te/dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni tshed me ro sna tshogs drang ldan pa dang 'bras
287a3('dul ba): chan 'tshal bar 'os pa ma lags kyi/nas rul pa 'tshul bar 'os pa lag so//de na yang bram ze'i khyi'u bzang po dad pa can dge ba'i bsamu pa can gnyis shig 'dug pa de
287a4('dul ba): dag gi mkhan po de skad ma gsung shig/'di dag ni bdug nyid chen po ste/lha'i bdud rtsi 'tshal por nges pa lags kyis/nas rul ba ni 'os ma lagaso zhes so//dge slong
287a5('dul ba): dgra ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus//de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi tshogs rnams la smod par byed pa gang yin pa de'i smin no//bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyar
287a6('dul ba): gnyis kyis ma tshang ba gang yin pa de dag nI dge slong lnga bArgyu ru gnyis kyis ma tshang ba 'di dag yi no//bram ze'i khye'u bzod po dang pA can dge ba'i bsam pa can gonyis po gang yin//
287a7('dul ba): pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di gnyis yon te/ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nyan tho slob pa dang /mi slob pa rnams la sems
287b1('dul ba): gdug pas ngag gi las rtsub mo byung ba dang /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma 'tshang bas rje su yi rung ba dang /gnyis kyis rje su yi rang ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/
287b2('dul ba): bde bar yul dag mthar de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs gcig tunas rul pa gsol to//shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi
287b3('dul ba): bu gnyis ni lce'i bdud rtsis longs spyod do//dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las rnams par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin laM zhes bya ba nas/gcig tu
287b4('dul ba): dkar ba'i las rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyi de lta bu la slab par bya'o//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
287b5('dul ba): dga' bo la dga' stsal pa/kun dga' bo tshugs ka gang na ba der 'dongango //btsun po bka' bzhini 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/
287b6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs lnga len nas ljong rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /tshugs kar gshegs nas/tshugs kri'i chu bo gang+gA'i mgam na bzhugaso//de nas dge slong zhig bcom

288a1('dul ba): la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis 'dor bsdus pa'i chos thos nas gcig tu dben par
288a2('dul ba): bag yod pa/rtul ba dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gonaso//gcig tu dben pa bag yod pa/rtul ba dang ldan pa/bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na/grang gi phyir rigs
288a3('dul ba): kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs nas/gos ngur smig bgos te/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bgyid pa/tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa
288a4('dul ba): de tshe nyid lnga reng gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bslabs nas/bdag gi skye bo zad do//tshangs par spyod pa la brtan to//bye ba byaso//'di las srid
288a5('dul ba): pa gzhan mi sheso zhes go bar bgyid pa'i chos de lta bu me dor bsdus te legs par bshad du gsol zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gA gang
288a6('dul ba): na ba de logasu gzigs pa las/bcom ldan 'das kyis chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun gyis shing sdong po chen po zhig khyer ba gzig so//gzigs nas kyang dge slong de la bka' stsal
288a7('dul ba): pa/dge slong khyod kyis chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun gyis shing sdong po chen po khyer bar mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagaso//gal te 'di tshu rol gyi 'gram du ma chags
288b1('dul ba): pha rol 'gram dang /dbus su ma chags skam lcam byung /mi dang mi ma yin pas ma bzung /klong du ma nub/khong rul par ma gyur na/dge slong shing sdong po chen po de
288b2('dul ba): ni rim gyis rgya mtshor gzhol bar 'gyur/rgya mtshor 'drab par 'gyur/rgya mtshor bab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gal te dge slong khyod kyis tshu rol la ma chags zhes bya ba nas/
288b3('dul ba): khong rul par ma gyur na/de ltar ni dge slong khyod rim gyis mya ngan las 'dres pa la gzhol bar 'gyur/mya ngan las 'das po la 'bab par 'gyur/mya ngan las
288b4('dul ba): 'das pa la bab par 'gyur ro//btsun pa bdag gi mu 'tshal na/tshu rol gyi 'gram ni ci lags/pha rol gyi 'gram ni ci labs/dbus su thogs pa ni ci lags
288b5('dul ba): skam la byung ba ni ci legs/mas gzung ba ni tsI lags/mi mA lags pas bzung ba ni ci lag sA/klong du nug pa ni ci lugs/khong rul pa ni ci lags/pa
288b6('dul ba): ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor smras pa'i chos thos nas zhes bya ba nas/'di la srid pa gzhan mi sheso//zhes bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu mdor
288b7('dul ba): bsdus te/legs par bdeg la bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong tshu rol gyi 'gram zhes bya ba de ni nang gi skye mched drug gi tshig bla dgas
289a1('dul ba): yin no//pha rol gyi 'gram zhes bya ba de ni spyi'i skye mched drug gi tshig bla dgas yin//dbus su thogs pa zhe bya ba de ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags
289a2('dul ba): gyi tshigs bla dgas yin no//skam las byung ba zhes bya ba de ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi tshigs bla dgas yin no//mis bzung ba zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar 'di ni la la rab
289a3('dul ba): tu byung ba dang /khyim pa 'dres par gnas te/dga'o ba mtshungs pa dang /bde ba mtshungs pa dang /badren bde ba dang /sdug bsngal na sdug bsngal zhing /'phral
289a4('dul ba): gyi bya ba byung zhing byung ba rnams yang dag par blangs te/mthar 'byin par byed pa lta bu yin no//mi ma yin pas zin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar 'di ni le la tshul khrims
289a5('dul ba): sau ma/brtul bzhugs sam/dka' thub bam//tshangs par spyod pa brten pa 'dis/bdag lha 'am/lha gang yang rung ba zhig tu gyur tsag ces smon lam btab nA
289a6('dul ba): tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lta bu'o//slong du nub pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'di na la la bslab pa yul nas babs pa lta bu yin//khong rul pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'di na la li/
289a7('dul ba): tshul khrims 'tshal po/sdig pa'i chos can/khong myagos shing phyir 'dzag pa/shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa/lung bong ltar spyod pa dang /dge sbyong ma yin la/dge sbyong du khas tshig tshadas
289b1('dul ba): par spyod pa ma yin par/tshangs par spyod par khas 'tshe ba yod pa lta bu yin te/dge slong khyod kyis glal te de bzhin du tshu rol gyi 'gram du ma thogs pa zhes bya ba nas/mya ngan las 'dra/
289b2('dul ba): pa la bab par 'gyur ro//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/r+b+he su yI radwa nas/bcom ldan 'das
289b3('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgro bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song //de nas dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis shing sdong po chen po'i dpe 'di'i gdams ngag
289b4('dul ba): gris btams te/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/rtul ba dang ldan pa/bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa nA/gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur
289b5('dul ba): smig bgos te/dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla ni med pa de tshe de nyid la reng gi mngon par shes pas
289b6('dul ba): mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nus/bdag gri skyob zad//tshungs par spyod pa la dz+nyAnA to//byA ba byaso//'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes zhes bya ba shes nus go bar byas te/
289b7('dul ba): dang ldan pa de dag bcom pa/sems shan tu rnam par grol bar gyur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dang he cang yang mi ring ba zhig no//gnag rdzi dga' bo zhes bya ba
290a1('dul ba): 'dug par gyur pa kha ra ba la brten nas gnag skyong zhing 'dug pa las de'i khar bas sprul pa zhig rjes//de gnad rnams chad la thug/tshigs rnams byel
290a2('dul ba): thug pa dang /sems bskyed pa/gal te bdag gi lus 'gul tom/skad byung na gzhi des gnag rdzi dga' bos gtam gyi bar chad du 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/bcom
290a3('dul ba): ldan 'das la mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyeso//de nas gnag rdzi dga' bos kha ra ba phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas/
290a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug//phyogs gcig tu 'dug
290a5('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das lnga gnag rdzi dgo' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun+da pa dag ni tshu rol gyi 'gra mo du mr-i chags/pha rol gyi 'gram du mi che gosta/dbus su mi chi
290a6('dul ba): skam par mi byung /mis mi bzung /mi ma lags pas mi bzung /klong du mi 'bying /khong du mi 'dul bar bgyi lagasnga na/legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul bya
290a7('dul ba): la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gis dngos po thob pa lta na/bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//
290b1('dul ba): dga' bo khyod kyis bdag po rnams la gnag/tang dam/btsun pa mi 'tsha lags te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/btsun pa pa rnams kyang gzhon pa bre'u rnams kyang tshar lags te/so so'i gnag/
290b2('dul ba): ra 'tshal bas/so so'i gnasu mchi sra lags pas bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob//
290b3('dul ba): pa lta na/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//dga' ba pa rnams kyang gzhon la/be'u rnams kyang cher te/rang rang gnag ra shes
290b4('dul ba): byas/rang rang gi gnasu 'gro bar 'gyur mod kyi/'on kyang gnog rdzi zas dang /gos bdag glir byed pas ni 'di ltar bdag po rnam la de bya dgos so//de nas gran gA NI dga'
290b5('dul ba): bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas 'jig so//'jig so zhes sgra chen po 'byin cing
290b6('dul ba): rgyug par brtsams pa dang /lam gyi byar nas gnag rdzi dro shes lnga brgyas mthong ste/de rnams kyis smras pa/ci zhig gris 'jigs/des smras pa/skye bso 'jigs
290b7('dul ba): so/rga bas 'jigaso//'tsho bas 'jig so//de rnams kyang de'i phyi bzhin du borgyug par brtsams pa dang /gnag TI dang /byug rdzi dang /rtsa thun dang /shing thun dang /lam gyis
291a1('dul ba): 'tsho ba dang /lam+b+ha grol bar ShA ma gzhan drug r+dz+dzang /de rnams mthong nas/zlartag pAr la/mA sa//snum mdun nas 'ongs
291a2('dul ba): pU rnams kyis de dag de wAr s+thA Sh+Tab+hin mdzod nas/de rnams kyis dris b+h+rUMm+b+ha sman drug 'di ci zhig/d+he rnamAg+nis smras pa/ sa/ nag
291a3('dul ba): gr-i 'jigs stebs 'jigs so//rgyu byas 'jigs s+ho//'argyu byas 'jigs so//dri rnams kyis zlos nas skur mig
291a4('dul ba): ri 'or dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pA/de nas r+yA 'or de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs des/skye bo'i tshogs chen po de mthong naste/srungs pas phan tshun
291a5('dul ba): du 'dong bar byed de/kha cig ni bros so//kha cig nI rdzas rnams sbed do//khru cig ni go bgos nas 'dug go//mi dpa' bo gzhan dag cig
291a6('dul ba): yod pa dgu gis bsu nanus dris pa/shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig/de rnams kyis smras pa/'jigs so//ci zhig gaste 'dzugs/skye bas

291b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par 'gyur//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i dus gnag N+DI dga' bo slong nas ring po ma lon par rigs nas/bcom ldan+d+ha

291b3('dul ba): ste/sdum par gtang lags/shA ri'i bu ge nag rdzi dga' bo sku ra ma nas khyimun gnas pa gang yin pa de ni gnas mi yin zhing go skabs med sogs 'jog yongasu
291b4('dul ba): spyod dang pas 'dod pa rnams long spyod par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do//gan go rdzi dga' bo dre'u re bdag po rnams la gnag gtad/'ong bar 'gyur zhing de gang gi phyir ri/
291b5('dul ba): kyo bu rnam skra dang khwa spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgros nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa che de nyid la
291b6('dul ba): raring gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/rdzogs par byas nas/skye ba zang //tshangs par spyod pa la rten to//bye ba byaso//'di la srid pa gzhan mI sheso//zhes go bar byed pa 'gyur
291b7('dul ba): de nas dus zhig na gnag rdzi dge' bos bdag po rnams lo gnag gtad nas 'khor lnga brgya dang /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la
