292a2('dul ba): chos 'dul ba la rab tu byu bya dang /bstan par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngas pa 'thob pastan/bdag bcom ldan 'das ni sbyi na ste tshangs par spyod pa sgyid byar ba
292a3('dul ba): gas par ga spangs po'i chos dul du kun rjod 'phel nga dang shAr+b+ha b+hU hU~M dad/desmyan par rdzogs pa drin gdu su ba tha~M
292a4('dul ba): sna byu b+h+ri dang / dang ldan pa de zhes byu ba nas sems shin d+he mo pa d+ma sgril bar b+ha ces bya byu bar gang ma bzhin gyi/nyid kyis ma/
292a5('dul ba): s+ho sgyus na sa ring bar ma lon par sems bsum skye bar 'gyur te/byede nas shi 'dzes pa dang gang du skyes pa dang /las dedzi nas yin pa'o//sngan sul
292a6('dul ba): da pa'i sgra'i bus ban+d+has nA/dngu kyi nas shi 'dres pa dang /rgyal can ni sa~M hrI rnams skyes pa dang / seMs nga
292a7('dul ba): dang pas yin no//de dri sum du sems te/dedag gis drang yang nag yin nos/bcom ldan 'das la bskye ba dang /bskyed pang bya ba'i phyir 'gro bani ga
292b1('dul ba): yin gyis/ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phying 'gro'o snya mo//de nas sngon sprul pa byed pa'i lha'i bus rna cha dri ma
292b2('dul ba): med pa g.yo ba thogs nas zhes bya ba nas/gang+gA'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas te/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gos gtor nas/bcom
292b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bsam pa dang /
292b4('dul ba): bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin mkhyen nas/de dang 'thun pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtags par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de thos
292b5('dul ba): pas zhes bya ba nas/thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsngags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
292b6('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/btsun pa bradag ni 'phagaso//mngon par 'phagaso zhes bya ba'i ba re grong ma bzhin du'o//ba dag bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /
292b7('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi legs kyis/bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/skyab su mchi bar
293a1('dul ba): mngon par dad lags//de nas sngon sprul pa byung byed pa'i lha'i bu chang pa thogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /zhing pa lo d+h+r-ig lagasu pa sgyu bu dang/
293a2('dul ba): dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /nad pa nad thams cad la sa thor pa lta bu 'byor pa gang gis/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid
293a3('dul ba): dwadang /rang gi gan su song ngo //dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang /nam gyi cha skad la myi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson zhing gnas pa de rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das
293a4('dul ba): kyi spyan snga na/snang ba rgya chen po mthong ngo //de mthong nas kyang the tshom du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa ci lcags/bcom ldan 'das mdangs bcom
293a5('dul ba): ldan 'das la balci ba'i skud du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong bu bzhi mchis sem/dge slong dbang bcu
293a6('dul ba): ba'i phyir/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs pa yang ma yin/lho rnams kyi dang po rgya ljin yong ma yin 'dzin myong ba bdi yo ts+tshi kyi 'on kyang gan/rdzi dga' bo'i khyer bris sbal pa
293a7('dul ba): brdzis te/gnad rnams kyang chad la thug/tshigs rnams kyang bye la thug pa dang /gnag rdzi dga' bo'i gtam par chad par 'gyuraro snyam nas mi g.yo zhing sgra ma byung
293b1('dul ba): bar 'dug nas/ngal sems mngon par dad par byas nas shA ba dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyes pa de/nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs nas/mya dang ngas
293b2('dul ba): de la chos bshad nas bden pa mthong ste/rang gi gnasu song ba yin no//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
293b3('dul ba): 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa gnag rdzi dga' bo dang /'khor lnga brgyas las ci zhig bgyis na/gnag rdzi dag gi nang du skyes shing /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
293b4('dul ba): rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis lags/sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bus las ci zhig
293b5('dul ba): dgyis na/des na sbal bar skyes par gyur cing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de nyid kyis las byas
293b6('dul ba): shing bsregs la/tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/lus can+da dag la zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskul pa bzang po 'di nyid la/
293b7('dul ba): skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/de bar na se'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar
294a1('dul ba): rten cing bzhug so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de'i gsung rab la gnag rdzi dga' bo rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum pa/chos slu ba/rigs
294a2('dul ba): pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can/'khor lnga brgya pa rtsod pa'i chos la mkhas pa zhig ste/de dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams zhi bar byed pa dang /de nas dge
294a3('dul ba): slong khengs pa nga rgyal can gnyis shig lan 'ga' yang de'i drung du mi 'dong ngo //dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis phan tshun du rtsod pa byung nas/don de'i phyir de gnyis de'i drung
294a4('dul ba): du dong nas/rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/bdag cag gnyis la 'di dang 'di lta bu'i rtsod pa byung na zhi bar mdzad du gsol/des bsams pa/gal te bdag gis
294a5('dul ba): 'di gnyis kyi rtsod pa deng kho na zhi bar byas na rag ma las pas/'di gnyis phyis 'ong bar mi 'gyuraro snyam nas/des dge 'dun thams cad bsags nas rtsod pa de
294a6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi nang du glengs nas chad par ni ma byas so//phyi de nyid yang de la ri 'or du dgos pa zhig byung nas/de der song ba dang /de nas de gnyis kyis thos so zhes
294a7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi nang du rtsod pa de glengs nas/de nas dge 'dun gyis zhi bar byas so//ji tsam na dge slong sde snod gsum pa/de ri 'or de nas 'ongs te lam gyis dub pa
294b1('dul ba): gsal nas lhan cig gnas pa dang /nye gnas rnams la dris pa/re zhig rtsod pa pa dang /rtsod zla gnyis mi 'ong ba dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/mkhan po de gnyis kyi rtsod///
294b2('dul ba): pa de zhi bar bgyis lag so//su zhig gis zhi bar byas/dge 'dun gyiso//ji ltar byas/de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa dang /des ngag rtsub po'i las byung ba/tshe dang
294b3('dul ba): ldan pa dag mi shes te/ji ltar gnag rdzi rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byaso//de rnams kyis kyang mkhan po de de bzhin te/ji ltar gnag rdzi rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa zhi
294b4('dul ba): bAr bgyiso zhes 'thun par smra so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe dus kyi dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de ni/gnag rdzi dga' bo 'di nyid yin no//
294b5('dul ba): de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /nye gnas lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni gnag rdzi lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yino//gang yang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
294b6('dul ba): 'od srung gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la gnag rdzi zhes bya ba'i tshig smras shing /lhan cig gnas pa dang /nye gnas rnams kyis kyang 'thun par smras pas/las de'i
294b7('dul ba): rnam par smin pas/tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'khor lnga brgya dang /gnag rdzi rnamasu skyes par 'gyur te/gang 'dis blags shing bton pas/phung po la mkhas pa dang /
295a1('dul ba): khams la mkhas pa dang /skye mched la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /gnas dang gnas ma yin
295a2('dul ba): pa la mkhas par byas pas/da ltar 'di 'khor lnga brgya dong /nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
295a3('dul ba): sum du byaso//dge slong dag sngon sbal pa byed pa'i lha'i bu yang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung kho na'i gsung rab la dge slong spong ba pa zhig tu
295a4('dul ba): gyur te/ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang /ri 'or zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der son to//de mtshan mo'i thun dang po la skyil mo krung bcas te/yid la bya
295a5('dul ba): ba goms par bya bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na 'don pa byed pa'i dge slong rnams kha ton byed pa dang /bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas/de sgras
295a6('dul ba): sems rtse gcig nyid du ma btub nas/des bsams pa/'di dag kha ton zer du chug gung thun la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas/gud thun la langs te 'dug pa dang //
295a7('dul ba): ji tsam na dge slong gzhan dang kha ton byed nas/des bsams pa/thun tha ma la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas/de thun tha ma la langs te 'dug pa dang /ji tsam na gzhan
295b1('dul ba): da kha ton byed nus/de 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pas kun nas bkris pa drag po skyes nas/des smras pa/'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni sprul pa bzhin maN+Dan//
295b2('dul ba): thog zag sgra 'byin to zhes byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/dge slong sdong ba pa gong yin pa de ni sngan sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di nyid yin te/gang yang 'dis
295b3('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la sprul pa zhes tshig tu smras pas/las de'i rnam par smin pas tshwa rabs lnga brgyar sbal par skyes par
295b4('dul ba): gyur te/da lta'i bar yang sbal por skyes pa yin//gang yang ngal sems mngon par dad par byas pas/des na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyes par gyur
295b5('dul ba): toHgang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pas/des na da ltar bden pa mngon par byaso//dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig
295b6('dul ba): tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya bo nas brtson par bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//zhes de skad
295b7('dul ba): ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+ga rgal ba dang /de na ngang pa dang /nya dang /rus sbal lnga brgyas bskor te/
296a1('dul ba): bskor bar bya'o//de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa mdzad de/bzhin bzangs dag 'di ltar 'du byed thams
296a2('dul ba): cad ni mi rtag pa'o//chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o//mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin pas/nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis la/ci nas kyang dung
296a3('dul ba): 'gro'i skye gnas la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyis shig/de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/gang bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la tshig gsum gyi chos thos nas//
296a4('dul ba): kha zas bcad pa dang /dud 'gro'i skye gan su song ba rnams ni me'i shas che bas dus las 'das te shi 'phos pa dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyeso//chos
296a5('dul ba): nyid kyis lha'i bu 'am/lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po me lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /gang du skyes pa dang /las gang gis
296a6('dul ba): yin pa'o//de rnams kyis bltas na/dud 'gro dag las shi 'phos nas/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyes pa dang /zhes bya ba nas/me tog man da ras
296a7('dul ba): thu ba bkang ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dang /chu bo gang ga snang bas gsal bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/bcom ldan 'das la
296b1('dul ba): kun bskor te 'dug go/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsams pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin mkhyen nas/de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i
296b2('dul ba): bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bstsags pa'i 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye
296b3('dul ba): shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang /des lan gsum du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/
296b4('dul ba): btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas ma bgyis te/mas ma lags/rang gi skye bo dang /gnyen gyi tshogs dang sdug pas ma lags/rgyal pos ma lags/lha
296b5('dul ba): rnams kyi ma lags/sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/dge sbyong dang bram zes ma ldogs pa gang lags pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/sems
296b6('dul ba): can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnams nus ni rkang pa drangs/lha dang mi rnamasu ni rab tu bkod/'khor ba las ni ring du mdzad/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni
296b7('dul ba): bskam/rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i
297a1('dul ba): 'jug tshogs la lta ba'i ri rje mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs byaSh+Ti bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/btsun
297a2('dul ba): pa bdag cag ni 'phag so//mngon par 'phagaso//bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge sbyong gi dge 'dun la skyab su mchi lcags kyis/
297a3('dul ba): bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho bi'i bar du srog deng yang bsngos te skyab su mchi byar mngon par dad lag so//dri nas ston nya dang /dang
297a4('dul ba): pa dang /rus skal byed byed po'i lha'i bu de rnams tshong pa khe sgrogs rnyed pa lta bu dang zhes bya ba nas rang gi gan su dong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong
297a5('dul ba): rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das lnga zhus pa/btsun pA hUM dang /dong pa dang /rus sbrul 'di rnams kyis lus
297a6('dul ba): zhen 'gyis ni/des ni dang bla das nya dang /nus sbrul rnam sa skyes lags/las ci zhig bgyis nAM/des nI lha rnams skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis
297a7('dul ba): mnas/tsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong da ngang pa dang /nywadang /rus skul 'dridug nyid kyi se sa byos shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed par
297b1('dul ba): ni zhes bya ba nas/lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba skul pa bzang po 'di nyid la/skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thuH
297b2('dul ba): pa na/ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/de ba ra na sa'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhug so zhes bya ba'i
297b3('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de'i bstan pa la de rnams rab tu byung bar gyur te/de na dge slong de rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo rnams dral bas/las de'i rnam par smin
297b4('dul ba): pas nya dang /ngang pa dang /rus sbal rnamasu skyes par gyur to//gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na lha rnam su skyes par gyur to//gang yang dag
297b5('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa des na bden pa mthong bar byaso//dge slong dag de lta bas na/gocig tu gnag pa'i las rnams
297b6('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal
297b7('dul ba): to/8zhes byi ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+ga rgal ba dang /yi dogs sdong dum tshig pa lta bu/keng rus bsgreng ba lta bu rang gi sgras
298a1('dul ba): lus yog pa/ltor yul ltar 'dub pa/kha khab kyi mig tsam yod pa 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tung bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur pa
298a2('dul ba): lnga brgya tsam gyis yongasu bskor nas de rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa bdag cag yi dgas rnams ni rnam par ltung ba'i lus
298a3('dul ba): can rnams lags te/sngon gyi las kyis nongs pas chab kyang mi rnyed lags na/tshal ma mthong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/khyod ni thugs rje chen po mnga' ba lags na/
298a4('dul ba): bdag cag la chab stsol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis wa rnams la chu bo gang+gA bstan nas/chu bsil skyo bo kun gyis nye bar spyad bya ba//skal ldan shing rta klung chen 'di ni grong
298a5('dul ba): khyer dang //yul 'khor dag dang grong khyer tshim par byed cing 'bab//zhing rnang sa lu ku mu da dang ud pa la spun//yi dgas rnams kyis gsol pa/chu bo skye bo kun gyis nye bar
298a6('dul ba): spyod bgyi ba//skal ldan shing rta 'bab 'dre bdag cag rnams la skams//'di ni khrag go dri mas gang zhing lhag pa na//dbyug pa dgra star bcas pa thogs pas 'di bsrung
298a7('dul ba): mthong //bcom ldan 'das kyis dang bA'i lha la bka'i stsal pa/khyod ni grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer tshim byed cing //zhing rnangs lu ku mu da dang ut+pal spun//ci phyir yi
298b1('dul ba): dwags skom pas rab nyin chem mi byed//khyod la byis pa'i skye bo sdug bsngal snying rje med//gang+ga'i lhas gsol pa/byis pa'i skye bo la bdag 'jigs pas ma lags shing
298b2('dul ba): tshig rtsub rgyus kyang mi mthun chab gtong mi bgyid//nongs bgyis sgrib pa chen pos bsgribs pa 'di dag la//chu bo skams gyur 'di la bdag gis ci zhig nongs//de nas bcom
298b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu yi dgas rnams la chu lud cig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa
298b4('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/yi dwags rnams la chu glud par brtsams pa dang /yi dgas de rnams kyi kha khab mig tsam po dag bskyed
298b5('dul ba): par ma nuso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/de rnams kyi kha bskyed nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos chu glud pa dang /de rnams skom pas nyen
298b6('dul ba): pas mang du 'thungs pas lto rgyas par gyur te//de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dang ba bskyed nas/shi'o zhes bya ba nas/'don pa mthong nas/rang gi gan su
298b7('dul ba): song zhes bya ba'i bar gong mo bzhin du'o//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa ye
299a1('dul ba): dgas 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/des na yi dgas rnamasu skyes lpags/las ci zhig bgyis na des na lha rnams skyes nas
299a2('dul ba): bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa dag ni/
299a3('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzung ba 'di nyid la/skye dgu'i tshe
299a4('dul ba): lho nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/de ba ra na so'i grong khyer nas/drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhun
299a5('dul ba): so zhes bya ba'i bar grong ma bzhin du'o//de'i nyan thos rnams kyis dad pas bslangs nas/spangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la bya ba byed do//gang gi tshe yang
299a6('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa rgyas par ma gyur pa de'i tshe dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong yang nyung bar gyur to//gang gi tshe rgyas par
299a7('dul ba): gyur pa de'i tshe/dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong yang mang bar gyur to//ji tsam na 'dun khang zhig/dge bsnyen lnga brgya 'ga' zhig gi phyir lhag so shing 'dus par gyur pa
299b1('dul ba): dang /dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong rab tu mang po dag de rnams kyi drung du dong nas/sbyin du gzhug par 'dod pa na/de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pa drag pos dag rtsub pa'i ltas//
299b2('dul ba): phyung ba/'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni yi dgas rnamasu skyes pa bzhin rtag tu lag pa zad par byedado zhes smras//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/dge bsnyen lnga brgya po
299b3('dul ba): gang dgra yin pa de dag ni yi dgas lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/gang yang 'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la yi
299b4('dul ba): dgas kyi tshig smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyur yi dgas rnamasu skyes par gyur te/da lta'i bar du yang yi dgras rnamasu skyes pa yino//gang
299b5('dul ba): yang de la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na/lha rnamasu skyeso//gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la skyab su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i bzhi blangs
299b6('dul ba): pa des na bden pa mthong bar byas//dge slong dag de lta bas ni gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin po ni gcig tu gnog pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/bstsal
299b7('dul ba): bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed cog gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo
300a1('dul ba): gang+ga las rgal ba na/glang po che'i sta stangs kyis g.yas phyogs nas/chu ba gang+gA gzigs pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la

306b7('dul ba): gis btsun pa/'od zer nyi ma sbyong bas ldog pa/rin pa che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/dag de'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can rnam

307b1('dul ba): ba dang bskrun par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
307b2('dul ba): rnams dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//bcom
307b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de rnams la gdams ngag byin nas/de rnams kyis 'bad pa dang /brtsal ba drag po zhes bya ba nas/mngon du spro bar bya bar gyur to//zhes bya ba'i
307b4('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o//glang de dag kyang gnya' shing dang /ru dag bcad nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na bro der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das la kun nas
307b5('dul ba): bskor nas 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/dper na chu bo pang+ga rgal te gshegs
307b6('dul ba): pab ni/dad pa dang /s+ya dang /lus sbal rnams kyis bden pa mthong nus/rang gi gan su skyong ba bzhi no//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad
307b7('dul ba): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa ston zhing pa bgyid pa'i dge slong 'di dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/las nge zhing par gyur/bcom
308a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/sngon glang
308a2('dul ba): bgyid bgyid pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag gis kyang las ci zhig bgyis nA/des na glang rnamasu skyes shing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
308a3('dul ba): stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong
308a4('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas//
308a5('dul ba): de ba ra na so'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhug so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de'i bstan pa la zhing po lnga brgya po 'di
308a6('dul ba): rnams rab tu byung bar gyur te/de na 'di dag gis ma klags ma bton/yid la bya ba goms par ma byaso//'on kyang dad pas byin pa zos shing zos nas 'du
308a7('dul ba): 'ji la chags te/pi los dus 'das par byas//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/dge slong lnga brgya po gang yin pa de ni zhing pa lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin no//
308b1('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gi bdag po gang yin pa de ni zhing pa 'di dag gang gi yin pa'i khyim bdag 'di nyid yin te/gang yang 'di dag gi gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i dad pas
308b2('dul ba): byin pa zos nas/ma brags/mA bton yid la bya ba goms par ma byas la/'du 'ji la chags pa te/le los 'das par byas pa'i las des na/tshe rabs lnga brgyar
308b3('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de'i zhing pa rnamasu gyur te/da lta'i bar du yang zhing bar skyes pa yino//'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi
308b4('dul ba): bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa des na da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid
308b5('dul ba): mngon sum du byas//sngon grang byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di rnams kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gyur te/'di
308b6('dul ba): dag gis de na/bslab pa'i gzhi phra m+bo phra mo rnams dral bas/las des na glang rnam su skyeso//gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa ngas na lha rnamasu
308b7('dul ba): skyeso//gang yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srung la tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing bsrungs pa da ltar lha'i bur gyur nas/bden pa mthong bar byaso//
309a1('dul ba): dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtul bar
309a2('dul ba): bya ste/dge slong dag khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang /
309a3('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo chu mongs gang na ba der 'dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
309a4('dul ba): 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das chu mangs su gshegs pa dang /phyogs gzhan zhig na/bram ze zhig zhing rme do//de nas bram ze des/sangs
309a5('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa zhes bya ba nas kun nas bzang ba
309a6('dul ba): mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar grong mo gong ma bzhin du'o//des bsam pa/gal te shes lhun go'u ta ma'i drung du phyag 'tshal du song na ni/bdag gi las 'tsher/'on te
309a7('dul ba): phyag 'tshal du ma song na ni/bsod nams yongasu nyams par 'gyur na/de la gang gis na las kyang mi 'tshor la/bsod nams kyang yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur
309b1('dul ba): 'o thabs bzang ba ji yod snum pa las/de blo skyes pa/'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du phyag byas na/de lta na las kyang mi 'char yaH/bsod nams kyang yongasu nyams par
309b2('dul ba): mi 'gyuraro snyam nas/des ji ltar lcag gzer bu can nyid thogs shing gnas de nyid ni 'dog bzhin du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalo zhes phyag byaso//
309b3('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo bram ze 'dis nyes te/pha bi la sa phyogs 'di na/yang dag par rdzogs
309b4('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig par bzhug so snyam pa de lta bu'i so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes shig yod par gyur na nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs
309b5('dul ba): te phyag byas pa zhig/de lta na pha bis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis la phyag byas par 'gyur ba zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir
309b6('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring srel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa bzhugs pa'i phyiraro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos myur ba myur bar bla gos
309b7('dul ba): phrag pa gcig tu byas te bting nas/bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ris gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugasu gsol/de nas sa phyogs
310a1('dul ba): 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis kyis longs spyad par 'gyur lags te/gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
310a2('dul ba): 'od srung dang /gang yang da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyiso//bcom ldan 'das kyis gadran po shams pa nyid la bzhugaso//bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la
310a3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsgyel gyi tshogs mA zhig pa rnams blta bar 'dod dam/bcom ldan
310a4('dul ba): 'dras da de'i dus la bab lagasaso//bde bar gshegs pa da de'i dus la bab lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
310a5('dul ba): gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa gang dge slong rnams la bstan pa mthong lags na/dge slong rnams sems mngon par dad par 'gyur lag so//bcom ldan
310a6('dul ba): 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe sgrog
310a7('dul ba): chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas/klu rnams kyis bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig
310b1('dul ba): gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gI ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa gzigs
310b2('dul ba): par bzhed par mthong nas/de nas de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig par phyung ba dang /de nas bcom ldan
310b3('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rtags zung shig/nub par 'gyur ro zhes pa dang nub bo//rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis
310b4('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa/nyan thos rnams la bstan to zhes thoso//thos nos kyang ngo mtshar skyes nas/
310b5('dul ba): btsun mo dang /gzhon nu dang /blon po dang /khrom gyi ru ba dang /grong mi dang /yul mi rnams dang lhan cig cha so//de bzhin du lus 'phags po dang /khyim bdag
310b6('dul ba): mngon med zas sbyin dang /drang srong sbyin dang /so phag mkhan rnying pa dag dang /ri dwag su 'dzin gyi ma s+yai ga dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma ngo mtshar skyes
310b7('dul ba): chaso//kha cig sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul ba dang /ji tsam na de mi snang bar gyur to//de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
311a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de'i ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa nub par gyur /zhes thos so//zlos nas kyang yang de rnams kyis
311a2('dul ba): bdag cag 'dir lhags pa dag la ni don med par gyur to/zhes sdug bsngal ba dang /yid myi bde ba skyeso//dge bsnyen zhig gris sa phyogs der bskor ba byas
311a3('dul ba): nas/sems la sems kyis 'di snyam du mngon par 'dus byas te/bdag gis 'di la gom pa bor bas bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /
311a4('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i 'gyod pa skyes pa bsal ba'i phyir dang /dge bsnyen de'i bsam pa yang thugasu chud nas tshig su bcad de
311a5('dul ba): gsungs pa/mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas//sangs rgyas mchod rten dog le gom 'dor ni//dem+bu chu bo'i gser gyi slang tshad ni//stong phrag brgyar
311a6('dul ba): yang de dang mnyam pa min//dge bsnyen gzhan zhig gis yang sa phyogs der 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig bzhug nas/sems kyisgo 'di snyam du mngon par 'dus
311a7('dul ba): byas te re shig/gom pa bor ba'i bsod nams kyang de skyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/'di la 'jim pa'i gong bu bzhag pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu
311b1('dul ba): 'gyur snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge bsnyen de'i bsam pa thub smra chud nas tshig su bcad de gsungs pa/gang zhig rab dang sems kyis sangs//
311b2('dul ba): rgyas kyi//mchod rten la ni 'jim gang 'dzag byed na//dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi gong bu no//stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min//de thos nas srog chags brgya stong
311b3('dul ba): phrag du ma dag gis kyang 'jim pa'i gong bu bcer to//gzhan dag gis de la me tog sel mas gtor nas/sems kyis 'di snyam du mngon par 'dus byas gom+bi pas
311b4('dul ba): bar ba dang /'jim pa'i gong bu'i bsod nams kyang de skyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/bdag cag gi me tog sil mo rnams la bsod nams ji snyed cig tu
311b5('dul ba): 'gyur snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsgom pa thugasu chud nas tshigasu bcad de gsungs pa/gang zhig rab dang sems kyis sangs rgyus kyi/
311b6('dul ba): mchod rten me tog sil ma sbyangs byas 'byor/dzam+b+ha chu bo'i gsar gyi dri bo ni//stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min//gzhan dag gis de la me tog gi phreng bas
311b7('dul ba): bskor ba byas nas/sems kyi mngon par 'dus byas pa me tog sil mo rnams kyi bsod nams de skyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/bdag cag gis me
312a1('dul ba): gi phreng bas bskor ba la bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugasu chud
312a2('dul ba): nanus/tshig su bcad de gsungs pa/mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas//sangs rgyas mchod rten me tog phreng bskor ba//dzam+b+ha chu bo'i gser gyi sgrom dag ni//
312a3('dul ba): stong phrag brgyar yang de dang mnyam pa min//gzhan dag gis de la mar me'i phreng ba phul nas/sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/me tog phreng bas bskor ba'i
312a4('dul ba): bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/bdag cag gis me mar phul ba'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das
312a5('dul ba): kyis de dag gi bsam pa thugasu chud nas/tshig su bcad de gsungs pa/mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas//sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me 'bul byed na/
312a6('dul ba): dzam+b+ha chu bo'i gser srang bye ba ni//stong phrag brgyar yang de dang mnyam pa min//gzhan dag gis de la dri chus chag chag btab nAs/sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas
312a7('dul ba): pa mar me phul ba'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/bdag cag gis dri'i chus chag chag btab pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam
312b1('dul ba): pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugasu chud nas tshogasu bcad de gsungs pa/mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas//sangs rgyas mchod
312b2('dul ba): rten dri chus 'thor byed na//dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi phung po ni//stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min//gzhan dag gis de la gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang
312b3('dul ba): 'phyan btabs nas/sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/gom pa bor ba dang /'jim gong bzhag pa dang /me tog sil mas gtor ba dang /me tog phreng bas
312b4('dul ba): bskor ba dang /me mar phul ba dang /dri chus gtor ba'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs nA/bdag cag gis gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
312b5('dul ba): 'phen btags pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsum pa thugasu chud nas tshig su bcad de gsungs
312b6('dul ba): parab dang sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod rten la//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phen ni 'dogs byed ni//gser ni ri bo lhun po dang mnyam pa//stong phrag brgya yang
312b7('dul ba): de dang mnyam pa min//rgya mtsho lta bu'i rdzogs sangs rgyas//de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa//ded dpon bla na med pa la/yon du bshad pa de yin//de rnams 'di
313a1('dul ba): snyam du/de la shig bcom ldan 'das yongs mya ngan las 'das pa lnga sgru ba byas pa'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//
313a2('dul ba): nag bzhugs pa la bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsams thugasu chud nas tshig su brjid de gsungs
313a3('dul ba): 'don sems rab dang byas nas//gang zhig bzhugs dang gang zhig ni//mya ngan 'das la mchod byed pa//bsod nams man+tam ste khyad par med//'di ltar sangs
313a4('dul ba): rgyas bsam mi khyab/sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/bsam mi khyib lnga dang rnams kyi//rnam par smin bya'ang bsam mi khyab//yang dag par rdzobs pa'i sangs
313a5('dul ba): rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo thog pa meng pa byaskor ba bsam gyos mi khyab pa de dag gi yonA tan ni rtogs par mi nus//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi skye blo'i tshogs chen po
313a6('dul ba): del glang thos na/srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste//tha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed/kha cig gis ni rang sangs
313a7('dul ba): rgyas kyi byang chub tu/kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur po thob/kha cig gis ni rtse mo//
313b1('dul ba): bcag gis ni bdun pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dag/khu cig+sa gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byasngo//kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bya/
313b2('dul ba): kha cig gis ni phyir me 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas/'khor de las phal cher ni
313b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas la gozhol ba/chos la 'bab/dge 'dun la bab par bkod pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad//bram ze dang /khyim bdag can pa can rnams kyis phyogs
313b4('dul ba): de nyid du dus ston btsu pa dang /den nu ma nga ston na chu mangs des skyon can zhes bya bar grags//de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la nas stongs rgyu zhing gshegs padang/
313b5('dul ba): mnyan yid du byon nas/mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhugaso//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom
313b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kau stso la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /mnyan yod du byon nas/mnyan yod na rgyal bya rgyal byed k+ShiM tshul gyi bdag gi kun dgu'i ra ba na bzhugaso
313b7('dul ba): zhes thos//bos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dang ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/phyogs gcig tu dus
314a1('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston
314a2('dul ba): par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dge par gzeng stod par mdzad ces bya ba nas/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung
314a3('dul ba): do zhes bya ba'i bar gong mya bzhin du'o//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin sten las langs te zhes bya ba nas/bcom ldan 'das gang nA ba der log su thal
314a4('dul ba): myo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par bdugs
314a5('dul ba): tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba drug sta gon byas nas/nang par sngar langs te
314a6('dul ba): stan po ting nas nor bu'i chu snod skya gon byas nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol pa/btsun pa
314a7('dul ba): gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsom/sgo srung gi mi la bsgo ba/kyi nang rje re shig/sangs rgyas pa
314b1('dul ba): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du/gzhan mu gas pa dag nang du ma btang shig/de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa la sbyin no//jo bo dka' bzhin
314b2('dul ba): 'tshal zhes sgo srung gi mis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin las mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs/lhung bzed dang chos gros bsnams
314b3('dul ba): te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/stan
314b4('dul ba): ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dgon pa'i grwanas mal zhig nas/sku dang
314b5('dul ba): kha spu ring zhing chos gos ngan pa zhig gyon te rgyal byed du 'ongs te/des bltas na rgyal byed kyi tshal stong par 'dug nas/des dge skyos la dris pa/sangs rgyas la sogs
314b6('dul ba): po dge slong gi dge 'dun gang du bzhud/ngos smras pa/khyim bdag mgon med zos skyon gyis spyan drangaso//des bsams pa/de nyid du bsod snyoms bza' zhing sangs
314b7('dul ba): rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/de khyim bdog mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du song ba dang /sgo srungs kyis smras pa/'phags
315a1('dul ba): pa nang du ma bzhud par bzhugs shig/ci'i phyir khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mched nas re shig/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
315a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gdugs tshong ma gsol gyi bar du/gzhan mu stegs pa dog nang du ma btang shig/de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa rnams la sbyin zhes bsgo lagaso/tshe dang ldan pa
315a3('dul ba): 'od srung chen pos bsams pa/gang bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis bdag la dge sbyong shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin no zhes bya bar ma shes pa de ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs
315a4('dul ba): par rnyed kyis song la skye bo bkren pa rnams la snying rje byaro snyam du bsams te/bskyed mos tshal du song nas/des bsams pa/deng bdag gis su zhig rje su bzung bar
315a5('dul ba): bya snyam pa dang /re shig cig tu na grong phyi nyug ma mdzes thebs pa/lus zhigs shing lus las rnag khrag 'dzag pa zhig slongs mo pa rgyu zhing 'dug nas de'i drung du song ba
315a6('dul ba): dang des kyang bslangs na 'bras khu zhig rnyed nas/des tshed ldan 'od srung chen po lus mdzes pa dang /sems dang zhing spyod lam zhi bar mthong nas/des gsams pa ngos
315a7('dul ba): bar bdag gis yon gnas 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas pas/des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gan su gyur gyis/gal te 'phags pa 'od srung chen pos bdag la thugs brtse ba'i
315b1('dul ba): phyir 'bras khu ba zhes na bdag gis 'di dbu lo snyam pa dang /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/lhung bzed bzed de/sring mo gal te khyod
315b2('dul ba): kyis btang ba yin na/lhung bzed 'dir lugs shig/de nas des sems mngon par dad par byas nas/lhung bzed der blugs pa dang /sbrang ma zhig lhung ngo //des de 'byung bar
315b3('dul ba): brtsams pa dang /'bras bu de'i nang du sor mo gcig chad de lhu ngo //des bsams pa/'phags pas bdag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ma phor zad kyi/'on kyang gsol ni
315b4('dul ba): rigaka so lo snyam pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos dri'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/de'i mngon sum kho nar 'bab pa'i rtsig drung zhig tu 'dug nas 'thungs pa dang
315b5('dul ba): des bsams pa/cung zad du na bdag gis sems bsrung ba'i phyir gsol gyi/'on kyang 'dis zas kyi go chod par ni ma byas snyam pa dang /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
315b6('dul ba): bos de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/grong phyi nyug ma de la 'di skad ces smraso//sring mo rab tu dga' ba skyed cig dang /khyod kyis byin pa'i zas 'dis kho bo nyin zhag
315b7('dul ba): gcig 'da' bar bya'o//de lhag par dga' ba skyes nas bdag gis 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la bsod snyoms la stabs na bzheso snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la
316a1('dul ba): sems dang ba bskyed nas/shi bas dga' ldan gyi lha'i rig su skyeso//lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i 'bras khu zhig phul nas sems mngon
316a2('dul ba): par dad par byas nas/shi ba mthong na//gang du skyes pa ma mthong nas/des sems can dmyal bar rtag pa brtsams na yang ma mthong /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas dang /
316a3('dul ba): mi dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnamasu yang ma mthong ste/'di ltar lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug gi/gong du mi 'ju
316a4('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi//bam po bzhi bcu pa/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan
316a5('dul ba): 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/'od srung bdag nyid chen po can//bsod snyoms phyir ni rgyu ba na//'od srung 'bras khu phul ba yi//bud med de ni
316a6('dul ba): gar dga' lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' ldan zhes bya'i lha de rnams//'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa ste//'od srung 'bras khu phul ba yi//
316a7('dul ba): bud med da ni de na dga'//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/re shig mi 'di dag ni bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong na sbyin pa dag gtong
316b1('dul ba): bsod nams dag byed na/bdag bsod nams dag mngon sum du mthong zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa go/ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi gtang /bsod
316b2('dul ba): nams dag mi bya snyam nas/'phags pa 'od srung chen po 'di ni sdug pa dang /mgon med pa bkren pa dang /phongs pa la thugs brtse ba yin gyis/mA la bdag
316b3('dul ba): gis 'di la bsod snyoms bstabs par bya'o snyam du bsams na/bkren pa'i srad du khyim shig shig tu 'dug par lhang lhong rdal pa shin tu mi bzang ba zhig sprul nas/
316b4('dul ba): bdag nyid tha ga pa sgra yegs pa/sha na'i ras kyi slad g.yogs gyon pa/rkang leg saur ga byung ba zhig tu sprul nas ras 'thag par brtsam so//lha mo bde sogs kyang
316b5('dul ba): bya ga pa'i chung ma'i cha byad du byas nas ras skud 'dzu bar brtsam so//de'i phyogs gcig tu ni lce'i zhal zlas zhig ste gon byas te bzhag pa dang /de nas tshe dung ldan pa
316b6('dul ba): 'od srung chen po bkren pa dang /mgon med pa dang /phongs pa'i skye bo rnams la rje su brtse ba'i phyir rim gyis khang paM der phyin nas/'di ni sdug bsngal ba zhigo zhes ltung
316b7('dul ba): bzed bzed nas sgor bsdad pa dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i zhal zas kyis bkong ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'di snyam du/'di zas
317a1('dul ba): /rtswa'i bdud rtsi la//khyim gyi sbyangs ni 'di tsam pas//shin tu 'ga'o zhes bsams te//bdag gI snying la the tshom skyes//'di ni chos
317a2('dul ba): nyid yin te/dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma bsams par ye shes mthong bar mi 'jug pas/bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /ji tsam na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
317a3('dul ba): yin par mthong nas/des smras pa/kau shi ka 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi yun ring po nas
317a4('dul ba): rje su 'brel ba'i the tshom da /som+b+ha tI'i zug rngu rdzu nas phyung zin na/ci'i phyir skye bo sdug bsngal ba'i bar chad byed/'phags pa 'od srung chen po skye bo sdug bsngal
317a5('dul ba): ba'i bar chad ci ste bgyid/re shig mi 'di rnams ni bsod nams ngag mngon sum du ma mthong na yang sbyin pa dag btong bsod nams drag bgyid ma 'ad bsod nams
317a6('dul ba): dag mngon sum du mthong zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa go/ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi gtad+ya/bsod nams ngag mi bgyid/bcom ldan 'das kyang
317a7('dul ba): bsod nams dag ni bya dgos te/bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur//bsod nams dag ni byas po yis//'jig rten 'di dang pha rol dga'//zhes ma
317b1('dul ba): gsungs sam/de'i phyin chad tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bsams nas/khyim rnam su bsod snyoms la 'gro bar brtsams//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
317b2('dul ba): na mkha' la 'dug bzhin du/lha'i zhal zas kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung gi lhung bzod 'gangs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos kyang lhung bzed khas phub pas
317b3('dul ba): bza' ba dang /btung ba bri bar gyur pa'i skabs de/bcoM ma ldan 'das la dge sbyong rnams kyis gsal ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ba sprul pa/dor phyir rjes
317b4('dul ba): su gnang gis lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs bcung bar bya'o//ping phyi nyug mche ge mo zhes bya bras 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la 'bras khyu gsol nas/de dga' ldan gyi
317b5('dul ba): lha rnams kyi ri su skyes zhes kun tu sgra grag so//ko sau la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis grong phyi nyug ma che ge mo zhes bya bas 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la 'bras
317b6('dul ba): gsol nas/dga' ldan gyi lha'i r-isu skyeso zhes tho so//thos nus kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song skye phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
317b7('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa mo'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos dang sman pa'i
318a1('dul ba): gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang

318a3('dul ba): nga s+ya la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'phags
318a4('dul ba): pa 'od srung chen po'i slad du dgung bdun du bdag gdugs tshad sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gasngal rgyal
318a5('dul ba): la cang mi gsung byas gan //de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsol rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
318a6('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing
318a7('dul ba): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngor langs te/stan bting nas/nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis
318b1('dul ba): dus tshod gsol zhes bya ba nas/rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhi no//mu lto ba zhig rgan gral log na 'dug pa/rgyal po 'di
318b2('dul ba): bsod nams mngon sum du mthong zhing /rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa yin pas/bsod nams dag gis ngoms mi shes par sbyin pa dag gtong

318b4('dul ba): rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /btsa' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyeg
318b5('dul ba): bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu byar rig nas/stan ches dma' bya zhig blangs te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das
318b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po su'i mying nas brjod de yon bsngo bar bya/ci khyod kyi 'am/'on te khyod pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa gang yin pa zhig
318b7('dul ba): giHrgyal pos bsams pa/bdag gi bsod snyoms bcom ldan 'das kyis yongasu longs spyad pas/bdag pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa gzhan lta bu
319a1('dul ba): yod snyam du bsams nas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa gang lags pa de'i ming nAs brjod/
319a2('dul ba): cing bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu lto ba de'i ming nas brjod cing yon bsngo ba mdzadado//de bzhin du nyi ma
319a3('dul ba): drug gri bar du mdzad pa dang /nyi ma drug pa la rgyal po lag pa la 'gram pa btad nas/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi bsod snyoms longs spyad cing /yon bsdu ba ni mu
319a4('dul ba): lte ba'i ming nas brjod nas mdzad snyam ste/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa de/blon po rnams kyis mthong nas/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal
319a5('dul ba): gtade thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag da ltar bcom ldan 'das ni nga'i bsod snyoms yongasu longs spyad na/yon bshad pa
319a6('dul ba): ni mu lci ba'i ming nas brjod cing mdzad na/ci ste sems khongasu chud cing mi 'dug/de nas blon pa rgan po zhig gis smras pa/lha thugs khral chung ngur bzhugs shig dang
319a7('dul ba): bdag gis sang ci nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha kho na'i mtshan nas brjod de yon bsngo ba mdzad pa de ltar bgyi'o//des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba
319b1('dul ba): khyod kyis sang kha zas ches bsod pa dang /rab tu mang po sta gon gyis la/brim pa yang 'di ltar ci nas kyang phyed ni dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed nang du 'gro la/phyed ni sa la
319b2('dul ba): bi bar gyis shig/de dag gis phyi de nyin kha zas ches bsod pa dang /ches rab tu mang ba bshams te/de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde ba
319b3('dul ba): bzhugs par rig nas/brim par brtsams te/phyed ni dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed du blugs/phyed ni sa la pho'o//de nas mu lto bas sa la pho ba rnams bsdu ba'i phyir
319b4('dul ba): bsgrags pa dang /de phyag gtsang 'drim pa dag gis slar bskrad do//de nas mu lto ba des smras pa/gal te rgyal po 'di la nor rdzas rab tu mang po yod na/bdag cag lta bu
319b5('dul ba): sdug bsngal ba/slong ba gang yin pa de dag la ci'i phyir mi sbyin/kha zas 'di bar bas ci phan zhes/mu lto ba de sems 'khrugs pas sngon gyi ji lta ba de ltar sems dang
319b6('dul ba): par bya mi nus//de nas rgyal pos sangs rgyas la sogs po dge slong gi dge 'dun de rnams gdugs tshod gsol zin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming nas smos
319b7('dul ba): te yon bsngo ba ni mi mdzad do snyam nas/yon bsngo ba ma mnyan pa kho nar khyim du song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ming nas smos
320a1('dul ba): te yon bsngo ba 'di skad du mdzad de/glang po che dang shI dpung bu chung //zhon nas grong khyer yul bcas 'khol byed pa//zan dron lan
320a2('dul ba): tshwa dag gis ma btab cing //snum bag med pa'i mthu ni yin par ltos//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa
320a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sA li'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang du gdugs tshod lan mang du gsol nas/ming nas brjod de yon bsngo ba mdzad na/'di lta bu'i yon
320a4('dul ba): sngo ba mdzad pa ni//bdag gis sngon chad ni lan 'ga' yang ma thos lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
320a5('dul ba): rgyal gyi nas ngar thug lan tshwas mi btab pa las brtsams te/las kyi rgyu ba khyod nyan par 'dod dam/bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab lagaso//bde bar
320a6('dul ba): gshegs pa da de'i dus la bab lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi nas kyi ngar thug lan tshwas ma stsal ba las brtsams te/
320a7('dul ba): las kyi rgyu ba bshad pa/bcom ldan 'das las dge slong rnams kyis zos na 'dzin par 'gyur log so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnas la bka' stsal pa
320b1('dul ba): dge slong dag sngon byung ba'i ri bor zhig ru/khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ded dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar
320b2('dul ba): byed/dga' mgur stod par byed//de rtse byor byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/bu gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba
320b3('dul ba): nas bskyed bsrings te de chen por gyur to//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//ci tsamo ni khyim bdag despyi chung mu lA smras pa/bzang mo bdag cag gi bu lon ded pa
320b4('dul ba): dang nga nor 'phrog pa skyos kyis/bdage zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o//des smras pa/rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig/des zong thogs te yul gzhan zhig tu
320b5('dul ba): spong ba las/de de nyid du ma skyes te shi bar gyur to//de ched po mi bdog pa zhig pas/de'i khyim gyi nor rnams zad bas/de'i bu yang sdug bsngal par gyur pa dang /
320b6('dul ba): khyim bdag de'i rten grogs shig yod pa des dri la smras pa/khyi'u kho bo'i zhing las dag byos shig dang /ngas khyod kyi zan sbyar bar bya'o//des de'i zhing las dag bya
320b7('dul ba): bar brtsams nas/des kyang de'i zan sbyar to//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dus ston la bab nas khye'u de'i mas bsams pa/dang ni khyim bdag gi chung ma mdza' bshos
321a1('dul ba): dang gnyen dang /nye du dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze'i skye bo rnams zan sbyin pas brel bar 'gyur gyis/snga mtshog su song la/khye'u
321a2('dul ba): dri'i zan bskyalo snyam nas/de snga mtshog su song nas/khyim bdag gi chung ma la don de dag go bar byas pa dang /de khros nas smras pa/re shig dge sbyong dang /bram
321a3('dul ba): ze dang /nye du rnams kyang da dung ma byin par mngag gzhug pa khye'u sbyin nam/re shig de ring ni sdod cig/sang nyis 'gyur du sbyin no//de nas khye'u de'i mas bsams

321a5('dul ba): des rgyang mi ring ba zhig nas mthong nas des smras pa/yum zhim po cung zad ma mchis sam/des smras pa/bu de ring ni zan nar ma gang yin pa de nyid kyang med do//yum
321a6('dul ba): ci ste lags/des bu la khyim bdag gi chung ma ji skad du zer de dag thams cad rgyas par bsnyad nas zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa 'di yang kho mo nyid kyis khyer te 'ongs kyis//

321b1('dul ba): zhing dran pa la snying brtse ba can/bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas
321b2('dul ba): shig phyogs der phyin pa dang /des de lus mdzes pa dang /sems dang ba dang /spyod lam zhi bar mthong nas des bsams pa/gdon mi za bar bdag gis yon gnas///
321b3('dul ba): yang dag pa 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas pa des na/bdag 'di 'dra'i gnas skabasu gyur gyis/gal te bdag las zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa 'di bzhes na/bdag gis
321b4('dul ba): de la dbul bar bya'o snyam pa dang /de nas rang sangs rgyas des skyes bu bkren pa de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/lhung bzed bzed de/bzhin bzangs gal te

321b6('dul ba): sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u bkren pa gang yin pa de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis rang sangs rgyas zan dron lan tshwas
321b7('dul ba): ma btab pa phul ba gang yin pa'i las des na/lan drug sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas//mnyan yod 'di nyid du yang lan drug
322a1('dul ba): rgyal po rgyal rigs sto bo nas dbang bskur to//las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis da ltar yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar gyur te//
322a2('dul ba): ngas 'di'i zan dron gyi rnam par smin pa rdzogs pa de la dgongasu nus/glang po rta dang shiparta dpung bu chung //zhon nas grong khyer yul gces 'khol byed pa//zan dron
322a3('dul ba): lan tshwa dag gis ma btab cing //snum brag med pa'i mthu ni yin par ltos zhes gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sA la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi zan dron

322a5('dul ba): gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nasde/bcom
322a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la cho skye dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba naso yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsungo zhes bya ba'i bar grong
322a7('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
322b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
322b2('dul ba): gcig la bdag dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang /chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /spyan gsos kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na
322b3('dul ba): gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnangango //de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
322b4('dul ba): dge 'dun la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zla ba gsum du zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsal nas/dge slong re re la yang 'bum ri ba'i gos re re bskon te/
322b5('dul ba): 'bru mar gyi bum pa bye ba bsogs pa nas/mar mo'i phreng ba bltam par brtsamaso//de ni gdugs tshod kyi kha dang /mchod pa'i tshe ca cotso'i sgra chen po grags pa dang/
322b6('dul ba): ci tsam na grong cug ma shin tu sdug bsngal ba zhig rdza'i chag du ma zhig thogs te/slong ba la zhugs pa des sgra chen po dang /sgra mthon po thos//thos nas kyang dris pa
322b7('dul ba): shre ldan dag sgra mngon po dang sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/gzhan dag gis smras pa/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la
323a1('dul ba): zla ba gsum du gdugs tshod gsol nas/dge slong re re la yang 'bum ri ba'i gos re re bskon te/'bru mar gyi bum pa bye ba bsogs te/
323a2('dul ba): mar me'i phreng ba gtong bar rtsom pa yin no//de nas grong nyug ma de 'di snyam du sems te/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di bsod nams kyis ngoms mi shes na/
323a3('dul ba): nga dung yang sbyin pa dag gtong /bsod nams dag byed na/ma la bdag gis kyang 'ga' zhig las bslangs la/bcom ldan 'das la me mar zhig blta mo snyam nas/
323a4('dul ba): des bslangs pa'i 'bru mar nyung zad po gyo ral gyi nang du blugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa'i slad du mar me bltam nas/zhabs gnyis la gtugs te
323a5('dul ba): smon lam btub pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/'jig rten du byung ba de bzhin du bdag
323a6('dul ba): kyang skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyu thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba kho nar 'gyur zhing /yang ji ltar 'di'i zung ma rtog dang zung bzang po/shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi
323a7('dul ba): bu dang //nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang /yab rngas gtsang dang /yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang /sras gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po dang /grong
323b1('dul ba): khyer ser skya'i gzhi lags pa de bzhin du/bdag gi yang zung mchog dang /zung bzang po shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu dang /nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang /
323b2('dul ba): yab zas gtsang dang /yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang /sras gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po dang /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'gyur zhing /ji ltar yang bcom ldan
323b3('dul ba): 'das 'di sku gdung gses nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du/bdag kyang sku gdung ga ses nus yongs mya ngon las
323b4('dul ba): 'da' bar gyur cig ces byaso//ji tsam na mar me de dag thams cad ni shi'o//des btang ba'i mar me ni 'bar zhing 'dug go/chos nyid
323b5('dul ba): kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji srid nang du yong dag ma bzhag pa de srid du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nye gnas rnams nang du yang dag mi
323b6('dul ba): 'jog pas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsems pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od la mnal bar mdzad pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med pas/
323b7('dul ba): ma la bdag gis mar mi de gsad par bya'o snyam nas/nges lag pos bsad par brtsams pa las ma nuso//de nas chos gos kyi grwa ba dang /de nas bsil
324a1('dul ba): yab kyis g.yabs na 'on kyang gsad par ma nuso//bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' sprul pa/kun dga'
324a2('dul ba): 'di ci byed/des gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi glo ba la bsams pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od la mnal bar mdzad pa ni gnas
324a3('dul ba): mya mchis shing go skabs ma mchis kyis/ma la bdag gis zhugs mar dgu mo snyam na/bdag gis de sreg pas dgum par brtsams na rngo ma thog go/de nas
324a4('dul ba): chos gos kyi grwa dang /de nas bsil yab kyis g.yabs ni/'on kyang rngo ma thogs lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dub par
324a5('dul ba): ma byed cig/gal te rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung langs na des kyang gsad par mi nus na/lag pa dang /chos gos kyi grwa dang /byisil yab kyis lta smos kyang ci
324a6('dul ba): dgos/'di ltar mar mi 'di ni/bu mo 'di sems kyis mngon par 'du byed pa chen pos bus pa yin//gzhan yang kun dga' bo bu mo 'di ni/skye dgu rnams
324a7('dul ba): tshe lo brgya thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub po zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing /de'i zung mchog dang /
324b1('dul ba): zung bzang po shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu dang /nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang /yab zas gtsang dang /yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang /sras gzhon
324b2('dul ba): nu sgra can zin bzang po dang /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhes zhes bya bar 'gyur la/de sku gdung gras sa nas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//grong nyug ma che ge mo zhes
324b3('dul ba): bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chag sa'i slad du mar me btang byas/de bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes kun tu
324b4('dul ba): sgra grags pa bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis thos nas/de'i ma 'ongs pa'i yon tan la bsams nas/yo byad thams cad kyis bstab so//de nas ko
324b5('dul ba): se la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/de nas ngo mtshar skyes te/'bru mar bum pa stong bsdogs nas mar sna tshogasu sbrengs te/rin po che sna bzhi'i mar me
324b6('dul ba): 'chag sa'i slad du bu so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/bicom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po bdag gis 'phags pa 'od srung
324b7('dul ba): chen po mchod pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das dgung 'dun gyi bar du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sngon gyi tshal ma dron po chos
326a1('dul ba): ma sprul ba las brtsams te/las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas/yang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/bdag
326a2('dul ba): gis dgung zla gsum du gdugs tshod gsol nas/dge slong re re la yang 'bum ri ba'i gos phrugs re bskon te/'bru mar bum pa bye ba bsdogs te phreng bar sbrengs nas
326a3('dul ba): zhugs mar bltam lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan lags na/bcom ldan 'das bdag
326a4('dul ba): kyang 'jig rten gyi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur ba lta na/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan na leg so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
326a5('dul ba): pargyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni zab pa/zab par snang ba/mthong bar dka' ba/rtogs par dka' ba/brtag par bya ba ma yin
326a6('dul ba): par rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/zhib mo brtags pa'i rtogs pa dang /mkhas pa dang /mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin te/de ni khyod kyi sbyin pa lan gcig
326a7('dul ba): byas pas thob par bla ba ma yin te/sbyin pa lan brgyas ma yin/sbyin pa lan stong gis ma yin/sbyin pa lan brgya phrag skyong gis ma yin//'on kyang rgyal po chen
326b1('dul ba): son med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byu chub 'dod na sbyin pa dag kyang rgyun/bskyod nams dag klung zhi /dag du'i shes garten dag kyang bsten par b+hu/bsnyen par bya/
326b2('dul ba): bsnyen bkur bya'o//rgyal ba chen po khyed kyis de bzhin du sbyin pa dngag ni boting /bsod nams dag ni byos shing /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag kyang bsten/byi snyen bkur byas na//
326b3('dul ba): de lta ma khyod na mo zhig nA 'jig rten gyi gtso bo/'dren par 'gyur grang /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang kyo sa l+ya'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mchi ma blags te ru so//de nas ko sa la
326b4('dul ba): po gasngal rgyal gyis gos kyi mtha' mas mchim byis nas/bcom ldan ldas lnga 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
326b5('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyeg pa na sbyin pa ji snyed cig sum/bsod nams ji snyed cig bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen por shig
326b6('dul ba): 'das pa'i bsrel pa bzhin rnams lci zhig gi/bskal pa b.rang po 'di la du zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer byas rnam grang smo du mar sbyin pa datang du/
326b7('dul ba): dang /bsod nams byas pa de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shini dang bshad//bar sdomi la/tsang los nu dang legs mthong che//dus dpog ku sho gdol pa
327a1('dul ba): dang /lha chen po dang mu khyud rgyal//me long gdong dang nor bzangs dang //thams cad sgrol dang 'dum byed//rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba skye dbu
327a2('dul ba): rnams kyi tshe lo dpag tu med pa na/rgyal po gas sbyong 'phags shes bya ba byung bar gyur te/de'i skye bor sharman 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa zhig skyes pa/dper na/
327a3('dul ba): shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ras bral gyi 'da' ba lta bur gnod pa cung zad kyang mi skyed do//de yongasu smin nas rdol ba las/gzhon nu gzugs bzang po mdzes pa
327a4('dul ba): blta na sdug pa/lpags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/lag pa ring ba/dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/smin ma 'dzar ba/sna'i gzengs
327a5('dul ba): mtho ba/yan lag dang /nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo //
327a6('dul ba): byung ma thag tu btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkri ba dang /rgyal po gro sro skyong 'phags kyi btsun mo brgyad khris gzhon nu mthong nas/nu ma rnams las 'o ma zags pa
327a7('dul ba): dang bud med re res kyang nga las nu nga las rU zhes smras pas/de'i ming ngo las nung las nu zhes bya bar gyur to//gzhan dag na re 'di ni skye bo las skyes pas de'i phyir/
327b1('dul ba): gzhon nu'i ming spyi bo skyes shes bya'o zhes zer to//don kha cig gis ni nga las nu zhes bya bar sheso//kha cig gis ni spyi bo skyes shes bya bar shes//gzhon nu las
327b2('dul ba): nu gzho ni nu'i rtse do mos rtse ba la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no//rgyal tsha ba la gnas pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos po lo no//gzhon nu nga las nu yul zhig tu song ste/
327b3('dul ba): de yul du phyin pa dang /rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags na bar gyur nas/de rtsa ba dang /sdong bu dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas
327b4('dul ba): na yang phyir thu ba kho nur gyur nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag myur du gzhon nu la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bras dbang bskur cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal
327b5('dul ba): zhes blon po rnams kyis pho nya bkug ste/rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags skud nas/des gzhon nu spun drongs la/rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba nyam su myong bar gyis shig
327b6('dul ba): ces bka' stsal gyis/gzhonu myur du byon pa'i rig so zhes s+thingo //de chas pa dang /rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags shi'o//de nas blon po dag gis yong pho nya gzhan zhig
327b7('dul ba): gtong ba le/gzhon nu khyod kyi yi ba ni nongs kyis/tshur spyon rgyal srid pa zhes shig ces springango //gzhon nu nga las nus bsams pa/gal te bdag gi yab nongs
328a1('dul ba): na/dreng song yang ci phan snyam du bsams nas de nyid na 'dug/blon po rnams yang 'dus nas/blon po zhig pho nyar btang ba dang /de
328a2('dul ba): song nas smras pa/gzhon nu rgyul srid bzhes shig/des smras pa/gzhon nu rgyal srid bzhes shig/des smraswa pA/gal te kho bos chos dang 'thun pas rgyal
328a3('dul ba): srid 'thob par 'gyur na/rgyul srid kyi dbang ba 'di nyid du 'ong bar 'gyuraro//blon po rnams kyis spring pA/lha rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba la ni mang du 'tshal te/rin
328a4('dul ba): po che'i gcal dang /seng ge'i khri dang /gdugs dang /cod pan dang /dbu rgyan gyis pho brang gi nang du rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bar bgyi 'tshul bas/de lta
328a5('dul ba): bas na gzhon nu 'di nyid du byon pa'i rigaso//des smras pa/ngas chos dang 'thun par rgyal srid 'thob pa lto na thams cad 'di nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//gzhon nung
328a6('dul ba): las nu'i mdun nas 'gro ba gnod sbyin lha gnas shes bya ba des rin po che'i gcal dang /srong ge'i khri de nyid du blang so//pho byung na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang /
328a7('dul ba): gdugs dang /cod pan dang /dpung rgyan khyer nas rang de nyid du lhags te/pho brang 'khor ba rang lhags pas gnas de'i ming gnas bcas gnas bcas shes
328b1('dul ba): bya bar grang so//phyis blon po de rnams dang /khrom gyi ru ba dang /grong mi dang /yul mi rnams kyis ni dbang bskur ba khyer te deng nas/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha dang /
328b2('dul ba): bskur ba de zhesu gsol/des smras pa/nga mi rnams kyis cod pan bcing ngam/gal te chos kyis rgyal srid 'thab na/mi ma yin pa rnams kyis cod pan 'ching grang //
328b3('dul ba): ji tsam na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis cod pan bcings pa dang /de'i rin po che sna bdun byung ba 'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /

328b5('dul ba): mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar byung ngo //yangs pa can gyi nye kor na nags tshal stug po dga' dga'
328b6('dul ba): ltar 'dug pa zhig yod pa de na/drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa lnga brgya bsam gtan byed do//nags tshul stug po de na yang bya kar rab tu mang po dag cig
328b7('dul ba): kyang gnaso//bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas bya kar rnams lding zhing skad 'byin par byed pa dang /de na drang srong bzhin ngan zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de 'khrugs
329a1('dul ba): pas des bya kar rnams kyi mdab gshog rnams lhags par shog ces dmod pa byor ro//de rnams drang srong 'khrugs pas mngang/
329a2('dul ba): gshog rnams lhags par gyur to//de nas de rnams rkang pas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /rgyal po de yang ljongs rgyur song bas/byi kar rnams rkang pas 'gro ba mthong
329a3('dul ba): ngo/de nas des blon po rnams la dris pa/ci'i phyir bya kar 'di rnams rkang pas 'gro bar gyur/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha bsam gtan gyi tshor ma ni
329a4('dul ba): sgra lags pas/drang srong 'khrugs pa dag gis 'di rnams la dmod pa bor ba dang /de nas drang srong 'khrugs pas 'di rnams kyi mdab gshog rnams
329a5('dul ba): lhag par gyur to//de nas rgyal pos smras pa/gang dgra sems can rnams la snying brtse ba med pa'i drang srong 'di lta bu yang yod pa lta zhes smras nas/shes
329a6('dul ba): wAnar+ya dag deng la/drang srong rnams la khyed cag dwa'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces bsgre shig ces smras so//de nas blon po drang srong gi thud du dong nas bsgo ba/rgyal
329a7('dul ba): po'i zhal nas khyed cig nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces bka' stsal to//drang srong rnams kyis bsams pa/rgyal po 'di ni gleng bzhi la dngang ba yin pas/raM
329b1('dul ba): rab kyi bam+b+ha rim du 'gro'o snyam nas/de rnams der dong ste gnaso//rgyal po nga las nu'i mi rnams ni sems par byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /nye bar rtog par
329b2('dul ba): byed pa yin te/de dag gis bsams shing /nye bar brtags nus bzo'i gnas dang /las kyis gnas tha dad pa rnams bya bar brtson pas de rnams sems par byed
329b3('dul ba): pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /nye bar rtog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ming shed las skyes shing las skyes zhes bya bar grag so//de rnams kyis zhing las dag bya bar
329b4('dul ba): brtsams pa dang /rgyal po ljongs rgyur song bas mi de rnams zhing las dag byed par mthong nas/des blon po rnams la smras pa/mI 'di rnams ci zhig byed/blon po
329b5('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/lha sman du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du lo thog la sogs pa sbun pa leg so//rgyal pos smras pa/ci bdag gis rgyal srid kyi byur kyis zhing las
329b6('dul ba): byed dam/de nas des smras pa/lhas sa bon gyi rigs nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi char phob shig ces byas pa dang /rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyed ma thug tu/sgras sa
329b7('dul ba): bon gyi rigs nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi char phab bo//rgyal po nga las nus yul mi rnams la dris po/'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung /de rnams kyis smras pa/
330a1('dul ba): skya'i yang lags/bdag cag gi yang lags//yang ma de rnamasbya sa bal zhing rmo bar brtsams pA dang /yang rgyal po sa na myos/
330a2('dul ba): rgyur spyo bas mthong nas/de nas blon po rnams la smras pa/mi 'di rnams ci zhig byed/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha mi 'di rnams ni ras bral gyi zhing rjod
330a3('dul ba): lcag so//rgyal po sa smras pa/ci zhig tu dgos/de rnams kyis smras pa/lca gas bgyi ba'i skad du'o//de nis rgyal po nga las nus smras pa/cinga'i rgyal srid kyi
330a4('dul ba): mi rnams rlos bal gyi zhing rmed dam+b+ha/lhas rus ngal kho na'i char po'i shig ces byas pa dang /rgya ma pA~M nga las nus sems bskyed ma thig tu ltas rus pal kha
330a5('dul ba): char sgrub bo//rgyal pos yul mi rnams la dris pa/'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung /de rnams kyis smras pa/lha'i yang logs/bdag cag gi yang lag so//
330a6('dul ba): yang mi de rnams ras bal de rnams 'khal bar brtsams pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/mi 'di dag ci zhig byed/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha srung ba 'tshal
330a7('dul ba): slad du ras bal de 'khal lag so//rgyal pos smras pa/ci nga'i rgyal srid kyi mi rnams ras srud mkhal lam/lhas ras skud kyi char kho nan phob shig ces byas pa
330b1('dul ba): dang rgyal po de pas na sems bskyed ma thag tu lhas ras spyang khon+da'i char phab bo//rgyal po des smras pa/'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung /de rnams kyis smras pa/
330b2('dul ba): lha'i yang lags/bdag cag gi yong lag so//de nas rims kyis ras 'thag par brtsams pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/'di dag ci zhi byed/dri rnams kyis smras
330b3('dul ba): pa lha gosu bgyi ba'i slad du ras 'thag lagaso//rgyal pos bsams pra/ci nga'i rgyal srid kyi mi rnams ras 'thag gam snyam na s+ye/lces ras nyid rje chur ba'i shig
330b4('dul ba): rjes byas pa dang /rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu lhas ras nyid kyi char thob bo//rgyal pos drin pa/'di dag suM'i bsod nams kyis byung /de rnams
330b5('dul ba): kyis smras pa/lce'i yang lags/bdag cag gi yang lagaso//rgyal pos bsams pa/mi 'dims ni bdag gi bsod nams dag gi mthu rab tu mi shes te/
330b6('dul ba): bdag l-I dzam+bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang /myi mang pos gang ba yang yod/bdeg la rin po che sna bdun 'din ste/
330b7('dul ba): 'khor lo rin po che da //glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /btsun mo rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun pa rnon po ran
331a1('dul ba): po yang yod/bdag la bu dpa' bla/rdul phod bu/yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi snga rab tu 'joms
331a2('dul ba): par byed pa stong yang tshang bar yod kyi/kye ma bdag gis pho brang gi nang du rin po che'i char 'bab cing /de las phyi rol tu ni kar shA pa nA 'ga' yang mi 'bab par
331a3('dul ba): gyur cig snyam pa dang /rgyal po de las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu pho brang gi nang du zhag bdun du rin po che'i char bab la/phyi rol tu ni kar sha pa ni 'ga' yang ma
331a4('dul ba): bab ste/ji ltar mthu chen po/rdzu 'phrul chen po/bsod nams byas pa/dge ba byas pa/rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu so sor nyam su myong ba bzhi no//
331a5('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung /de rnams kyis smras pa/lha'i lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed kyis nyes te//
331a6('dul ba): grol te khyed kyis lha'i bsod nams kyis lagaso zhes smras pa dang /ngas dzam+bu'i gling mtha' drag tu rin po che'i char bab par 'gyur ba zhig/'on kyang khyod las
331a7('dul ba): rin po che su 'dod pa des rin po che ci 'dod pa dag long shig/de nas rgyal po de las nu de rgyal srid chen po'i dbang byed du 'jug pa la/brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa
331b1('dul ba): yon//nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro ba gnod sbyin lha gnas shes bya ba de la rgyal pos smras pa/gangangs ka' stsal dgos pa/bka' 'og tu ma chud pa'i gling gzhan 'ga'/
331b2('dul ba): lta yod dam/lha gnas kyis skyes pa/lho shar gyi lus 'phags shes bgyi ba'i gling 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang /mi
331b3('dul ba): mang pos gang ba mchis kyis/lha der gshegs te bka' stsal tu gsol/de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag la dzam+bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /
331b4('dul ba): rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang /mI mang pos gang ba yang yod/bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin
331b5('dul ba): po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/bdag la bu dpa' ba/
331b6('dul ba): rtul bod pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang /bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun du
331b7('dul ba): phab na/shar gyi lus 'phags shes bya'i gling zhig yod ces drag gis/ma la bdag der yang song la rje su bstan par bya'o snyam pa dang /sems skyes ma thag tu
332a1('dul ba): rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'dum dang thabs gcig tu/bu stong gis yongasu bskor te/mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun
332a2('dul ba): dang na mkha' la 'phags te/rgyal po nga las nu shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rgyas nas rgyal po nga las nu shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du gnas te/rgyal po
332a3('dul ba): lus nu ji ltar sems tsan bsod nams byas pa/dge ba byas pa/mthu chen po/rdzu 'phrul chen pos rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyam sa myong ba ltar/shar
332a4('dul ba): gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du lo mang po dang /lo brgya phrag mang po dang /lo stong phyag mang po dang /lo brgya stong phrag mang por rje su bsten par byaso//de shar gyi lus
332a5('dul ba): 'phags kyi gling na rje su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no//yang rgyal po nga las nus/gnod spyan lha gnas la smras pa/bka' 'og tu ma chud pa'i gling
332a6('dul ba): gzhan 'ga' lta yod du maMlha gnas kyis smras pa/lha nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legres pa/skye bo dang /
332a7('dul ba): mi mang pos gang ba mchis kyis/lha der yang gshegs te rje su bstan du gsol/'dul po gzhi///bam po zhe gcig pade
332b1('dul ba): nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems twe/bdag la dzam+bu'i gling 'byor ba dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba yod/
332b2('dul ba): bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang rin po che'i char phrag bdun du phab/bodag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du yang phyin/lo mong po dang /lo brgya phrag mang po dang /
332b3('dul ba): lo stong phrag mang po dang /lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rje su bstan na/nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling zhig yod ces
332b4('dul ba): brag gis/ma la bdag der yang song la rjesu bstan par bya'o snyam pa dang /sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang thabs
332b5('dul ba): gcig tu bu steng gis yongasu bskor nas/mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang steng go na mkha' lo 'phags te/rgyal po nga las nu nub kyi bo lang spyod kyi gling du chas
332b6('dul ba): nas nga rgyal po nga las nu nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du gnas te/rgyal po nga las nus ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/dge ba byas pa/mthu chen po/
332b7('dul ba): 'phrul chen po/rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ba ltar/nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du lo mang po dang /lo brgya phrag mang po dang /lo stong phrag mang
333a1('dul ba): dang /lo brgya stong phrag mang por rje su bstan par bya'o//de nub kyu ban lang spyod kyi gling nA rdza su brtan pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa
333a2('dul ba): lo no//yang rgyal po nga las nus gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/bka' 'og tu ma chud pa'i gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/lha gnas kyis smras pa/lha byang
333a3('dul ba): gI sgra mi snyan ces bgyi ba'i gling 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /badre ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos gang la/gzhan yang mi de dag ni bdag gir/
333a4('dul ba): bgyi ba ma mchis pa yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa zhig mchis kyis/kye ma lha der yang gshegs te/nyid kyi dpung gi tshogs la rje su bstan du gsol/de
333a5('dul ba): nus rgyal po nga lAs nu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag la dzam+bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /badro ba dang //lo legs pa/skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba
333a6('dul ba): yodabadag gi pho brang gi nang du rin po che'i char zhag bdun du phab/bdag shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du song ste/yang lo mdo po dang /lo brgya phrag mang po
333a7('dul ba): dang lo stong phrag mang po dang /lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gi shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rje su bstan/bdag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du yang song ste/
333b1('dul ba): mang po dang /yo ba rgya phrag mang po dang /lo stong phrag mang po dang /lo brgya stong phyug mang po bdag gis nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du rje sa bstan nA/byang gi sgra mi snyan
333b2('dul ba): ces bya ba'i rgyud 'byor pa dang /rgyus pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang /mi myang pos rab tu gang la/gzhan yang mi de dag ni bdag gir bya ba meng
