366a4('dul ba): byabyas shing gsugs pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched la rnam par smin par gyur te/las rnams bskul ban+d+ha duM yang ni//rgyud mi tha
366a5('dul ba): tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//smras bu dan tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag smon byung ba ri 'ong gzhin zhig na/khyim bdug gcig gnas te/
366a6('dul ba): de bzan pa dang /bci'i ba rab tu mang po khyed te/bskyed mos tshal du sa dang //sangs rgyas bcom+bi ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med pa nA~M/'jig rten du rang sangs
366a7('dul ba): rgyas dman pa dang /ngan pa la stong brtse bo na/bas mtha' gnas mal dag la dga' bo/'jig rten gyi yin gnas gcig pu dag 'byu baba'i rgyuro//de nas
366b1('dul ba): rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing skyong ba na/bskyed mos tshul der phyin pa khyim bdag des mthong nas/des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag
366b2('dul ba): rab tu byung ba 'di skad cig/de dge slong mapod pa dang khyi mo bdag de nyid langs te bzung nas bskrad de/seng ge'i gdong can+da mtshan nga ni bcwo brgyad dang ldan pa khyod ger 'gro
366b3('dul ba): zhes kyang smras//rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/nyon mongs 'di gtan du smras shing nyams na mi rung ngo snyam du rig nas/steng gi na mkha' la zhes bya ba nas
366b4('dul ba): des bkur bsti byas te zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar te/ji tsam na rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pA/bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu
366b5('dul ba): la ngag rtsub po'i phyung ba gang yin pa de'i las de bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig/gang yang bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dri dang phyug cing nor mang ba dang /longs spyod
366b6('dul ba): che ba'i rigasu skye bar gyur cig ces byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/khyim bdag gang yin pa de ku sha bzhon nu 'di nyid yin te/de ni 'dis rang sangs rgyas
366b7('dul ba): la ngag rtsub po'i las phyung bas/las de'i rnam par smin pas mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan zhing bzhin seng ge'i gdong 'dra bar gyur to//gang yang bya ba byas pa de'i
367a1('dul ba): las kyi rnam par smin+da pas stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi
367a2('dul ba): rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag par 'gyur zhing /'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren mor 'gyur/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar bar 'gyur ro//de lta
367a3('dul ba): byas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/las gang dag gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/gcig tu dkar ba'i las rnams
367a4('dul ba): kho na la btsal bar bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//gzhan yang rgyal po chen po des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de na du
367a5('dul ba): gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang /bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul ka ling ka zhes bya bar gdol pa'i rgyal po
367a6('dul ba): phur bu grwa sum po zhes bya ba 'khor gdol pa brgya phrag du ma dang /'khor gdol pa stong phrag du ma dang /'khor gdol ba brgya stong du ma yod pa/byams pa'i
367a7('dul ba): bdag nyid/snying rje can/sems can thams cad la phan par/snying brtse ba zhig byung ste/de'i yul du na ma lo nyes byung ba de'i tshe bden pa gsol bas/lhas
367b1('dul ba): char pa 'bebs pa/lan 'ga' yang la nyes 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//de drang skyong gi nang du rab tu byung nas/des mngon par shes pa lha mngon sum du byas//de'i
367b2('dul ba): yul bA rA na se na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang lo 'ag de skye bo dang mi phal po ches rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug/ji tsam dus
367b3('dul ba): gzhan zhig na/ltos mkhan rnams kyis po bcu gnyi su char mi 'bab po zhes lung bstan to//de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin grong khyer bA ro na sde rare dril skrag tu gtsug pa/
367b4('dul ba): ra na sai nu gnas pa'i shes ljin grong khyer pa dag nyon cig/ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyi su chur myi 'bab po zhes lung bstan gyis/khyed cag lngas gang dag
367b5('dul ba): lnga dus de tsam gyi bza' ba yod pa de ni 'dug shig/gang dag la med pa de ni dengs shig/de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag mu gros dus ma yin par 'chi bas
367b6('dul ba): 'jigs skrag nas/gro sa bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag rgyal pos yul rnamasu 'di lta bu'i dril sgrog tu bcug na/de ji ltar bsgrub byar bya/gang du 'dong /
367b7('dul ba): de rnams kyis bdol pa'i yul na/gdol pa'i rigs las byung ba'i drang srong zhig yod de/de'i bden pa gsol bas/lces char 'beb so zhes thos nas/
368a1('dul ba): de nas lo ban+d+ha bAny+tsis kyi bar gyi bza' ba med sna yin pa de rnams gdol pa'i yul du dong pa dang /gdol pa'i rigs las byung bya'i drang
368a2('dul ba): snong gri bu gdol pa'i rgyal po des skye bo'i tshogs de'i bza' ba dang /btung ba lo bcu gnyi su spyad na/mu ge rgyun rdzogs kho nar byung nas/rgyal po tshangs
368a3('dul ba): sbyin gyis blon po rnams la dris pa/skye bo'i tshogs de dag gang du song /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha yulA ka ling kArI gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum
368a4('dul ba): po zhes bgyi ba/byams pa'i bdag nyid/snying rje can sems can thams cad la phan pa'o byams pa zhig mchis te/de'i bden pa gsol ba sA lhas char
368a5('dul ba): 'bebs pas/de ro skye bo'i tshogs chen po mchi so//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag mu gri chen po 'di ni mu ge'i bskal pra bar ma dang 'dra ba yin na/de la
368a6('dul ba): ji ltar bsgrub par bya/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha gdol pa'i yul gyi rgyal po gang lags pa de drang srong gi nang du rab tu byung ngo zhes thos lags kyis/de la
368a7('dul ba): gsol ba mdzod cig/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gdol pa'i yul du song nas/drang srong de la gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa/drang srong chen po bdag gi yul
368b1('dul ba): du mu ge chen po mu go'i bskal pa bar ma dang 'dra ba byung na/de la bden pa gsol ba'i rigs//nges badren pa gsol bar brtsams pa/khyi 'tshod rigs las skyes pa
368b2('dul ba): yin zhe sdang med cing 'tshe med pa//gdo lnga pa phur bu gsum pa zhes//lha dang mi la glags pa yis//sems can kun la byams pa'i sems//skyon mdo rab tu
368b3('dul ba): bsgom bdag gi/bden tshig des ni skye dgu 'di//klus ni tshim par byed gyur cig/gang phyir skyes pa tshun chad nas//byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgoms pa//bden
368b4('dul ba): pa'i tshig des skye dgu dag/klus ni tshim par byed gyur cig/de nas bden pa gsol pas/yul bA ra na ser lngas tshar phab nas/mu ge rgyun chad cing lo legs par
368b5('dul ba): gyur to//de nas b+hA ra na se na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs de gdol pa'i yul nas bA ra na ser lhagaso//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe dri'i dus na/gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu
368b6('dul ba): gsum pa zhes bya ba/byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can/sems can thams cad lnga phan pa/snying btso ba can zhig byung ba de'i bden pa gsol bas/lhas char
368b7('dul ba): phab nas mu ge rgyun chad cing lo legs par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/gdol pa'i rgyal po
369a1('dul ba): /phur bu gsum pa nas byu rnams paSh+Ti bgrAts+tsha snying d+d+ho nA/sems twA nA Sh+Tam+b+has rlung su na dang /stong rgyubatsun+ya rlo da da
369a2('dul ba): gsol byas lhas char 'bebs par de yin par gyur to//rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa 'am/sbyin pa'i dgo bA sha'i des blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
369a3('dul ba): chung zob+h+r-i s+t+wa ma nA/khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsam
369a4('dul ba): yI no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang dus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/sbyin pa dag btang /bsod nams dag byas pa gang
369a5('dul ba): yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon+da byung ba yul mi thi lar/rgyal po lho chen po zhes bya ba 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal bya
369a6('dul ba): chos drang ldan pa/chos kyi rgyal po/rI nu po che sna bdun dang ldan+da po zhig byung ste/de'i rin po che sna bdun nI 'di lta bu dag yin te/'di lta ste/'khor lo
369a7('dul ba): rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun pa blon po rin po
369b1('dul ba): tshe'ordordo lta bu dpa' ba/rtul phod pa/yan lag mchog gri gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sngo rab tu 'joms pa stong yang rkyong bar yod cing /de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i
369b2('dul ba): sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sngo ba myed cing /'tshe ba med pa/'di nyid chud pa med cing /mtshon gyis 'da' ba med la/chos dang 'thun pa snyoms pas legs par
369b3('dul ba): phub ste gnaso//de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i sgra mkhan gyi mi sku dang kha spu 'chos pa na/skra mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/kye nang rje khyod kyis gang gi nga'i mgro las gshin
369b4('dul ba): rje'i pho nya skra dkar skyes po de'i tshe nga la sgron cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skra mkhan gyi mis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar mnyan to//dus gzhan zhig na skra mkhan
369b5('dul ba): gyi mis rgyal po lha chen po'i sgra drang /kha spu 'chos pa na/rgyal po lha chen po mgo las/gu shin rje'i pho nya'i sgra dkar skyes pa mthong //mthong nas kyang yang
369b6('dul ba): rgyal po chen po lha chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//lha mkhyen par mdzod cig/dbu la gshin rje'i pho nya dbu skra dkar po skyes lag so//kye nang rje de'i phyir khyod kyis skra
369b7('dul ba): dkar de dag rim gyis dal bu dal bus phyung li/nga'i lag par byin cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smra mkhan gyi mis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar mnyan nas/sgra rtse
370a1('dul ba): bo de dag gser gyi slad tser rim gyis dal bu dal bus rgyud nas+ya/rgyalnga po lha chen po'i lag tu bzhago/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos sku skya
370a2('dul ba): bo de dag lag pa gnyis kyis brkyang nas/tshigasu bcwa de sbas pA/bdag gi mgo la klad kyi sgra//lang tsho 'phrog pa skyes pa na//gshin rje'i pho ny+dza byung gyur gyis///
370a3('dul ba): bdag ni rab 'byung dus la bab//bdag gis mi rnams kyi 'dod pa ni spyad zin te/lha rnams kyi 'did pa bcol ba'i dus lo bab kyis/ma la bdag gis gzhon nu
370a4('dul ba): thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug la/rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyad pa spyod do//snya mo//de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo shos
370a5('dul ba): pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smraso//gzhon nu shes par gyis shig nga'i mgo las gshin rje'i pho nya skra dkar skyes te/ngas mi rnams kyi 'dod pa ni spyad zin pas//
370a6('dul ba): lha rnams kyi 'dod pa btsal ba'i dus la bab ste/bu gzhon nu khyod la ngas rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po 'di gtad kyis/khyod kyis 'di la chos bzhin gyis bskyang
370a7('dul ba): bar bya'i/chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no//'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam/'dren mar spyod na/khyod kyi yul du gan sum gzhug cig/bu gzhon nu khyod
370b1('dul ba): kyis kyang gang gi tshe mgo la gshin rje'i pho nya skra dkar skyes par mthong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis kyang gzhon nu thu bo shes rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du chug la/rgyal po'i
370b2('dul ba): drang srong tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ci nas kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa 'di lta bu la zhugs pa'i rjesu 'jug par bya'i/rgyun chad par mi bya zhing skyes bu tha shal du
370b3('dul ba): gyur par mi bya'o//bu gzhon nu 'ga' zhig skyes bu bzang po yod pa'i dus 'di lta bu la/dge ba'i lam nges pa 'di lta bu la/zhugs pa'i rjesu 'jug par byed du gang yin
370b4('dul ba): pa de ni/de rnams kyi rgyun chad par mi byed pa yin/de ni de rnams kyis skyes bu tha shal ma yin par 'gyuraro//bu gzhon nu 'ga' zhig skyes bu bzang po yod pa'i dus 'di lta bu
370b5('dul ba): lA dge ba'i lam nges par 'di lta bu la zhugs pa'i rje su 'jug pa do mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni/dri rnams kyi rgyun chad par byed pa yin/de ni de rnams kyi skyes bu tha shal
370b6('dul ba): yino//de lta bas na nga khyod la de skad du ci nas kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i laM nges pa 'di lta bu la zhugs pa'i rjesu 'jug par bya zhing /rgyun chad par mi bya zhing skyes bu tha shal du
370b7('dul ba): gyur par mi bya'o//zhes smraso//de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug nas/yul bcom brlag 'di nyid kyi lha chen po'i
371a1('dul ba): a mra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//rgyal po lha chen po'i gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang //
371a2('dul ba): byed du bcug pa gang yin pa de yang rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni sde gnaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
371a3('dul ba): bzhino//de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu dag skra mkhan gyi mis 'tshos pa na zhes bya ba nas/skyes bu tha shal du gyur par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
371a4('dul ba): bzhin no//de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug lnga dbang byed du bcug nas/rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad//de lta bu dang
371a5('dul ba): tshwa bo yang tsha brgyud pasnga lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gisra rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//de nas rgyal po lha chen po bdag nyid mchod sbyin phun sum
371a6('dul ba): tshogs par mthong nas tshig su pa cade smras pa/wA dang mi yi nang dag tu//dga' phyug don du gnyer ba dang //dbul bA'i 'jigs pas skrag pa yis//ts+yai nus
371a7('dul ba): kyis ni sbyin pa btang //'jig rten ni ni sbyin byed mchod//sbyin byed lha yi nang mchod de//bya yis 'bras ldan shing bzhin du//'byung po kun gyi skyabs 'os yin///
371b1('dul ba): rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang gis dge ba'i lam nges pa de sgrol btod cing dge ba'i lam nges pa srol
371b2('dul ba): btod pa de la brten nas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po'i drang srod gis tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste//
371b3('dul ba): nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/'khor lo rgyur ba'i rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/nga nyid kyis dge bo'i las kyi lam nges pa de srol btod cing /dge ba'i lam
371b4('dul ba): des pa srol btod pa de la brten nas/la chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa 'am/
371b5('dul ba): sbyin pa'i byago ba shwa' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang
371b6('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /rgyan tsam dang /tsho gas tsam yi no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du
371b7('dul ba): gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang /bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul mi thi la 'di nyid du de rnams kyi tha ma shos
372a1('dul ba): rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos kyi rgyal po/chos dang ldan pa/tshes la gnas pa'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/de btsun mo dang /gzhon nu dang /
372a2('dul ba): blon po dang /khrom gyi ru ba dang /grong ma dang /yul mi rnams dang lhan cig tu chos spyod cing sbyin pa dag gtong /bsod nams dag byed pa/bsnyen gnas la nye bar
372a3('dul ba): gnas pa/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnaso//de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gung la lha rnams mdun sa chos
372a4('dul ba): bzangasu tshogs shing lha rnams la bsngags pa brjod de/grogs po dag lus 'phyags kyi mI rnams kyi rnyed pa ni legs par rnyed de/lus 'phags kyi myi de rnams kyi
372a5('dul ba): rgyal po mu khyud ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po yin te/de btsun mo dang zhes bya ba nas lhan cig tu chos spyod cing tshul
372a6('dul ba): khyams yang dag par blangs te gnaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhi no//grogs po dag khyed cag rgyal po mu khyud blta bar 'dod dam/ko'u shri ka mchog tu 'tshalo//
372a7('dul ba): grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed cag sdod cig dang /kho bos je rgyal po mu khyud brtag par bya'o//de nas lha rnams kyi dadang po brgya byin dper na skyes bu mthu dang ldan pa'i
372b1('dul ba): lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba mthar brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur te/mi
372b2('dul ba): lar rgyal po mu khyud ldan gyi khang bzangasu phyin nas 'di skad ces smraso//mu khyed ldan khyod kyis rnyed pa ni legs par rnyed de/gang gi phyir sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i
372b3('dul ba): mdun sa chos bzangasu tshogs shing 'dus pa rnams khyod kyi bsgrags pa brjod par byed de/grogs po dag lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyis rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas tshul khrims
372b4('dul ba): yang dag par blangs te gan so shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhi ni//mu khyud khyod sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la blta zhing 'gro 'dod dam/ko'u shiM ka bdag sum cu rtsa
372b5('dul ba): gsum pa'i lha rnams la blta zhing mchi 'tshalo//mu khyud de'i phyir khyod sdod cig/kho bos je cang shes stong ldan gyi shing rta khyod la bskur gyis/der khyod zhugs la
372b6('dul ba): ma g.yo bar shog shig/rgyal po mu khyud kyis de bzhin 'tshalo zhes lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum
372b7('dul ba): pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdul smras pa/me la gdu khyod song lo/cang shes stong ldan gyi shong rta myur du chos la/rgyal po mu khyud gang
373a1('dul ba): der song ste phyin nas/'di skad ces mu khyud la sgra rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/cang shes stong ldan gyi shing rta bskur ba 'di yin gyis
373a2('dul ba): der khyod zhugs la mi g.ya bar shog shig ces byos shIg/ko'u shi ka khyod kyis gsungs pas shin tu ma nongs shes kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus lha rnams kyi dbang
373a3('dul ba): po brgya byin las mnyan nas myur du cung shes stong ldan gyi shing rta bcas te/rgyal po mu khyud gadra na bya der song nas phyin bya dang /'di skad ces smras//mu khyud khyod
373a4('dul ba): lalU rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis cang shes sbyong ldan gyi shing rta bskur ba 'di yin gyi 'dir khyod zhugs la mo gu yo bar shog shig ces mchi'o//rgyal po
373a5('dul ba): chen po rgyal po mu khyud cang shos rta stong ldan gyi shing rtur zhugs pa dang /de nas kha lo sgyur ba mo la gdus rgyal po mu khyud la smras pa/khyod kyi shing rta gang nas
373a6('dul ba): drang /gong na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyamasu myong ba nas sam/gang na sems can dge ba'i las can
373a7('dul ba): rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa nyamasu myong ba nas drang /ma la gdu de'i phyir gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams/sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin
373b1('dul ba): pany+tsamasu myong ba yod pa/gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams las dag ba'i rnam par smin pa nyamasu myong ba dag yod par gnyis glu bltas/de dag gang na byad/
373b2('dul ba): lcogasu shong rta drongs shig/de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus rgyal po mu khyud kyis ci nas kyang byangan sems can sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyamasu myong
373b3('dul ba): yod pa na/gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa nyam su myong ba yod pa gnyi ka mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar rgyal po mu khyud ldan gyi shing
373b4('dul ba): drangaso//rgyal po mu khyud sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du phyin nas rgyal po mu khyud lha rnams kyi mdun sa chos bzang su zhugs pa dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
373b5('dul ba): byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud la stan phyed stabs nas/rgyal po mu khyud dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan phyed la 'dug/rgyal po chen po rgyal po mu khyud dang /lha rnams
373b6('dul ba): kyi dbang po brgya byin stan phyed phyod la 'dug pa na/khyad par ram/bsam pa 'am tha dad du bya ba cung zad du med do/gzhan du na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ni mig mi 'dzums
373b7('dul ba): par zad do//de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/de'i tshe tshig su bcad smras pa/dge las byas dang de bzhin du
374a1('dul ba): myi dge ba yi lus mthong nas//mi gang bag myed byed pa de//skyes puSh+Ta shal snying re rje//de nas lha rnams kyi dbyung po brgya sbyin gyis/rgyul
374a2('dul ba): mu khyud la 'di skad ces smraso//mu khyud khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la dga' ba spyod cig/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pas rtsed mo byos shig/dga' bar spyod cig/
374a3('dul ba): dga' dgur spyod cig/des tshigasasu btsod smras pa/ji ltar snod dang shing rta dag/brnyas pa re shig dus yin ltar//de dang 'dra bar gnas 'di yang //dbang ni gauzhun
374a4('dul ba): dag sbyar bas brlag/'di nas mi thi lar song nas//dge ba mang po rnams bya zhing //bsod nams phun sum tshogs byas nas//de nas mtho ris 'ong bar bya//de mi thi
374a5('dul ba): lar 'ong nas sbyin pa dag btang //bsod nams dag byas nas//tshig su bA tsa de smras pa/gang tshe rgyalnga rigs bram ze dang //rje'u rigs dmangs gladol pa dang //klu
374a6('dul ba): klo phongs la sbyin pa ni//sbyin pa dmu pa rnams kyi bsngags//mu ge'i tshe na sbyin byin zhing //skye bo dam po che ma byas nas//ngan song rnams spangs 'di dang ni//mtho ri su
374a7('dul ba): yang bkur ba yin//phan yan 'di ni shes nas kyang //mkhas pa rnams kyis sbyin pa btang //sbyin pa yis ni thar pa dang //dbang phyug lha gnas 'byor par 'gyur///
374b1('dul ba): rgyal po chen po dang tshe de'i dus na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po su khyud ces bya ba gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyu byin
374b2('dul ba): byi stan phyed dang /lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bstabs nas/ngos mi thi lar 'ong ste nas grong khyer g+hi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs nas sbyin pa
374b3('dul ba): dag btang /bsod nams dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/nyon kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus no/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud
374b4('dul ba): ces bya ba dang bri sum du rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi stan phyed dang /lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bstabs pa
374b5('dul ba): yin par gyur teng nyid de nas mi thi lngar song nas/grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te/sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dag byas//rgyal po
374b6('dul ba): chen po ngas sbyin pa 'am/sbyin pa'i bgo ba shwa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po po sgyum na/khyod kyis da ltar mi lta ste/'on kyang de'i sbyin po de ni
374b7('dul ba): bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshobs tsam yin no//de'i 'og tu rgyal po kun dga' bo zhes bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya
375a1('dul ba): ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar te/de la bu gcig dang gnyis nas lnga'i bar dag bcas pa las/de'i bu tha chungs gang yin pa de'i gdong mo long dra
375a2('dul ba): bas de'i ming me long gdong zhes bya bar glag so//de dag thams cad bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur te/gzhon nu me long gdong ni shin tu nges pa dang /shin tu dul gyi
375a3('dul ba): yin no//de dag gzhan ni gtum pa/gzu lums can/rtsub pa yin no//de dag thams cad pa'i dgos pa zhig gi phyir 'dus nA/shes rab kyis cung zad kyang so
375a4('dul ba): sor rtog pa medado//gzhon nu ma long gdong ni dri ba zab mo dag la rang gi shes rab kyis spyod par byed//rgyal po kun dga' bo nad kyis thebs nas/des bsams pa
375a5('dul ba): gang rgyu lnga srid byed du gzhug/gal te bdag gi swa phu bo gong ma bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig/rgyal po byed du bcug na/de rnams gtum pa gzu lums can/
375a6('dul ba): rtsub pa yin pas/tshul ma yin pas/yul mi rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro//gral te gzhon nu ma long gdong rgyal srid byed du bcug na ni nye du rnams kyis
375a7('dul ba): nga rgyal po 'dis sras thu bo rnams bzhag nas/sras tha chungs rgyal srod byed du 'jug pa ci tha tshig ces smod par 'gyur bas/thabs shig ba sha mo snyam nas
375b1('dul ba): des rin po che gsum dang /btsun mo'i 'khor zhes byed pa dang /shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug bzhag nas/des rnon po rnams la smras pa/kye sna bo dgra
375b2('dul ba): nga 'das na khyed cag gis gzhon nu rnams re re nas brtog par bya ste/sus nor bu'i lham zung bgos ni/'tsham par 'gyur ba dang /seng ge'i khri la 'dug na mi g.yo
375b3('dul ba): bAr 'dug pa dang /dbu rgyan mgo la thogs na mi g.yo bar 'dug pa dang /btsun mo'i 'khor zhes byed pa dang /shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug po nang
375b4('dul ba): gi gter dang /phyi'i gter dang /phyi nang gi gter dang /shing gi rtse mo'i gter dang /ri'i rtse mo'i gatrer dang /chu 'gram gyi gter te/su 'di dag thams cad ldan
375b5('dul ba): par gyur pa de du 'das nas khyed cag gis cug shag ces smras nas/bsags pa kun gyi mtha' mdzad cing /mthon po'i mtha' ni ltung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba yin pas
375b6('dul ba): shi'o//blon po de rnams kyis gzhon nu phu bo shos la nor bu'i lham zung du bskon na/ji ltar yang de dang mi 'tsha mo//seng ge'i khri l-i bzhag na g.yoso//dbu rgyan
375b7('dul ba): btags na rab tu g.yoso//btsun mo'i 'khor gyis kyang zhes mi byas//shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug smras na ma shes te/nu bo phyi ma rnams kyang de
376a1('dul ba): bzhino//gzhon nu me long gyudrong la nor bu'i lham zung du bkon na shin tu 'tsham par 'dug go/seng+ge'i zi la 'dun na mi hA yo bya 'dug
376a2('dul ba): dbu rgyan thogs na spyi gtsug rgyas par 'dug/btsun mo'i 'khor gyis kyang zhes byas pa dang /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/da dung shes rab kyis so sor brtag
376a3('dul ba): bar bya ba drug po nang gi gter dang /phyi'i gter dang /phyi nang gi gter dang /shing gi rtse mo'i gter dang /re'i rtse mo'i ga tA ra dang /chu 'gram gyi gter shes par bya
376a4('dul ba): dgoso//me long gdong gis bsams pa/nang gI gI ter+ya zhes bya ba/rlung gi gter ci zhe na/them pa'i nang rol na yod na gter yino//phyi'i gter zhes bya ba/byin
376a5('dul ba): gter ci zhe na/phyi'i gter zhes bya ba ni them pa'i phyi rom na yod pa'i gtar yino//phyi nang gi ga tAMrA zhes bya ba ni ci yin zhe na/them pa'i 'og na yod pa'i gti//
376a6('dul ba): yin no//shing gi rtse mo'i gter zhes bya ba shing gi rtse mo'i gter ci zhe na/rgyal po de bzhugs pa'i shing de'i grib mas nyi mu'i gung la gang du khyab pa de na yod pa'i
376a7('dul ba): gter yin//ri'i rtse mo'i gtor zhes bya ba ni/rgyal po de yod pa'i rdzing de na khrus kyi me lo'i de'i 'og na yod pa'i gter yi no//chu 'gram gyi gter zhes bya ba ni/
376b1('dul ba): khyom gyi chu gang du 'bab pa de'i sbyor khung gi mtha' na yod pa'i gtar yo no//blon po de rnams kyis thams cad so sor brtags na de dag byung nas/de rnams kyis nga rgyal
376b2('dul ba): por dpung bskur te/rgyal po mo long gdeng zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan par gyur te//ri 'or gzhan zhag na/bram ze dbyug gu can zhes bya ba zhag gnas pa des/khyim
376b3('dul ba): bdag cig las glang dag cig brnyas te/zhing rmos nas glang de dag ded de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /ji tsam na khyim bdag dro grol bab nas/bram ze dbyug
376b4('dul ba): gu can gyis glang phug tu btang ba las/sgo gzhan zhig nas byung ste song ngo //khyim bdag de zan zos nas langs na gang na yang glang mi snang nas/des dbyug gu can
376b5('dul ba): bzung nas/glang ga re des smras pa/khyim du ma bcug gam/khyod kyis kho bo'i glang phyogs kyis/kho bo la glang slar byin cig/des smras pa/kho bos ma phrogs
376b6('dul ba): so/des smras pa/rgyal po me long gdong 'di ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin gyis/de'i drung du dong ba dang /des don 'di mkhas te bdag cag la rigs ston par
376b7('dul ba): 'gyuraro zhes de gnyis chas pa dang /mi zhig gis rta rgod ma zhig zos nas/des dbyug gu chen le smras pa/rta nad ma'o ni khog shig/des smras pa/ji ltar dag
377a1('dul ba): tsi nus paso//des rdo ba zhig blangs te/mgor bsnun pas de shi bar gyur to//mi des smras pa/kho bo'i rta rgod ma khyod kyis bsad kyis
377a2('dul ba): kho bo la rta rgod ma gcig byin cig/ci'i phyir rta rgod ma sbyin/des smras pa/tshur shog/rgyal po me long gdong gan du dong dang /des bdag cog gi zhal che sbyor
377a3('dul ba): bar 'gyu ro zhes de dag der dong ba dang /dbyug gu can de 'bros par brtsam so//des rtsig pa zhig gi kha nas bdag nyid 'tshongs pa dang /de'i shod na tha ga pa zhig tha bros
377a4('dul ba): 'thag cing 'dug pa de'i steng du lhung bas tha ga pa shi nas/dbyug gu can yang tha ga pa'i chung mas bzung nas/kho bo'i khyim thab khyod kyis bsad kyis/kho mo'i
377a5('dul ba): khyim thab byin cig/kho bos khyod kyi khyim thab ga la sbyin/des smras pa/tshur rgyal po me long gdong gi drung du 'dong ba dang /des bdag cag gi zhal che gcod par
377a6('dul ba): 'gyu ro zhes de rnams chas pa dang /lam+bu gyi bar de na chu bo gting za ba mo zhig yod pa de la shing mkhan zhig kha na sti'u thogs te/phas tshur rgal ba de la dbyug gu
377a7('dul ba): can des smras pa/chu che chung ji tsam/sti'u btang ste smras pa/chu gting zab po//sti'u de chur lhung nas/des dbyug gu can de bzung ste/khyod kyis nga'i ste'u chur
377b1('dul ba): bsku ro//ngas ma bskuro//tshur rgyal po me long gdong gi drung du dong dang /des bdag cag gi zhal che sbyor bar 'gyur ro//de rnams ngal bas dbyug gu can khrid de/chang 'tshong zhing/
377b2('dul ba): gi khyim du zhugs pa dang /chung 'tshong ma la khye'u zhig btses pa/des khye'u de gos kyis bkab ste bskal pa de la dbyug gu can 'du'o/des khye'u yod khye'u yod ces smras
377b3('dul ba): nas/ji tsam na bltas na shrI bar gyur nas/des dbyug gu can de bzung nas/khyod kyis kho mo'i bu bsad kyis/kho mo'i bu byin cig/des smras pa/kho bos naM
377b4('dul ba): ma bsad pa na/ci'i phyir kho bos khyed kyi bu sbyin/des smras pa/chur rgyal po me long gdong gi drung du 'dong do zhes de rnams chas pa dang /ji tsam ni phyogs gzhan zhig
377b5('dul ba): nA shing skam la khra zhig 'dug pa des/dbyug gu can mthong nas smras pa/gang du 'gro/kho bo ni mi 'gro na/'di dag gis kho bo khrid//gang du me long gdong gi drung du'o//
377b6('dul ba): 'o na kho bo'i phrin yang khyer la/rgyal po me long gdong phyogs ga ge mo zhig na/shing lo ma skams pa zhig mchis pa de la khra zhig mchis te/de'i mchid nas/shing
377b7('dul ba): lo ma sngo zhing sdum pa gzhan dag mchis bzhin du/de la bdag dga' bar mi 'gyur gyi/'di la bdag mchis na bde ba ci las gyur ces gyis shig/de rnams ches pa
378a1('dul ba): lAs rnyi dgras zhig gis dbyuglu gucan mthong nas des smras pa/dazug bu can brang du 'gro//'a bo ni gang du yang mi 'gron/'di dag gis
378a2('dul ba): bo khrid//gang du me long gdong gi drung du'o//kho bo'i phrin yang khyer la/gnas grezhan dag na gsing ma dang /rtswa sngon po dag mchis bzhin du/bdag de dag la ma drad pa
378a3('dul ba): la rgyu ci zhig mchis shes gyis shig/de dag chas pa dang ji tsam na seg pa zhig mthong nas smras pa/gang du 'dong zhes bya ba nas/'o na kho bo'i phrin yang khyer ci bra ces
378a4('dul ba): bya bar gong ma bzhin du ste/bdag phyogs gcig tu ni sreg pa'i skad 'byin la/phyogs gzhan du ni skad gzhan 'byin pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis shes gyis shig
378a5('dul ba): 'dum pa gzhi bam po zhe bzhi pa phyogs gzhon zhig na sgrol zhig gis mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/'o na kho bo'i 'phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i
378a6('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du ste/bdag phug nas ni bde bar 'byung la/slar ni sdug bsngal gyis 'jug par 'gyur ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis shes gyis shig/srul zhig dang
378a7('dul ba): ne'u le gnyis pha ni tshun mi mthun zhing 'thab pa byed pa zhes bya ba nas/'o na bdag cig gi phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/bdag cag nyin
378b1('dul ba): drar gcig gis gcig mthong nas zab mo bgyid kyi/dga' bar mi 'gyur ba 'dri la rgyu ci zhig mchis shes gyis sh+log/dbra sar gzhon nu ma zhig giso zhes bya ba nas/
378b2('dul ba): des smras pa/'o na bdag cag gi phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/gang gi tshe bdag pa'i khyim na mchis pa de'i tshe na/gyos po'i khyim 'tshal la//
378b3('dul ba): gang gi tshe gyos po'i khyim na mchis pa de'i tshe ni/pha'i khyim 'tshal ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis shes gyis shig/de rnams chas nas/rgyal po me long gdong ga la ba
378b4('dul ba): der dong ste phyin nas dbyug gu can gyis/rgyal po la rgyal ba dang /tshe spelnga ba dag byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/gzhan dag gis kyang rkang pa gnyis la mgro bos
378b5('dul ba): phyag byas te 'khod pa dang /rgyal pos dbyug gu can la dris pa/khyod ci la 'ongs/lha bdag ni khridado//ci zhig gi phyir/dbyug gu can gyis khyim bdag dang ci
378b6('dul ba): zhig las rtsod pa de thams cad smraso//rgyal pos khyim bdag la dris pa/khyod kyis blang mthong dram/mthong lag so//dbyug gu can khyod kyis glang phugasu bskrad dam
378b7('dul ba): lha bskrad lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/gang gis phyir go dang ma byas pas dbyug gu can 'di'i lce tshod cig/gang gi phyir 'di yang glang ma btags pas mig byang shig
379a1('dul ba): khyim bdag bris smras pa/rnam gcig tu bdag pa glang stor/rnam gnyi su bdag gi mig phyung bas/dbyug gu can rtul mi bsdu'o//mi nges
379a2('dul ba): smras pa/lha dbyug gu can 'dis bdag gri rta tshod ma zhig bkum mo//ji ltar bsad/des rgyas par smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/grang gi phyir ji ltar nus pa de
379a3('dul ba): bzhin du log shig ces smras pas mi 'dri'i lha chod cig/gang gi phyir rdo bas mi skrun par gzhan gyis dgag mi nus pa med pa dbyug gu can 'di yang lag pa chod cig
379a4('dul ba): mi des smras pa/rnam gcig tu bdag gi rta rgod ma bkum/rnam gnyi su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas/dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o//tha ga pa'i chung mas rgyas par
379a5('dul ba): smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/'di nyid khyod kyi khyim thab tu khyer cig/des smras pa/rnam gcig tu ni 'dis bdag gi sdum thab bkum/rnam gnyisu ni 'di
379a6('dul ba): ma thab tu 'gyur ba bas/dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o//shing mkhan gyis rgyas par smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/gang gi phyir sti'u chu'i dbusu bor nas
379a7('dul ba): tshig smras pas/shing mkhan 'di lce chod cig/dbyug bu can 'dir yang chu'i gting zab par mthong bzhin du/shing mkhan la 'dri bas mig dbyung ngo //shing
379b1('dul ba): mkhan gyis smras pa/rnam gcig tu bdag gi ste'u stor/rnam gnyi su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas dbyug gu can la rgyal mi bsngo'o//chang 'chung mas rgyas par smras pa dang //
379b2('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/gang gi phyir 'odas bu thams cad kyi thams ca dgos kyis g.yogs nus bsnyal bas/chang 'tshong ma 'di lag pa chod cig/dbyug gu can yang ma
379b3('dul ba): brtag par gzhan gyi stan la 'dug pas 'di'i mig phyung shig/des smras pa/rnam gcig tu bdag gi bu bkum/rnam gnyi su bdag gi drug pa bkum pa bas/dbyun
379b4('dul ba): gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o//dbyug gu can gyis khwa'i phan smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/dbyug gu can khri de la khyod kyi phyogs de ni/ri'i rad cig yod pa'i grong gi bdag
379b5('dul ba): par gyur na/shing skam pa dri'i drung na gtAr yod kyi/de 'ga' zhig la byin te song shig dang bde bar 'gyu ro zhes bsgo shig/ri dgas kyi zan smras pa dang /khyod kyis
379b6('dul ba): dgas la ri dgas khyod de na shing yod pa de'i kha nas sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa 'jig ste/de zags pas rtsa dang /gseng ma dag/dang por gyur pa la/khyod za za ba spang ma da
379b7('dul ba): song zin gyis/rol che nges par ma byed cig/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes skyes shig/sreg pa'i than smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/du
380a1('dul ba): sreg pa de sreg pa'i skad 'byin pa'i phyogs de na gter med kyis/gang du skad gzhan 'byin pa de na gterar+ya yod pas/khyod kyis gter 'ga' zhig
380a2('dul ba): la ston la tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa nA mi rung gis gzhan du song shig ces bsgo shig/des sbrul dang ne'u le'i than smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/
380a3('dul ba): de gnyis la khyed cag mir gyur pa na/spun gnyis shig tu skyes te/de na gcig gis smras pa/nor bgo'o//cig shos ser snas zil gyis non pas ma bgoso//
380a4('dul ba): de la gcig ni lhag pa'i chags par byas pas sbrul du skyeso//cig shos kyang nod la the na te lhag par chags par byas pas ne'u lir skye so//de bas na khyed cag gis
380a5('dul ba): nor de dag dge sbyong ngam/bram ze dag la byin la/gnas de 'or cig dang /bde bar 'gyu ro zhes bsgo shig/sbrul gyi tha na smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/khyod
380a6('dul ba): kyis sbrul de la khyod lcogs shing nyam chung bar gyur pas ni phug nas bde bar phyir 'byung ba la kha zas phul mo che zos nas ni sdug bsngal bas phug tu 'jug pa yin gyis//
380a7('dul ba): khyod kyis kha zas la ji tsam du spyod pa drod zin par byas na/khyod bde bar gnas par 'gyu ro zhes bsgo shig/bag sar gzhan nu ma'i then smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/
380b1('dul ba): da kyis bag sAr gzhon nu ma de la khyod kyi bla ma'i khyim na ni 'grogs pashes shig gnas te/gang gi cha khyod gyes pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i rkyen 'grogs shes te 'dod
380b2('dul ba): gang gi tshe pha ma'i khyim na gnas pa de'i tshe ni khyim thab 'dod de/khyod tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur na mi rung gis/gnas cig thong la/gcig legs par
380b3('dul ba): 'chang bar byos shig ces bsgo shig/bag sar gzhon nu ma de dang /sbrul gyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin byaso//sbrul dang ne'u le dag dang /khras ni nor dbyug gu can la
380b4('dul ba): byino//lhag ma rnams kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa de bzhin mnyan to//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/kye ma'o//lha la 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang mnga' ba lta/rgyal po dga'
380b5('dul ba): bib dang mgu bas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi rnamasu sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs nas/sbyin pa'i zhal ta ba'i mI dag bzhag/de'i tshe mu ge lo bcu gnyisu byung ste/des mu ge lo
380b6('dul ba): bcu gnyi su byung ba ni/srog chag brgya stong phrog du ma dag gi kha zas sbyar to//des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs par mthong nas tshig su bcad smras pa/blo ldan
380b7('dul ba): chos dang 'thun pa yis//nor snyed bsags par mi bya ste//tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yi//yon gnas la ni yon du dbul//dge sbyong bram ze des pa dang //phongs
381a1('dul ba): pa legs par tshim byas na//shes rab can de lus zhig nas//lha yi nang du skye bar 'gyur//mkhas pas de ltar shes byas//
381a2('dul ba): dang ldan chags pa med sems kyis//yon gnas rnams la byin pa ni//dpa' bo ser sna med pas bsngags//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus nA/rgyal po me long
381a3('dul ba): gdong zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan pa/gang gis myu ge lI bcu gnyi su byung ba na/srog rgyags brgya stong phrag du ma'i kha zas sbyar ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod
381a4('dul ba): kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus ni/rgyal po mye long gdong zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan pa der gyur te/ngas mu ge lo bcu gnyi su byung ba na/
381a5('dul ba): sngosrog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi kha zas sbyar to//rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa 'am/sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' dris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu//
381a6('dul ba): tho byo snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam+ba dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsam
381a7('dul ba): yino//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang nges bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin
381b1('dul ba): pade nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po nir bzangs shes bya ba zhig byung ste/des grong khyur brgyud khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas baN+Di ga
381b2('dul ba): po mang po dang /s+yo brgya phrag mang po dang /pa stong phrag mang po dang /lo byurgyu stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dkri byas te/des bdag nyid
381b3('dul ba): kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshig su bcad de smras pa/lha dang mi yi nang dag tu/bdag gi 'byor pa mthong nas ni//gang gis phun sum 'thob pa yi//
381b4('dul ba): sbyin pa su zhig sbyin mi byed//gang gis skyes bu brgya phrag thibs mnan cing //ser sna dgra bor gyur pa zil mnan+da nas//'jig rten pha rol 'jigs par sbyin gtong
381b5('dul ba): sto bdag ni dpa' ba'i dpa' rab yin par sem+b+has//gang zhig lag na mtshon thogs g.yul dor khyug/de ni dpa' bo myin zhes thub rnams gsung //gang dag
381b6('dul ba): 'jigs pa med par sbyin gtong pa//de dag dpa' bo yin zhes kun mkhyen gsung //rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bzangs shes bya
381b7('dul ba): gang gis grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsegs te/lo mang po dang /lo brgya phrag mang po dang /lo stong phrag mang po dang /lo brgya stong phrag mang
382a1('dul ba): bo sbyin pa dag sbyin/bsod nams dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyamAn/khyod kyis de ltar mi l+yA ste/'on+da kyang tId de Sh+T+rI d+d+hi dus
382a2('dul ba): n+ya/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bzangs shes bya ba der gyur te/nga nyid kyis de na grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas partsigs te/lo mang po dang /
382a3('dul ba): lo brgya phrag mang po dang /lo stong phrag mang po dang /lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag byaso//rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa 'am sbyin pa'i
382a4('dul ba): daglo sha 'dus rgyun med pa yang dag par rdzogasmra pa'i rgyu bri h+nA samA nA/ de spyir mis s+t+waM/na myong ba sbyin pa de ni blan myed pa yang drug
382a5('dul ba): pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsam yin no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer
382a6('dul ba): ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dgra byas te/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
382a7('dul ba): mthob pa gang yin po de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul lnga len par rgyal po gnyis byung ste/byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa dang /lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'o///
382b1('dul ba): de la byang phyogs kyi lnga lon pa nor can zhes bya ba grong khyer glang po che'i khyim zhes bya ba na 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos
382b2('dul ba): gang ba/'thab pa dang /khrag khrug dang /'gyed pa dang /chom rkun med pa/nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/'bras sa lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba lang dang /ma he
382b3('dul ba): phu sum tshogs pa ni/chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa dang /chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go//grong khyer de na yang mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /
382b4('dul ba): ku mu da dang /pud+ma dkar pos gang ba/drang pa dang /ngur pa dang /bya ka ra na da bas mdzes par byas pa/yid du 'ong ba yod do//mtsho de na klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa
382b5('dul ba): zhes bya ba gnas te/des dus dusu char gyi rgyun legs par phab pos/sa gzhi lhag par lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to//yul yong bzeng bu dang /
382b6('dul ba): btung ba shin tu mo la/'jig rten yang sgrib pa dang /mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur dang ldan pas/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /phongs pa
382b7('dul ba): rnangs la kha zas sbyin par byed do//lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po ni chos ma yin pa la lhag pa gnas pa gtum pa/gzu lums can spro thung ba dge bas/
383a1('dul ba): chos mya yin pas+yA rgyu la snying byed cing chad pa dang /rdeg pa dang /'tshog pa dang /bsod pa dang /'dzin pa dang /'ching ba dang /surma//
383a2('dul ba): 'dod dang /khong sgril dang /gnod pa sna tshogos kyis yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la rtag tu skrag par byed//de chos ma yin pa lnga lhag par gnas pas
383a3('dul ba): der lha yang dus dusu char gyi rgyun legs par mi 'beb so//des na skye ba'i tshegs de 'jigs pa dang /yi chad pas rang gri srog la mi lci bar yul yongasu
383a4('dul ba): spangs te/byang phyogs kyi yul lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul du dong nas gnaso//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nu/lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i dgas 'tsher
383a5('dul ba): ba'i tshul du byas nos yul rnams brtag pa'i phyir byung ba dang /grong rdal dang /grong khyer gang yin pa dag ni stongs par gyur cing /bskyed mos tshul dang /lha
383a6('dul ba): khung rnams ni zhig ral du gyur pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag ci'i phyir grong rdal dang /grong khyer 'dri stongs par gyur
383a7('dul ba): cing bskyed mos tshal dang lho khang rnams ni zhig ral du gyur/skye bo'i tshogs de dag ni gang du dong blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal
383b1('dul ba): pa nor can gyi yul du mchi ste//ci'i phyir/m+b+hi 'jigs pa sprul du gsol/shes ldan sbyin gyi smros shig/de nas de rnams kyis smras pa/lha byang phyogs kyi
383b2('dul ba): lnga len pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid bgyid pas de'i yul 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs par skye bo dang mi mang pos grang zhing
383b3('dul ba): 'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /khrag khrug dang /'gyed pa dang /chom rkun ma mchis la/nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/'bras so lu dang /bu ram shing dang
383b4('dul ba): ba lang dang /ma he phun sum tshogs pa/'jig rten la yang sbyin pa dang /mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur dang ldan pas dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /bkren pa
383b5('dul ba): dang da phongs pa rnams la kha zas stsol bar bgyi do//lha ni gtum pa/gzu lums can/spro thung bas chad pa dang /rdeg pa dang /'tshog pa dang /bsod pa dang
383b6('dul ba): 'dzin pa dang /'ching ba dang /su myi 'dod dang /khong sgril ba dang /gnod pa sna tshogs kyis yul mi rnams la rtag tu skrag par mdzad pas des na skye bo'i
383b7('dul ba): tshogs de 'jigs shing yid chad nas byang phyogs pa lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul du mchis lag so//lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag
384a1('dul ba): gang gros na skye bo'i tshogs de slar 'ongs nas glong rdal dang /grong khyer 'di dag tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/blon po
384a2('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/lha gal te byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin gyi rgyal po mdzad de/byams pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang /
384a3('dul ba): thugs brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bsgyingasnga na/ring por mi thogs par skye bo'i tshogs de slar mchis nas grong rdal drang /grong khyer 'di rnamasu gnas par
384a4('dul ba): 'gyur lag sngo//lho phyogs kyi lnga len+do pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/shes ljon dag gral te de lta nu ngas kyang byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po bzhin du chos
384a5('dul ba): bzhin rgyal srid byas te/byams pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang /snying brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyang bar byas/khyed kyis ci nas kyang skye bo'i
384a6('dul ba): tshogs de slar 'ongs nas grong rdal dang /grong khyer 'di rnamasu gnas par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/lha yon tan gzhan yong 'di lta bu mchis te/grong khyer
384a7('dul ba): de na mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ngang pa dang /ngur pa dang /bya ka ran dkas mdzes par bgyis pa/de na klu'i
384b1('dul ba): duskyob sna tshogs pa zhes pagyi ba zhig gnas te/des dus dus NAr+ya gyi rgyun logs par phab pas/lo tog lhag par phun sum tshogs pAr gyur to//de nas gzhi
384b2('dul ba): por li tog dang ldan pas yul yang bza' ba dang /btung ba shin tu med lagra so//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag gang gis ni klu'i bu de 'dir khugs par
384b3('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/lha rig sngags dang /gsang sngags 'chang dag gis de khugs par 'gyur gyis/de dge btsal du gsol/de nas rgyal pos gser
384b4('dul ba): gyi thum po rgyal mtshon gyi rtse mo lA bcings nas/yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/gang gis byang phyogs lnga len pa'i yul nas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khugs
384b5('dul ba): nad de la glo ser gyi thum po 'di sbyin//bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur sti bya'o//ji tsam nA sbrul khas sdigs pa zhig blon po rnams kyi drung du song nas smras pa/bdag
384b6('dul ba): la gser gyi thum po 'di stsal ni/bdag gis klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs po phrogs te/khrid de mchi'o//rnon po rnams kyis smras pa/'dri khyer cig/des smras pa/
384b7('dul ba): khyed cag gang la yid ches shing yid brtan pa de'i lag tu bzhig la klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khrid de mchis nas 'tshalo//de bzhin du gyis shig/de nas sprul
385a1('dul ba): khas sdigs pa des ma yid brtan du rung ba'i lag tu gser gyi thum po g+hAtad nas byung po khyim gyis spyod khyod du song ngo //de nas nges
385a2('dul ba): mtsho de'i kho ra khyor yug tu brtags nas/mtshan ma la mkhas pa zhig pas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa de ni/phyogs 'di kho na nyid na 'dugo snyam nas/de nas
385a3('dul ba): de gter ma dang yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas/blon po rnams la smras pa/bdag la gtor myi dang yo byad rnams stsol cig dang /zhag bdun gyi nyin par klu'i
385a4('dul ba): bu de phrogs te khrid mchi'o//sbrel khas skyigs pa de yang des mthong nas/ ni bdag 'phrog tu 'ongs te/zhag bdun gyi bar bdag phyogs nas/ba m-i
385a5('dul ba): dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal chen po bdag gis myang bar 'gyur na/ji m+b+hir bya/su la skyabs btsal snyam pa dang /yang mchi de nas hA cang yang mi
385a6('dul ba): ring ba zhig na/rngon pa sran can dang /spyang leb can gnyis gnas te/de gnyis mtsho do'i drung na gnas bcas nas gang dag skam la yod pa'i srog chags ri
385a7('dul ba): bod dang /ljang sro ska dang /phag la sogs pa mchod la 'thung ngu 'gro ba dang /gang yang chun yod pa nya dang /ru sbal dang /sbal pa la sogs pa bsad cing
385b1('dul ba): 'tsho bar byed pa las de na yang sran can nA sh+lo/srang lob can ni gson no//klu'o zla skye ba sna tshogs pas bsams pa/rngon pa srung laban+dan ma gtugs pa
385b2('dul ba): skyabs gzhan mdo snyam nas/de nas mi'i cha byad du byas te/rngon pa spang leb can gyi drung du song nas smras pa/kye nang rje rgyal po nor can gyi yul gyi 'byor pa dang /
385b3('dul ba): rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba zhes bya ba nas/'bras sa lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba la glung dang /ma he
385b4('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/su'i mthu las gyur pa dzi ga khyod kyis shes sam/des smras pa/shes te rgyal po de chos dang ldan
385b5('dul ba): pas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed de/byams pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang /brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyangs paso//des smras pa/ji
385b6('dul ba): ste 'ba' shig gam/gzhan gyis kyang yin/mthon pas smras pa gzhan gyis yon tan zhig kyang yod de/mtsho 'di na klu'i bu skyo ba sna tshogs can zhes bya ba gnas
385b7('dul ba): to/des dus du su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to//de na sa gzhi lhag par lo tig dang ldan pas yul yang
386a1('dul ba): bza' ba dang /btung ba mod par gyur to//skye ba sna tshogs bslus pa/gal te 'ga' zhig gis klu'i bu de yul 'di nas phrogs
386a2('dul ba): na klu'i bu de cir gyur rung bar mi 'gyur te/de phra ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyuraro//rgyal po dang yul mis phyogs na/de lta khyod kyis ji ltar
386a3('dul ba): bya srog dang dbrel bar bya'o//khyod kyis klu'i bu de gang yin pa shes sam mi shes//de nyid nga yin na/lho phyogs lnga len pa'i sbrul khas sdigs pa nga 'phrog
386a4('dul ba): par byed/de gtor ma dang /yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'ong bar 'gyur te/'ongs nos mtsho ngog su seng ldeng gi phur bu grwa bzhir
386a5('dul ba): btsugs pa tshon skud sna tshogs kyi sa breswA te/gsang sngags brjod par byed kyis/de nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu khyod mi mngon par 'dug la/gang gi tshe
386a6('dul ba): des tshe ga de lta bu byibye gyi'i de'i tshe mtsho'i nang gi chu khol zhing lud pAr 'gyur to/nga yang 'byung gis/de'i tshe khyod kyis sgrol khas sdigs pa de'i gnad du mangs
386a7('dul ba): bsnun la de mo thig tu drung du song ste gsang sngags slar bsdus shig/ma bsdus na khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad do/sa la bor ra re zhes smos shig/gal te des
386b1('dul ba): gsang sngags rnams ma bsdus par srog dang bral te shi nA ni/kho bo ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gsang sngags kyi zhugs pas bcings par 'gyuraro//rngon pas smras pa/
386b2('dul ba): gal te khyod gcig pu la phan thogs na yang de bzhin du kho bo kho nas byas na yul mtha' dag la phan pa lta smos kyang ci bgos te/kho bos skyabs byas song shig
386b3('dul ba): de nas klu'i bu des de la dben pa'i phyogs shig bstan nas/ji tsamo na sngon ma de dge 'dun gyi nyin par phyogs dben par bdag nyid gab ste 'dug pa dang /sbrul
386b4('dul ba): khas sdigs de yang 'ongs nas/gtor ma dang yo byad kyi cho ga bya bar rtsom ste/des phyogs bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi btsugs/tshon srung sna tshogs kyis
386b5('dul ba): bres te gsang sngags brjod do//de nas chu de khol du tsha ba dang /rngon pas gnad du mangs bsnun nas/ral gri shugs nas phyung ste smras pa/khyod kyis nged kyi
386b6('dul ba): yul na gnas pa'i klu'i bu gsang sngags kyis dbrog gam/gsang sngags slar bsdus shig/ma bsdus na khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la bor ra raM/de nas
386b7('dul ba): sbrul khas sdigs pas sdug bsngal nyamasu myong bas nyam thag cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas skrag nas gsang sngags btul ba dang /rngon pas de ma thag par de bsad
387a1('dul ba): do//de nas klu'i bu gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa las thar te/mtsha nas byung nas rngon pa la 'khyud de 'di skad ces smras//rgyang/
387a2('dul ba): ni kho bo'i ma yin/khyod ni kho bo'i pha yin te/'di ltar khyod la brten pas kho bo pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ma skyes so//tshur shog gnasu 'dong
387a3('dul ba): zhes des de gnasu khrid de song nas bza' ba dang /btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas te/rin po che dag bstabs nas ma dang pha la smras pa/yab yum 'di
387a4('dul ba): ni bdag gi snying du sdug pa/skyabs dang gnyen du gyur pa lags te/'di'i mthus bdag khyed dang lhan cig pa las bral bar ma gyur to//de dag gis kyang de la dam
387a5('dul ba): pa sbyin par byed de/rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs byin nas des de rnams khyer te mtsho de nas byung ngo //mtsho de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na/bsti gnas me tog dang
387a6('dul ba): 'bras bu phun sum tshogs la/bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de/don drang srong byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can rnams la sdug par 'dzin pa
387a7('dul ba): zhig gnas//de nas rngon pa de drang srong ngo'i drung du dus gsum du 'gro bar brtsom zhing /de la klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang lhan cig ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams
387b1('dul ba): rAdu rgyas par smraso//de nas drang srong des smras pa/khyod la rin po che dang gsar ci dgos/de'i gnas na don yod pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa yod kyis de slongs
387b2('dul ba): shig/de nas rngon pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa la chags pa skyes nas/drang srong gi tshig mnyan te/slar klu'i gan su song bu dang /de nas ji tsam na klu'i khang pa'i
387b3('dul ba): sgron don yod pa'i zhags pa de mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag 'dod pa'i zhags pa gang yin pa de ni 'di kho na yin snyam nas/klu'i gan su zhugaso//
387b4('dul ba): de nus klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang /klu gzhan rnams kyis yang dag par dga' ba dang /mgu ba dgu byas nas rin po che dag bstabs pa dang /des smras pa
387b5('dul ba): kho byol ni rin po che mi dgos kyis/'on+da kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa 'dri kho bo la byin cig/skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa/khyod la 'di ci dgos kho ba cig la ni
387b6('dul ba): dgos rab ste/gang gi tshe na mkha' lding gis gnod pa byas pa de'i tshe 'dis kho bo tsog srung bar 'gyurari//rngon pas skyes pa/khyod cag la ni na mkha' lding gi gnod
387b7('dul ba): pa lan 'ga' zhig 'byung ba ni 'di dgos kyi/kho bo la ni dus kun tu dgos kyis gal te legs pa byas pa dang /pha ni btags po dran pa lta na byin cig/klu'i bu
388a1('dul ba): skye ba sna tshogs pa 'di snyam du sems te/'dis bdug la phan cher btags kyis/pha ma la brtags te sbyi na snyam nas/desna
388a2('dul ba): pa ma la brtags te zhags pa de byin no//de nas rngon pa de bdag thob pa bzhin du bde ba dang /yid bde bas tshi ma nus/don yod pa'i zhogs pa khyer te/klu
388a3('dul ba): gnas nas byung nas rang gi khyim du song ngo //ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal po nor can btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dka' mgur
388a4('dul ba): spyod par byed//de rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu bo yang med/bu mo yang med nas/lag pa 'gram pa la gtad te/
388a5('dul ba): bdag gi khyim du nor zas 'di snyed cig bsags kyang /bdag la bu po yang mod bu mo yang med pas/bdag 'das na bdag gi rgyang 'chang cing yul 'tshor ba dang /
388a6('dul ba): bdog po rol yong rgyal po gzhan gyis dbang bya bar 'gyuraro snyam nas/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa dang /de la dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /grogs pa
388a7('dul ba): dang /mdza' ba shes dang /nyedu rnams kyis smras pa/skye tse'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/de skabs de rnams lo rgyas par smras pa dang /de rnams kyis
388b1('dul ba): smras pa/lha rnams la gsol ba/mdzod cig dang /khyod lha sras mchis par 'gyur//de bu med de bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang /chu dang /lus ngan
388b2('dul ba): dang /nor lho li sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing /lha'i bye brag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /nags tshal gyi lha dag dang
388b3('dul ba): bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /sum mdo'i lha dag dang /gtor ma lon pa'i lha dag dang /lhan cig skyes pa dang /chos dang 'thun pa dag dang /rtag tu rje su 'brang ba'i
388b4('dul ba): lha dag la yang gsol ba 'deb so//'jig rten nu gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/de ni de lta bu ma yin
388b5('dul ba): te gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na/re re la yang 'di lta ste dbyer na/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur//'on kyang gnas gsum po dag
388b6('dul ba): mngon par gyur pa las bu pho dang /bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro//gsum po de dag gang zhe na/pha dang mi dag chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /ma dus la bab cing
388b7('dul ba): zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu po dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyuraro//de de
389a1('dul ba): ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na/bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' zhig btsun mo dam pa de'i mngal
389a2('dul ba): du zhug so//bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod/lnga gang zhe na/skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing /chags pa
389a3('dul ba): dang bral ba shes pa dang /dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang /gang las mngal du zhugs pa de yang shes pa dang /
389a4('dul ba): khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas pA rten cing 'dug la/gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug/de yid dga' zhing
389a5('dul ba): yid dga' nas/khyo la smras pa/rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pa las na/nges
389a6('dul ba): pabar khye'ur 'gyur gyi sa dgyes pa bskyed du gastsol/de yang yid draga' nas ro stod bsrang ste lag pa grwayas pa brkyang nas/'di skad ces kho bo yun ring po nas
389a7('dul ba): mngon par 'dod pa bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /kho bo dang 'thun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /bgo
389b1('dul ba): sbrul la spyod pa dang /kho bo rigs rgyud la yun ring du gnas par bsgrub pa dang /bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu 'am/mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag
389b2('dul ba): byin/bsod nams dag byas nas 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rje su 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis yon bsngo ba byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa brjod
389b3('dul ba): por byed//de la sems can zhugs par rigs nas/'di lta ste/mung la ne gnas pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir grang ba na/grang ba'i
389b4('dul ba): yo byad dag dang /dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /sman pas bstan pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /ha cang mau skur ba dang /ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang /ha cang mi mngar
389b5('dul ba): ba da hA cang mi che ba dang /ha cang mi bsko ba dang /khya ba dang /skyur ba dang /lan tshwa dang /mngar ba dang /tsha ba dang /bsku ba spangs pa'i zas
389b6('dul ba): dag dang /do shul dang /se mo do dang /rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal ni rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /khri nas khrir dang /khri'u nas khri'ur dang
389b7('dul ba): shod kyi sa gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi zos par nyam bag tu bzhago//ngo zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba/
390a1('dul ba): s+thAn sdug pa/mdzes pa/gsapa d+ha/gsar gyi mdog 'dru /maglub gdugs ltar 'dug pa/lag pa ring ba/drangul ba'i da rgya/
390a2('dul ba): basmin mya 'dzar ba/sna'i gzungs mtho bA/yan lag dang /nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig bcis//dI bcas na kun dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rnga brdungs pa
390a3('dul ba): rgyal pos thos nas smras pa/de ci'i zhig yin/btsun pa rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/khyod kyi sras po zhig blta mo//de
390a4('dul ba): nas rgyal pos grong khyer de thams cad rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo bsal te/byi dor byas nas/tsan dan gyis chus chag chag btabya/rgyal mtshan dang ba
390a5('dul ba): ngadon ba sgreng /shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag bshams/me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis dga'u dga' ltar bkram ste bskor/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /
390a6('dul ba): kren pa dang /phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin cig/btson thams cad khyo shig/de'i phyir nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rje gcig tu btsos pa'i btsas ston rgyu
390a7('dul ba): cher byas nas/khye'u yi ming cir gdogs shes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/blon pa rnams kyis smras pa/khye'u 'di rgyal po nor can gyi sras lags paso//
390b1('dul ba): khye'u'i ming nor bzungasu gdagaso shes de'i ming nor bzangs shes byu bar btag s+ho//khye'u nor bzangs ma ma brgyad po/pang nA 'tsho bA'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma
390b2('dul ba): snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtsi grogs kyi mya ma gnyis la rje su gtade/da ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar
390b3('dul ba): dang na zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag btso bo btso bo dag gis sring bar byed/bskyed par byed cing /rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma
390b4('dul ba): bzhin du myur du skyed par byed//gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug ste zhes bya ba nas/brtag pa brgyad dang /dbye ba dang /klag pa la
390b5('dul ba): mkhas pa dang /spyod pa la gsal bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhi no//de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ljongs kyi dbang phyug dang /
390b6('dul ba): mthu dang /brtson 'grus thob pa/sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di mngon par rgyal bar byas te/gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas shes
390b7('dul ba): bya ba nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/de'i phos chung mo gsum po che ma dang /'bring ma dang /chun ma dag bzhag cing gnas
391a1('dul ba): pa'i khang pa rnam pa gsum po//dgun gyi dang /pyid kyi dang /dbyar gyi rnams bamyigs nas/bskyed mos tshal rnam pa gsum go//
391a2('dul ba): dgun gyi dang /pyid kyi dang /dbyar gyi dge bcug so//de nas gzhon nu nor bzlongs steng gi khang brnangs kyi gzhi la skyes pa med par song nas sil snyan rnams kyis
391a3('dul ba): rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' mgur spyod par byed//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig ni rngon pa spang leb can ri dgas tshol zhing de dang de dag tu rgyu ba na/ri bo gzhan
391a4('dul ba): zhig lo phyin pa dang /des ri bo de'i shid na/drang srong ge ba ste gnas me tog dang /'bras bu phun sum tshogs bya/bya sna tshog sa rgyu/de ni mtsho chen po
391a5('dul ba): ut+pal dang /ku mu dang gA/pad+ma dkar pos yog pa/drang pa dang /bye ka ran+ma da ka dang /ngur pos mdzes pa de mthong nas/de bsti gan sU der 'i khyam par bcom
391a6('dul ba): pa las/ji tsam nu drang srong ske dang kha spu dang /sen mo dang /spu rnams ring ba lus rlung dang /tsha bas gdungs pa/shing gos gyon pa zhig shing drung du gnas
391a7('dul ba): bcas te/rtswa'i spyil bu ni 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang rkang pa la mgo bos phyag rgyas te thal mo sbyar nas dris pa/legs ldan phyogs 'dir khyod bzhugs
391b1('dul ba): nas/yun ji srid cig lags/lo bzhi bcu lon no//khyod kyis yun de srid gcig tu phyogs 'dir lon no//ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'ga' lta gzigs pa 'am//
391b2('dul ba): gsan pa lta mchis sam/drang srong zhi ba'i bdag nyid des/dal bu dal dus smras pa/bzhin bzangs khyod kyis mtsho 'di mthong ngam/legs par mthong yag so//
391b3('dul ba): 'di ni tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing zhes bya ste/ut+pa la dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar pos gang ba dang /bya sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyis bsten pa/kha ba dang /dngul dang
391b4('dul ba): ba mo'i mdog lta bu'i chus shin tu gang ba/shin tu dri zhim pa'i mye tog gis bskor ba'i chu'i rdzing 'dir tshes bi co lnga la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma
391b5('dul ba): zhes bya ba/mi 'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongasu bskor nas/mgo khrus dang bas nye sna tshogs dang longs nas khrus byed//de khras byed pa'i tshe bro gar dang /glu dang /
391b6('dul ba): rol mo'i sgra nyan pas bya dang //ri dgas kyang yid 'phrogs par byed do//kho bo yang de'i sgra thos nas dga' bo dang /yid bde ba chen pos zhag bdun 'da' bar byed de/
391b7('dul ba): bzhin bzangs kho bos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di mthong ngo //de nas rngon pa snang leb can 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis klu las don yod pa'i zhags pa thob pa ste
392a1('dul ba): de mi 'am ci'i bu mo yi 'phrog mA la gdab po snyam nas/de dus gzhan zhig na tshes bco lnga la don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te/maN+Da
392a2('dul ba): 'gram dang nye bar me tog dang /'bras bu dang /lo ma tshang ching zhig tu 'azas nas gcig tu bsgrim pas byar byed cing 'dug go//ci tsam na yid 'phrog ma myi 'am ci
392a3('dul ba): mo lnga brgyas yongasu bskor te/de 'dra ba'i 'byor pa nyid kyis tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing du khrus kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /rngon pa srang la ba can gyis de ma thag tu dron yod
392a4('dul ba): pa'i zhags pa btab pa las/des mi 'am tso mo yid 'phrog ma zin to//don yod pa'i zhugs pas zin nas/mtsho'i nang na mchod rgal zhing 'jigs pa'i sgra yang
392a5('dul ba): phyung ba dang /mi 'am ci mo'i tshogs lhag mas de thos nas/phan tshun brgyugs te mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma la brtag par brtsams pa las bzung bar mthong ///
392a6('dul ba): mthong nas kyang skrag nas blos so//rngon pa des mchog tu gzugs bzang mo dalta na sdug pa de mthong //mthong nas kyang gzung ba'i phyir drung du gtugs pa dang /des
392a7('dul ba): smras pa/ma rabs khyod ni nga la ma reg shig/khyod kyi 'di ni thog tu bab ma yin//de ni gzugs bzang rgyal gyi 'os yin pas/'dzin pa legs par 'gyur ba ma
392b1('dul ba): yin no//rngon pus smras pa/glang do khyod ma bzung na 'bros par 'gyur//des skyes pa/kho mo mo 'bros kyis/gal hUM yid mi chos na/'di'i mthus kho mo steng gi nam paphywa
392b2('dul ba): 'gros gtsug gi nor bu 'di zung shig/rngon pas smras pa/su shes des de la gtsug gi nor bu byin nas/smras pa/gtsug gi nor bu 'di su'i lag pa na gnas pa de'i dbang du kho mo
392b3('dul ba): 'gyuraro//de nas rngon pas nor bre de blangs te/zhags pas bcings bzhin du khrid song //de'i tshe gnon nu nor bzangs ri dgas 'tshar du chas pa dang /rngon pa des gzhon nu nor
392b4('dul ba): bzangs gzugs bzang po/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa mthong //mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/'di ni rgyal bu gzhon nu yin la/'di yang mchog tu gzugs bzang mo
392b5('dul ba): blta na sdug pa yin te/gal te 'di mthong na bcan zabasu khyer bar 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gis 'di skyes kyi tshul du bdag nyid kyis dngul snyam nas/de nas de zhugs pas bcings
392b6('dul ba): bzhin du/rgyal po gzhon nu nor bzangs gang na ba der khrid song nas phyin pa dang /rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/lha bdag gis bud med rin po che 'di skye su 'tshal te
392b7('dul ba): mchis na bzhe su gsol/rgyal bu gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis/mi 'om ci mo yid 'phrog ma gzugs bzang mo/blta na sdug pa/mdzes pa/kha dog rgyas pa/mchog dang ldan pa//
393a1('dul ba): ston thams cad 'dus pa/bud med kyi mtshan bco brgyad kyis brgyanA pa/yul gyi mi bas bzang ba/nu ma gser gyi bum dang bA/ru sbal lhur//
393a2('dul ba): rgyas shing rlo ba dang mkhrang zhing mkhregs pas shin tu legs par zlum pa lham pa/mig 'thon mthing la rtsa dmar zhing dkyus ring la/pad+ma gzhon nu 'dra ba/sna'i gzangs ring
393a3('dul ba): zhing mtho ba/ma mchu byi ru dang /nor bu dang /rin po che dang /bimA pa'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra ba/'gram pa ma stongs shing yongasu rgyas pa/mkhur tshos lhag par
393a4('dul ba): dga' bar byed pa'i ri mo'i thig le can/sprin ma rim gyis mdzes shing 'dzar la bung ba'i tshogs ltar gnag pa/dpung pa zla ba dri ma med pha ltar rgyas la ring ba/lto gnyer
393a5('dul ba): ma zab mo gsum dang ldan zhing yid tsam rnyong ba/nu ma'i g.yur gyis ro stong pags kyis 'dud la/dku shing rta'i yan lag ltar dbyibs shin tu mdzes pa/lag pa chu
393a6('dul ba): shing gi snying po 'dra ba/berla byin gyis phra ba bzlum pas mdzes pa/rtsa shin tu mi mngon zhung g+ha gyu med pas yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/nor bu mang po'i mgo rgyan dang
393a7('dul ba): mgul gdub dang /rkang gdub dang /gdub bu dang /do shal dang /se mo de'i sgras 'gying zhing 'gro ba/sgra gnag la 'jam pa/bde sogs ltar rkang pa rkang gdub kyis brgyan
393b1('dul ba): tso gsar gyi 'og brags can/ phyung ngo ba/do shul mang po sbyangs pa/mdog gser btsom ltar bzang ba mdzod /mdzong ma thag tu gzhon nu nor bzangs 'dod chags /
393b2('dul ba): zhags pa/chu zla dri ma med cing /gsal ba g.yo ba'i rang bzhin lto bur gzung dka' ba/rlung chu rlabs dang bcas pa'i chu srin lta bur rtogs par dka' ba/na mkha' lding dang rlung gi
393b3('dul ba): shugs dang 'dra bar 'gro ba shing bal gyi mda' ba lta bur myur du 'gyur ba/spre'u ltar sa gcig na mi 'dug pas g.yo zhing gtse ba yab can gyis ni dam du zin/'dod chags kyi myed
393b4('dul ba): rtag tu nyon mongs bsten pa la goms pa'i 'dod chags kyi bde ba ro myang ba la bskam pa/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yul ngan 'gro'i g.yungs las mi zlog pa/bzang mo
393b5('dul ba): la rje su chags pa'i sems kyis shin tu dri ma can du byas pa/phrad pas 'dod pas shin tu dbyung mi bzod pa'i sgra 'byin pa/tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i gzhus 'phangs pas ni snying la
393b6('dul ba): phog ste/me'i nang du phye ma leb bzhin du de nyid du 'gyel to//smras pa/dbyar gyi char sprin nang nas glog ni 'gyu ba ltar//bzhin ras zla ba 'dra de nor bzangs kyis mthong ste//de la
393b7('dul ba): chags pa'i 'dod pa ste tshul las byung ba'i//'dod chags mnga' yi sems lo phog//'dul ba gzhi bam po zhe lnga pa/de nas rgyal bu nor bzangs kyis
394a1('dul ba): yid 'phrog ma de khrid de glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song nas/rngon pa de la yang grong khyer mchog gcig byin no//de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs//
394a2('dul ba): yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir dong nas lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' mgur spyod par byed/yid 'phrog ma'i gzugs dang /
394a3('dul ba): na tshod dang /bsnyon bkur brgya phrag du ma'i yon tan gyis gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi sems ji ltar de dang skad cig kyang 'brel mi phong pa de ltar phrogaso//ji tsam dus
394a4('dul ba): gzhan zhig na bram ze gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'ongs pa las/de las cig ni rgyal po la rten bcaso//gnyis pa ni gzhon nu nor bzangs la'o//rgyal po la rten bcas
394a5('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de ni/rgyal pos mdun na 'don du bcug ste/longs spyod kyi skal ba yang byin//gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi gang yin pa de la ni/des longs spyod kyi skal pa
394a6('dul ba): tsam zhig byin pa dang /smras pa/gzhon nu gang gi tshe yab 'das nas khyod rgyal por bcug pa de'i tshe/bdag la ci zhig bgyi/gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi so smras pa/
394a7('dul ba): ji ltar khyod kyi grogs pa bram ze de'i yab kyis mdun na 'don du bcug pa de bzhin du/khyod kyang nga'i mdun na 'don du gzhugo zhes bya ba'i gtam de gcig nas gcig
394b1('dul ba): tu brgyud do/bram ze mdun na 'don des thos nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/ngas ci nas gzhon nu nyid kyis kyang rgyal srid mi thob pa de bya na/mdun na 'don du gzhugs
394b2('dul ba): pa ste smos kyang ci dgos skye mo//ji tsam dus gzhar zhig na rgyal po de'i yul du ri 'or pa zhig sngo bar gyur nas/rgyal pos de 'beb su dmag kha chen cig btang ba lags/
394b3('dul ba): de btso mi rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar logo/de bzhin du kha che bdun gyis bar btang ba las/de rnams kyang bcom rnam par bcom ste/pham byar byas nas slar
394b4('dul ba): lhag so//rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/lha ci'i slad du rang gi dpung nyams shing gzhan gyi mthu bskyed par mdzad/gang yang lha'i yul ba mtshon gyis 'tsho ba
394b5('dul ba): ji snyed mchis pa thams cad dgug tu gsol/bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/gzhon nu nor bzangs bsad pa'i thabs bya ba'i dus ni 'di yino snyam nas/de nas
394b6('dul ba): rgyal po la gsol pa/wA de lta bus ni dbab par rngochom thog/rgyal pos smras pa/ji ltar bya/nga nyid kho na 'gro 'am/mdun na 'dron gyis smras pa/ci'i slad du lha nyid ga
394b7('dul ba): gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di ni dar la bab cing mthu rtsal ngo snyams pa dang ldan pa yin ma~M pas/dmapa 'di rnams dang lhan cig tu dgyer gsol/rgyal pos smras pa de
395a1('dul ba): bzhin du bya'o zhes/de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu bkug nas bsgo ba/gzhon nu dmag dang lhan cig tu deng la ri bor rnams phog shig/lha bka'
395a2('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzongs kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas/btsun mo rnams kyi gan du snang ste/yid 'phrog ma mthong ba dang /des thams cad brjod par
395a3('dul ba): gyur to//de nas yang rgyal pos bsgo ba dang /yang de mthong ma thug tu thams cad brjed par gyur to//de nas mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa/lha gzhon nu
395a4('dul ba): nor bzangs ni yid 'phrog ma la lhag par chags pa mchi rngo mi thog gis/dmag bsdogs la gzhan nu btsun mo rnams kyi nang nas byung ba dang /ci nas kyang yid 'phrog ma'i
395a5('dul ba): drung du mi mchi bar thal byung bar btang bgyi'o//rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag dpung gi tshogs ste gon gyis shig/blon po rnams kyis rgyal
395a6('dul ba): po lus mnyan nas/dpung gi tshogs glang po che dang /rta dang /shing rta dang /dpung bu chung phun sum tshogs pa/'chog chas go mtshan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa dag sta glan
395a7('dul ba): byasod/de nas gzhon nu phyir byung ba dang bsgo ba/gzhon nu dpung gi tshogs ste gin byas kyis song shig/des smras pa/lha yid 'phrog ma la bltas te mchi bar bgyid//
395b1('dul ba): rtul pas smras pa/gan nu thags par 'gyur gyis mya sna shig/yab kAs+sa te dwe stA nA mA s+sa byA m+b+ha s+yA twA mAHsmai/kun+d+ha nu ma sa sa /sa yod 'brugs nad du na/
395b2('dul ba): gnar bu khyer nas/ma'i drung du song ste nang po gnyis la ka~M tugs te smras pa/sum bdeg ri' ba rnams 'debs mchi legs kyis//tsug nur bu 'di khyod kyi phyi
395b3('dul ba): tu dben par spos la/yid 'phrog ma 'gum pa la thug pa ma legs par ji ltar gyur kyang ma stsal cig ces des de skad ma lnga bsgo nas mtsho phyag byas te/dmag gi
395b4('dul ba): dpung gi tshogs dang /rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang chus te rim gyis yul 'das nas/ri 'or pa de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa zhig gri drung du btang ste 'dug
395b5('dul ba): de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang /'khar gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang /la 'ar gnod sbyin brgya stong
395b6('dul ba): phrag du ma dang lam de nas gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar chaso//de lom de nas chas pa na/na mkha'i lam lo zags par gyur nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/
395b7('dul ba): bdag gis lam 'di nas lan mang ba zhig tu song na bdog gi bzhon pa lan 'ga' yang thogs par ma gyur na/gang gis na de ltar thogs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod snyam pa las/dris
396a1('dul ba): gzhon nu nor bzungs mthong nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/'di ni bskalnga pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/dra ma pa la chas pas can mangs
396a2('dul ba): par 'gyur gyis/'di'i grogs byis te/ri 'or pa 'di rnams sgrog tshogs 'ga' yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba dbab po snyam du bsamye nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po k+She len
396a3('dul ba): la smras pa/lnga len tshur shog/khyod kyis gzhonu nor bzangs ri 'or pa rnams dang g.yul ma bkye bar srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod par mi bya ba pob shig/gnod sbyin gyi sde
396a4('dul ba): dpon chen po lha len gyis bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas/lha'i yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs shing ta la'i tshad tsam gyi skyes pa
396a5('dul ba): dang /ri'i tshad tsam gyi glang po che dang /glang po che'i tshad tsam gyi rta dang /gzhal med khang gi tshad tsam gyi rta dang /gzhal med khang gi tshod tsam gyi shing rta rnams sprul to//de nas ral
396a6('dul ba): gri dang /tho ba dang /mda' bo che dang /mdung dang /'khor lo dang /mdung thung dang /mnga' dang /dgra s+t+wa la sogs te/mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs dang /sil dkrol gyi sgra
396a7('dul ba): rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas 'jigs pa chen po ston cing /lnga len mthu chen po tshogs rnams dang ri 'ong phyin pa dang /glang po che dang /rta dang /shing rta'i sgra dang /sil dkrol gyi sgra sna
396b1('dul ba): tshogs dang /gnod sbyin rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi mthus/ra ba dag ral bAr gyur to//de nas ri byor na blanas pa de rnams kyi dpung po tshogs de dag/rU ba dag ral pa mthong nas/mtshud tu ngo mtshar
396b2('dul ba): skyes te/dris pa/dpung gi tshogs 'di gang nas 'ongs/de rnams kyis smras pa/myur du sgo phye shig/gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di'i mjug nas 'ong ste/dpung gi tshogs 'di ni de'i yin//gral te
396b3('dul ba): myur du ma phye na/thams cad rmeg med par 'gyur//de rnams kyis/bdag cag rgyal mi ldog ste//gzhon nur blo dang ldan la min//rgyal po'i zho shas mtsho rnams kyis//bdag cag 'jigs
396b4('dul ba): shi skrag gyur med//ces smras nas/de rnams kyis sgo phye ste/de nas rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bsgreng nas/bum pa gang ba dang /rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis gzhon nu nor bzangs
396b5('dul ba): bsu'o//des kyang dbugs phyung nas de rnams 'grung ba las sna po bskos to/dpya thang bcad/gti'u yang bzung //de nas ri 'or pa de rnams cham du phab nas/gzhonanu nor bzangs slar log//
396b6('dul ba): rgyal po nor can gyi de nyid kyi nub mo rmi lam na bya rgod cig 'ongs te/rgyal po'i lho dral nas rgyu ma gzangs te/grong khyer de thams cad kyi mtha' bskor ba dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi khyim du
396b7('dul ba): 'ongs par mthong nas de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag mi dga' zhing spu zing zhos byed nas/myur ba par bar langs te/mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 'gram pa gtad/gzhi 'di
397a1('dul ba): las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa las/de num nangs nas/rmi
397a2('dul ba): lam de bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa dang /des bsams pa/lhas rmi lam de lta bu mthong ba ni gdon mi za bar gzhon nus ri 'or pa rnams pham par byas kyis/log pa bzhin
397a3('dul ba): du bstan par bya'o snyam nas smras pa/lha khyed kyi rmi lam du gzigs pa ni bzang po ma lags te/gdon mi 'tshal bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/sku
397a4('dul ba): tshe'i bar chad du 'gyur lagaso//'on kyang 'di bzlog pa'i thabs mchis te/de yang bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig las mthong //bzlog pa'i thabs de ci yin/lha bskyed mos
397a5('dul ba): tshal du rdzing dbyibs legs pa tshad la bab pa bgyis la/de nas rdo thal gyis byugs te/legs par bstar nas/ri dgas phra mo rnams kyi khrag gis bkang la/de nas lhas
397a6('dul ba): khrus la gshegs pa na/rdzing de la them skas gcig la 'jug par bgyi'o//gcig las zhugs nas gnyis la 'dzeg par bgyi'o//gnyis pa las zhugs nas gsum
397a7('dul ba): pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o//gsum pa las zhugs nas bzhi pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o//de nas bram ze rig byed dang /rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis lha'i zhabs
397b1('dul ba): sa bldags la/mi ma yin pa'i tshil gyis bdug pas 'dug/de sgyur na lha'i dngos sdig 'byung zhing yun ring por rgyal srid stong bar 'gyur//rgyal pos smras pa/de dag thams
397b2('dul ba): cad ni nus na/'di ltar mi ma yin pa'i tshil bu 'di ni shin nu dkon//mdun na 'don gyis smra so//lha mod pa gang lags pa de dkon lags som/rgyal pos smras gang ji lta bu
397b3('dul ba): zhig yin/mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/lha yid 'phrog ma 'di mi mya la pa la/sa rgyal pos smras pa/mdun na 'don 'di la gzhon nu'i srog 'dug gis de skad ma smra shig/des smras
397b4('dul ba): pa lha khyim gyi phyir ni 'ga' gtang ste/grong rdul phyir ni khyim gtang //yul ljongs phyir ni glong rdal te//bdag gi phyir ni sa gtang zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam/rgyal po bdag nyid brtan
397b5('dul ba): byugyur nas//gzhon nu zo ldan de la ni//gzhan zhig stsol bar spyong grang gis//yid 'phrog 'di ni dgum par mdzod//bdag nyid la mngon par chags pa ni mi byed pa ci yang med pas/
397b6('dul ba): dag las blang so//de nas mdun na 'don gyis ji skad ba stan pa bzhin du bya bar brtsams te/rdzing ba rkos nas rdo zil gyis rmugs shing legs par bskur nas//ri dgas phra mo rnams
397b7('dul ba): khrag sogs pa la zhug so//sbyor ba de nor bzangs kyi btsun mo'i skye bos shes nas/de rnams dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes te/bdag cag lang tsho bab cing /gzugs phun sum tshogs pa
398a1('dul ba): yin pas/dA ni bdag cag dang /gzhonu nor bzangs yongasu dga' dgur spyod par 'gyu ro zhes de rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag/yid 'phrog mas
398a2('dul ba): mthong nas dris pa/khyad cag ci'i phyir lhag par dgal/ji tsam na gzhan zhig gis yid 'phrog mo la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /yid 'phrog pa sdug bsngal ba dang /yid
