398a3('dul ba): mi daded skyes nas gzhon nor bzangs kyi mi gang na ba derang song ste/rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas snying rje rje skad du sgra gtsom chung ngus don de dal bus smras pa dang /des smras pa
398a4('dul ba): gal te de ltar na legs par rtogs shig/bdag gis kyang brtag/yid 'phrog mas brtags nas yang skyes pa dang /des brtags na yang bden par mthong nas/de nas des
398a5('dul ba): gtsug gi nor bu de dang /gos shig yid 'phrog ma la byin nas smras pa/bu mo khyod dus la ma bab par ma 'gro shig/de ltar na khro bo la kham mchu 'byung bur mi 'gyuraro//de nas rgyal po
398a6('dul ba): ji skad bskrun pa'i rim pa bzhin du khrus la chas te khrag gis gang ba'i rdzing bur zhugs nas byung ba dang /de nas de'i rkang pa gnyis lnga bram ze rnams kyi skyes bldags so//ji tsamA na
398a7('dul ba): mi 'am ci mo khri shog shig ces sgo ba dang /de ma thag kho nar yid 'phrog man mkha' la 'phags te tshig su bcad smras pa/bdag ni rig dang phreng ba dang //bdag ni bgad dang brtses
398b1('dul ba): las/na klung ma bat+tag sa tha phyu stu //dA ni bdag 'gro bar bya//rgyal pos kyang namakha'i lam las 'gru' mdza na du sag sto mdun na 'don la smras pa/gang gi phyir 'a/
398b2('dul ba): par bya ba de ma grub par/mi 'am ci yid 'phrog ma bro so//mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/lha nga ni don grub ste/dngos sdin ma la lag s+ho//de nas yi 'i phyog na mkha'i lam lngas
398b3('dul ba): 'phro bo na 'di snyam du sems te/gang yang bdag gnas skabs 'di thob pa de ni drang srong des bstan pa las gyur gyi/gal te des ma bstan na ni bdag gzung zhing 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/
398b4('dul ba): de sti bAs na re shig drung srong de'i drung du 'gro'o snyam nas/de de'i bsti g+haHsu song nas rkang pa gnyis la pAH/r+g+haM san+na s+yA drang klong le smras pa/drang srong chen po khyod kyis bstan pas/bdag bcung
398b5('dul ba): skye mchis nas/mi'i reg pa rnams thob cing srog gi bar chad du drung zhig gis ma gyur to//de bas gsolce dza nI mal te brgya zhig la mA no nu nor bzangs bdag tshol zhing mchis nas/de bdag/
398b6('dul ba): gi sor rngub stsol la/'didri skad kyang gsung ba'i rig so//gzhon nu la ma yang bgrod par dka' ste/nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis slar bzhud cig/gal te pazlog kyang mchi su ma btub na/de la
398b7('dul ba): lam bstan pa'i rigs kyis/gzhon nu yid 'phrog mas bstan pa/byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum mchis de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum//de dag rnal po'i pha rol na rnaMs/
399a1('dul ba): mchi so//de dag rgal ba dang /ri'i rgyal po gangs can mchiso//de'i byang phyogs na ni ri bo phur pa'i rtse mchi so//de nas lam chu sgra can dang seng ljang can dang /
399a2('dul ba): rgyud gcig pa dang /rdo rje can dang /'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang /phur pa'i dbyibs dang /sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang /mi g.yo ba dang /rab grol te/ri bo de dag khyod kyis rgol
399a3('dul ba): tsog de la ri bos seng ldeng can dang /rgyud gcig pa dang /phur pa'i dbyibs la ni phug nas 'jug/rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/thabs 'di dag gis ri bo de rnams rgal
399a4('dul ba): bar bgyi'o//'khrul 'khor ra gdong can dang /lug lta bu dang /skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag kyang gzhom par bgyi'o//phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs rgyug
399a5('dul ba): pa zhig mchis te/de ni zho shas gzhom par bgyi'o//gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig/phug ni phyed 'dug mthong nas ni//bdag gi slad du gzhu brdungs la//mda' yis bsnun te gseng
399a6('dul ba): par gyis//gang nas lug gnyis phan tshun nas//rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni//de gnyis rwa re bcag mdzad dang //lam ni rnyed par gyur lags//'jigs pa che skyed mtshan thogs pa'i
399a7('dul ba): lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na//de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang //lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lag so//srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig/kha 'dzum gdangs par bgyid gzi
399b1('dul ba): nas da tshad yo pral bya lta//phur pa dag las gdab par mdzad//de bzhin byon pa klong drug 'a la//dgA mu khru can+d+ra la khyod mtshangs//sku myog sod ge'i ltar sor zhing //mo bzad brnyan//
399b2('dul ba): par gyur ba yin//gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag/gzhu bkang sbyin gusad mdzad la//chu skyen 'dzina'i khres gang ba yi//chub mang po rgal mdzod cig/rlung ga phyi ma lab gdungs drung //
399b3('dul ba): dud mo rgod pa dang //sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung //nang gan ni srin mo khro//phye ma lab na mi ma yin//gdungs pan ni 'dzin khri mang //sna tshogs can na 'dod rgyur gzungs//du mor me 'chi
399b4('dul ba): yi bran//dgod pa na ni mi 'am ci'i//muna' ma sbrul mang sbrul can na//'od ma can krung shal mi sli//nang ga la ni rten par bya//bye mi lab la brtul phod bya//bdung bar 'dzin khri khab cing //
399b5('dul ba): sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs//dud mo can du yid bde byas//dgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i//sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod//sbru la can du ni sbrul dug gi/sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can//klung
399b6('dul ba): dri mtshon rnon gdab pa yi//sbyor bas kun tu rgol bar mdzod//chu bo rnams rmil nas gcan pa'i gnas ni gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la snyan tshugs te/gzhom par mdzod cig/
399b7('dul ba): de nA ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis shes gsungs shig/drang srong de la yid 'phrog mas de skad smras nas/rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te de nas song ngo //
400a1('dul ba): ji tsam na gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis ri 'or de phab nas skyes khyer te/glang po'i grong khyer du 'ongs so zhes rgyal pos thos nas/mchog tu dga' ba skyes/
400a2('dul ba): de nas gzhon nu ngal sos nas/pha'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas mdun du 'dug pa dang /rgyal pos mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas/smras pa/gzhon
400a3('dul ba): nu khyod bde bar 'ong sam/lha khyod kyi bka' drin gyis/ro 'or pa phab ste gte'u bzung sna po bskos lags te/dbye dang skyes kyang 'di dag lags kyis phyag mdzad du gzhug
400a4('dul ba): rgyurgyo gsol rgyal pos smras paste/bu legs par byas kyis bzhes so//de nas gzhan nus pa la phyag byas nas chas pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/gzhon nu skyes la lhun
400a5('dul ba): tsaci kho nar spyad kyis 'dug shig/lha bdag gis yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas yun ring zhig lags pas mchis lags so//gzhon nu deng 'gro ba bshol lo/sang song
400a6('dul ba): shig/de grol gyis 'chu zhing 'di skad ces smras so//yab nges par deng nyid bdag mchis lagaso//rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go//de nas gzhon nu rang gi khyim du song
400a7('dul ba): na/btsun mo'i pho brang gi sgo dpal gyis stong par mthong nas/de sems khongs su chud bzhin du zhugs ni/yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas/snying sto te pha ni tshun dub+h+yo
400b1('dul ba): yid 'phrog ma yid 'phrog ma zhes sku phyung ngo //ji tsam na btsun mo rnams tshogs nas/btsun mo de rnams gtam rlung bskur ba dang /de'i srid la zug rngus zugs pas/yang nas
400b2('dul ba): yang du dris pas/de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras//de mya ngan gyis yid blong bar gyur to//bud med de rnams kyis smras pa/lha btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na/de bas bud med
400b3('dul ba): shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na/ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/des pha snying rje med cing byas pa chud gzon po thos nas/ma'i drung du song ste/rkang pa gnyis la
400b4('dul ba): btugs nas smras pa/yum yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur cing //gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi//yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na//bdag yid 'phrog ma gang du mchis//
400b5('dul ba): yid kyis rab tu rgyag snyam na'ang //bdag gi yid ni kun tu rmongs//de dang bral bar gyur pa yis//snying ni shin tu gdungs pa nyid//bdag gi yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog la//yid du
400b6('dul ba): 'thad cing yid la dga' ba yi//yid 'phrog dang bral bdag lus gdungs pi li//bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas mchis//des smras pa/bu yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal
400b7('dul ba): ming zad pa nyam nga bar gyur nas/kho bos btang ngo //yum ji ltar thar/des ji ltar gyur pa thams ca de rgyas par smras pa dang /des pa snying rje med cing byas pa mi bzo ba yin no na/
401a1('dul ba): smras nas/yang smras pa/yum gang du mchis shul ni gang nas/des smras pa/gang du yid 'phrog song ba yi//lam de ring dang drang srong dang //seng ge ngag gis
401a2('dul ba): rtag bsten cing //chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa yin//de yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi bzad par nyam thag cing snying rje rje skad du bla zhing smre sngags 'don pa yid
401a3('dul ba): bzhin yon tan ldan gyur pa'o//yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na/zhes bya ba nas/bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas 'ong zhes bya'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas mas smras pa/
401a4('dul ba): bu btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bud med dag yod na/ci'i phyir mya ngan byed/gzhon nus smras pa/yul de ma rnyed par bdag dga' bar ga la 'gyur/
401a5('dul ba): des dbugs phyung yang /'on kyang mya ngan gyis gdungs nas/de'i khungs tshol zhing phan tshun du btsal bar btsams te/de'i blo skyes pa/gang kho na las thob pa de nyid la re shig/
401a6('dul ba): dri'o snyam nas/nges rngon pa spang lob can gyi drung du song ste dris pa/khyod kyis yid 'phrog ma gang nas rnyed/des smras pa/ri bo che ge mo'i ngos la drang srong zhig gnas te//
401a7('dul ba): de'i bsti gnas na tshangs pa 'du ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing mchis te/der khrus la zhugs pa las/drang srong gis bstan nas rnyed do//des bsams pa/da ni drang srong gi drung du song //
401b1('dul ba): dang /de las khrungs phyin par 'gyur ro snyam mo//rgyal posna gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma dang bral bas shin tu yang blung d+h+r-i t+ti/dwe thos so//de nas rgyal pos smras pa/gzhon nu
401b2('dul ba): khyod yid rkyong du ci yod/da ni de bos khyad par du 'phags pa'i chung mi sbyin no//des smras pa/yab bdag ni de ma lags pa'i mchis brang gi 'khor dang mchis par rngo mi thog
401b3('dul ba): logs so//rgyal pos de la lan du ma smras kyang ma zlogaso//de nas rgyal pos grong khyer gyi sgo dang /za ba'i khar ci nas kyang gzhon nu phyir mi 'chor bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu
401b4('dul ba): srungs ma dag bkod do//de nas gzhon nu ni mtshan thog thag mi nyal bar gyur to//lto po 'di dag ni mtshan mo cung zad nyal gyi/pal tshor mi nyal te/lho gang zho na/skyes pa
401b5('dul ba): bud med la chags pa sems bcings pa dang /bud med skyes pa la chags pa dang /srog chags ngur pa dang /chom rkun pa'i ra go dang /dge slong brtson 'grus brtsams
401b6('dul ba): pa yin no zhes gsungs so//de nas gzhon nu 'di snyam du sems te/gal te bdag sgo nas song nas/rgyal po'i sgo srungs kyi chung ma gtum po dge yod de/de rnams kyis
401b7('dul ba): bdag chad pa gcad pa 'am/srog dang bral bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ci nas kyang ma la bdag srungs mo na de pa'i lam nas 'gro'o snyam nas/de mtshan mo langs te/
402a1('dul ba): ud pa la sngon po'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa'i phreng ba rgyal mtshan la brtags nas/gang nas gsungs ma'i mi med pa de nas 'babs pa na zla
402a2('dul ba): ba shar to//de nas des zla ba la bltas nas/yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i smre sngags 'di lta bu dag 'don par byed de/zla nya rgyu skar rgyal po mtshan mo gsal mdzad kyikye/
402a3('dul ba): khyod ni snar ma'i mig tu sdug pa ded dpon bzang //cig bdag gi sdug pa ud pa la lta bu'i mig/yid 'phrog ces bgyis khyod kyis sa stengs gzigs lags sam/
402a4('dul ba): zhes smras nas/sngon gyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba dran zhing song ba las ri dgas mo zhig mthong nas de la yang smras pa/kye ma ri dgas mo khyod rna chu lo ma za//khyod ni
402a5('dul ba): legs 'gyur bder spyod bdag ni rngon pa min//ri dgas mo ltar mig kyus ring bas gzugs bzang ba//bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tama?/de de nas/
402a6('dul ba): song ste phyogs gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang /tshal me tog dang /'bras bus mdzes par byas pa'i snying po la bung ba dag longs spyod pa mthong nas de nas bung ba zhig la smras
402a7('dul ba): pa/sbrang rtsi'i bung ba ri bo mthon ting lta bu'i mchog/smyug ma'i sbubs dang pad+ma dag la gnas 'cha' ba//skra yi tshogs ring kha dog bung ba ltar gnag pa//bad
402b1('dul ba): gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang /sbrul zhig mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang smras pa/kye ma'o sbrul gnag shing lo lta bur lce g.yo zhing
402b2('dul ba): mig dang kha yi nang nasau dud pa'i tshogs 'byin pa//khyod kyi gdug pa'i me dang 'dod chags mer mi mtshungs//bdag gi yid 'breg ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/
402b3('dul ba): de nas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu son pa dang /tsha lo gzhan zhig nu khu byug sgra 'byin pa zhig mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang khu byug dri la yang smras pau//kye ma khu byug tshogs
402b4('dul ba): mchog ljon shing la gnas pa//'dab chags tshogs kyi rgyal po bud med yid 'phrog pa//ud pa la sngon po lta bur dri med mdzes pa'i mig/bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod
402b5('dul ba): kyis mthing gyur tam/phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang /shing mya ngan 'tshang bya ba me tog thams cad rgyas pa zhig mthong nas/ming gi rnams grangs bkra shrIs zhes brjod pa/
402b6('dul ba): ljon pa rnams kyi rgyal po cher gyur pa//yid 'phrog mya ngan gyis ni blong ba bdag/thal mo sbyar na khyod kyis mya ngan songs//de de ltar yid blong zhing rim gyis drang srong de'i
402b7('dul ba): bsti gnas su phyin nas/des drang srong de la dul ba dang bcas pas phyag byas nas spras pa/bzod 'phags gos su shing shun dang ni g.yang bzhi bsnabs//rtsa ba myu gu
403a1('dul ba): skyu ru bil ba ka bdi gsol//drang song mgos btud phyag 'tshal bdag gi yid 'phrog ma//khyod kyis gzigs sam khyod ni bdag la myur du gsungs//
403a2('dul ba): de nas drang srong des gzhon nu nor bzangs la byon pa legs zhes bya ba dang /stan bting ba bya ba la sogs pa sngar bya ba'i yang dag par dga' bo byas nas/smos pa/smin ma
403a3('dul ba): 'dzar pa'i smon tshugs mthon ting bzhin legs mthong na dga' ba'i gzugs 'chang ba//bzhin ras zla ba nya 'dra ud pa la sngon po lta bu'i mig de bdag gis mthong //dpon
403a4('dul ba): khyod dag rkyong bzhugs te rtsa ba 'bras bu sna tshogs gsol bar na dzod cig dang /slad kyis pad blag byon 'gyur 'di la bdag gi yid la the tsom yong ma mchis//smin ma bzang
403a5('dul ba): mos 'di skad tshig smras te//gzhon nu khyod la sred pas bdag mi bde/nag khrod gnas pa'ang sdug bsngal chen po ste//gshegs par gyur na nges par bdag mthong ngo //
403a6('dul ba): des sor gdub rgyan 'di byin nas smras pa/lam yang la bgrod dka' bas/nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis slar log shig/gal te bzlog kyang 'dug tu ma btub na de la lam
403a7('dul ba): bstan pa'i rigoso//des yang 'di skad ces bstan te/byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod do//de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum/de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang
403b1('dul ba): gsum yod de dag rgyal ba dang //ri'i rgyal po gas can zhes bya ba yod de//phyogs de nas sman 'di dag blang bar byaste//'di lta ste/shin tu 'o ma 'jug ces bya ba'i spyan yod
403b2('dul ba): de/de mar las btsos nas btung bar bya'o//des na skom pa dang /bkres pa mod cing dran pa dang /mthu stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro//spre'u zhig kyang bkri bar bya//gsang sngags
403b3('dul ba): dag kyang bslab par bya//gzhu mda' dong chas pa dang //nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang //dug gsod pa sman dug sel ba dang //lcags kyis phur pa gsum da //be bang yang bcang
403b4('dul ba): bar bya'o//ri'i rgyal po gangs can gyi byang phyogs na//ri ba phur pa'i rtse yod do//de nas lamachu sgra can dang /sed l+yAng n+dan dang /rgyud gcig pa dang /rdo rje can dang /'dod
403b5('dul ba): dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can+da dang /phu ro pa'i dbyibs dang /sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang /mi g.yo ba dang rab grol lo//khyod kyis de dag rgol dgos te/de la ri bo seng lhung can la
403b6('dul ba): ni/phug nas 'jug rgyang gcig pa dang /phur po'i dbyibs la yang bug nas 'jug/rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/thabs 'ang dag gis ri rnams rgal bar bya'o//'khrul
403b7('dul ba): 'khor ragadong can dang /lug lta bu dang /skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag gzhom par bya'o//dug na sbrul kha tshu'i rgyan chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhigo mchis te//
404a1('dul ba): de ni zho shas gzhom par bya'o//gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig/phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni//bdag gi slad du gzhu brdungs la//mda' yis bsnun te
404a2('dul ba): gsad par gyis//gang la lug gnyis phan tshun nas//rdung bar mdzod pa mthong na ni//de gnyis re re bcad mdzod dang //lam no rnyed par 'gyur lagaso//'jigs pi che
404a3('dul ba): skyed mtshon thogs pa'i//lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na//de gnyis las ni gcig brdengs dang //lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lagaso//srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig/
404a4('dul ba): kho 'dzug dang par bgyid gzigs na//de tshe de yi dpral ba la//phur ba dag gis gdab par mdzod//de bzhin 'khron pa klong khrag 'khyil//drug cu'i khru can la khyod mchongs//
404a5('dul ba): sgra mig seng ge'i ltar ser zhing //mi bzad brnyan par dka' ba yin//gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag/gzhu bkang de ni bsad mdzod la//chu sprin 'dzin 'khris gang ba yin/
404a6('dul ba): chu bo mang po rgal mdzad cig/nang gA phye ma leb gdungs dang //sna tshogs dud mi dgod pa dang //sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung //neng wAnu ni sbyin mo khro//phye ma lab na mi
404a7('dul ba): ma yin//gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang //sna tshogs can na 'dod sbyar gzugs//dud mor mi 'am ci yi bran//dgod pa ni ne mi 'am ci'o//mna' me sbru lo can sbrul med/
404b1('dul ba): na//'od ma can krung shal mu li//nang ga nA ni brtan par bya//phye ma le bya la brtul phod bya//gdung bar 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo //sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs//dud mo can du yid
404b2('dul ba): bde bas//dag byed du ni mi smra ba'i//sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod//sbrul can du ni sbrul dug gi/sngags kyi sbyor dang 'dam can//klung du me tshun rnon gdab pa yi//sbyor
404b3('dul ba): ba kun tu rgal ba dzo//chu bo rnams rgal nas can phyi'i gnas nA gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran rmugs te gzhom par mdzod cig/de nas ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pi byung
404b4('dul ba): mchis zhes gsungs shig/de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis ji skad bstan pa'i sman dang /gsang stegs dang /sman dug sel gyi sbyor ba rnams/btsal ba'i phyir/drang srong de'i
404b5('dul ba): rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo //de nas des spre'u ma gtog par ji stan pa thams cad sta gon byas nas/de nas de rnams khyer te/yang drang srong de'i drung du sing be dang /
404b6('dul ba): des de la spre'u byin nos smos pa/gzhon nu 'bad pa 'dis ci bya/yid 'phrog ma 'dis ci zhig dgos//khyod cig pu ni grogs med po/lus gdon mi za bar 'gyur gyis
404b7('dul ba): mthong gzhon nus smras pa/drang srong chen po bdag ni gdon mi zo bar mchi'o//de ci'i slad du zhi na/mkha'i la zla ba rgyu ba grogs shig ga las mchis//mche ba'i mthu stobs
405a1('dul ba): ldan pa'i ri dwags gtso bo dang //mo yis nags sreg pa nu grogs shig ga las mchis//bdag lta bu la grogs po mthu ldan ci zhig 'tshal//kye ci rgyu/
405a2('dul ba): mtsho che tshur 'jug par mi bgyi'am//ci lags sbrul gyis zin cis gso bar mi bgyi 'am//sems can spungs can gyis bstan brtson 'grus cher brtsams te//gal
405a3('dul ba): te 'bad de ma rung 'di la nyes pa med//de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs yid 'phrog mas bstan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang chas te/rim gyis ri dang chu bo dang /phug dang /g.yang
405a4('dul ba): la sogs par sman dang gsang sngags dang /sman du ga sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas//mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu son pa dang /gzhon
405a5('dul ba): nus grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa/bskyed mos tshil gyi tshal me tog dang /'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pas mdzes par byas pa/bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa/rdzing bu dang /mtshe
405a6('dul ba): 'u dang /ring po dang /gru bzhi dang /mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis bskor ba de la/mi 'ami ci mo rnams chu lan du 'ong ba mthang nas/de nis gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis de rnams la
405a7('dul ba): smras pa/chu mang po 'dis ci zhig bya//de rnams kyis smras pa/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis/de mi'i lag tu son par gyur pa
405b1('dul ba): mi'i dri ba shal+ma pA lags so//gzhon nu nor babangs kyis dris pa/ci bum pa 'di dag blams nAdan+ti s+yAng+yas gcig tu de'i spyod nas lcags sam+ba/b+h+yon te rI mu gyis/de rnams
405b2('dul ba): kyis smras pa/rim gyis so//des bsams pa/thabs 'di bzung ste/sor gdub gyi rgyu 'dabum pa gcig gis nang du gzhug gro sta bi nas/des mi 'am N+Di mo gcig gi bum
405b3('dul ba): par mtshir bar bcug nas//mi 'am ci mo de la smras pa/khyod kyis bum pa 'dis zlog mar yid 'phrog ma lnga khrus byas shi ba/des bsams pa/gdon mi za bar 'di la dgos
405b4('dul ba): pa zhig yod par 'gyur ro snyamA nas/de nas des bum pA de thog myur yid 'phrog ma'i spyi bor thugs pa las/ji tsam na sor gdub kyi rgyu pang du lhung ba dang /yid 'phrog mas de 'phrigs
405b5('dul ba): so//de nas mi 'am ni mo laM dris pa/'dir mi 'ga' zhig ma 'ongs sam/des smras pa//mchis so//song la de dben pa zhig tu zhog shig/des de nang du khrid nas dben pa ni sa
405b6('dul ba): bA nag go/de nas yid 'brog mas pa'i rkang pa k+Shanyis la gtugs te smras pa/yab gal te bdag gi Sh+NI zab paskyed pa/gzhon nu nur bzangs de mchisan/dri la khyod kyis
405b7('dul ba): zhig bgyi des smras pa/de mi yin te cir yang mi kho bas/ngas de dum bu brgyar byas te phyogs bzhir gau tor te gtong ngo //yid 'phrog mas smras pa/yab mir gyur pas 'dir
406a1('dul ba): ga la mchis bdag nyid de skad mchi bar bso//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/de kun nas bkris pa dang bral nas/smras pa/
406a2('dul ba): gal te gzhon nu de 'ongs nangs khyod rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa/nor dang yo byad mang po dang /mi 'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/de la chung ma'i don du sbyin no//de
406a3('dul ba): nas yid 'phrog ma dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' bas/gzhon nu nor bzongs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bstan to//de nas mi 'am ci'i
406a4('dul ba): rgyal po ljon pas/gzhon nu nor bzangs gzugs bzang po/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong ngo //mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/
406a5('dul ba): de nas de bgam par 'dod nas gser gyi sdong po bdun dang /shing ta la bdun dang /rnga bo che bdun dang //phag bdun btsugs so//gzhon nu nor bzangs ni byang chub sems
406a6('dul ba): dpa' yin la/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas de dang /de dag la mkhas pa yin no//lha rnams kyang de dag la bgegs med par bya
406a7('dul ba): ba'i phyir brtson por byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' gar dang /glu dang /bi bang dang /khar rnga dang /shin tu sgra snyan dang /pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang /rdza rnga la sogs
406b1('dul ba): pa rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra'i khyad par ni kun nas 'bud cing mi 'am ci stong phrag du mas ni yongasu bskor nas/ral gri ud pa la sngon po'i
406b2('dul ba): mdab ma 'dra ba thogs te/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mthong bar gser gyi sdong po'i drung du song nas/chu shing le gcod pa bzhin du sdong po de dum bu dum bur bcag par brtsams
406b3('dul ba): te/de nas de'i til 'bru tsam du glags so//mangs ni shing ta la bdun dang /rnga bdun dang /phag bdun gtsang mar phyung ste/ri rab bzhin du mi ge yo bair gnas so//de nas
406b4('dul ba): na mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang /mi 'am ci'i brgya stong phrag du mas e la la zhes ca tsa dang /ga ng+gA'i sgra chen po phyung ngo //mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas mthong zhing thos nas
406b5('dul ba): shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to//de nas mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog me 'dra ba sha stag stong gi dbus su yid 'phrog ma bzhag ste/gzhon nu nor bzangs la smras pa/gzhon nu tshur
406b6('dul ba): yid 'phrog ma ngo shes par gyis shig/de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis/de ngo shes par bya ba'i phyir tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/ji ltar khyod ni ljon pa'i
406b7('dul ba): bu yin la//kho bo'i sdug pa yid 'phrog yin zhes ni//bden pa 'di yis myur ba kho nor ni//yid 'phrog gom pas sbyor du 'gro ba shog/de nas de dom thag tu gos/
407a1('dul ba): ngas song ba dang /mri 'am ci'i rnams kyis smras pa/lha gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di ni stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /pha rol gnon pa shin tu 'tshogs
407a2('dul ba): ba lags te/yid 'phrog ma dang thab ring bab lags na ci'i slad du 'di la mtho bcom 'di la yid 'phrog ma gsol cig/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'am ci'i
407a3('dul ba): tshogs rnams kyi rjes su bsngags pa dang /mi 'am ci rnams kyi 'dun pas gzhon nu nor bzangs la rjes bkur bsti chen pa byas nas/yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams kyis
407a4('dul ba): brgyan te lag pa g.yon pas bzung /gser gyis bya ma bum lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas/gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi drung du song ste/smras pa/gzhon nu yang 'phrog ma
407a5('dul ba): 'di mi 'am ci mo stong gis yongasu bskor te/kho bos khyod kyi chung ma'i phyir byin gyis/mi rnams ni mi rtag pa yin gyis ji ltar yang 'di ma dor cig/yab bka' bzhin
407a6('dul ba): 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las mnyan nas/mi 'am ci'i gnas kyi khang pa na/yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig skyes pa med par
407a7('dul ba): sil snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi yul dran nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug
407b1('dul ba): bsngal gyi mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur nas/yid 'phrog ma la smras pa/pa ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nAn par gyur to//de nanus yid 'phrog mas/de ltar
407b2('dul ba): gyur pa dag pa la rgyas par smraso//dus smras pa/gzhon nu dang lhan cig song la/mi rnams ni slu bar byed pa yin gyis/khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig/de nas mi 'am ci'i
407b3('dul ba): rgyal po ljon pas nor bu dang /mu tig dang /gser la sogs pa mang du brdzangs te btang nus/de yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu steng gi na mkha'i lam la/mi 'am ci'i
407b4('dul ba): shugs kyis chas pa na/rim gyis glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du phyin te//de nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo rnams bsal nas/tsan dan
407b5('dul ba): gyi chus chag chag btab/ngar gyi tshun 'phyangs sbyangs/rgyal mtshon dang /ba dan btsugs/shin tu dri zhom po'i pog por dag bshams/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bkram
407b6('dul ba): ste/dga' dga' ltar byas so//de nas gzhon nu ma'i gtso bo stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing /yid 'phrog ma dang ldan cig tu glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du zhugaso/
407b7('dul ba): don lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas/rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag khyer te/pha'i drung du song nas/rgyal po'i sman gyi glo zhig tu 'dug ste/mi 'am ci'i grong khyer du so
408a1('dul ba): ba dang /'ongs pa'i rnams rgyas par smras so//de nas rgyal po nor can gyis 'di ni shin tu stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /pha rol gnon pa can no zhes bya
408a2('dul ba): bar rig nas/rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro//gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis bsams pa/gang bdag yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tshogs pa dang /rgyal srid kyi
408a3('dul ba): dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa 'di na/sngon byas pa'i rgyu'i khyad par yin gyis/ma la da yang bdag gis sbyin bdag ni btang /bsod nams dag ni bya'o snyam nas/des glang
408a4('dul ba): po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du lo bcu gnyisu gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byaso//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus no/gzhon nu nor bzangs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin
408a5('dul ba): snyam nAM/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/rgyal po nor bzangs zhes bya bar gyur to//ngas gang yid 'phrog
408a6('dul ba): ma'i phyir skyobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /pha rol gnon par bstan nas/lo bcu gnyisu gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa des/ngas bla na med pa yang dag par
408a7('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob mod kyi 'on kyang sbyin pa de dang brtson 'grus de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam/rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsam yin//
408b1('dul ba): rgyal po chen pa gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/sbyin pa dag btang bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal chen
408b2('dul ba): sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer na/rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bo zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang
408b3('dul ba): lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na/'thab pa dang /'thab mo dang /khrag khrug dang /'gyed pa rnams rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba nas//chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid
408b4('dul ba): byed bu 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma gzhin du'o//de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de rtse bar byed//
408b5('dul ba): dga' bar byed/dgo' dgur spyod par byed pa las/dus gzhan zhig na/btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/de zla ba brgyad dam/dgu 'das nas/khye'u gzugs
408b6('dul ba): bzang ba/ngo lta na sdug pa/mdzes pa/lpags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/dpung pa ring ba/dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/sprin mo 'dzar ba
408b7('dul ba): sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhes bya ba nas/gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no//gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa bzang ba/dge ba'i bsam pa can/
409a1('dul ba): bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/snying rje can bdag nyid chen po//chos 'dod pa/skye dgu rnams la byams pa/thams cad sbyin pa/
409a2('dul ba): thams cad gtong ba/chags pa med par gtong ba/gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin//de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos nas/dpag tshad brgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skye bo
409a3('dul ba): 'ongs te/thams cad kyang yid la re ba rdzogs par byas nas gtong ngo //de nas re shig cig na/byang chub sems dpa' shing rta nor bu dang gser dang /dngul dang /rdo rje dang /baM
409a4('dul ba): DUr+ya dang /spug dang /pad+ma rag dang /in dra nI las 'bar bar byas pa/tsan dan sa mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/seng ge dang /stag dang /gung gi pags pas g.yogs
409a5('dul ba): pa/rta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa/gser dang /dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'khrol ba bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas/grong khyer dam pa nas bskyed mos
409a6('dul ba): tshal du mngon du song ngo //de nas bram ze rig byed dang /rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol mngon du bsu nas smras pa/rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal
409a7('dul ba): bar gyur cig/yang smras pa/khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags//bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di//khyod kyis sbyin par btang bar rig/
409b1('dul ba): de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol//shing rta de las myur ba myur bar bzlas te/snying dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' byas bram ze de dag la
409b2('dul ba): shing rta de byin nas smras pa/bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la//mchog tu dga' ba shing rta btang //de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum//btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog/
409b3('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/bam po zhe drug pa//de dus gzhan zhig na/glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba/me tog kun da dang /ku mu da dang /kha ba dang /dngul dang /sprin dkar po
409b4('dul ba): lta bu'i mdog can bdun legs par gnas shing /rkang lag legs par gnas pa/glang po che sa srung gi bu lngar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/rang bzhin gyis mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/mthong
409b5('dul ba): na bkra shis pa la zhon nas/shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang /mdza' bshes dang /g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du/sos kha'i
409b6('dul ba): dus la bab pas/shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing /dang pa dang khrung khrung dang /rma bya dang /ne tso dang /ri skegs dang /khu byug dang /shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi bskyed
409b7('dul ba): chos tshal gyi sar song ba dang /de nas phyir rgol ba spad pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas/rgyal rigaso gzhon nu khyod rgyal ba
410a1('dul ba): gyur cig ces smras nas/yang smras pa/lha min ltar bcas 'jig rten du//khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags//khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni//bdag
410a2('dul ba): cag rnams la stsal ba'i rigs//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas/dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu
410a3('dul ba): dga'i yid kyis de dag la glang po'i mchog de byin nas smras pa/bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la//mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang //de bzhin bdag gi srid pa gsum//
410a4('dul ba): btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog/rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis/glang po'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba phyir
410a5('dul ba): rgol bas spod pa'i bram ze rnams la byin no zhes thos so//thos nas kyang rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shin tu khros/'khrugs nas/gzhon nu thams cad sgrol
410a6('dul ba): bkug ste smras pa/gzhon nu khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song shig/de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol phas spangs pa dang /bsams pa dang /bdag gis byang chub
410a7('dul ba): kyi phyir 'bad pa byas pa dang /'jig rten thams cad rjesu bzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyis cho ga bgom pas/glang po chen po de yang btang ste/de bas khyim na gnas
410b1('dul ba): san// nus par ni sbyin par gtang //da/thub gnas su rgyan nas na//nges par mchog dag bya ba yis//bstsus nas mi sbyin zhes bya ba'o//rlig+sa ni smra bar ma thod kyis//
410b2('dul ba): bas bdag ni khyim spungs te//dka' thub gnas su rab tu 'gro//byang chub sems dpa' de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas/chung ma rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste/de dag rgyas pa
410b3('dul ba): smras so//de nas rgyags sbyin mas thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis thal mo sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/rje'i sras gal te de lta na bdag kyang
410b4('dul ba): dka' thub kyi nags su mi che ste/bdag ni rje'i sras dang bral na/skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thog lagaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/nam mkha' zla bas stongs par gyur pa dang /
410b5('dul ba): ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang //pad+ma chu yis stongs par gyur pa ltar//bud med khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/bdag cag mthar
410b6('dul ba): gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur te/'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no//khyod ni bzor ba dang /btung ba dang /mal cha dang /bgo ba mchog la goms pas lus shin tu spyod de
410b7('dul ba): ba yin dka' thub kyi nags na ni rtswa dang lo ma bting bar ni nyal/rtswa dang /me tog dang /'bras bu ni za/rtswa dur ba dang /zug rdo dang /zla dang /tshong mas gang ba'i sa la ni rgyu/yong dang
411a1('dul ba): yang du za gcig pa la ni rten/bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la na bstan dgos/blo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod sbyin la ni 'bad dgos la/nga na yang gdon
411a2('dul ba): mi za bar ci nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste/de la khyed kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyid par bya dgos so//de bas na re shig nga dung yang legs par soms shig/rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/
411a3('dul ba): rje'i sras bdag rngo ci thog gis rje'i sras kyi rjes su bsgrub lags so//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/gal te de lta na dam bcas pa de khyod kyis dran par byos shig/de nas
411a4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te/yab cig bdag gis sbyin par glang chen stsal//nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol//bdag ni//
411a5('dul ba): grongs nis dgon par mchis lags kyis//mi yi dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur//de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs brnang ba rdzangs te skad 'dar
411a6('dul ba): 'dar por smras pa/bu sbyin pa'i blo 'or la 'dug shig/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/sa ni ro dang bcas par yang //gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi//sa bdag bdag
411a7('dul ba): ni sbyin pa las//sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do//zhes smras nas song ngo //de nas bu dang bran mo dang /chung ma dang ldan shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/slong phyir dam pa de nas bya
411b1('dul ba): nas/pho brang 'khar gyi mi dang /yul mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjesu 'brang bzhin song ngo //de nas mi zhig gis ngu zhing /smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos/skye bo'i tshogs chen dwa
411b2('dul ba): grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas/mi zhig la dris pa/kye nang rje skye bo'i tshogs chen po che nges 'debs pa 'di ru tsi las gyur/des smras pa/shes ldan dog ci mi shes sam/'di
411b3('dul ba): dag gi yi dbang pos nyid kyisras pos che ba bzang //brten pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'dis ni spyugs//de ni bu dang chung mar bcas te nags mthar chas pa las//pho brang 'khor
411b4('dul ba): pa rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes tshe nges 'dibs//de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas//
411b5('dul ba): smras pa/shes ldan dag slar dang shig/slar dang shig/'dri lta ro shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi zla bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du gyur te/
411b6('dul ba): gnyen gyi skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni/lam kha'i ngal bso ba'i gaste gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten kun na
411b7('dul ba): skye bo dbang med de//'dza' ba rnams dang bral bar 'gyur bsams nas//khyod kyis sa stengs 'bad pa thams cad kyis//zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brton pa gyis/de nas dag tshad
412a1('dul ba): sum brgya 'das pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas/bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu badrag ni khyod kyi yon tan thos/
412a2('dul ba): nas/'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyis yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyis/khyod kyis shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs so//de nas
412a3('dul ba): rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas/tshig blang pos bram ze de la smras pa/e ma'o nags na'ang mi dbang smos la slong ba gang /bram ze 'di ni shin tu brtse ba med pa'i blo//mi dbang
412a4('dul ba): sras po mo dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa/'di la 'dir ni snying pa rje cig mi skye 'am/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyags
412a5('dul ba): sbyin ma gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na//kun sbyin med par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob//skyon sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog
412a6('dul ba): con gyi/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas yang rgyu dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin
412a7('dul ba): nas smras po/bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa//shing rta rab tu 'byin pa 'di yis 'diraro//bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i//zag med chos kyi shing rta che bskor shog
412b1('dul ba): de na sa thams cad sgrol gyis snyed rab tu dga' bsna shang+ga rta'i mchog de yang bram ze lnga byin nas//gzhon nu nag po phyag pa la khyer/rgyags sbyin mu ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas/
412b2('dul ba): dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang /rim gyis dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to//de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub tshal der rong gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs
412b3('dul ba): blangs te gan so//ji tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir dka' thub kyi nags nas song ba dang /bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/rgyal
412b4('dul ba): rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/bdag cag bkol ba mi mchis pas//spa shugs lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na//de yi don du bus pa gnyis//khyod kyis bdag pa
412b5('dul ba): sbyin pa'i rigs//de skad ces smras pa dang /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgro //bu sdug pa gtong ba la cung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang /de nas bram ze des//
412b6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa/kyai rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na/'di ltar phyed la bdag gis bslangs pa de la/
412b7('dul ba): ci zhig dpyad du yod/khyod ni kun ster snying rje yi//bdag nyid can dus snying grags//ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du//khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs//de skad ces smras par
413a1('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis/bram ze de la smras bya/kye bram ze chen po/rang gi srog ni btang ba la'ang //ldan 'ga' dpyod pa ma
413a2('dul ba): myong na/rang gi bu ni btang ba la//bdag blo gzhan du gyur tse spros//bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/bdag gis nags su bskyed pa yi//bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spongs na//
413a3('dul ba): mAM dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa//'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod//gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas//bus pa btang la po dag min zhes//kha cig bdag la 'phyir 'o/
413a4('dul ba): gis//bram ze bdag ni khrid/legs//de nas bram ze des/thams cad sgrol la smras pa/kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/sa 'di thams
413a5('dul ba): cad du yon tan grags pa/srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa/sbyin pa dang /mchod pa dang /bkur stis spos kyi glang po che lta bu/dge sbyong
413a6('dul ba): dang /bramra ni dang /glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod par byed pa/skye bo basbyin pa dang /phongs pa dang /mgon med pa dang /ltogs pa yongs su sdud pa/byams cad kyi ro
413a7('dul ba): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/mthong na don yod pa/khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa 'am/lam gyis dub pa/'bras bu med pa'i ma/mthong ba don med pa
413b1('dul ba): 'am/re ba dang /yun ring po nas brnag pa brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bru 'bras med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/khyod kyis med do//sa bya ba'i tshig gis/khro ba'i yid la
413b2('dul ba): re ba'i kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na/ldog par 'gyur ro//de bas na khyod kyis bdog yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/btang ba'i rig so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chu gter
413b3('dul ba): gosu gyon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa//ri ba mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can//grong khyer grong rdal btsos pa'i sa la bcal byas kyang //mtsho bzangs khyod dang
413b4('dul ba): mtshungs pa'i gtong phod yod ma yin//de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas/bu la chags pa'i slong bas 'di dag sems par byed//
413b5('dul ba): gal te re shig bu gnyis po//bram zer byin na bro dang ni//bral ba las byung sdug bsngal dag/bdag dang rgyags sbyin gyis thob 'gyur//'on kyang 'di la mi byin na//brtul
413b6('dul ba): zhugs las kyang nyams 'gyur zhing //bram ze 'di ni tshi chad de//ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro//nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i//mya ngan sa stongs bdag gis blangs//de
413b7('dul ba): bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa//zhig cing btul zhugs nyams par 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis/sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par btang bar
414a1('dul ba): chad nas smras pa/kye kho bos/dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi//rgya mtsho chen pos so sor 'jigs byed pa/gting mi dpogs par rab
414a2('dul ba): tu bying ba dag/pha rol rgal phyir lam gyi zam stegs gca'o//zla ba dri med nye ba'i bzhin ras can//ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas//mchi ma rlan chus mig ni gang gyur//
414a3('dul ba): po'o//byis pa gnyis ni bram ze de la byin//yang smras pa/bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni//rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas//des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las//'jig rten
414a4('dul ba): rnams ni bsgral bar bya//bus pa gzhon nu dag sbyin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//de nas sa g.yos pa de/tshal de na gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams dang dra
414a5('dul ba): nas/phan tshun smras po/sa ni mi bzad g.yos gyur pa//'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin//gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba//shin tu gsal bar shes par bya//de nas gnas
414a6('dul ba): 'jog dang rus gcig pa rgan po dka' thub can/ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des/drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/gdon mi za bar dka'
414a7('dul ba): thub kyi nags na 'dug pa'i bu byis pa/'bras bu dang chu mthung ba/yid du 'ong ba/mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis/thams cad sgrol gyis skye sdug bsngal gyis nyam tha
414b1('dul ba): pa yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir spangs te/des nas g.yos par gyur to//de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas/snying rje rje skud du
414b2('dul ba): ngu zhing thul mo gnyis sbyar nas/thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/yab cig yum ni ma mchis par//khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed paM/re zhig
414b3('dul ba): de ni mthong gyur nas//de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol//dri nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la bcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngom zum gnag cing /mchi ma 'dzag
414b4('dul ba): bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/bu dge nga'i snying du mi sdug mini//snying brtse snying rje med min te//'jig rten kun lnga phan pa'i phyir//yon tan mthong nas btang
414b5('dul ba): ba yin//ci nas nga yis byang chub mchog/zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i//rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgralo//de nas bus pa gzhon
414b6('dul ba): nu de dag gis phas snying nas yongasu btang ba'i blo rig nas/pha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang /sma bab pa'i tshig gis dal bus smras/
414b7('dul ba): pa/gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na//ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi phrin//khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces//yab cig khyed kyis gsung du gsol//yab gzhan yang
415a1('dul ba): byis par gyur pas bla mA khyod la nongs pa bgyis pa gang /gal te la lar thug la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa 'am//gus par mnyan pas
415a2('dul ba): yongs su mnyes pa nyid du mi bgyis pa//de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags shes bzod pa mdzad du gsol//de skad ces smras nas/pha la phyag 'tshal te lan gsum
415a3('dul ba): du bskor ba byas nas/mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bla ma la smra bar yid la chags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo //de nas byang chub
415a4('dul ba): sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshigs shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong na/yid kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo mi'i
415a5('dul ba): spyil bur zhugs so//byis pa gzhon nu dag drong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yoso//lha stong phrag du
415a6('dul ba): mo yang bar snang la ca co dang /gzha'i sgra 'byin cing e ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che//bus pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang //gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa//de yi nges
415a7('dul ba): pa rmad gcig go/de nas rgyags sbyin ma rtse ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyor te/pasti gnas logs su chas pa las/sa che thang du g.yos pa des/myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de
415b1('dul ba): nyid du song ba dang /lha gzhan zhig gis rgyugs sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thar bar bya bar brtson pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pISh+Ta chad byed par 'gyur du
415b2('dul ba): 'ong ngo snyam nas/seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur to//lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang /rgya gros sbyin mas ri dogs kyi rgyal po'i chung ma do la smras pa/ri dgas rgyal po'i
415b3('dul ba): chung ma'i sgeg bsreg ma//kho mo'i lam 'di bkra ga nas ni ci skye 'dug/ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyongs shes na/lam los zur ti myur du 'gro bar gyis//gzhan yang khyod
415b4('dul ba): kyang ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma la//bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi//btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyis//rI dag sa rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye zhig/de skad ces smos
415b5('dul ba): pa dang /lha song ge'i gzugasu bsgyur ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo //de nas rgyags sbyin mas bkra ma shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas/yud tsam zhig bsams pa/
415b6('dul ba): ji ltar bar snang la dud mo'i sgra grogs pa dang /ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i lha rnams mya ngan pyod pa'i sgra grags pa las na/gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa
415b7('dul ba): zhig byung bar gyur to snyam nas smras pa/ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang //ji ltar byo skad 'byin pa dang //ji ltar bdag ni dogs pa las//bris pa de gnyis btang bar
416a1('dul ba): nges//ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa las//bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang //ji ltar lus kyang rme ba las//bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges//zhes de
416a2('dul ba): lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas/bsti gnas su zhugs te/mi dga' bzhin bltas na/bud gnyis ma mthong nas/de nas rmongs shing
416a3('dul ba): snying 'dar nas/bsti gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/phyogs 'di na ni gzhon nu nag po sring mo dang lhan cig ri dgas kyi phrug gu dang rtag tu rtse rtse/'di ni de gnyi
416a4('dul ba): kyis rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin/'di ni de gnyis kyi rtsed mo'i cha byad yin na/de gnyis ni mi snang na/gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi/lo ma'i spyil bur
416a5('dul ba): zhugs nas nyal lhor srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re zhing bu mthong bar 'dod pas/rtsa ba dang /'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas/mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim/
416a6('dul ba): thabs kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te spras pa/rje'i sras khye'u dang bu mo gnyis gang du mchis/thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa//kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig/ngo
416a7('dul ba): bas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas//bus pa de gnyis de la byin//de la rjes su yi rang rigs//de skad ces smras pa dang /rgyags sbyin ma ri dgas mi mnga' dug can
416b1('dul ba): zhig gis phog pa bzhin du sa la 'gyel nas/nya chu'i gnas nas byung ba bzhin du ni 'gre ldog par byed/klung krung bu stor ba bskrin du ni snying rje rje skad du duru/bya be'u shi ba bzhin du
416b2('dul ba): ni 'bya'i sgra tshogs 'don cing smras pa/pad+ma gzhon nu lta bu'i byang bzhin can//lag pa pad+ma'i 'dab ltar gzhon sha tsa na//bdag gi bu gnyis drug bsngal ma mong bas//'gro ba gling
416b3('dul ba): du song nas sdug bsngal gyur//ri dgas bu ltar drang zhing ri dgas mig/ri dgas lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na//di ring dag gi bu gnyis ji ltar gyur//gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing
416b4('dul ba): sdug bsngal gyur//migra ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni//snying rjes ngu ba shin tu sdug bsngal ba//de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas//kye bo bkren pa'i nang na
416b5('dul ba): sdug pas 'tsho//de gnyis bdag gi pang nas bskyed bskyed pa//zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za//bzod dang gnam pas bla ma brtag dka' ba//bdag glo bu gnyis shin tu
416b6('dul ba): sdug bsngal lo//de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang //rtsa log rnams kyis gzu lum spangs pa las//skye bo sdig can ngan dang phrad gyur nas//bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo///
416b7('dul ba): skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na//de gnyis su yi dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur//bran du gyur pas gdon mi za bor ni//de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongasu gzir/
417a1('dul ba): bdag gis nges par rgyu rabs gzhan dag tu//skon chags sdug pa brgya dang bral ba yi//sdig las shin tu mi bzud 'di sa pa//snyan pa ba'u mong
417a2('dul ba): bzhin cho nges 'debs//bden tshig gang gis bdug ni rtag tu yang //sems canI kun lo yid na mnyam gyur pa//bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po//bran du gyur pa lnga
417a3('dul ba): ni thar bar shog/rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrings pa'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma thib be 'dug par mthong nas/snying du sdug nas 'khyud
417a4('dul ba): smras pa/bus pas ril ba chu ngus chu bcus pa'i//lo ma rnams lus thigs pa 'dzag pa yi//ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin//bus pi nu zho ma blung lta
417a5('dul ba): bur ngu//yang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dgas kyi phru gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas/mi dga' ste snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis del bus smras
417a6('dul ba): pa/de yi ne'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang //gnas su ma tshugs mtshan cing tshol byed pa//ri dgas drug rgyu ba 'di dag kyang //bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin ni/
417a7('dul ba): de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der rjes bcad pa der rjes bcad pa dang /bris pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyi rjes drang por ma byung gi/gya gyus ga
417b1('dul ba): bar mthong nas lhags par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa/ji ltar zin pa'i rjes byung dang /la lar myur du song ba las//brdegs te khrid pa gludon mi za//kyem byu
417b2('dul ba): brtse med mchog/mgul ni dbugs kyis brdzangs shing skad kyang 'dzer//ma mchu mdzes pa 'dir zhing bdag gi bu//ri dgas bzhin du mig kyang rig rig ste//rkang pa 'jam po
417b3('dul ba): ji ltar song zhig gu//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas/mi rtag de nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grags mang por
417b4('dul ba): go bar byas nas smras pa/kho bos bu gnyis grangs pa yis//btang bas ma yin sdang bas min+da//sems can kun la phan+de don du//btang bar dga' ba'i bu de btang //mchog
417b5('dul ba): tu btang dka'i bdag nyid dang //bu nor chung ma rnams btang nas//sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du//byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur//rgyags sbyin bdug gis gtong
417b6('dul ba): ba la brtan ba tang dka' ba'i//bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang //bdag dang chung ma bzhon dang btang byas te//kun la thams cad gtang po'i blo gros nga la yod//
417b7('dul ba): de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brten te//byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyis//khyod blo gzhan du ma 'gyur cig/gal te bdag kyang stsol
418a1('dul ba): bzhed na//dogs pa med par bdag stsol cig/gzhan yang dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyi mi//sdug pas chags pa btang ba yi//don de myur du thob na/
418a2('dul ba): ni//srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzad//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis//byang chub sems dpa' dang /rgyags sbyin ma brtson 'grus shin tu rmad du byung ba dang //
418a3('dul ba): shin tu bya dka' bar rigs nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor te/steng gri na mkha' las bsti gnas der lhags na/snang ba rgya chen pos nags de gsal
418a4('dul ba): bar byas te/nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blong na gzhung gis bcings pa'i blo gros can//longs spyod la
418a5('dul ba): chags snying gi zhags pa bu yis bcings pa'i nang na yang //khyab bdag khyod gcig chags pa med pas dga' ba bskyed pa'i bu gtong bas//nges par go 'phang bde dang zhi ba
418a6('dul ba): dri med rga ba med pa thob/de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/'di gcig pu g.yo ga dang bral na nyon mongs
418a7('dul ba): par 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gis rgyags sbyin ma bslang ngo snyam nas bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas/yang byang chub sems dpa' la
418b1('dul ba): smras pa/yan lag kun bzang khyim zab las//'phyo ba med cing snyeng nye ba//rigs na bsngags pa'i srid mo/'di//bdag la blun mo'i don du stsol//de nas rgyags sbyin ma ma
418b2('dul ba): bzod pa skyes nas/bram ze la spros pa/ngo tshar med cing bskam pa khyod//'di na bram ze ba shal te//khyod m+b+ha 'phyon ma mi byed cing //dam che sde dga' ba de 'dod dam//de nas
418b3('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis/rgyags sbyi ni ma lA btags par brtsams pa dang /de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa'
418b4('dul ba): la smras pa/bdag ni bdag la g.yang ngan med//de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags//gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes//de ltar khyod skad g.yor ngan bgyid//de nas
418b5('dul ba): byang chub sems dngas rgyags sbyin ma lnga smras pa/gro 'phang mi bzang mya ngan med pa tshol bdag la//sa steng 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngan bya mi dwags//khyod ni mya ngan med
418b6('dul ba): par bram ze 'di rjes 'grongs//bdagra ni ri dgas m+b+hachi bu bzhin du bsti gnas 'then//de skad ces smras nas//dgu' ba dang /mgu ba dang /yid rab tu dga' bso bsams
418b7('dul ba): pa dang /sbyin pa 'di ni nags tshal 'dir//bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin//rgyags sbyin 'di yang yong btang nas//yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur snyam du rig nas/rgyags
419a1('dul ba): sbyin ma lag pa nas bzung ste/bram ze de la smras pa/bdag gi mchis brang sdug pa 'di//snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan//ya rabs tshul can snyan par//
419a2('dul ba): sgra//bram ze mchog khyed ga zhes su gsol//de nas miche ba bzang po yi//chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir btang //tshu la gru ni ji lta bar//sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug g.yos
419a3('dul ba): de nas rgyags sbyin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te/khyo dang bu dang /bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nA/dbugs brdzangs pas sgra rang rang por 'gags
419a4('dul ba): bzhin 'di skad ces smraso//bdag gi tshe rabs snga mo la//ci 'dra ba'i las ngan byas//de nas pa be'u shi ba bzhin//skye bo med pa'i nags nang du//de nas lha rnams kyi
419a5('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i chu byad mi snang bar byas te/rang bzhin gyi cha byed du gnas nas//rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa//skal bzang bdag ni bram ze ma yin
419a6('dul ba): mi yang ma yin gyi//bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya byin lha minA 'joms byed de//khyed kyi 'dul ba mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis//bdag las dam pa
419a7('dul ba): gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis//de nas de'i tshig gis rgya gso sbyin ma yid bde ba skyes nas/bai rgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/spyan stong ldan pa
419b1('dul ba): drug gaT//bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing /mes bya'i drung du phyin par phyung //sus tsun klu sum pa dag pos mdzod//de skad ces smras nas/yang dbang ngo n+na
419b2('dul ba): ngasti gnas su zhugs nas byang chub sems dnga'i drung du song ste/rgyags sbyin ma lug pi g.yon pa nas bzung nas/byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/bradag gis khyod
419b3('dul ba): la rgyags sbyin 'di//g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par bya//khyod kyi sa la'ang ma spyon cig/bzhag pa byin na smad par gyur//de nas lha rnams kyi dbango po brgya byin gyis/bram
419b4('dul ba): ze khye'u dang /bu mo khyer ba de/ji ltar grong khyer gzhan zhig yin snyam nas/grong khyer de nyid du song nas/dris pa gzhon nu de dgu bcing bar brtsams pa de lto bur rmongs pa
419b5('dul ba): byas so//ji tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/lha khyod kyi dpon po nag po dang /dra ba can dang de gnyis ni//bram ze shin tu ma rungs pas/grong
419b6('dul ba): khyer mchog 'dir 'tshong zhing mchis/de skad thos nas/rgyal po de sems mi dga' nas smras pa/gzhon nu gnyis myur du ston cig/blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba drang /grong
419b7('dul ba): khyor ba rnams myur du rgyal po'i drung du nye bar lhags so//ji tsam na blon po gzhan zhig gis//rgyal po'i drung du khrid pa dang /mi yi dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bo
420a1('dul ba): gos med cing //lus rbeg dri ma can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni//mod la seng ge'i khri las sa yi steng du lhung gyur te//po blang 'khor mi blon tshogs
420a2('dul ba): bud med drag kyang ngu bar gyur//de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/gang zhig nags na gnas na yang //sbyin la mngon par dga' ba'i yid//mig bzangs dri ni
420a3('dul ba): myur du 'dir//chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas/rang gi gnas su song ngo //phyi
420a4('dul ba): zhig na rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shi ba dang bram ze dang /blon po dang /grong mi dang /yul mi rnams lhan cig tu bsti gnas der song nas/byang chub sems dpa' la
420a5('dul ba): gsol ba btab ste/rang gi grong khyer du bos nas/rgyal por bcug/de nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to//des dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang
420a6('dul ba): bkren pa dang /phongs pa dang /mdza' bo dang /nye du dang /gnyen bshes dang /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnams pa du ma dag byin nas/tshig su bocad de smras pa/
420a7('dul ba): byang chub don du gnyer ba yis//rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang //dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang //'jigs pa med par sbyin pa btang //gser dang
420b1('dul ba): dngul dang ba lang dang //rta drang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang //de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran//tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin//chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni//bu dang bu
420b2('dul ba): mo yongs btang nas//'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du//mi yi dag pa theg par 'gyur//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis
420b3('dul ba): dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /phongs pa dang /mdza' bo dang /nye du dang gnyen gshes dang /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin/bsod nams
420b4('dul ba): dag byos pa de bzhin zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba der gyur te/nga nyid kyi de na dge sbyong dang bram ze dang
420b5('dul ba): bkren pa dang /phongs pa dang /mdza' bo dang nye du dang /gnyen byashes dang /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa du ma dag byin bsod nams dag byaso//rgyal po chen po nga'i sbyin pa
420b6('dul ba): 'am/sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mo blta ste/'on kyang nga'i sbyin po de'i bla na med pa yong dag
420b7('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsam yin no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i
421a1('dul ba): phyir/sbyin padag btang /bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya ba'i grong khyed kyi glang
421a2('dul ba): rdal du/rgyal po thams cad kyi bo shes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/de 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang /mi mang pos
421a3('dul ba): rab tu gang ba/'thab pa dang /thab mo dang /khrag khrog dang /byed pa dang /chom rkun dang /nad rab tu zhi pa/'bras su lu dang /bu ram shishong dang /ba lang phun
421a4('dul ba): du ma tshogs pa na bu cig pa la byams pa bzhin du rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/des rigs mnyam pa las/chung ma blangs
421a5('dul ba): nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga'i dgur spyod par byed de/de rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/khye'u gzug
421a6('dul ba): bzung ba/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/dpung pA ring ba/dpral po'i dbyes che ba zhig bac+doMs te/
421a7('dul ba): de'i nye du rnams 'dus nas/khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/shes ldan dag gzhon nu 'di ni rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen gyi bu yin pa/
421b1('dul ba): gzhon nu thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gdags so zhes gzhon nu thams cad sgrol ming du btags nas/mA mA brgyad la gtad de zhes bya ba nas/gnas lnga rnams la byang bar gyur to//
421b2('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no//de gang ci slong ba thams cad slong ba po dag la sbyin par byed pas de'i ming thoms cad gtong ba thams cad gtong pa zhes bya bar gragaso//khams
421b3('dul ba): kyi rgyal phran gyi bu mo rgyags sbyin ma zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de/de'i ched du bslangaso nas/dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mA blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga'
421b4('dul ba): bar byed/dga' dgur spyod por byed pa las/ji tsam na khye'u zhig btsas pa dang /de'i ming nag po zhes bya bar btags/yang de dang rtse bar byed//dga' bar byed/dga' dgur
421b5('dul ba): spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/de'i ming dra bo can zhes bya bar btags so//rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen la glang po che'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba
421b6('dul ba): yod de/de'i mthus khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spu 'gong bar byed do//des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/bu bdag gis glang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phrin rnams spu 'gong bar
421b7('dul ba): byed pa de dag thams cad kyang glang po che'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis/khyod thams cad gtong na ya glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan ni zhog shig/khams kyi rgyal phran rnams
422a1('dul ba): kyis smras bya/gang gi mthus rlu bdag cag thams cad rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen 'dis zil gyis mnan/kha cig gis smras pa/rgyal//
422a2('dul ba): po thams cad bshes gnyen la glang po'i mchog bkra shris ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de'i mthus bdag cag 'dis zil gyis mnan to//de dag gis smras pa/gang
422a3('dul ba): gris na glang po'i mchog de dgug pa'i thabs bzang po lte ci yod/blon po nam gyis smras ga/lha rgyal po zad bshes gnyen gyi bu//dzade sgrol zhes 'gyib de/mi sbyin pa 'am/mi gtong ba
422a4('dul ba): ci yang ma mchis te/de ci slongs pa de thams cad sbyin pas/de'i ming thams cad gtong ba/thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags kyis/bram ze dag cig mngags pa dang
422a5('dul ba): de rnams kyis bslangs na khugs par 'gyur ro//de rnams kyis bram ze dag bkug nas smras pa/bram ze dag deng la/thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal na/thams cad
422a6('dul ba): sgrol zhes bya ba/las glang po'i mchog slongs shig/de dag mngags nas/thams cad kyi grong rdal du dong ngo //gzhon nu thams cad sgrol glang po'i mchog/me tog kun
422a7('dul ba): da dang /ku mu dang /kha ba dang /dngul dang /sprin dkar po'i mdog lta bu mche ba drug pa bdun legs par gnas pa/glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar bgying zhing 'gro ba/rang
422b1('dul ba): bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/mthong na bkra shis pa la zhon nas/shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang /grogs po dang /g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing /zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs
422b2('dul ba): kyis yongasu bskor ba bzhin/grong khyer nas byung nas bskyed mos tshal logasu song ngo //de nas mngags pa de dgis gzhon nu thams cad sgrol mngon bsu nus smras pa/rgyal rigs
422b3('dul ba): gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/yang smras pa/lha min lhur bcas 'jig rten du//khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags//khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni//bdag cag rnams la
422b4('dul ba): stsal pa'i rigs//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mchog de las babs nas/dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bram ze de dag la
422b5('dul ba): glang po'i mchog de bstan nas/smras pa/ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng //bram ze rnams la glang chen btang //de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum//btad nas byang chub
422b6('dul ba): mchog reg shog/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la smras pa/lha khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis/glang po'i mchogs bkra shis ldan zhes bgyi bA/
422b7('dul ba): phyir rgol bas mngags pa la stsal to//rgyal pos thos nas shin tu khros 'khrugs te bsgo ba/shes ldan dag dang la/thams cad sgrol khrid de shog shig/de rnams kyis
423a1('dul ba): /khrid de 'ongs pa dang /rgyal po thams cad bshos gnyen gyis/thams cad sgrol la smras pa/gzhon nu 'o ngas khyod la gung cung zad khams kyi rgyal phrung
423a2('dul ba): rnams sku 'gong bar byed pa de thams cad ni glang po'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis khyod thams cad gtong na yang glang po'i mcho ga 'di zhog cig ces/snga mo zhig tu mu bsgo
423a3('dul ba): 'am/ci'i phyir khyod kyis glang po'i mchog yongs su btang /des mnyan nas smras pa/yab bslangs na ji ltar mi stsal/ci ji snyed bslangs pa de thams cad de sbyin name//
423a4('dul ba): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/khyim na gnas pa'i skyes bu yis//ci rigs par ni sbyin pa btang //'on te nagasu song na ni//nges pa yin mchog bya'o//yab gal te sbyin pa
423a5('dul ba): dag bdang //bsod nams dog bgyir ma mchis na//dka' thub kyi nags su brten par bgyi'o//gzhon nu de bzhin du gyis shig/byang chub sems dpas rgyags
423a6('dul ba): sbyin ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/rgyags sbyin ma bdag ni dka' thub kyi nag su gnas kyis//khyod khyiman bag yod pas gnos shig/des smras pa/rje'i sras dang
423a7('dul ba): thobs gcig dka' thub kyi nag su gnos par bgyi'o//rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa la dga' bas/gal te khyod 'ga' zhig slong na byin par
423b1('dul ba): 'gyur ro//rjes sras gal te khyod kyis btang na stsal du gsol/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/khyod kyis dam bcas pa de dran par byos shog/de nas byang chub sems dpa'/
423b2('dul ba): dri'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyug byas te smras pa/yab cig bdag gis sbyin slad glang chen btang //nongs pa gang lags su bdag bzod par gsol//bdag ni grong nas
423b3('dul ba): dgon par mchos lcags kyis//mi dbade khyod kyi phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur//de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i blong bas mchi mas brdungs nas smras pa/bu sbyin pa dang /
423b4('dul ba): dka' thub kyi nags kyi blo gros 'di zlog shig/byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/sa ni ro dang bcos par yang //gal te ldog par 'gyur gadra' yi//sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa
423b5('dul ba): las/sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do//zhes smras nas song ste/byang chub sems dpa' bu dang /bu mo dang /chung me dang lhan cig shing rta mchog gi nang du zhugs nas
423b6('dul ba): dka' thub kyi nags su chas so//de nas bram ze rig byed dang /rigs byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis/thams cad sbrelnga bsu nas smras pra/rgyal rigs gzhan
423b7('dul ba): du khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/khyod ni 'jig rten thams cod du//bams cong gtong zhes rnam par grags//bram ze dag la shing rta 'di//khyod kyis sbyin par btang ba'i dzin mi//
424a1('dul ba): dri skad rjes smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol shing d+hA'i mchog de las babs nas/dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' ba'i snying
424a2('dul ba): gis bram ze dag la shing rta'i mtshig de bstan nas smras pa/ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas dang //bram ze rnams la shing rta btang //de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum//btang
424a3('dul ba): nas byang chub mchog reg mchog/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta la zhon nas//rgyags sbyin ma dang lhan cig song ba dang /de nas bram ze rig byed dang /rig byed kyi
424a4('dul ba): yan lag shes pa kha cig gis/thams cad sgrol bsu nas smras pa/rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du//thams cad gtong
424a5('dul ba): zhes rnam par grags//bram ze rnams la rta 'di ni//khyod kyis sbyin par btang ba'i rigs//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol rta de las
424a6('dul ba): babs nas/dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram ze de rnams la rta de bstan nas smras pa/ji ltar bdag rab dka' bas deng //bram ze rnams
424a7('dul ba): larta btang ba//de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum//btang nas byang chub mchog rig shog/de nas byang chub sems dpas ni nag po khrid/rgyags sbyin mas ni dri ba
424b1('dul ba): can khrid de rkang pas dong nas/byang chub sems dpas gangs ri'i sul me tog dang /'bras bu dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu song ste/byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam
424b2('dul ba): gtan byed de//rgyags sbyin mas ni 'bras bus bsnyen dkur byed do//ri 'or gzhan zhig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs ma nyams pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan
424b3('dul ba): cig rtse bar byed//dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed de/de rtsa bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/khye'u mtshan ngan pa bcwa brgyad dang ldan
424b4('dul ba): bya zhig btsos pa/rgyan to re zhes sgra 'byin pas/de'i ming ngan to re ngan to r-i zhes par gyur to//ri 'or gzhan zhig na/bram ze rigs byed bzhi shes pa zhig gnas pa des//
424b5('dul ba): rig mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/do dA dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ji tsam nr-i bu mo gzugs bzang mo/mdzes
424b6('dul ba): pA r+Nabalta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/bsrings bskyed nas chen moro gyur pa dang /bram ze des bdagI gi bu mo byid byad gzugs sam/rigs sa maM/bzo 'am/nor gyis
424b7('dul ba): phyir ni su la yang mi sbyin no//'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa yod na/bdag gis de la 'od sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcaso//de nas ngan to ra gsang tshig
425a1('dul ba): don du gnyer zhing /gsang chog tshol bya/bram ze de'i gan du song ste/byin nas smras pa mkhan po'i zhabs la bdag bkur sti bgyid par 'tshal lag so//
425a2('dul ba): ci'i phyir/rig byed klog pa'i slad du'o//de bzhin du gyis shig/de de las rig byed klag par partsams pa las/de yid gzhungs pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yin pas
425a3('dul ba): ngas ring po ma lon par rig byed rnam pa bzhi la byang bar gyur to//bram ze des bsdam pa/bdag gis dam bcas pa ni/bdag gi bu mi 'di rigs sam zhes bya bar rgyas
425a4('dul ba): par sbyar te/bram ze'i khye'u 'dis bdag las rig byed bzhi byang bar byas pa yin na/mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/gal te 'dis bu mo ma 'dod na ni legs
425a5('dul ba): so snyam nas/des de la smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u bdag gis bu mo 'di byed gzugs sam/rigs sam/bzo 'am/nor gyi phyir su la yang mi sbyin te/'on kyang sa zhig
425a6('dul ba): bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa zhig yod na/bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa las/bdag las khyod kyis reg byed bzhi byang bar bya ba las khyod
425a7('dul ba): la bu mo 'di chung mor sbyin no//des smras pa/bkra shis par gyur cig blang bar bgyi'o zhes des de la dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar btang nas/smras pa/bram ze'i
425b1('dul ba): khye'u chung ma khrid la rang gi khyim du song shig/des chung ma de khrid de rang gi khyim du song ba dang /des de la smras pa/rtswa'i sras bdag ni shin tu gzhon pas/las bgyid rngo mi thog gis
425b2('dul ba): dpe la bkrol bstsol cig/des de la smras pa/bzang mo khro bo la bkol dag la mchis/des smras pa/rje'i spos thams cad ces bgyi ba'i grong rdal ni/rgyal po thams cad
425b3('dul ba): kyi bshes gnyen zhes bgyi ba de'i sras thams cad sgrol zhes bgyi ba de gang cung zad ci slong ba de thams cad stsol gyis/de la bdag gi bkrol ba slongs shig/bzang mo gal
425b4('dul ba): te de lta na lhan cig tu 'dong ngo //de nas ngan to re thams cad kyi grong rdal du phyin nas dris pa/gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gang na/de dag gis smras pa/dka' thub kyi nags na/
425b5('dul ba): gnas so///'dul ba gzhi/bam po zhe bdun pa/de nas ngan te re chung ma dang lhan cig dka' thub kyi nags su song ba dang /de'i tshe rgyags spyan ma me tog dang /
425b6('dul ba): 'bras bu'i phyir spong ngo //de nas bram ze dran to re rgyags sbyin ma me tog dang /'bras bu'i phyir song ba dang /thams cad sbrul gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/chu gter go su
425b7('dul ba): gyon zhing gzo' mig mtshungs med pa/ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stong ce na//grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang //mche bzangs khyod dang
426a1('dul ba): mtshungs par gtong pong yod ma yin//bdag kyang bkol ba ma mchis pas//spu shugs lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na//khyod kyis rjes su brgya
426a2('dul ba): bgyis te//bdag la bkol ba stsal pa'i rigs//kho bo la bkol ba ga la yod//de dang ha cang mi ring po zhig na/nag pa dang /dra ba cani gyi zhing 'dug pa dang /des
426a3('dul ba): smras bya/bus pa gzhon nu'o ni dag sbyin cig/de skad ces smras pA dang /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bu sdug pa yongs su gtong ba la srud tsam zhig sems par+ya
426a4('dul ba): gyur to//de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol lnga smras pa/kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu kho bos khyod thams cad gting ba'o zhes thos nas/de'i phyir kho bo khyod la slong na/'di
426a5('dul ba): la khyod kyis dpyad du ci zhig yod/snying rje yi ni bdag nyid khyod//thams cad gtong bar so stengs grags//ji ltar glags pa de bzhin du//khyod kyis sa stong bya ba'i
426a6('dul ba): rigs//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so//rang gi srog ni gting ba la'ang //bdag giso res 'ga' ma dpyad na/
426a7('dul ba): rang gi bu na btang ba la//bdag bla gzhin 'gyur smos ci dgos//bram ze chen po de lta med ni//bdag gis gnas su sgyid bskyed ces//bus pa 'di gnyis yongs su
426b1('dul ba): na//ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa//'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod//gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas//bus pa btang la bdag min zhes//kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gis//
426b2('dul ba): bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs//de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smraso//kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigasu skyes pa/sa 'di thams
426b3('dul ba): cad du yon tan grags pa/srog chags thams cad l-i snying brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa/sbyin pa dang /mchod pa dang /bkur stis spos kyi glang blo che lta bu/dge sbyong
426b4('dul ba): dang /bram ze dang /glo bur dang /skye bo bla ma la mchod pa dang /bkren pa dang /mgon med pa dang /phongs pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa/thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs
426b5('dul ba): bar byed pa/mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis//bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa 'am/lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa 'am/mthong na don med pa 'am/re ba dang /yun ring po
426b6('dul ba): nas brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bru 'bras med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/cha ma yin te/khyod kyis med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na myur
426b7('dul ba): du ldog par 'gyuraro//de bas na khyod kyis bdogi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas te btang ba'i rigaso//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/bram ze gal te de lta na yongasu baiti //
427a1('dul ba): bus pa gzhon nu dag btang ma thag tu/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di rnams pa drug tu g.yos//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
427a2('dul ba): po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nus seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te/lam
427a3('dul ba): bkag nas 'dug pa dang /de nas rgyags sbyin mos smras pa/ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma bsgeg bsgreg ma//khyod ni ci ste lam bkag 'dug par byed//ge la te bdag/
427a4('dul ba): ni mi 'phyo bden zhe na//lam las zur te myur du 'gro bar gyis//khyod kyang ri dgas rgyal po'i chung me la/bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi//btsun mo yin pas
427a5('dul ba): chos kyi spun gyur gyis//ri dgas rgyal po'i chung mes bdag lam phye//de skad ces smras pa dang /ri dgas kyi rgyal mo de lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo //de nas
427a6('dul ba): rgyags sbyin mr-i bsti gnas gang na ba der song ba dang /nag po dang /dra bo can grang na yang ma mthong nas/byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste smras pa/rje'i sras bus pa
427a7('dul ba): gzhon nu gnyis gang na mchis/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig/re bso yang dag 'ongs gyur nas zhus pa de gnyis de la byin//de la rjes
427b1('dul ba): yI rang rigs//de brgyal nas sA la 'gyel ba dang //de la chu mang pos btab nas rtas te smras pa/rje'i sras bus pa gzhon nu dka' thub kyi nags nas bskrun pa bde ba'i bdag
427b2('dul ba): nyid can de dag/khyod kyis ci'i slad du yongs su spang /de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus la bla gosi phud de/rgyu gas sbyin ma la smras pa/ci bo de gnyis la byams
427b3('dul ba): pa med snyam 'am/nga'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas gswA tau khrag phyung ba la ltos/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub
427b4('dul ba): sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas gal te 'ga' zhig gis rgyagasde sbyin ma bslangs te de la byin na/g.yog byed po med par 'gyu ro snyam du bsams nas/bdag
427b5('dul ba): nyid bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi cha byad du sprul nas/byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/grogs po g.yog byin cig/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
427b6('dul ba): bdag lnga g.yog ga la yod//brgya byin gyis smras pa/rgyags sbyin ma byin cig/byang chub sems dpa' rgyags sbyin mo'i gdong du brtags par brtsams pa dang //
427b7('dul ba): rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa shes nas smras po/rje'i sras gal te khyod kyis bdag nyid btang na stsal du gsol/byang chub sems dpas smras pa//
428a1('dul ba): bram ze khyod ladz+nyAn+da na//de nas lha rnamus kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/bram ze'i khye'u yi cha byad ma snang bAr byas nas rang gi cha byud du 'dug nas smras pa//
428a2('dul ba): drung srong bdag gi rgyags sbyin ma 'di khyod la bcol gyis/khyod kyi su la yang ma sbyin cig/rgyags sbyin maso brgyu byin gyi rgong pa gnyis la mgo byis gtugs te smras pa/
428a3('dul ba): kauSh+yA shA ka ci nas kyu bras pa gzhon nu de gnyis blan nyid du mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/de
428a4('dul ba): du mi snang bar gyur //denas lha rnams byung ba bad+ma sbyin gyis//bus pa gzhon nu khyer ba'i bram T+wA~M dzI ltar thams cad kyi grong rdal du 'tshong bar brtsams byed
428a5('dul ba): ster rmongs par byas//de gnyis rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis mthong nas/de rnams rgyal po'i drung du song skye smras pa/bus pa nag po dang dra ba can ni
428a6('dul ba): bram ze zhig tshong dus na 'tsheng zhing mchis lag so//des bsgo ba/shes ldan dag dong la khrid do shog shig/de gnyis khrid de 'os pa dang /rgyal pos srung la
428a7('dul ba): gzhal te mnyam du gser gyis brus//rgyal po des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag gang zhig khye'u dang bu mo yang yongs su gtong bar byed pa la
428b1('dul ba): gzhan yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba ci yod/gzhon nu de khug shig dang /rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug go/blon po rnams kyis de dka' thub kyi gnas
428b2('dul ba): nas bkug ste/de rgyal po'i rgyal srid kyi dbyung phyug la bzhag nas/dris grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi khang pa brtags nas lho mAng pa dang /mye brgya
428b3('dul ba): phrag mang po dang /lo stong phrag mang po dang /lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dag byas te/des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin gyi phun sum tshogs
428b4('dul ba): pa mthong nas tshogasasu bcad de smras pa/byang chub bsod nams don gnyer bas//dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la/'jigs pa
428b5('dul ba): med par sbyin pa byin//gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang //rta dang nor bu rgyan rnams dang /de bzhin las ngag byed pa'i bran/tshul khrims ldan pa rnams la sbyin//chag
428b6('dul ba): bya med pa'i sems kyis ni/byA dang bu mo yongs rgyu btang bas/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/mi yi dag pa 'thob par 'gyur//rgyal po chen po de'i rgyu de'i dus na/rgyal po thams cad
428b7('dul ba): sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis bu dang chung ma yongasu btang ba de/gzhon zhig yin snyam na/khyed kyis de ltar mi bsti ste/'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus ni/rgyal po thams
429a1('dul ba): cang sgrol zhes bya bar gyur te/ngas den bu dang chung ma yongs su btang dro//rgyal po chen po dbu dang chung ma yongasu btang ba des/bla na med pa yang dag par
