429a2('dul ba): rtogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang sbyin pa de mi bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /
429a3('dul ba): tshogs tsam yin no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dgra byin/bsod nams ngag byas pa ga//
429a4('dul ba): yin pa de nyon gyig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba bA ra nA se zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du/rgyal po che sa sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/dri 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /zhes
429a5('dul ba): bya ba nas/chos bzhin gyi rgyal srid byid do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//ji ltar na lhas mkhan dag gi sa~M bA ra Na ser lo bcu gnyis su char pa mi 'bab bo zhes
429a6('dul ba): lung bstan to//de nas rgyalnga po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du ril sgrogs su bcug paM/dri'i yul na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer ba dag nyon cig/ltas mkhan+da dag
429a7('dul ba): gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pa ro lung bstan gyis/khyed cig las gang dag la lo bcu gnyisu bza' ba yod pa de rnams ni 'dug shig/gzhan rnams ni bza
429b1('dul ba): dang btung ba myod pa'i yul du dang shig/lo legs par gyur pa dang skar yang sheg shig/de'i tshe b+hA ra nA sa'i grong khyer na khyim bdag 'dus byed ces bya ba phyug pa/nor mang ba/longs
429b2('dul ba): spyo ts+tsha baM/yongasu bzung ba/yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'grin pa zhig gyonas so//des mngon bkug ste smras pa/
429b3('dul ba): kyi rnying rje bang ba na bdag 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas pa lo dacu gnyis rgyags thub par yod dam/'on te med/des smras pa/jo bo mchis so//de nas khyim ba dag 'dum byed
429b4('dul ba): 'dir dang bcas pa ni 'dug go/skye bo'i tshogs gzhan ni bza' ba dang /btud pa mong pa'i yul du dong ngo //sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na/'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas
429b5('dul ba): dben pa dang /ngan pa la snying brtse btson/bas mtha'i gnas mal dgu la dga' ba/'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dge 'byung bar 'gyur bas/dzi tsam na b+hu ra na sa da
429b6('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnaso//phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang /rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya'o//de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po dag smra dro shAm thabs bgos//ltung
429b7('dul ba): rnyed dang /mes gos thogs te/khyim bdag 'dus byed ga la ba der dong sti lhags pa dang /khyim bdage 'dum byed la 'di ces smos//khyim bdag khyod kyis rab tu byung ba
430a1('dul ba): /brgya la lo bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms 'bul nus sam/des smras pa/'phags pa dag re shig mngan la rmas te bgyi'o//des mngan bkug ste smras pa/
430a2('dul ba): kye nang rje bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub par yod dam/des smras pa/jo bo mchis so//de nas rang sangs
430a3('dul ba): rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs so//ji tsam na phyi dro'i dus su rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po gzhan yang lhags nas/khyim bdag 'dum byed la khyim bdag rang sangs rgyas
430a4('dul ba): lnga brgya po 'di dag la/khyod kyis lo bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms 'bul bar nus sam zhes bslangs pa dang /des smras pa/'phags pa dag khyod cag la g.yar gyis
430a5('dul ba): blangs lags na/yang bslang ci 'tshal/de rnams kyis smras pa/khyim bdag de dag kyang gzhan la/bdag cag kyang gzhan yin no/des smras pa/'phags pa dag
430a6('dul ba): gal te de lta na re shig mngon la rmas te bgyi'o//des mngon bkug ste smras pa/kye nang rje bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /rab tu byung ba lnga rgya lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags
430a7('dul ba): thub par yod dam/des smras pa/jo bo mchis so//de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs to zhugs pa/khyed cag gi dus gang lags
430b1('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/gung tshigs ma yol ba'o//de nas khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis//sbyin pa'i khang pa brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dag kyang bgos//dus da
430b2('dul ba): brjod pa dag kyang bkos te/des nyi ma re re zhing rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug go//mu gaM de yang li rgyud ma kho nar bAr ye mched nas/de nis khyim
430b3('dul ba): bdag des rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhus pa/'phags pa dag lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ram/char 'bebs par 'gyur ro//bdag gis sa bon stsal tas/thob shig/
430b4('dul ba): de dag gis sa bon btab bo//lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin gyis des bsams pa/'jig rten na yon gnas ga ji snyed
430b5('dul ba): de rnams kyi mchog ni rang sangs rgyas rnams yin la/sbyin bdag gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni khyim bdag 'dum byed yin gyis/bdag gis 'di dag gi grogs
430b6('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang po chen po'i char phab pa dang /lo tog de rnams slu bar skyes so//de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis/radwa
430b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams la zhus pa/'phags pa dge bdag cag gi lo tog bskrun pa gang lags pa de dag skye bar skyes par gyur na/de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/de rnams kyis
431a1('dul ba): smras pa/ma bcad par spyan cig/de rnams kyis bskrun pa las/me tog dang /'bras bu rgyu ma'i tshad tsam chag so//de nas de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas
431a2('dul ba): de dag la rgyas par smras pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/ma gcad cig dang /rang nyid smin nas gas par 'gyur ro//ji tsams na de rnams smin nas gus pa dang /gang gis so
431a3('dul ba): bon ji lta bu btab pa de'i kho na lta bu sha stag gis gang bar gyur to//de nas mu ge rgyun chad nas lo legs par gyur nas/yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i skye
431a4('dul ba): po'i tshogs dang /srog chags gang dag mu ges 'jigs skrag nas drong ba rnams kyang yul bA ra na ser 'ongs so//de nas mu ge rgyun chad nas lo legs par gyur nas//
431a5('dul ba): khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis de na rang sangs rgyas stong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba sna tshogs dang /tshod ma ro dang ldan pa rnams kyis tshim par byas te/tshigs
431a6('dul ba): su bcad de smras pa/blo ldan mkhas pas nor dang ni//dad pa shes rab rnyed nas ni//skyes bu de yis rtag par yang //'dod chags brel la yon dbul lo//rdzu 'phrul
431a7('dul ba): ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan pa'i//brtan rnams gang gis bshos gsol ba//de yi rigs ni bde bar 'phel//de ltar tshul khrims phun
431b1('dul ba): sum tshogs pa'i//yon gnas dag la yon phul nA//'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du//bde ba dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus nas//khyim bdag 'dum
431b2('dul ba): byed ces bya bar gyur pa gang gis mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/rang sangasu rgyas stong la bstod snyoms sbyar cing //de'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byas pa
431b3('dul ba): de bzhin zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe dwa'i dus na/khyim bdag 'dom byed ces bya ba der gyur te/nga nyid kyi de na mu go l-i bcu gnyis su
431b4('dul ba): byung ba na/rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms sbyar bas/nga'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byas so//rgyal po chen po nga'i sbyin pa 'am/sbyin pa'i bgo bshal
431b5('dul ba): des/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/'on kyang ngo'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu
431b6('dul ba): tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsamra yin///sdom la/sprin shugs dbang po sbrul mgo gnyis//de bzhin chu sregs ne tso dang //sngon mo ru sA lo ste bzang
431b7('dul ba): dang /ded dpon tshogs su bsdus pa yin//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/sems can rnams rjesu bzung
432a1('dul ba): ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun pa rab tu mang po dag cig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te/
432a2('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod nas/de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan dag bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste cig la cig phan
432a3('dul ba): thogs par mngon pa med kyis/mal bdag nor tshol pa rnams so so nas phongs pas na/dgos pa phong+ga ba rgyal gyi cha spyad dag khyer te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o//
432a4('dul ba): zhes de ltar chas bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rgyal gyi cha byad kha cig gis ni shing shal ma lA'i spang lebo/kha cig gis nI ras skye nong
432a5('dul ba): tshangs can/kha cig gis ni sku pa bskyes pa/kha cig gis ni ra rgyal khye te rgya mtsho chen por zhug so//de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang /chu srin nyi'i
432a6('dul ba): rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gu bo che bshig go/gru bo che bshig pa dang /de rnams rkyal pA re re la zhon te/chu ji lta ba bzhin du khyer te rdong ba las/de rnams kyi las
432a7('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/des lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang /de na bud med gzugs bzang jo mo mdzes ma/blta na
432b1('dul ba): sdug pa dag yod de/de dag gis 'di skad ces smra so//rnga bo dag chung spyon/bzhin bzangs dag tshur spyon//bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang /khyim thab ma
432b2('dul ba): mchis pa rnams kyi khyim thab dang /gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas dang /gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling dang /mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang /skyabs
432b3('dul ba): mA mchis pa rnams kyi skyobs dang //rten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig/'di dag ni khyed kyi zas kyi khang pa dang /skom gyi khang pa dang /gros kyi khang pa dang /gnas ma
432b4('dul ba): gyi khang pa dang /dga' bor 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang /dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang /dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang /'dzam bu gling gi rin po che mang po 'di lta ste/
432b5('dul ba): nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /mAn shel dang /byi ru dang /dngul dang /gser dang /rdo'i snying po dang /spug dang /pad+ma rA ga dang /dung g.ya su 'khyil ba dag
432b6('dul ba): lags kyis/khyed tshur spyon/bdag cag dang lhan cig tu rtsed mo bgyi/dga' bar bgyi/dga' dgur spyad par bgyi'o//khyed cag la su yang smos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du
432b7('dul ba): ma bzhud cig/de dag bud med de rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod por byed de/de dag de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed
433a1('dul ba): dka' dgur spyod par byed pa las/bu po dang bu mo dag bcos so//de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ci'i byung /
433a2('dul ba): bud med de dag gis lho phyogs kyi lom lta go par srung bar sems//mya la bdag gis bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de mal du gnyid log par rig nas/bag so
433a3('dul ba): kyis dral bu dal bus mol nas babs la/lho phyogs kyi lam du 'gro'o snyam nas/de de ltar nges par byas nas bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de gnyid kyis log
433a4('dul ba): par rig nas/brags kyis dal bus malA nas brobs te/ral gri rnon po mtshan du thogs nas/lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang /don skye bo'i tshogs chen po smre sngags
433a5('dul ba): 'don pa'i sgra/kyi hud ma/kyi hud pa/kyi hud sring mo/kyi hud mun/kyi rgyud 'dzem bu'i snyid bkri bos sbyangs sam/'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na re skyid ces sgra 'byin pa
433a6('dul ba): dag zos so/zlos nas kyang de 'jigs par gyur/rmongs par gyur/ shur zhes byed par gyur to//de nas tshong ba mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can+da des/'jigs pa da /spyi bung
433a7('dul ba): zhes byed de/shin tu legs par bsal nas/lho phyogs kyi lam de kho na'i rjes su song ba dang /des de na lcags kyi mkhar chen po mtho zhing rgya che ba zhig mthong nas
433b1('dul ba): des grong khyer da'i mtha' kho ra khor yug tu bskor na/ci nas kyang sgo cung zad cig rnyed grang snyam nas/des grong khyer de'i mtha' kho ra khor yug tu bskor ba dang /chung ngu na byi la 'am/
433b2('dul ba): sbrul 'dzul ba'i sgo tsam yang ma rnyed do//de na shing shi ri ga zhes bya ba sbom la ring ba zhig mthong nas/de nas chod pa mkhas pas rang bzhin can des shing shi ri sha di lo bags
433b3('dul ba): kyis/de la dal bus 'dzegs nas/skye bo'i tshogs chen la 'di skad ces smra so//shes ldan dag ci'i phyir kyi hud ma/kyi hud pa/kyi hud sring mo/kyi hud spun/kyi hud 'dzam
433b4('dul ba): bu'i gling bkra bas spangs sam/'di lhor 'dzam bu'i gling na re skyid ces shin tu smre sngags 'don/de rnams kyis smras pa/kyai nang rje bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun
433b5('dul ba): nor tshol ba rab tu mang po dag cig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs tau/rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod pa las/bdag cag 'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan dag bdag cig
433b6('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lha ste/cig la gcig phran 'dogs pa mngon pa med kyi/ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na/dgos pa
433b7('dul ba): rgyal gyi cha byed dag khyer te/rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o zhes de ltar chas bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rgyal gyi cha byad /kha cig gis ni
434a1('dul ba): shal ma la'i spung leb/kha cig gis ni ras skye nang tshangs can/kha cig gis ni slu ba bslus pa/kha cig gis ni ra rgyal khyer te/rgya mtsho chen por
434a2('dul ba): zhugs so//bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang /chu srin nya'i rigs kyis gru bo che bshig go/gru bo che bshig nas bdag cag rkyal ba re re la zhon te/chu ji
434a3('dul ba): lta ba bzhin khyer te dong ba las/bdag cag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/des bdag cag lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba
434a4('dul ba): dang /de na bud med gzugs bzang mo/mdzes ma/blta na sdug pa dag yod de/de dag gis 'di skad ces smraso//jo bo dag tshur spyon/bzhin bzangs dge tshur spyon//
434a5('dul ba): bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang /khyim thab ma mchis pa rnams kyi khyim thab dang /gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas dang /gling ma mchis pa rnams
434a6('dul ba): kyi gling dang /mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang /skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang /rten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig/'di dag ni khyed kyi zas kyi
434a7('dul ba): khang pa dang /skom gyi khang pa dang /gos kyi khang pa dang /gnas mal gyi khang pa dang /dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang /dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang /dga'
434b1('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang /'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byi ru dang /dngu lnga dang /gser
434b2('dul ba): dang /rdo'i snying po dang /smyug dang /pad+ma rA ga dang /dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dag lags kyis khyed chur spyon/bdag cag lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/dga' bar bgyi/dgu' dgur
434b3('dul ba): spyad par bgyi'o//khyen cag la su yang smyos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud cig/bdag cag bud med de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par
434b4('dul ba): byed de/bdag cag de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u dang bu mo dag btsas te/ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun pa
434b5('dul ba): gzhan rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i gru bo che zhig go zhes ma zos pa de srid du bud med de dag dong bdag cag lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/gang
434b6('dul ba): gi tshe bud med rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi don thun rab tu mang po gzhan dag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang /chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bshig go
434b7('dul ba): zhes thos nas/de nas bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs te/kha cig ni zos so//skyes pa za bar byed pa na lhag rol sgo 'am/spu 'am/sen mo 'am/sau lus pa gang dag yin pa de
435a1('dul ba): dag kyang ma lus par za bar byed do//de rnams za bar byed pa na khrag dron po'i phigs pas la ltung ba gang dag yod na yang /de dag kyang sor mo'i rtse mo
435a2('dul ba): rnams kyis brud de/sa dang bcas par khar 'jug par byed do//bdag cag kho cig ni lcags kyi mkhar 'drir bcug go/kye nang rje 'di dag ni mi'i bud med ma yin te/srin
435a3('dul ba): mo yin gyis 'di dag las bdag nyid srungs shig/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la 'di skad ces skyeso///
435a4('dul ba): gang gis na khyed cag dang /bdag cag legs pa dang /bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs 'ga' ci yod/de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smraso//
435a5('dul ba): kye nang rje re shog bdag cag gang gis nu/legs pa dang /bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs ni cung zad kyang khro bo cag la med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
435a6('dul ba): gal te bdag cag gse 'di snyam du kye ma bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'dri las brgal te 'bros so snyam du bsams na/de'i nyis 'gyur ram/de'i sum 'gyur
435a7('dul ba): gyis mthon por 'gyuraro//gal te bdag cag gis 'di snyam du/kye ma bdag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di'i glo phug ste/'dre so snyam du bsams na/de'i nyis 'gyur
435b1('dul ba): ram/de'i sum 'gyur gyis zheng du skye bar 'gyur te/de ltar re shig bdag legs pa dang /bde bar mdzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs bdag cag la med do//'on kyang
435b2('dul ba): gang gis na khyed cag ni slar legs pa dang /bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod de/'di na bdag cag gi bar snang la rgyu ba'i lha rnams/kye ma 'dzam bu'i
435b3('dul ba): gling gi don 'thun pa rnams bso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid la/byang phyogs kyi gseb lam gang na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can/ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu za ba dang /bde
435b4('dul ba): ba dang /nad med pa dang /stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim pa/mgro 'phang bstod de/pha rol du 'gro ba ni su yod/su ni pha rol du bkri/su ni 'dzam bu'i gling du legs
435b5('dul ba): pa dang /bde bar phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yod par mi 'gro ba ni byis pa'o zhes sgra 'byin pa thos kyis/khyed de'i drung du deng la/'di skad ces bdag
435b6('dul ba): cag pha rol tu mchi'o//bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/bdag cag pha rol du bkri zhing legs pa dang /bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin pa mdzad du gsol zhes smros shig/de nas
435b7('dul ba): tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/skye bo'i tshigs chen po des smras pa shin tu legs par bzung ste/chub par byas nas/bags kyis dal bu dal bus shing shi ri sha las
436a1('dul ba): byabs nas/g.yas phyogs kyi lam de nyid du song ste/bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de mal nag nyid kyis log par rig nas/bags kyis dang
436a2('dul ba): bus nyal lo//de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /nang par sngar langs nas/'dzam bu gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang
436a3('dul ba): po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//shes ldan dag re shig gang na bskyed mos tshal dben pa
436a4('dul ba): yod pa zhig tu sheg shig dang /kho bo khyed cag dang lhan cig gsang ste glod dgos pa chung zhig yod kyis/khyod su yod smyos kyang /khye'u 'am/bu mo ni khrid de ma 'ong

436a7('dul ba): ji snyed glongs pa de dag/'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams la rgyas par smras nas/'di skad ces kyang smras te/'di dag ni bud med ma yin te/'di dag
436b1('dul ba): nasrin mo yin gyis/shes ldan dag 'di las bdag nyid bsrung bar gyis shig/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams de bzhin du gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa nyid la
436b2('dul ba): byung phyogs gas pa lam gang na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs ca na/marmos mya btab pa'i 'bras si lu rba baM/bde ba dang /nad med dang /stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams
436b3('dul ba): tshim po/mgo 'phang bstod de/pha rol du 'gro ba ni su zhig yod/su ni pha rol du bkri/su ni legs pa dang /bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched
436b4('dul ba): du brjod pa yod par song ba dang /tshong pa d+hU rje'i rigs shig gis d+he'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi shug sI can rgyung ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthing nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun
436b5('dul ba): rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras//shes ldan dag rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can ni pha bi yin te/pha ba'i drung du dong la 'di skad ces/bdag cag pha rol tu mchi'o//bdag
436b6('dul ba): cag pha rol du mchi ste/bdag cig pha rol tu bkri zhing bdag cag legs pa dang /bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra'o//de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang
436b7('dul ba): bzhin can gyis don 'thun rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so//shes ldan dag bdag gis ji ltar skye ba'i tshogs chen po des smras pa'i don go ba ltar 'di ni bdag cag gis
437a1('dul ba): rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can de'i drung du dong nas 'di skad ces/bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o//bdug cag pha rol tu mchi skye/bdag cag pha rol tu

437b6('dul ba): pa de la khyed cag las/gang dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gi chung ma 'am/bu pho 'am/bu mo 'am/bdag gi zas kyi khang pa 'am/skom gyi khang pa 'am/gos kyi khang pa 'am/
437b7('dul ba): gnas mol gyi khang pa 'am/dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba 'am/dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing ngam/'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/nor bu dang /mu tig dang
438a1('dul ba): bai DUr+ya dang zhes bya ba nus/dung g.yas su 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sems phan chad de dag kho bo'i rgyab bam ro stod la zhon yang
438a2('dul ba): shing rtog gis 'bras bu smin pa rtsa ba chad po bzhin du lhung bar 'gyur zhing /bud med de rnams 'ongs nas za bar 'gyur te/de dag skyes pa za bar byed pa na/khrag dron po'i thigs

438a5('dul ba): dag legs par dang /bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro//de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis/'dzam bu'i gling gis tshong pa rab tu mang po la legs par
438a6('dul ba): rab tu gtams shing rjesu bstan nas rgyu ba smad do//de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi chung pa rab tu myung pos d+hA'i rgyal po sprin+da gyi shugs can+da la/kha cig ni ro stong du/khya cig ni rgyub

438b6('dul ba): gyur pa dang /bud med do rnams de dag gi drung du dong ste phyin nas zla bar byed de/skyes pa rnams za bar byed pa ni/lhag ma lus pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/sla 'am zhes bya ba

439a1('dul ba): zhes pa bya ba nas/dung g.ya su 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/de ltar mi sems pa rnams ni 'di ltar rta'i rgyal po sbyin gyi shugs can gyi spu'i rtse mo
439a2('dul ba): cha shas la 'jug pa yang legs pa dang /bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par gyur to//rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang dag 'di snyam du/bdag ni mig yin no//migo ni bdag gi
439a3('dul ba): yin no//bdag ni rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid yin no//yid ni bdag gi yin no//bdag ni gzugs yin no//gzugs ni bdag gi yan no//bdag ni sgra

439a7('dul ba): ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin//rnam par shes pa ni bdag gi yin no//snyam du sems na/de rnams sdug bsngal 'thob par 'gyur te/srin mo'i nang du tshong

440a2('dul ba): cung yang mi ring ba zhig na/drang srong byams pa'i bdog nyid snying rje can/sems can la 'o byams pa zhig gnas so//de'i bsti gnas dang ha cung yang mi ring ba zhig na/
440a3('dul ba): khyim bdag zhing pa gnyis shig zhing rmod pa las/de gnyis phan tshun rtsod pa byung bar gyur te/de na gcig khros pa dang /gcig shos kyang slar khros so//gcig gis
440a4('dul ba): brgyab pa dang /gcig bshos kyis kyang slar brgyab bo//de gnyis ka yang drang srong gi drung du dod nas/drang srong de la gcig gis dpang btsugs pa dang /gcig shos kyis
440a5('dul ba): kyang btsugs so//de gnyis rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang /rgyal pos de gnyis la smras pa/khyed gnyis la dpang su yod//gcig gis smras pa lha bdag la dbang drang srong
440a6('dul ba): lags so//gcig shos kyis smras pa/bdag gis dbang yang de kho na las bka' de nas rgyal po sa drang srang bos te dris pa/drang srong chen po 'di gnyis sngar gang gis nyes
440a7('dul ba): drang srong gis smras pa/lha gal te 'khor lo sbyar ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhal che bcad na/de lta na bdag gis dbang bgyi'o//gzhan du ni ma lag so//rgyal pos smras pa/de bzhi

440b4('dul ba): sbyar ba'i rgyal po ni/gnod pa las zlog cing /phan pa la sbyor bar bgyid do//de nas rgyal pos smras pa/gnyis ka dang la da phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i
440b5('dul ba): dus na/drang srong du gyur pa gang gis chos bzhin gyis dbang byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na zhes bya ba nas//
440b6('dul ba): nga nyid kyis chos bzhin gyis dbang de byaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//rgyal po chen po ngas chos bzhin gyis dbang byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub
440b7('dul ba): rtogs so snyam na/khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang ngas chos bzhin gyis dbang byas pa de ni/bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas/tshogaso tsam
441a1('dul ba): yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/mA nges pa'i//
441a2('dul ba): phung po la gnas pa na rang gi srog yongs su btang nas/sems can mang po rjes su bzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba nag sau tshang tshing zhig
441a3('dul ba): na/seng ge ral ba can zhig gnas so//lam de nas don 'thun lnga brgya tsam dong nas/de dag gi ca co'i sgras dus bskul bas/sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya ba zhig
441a4('dul ba): glo bur du langs nas/des don 'thun tshong dpon dang bcas par bskor ba dang /de rnams skrag nas sgra 'byen cing zhi ba dang /chu lha dang /lus ngan dang /dbang phyug la sogs
441a5('dul ba): pa lha rnams la gsol ba btab pa dang /de nas seng ges sgra de thos so//thos nas kyang phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /ji tsam na sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya bas/don
441a6('dul ba): 'thun lnga brgya tsam bskor ba mthong ngo //de dang hra la yang mi ring ba zhig na/glang po'-i phru gu zhig kyang rgyu zhing 'dug pa dang /de'i drung du song ste smras pa/grogs po sprul
441a7('dul ba): chen bzhagaso pa lta bu zhes bya bas don 'thun lnga brgya bskor na/de rnams kyi don gyi phyir/rang gi srog yongs su btang bar khyod spro'am/ji lta bu zhig bya/bdag gi
441b1('dul ba): rkang pa khyod kyi klad par bzhag la thal mo sbrul chen po la bstan dang /bdag gi rkang pa brtan pa'i shugs kyis ni khyod 'chi bar 'gyuraro//thal lcags gis ni sprul lo//sbrul chen
441b2('dul ba): po'i kha chus reg pas ni bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyuraro//glang po rje'i phru gus de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs nas/seng ges glang po chu'i phru gu'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nAs/thal
441b3('dul ba): mos sbrul chen po la bsnun pa dang /seng ges rkang pa brten pa'i shugs kyis ni glang po che'i phru gu nI shi/thal mos kyang sbrul chen po shi/sbrul chen po'i kha chus kyang ril dgas
441b4('dul ba): kyi rgyal po seng ge shi ste/'gro ba gsum char yang ngo //don 'thun gyi tshogs ches pa dang /lha zhig gis smras pa/bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpas khyed kyi phyir
441b5('dul ba): rang gi srog yongs su btang nas/skyabs byas kyis re shig de'i lus la mchod pa byos la phyir deng shig/de nas de rnams kyis de'i rus pa bsregs te/rus pa la mchod pa byas//
441b6('dul ba): rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge zhes bya ba nas/ngas don 'thun lnga brgya po de dag sbrul chen po las rang gi srog btang nas thar bar byaso zhes bya ba'i
441b7('dul ba): bar snga ma bzhin no//rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba des/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/
442a1('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/ngas sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pI byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsam yin
442a2('dul ba): no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngaste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyis pa'i phyir gsod pa la yang byams bu bsgrubs
442a3('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba nags khrod cig na/byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas po/bya mgo gnyis ltos tshwas tha dad pa
442a4('dul ba): zhig tu gyur to//de la gcig ni chos can zhes bya'o//gcig shes ni chos yin zhes bya'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na chos can gyis bdud rtsis 'bras bu zhig zos so//chos
442a5('dul ba): min gyis ni dug gis 'bras bu zhig zos pa las/gnyis ka yang dug gi mthus kun tu myos par gyur na/phan tshun rtsod par brtsams pa dang /gcig gis log par smon
442a6('dul ba): lam btab/khyod kyi skye ba gang dang /gang du skyes pa'i skye ba de dang der gsod pa dang /phyir rgol ba dang /dgra bor gyur cig ces byaso//gcig shos kyis kyang smras pa/
442a7('dul ba): bdag ni khyod la thams cad du byams pa'i semos dang /phan pa'i sems dang snying brtse ba'i sems su gyur cig ces byaso//rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/de'i
442b1('dul ba): de'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//chos min gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin yin//rgyal po chen po nga'i byams pa'i sems des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
442b2('dul ba): bya'i byang chub thob po snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/'on kyang nga'i byams pa'i sems kyis blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /
442b3('dul ba): tshogs tsam yino////'dul ba gzhi/bam po zhe brgyud pa/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir
442b4('dul ba): sems can gyi skyabs byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba/chu gling zhig gi 'grum na/byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas nu/
442b5('dul ba): chu sregs rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/chu sregs lnga brgya'i dpon du gyur to//dzaM tsam na chu sregs rgan po zhig/chu srogs de rnams kyi sgo nga dang /phru gu rnams thabs kyis sngar
442b6('dul ba): zlos nas/dal bu ngal bus 'tshag cing res 'ga' bo ba med pa/rkang pa gcig bskums nas 'dug go//de nas chu sregs de rnams bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug
442b7('dul ba): bsngal gyis gdungs nas dpon po'i drung du song ste/ris 'thun pa'i skad gnyug mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang /de nas dpon po rang gi khyu rnams de ltar sdug bsngal bar
443a1('dul ba): mthong nas/chu gling kun nas byung ba brtsams pa dang /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis rnams par ltung bar 'gyur gyi/
443a2('dul ba): sesems kyis ni ma yin pas/des chu srigs rgan+da pA de dal bu dral bus 'chag cing /phyogs gcig tu song nAs/rkang pa gcig btsugs te gnas pa mthong nas/
443a3('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas 'phrigs pa/'di ni rang gi rigs kyi phyir rgol ba/rang gzhin ngon pa yin no snyam du rigs nas/tshig su bcad de smras pa/bdag gi sgo nga
443a4('dul ba): phru gu dang //rus chags rnams kyang zos nas ni//rkang pa gtsog btsugs 'dug pA de//kye ma khyod kyis brtul zhugs yin//kha cig smra ba yang bden te//gom ba dal bus 'dor byed/
443a5('dul ba): cig dal bu dal bus smra ba dang //gnya' ba gyur gyur byed pa ni//de ni dran g.yo'i mtshan nyid yin/des bsams pa/dpon po 'dis ni bdag gi rgyus sheso snyam du rigs
443a6('dul ba): nas skyabasu song ngo //de nas dpon pos smras paM/khu gu nam chu sregs kyi tshogs rnams 'khrugus par ma gyur par de'i bar du khyod kyi sems bde bar gyis shig/de
443a7('dul ba): nas chu sregs rgan po de bros nas/chu sreg de rnams bde bar gyur to//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus ni/chu sregs kyi dpon po bde bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin/
443b1('dul ba): snun/rgyus da ltar mo dar+b+ha m+b+ha/'on kya dang nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na su sogs kyi dpon pa dur gyur to//rgyal po chen blongs sems can rjes su bzung ba dos blan med du nga
443b2('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa snyam no/khyod kyis de ltar mi ngali~M s+t+wa~M/'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu
443b3('dul ba): tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsam yin no///rgyal po chen po gzhan yang dus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir so ma
443b4('dul ba): can rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba nags tshad chung zhig na/byang chub sems dpya' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pu no/tsa
443b5('dul ba): skad sme ba zhig tu gyur to//de'i tshe bA ra na ser rgyal po tshangaso sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de chos ma yin pas rgyal skrod byed du 'jug go/de nas ne tso nyin re zhing rgyal po de'i khang pa'i
443b6('dul ba): dri shu'i steng na yob cing /rgyal po chen po chos ma yin pas rgyal srid ma mdzod cig ces smra'o//rgyal po de de dang lhan cig gtsug par gyur pa dang /de nas des rgyal po
443b7('dul ba): dka' thub kyi gnas lnga la rab tu bzhag nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed pa la zhugs nasader dbus dang /bye thams cad la po 'jigs pa byin no//rgyal po che
444a1('dul ba): po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ne tsor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi pAlta ste/'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ne tso mi skad smra ba
444a2('dul ba): de yin par gyur to//rgyal po chen po ngas sems can lnga phan pa byas pa des/bla na myod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam nAM/khyod kyis de ltar mi
444a3('dul ba): lta ste/'on kyang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dong /rkyen tsamA dang /tshogs tsam yin no//
444a4('dul ba): rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/bsod pa la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa
444a5('dul ba): de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul ka shi zhes bya ba na/rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed de/de rtag tu lus 'phags kyi yul 'dod pa
444a6('dul ba): kho na'i phyir lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang mi mthun par gyur to//lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de ni do ngas khyad zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan+da yAng yul de mi 'dod pas/rtag
444a7('dul ba): tu byamaso pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang /snying brtse bas gan so//'on kyang de srid pas 'khor bas yul de kho na 'dod pa'i phyir/de dpung gi tshogs yin
444b1('dul ba): lag bzhi pa go bkon nas/lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang /gra yul sprad pa'i phyir chas//de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po sna thos nas/dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi
444b2('dul ba): lam stor du bcug ste/grong khyer de thams cad rdo ba dang /gseg mu dang /gyo mo bsal nas/rgyal mtshan dang /ba don ni bsgrengs/dar gyi chun 'byung mang pos ni sbyangs/
444b3('dul ba): dri zhim po'i bag por ni bshams/tsan dan gyi chu'i chug chad/gis btab cing /me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis dga' 'ga' ltar byas nas/go cing zhing bsod pa'i
444b4('dul ba): bza' ba rab tu mang po dgra lta gon byas te/grong mi dang /blon po rnams sur bkye nas/mgu bar 'gyur ba brgya phrag dag sbrid pa zos pa dang /rgyal po tshad sbyin kun
444b5('dul ba): nas bkris pa dang bral te/de nas bsams pa/lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la so sor yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba zhig byas te/slar ldog go snyam du bsamaso
444b6('dul ba): na/lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang /lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos bsgyur bsti chen pos bsu nas nang du khrid de/kha zas bsod pa rnams kyis tshim par byas
444b7('dul ba): nas tshig su bcad de smras pa/rgyal dbang bdag la bzod par mdzod//khyed la bdag ni rtag tu 'dud pa//bdag ni grogs pos kyur lags na//khyed kyi bdag ni brtse bar
445a1('dul ba): /mdzad//des kyang tshigs su baH de smras pa/bzod pa yi ni gzhi brdus nas//khrod du du rgyal 'joms pa yi//yon tan ldan pa'i mda' gcig gis/
445a2('dul ba): khyod kyis bdag cag ril bcom mo//de nas de gnyis phan tshun yid btsugs par gyur nas/rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang rang gi yul du song ngo //lus 'phags kyi yul mi
445a3('dul ba): rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur to//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/lus 'jigs kyi rgyu la por gyur bya de gzhan zhig yin snyam ni/khyod kyis da ltar mi lta
445a4('dul ba): ste/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de yin par gyur to//rgyal po chen po dus yid kyi dregra pa bcom pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
445a5('dul ba): byang chub thob bo snyam nAM/khyod kyi de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga'i yid kyi dregs pa bcom pa de ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas/chogs
445a6('dul ba): tsom yin no zhes bya ba'i bad+mo gong ma bzhin no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gtor ba'i phyir/sems can gyi
445a7('dul ba): don chen por byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba/byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po'i la gnas pa na/rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gyi dpon
445b1('dul ba): po zhig tu gyur to//ji tsam na ded dpon 'khor lnga brgya nor tshol ba zhig/rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas/rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las ji tsam na gru de chu srin nya'i rigs
445b2('dul ba): kyis bsheg nas/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//de nas ru sbal des tshong ba lnga brgya rgyab tu zhon nas/rgya mtsho chen po las bsgral to//rgyal po chen po dri'i
445b3('dul ba): tshe de'i dus na/rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gyi dpon por gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga nyid de'i dus de'i dus na/rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gyi
445b4('dul ba): dpon po der gyur to//rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rje su bzung ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang dra/
445b5('dul ba): sems can rjes su bzung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas/tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no////rgyal
445b6('dul ba): po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer po'i phyir sems can la phan pa byas po gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon
445b7('dul ba): byung ba lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po lnga brgya byung ba las/de na sde can dang /sde 'azangs shes bya ba spun gnyis shig blon po'i gtso bo byed pa las/sde can gyis sde bzang
446a1('dul ba): //la rtag tu klan ka tshol zhing gnod pa bya ba la zhug so//sde bzangs ni de la rtag tu phan bya ba la zhugs//rgyal ba'i blon po dang /grong myi rnams kyis
446a2('dul ba): kyang sde bzangs kyi ched du sde can dang sdums byas kyang gnas skyabs thams cad du gnod pa byed pa las ldog ma btub bo//de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos mang po zhing
446a3('dul ba): spyos nas yul nas bskrad do//de bA ra na sor song nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po'i go tso bor bcug go//de nas dus gzhan zhig na long bar gyur to zhes nu bo sde bzang
446a4('dul ba): kyis thos nus/rgyal po la gsol ba byas te/bA rA na sor song nas mig phye ba dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos/se bzungs 'di lta bu gang gis na mthus phu bo long bar
446a5('dul ba): byas pa'i rigs no/snying rje dang ldan pa 'dis de'i mig phye'o zhes sde bzang lo sems dgo' bar gyur to//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/blon po'i glatso bo sde bzang
446a6('dul ba): shrIs bya bar gyur pa gzhan zhig yin snyam na zhes bya ba nas/'on kyang ngas sems can rjesu bzung ba ni/bla na myemed pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bye ba nA/
446a7('dul ba): tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla ni med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/sems
446b1('dul ba): na rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba tshong khang zhig nA/deng dpon gnyis shig gnas pa/de gnyis shing rta lU brgya lnga brgya dang /
446b2('dul ba): tsho lnga dgon pa'i lamo zhig tu zhugs pa dang /de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag dgon pa'i nang nas 'dod pa rnams 'di lta ste/gcig la cig phani 'dogs par mngon
446b3('dul ba): bamed kyis/ma la bdag cag gis shing rta pa'i 'don pa rabs gnyis su btsang la/dgon pa'i lam du 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/de gnyis kyis shIng rta pa'i 'dron pa rabs
446b4('dul ba): gnyis bcad nas/dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so//de la ded dpon gi cig ni shing rta pa lnga brgya dang /dgon pa'i lam gyi mgo na 'dug go//ded dpon gcig shos ni shing rta pa lnga
446b5('dul ba): brgya dang dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so//ded dpon gyi mi tshong ba'i mdun nas 'gro bas/skyes bu nag po mig che la dmar ba bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa 'khor lo rdzab kyis
446b6('dul ba): yog pa gos rlan pA swA gu sher ba/me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa/mgo 'dren dang /dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces
446b7('dul ba): smras pa/kye nang rje ci dgon pa'i lam du lhas cher phab nas/rtsa dang chu sar pa mang du skyes sam/kye nang rje brjen te dgon pa'i lam du ltas char phab nas/rtsa dang chu sar pa
447a1('dul ba): bskyed kyis/shes ldan dag rtsa dang /chu snying pos khal rnams dub par ma byas par 'or cig/khyed cag rtsa dang /chu sar pa la longs spyad dang /bde ba
447a2('dul ba): dang /legs par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol ba dang /lhag ma yang rtol bar 'gyur ro//de nas ded dpon gyi mi 'gron pa grang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /'dron pa de dag
447a3('dul ba): la 'di skad ces smraso//shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig/kho bo tshong pa rnams kyi mdun nas 'gro ba na/'di ni skyes bu nag pa mig tsho la dmar ba/bong bu'i shing
447a4('dul ba): rtar zhugs pa/'khor lo rdzab kyis yogs/gos rlan pa/sgra gsher ba/me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa/mgo 'dren pa dang /dkyus ma dag dbyangs
447a5('dul ba): su len pa mthong ngo //mthos nas kyang 'di skad ces/kye nang rje ci dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtsa dang /chu sar pa mang du skyes sam zhes byas pa dang /des 'di
447a6('dul ba): skad ces kye nang rje bden te/dgon pa'i lam du ltas char phab nas rtsa dang /chu sar pa bskyed kyis//shes ldan dag rtsa dang /chu snying pos khal rnams dub par ma byas par
447a7('dul ba): mang cig/khyed cag rtsa dang /chu sar pa la longs spyad dang /bde ba dang /legs par dgon pa'i lam rtol pa rnams yang rtol bar 'gyuraro zhes zer gyis/bdag cag
447b1('dul ba): khal rnams ma dub par rtswa dang /chu bor la/bdag cag rtsa dang /chu sang ba la longs spyod nas/bde ba dang /legs par dgon pa'i lam rtol ba ltag ma yang rtol bar bya'o zhes
447b2('dul ba): de rnams kyi rtsa dang /chu snying pa bor te dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las/de rnams dong nas zhag gcig len yang /rtswa dang /chu sar pa ma rnyed do//zhag gnyis dang gsum dang /
447b3('dul ba): bdun gyi bar du song yang rtsi dang /chu sar pa ma rnyed do//de nas 'dron pas zhag bdun lon pa dang /gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas kha btago/de nas ded dpon cig
447b4('dul ba): shos 'di snyam du sems te/tshong po dag dong nus deng du zhag bdun lon snyam du bsams nas/dgon po'i lam der zhugs pa las ded dpon gyi mi tshong ba'i 'dun nas 'gro bas
447b5('dul ba): skyes bu nag po mig che la dmar ba/bung bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/'khor lo rdzab kyis yog pa/gos rlan pa/skra ga shir ba me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa
447b6('dul ba): mgo 'dren dang /dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smraso//kye nang rje ci dgon pa'i nang du lhas char phrab nas/rtswa dang /chu sar pa dag
447b7('dul ba): mang du skyes sam/kye nang rje bden to/dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas/rtswa dang chu sar pa ming du skyed kyis/shes ldan dag rtswa dang /chu snyid pas khal rnams dub par
448a1('dul ba): ma byas par 'or cig/khyed rtsubar+b+ha dang /chu sar pa la longs smang dang /bde ba dang /logs par dgon pa'i lam+bu lhag ma yang rtul par 'gyur//
448a2('dul ba): de nas da dpon gyi mi de/'don pa gang na ba der skyong ste phyin pa dang /'dron pa la 'di skad ces smras//shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig/kho bo tshang pa'i mdun nus 'bru
448a3('dul ba): ban 'dir/skyes bu nag po zhes bya ba nas/mgo 'dron dang /dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/'di
448a4('dul ba): skad ces kye nang rje ci dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang /chu sar po mang du skyes sam zhes byas pa dang /de 'di skad ces kye nang rje bden te dgon pa'i lam du
448a5('dul ba): lhas char phab nas/zhes bya ba nas/rtol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du'o//shes ldan dag re shig bdag cag gis ji srid rtswa dang /chu sar pa ma rnyed
448a6('dul ba): bar du r+N+Na dang chu rnying pa mi dor ro//de rnams dong nas zhag gcig lon na yang rtswa dang chu ser pa ma rnyed do//zhag gnyis dang /gsum dang /bdun gyi bar du song na yang
448a7('dul ba): dang /chu sar po ma rnyed pa las/ded dpon gyi mis mdun na 'don pa/gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas kha btag pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces
448b1('dul ba): kye ma'i ring dpon gyi mi ni bus pa ste/des 'dros pa tshul ma yin pas kha btag gis mdo zhes smraso//de ni bde ba dang logs par dgon pa'i lam rtol bar gyur to//de'i rgyu
448b2('dul ba): dus kyi da dpon phyi ma shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rje su bzung ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po snyam na/khyong
448b3('dul ba): de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas/tshogaso tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar
448b4('dul ba): gong ma bzhin no//sdom la/mche ba drug dang ri bong dang //pha dang ma dang chu skyed dang //tshal tshig long brjod dang ni//yul 'khor spyod la sogs pa'o//rgyal po chen po gzhan
448b5('dul ba): yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dri nyon cig rgyal po chen po sngon
448b6('dul ba): byung ba nags chang ching rI dang /'beb chu mang pos gang ba/rtswa sngon po dang /del ba dang /shing sa lo dang //ba la shas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs shi gi na/byang chub
448b7('dul ba): sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na/glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug bzhin tu gyur to//de'i chung ma bani glang mo bzangs mo zhes myong /ban gleng ma thams cad
449a1('dul ba): kyi nang na mchog tu byung ba de dang /de lhan cig khyu las gar te/phyogs gzhan zhig tu dga' dgur rgyu zhing gnas pa las/ji tsam na ban
449a2('dul ba): grang mo mchog/mchog tu yid 'phrogs ma gzhan zhig yid la'ang mi bsam pa las/glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug gi drung du phyin to//de nas de yang mkhas pa'i
449a3('dul ba): yon tan dang ldan pa zhig pas glang po che de ji ltar chags pa'i sems dang 'brel bas/de 'gro na yang phyis bzhin 'brang /'dug na 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur
449a4('dul ba): bsnyen bkur byaso//de nas ban glang mo bzang mo phrag dog gi skyon gyis mi bzod pa skyes nas/ban+do glang mo de la klan ka tshol bar gyur/glang po che ba drug pa la yang
449a5('dul ba): shin tu tshig bo za'o//gnas skabs thams cad du nam yang gla gros ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/smon lAm log par gdab par brtsams bA/gang du glang po che byis pa chung
449a6('dul ba): gson pa 'di'i srog gcod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas des ri kha nas bdag nyid mchongs te/shi bA lus/lus 'phags kyi rgyal
449a7('dul ba): bo'i btsun modam pa'i mngal du skyes nas/zla ba dgu 'das nas bu mi zhig btsas te/skyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur to//gang gi tshe bag mar gtang ngan pa de'i
449b1('dul ba): ru la ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin la byin te/des btsun mo dam par byaso//des tshe sngon ma'i sha kho na yod pas/bya ra ba rnams kyis glang po che mche ba drug gyaras sod par
449b2('dul ba): byed du bcug te/de nas des rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smos pa/lha phyogs che ge mo zhig na/glang po che mche ba drug pa mchis shes mchi na/de'i mche ba bdag la 'tshal ba zhig
449b3('dul ba): mchis kyis/lhas grong mi rnams la bka' stsal tu gsol/de nos rgyal pos yul thams cad na gnas pa'i rngon pa rnams bkug ste bsgo ba/shes ldan dag dreng la/
449b4('dul ba): phyogs che ge mo zhig ni/glang po che mche ba drug pa zhig 'dug pa de'i mche ba dgos kyis//myur du khyer te shog shig lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rngon pa de rnams kyis/rgyal
449b5('dul ba): po tshangs sbyin las mnyan to//de nas rngon pa de rnams kyi sde dpon gang yin pa des/rngon pa de rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag rang rang gi lus la 'bod cing 'dug shigro dang
449b6('dul ba): kho bo kho na 'gro'o zhes/des gtor mi'i cho ga byas/go bgos mnga' dug can lag la thogs/gzhu brdungs te/glang po che tshol zhing spong ba las/phyogs der phyin pa
449b7('dul ba): das skyes pa kyi/rlung mo dang spyan cigadog 'gyur rgya zhing dgas rgya kyi 'dug pa nga /skyes pa/srid pa la dru ba ba du ldan la phyogs su
450a1('dul ba): tshon dam pa me tog kun da zla ba dang //rba ma 'o ma dang no ba mo'i mdog can do//gang ri ma tshogs pa 'gro ba lta bur do yis mdzong //glang chen mchog/
450a2('dul ba): gi dbang po zla ba 'dra ba de'i//mche ba drug pa zla ba'i 'od zer ltar smra ba//pad+ma dkar po'i phung chen gyen du 'phags pa la//pad+ma'i rtsa lag dri med sdug cig rte mgo
450a3('dul ba): de nas rngon pa des lus la gos ngur smrig bgos/mnga' gzhu chen du bcig nas 'khri shing tshang tshing gi nang nas 'jub cing gom pa brtan te dpe bus nyo bar song
450a4('dul ba): ba dang /de nus bal glang mo des rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas/des khyim thab de la smras pa/lha tshur spyon/mi zhig mchi yis gzhan du bzhud do//des
450a5('dul ba): smras pa/mI ci 'dra ba zhig/gos ngur smrig can zhig go//byang chub sems dbus smras pa/gral ti lta yin te/ni ste de la ngur smrig yod na bge ma tsha zhig/du
450a6('dul ba): smig las ni mi dge mI 'byung ngo //de tI'i phyir zhe na/'di nr-i snying rje'i bdag nyid byams pa yid ldan pa//gzhan gsod dga' ba spangs pa rnams kyi rgyal
450a7('dul ba): mtshan te/zla bas sim pa 'ba' shig byed kyis gdung men ltar//'di la so 'jigs pa mi 'byung 'di las zhi ba thob//de nas bal glang mo de dang //
450b1('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' de yang bag tsha ba med par rgyu bar brtsams pa las/de nas rngon pa des tshang tshing gi nang du zhugs na/mda' dug can gyis gnang du bsnun to//de nas bal glang mo des/
450b2('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/lha cing chos gos can las bsnyengs par byung ngam ma byung /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/snying gi sdug pa ma bying ma byed cig/nyes 'di thub
450b3('dul ba): ngo'i ni bza' 'di'i min gyis nyes 'di nyon mongs dbang du song ba yi//sems ldan snying rje rnam par spangs pa yi//skye bo ma rmongs sems ldan rtog patson//su yis gser
450b4('dul ba): gyis g.yog pa'i lcags la ni/mi rnams slu bar byed ces bsams nas su//gser de lcags dang 'dra ba nyid du lta//'di yi mda' dang gzhu dang yid gdug pa//gang yin de
450b5('dul ba): ni gdug pa nyid du shes//ngur smra re mchog tu zhi ba 'od yang ni//rtag tu zhi ba nyid du blo yis rtogs//gnas ba la glang mo de mi bzod pa skyes nas khyim thab la smras pa//bdag ni
450b6('dul ba): tshig 'di dag gis bde bar basbyin pa khyod gsod pa btang snyom su bgyid rngo mi phrog gis/bdag gis 'di'i yan lag dang /nying lag rnams sgrogs g.yeng dbug gsheg ga
450b7('dul ba): par dgyi'o//de nas byang chub sems dngos 'dzum phyung ste dras pa/e ma'o nyon mongs pa'i 'byung po gso ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rlung ma'i mngon par zhen pa rung ba yin no//ci 'di
451a1('dul ba): yang mi shes sam/'byung blo gdan d+his thengs pa sems blangs pa//nad pa des ni sman pa mI bkur te/de la sman pa gnod pa mi byed kyi//'byung ba de
451a2('dul ba): nyid zil gyis mnan nas 'joms//de bzhin nyon mongs gdon gyis thebs pa yi//skye bo sems rmongs 'di ni sdig par byed//de la bdag shos nyon mongs gnod
451a3('dul ba): byed kyi/nyon mongs pa yis pham byas rnams la min//lhan cig spyod ma bdag gis byang chub thob nas srid gsum 'di//grags pas kun bkang nyon mongs g.yo
451a4('dul ba): tsan dran 'dul brtan pa dang /drang po 'joms byed phyir klag bcud dang btag cing bskam po dang /rab tu bsgoms pas ring po mi phyogs shin tu tshar bcang bya//de nas
451a5('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs rnams kyis//ba lo glang mo de snying rtse bri bar byas pas cang mi smra bar 'dugs de nas glang po che'i tshogs de/byang chub sems dpa'i drung
451a6('dul ba): du'ade ba dang /byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/glang po che 'di dag gos 'di nyid du rngon pa 'di la gnod pa bskyed na mi rung ngo snyam mo//'di ni chos nyid yin te/
451a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis log par ltung bar 'gyur gyi/sems kyi ni ma yin pas/de rngon pa de'i mdun du song nas/mi'i
451b1('dul ba): skad kyis ma 'jigs shig ces smras te/dbugs phyung nas brang 'og tu smras te 'dug go/glang po che de rnams kyang skad cig btags nus/phyogs de nas gzhan du btang ngo //glang
451b2('dul ba): ba che rnams dong ba dang des rngon pa la smras pa/kye ning rje shes par gyis shig/glang po che rnams dong gis da ni rang gi dgos pa byos shig/dzin pas bsams pa bdag 'dra ba'i mi
451b3('dul ba): ni tha shal yin te/nga dag dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba 'dis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag gis dad pa bskyed do snyam nas/de skad phyung ste ngus pa dang de nas byang chub sems dpas
451b4('dul ba): smras pa//kye nang rje ci'i phyir du/rngon pas smras pa/brgyab po/byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' nas po sems pa/ma la bdag gis skyabs byas pa'i tshe gnod par 'gyur ba
451b5('dul ba): 'am/bal glang mo 'dis bdag gsod pa la mi b.rad pa skyes pas/'di la mi dga' ba cung zad cig byas par gyur tam snyam nas/rngon po de la smos pa/kye nad rje khyod su zhig
451b6('dul ba): gis brgyab/de nas rton pa de mag mchi ma'i dba' rlabs kyis gang bzhin du smras pa/glang chen dbang po khyod kyi ni//lus la bdag gri mnga' lis brgyab//khyod kyis yon
451b7('dul ba): tan tshogs kyi mangs//bdag gi sems la brgyab par gyur//dug can mda' yis phig pa yis//lus rnams skyes par 'gyur ba ste//yon tan gyi ni mangs phog pa'i//
452a1('dul ba): mam pa rnams no/sum 'gyur//bshad ma la yang steng drug/'di du gang la hU~M gyur pa//snron+nan+da tanA r+m+ma maN+Da Sh+Tha ts+tsha//yon tan du //
452a2('dul ba): su yis nus//'dor na bdag ni mi snyam pA'i//blo yang bdag la mi 'byung gi/bdag lus yon tanas stong pa//'di la tshig pang ba skyes//me yi sha tshugs ldan yang
452a3('dul ba): bdag/drang 'gro'i skyes gnas song ba yin//glang chen mchog khyod dung 'gro yi//skye gnas sha tshugs 'chang yang mi//sha tshugs tsam gyis bud 'gro'am//mra'i
452a4('dul ba): yang brtsi ba ma yin gyi//gang la yon tan nyer dmigs pa//dro ni mar zhes bya bar dran//byang chub sems dpa' smras pa//yon tan gyis bstod pa me byed pa'i tshig
452a5('dul ba): gis gnyam gyi bar chad pathong la/don ci zhig gi phyir khyod kyis ngal pangs bsnun pa myur du smros shig/des smras pa/rgyal po'i nan tur gyis bri dag gis
452a6('dul ba): bam yin pa 'di byas te/khyod las dgos pa zhig yod do//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/gal te de lta na la byas thong la//lag pa gnyis ni myur rkyong
452a7('dul ba): la//ci 'dod pa ni blang bar gyis//byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni//mi btang cung zad med pas long //bdag go sha 'di bcad nas khyer ba 'am//mtshob
452b1('dul ba): rnams kyang 'dod par byed la ra//'di ni gzhan la brtse ba'i phyir bskyod pas//lus 'di la ni ji ltar dga' bar gyis//mya ngan las pa'i grong khyer 'jug nus kyang //labar
452b2('dul ba): ba bgrod da//'a bdag ni zhugs pa gang //thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa//gzhan la brtse ba de'i rgyu yin no//denas rngon pa dngango tsha ba smos kyang //rgyal po nan
452b3('dul ba): tural busems nas smras pa/khyod kyi mche ba rnams dgos las so//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/dal gyis phyeng la khyer cig/des smras pa/khyod nyid kyis thugs
452b4('dul ba): dpag mdzod cig/bdag ni khyod kyi mche ba 'byin mi phod do//de ci'i phyir zhe no//gal te snying rje'i bangag nyid can//khyod kyi mtsho ba rnams phyung ni//byam so pa ma yis dris
452b5('dul ba): bsregs nas//bdag gi log gnyis mi ltung ngam//byang chub sems dpas smras pa//gal te de lta na nga nyid kyis byung la sbyin no zhes de nas des mche ba rtsa ba shin tu ring
452b6('dul ba): du drug pa dug phyung ba dang /bdag nyid chen po de las khrag byung ste/de mthong nas gzhan dag gi dbar byas pa/mche ba ba ton pa las byung khrag gis mthong ka kun nas bya
452b7('dul ba): podol//me tig ku mu ta bkram mngag sta bu li lus de dang mo ldan rnam par mdzes//rasrang labs khongs pa'i ri bo 'od zer mdzes dang sngon gyur ba'i//rtse mtshon gyi btsag
453a1('dul ba): gos kha bsgyur chu yis gas pa gsob gtor ba bzhin//de nas byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid spro ba spring ba'i phyir smras pa/snying khyod du na
453a2('dul ba): brtan par mnos shig rmongasu ci zhig yod//phongs par gyur dang mgon med 'jig rten lo yang blta bar gyis//khyod ni skye bo'i 'chi ba'i dang du song ba rnams kyi mgo
453a3('dul ba): de ltas 'dir ni de zhum bya ba'i tshe ma yin//blar skabs der na mkha'i ngos kyang yam tshan gyi yi rangs pa'i lha rnams kyis gang /ya mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byung ngo //de nas lha
453a4('dul ba): zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i las shin tu bka' ba spyod pa de mthong nas smras pa/grogs po bdag nyid chen po'i gnas gang yin pa 'di ni ye mtshan che ste/mchi
453a5('dul ba): ba rnams ni byung ba yi//tshor bas nyam thag gyur kyang de//lhag pa'i byas ma dang ldan pa'i sems//byang chub las kyang mi ldog go/de nas lha gzhan zhig gis de
453a6('dul ba): la smras pa/mche ba phyung ba las byung ba'i//sdug bsngal rang gis myong yang de'i//snying rje dmyal ba la gnas pa'i//sems can rnams la mngon 'phel ba/
453a7('dul ba): gang dag yin pa de'i sems//byang chub las ldog ga la 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpes mche ba de dag phyung nas rang nyid thogs te/cang mi smra bar 'dug
453b1('dul ba): de nas rngon pa mi dga' ba skyes te/ci 'dis rang gi mche de dag gzung nas//sbyin par gtong mi 'dod dam snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i bsam pa shes nus//
453b2('dul ba): me tog kun da lta bu'i sna mngon du brkyang nas//grogs po byeg mche zhig ces smras te/ku mu ta dang zla ba dang /pad+ma'i rtsa 'dro mche ba'i mchog/drug po 'di dag khyod sbyin zhe//
453b3('dul ba): bdag gis bzung gi bde bar 'dug/skad cig tsam zhes sdod gcig dang //len pa po dang nye bar ni//de'i bar gyi sdug bsngal gyis//gdungs pa'i yid rab dang bar bya//
453b4('dul ba): gal te khyod ni ci ste bdag brtags nas//khyod kyis sems ni rab tu dang bar bya//bdag ni gsod 'khru g.yon can ngo tsha med//de la go bar gyis shig snyam sems na//
453b5('dul ba): khyod kyi nyos spyad gdug dang gzhu gdug pa//de dang mda' rnon khyud du gsad nas ni//ngur smrig 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyur pa de//mthong nas yid ni rab tu dang bar bya//
453b6('dul ba): sbyin pa kha cig len pa las 'dug ste/de bzhin gzhan ni sbyin po po las 'dug/de yi phyir na 'dir ni rang sems la//yon gyi dag pa yang dag bskyed par 'bad//
453b7('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan yin no snyam nas/ngur smrin de nyid la rtog cing sems rab tu dang bar byas te/mche ba rnams rang gi
454a1('dul ba): lag nas byin nas smras pa/dug can mdar yis phog nas bdag gi snying la ni/mi dga' chung zad ma gyur bden pa gang yin pa'i//bden pa
454a2('dul ba): de yis yang dag byang chub mchog thob nas//'gro ba nyam thag sdug bsngal dag las yongs thar bya//rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/glang po che//
454a3('dul ba): rgyal po mche ba drug par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa zhes
454a4('dul ba): bya bar gyur te/rgyal po chen po de na dus byams pa'i sems nye bor bsgrubs pa dang /bya dka' ba'i sbyin pa yongs su btang bas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
454a5('dul ba): po'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga nyid byams pa'i sems dang /btang bka'i sbyin pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam
454a6('dul ba): dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsam yin no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ri bong du gyur pa na//
454a7('dul ba): drang srong la bdag nyid kyi sha byin pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa na ri khrod chu mig dong /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /rtsa ba phun sum
454b1('dul ba): tshogs pa zhig nA/drang srong bka' thub drag po can/'bras bu dang /rtsa ba dang /chu spyod pa/g.yang gzhi dang /shir shun gyon pa/sbyin srid byed pa zhig gnas so//drang srong de'i//
454b2('dul ba): grogs po ri bong mi skad du smra ba zhig yod de/de nyin par drang srong gi drung du song son po dang /phyag byas te/gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par mgu bar byed pas/de
454b3('dul ba): gnyis pa dang bu kho na bzhin sdug pas gnas par gyur to//ji tsam dus 'das pa dang /tha na cheni byung ste/de 'ba'i chu dang /klung rnams chu chung par gyur cing /shing rnams
454b4('dul ba): me tog dang /'bras bur mi ldan par gyur to//de nas drang song de sti gnas de na kha zas dang bral ba lhag par dag par ma gyur nas/de ga yang bezhi dang /shing shun rnams bsdu
454b5('dul ba): bar brtsam so//de nas ri bong gis de de lta bu la zhugs pa mthong nas/dris pa/drang srong chen po gang du bzhud /drang srong gis smras pa/grong 'dab tu song la der bcos pa'i/
454b6('dul ba): bsod snyoms kyis 'tsho bar bya'o//de nas des drang srong gi tshig thos nas/gdung ba skyes te/pha ma dang bral bar sems shing /rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/drang srong
454b7('dul ba): de la smras pa/bdag ma dor cig/gzhan yang khyims gnas pa ni/nyes pa du mas dkrugs pa lags la/dgon pa na gnas pa ni yon tan du ma phun sum tshogs pa lagaso///
455a1('dul ba): des lan du ma smras na yang ldog tu ma btub nas/de nas ri bong gis smras pa/gal te des na 'on kyang re shig deng la bAzhes la/ji ltar dgyes pa
455a2('dul ba): bzhin du srang bzhud cig/de nas drang srong de 'di snyam du sems te/'dis de ring nges par bdag kha zlas la mgron du 'bod par 'dod de/'di ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
455a3('dul ba): skyong ba'i srog chag 'di dag ni/sogs pa la brtson pa yin snyam nas/des de la khas blangaso//de nas me'i spyad pa byas nas/khas zas kyi dus la bab po dang /ri
455a4('dul ba): bong song ba nas/drang skyong de la bskor ba byas te/bzod par gsol ba brtsams pa/drang srong chen po bdag drod 'gro'i skyes gnas su skyes pas blangs pa dang /dor
455a5('dul ba): bam tshal nas khyod la nings pa cung zad ci bogyis pa bdag la bzod par mdzod cig ces smras nas/de ma thag tu mo'i nang du mchong so//de nas drang srong de mi dga'
455a6('dul ba): ba skyes te/ngom zlum gnag la mchi ma zag cing bu sdug pa gcig pu la bya ba bzhin du khyud nus smras pa/bu 'di ci zhig byed par brtsams/ri bong gis smras
455a7('dul ba): pa/drang srong chen po dgon par bgyis par mdzod la/bdag gi shas nyin zhag gcig gi 'tsho ba mdzod cig/gzhan yang nags su skyes pa'i ri bong la tu
455b1('dul ba): dag dang /maun sran sde'u dang /'bras thug chen po ni mA mchis/bdag gi lus ni zhugs su legs par bskol ba 'di//'di ru gsol la dang la bkru' thub na gus su
455b2('dul ba): bzhugs par mdzod//de rnam drang srong des ri bong gi tshig thos nas mi dga' ba skyes te smras pa/gal te de lta na khyod dga' ba ltar ci byung ba byung /'di nyid du srog der
455b3('dul ba): bar byas te/grong gi mthar mi 'gro'o//ri bong gis tshig de thos nas/yid dga' bor gyur te/mgo bstod nas nam mkho'i ngos logs su bltas te/gsol ba 'debs par
455b4('dul ba): zhugs shing smras pa/dgon pa la ni gnas bcas te//bdag nyid dben pa la dge' na//bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis ni//dbang chen lha yis char phob shig/ces smras
455b5('dul ba): po'i mod la/byang chub sems dpa'i mthus//dbang po chen po'i gnas g.yos par gyur to//lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas ci las byung bltas
455b6('dul ba): na/byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin nas/ji tsam lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang phyug chen po'i char phab ste/des bsti gnas de slar rtswa dang /shing gel ba dang /
455b7('dul ba): sman dang /me tog dang /'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur to//de nas drang srong des dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri bong la brten nas de na gnas te/mngon par shes pa lnga mngon
456a1('dul ba): sum du byas so//de nas drang srong gis smras pa/kye re bong bya dka' ba'i brtson 'grus 'di dang snying rje 'di lta bus mi zhig don du gnyis/des smras
456a2('dul ba): pa/'jig rten long ba/'dron pa med pa/yongs su 'dren pa med pa/sems can ma bsgral rnams bsgral ba dang /ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /dbugs
456a3('dul ba): ma byin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur par bya'o//de nas drang srong des tshig 'di
456a4('dul ba): zlothos nas/ri bong la smras pa/gang gi tshwa khyod sangs rgyas su gyur pa de'i tshe/bdag la yong dgongs shig/ri bong gau smras pa/de bzhon du bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das
456a5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/ri bong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na/ri bong der gyur te//
456a6('dul ba): rgyal po chen po de na ngas bya bka' ba bdag nyid yongs su btang bas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang nga
456a7('dul ba): de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /rkyen tsam dang /tshogs tsam yin no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla ni med pa yang dag par
456b1('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i byur ba dang ma long ba phrag pas khyer ba gang yin pa de nyon nu /rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bA ra na so'i grong khyer du//
456b2('dul ba): rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba/'thab pa dang /thab me dang /khrug khrig dang
456b3('dul ba): 'gyed pa dang /ches rkun med cing rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/'bras dang /bu ram shing dang /ma ho phun sum tshogs pa la chos kyi rgyal po//chos dang ldan pa/chos bzhin gyis
456b4('dul ba): rgyal srid byed do//de'i mdun na 'don gyi bram ze'i bu ljang ku zhes bya ba rig pa'i gnas par brgyud kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa dang /dad pa bzang ba/dge ba'i bsdam pa can/bdag
456b5('dul ba): la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/snying rje can/pho dang ma la sri zhu byed pa yod do/bu ni cig pu drir zad la/pha dang ma de dag kyang rgas nas mig nyams te mdongs
456b6('dul ba): la thugs pa dang /de nas de'i phams rgyas po tshangs sbyin la gsol pa/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ljang ku 'di mdun na 'don du dbang bskur du gsol/bdag cag bka'
456b7('dul ba): thub kyi nag su mchi lags so//de nas rgyal po tshang sbyin gyis ljang ku la smras pa/ljang ku khyod mdun na 'don gyis shig/des smras pa/rgyal po chen po bdag mdun na 'don
457a1('dul ba): mi 'tshal te/bdag ni rgas pa/nyams chung ba/dbang po nyams pa rnams kyi rim gro 'tshal rtswa lug so//de nas ljang kus khyim na gnas pa dang /mdun
457a2('dul ba): na 'don mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du spangs nas/pha ma'i grog su nags na gnaso//de ning bar longs nas pha ma gnyis la so shing dang /chu gtsang mas bsnyen bkur byed do//
457a3('dul ba): de nas de'i 'og tu lha la me'i sbyin sreg gis mchod sbyin byas nas/phyis 'bras bu dang /rtsa ba'i phyir nags khrod du 'jug go/de nas 'bras bu dang /rtsa ba dang /chu bsil ba
457a4('dul ba): khyer te pha ma la byin nas/de'i 'og tu phyogs gcig tu song nas/bsam gtan la brtson pa ro gnas te/rimA pa de lta bus dus 'da' bar byed de//ji tsam nyi ma gzhan
457a5('dul ba): zhig la nang par sngar langs te/pa dang ma'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nus gsol te//rmi lam du mthong ba rigri par byed cing smras pa/bdog gi g.yar lam sbrul nag
457a6('dul ba): byos/bdag lus shin tu zos pa dang /bdug ni zhags pa nago pos yis//bcings nas lho phyogs khrid pa rmis//ga yAr lam 'jigs byed mthong dag gi/snying la
457a7('dul ba): dogs pa deng bdag la//bla ma dang bral shin tu na//mi bzang 'byung bar 'gyur snyam bgying //ji tsam ni pha ma de gnyis kyis dbugs phyung nas/nyi ma la kha ltas te
457b1('dul ba): 'dug nas/bden pas gsol ba btab ste/ril ba khyer nas chu len tu song ngo //de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin ri dgas 'chor du chas te/dka' thub kyi nag der zhugs pa dang /
457b2('dul ba): rgyal po de sgra grags par phog pa zhig ste/des ri dgas kyi sgra lta bu zhig thos nas/gzhu rno drung du bkang ste/'das 'phangs pas/ljang ku'i snying kar phog par gyur to//de nas
457b3('dul ba): mda' gnad du phog bas sa la 'gyel kyang de rang gi sdug bsngal khyad du gsad nas/pha ma kho na'i mya ngan byed cing smras pa/mnga' cig bsnun pas bdag dang ni//dbang po
457b4('dul ba): nyams par gyur pa yi//pha dang de bzhin ma dag dang //bdage bag skye bo gsum bsad do//de nas rgyal pos de thos nus 'ongs te dris pa/ci ste nga'i mda' gcig bsnun pasna
457b5('dul ba): skye bo gsum bsad/de nas ljang kus snying rje rje skad du ngus nas/rgyal po la smras pa/bdag pas ches ni nyam chung ba'i//pha ma yang ni ljongs par gyur//bdag kyang mda' yi
457b6('dul ba): bosnun pas na//kye bo gsum ni 'chi bar 'gyur//de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag la dngangs nas/ljang ku la 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze'i khye'u ngas nyes pa byas
457b7('dul ba): te mi shes nas/mda' 'phangs kyis nga la dmod pa 'dor du ma gzhug par/pha ma la gsol ba byas pa'i rig so//de nas ljang kus gus pa dang bcos pas/rgyal po
458a1('dul ba): dbugs 'byin par byed de/rgyal po chen+da po bdag par mchis pa rnams la dbang zhig mchis na/snying can dam/ bo la byams pa dang /'jig
458a2('dul ba): rten pha rol la blta ba lags pos//dmad pasku mo brnyes shig/yang smras pa/bdag gi bla ma gang na bar//ril ba 'di ni snyoms mdzod cing //de dag gi ni rkang bkru ba//
458a3('dul ba): tha ma 'di ni lags par 'gyur//bdag gis tshig gis rkang la phyag mdzod la/'di skad ring por mi thogs par mthar ni gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang
458a4('dul ba): gsungs shig/de nas rgyal po rang kho nas ril ba khyer te nags khrod du chas pa dang /de'i tshe phyogs bzhir mi ma yin pa che thang du 'khrugs par gyur to//de nas yod pa
458a5('dul ba): de gnyis cig la gcig smras pa/ljang ku 'di ni mtsho'i 'gram du ring mo zhig lon no//de nas de'i mas smras pa/de ltar khro mo'i lteng ku de//pad+ma ud pa la gal pa'i mtsho//
458a6('dul ba): ngadang pa sgra snyan 'byin pa na//ri dgas lhan cig rtse bar byed//de nas rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang /de'i rting sgra las drang srong de dag gis smras pa/snying du sdug cing mthong
458a7('dul ba): dga' bo//ljang ku ci ste nang du 'jug/pha ma nyams tshud bkres pa yis//nyam thag pa la ci zhig ga tse//de yi dga' nas snying rje rje skad du smras pa/kho bo ni ljang ku ma yi
458b1('dul ba): //kho bo rgyal po tshangs sbyin no//byon pa legs tshur khyod badre'am//gdan 'di la ni bzhugs shig dang //ljang ku chab dang 'bras bya dag/thogs nas dro'u ro 'dir mchi'o//
458b2('dul ba): mi dbang ljang ku zhes bgyi bo//yon tan rnams ldan rang bzhin byams//de yi byams pa'i stobs kyis 'dir//ri dgas dang ni bya rnams gnas//de nas rgyal pos drang srong
458b3('dul ba): gi rkang pa gnyis la btugs nas/mchi ma zag cig skud 'dar 'dar por smras po/ljang ku ni nags tshal 'di'i nang du snying la mangs phog ste/srog gis lhag ma cung
458b4('dul ba): zad cig lus shing 'dug go/ril ba chus bkang ba 'di ni des bskur te/'dis khyed gnyis kyi rkang pa'i khrus tha ma mdzod cig de gnyis kyis thos nas brgyal te sa'i steng du
458b5('dul ba): 'gyel to//de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis chus gtor nas bslang ba dang /de gnyis snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don pa/rgyal po chen po de 'gum pas bdag cag kyang 'gro
458b6('dul ba): du bso//de lta mod kyi phyogs gang na mchis pa der bdag cag khrid cig dang ci nas bu de ma gum pa la reg pa bgyi'o de nas rgyal po khyod shug gi nyi ga khrid de phyogs der phyin
458b7('dul ba): pa dang /de'i srog gi lha gau ma cung zhig lus nas/de nas de'i pha mas/ljang ku'i lus la kun du phyugs nas smras pa/sdug pa 'di ni su yis bskyed//ljon shing dmau pa
459a1('dul ba): su yis bcad//de nas rgyal pos rkang pa gnyis la btugs nas smras pa/kho bos sdig pa'i las kyis su//nags tshal nang nas rgyu ba na//
459a2('dul ba): khyed cag gi ni bu gcig pa//'di ni mda' yas bsnun par gyur//de nas de'i pha maM dag snying rje rje skad du smre zhing bden pas gsol bar byed pa/bu khyod kyis ni pho ma
459a3('dul ba): lo//bsnyen bkur lha lA me yi ni//sbyin sreg byas pa'i bden pa gang //des ni dug kyang zhi bar shog/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byon gyi gnas g.yos par gyur
459a4('dul ba): nas/des sa g.yos pa 'di ci las gyur ces brtags na/bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' gnad du mdas phog ste/dug gis glongs pas sdug bsngal
459a5('dul ba): bar gyur pa mthong ngo //de nas gnas nas babs nas/bdud rtsi btab ste pha ma'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang /lha rnaMs kyi dbang po'i mthu gang yin pa dang /zug rngu byung ba brang yin pa des
459a6('dul ba): rma yang rub du gi shuDa de yA zhi nas ljang ku sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar nas/yun ring por pha dang /ma gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
459a7('dul ba): sbal pa/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na ljang ku zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin to/rgyal po chen po nges pha ma gnyis la
459b1('dul ba): sten bkur byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang 'a dri ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu/
459b2('dul ba): kyi rgyu tsam dang /rkyen tsam+ba dang /tshogs tsam yin no////'dul ba gzhi/bam pozhi dgu pa/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de
459b3('dul ba): nyon cig/'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyis pha ma dag/smyung ba la 'jog par byed/mer 'jug par byed tshur 'jug par byed pa/dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de ngas thams cad
459b4('dul ba): kyi thams cad du bcad do//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/nyan thos du ma mngon par shes pa
459b5('dul ba): lnga la bkod pa gang yin pa nyon cig/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bA ra na se'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal sring byed de/'byor pa
459b6('dul ba): dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang mi ming pos gang ba/'thag pa dang /'theb mo dang /khrag khrug dang /'gyed pa dang /tshe mau kun med cing /nad
459b7('dul ba): rab tu zhi ba/'bras dang /bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa dang /bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byed du 'jug blo//rkya
460a1('dul ba): po tshangs sbyin de'i chung ma ni tshangs ldan ma nyes bya'o//rdzing ni tshangs ldan zhes bya'o//rgyal po tshungs sbyin bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod nas/zhi ba
460a2('dul ba): dang /chu lha dang /lus dran dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa/lha'i khyad par le gsol ba 'dobs shing /'di lta ste/kun dka' ra ba'i lce dag dang /
460a3('dul ba): tshal gyi lha dag dang /bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /sum mdo'i lha dag dang /gtor ma lon pa'i lha dag dang /lhan cig skyes pa dang /chos 'thun pa dang /rtag tu rje su 'brang
460a4('dul ba): ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so//'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu pho dang /bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/
460a5('dul ba): de ni da lta ma yin te/gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na/re re la yang 'di lta ste/dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro//'on kyang gnas
460a6('dul ba): gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las ma'i mngal du bu 'chags par 'gyur te/gsum po dag gang zhe na/pho dang ma gnyis chags par gyur ci'i 'dus pa dang //ma
460a7('dul ba): yang rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /dri zanya bor gnas pa ste/gnas gsumo po de dag mngon du gyur pa las/bu bo dang /bu mo dag smyem 'gyur ro//deng
460b1('dul ba): gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na//bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dam bcas pa la brten pa'i sems can zhig/sems
460b2('dul ba): can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos te/btsun mo tshangs ldan ma'i mngal du zhugaso//bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la/ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/lnga gang zhe na
460b3('dul ba): skyes po chags par gyur pa shes shing /chags pa dang bram ba shes pa dang /dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /gang las
460b4('dul ba): mongal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang /khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon
460b5('dul ba): par rten cing 'dug go//de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas khyim thab la smras pa/rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa na/'di ltar bdag gi dgu g.yas par
460b6('dul ba): rten cing mchis pas/nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyis/dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/de yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas kho bo yun ring po nas/mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i ngo
460b7('dul ba): mthong ba dang /kho bo dang 'thun par skye zhing /mi 'thun par mi skye bo dang /kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /bgo skal la spyod pa dang /khro bo'i/
461a1('dul ba): rigs brgyud yun ring du gnas par bsgrub pa dang /bdag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag nyung ngu 'am/mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dgra byin//
461a2('dul ba): zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/'di dri gnyis gang du skyes der 'gro zhing /rjesu 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis yon sngo bar byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod par byed do//
461a3('dul ba): de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste/mngalda na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir glang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag
461a4('dul ba): dang /dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /sman pas bcas pa'i kha zas ha cang mi grang ba dang /hau cang mi dro ba dang /ha cang mi kha ba dang /ha cang mi sbyar ba dang /ha cang lon tshwa mi
461a5('dul ba): che ba dang /ha cang mi mngar ba dang /ha cang mi tsha ba dang /ha cang mi basma bA dang /kha ba dang /sgyur ba dang /lan tshwa dang /mngar ba dang /tshwa ba dang /bska ba dag rnam par spangs
461a6('dul ba): pa'i zas dag dang /ngo shal dang /se mo do dang /rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga'i ba'i tshal na rnam parwa spyod pa lta bu dang /khri nas khrir dang /khri'u nas khri'ur
461a7('dul ba): sgyus zhing /shod kyi sa gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du bcug go/de nas btsun mo tshangs
461b1('dul ba): ngas dus gzhan zhig na 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/kye ma'i lhas grong khyer gyi shar skor sbyin pa dag btang /bsod nams byas shing /lha phyogs dang /mu phyogs dang /byung b+h+yom
461b2('dul ba): dang /dbus dang /sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag btang /bsod nams dag byas la/brtson thams cad thar par byas kyang ci ma rung zhes bya snyam po dang /de nas rgyal/
461b3('dul ba): po tshangs sbyin gyis/btsun mo tshangs ldan mo las mnyan nas/grong khyer gyi shar sgor sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dag byaso//lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs
461b4('dul ba): kyi sgo dang /grong khyer gyi dbus dang /sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dgo byas nas/btson thams cad thar bor byaso//gzhan yang btsun mo tshangs
461b5('dul ba): ldan ma 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyed te/kye ma'o bdag lha dang thabs gcig gru bo che'i lding khang du zhugs te/tshangs ldan gyi rdzing du rtse ba byed/dgo' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par
461b6('dul ba): byed kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis btsun mo tshangs ldan ma la me nyin na/btsun mo tshangs ldan ma dong /thabs gcig tu gru bo che'i lding khong du
461b7('dul ba): zhugs nas/tshangs ldan gyi rdzing na rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/gru de nyid du khye'u gzugs bzang po//lta na sdug pa/mdzes pa/lpags
462a1('dul ba): pa'i mdol gsor 'dra ba/mgo ba gdug lta bu dang ldan pa/lag pa ring ba/dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/sbyin ma 'jar ba/sna'i gzangs mchog
462a2('dul ba): ba dran pa zhig btsaso//de btsas pa na de'i nye du dag lhags shing 'dus nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu botsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/khye'u yi
462a3('dul ba): cir gdags shes de'i ming 'dogs par byed de/khyi'u 'di ni chu'i nang du btsas pa yin pas/khye'u chu skyes shes bya bar btags so//gzhon nu chus skyes ma ma brgyad//
462a4('dul ba): po//pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma mo gnyis dang /rtse dro grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rje su btad do//de la mo ma
462a5('dul ba): brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /zho dang /med dring /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yod byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis bsring bar byed/
462a6('dul ba): skyed par byed cing /rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do//de nas gzhon nu chu skyes 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gang nas shi 'phos snyam na
462a7('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba nas so//las ci zhig byas ni des na sems can dmyal bar skyes snyam ni/rgyal tshab la drug cu byas pas so//da lta gang du skyes snyam na
462b1('dul ba): me'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes te/gal te slar yang rgyal srid byas na/slar yang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas/ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang thabs shig bya'o snyam//
462b2('dul ba): nas/des 'bye bor rdzus te 'dug go//gang gi nyi ma le de zhon nu chu skyes bcas pa de nyid kyi nyin par/blon po lnga brgya'i bu yang bcos so//de nas nyin re zhing gzhun nu rnams
