494b3('dul ba): byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/sbyin pa rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis su//'gro bar rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni//sngon gyi rgyal dbang
494b4('dul ba): rnams kyi ma bsgral ba//skye bo'i tshogs dag bo dag gis bsgral bar bya//bdag gis skye dgu legs bskyangs las byung ba 'am//btang ba las byung bsod nams yod pa gang //
494b5('dul ba): des ni sangs rgyas nyid thob 'jig rten dag/'dod pa'i rims nad los ni thar bar bya//rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po 'od ldan du gyur pa gang
494b6('dul ba): yin pa de ni/de'i tshe de'i dus na ngo nyid de yin te/ngas der thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med
494b7('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la thog mar bsod snyoms phul lags/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba
495a1('dul ba): yangs pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/yangs pa'i grong khyer du/rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig byung ngo //de'i tshe ston pa shAkya
495a2('dul ba): thub pa zhes bya ba/'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de'i tshe mchog zung dang /bzang po zung ni
495a3('dul ba): shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu zhes bya'o//rim gro byed pa ni dge slong kun dga'o zhes bya'o//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong
495a4('dul ba): gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon pa dang /de rlung shes ches pa'i snyun gyis thebs nas/des tshe
495a5('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la/rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od las maur dang /til mar dang /bu ram chu khyer te shog shig/btsun pa bka'
495a6('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /rdza mkhan yang
495a7('dul ba): pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces smras so//yangs pa'i 'od shes par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das rlung shas che ba'i snyun gyis thebs te/do lo mar dang /til mar dang /
495b1('dul ba): bu dang chu dgos//de nas rdzas mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan nas/myur dang /tal mar dang /bu ram chu khyer te bu dang lhan cig yang
495b2('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /mar dang /til mar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byugs nas/chu 'jam pos sku khrus byas
495b3('dul ba): te/bu rim chu'i btung ba gsol to//des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzod cing 'tsho bar gyur to//dri nas rdza mkhan yengs pa'i 'od kyis de'i
495b4('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam gdab pa/bdag kyang rab tu sbyin pa 'dre yis shAkya'i rigs skyes pa//yon tan rigs dang rus dag mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas
495b5('dul ba): nyid gyur cing //bdag gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar gyi nyams pas 'chi ba yi//pha rol zhi ba rgya tshon 'jigs pa med pa sgrol bar shog/de'i bus kyang sgron lom
495b6('dul ba): btab pa/bdag kyang las 'dis ni gzugs med pa'i chos rnams rto sag pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro byed par 'gyur cig ces byas//rgyal po chen po ji
495b7('dul ba): snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang yid pa de ni nga nyid yin te/de rangs yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thob pa la thog mar
496a1('dul ba): 'an rnams phul na//de da dus kyis drug man mdon sun ga yon mnan /'dum bgan/ ga gag gyu/
496a2('dul ba): babacom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i slad du/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen pa/
496a3('dul ba): bgyis lags/rgyal po chen po re shig grangs med pa dang po la/sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas/'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gri bar//de'i bar bdun khri bdun stong gi/
496a4('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams no ngas mchod do//grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi//rgyal po ngas ni mchod byas te//sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod pa'i phyir//de la skyo bo'i sems
496a5('dul ba): med do//rgyal po chen po grangs med pa gnyis pa la ni/sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nas ni//dbang po'i rgyal mtshon thub pa'i bar//bdun khri drug stong dag gi ni/
496a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod//grangs med gnyis po chang bar ni//rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te//skyes pa de dang de dag tu//nga la skyo ba'i sems med do//
496a7('dul ba): grangs mod pa gsum pa la yang /sangs rgyas legs mdzad nas bzung ste//sangs rgyas 'od srung bar dag to//bdun khri bdun stong nga yis mchod//grangs med
496b1('dul ba): gsum pa de lta ni//rgyal ba ngas ni mad byas to//byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na//de'i chung la sgyu soms med//nga ni byang chub sems dpa' na//sa sa rgyas mchog ni dang
496b2('dul ba): mchog/'jig rten 'dren pa de kun gyis//nga ni sangs rgyas nyid du bstan//ngas ni ston bsams gang yin pa//nga yi smon lam thams cad rdzogs//nga ni sangs rgyas
496b3('dul ba): ra te//sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung //de nas kI sA la'i rgyal po gsal rgyu mAM/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dge' ste rjes yi rang nas/
496b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas sing ngo //de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa kun
496b5('dul ba): dga' bos zhus pa/'jig rten gtso po rnam 'dren pa//grub pa khyod kyi byang chub thugs//theg mang gang du skyid pa dag/sgrol ldan chen phyo badrug la gsung //khyod sngon
496b6('dul ba): byang chub spyad pa na//sangs rgyas ji snyed dus gang du//ji lta bur ni bsnyen bkur mdzad//mi mchog de ni bdeg le gsungs//kun dga' bo mi tshig gsan nam//rkang
496b7('dul ba): gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas//gri li thugs rje mdzad nas su//thub pas byang chub spyod pa gsungs//sangs rgyas 'dod tshigs bral thos shing //glang po drags pa'i
497a1('dul ba): shas chen dang //'jig rten sdug bsngal gyuR+Ya mthong nas//dus ni byang chub sems bskyed do//mi dbang 'od ldan gyur pa na//ngas ni byang chub
497a2('dul ba): 'dod pa'i phyir//ngas ni brtan por dam bcas te//sprin myed po yi sbyin pa btang //nga ni rdza mkhan gyur pa na//sangs rgyas shAkya thub mthong nas//byang chub phyir ni
497a3('dul ba): thog mar ngas//mar dang til mar gyis mchod do//sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu//tshong dpon bu mor gyur pa na//sangs rgyas kau di n+ya mthong nas//ngas ni mau me'i
497a4('dul ba): sbyin pa byas//sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thul ba'i//nga sngon sde snod gsum pa las//dge slong dge 'dun rtsod pa la//dge 'dun la ni bud med skas//tshig gi
497a5('dul ba): nyes byas byung bas nas/mod la bud med nyid du gyur//slar yang sems dang byas pas ni//skyes pa nyid ni thob par 'gyur//sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu//
497a6('dul ba): nga ni rgyal po'i sras gyur tshe//gAcen po rin che ni gtsug gter la//ma ru mye'i sbyin pas mchod byas shing //ngas ni zla gsum drug cu ru//bde mdzad kyi ni zham ring
497a7('dul ba): byas//ngas ni mya ngan 'das pa de'i//mchod rten la ni nor kun phul//nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na//sgra brnyan dbyangs la zla gsum mchod//de yi mchod rten 'thon po ni//
497b1('dul ba): dgu bcu rtsa gcig cig tu bcug/ngani byam zer gyur pa na//sangs rgyas dpal 'byung mthong nas dga'//legs par thal sbyar de nas yang //mi mchog la ni mchod pa b+h+yas//
497b2('dul ba): ngasngon bram zer gyur pa na//bstan bcos du mi 'jigs mad tshe//sangs rgyas phyin par bzhed mdzad pa//nga yi stan la spyan drangs so//sngon ni dka' thub ldan pa yi//
497b3('dul ba): drang srong chos la gnas gyur tshe//sangs rgyas ko'u de n+ya mthong nas//ngas ni ri bo'i kha nas mchongs//drang srong gyur na'ang yid dga' bas//sangs rgyas blta na sdug
497b4('dul ba): mthong nas//rtsa ba dang ni 'bras bu'i phyir//bsti gnas bzhugs pa ngas spyan drangs//'jig rten 'dren pa sbyin mdzes la//drang srong gyur tshe bkur bsti byas/shi
497b5('dul ba): shun yid du 'ong ba yis//ngas ni mo yi mchog bkab bo//de ni rgyal por gyur pa na//yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung spangs nas//byang chub 'dod pa'i ched du nges//yul
497b6('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi zham 'bring byas//sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas//'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar/bdun khri drang ni lnga stong gi/sangs rgyas la ni nga yis mchod//grangs
497b7('dul ba): med gcig ni 'ongs pa yi//rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te//byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na//de tsha nga la skyo sems med//grangs med pa dang po'o//bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa
498a1('dul ba): de'i tshe//'od dang grags par ldan pa yi//sangs rgyas mar mo mdzad mthong nas/ut+pa la sngon po bdun gyis mchod//nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na//
498a2('dul ba): dka' thub spyod ces bya ba yi//sangs rgyas mtshan mnga' mthong nas ni//myi mchog la ni bla res mchod//rgyal por gyur tshe mun 'joms pa'i//skal chen la ni rin
498a3('dul ba): po che//sna tshogs bkri ba'i rol mo yis//mchod pa dag gis bzhes gsol to//kun dga' mi dbang gyur pas//sing+ge sing+ge'i rtsal mnga' la//rin chen yu hA
498a4('dul ba): can gdugs kyis//mi mchog la ni mchod pa byas//rgyal por gyur tshe grong khyer ni//stong phrag drug cu rnamasu yang //me yi nyi ma bad mdzad ni//spyan drangs nas ni
498a5('dul ba): mchod pa byas//'jig rten 'dren pa mi dbang lo//skyo khang las dang de bzhin du//a ger nag po dri dag gis//bram zer gyur tshe zha 'bring byas//grong khyer rgyal
498a6('dul ba): srid 'brel bar ni//bram ze'i sangs rgyas sum cu po//gtsug tor can zhes 'jig rten grags//rgyal por gyur tshe mchod pa byas//grong khyer 'bras 'phrol
498a7('dul ba): dag tu ni//sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa lnga la//ngan tshong dpon gyur pa na//tshangs par spyod pas mchod pa byos//grong khyer dga' ba de nyid du//dri ni tshong dpon gyur
498b1('dul ba): pa'i tshe//sangs rgyas gtsug tor 'jig rten grags//gtsug lag khang gis mchod pa byas//tshong dpon gyur te rgyal ba drug/mchod phyir glang chen rta gser dang /bud
498b2('dul ba): myed rnams dang nor bu yi//rgyan gyis bskyed mos tshal byas so//rgyal por gyur tshe dad pa yis//grong khyer yid 'ong de nyid du//byang chub don du gnyer ba ngas//gtsug/
498b3('dul ba): tor can la skra bregs so//kun dga' bram zer gyur pa no//thub chen ma 'grogs de la ni//byang chub don du gnyer bar ngas//'bras bu mchog gis mchod pa byas/
498b4('dul ba): tshong dpon du ni gyur pA na//'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la//nor bu rin chen gyis mchod cing //gtsug lag khang ni nyams dgas mchong //ded dpon du ni gyur/
498b5('dul ba): pan//byang chub shing gi drung na ni//sangs rgyas legs 'khrungs bzhugs mthong nas//thog mar bsod snyoms la spyan drangs//nga ni ded dpon gyur pa ni//
498b6('dul ba): byang chub shing drung thub pa ni//'jig rten dga' mdzad blo bzang mthong //'khor ni stong dang rab tu byung //da ni ded dpon gyur pa na//sangs rgyas tsa ni dran 'od dpag
498b7('dul ba): med//chu 'jam dang ni til mar dang //bu ram la ni spyan drangaso//kun dga' rgyal por gyur pa na/tshangs sbyin grags po chen po pa//'dren pa la ni zhal zas
499a1('dul ba): dang //thams cad sbyin pas mchod pa byas//bram zer yang ni gyur pa ni//thugs rje chen po 'od zer can//thub pa rkang gnyis mdzog many+dzu
499a2('dul ba): nas//smra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis mchod do//rgyal por gyur nas sangs rgyas ni//don dam gzigs pa grong mchog tu//'jug po de la tA la yi//lo ma'i
499a3('dul ba): bsil yib mchod pa byas//nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa ni//'jig rten gsal mdzad sangs rgyas ni//shAkya thub la me tog gi/sil ma sna tshogs dri sbyar mchod//
499a4('dul ba): grong khyer mchog tu mthor 'phags pa'i//mi mchog 'jug par mthong nas ni//rol mo rnams kyi sgra dag dang //me tog rnams kyi mchod pa byas//rgyal por
499a5('dul ba): gyur tshe dang ba yis//sangs rgyas dam pa zhes bya ba//srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba la//thog mar shing rta dag gis bskyabs//nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na//gtso bo'i
499a6('dul ba): ched du lam bstar cing //dpag tshad brgya ni gong bar yang //me tog khang brtsegs mchod pa byas//sangs rgyas dgra zhi mdzad pa ni//grong khyer gshegs shes ngas
499a7('dul ba): zos nas//lam ni rgyal mtshan yongs dkang ste//rgyal po'i 'byor pas bsu ba byas//nga ni mnyan par gyur pa na//shing rta'i yan lag chu 'gram du//byon pa ngas
499b1('dul ba): ni mthong nas ni//thub pa chu yi rgyun las bsgral//ded dpon byung tsho drad pa yi//shing rta skal ldan chen po ni//ngas ni grub zam btags nas kyang //mtsho chen las ni bsgral
499b2('dul ba): ba byas//nga ni rgyal por gyur pa no//rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas ni//tshangs pa tsanA dan sa mchog gi/ka bar ldan pa'i khang pas mchod//rgyal por gyur tshe sangs rgyas ni//
499b3('dul ba): bcom ldan tshangs pa'i tshe mchod cing //sman sbyin rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas ni//ngas ni yams kyi nad zhi byas//tsen dan ldan la char med tshe/rgyal po lta bu'i sku khrus byas/
499b4('dul ba): de tshe lhas ni char phab pas//skye bo rnams ni skyabs su dong //nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan zla ba la//mchod nas ngas ni bya mos bsgoms pas//bdud
499b5('dul ba): kyis btang ba'i yams nang zhi//mI yi dbang por sngon gyur tshe//ngas ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul ba la//cho 'phrul phyir ni gsol ba btab//rgyal
499b6('dul ba): po dag tu gyur pa na//rin chen ri bo 'od chen ldan//'khor ni brgya stong phrag mang po//mthong nas lo lngar mchod pa byas//bram zer gyur mi dad pa yi//sangs rgyas don
499b7('dul ba): kun bsgrubs pa ni//mtshan dang ldan pa mthong nas kyang //ngas ni spyod pa lnga brgya byas//bram zer gyur tshe yid dga' bos//sangs rgyas dbang po rgyal mtshan mthong //ngas ni
500a1('dul ba): thal mo legs sbyar te//dam pa'i gsod pa'i 'os zhes gsol//sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa nas//thub pa dbang po rgyul mtshan par//bdun khwa
500a2('dul ba): dang ni drug stong gi/sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod//grangs med gnyis pa tshang bar ni//rgyal ba nga yi mchod byas te//byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na//de tshe nga la skyo
500a3('dul ba): sems med//grangs med pa gnyis pa'o//sangs rgyas bde mdzad dam pa la//rgyal por gyur tshe mchod byas nas//mya ngan 'das nas mchod rten portsigs//rgyal srid rab
500a4('dul ba): tu zhi bar byas//rgyal por gyur tshe dang pas ni//sangs rgyas gang bor de skrong lo//tshul dang 'dra bar mchod byas te//chos kyi rgyal po zhes bsgrags so//sangs rgyas
500a5('dul ba): thams cad zil gnon la//tshong dpon gyur tshe legs par ni//rim gro byas shing mi mchog la//de bzhin gser gyi me tog gtor//nga ni tshong dpon gyur
500a6('dul ba): pa na//sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can//thub chen grong mchog gshegs de la//gser gyis dra bas mchod pa byas//nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na//pad+ma dam
500a7('dul ba): pa dpa' chen po//rgyal por grags pa'i grong mchog tu//dngul gyi me tog sil mas gtor//nga ni bram zer gyur pa ni//sangs rgyas grags mchog slob mi yi/
500b1('dul ba): ge 'dun gyis ni mdun bltas pa//mthong nas mi mchog gnas kyis mchod//du ni rgyal por gyur pan//legs gsung byang chub shing drung du//bzhugs pa ngas mdzong byung
500b2('dul ba): po rgyu//shing rta dpung bu chung gis bsrungs//sangs rgyas dri med thub chen la//tshong dpon gyur che bsro khyang dang //mchod rten las dang myur mes ni//de yi tshe na rnam par
500b3('dul ba): mchod//sangs rgyas sad mdzad rdo leb stengs//snyoms par bzhugs pa mthong nas ni//dad pas rol mo'i sgra kun dang //rgyal po'i 'byor pas bzhengs gsol to//
500b4('dul ba): tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na//'jig rten dga' mdzad dgra thul ba//sangs rgyus spyod pas gshegs pa na//lam ni sna tshogs brgyan pas mchod//tshong dpon 'gyur tshe yid
500b5('dul ba): dga' bas//gnas mchog gshegs pa thos nas ni//bskyed mos tshel ni brgyan byas nas//ngas ni gtsug leg khang brtsig so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan skar
500b6('dul ba): 'od la//byang chub 'dod pas dad pa sangs//rgyal po'i mdzad ni ngoms cad las//nor bu rin chen rnams kyis mchod//nga ni rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe//tog gis bdud
500b7('dul ba): rnams bcom byas nas//chos kyi rgyal srid bsgrags pa ni//ngas ni rgyal mtshan kho na btsugs//b+ha ra dra dza blo ldan pa//bram ze mya ngan 'das pa la//rgyal po nga
501a1('dul ba): ni ril ba dang //dbyug gu gtsug lag khang chen byas//nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na//sangs rgyas 'dren pa don gzigs pa//gser dang nor bu
501a2('dul ba): mu tig dang //dri yi snying po rnams kyis mchod//sangs rgyas don kun grub po ni//sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa ni//rgyal por gyur tshe dpung dag gis//tshogs
501a3('dul ba): kun gyis ni mchod pa byas//sangs rgyas don dam gzogs pa ni//grong khyer dram par gshegs pa na//rgyal por gyur tshe rol mo dang //me tog kun gyis mchod pa
501a4('dul ba): byas//nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na//sangs rgyas bka' rgyal rkang gnyis mchog/dri yi snying po de bzhin du//rtsa ba'i dri rnams rab tu gtor//rin chen bkra ba'i phug na
501a5('dul ba): yang //sangs rgyas skar rgyal la ni ngas//de tshe tshigs bcad gcig bstod pas//bskal pa dgu ni phyir bsnyil to//'bru 'tshong du ni gyur pa na//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
501a6('dul ba): rnams gzigs la//de tshe byang chub spyod pa'i phyir//mud ga spar gang phul bas mchod//tshong dpon gyur tshe dras mchod pa//sangs rgyas mchog ni gtsug tor can///
501a7('dul ba): thub pa nyan thos tshogs btsos pa//zhal zos kyis ni zla gsum mchod//tshong dpon du ni gyur pa'i tshe//'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad skyob//skal chen nyan thos
501b1('dul ba): bcas pa las//zhal zas kyi ni gus par mchod//tshong dpon gyur tshe dad pa yis//sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig pa ni//bdog pa kun la spyan drangs nas//tshangs par spyod
501b2('dul ba): phyir blo gros bskyed//tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na//yang dag sangs rgyasra gser thub la//gtsug lag khang brtsigs dad pa yis//khyim med par ni rab tu byung //bram ze'i
501b3('dul ba): khye'u ni bla ma'i tshe//dga' skyong gi ni tshig thos nas//'od srung rkang gnyis mchog las ni//rab tu 'byung ba'i blo bskyed do//byams pa drang srong gyur pa na//rgyal por gyur nas
501b4('dul ba): rim gro byes//byas pa gzo ba rjes dran nas//de nas nga la slar mchod do//gang yang sangs rgyas bde mdzad nas//sangs rgyas 'od srung bar du ni//ngas ni bdun khri bdun
501b5('dul ba): stong gi/rgyal ba rnams ni mchod pa byas//grangs med gsum po tshang bar ni//rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te//sngon ni byang chub spyad pa na//nga la skyo ba'i sems med do//nga ni
501b6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa'i tshe//sangs rgyas mchog ni de rnams mchod//nga ni de dag thams cad kyis//'jig rten mdun du lung bston to//ngas ni sngon bsams gang yin pa//
501b7('dul ba): ngo yi smon lam thams cad rdzogs//de ni sangs rgyas khur bor te//sems can rnams ni rje su bzung //shi bo'i rgyal po rang gyur te//sbyin pa dag ni thams cad btang //nga ni dus
502a1('dul ba): dpog gyur pa'i tshe//sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rdzogs//rgya mtsho'i tshong par gyur pa na//tshul khrims pha rol phyin don du//srog chags rnams ni ma
502a2('dul ba): btang zhing //ngas ni rang gi sha btang ngo //nga sngon drang srong gyur pa na//bzod pa'i pha rol rdzogs bye'i phyir//yan lag rnams ni btugs pa yis//nga yi bzod pa yongs
502a3('dul ba): su rdzogs//mi ma yin mo'i skye rab dang //de bzhin rgya mtsho bskams pa dang //de bzhin bdag ni baudren dga' ba'i//brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rdzogs//sman chen
502a4('dul ba): blon por gyur pa dang //gnag lhas skyesu nga gyur tshe//shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs nas//de bzhin rnga bo che yang bsgrags//bram ze rab 'bar gyur pa na//ral par
502a5('dul ba): mdab chags tshang bcas kyang //bsam gtan las ni ma langs par//bsam gtan pha rol phyin brtson byas//snying rje yongs su bsgom byas shing //pha rol phyin
502a6('dul ba): pa drug rdzogs pas//khur lci ba ni ngas bor te//dam bcas pa yang rdzogs par byas//da dang sangs rgyas gang phyug nas//mchod pa byis pa'i mi mchog ni//de
502a7('dul ba): kun mya ngan 'das par gshegs//nga ni byang chub la gzhag go//rgyal po 'od ldan dbang po nas//thub bo dbang po rgyal mtshan par//sems can bye ba phrag stong
502b1('dul ba): ni//srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral ba byas//'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa//rdzogs sangs rgyas te lha mir bcas//'jig rten 'di ni bsgral pa dang /sgrol bar mdzad pa
502b2('dul ba): smos ci dgos//ngas ni 'jig rten don gyi phyir//mya ngan 'das na'ang chos kyi gru//brtan po dag ni bcu' byas te//brgya stong phrag ni bsgral bar bya//mi gang sangs rgyas
502b3('dul ba): skyibs song zhing //mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas lo//bya ba byed pa'i skyes bu de//'jig rten dag ni sgyid dro ba//gang dag de bzhin gshegs rgyal lo//bya ba cung zad byed
502b4('dul ba): po na'ang de//man+to ris sna tshogs bgrod nas ni//bdud rtsi gau 'phang 'thob par 'gyur//yang dag ji bzhin 'di thos nas//dge ba zungs ni bskyed de bya//du ni mya ngan
502b5('dul ba): 'das 'og tu//srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyam sa re//sangs rgyas mang po'i skabs rdzogs so///sangs rgyas 'od ldan dang /shAkya thub pa dang /ko'u din+ta dang /
502b6('dul ba): 'jig rten 'dren dang /gzhan gyis mi thob dang /rin chen gtsug tor dang /bde mdzad dang /sgra snyan dang /dpal 'byung dang /phan bzhed dang /ko'u di n+ya dang /blta ni sdug
502b7('dul ba): pa dang /spyan mdzes pa dang /yul 'khor skyong dang /mar me mdzad dang /dka' thub mdzad dang /mun sel dang /bde mdzad dang /dbang chen dang gtsug tor can dang /
503a1('dul ba): 'gags pa dang //spyan mdzes dang /legs 'khrungs dang /yid bzangs dang /tsan dran dang /tshangs skyon dang /'od zer can dang /don dam
503a2('dul ba): gzigs dang /shAkya thub pa dang /mthor 'phags dang /dam pa dang /gtso bo dang /dgra zhi mdzad dang /shing rta'i yan lag dang /skal ldan shing dang /tshangs pa dang /
503a3('dul ba): tshangs pa'i tshe dang /tsan dan dang /dbang po dang /dbang po 'dul dang /rin chen ri bo dang /don thams cad grub pa dang /tha ma dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /bzod pa
503a4('dul ba): mdzod dang /rdzogs ldan dang /thams cad zil gnon dang /rin chen gtsug phud dang /pad+ma dam pa dang /grags pa dam pa dang /gsungs stan dang /dri ma med dang /
503a5('dul ba): srad mdzad dang /dgra thul dang /gnas 'jog dang /skar 'od dang /tog dang /drang srong dang /ba ra dA dza dang /don gzigs dang /don dam gzigs dang /don
503a6('dul ba): thams cad gzigs dang /brgyal dang /skar rgyal dang /rnam par gzigs dang /gtsug tor can dang /thams cad skyob dang /log pa dang sel dang /gser thub dang /
503a7('dul ba): 'od srung dang /shAkya thub pa dang /tha ma byams pa'o//sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan rdzogs////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas
503b1('dul ba): shes bya ba gong ma bzhin du ste/de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/mgron med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe gzhan
503b2('dul ba): mu stegs can/kun tu rgyu rab tu mang po rtog khang du lhags shing 'dus par gyur nas/skabs kyi gtam 'di ltar bu dge gleng bar byed de//shes ldan dag shes par gyis
503b3('dul ba): shog ma sngon ni bdag cag la rgyal po dang /blon po dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag dang /grong mi dang /yul pa dang /tshong pa dang /tshong dpon dang //ded dpon rnams kyis
503b4('dul ba): bkur bstis byas//bla mar byas/rjed par byas pas/gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gnas mal dang /nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyang rnyed pa las/da ni dge sbyong
503b5('dul ba): go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba los bkur stir byed/bla mar byed/rjed par byed/mchod par byed ces bya ba nus/sman dang /yo byad rnams shes bya ba'i bar kong ma bzhin no//
503b6('dul ba): des na de ltar bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang /bkuri sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad na/de la bdag cag gi ji ltar bya/de na kha cig gis smras pa/tshangs par spyod pa la/
503b7('dul ba): tshangs par spyad pa skyon yin pas/de la skyon 'di gdags so//kha cig gis smras pa/ji lta bu zhig bya/de rnams kyis smras pa/bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang mo//
504a1('dul ba): mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de la/sring mo dgu tshur dge sbyong grol+la ta mA la skur ba thob shig ces spro bar bya'o//bdag cag gi nang na
504a2('dul ba): kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang mo//mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa gang yin/bram ze'i bu mo rtsa mo yin no//de la spro ba skyed do zhes de rnams kyis do pho nyas bkug ste smras pa/
504a3('dul ba): srang mo shes par gyis shig/sngon ni bdag cag gi bkur sti dang /zhes bya ba nas/nad kyi rkyen+da sman gyi yo byad rnams shes bya ba'i blar gong ma bzhin du'o//da ni dge
504a4('dul ba): sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung bas/'jig rten de la bkur bsti byed pas/bdag cag gi rnying pa dang /bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chud par gyur na/
504a5('dul ba): khyod kyis yal bar dor ra moM/bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtsa mis smras pa/'phags pa dag bdag gis de la ji ltar bgyi lags/sring mo khyod kyi nye du rnams kyi tshad
504a6('dul ba): du/dge sbyong go'u ta ma la kho mo dang lhan cig tu me tshangs par spyod do zhes/khyod skur pa 'debs par spro'am/de lta na bdag gi rnyed pa dang /bskur bsti sngon gyi
504a7('dul ba): gzhan du 'gyur//de skad ces smras pa dang /bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtsa mis gzhan mu stegs can dang /kun tu rgyu rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so//'phags
504b1('dul ba): pa drug dge sbyong ga'u ta ma la ni skur ba 'debs par bdag mi spro'o//sring ma khyod rdotsam du/dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa 'debs pA mi spro ba de tsam du bdag cag drung gtam 'dru
504b2('dul ba): bar mi bya/phebs par smras par mi bya/blta bar mi bya/rnam par blta bar mi bya zhing /khyod gnas thams cad du 'dug tu mi bzhug ste/'gyod pa de cir gyis dus byas nas
504b3('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do//bud med ni shes rab chung ba yin pas/de skye gnas smras paM/'phags pa bdag gi ji ltar bro zhig
504b4('dul ba): bgyi/sring mchu gyi tshur rgyal bu rgyal byed tshal du rgyun du song la dus thag gi tsam lon nas/dge sbyong go'u ma la skur pa thob shig/de nyi ma re re zhing langs te rgyal bu rgyal
504b5('dul ba): byed kyi tshal du song ngo //ji tsamo na lho la snod gcig btsongs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dero song ngo //de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos
504b6('dul ba): 'don myed bzhug so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtsa mi rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/nga nyid kyis las
504b7('dul ba): rnams byas shing bsags pa/tshogs rnyed pa/rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba yod pa bzhin nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams/gzhan du zhig gis
505a1('dul ba): so sor myur bar 'gyur snyam mo//de nas bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rnA mi/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas gsol pa/bdag ni 'di ru sbrum
505a2('dul ba): bgyis nas/chags par 'gyur zhing dga' 'gyur ba//snyan cing 'jebs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis//da ltar chos ni gsung mdzad dam//bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa//
505a3('dul ba): yang dag min pa smra ba dmyal bar 'gro//bram ze'i bu mo rtsa mis gsol pa/gang gis byas nas ma byas zhes sla ba 'ang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dman pa'i
505a4('dul ba): chos can mi ni de gnyi ga/pha rol dag tu 'dra bar 'gro bar 'gyur//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di ste du sems te/kye ma'o bram ze'i bu mo rna mi 'di ni/bcom
505a5('dul ba): ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la yun ring po nas 'tho 'tsham par byed do snyam du bsams nas/rdzu 'phrul gyis snod de sa la ltung bar byaso//de nas bram ze'i
505a6('dul ba): bu mo rtswa mi skyengs nas rings pa rings par slar song ngo //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis bcom ldani 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun
505a7('dul ba): parko sa li rgyal po gsal rgyal la/chos kyi dbang du bgyi ba'i bka' mchid kyang bad+ma'i stsal/gang du thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
505b1('dul ba): thugs bskyed pa yang lung bstan/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la brnyan bkur bgyis pa yang bka' stsal lags pas/ci nas bdag cag mtsho chen po ma
505b2('dul ba): dros par mchis la/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams
505b3('dul ba): la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'chi zhing bzhes pa rnams kyi gdon mi za bar mdzad pa rnams ni bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/
505b4('dul ba): ji srid sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa dang /sems can 'gos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar bya ba
505b5('dul ba): thams cad btul po dang /nyan thos kyi mchog zung cig tu bstan pa dang /mtshams bcad pa dang /skye tsho'i tshe lnga cha btang ba dang /banyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam por
505b6('dul ba): bstan pa dang /grong khyer gsal byar lha las gshegs pa bstan pa dang /yab dang yum gnyis bden pa dag la bkod pa dang /mtsho chen po me dros par nyan thos kyi
505b7('dul ba): dge 'dun dang thabs gocig tu mngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba bstan pa ma mdzad pa de srid du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/rnams yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da'o//don 'di
506a1('dul ba): la ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /thabs gcig mtsho chen po ma dros par sngon gyi las rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas/dge
506a2('dul ba): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mtsho chen po ma dros pa gang na bar 'dong /der rang rang gi sngon gyi las gyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bya'o//btsun pa bka'
506a3('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi lta mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs
506a4('dul ba): gcig tu mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/mtsho chen po ma dros par gshegaso//gnod sbyin gtum po mi bzad gnas pa yid 'ong zhing //me tog sna tshogs///
506a5('dul ba): shing gis rnam par mdzes byas pa//de las rgya mtsho dug can dag tu 'gro ba yi//chu bo chen po bzhi po 'di dag phyogs bzhir 'bab//gang gi sin du de bzhin
506a6('dul ba): pag shu dang //si ti de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs thob pa/ma gtogs mi rnams kyis ni mi bgrod pa//der ni thub po dge 'dun bcas par bzhugs//de nas bcom
506a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa
506b1('dul ba): mdzad pa de'i tshe nas srog chags grog sbur yan chad kyi sems kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur bas/de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nyer dga' bo gnyis
506b2('dul ba): kyis bsams pa/ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam na/mtsho chen po ma dros par las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed par mthong
506b3('dul ba): ngo //de nas de gnyis kyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du pad+ma mdab me stong pa/shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam/bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa/sdong po ni rin po che//
506b4('dul ba): ge sar ni rdo rje las byas pa/pad+ma stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba zhig sprul pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gang yA/pad+ma'i snying po de la bzhugs
506b5('dul ba): so//dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang /pad+ma gzhan rnams kyi snying po la 'khod do//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la snam sbyar
506b6('dul ba): 'drub bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu song la/rab tu byung ba'i zla bo khrid de shog shig/btsun
506b7('dul ba): ba bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgel chen po ma dros pa nas mi snang bar gyur cing /bya rgad kyi phung po'i ri la/tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug ste/
507a1('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ston pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs gcig tu/mtsho chen po ma/
507a2('dul ba): dros pa na/sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba l+r-ing bstan par bzhed nas/khyod la gnyis kyis tshur shog 'dod //des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po//re
507a3('dul ba): shig snam sbyar drubs la/de nas phyis 'gro'o//des smras pa/grogs bya'o//de bzhin du gyis shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul
507a4('dul ba): gyis sor mo lnga char gyis drub par brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa//tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgul gyi bu chen po 'o na lha drub zin du zad med//des
507a5('dul ba): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te khyod mi 'gro na/mthus bkar bar bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus//ske rags rgya cang phrol nas smras pa
507a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyed/bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu can rnams kyi mchog tu bas+thAn+da pA yin na/re shig khyod kyis 'di khyi la/
507a7('dul ba): de nas phyis kho mo khyer cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'i dgal gyi bu chen pos//de drangs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/'odi ni mthu che zhing rdzu
507b1('dul ba): 'phrul che ba yin pas/gal te 'di khyer bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do snyam nas/des de bya rgod phung po'i ro'i spyi la btags so//tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
507b2('dul ba): pos de blas pa dang /bya rgod kyi phung por 'gal bar gyur te/de nas tshe deng ldan pa shA ri'i bu bosams pa/'dis phyi rgod kyi phung po'i de yid khyer bar gyur gyis/mAl
507b3('dul ba): bdag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab la gdagaso snyam nas/des de ri'i rgyal po ri rab la btags pa las/yang tshe dang ldan po mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/de drangs pa dang /ri'i rgyal
507b4('dul ba): po ri rab dang /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga' bo dag kyang g.yos par gyur/ma dros pa yang kun nas 'khrug shing /dge slong gnas brtan gnas brten rnams kyang ldog
507b5('dul ba): par gyur nas/pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug bzhin du/de rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa ci'i slad du klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos
507b6('dul ba): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos pa ma yin te/'on kyang nyan thos chen po gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis
507b7('dul ba): rnam par 'phrul par byed do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'di yang khyer bar gyur gyis/ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi la
508a1('dul ba): gan du sun sa su smra su dras so slong la phyugs byas ma 'phrul ba / ga byu/
508a2('dul ba): d+hU m+bu / sbyin pa dul 'du ba des smras/da u/d+h+ye sbrul gyis rnas pa 'i sna
508a3('dul ba): gag 'dod/da sman pa drug pa rten pa skyeng ga sa smra s+ho/de ste byed ldan pa sa
508a4('dul ba): de'i tshig tu tu dang ldan pa ma ni la sbyi chen ni sbyi pas/mdung ldan pa shA ri'i bram dun sangs smras pa/da ldan pa sa nr-i dgal m+b+hi bu'os
508a5('dul ba): ldan pa khro bos 'das so//dge slong rnams the tsam skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom lda
508a6('dul ba): 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa la gos na/'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i
508b1('dul ba): 'phrul gyi pham par bgyis pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang
508b2('dul ba): bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byed be/yul dbus su ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byungo //de dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir yul dbus nas/
508b3('dul ba): yul nas can zhes bya bar song ngo //de de na 'khrul 'khor gyi rgya rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa lngas/de de nyal ba'i rim gro bar 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig
508b4('dul ba): byas nas btang ngo //des de'i rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas 'dug go//de nas des song shig ces smras ni/de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/des bsams pa/gdon ma zos par
508b5('dul ba): 'di bdag dang dga' dgur spyod pa'i phyir btang ngo //snyam nas/des de'i lag pa nas bzung ste/drangs pa las/ji tsam zhig nas shing bral gyi phung por gyur to//de
508b6('dul ba): skyengs nas bsams pa/bdag gcig pu zhig tu skyengs par byas kyis/ma la bdag gis ni 'di rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par bya'o snyam nas/des sgo'i
508b7('dul ba): ngos logs la rang gi gzugs brnyan 'gegs po zhog bris to//sgo phag tu yib nas 'dug go/de ldang ba'i dus na ma yin pa de las bral ba dang /de nas 'khrul 'khor
509a1('dul ba): gyi sgyu rdul gyi slob dpon gyis bsams pa/ring zhig lon na ci'i phyir de skor ma byung snyam du sems te/dor song ba las/ji tsam na 'grogs te shrI
509a2('dul ba): ba mthong ngo //des bsam po/ci'i phyir 'dis bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byas snyam pa las/des 'khrul pa khor zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por 'dug pa mthong nas/de
509a3('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/bdag nyid skyengs pas 'gagaso snya mo//yul nas can gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/gang su'i khyim yang rung /der mi blo bur ba shin/ji srid rgyal po la ma
509a4('dul ba): 'thol ba de srid du/des de la rim gro mi byed do//de nas de rgyal po'i drung du song ste/mthil pa/lce yul dbus nas ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig mchis te/de bdag gi snga ma
509a5('dul ba): par gnas pa las/de la bkur sti bgyi ba'i slad du/bdag gis 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig bgyis te btang ba dang /des de lag pa nas bzung ste/drangs pas shing gi
509a6('dul ba): phung por mchis pa dang /de skyengs nas bdag nyid 'gegs lags na/lha de la grayar snga 'drim pa zhig btang du gsol/de nas bdag gis rim gro bgyi lag so//de nas rgyal
509a7('dul ba): bos zhoshwAs 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag deng g.yang snga rims shig/de rnams dong nas de mthong //des bsams pa/bdag gis ji ltar zung nga las dbab par
509b1('dul ba): bya'o snyam//gzhan dag gis smras pa/'gog thag tshod/sta re khyer te thug pa gcud par byartsams pa las/dzaM tsam+ba ni rtsigs pa yin par mthong nas/de nus 'khrul 'khor mkhan//
509b2('dul ba): gyi slob dpon de skyengs par gyur to//de de ltar skyengs par gyur pa dang /ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon de/sgo lkog nas phyung ste smras pa/kye nang rje drag khyod kyis ni kho bo gcig pu zhag tu skyengs
509b3('dul ba): par byas te/khyod ni rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni/dge slong
509b4('dul ba): shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas//da ltar yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byaso//gzhan yang 'di ltar 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas
509b5('dul ba): par de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor gzhan zhig na/ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpo gnyis shig byung pa las/rtsod por gyur te/gcig gis smras pa//du ni bzo lags por
509b6('dul ba): shes so//gcig shos kyis smras pa/nga ni de bas kyang lhag par legs par sheso//de gnyis phan tshun mgran par gyur nas/rgyal po'i drung du dong ste/de'i rkang pa gnyis la
509b7('dul ba): gtugs te/gcig gis smras pa/lha bdag ni bzo legs par 'tsha//cag shos kyis kyang smras pa/lha bdag ni de bas kyang lhag pa legs par 'tshal to//rgya
510a1('dul ba): ngos de gnyis la sgo khang bstan nas/khyod gnyis gang mkhas ni ngas mo shos maud kyis/'on kya du gcig gis ni rtog ngos cog la ros la/cig shos kyis kyang
510a2('dul ba): cig la ris shig dang /de lta na khyod gnyis gang bzo legs par shes pa/dus legs par shes par 'gyur ro//de gnyis kyi bar stsol bas bcud nas/ri mo bri bar
510a3('dul ba): brtsams te/de la gcig gis zla ba drug gis ri mo'i las zin to//cig shos kyi ni zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar to//ri mo'i las zin pa gang yin pa de rgyal po'i drung du
510a4('dul ba): song ste/son pa dang /smras pa/lha dag gis ri mo'i las bgyis lags nA/spyang brim du gsol/de nas rgyal po'i blon po dang lhan cig sgor byung nas mthong ba dang /rI
510a5('dul ba): mo'i las mkhas so zhes shin tu mgu'o//cig shos kyis kyang rkang pa gnyis lo btugs te smras pa/de dag gris ri mo'i las la gzigs su gsol/nges bar chad kyi
510a6('dul ba): yol ba bshos pa dang /cig gi gzugs brnyan dri la shar ba rgyal pos mthong nas/rI myo'i las la lhag par 'di mkhaso//zhes shin tu ya mtshan skyes so//de nas
510a7('dul ba): des slar yol bas par bcad nas/rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/lha 'di ni ri mo'i las mi lags te/'on kyang rtsig ngos bstar ba lags so//de nas rgyal
510b1('dul ba): bodwe ya mtshan skyes nas smras pa/'di ni bzlo la lhag par mkhas pa yin no//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/gang gis zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstan pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di
510b2('dul ba): nyid yin no//gang gis zla ba drug tu ri mo'i las byas pa de ni/de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin te/de ni yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas so//da ltar
510b3('dul ba): yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so//gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di pham par byas pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba na/bA ra na se'i grong khyer du/drang
510b4('dul ba): slong dung dang /bris shes bya ba gnyis shig nye bar bsten cing gnas so//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na lhas char phab pas rdzab du gyur te/dung dred de rdzab du rdeg 'o chos na
510b5('dul ba): rnyil ba chag par gyur to//de nas des dmod pa bor baM/rang bzhin ngan pa khyod kyis de phan chad lo bcu gnyis su char mi'i bebs par gyur cig ces byas so//rgyal po tshangs
510b6('dul ba): sbyin dang /bA ra na srin gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas/de nas de rnams de'i drung du song ste/gsal ba btab pa/drang srong chen po de ltar ma mdzad cig/des
510b7('dul ba): spros pa/bdag gis rang bzhin ngan pa la bzod par ma nus te/bdag gis dmod pas bcom pa des/yo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal po
511a1('dul ba): tshangs sbyin dang /skye bo'i tshogs des bris pa la gsol ba btab nasu/des gsol ba byas te/lhas char phab bo//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//
511a2('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong dung gang yin pa de ni/dge slong ma'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yi no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bris pa gang yin pa de ni/dge slong shA ri'i bu yin te/de nas
511a3('dul ba): yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so//gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas pa de nyon cig/bris pas dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir//
511a4('dul ba): dung gI rkang pa gany+dzisi la btugs pa las/dung gi rkang pa gnyis kyis ral pa mnan pa dang /bris pas smras pa/nyi ma char ka'i dus kyi tshe/khyod kyi spyi bo gso par
511a5('dul ba): gyur cig/dung gis smras pa de ltar na nyi ma 'char bar ma gyur cig ces byas pa dang /'jig rten du nam sros par gyur to//de nas rgyal po dang /bram ze dang /khyim
511a6('dul ba): bdag gi dung la gsol ba btab pa/drang srong chen po de lta bu ma mdzad cig/des smras pa/nyi ma shar bar gyur ni/gdon mi zla bar badrag gis mgo 'gas
511a7('dul ba): par 'gyur//bris pas de la smras pa/gal te de lta na/'dzi ba las byas pa'i mgo zhig byos shig/ji tsam na 'ji ba las dung gi mgo zhig byas pa las/nyi ma
511b1('dul ba): shar ba dang gas par gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/dung gang yin pa de ni/dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no//byis pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ra
511b2('dul ba): bu 'di nyid yin te/don yang 'dis pham par byas//gzhan yang ji ltar bam par byas pa de nyon cig/yul dbus su ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung nas/ba so 'bris
511b3('dul ba): tsem+ba bre'u gang khyer nas/yul nus can du song ste/de ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs na/de yang rtsod par 'dug pas/de'i chung ma la smras pa/grogs
511b4('dul ba): po'i chung ma 'bras bre'u chung gang po 'di chos pa byin cig ces de bzhag ste song ngo //des bcoM bar brtsams pa las/shing zad par gyur kyang ma chis so//de nas de'i
511b5('dul ba): khyim zab 'ong nas smras pa/bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/des rgyas par smras pa dang /des de brtags pa las/ba stso 'bras tsa ma sha stag tu mthong nas/des de la tso bri//
511b6('dul ba): byar+ya smras pa/bzang mo 'di tshwa chu yin gyis/chung bzang po gzhan sbyin khyer te 'ongs dang /des 'bras 'di rlom par 'gyur ro//des bya so mkhan gyi slob dpon la/chu bzang
511b7('dul ba): bo zhig khyer te shog shig ces smras so//des de la smras nas/des phyogs gzhan zhig tu rdzing du zhig dris te/de khyi re bam pa zhig kyang bris so//de nas bso mkhan
512a1('dul ba): gyi slob dpon de bum pa khyer nas/rdzing bu yin no snyam nas/phyogs der phyin te/khyi ro bamA pa mthong ba dang /des sna bkab nus brtag par/
512a2('dul ba): brtsams pa las/ji tsam na de'i chu snod de chag nas/ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon de skyengs par gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ba si mkhan gyi slob dpon
512a3('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no//ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni/dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no//'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
512a4('dul ba): pas brnyes pa'i bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes so//rang sangs
512a5('dul ba): rgyas rnams kyis thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang /dge slong shA ri'i bus mi sheso//dge slong shA ri'i bus thob po gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang dge/
512a6('dul ba): slong mo'u dgal gyi bus mi sheso//dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bus thob pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang /nyan thos gzhan rnams kyis mi shes te/dge slong mo'u dag la
512a7('dul ba): gyi bu bas/dge slong shA ri'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che mod kyis/des mang du gnas pa la dgongs nas/ngas rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//shA ri'i
512b1('dul ba): bu dang /smyen ga la m+b+hi bu'i lce//dri nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang ga las kyis lung sbyin par byed do/snyas pa/de ni dang song ston nas spyad pa dang //
512b2('dul ba): rje 'thun tshig dag shin tu sgrogs pa na//gang zhig byas pas 'bras bu che myong ba//chung ngu gcig pu de ni myur dran nas/ji ltar sing ge ri yi phug gnas pa//'jigs pa med
512b3('dul ba): pUpAr spyod yul 'gro ba ltar/mtshungs pa med pa'i nyan thos 'od srung de//sngon gyi gnas nos spyod pa sgrogs byed pa//zag med za ba med pa rnams grol sems//nyon mongs
512b4('dul ba): pa nas pa sbyin me //de la chos mchog yod pa yi na sa/sa mi yis/sa surgyas le ga gsalan du na//
512b5('dul ba): rlung gang zhig rab phul bas//de 'dra ba dang kun tu phrad gyur cing //smon pas sgra mi snyan du skyes pa ni//lus de gcig pa nyid kyi 'bras bu yis//lus can bdag gir
512b6('dul ba): 'dzin med tshe ring ba//khyad par 'gro zhing spyod pa mi dman po//sgra mi snyan du lan stong skyes par gyur//las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bu yis//lan stong sum cu rtsa gsum
512b7('dul ba): par skyes te//me tog phreng rgyan byug pa sna tshogs dang //mthu chen lus modzes pa dang ldan par gyur//de nas 'phos bdag blo mi sten du skyes//slar yang lce dag dga' bar
513a1('dul ba): byed pa dang //sems kyi smon lam dbang gis slar yang bdag/mi ni dge bya rnams kyi nang du smras//lus de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bu bdan rla
513a2('dul ba): bram ze sa la chen po'i rigs skyes te//nor ming skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskur//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga don mi gnyer yang //bdag gis ston pa las dga'
513a3('dul ba): me mthong zhing //mtshungs med nyan thos bdag gis mo mthong nas//bdag gis song ras tshem gyon 'jig rten na//dgra bcom rnams la phyag 'tshal rab tu byung /
513a4('dul ba): bdag ni de ltar rab tu byung ba dang /rgyal ba bu mangs mchod rten nang bzhug mthong /thub zhabs phyag 'tshal bcom ldan bdag gi ston//bdag ni khyod kyi nyan thos
513a5('dul ba): gyur ces gsol//'od srung ji skad smras bzhin byas te 'dir//khyod ston nga yin nga'i nyan thos khyod//gal te sdug bsngal kun las thar 'dod na//khyod kyis snyan
513a6('dul ba): par bshad pa'i chos spyan nyon//gang yang dag lo skyes mchog skyob pa ni//thugs rje chen po yis ni chos bshad pa//besam gtan bzhi stobs dbang po byang chub
513a7('dul ba): kyi//yan leg lam gyi yan lag rnam par thar//de dag bsgom pa dag gis dga' dgur thob//zag pa zad cing lus kyi tha ma bzung //lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa rdul
513b1('dul ba): med pa//drang po 'di dag dang ni bdag par blang //de bzhin gshegs rgyu la phun sum tshogs pa gas so//tshul khrims ldan pa gang da 'grub par 'gyur//bdug gi yang la
513b2('dul ba): ci dang ci bsams pa//thams cad rtsub ste sred pa'i pha ma 'di//bdag gi skye ba zad cing 'ching ba dang //srid pa kun neste langs pa nyid bcad de//bdag ni chos rgyu la
513b3('dul ba): thugs las skyes pa'i sgras//nyon mongs tshogs rnams zud pas mya ngan 'di'//bdag ni thams cad gzigs pa yis//sbyangs lus nus pa mchog tu bston//
513b4('dul ba): zag bla med dri de nye ba bas la//go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis thob//gnas rten 'od srung de lta bur//ma dras pa yi mtsho chen du/dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/
513b5('dul ba): rang gi las ni bstan to//'od srung gi le'u ste drang po'o//'dul drug ni/bam po de gnyis pa/de nas dge slong gnas brten gnas brten rnams kyi
513b6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu las ci zhig byas na/las de'i rnam par sman pas/shes rab chen po dang /spobs pa chen po dang
513b7('dul ba): ldan par gyur/des smras pa/bdag gis dgon par rang sangs rgyas/drang srong dge sbyong zhi gyur pa//skal dang ldan pa chos gos ni//de tshe rnying par byon pa mthong //
514a1('dul ba): de la bdag gis sems dad pas//bang brgyugs nas kyang chos gos ni//drubs shing kha bsgyur de bzhin du//de la yang dang yang du btugs///
514a2('dul ba): de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir//de ni bar snang la 'phags nas//rang gi gzi brjid kyis 'bar zhing //de nas tso mkha' la gshegs par gyur//bdag gi
514a3('dul ba): thal mo sbyar byas nas//ji ltar bdag ni 'di 'dri bar//dbang rnon shes rab cher shig ces//de lta bu ni smon lom btab//bdag ni phyug po'i rigasu 'ang //ma rabs
514a4('dul ba): dag tu mi skye bar//bar ma'i rig su skye 'gyur zhing //rtag tu rab 'byung mang por shog/dge ba'i rtse ba des na bdag/bdag ni tshe ribs lnga brgyar yang //mi yi rnyed//
514a5('dul ba): pa thob nas ni//khyim med pa ni rab tu byung //bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni//mi yi srid thob 'di yin te//rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi//ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas
514a6('dul ba): shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la//bdag gris rab 'byung thob nas ni//mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i//dgra bcom pa yang bdag gi sra thob//btsun pa bdog
514a7('dul ba): gis zla phyed kyis//'gro ba'i pha rol phyin thob nas//dge slong dge 'dun gung bzhugs nas//ston pas bdag ni mngon sum du//chos kyi 'khor lo rjes skor ba//
514b1('dul ba): she rab can gyi gtso bor bstan//shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu//dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//ma dros pa'i mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan to//
514b2('dul ba): shA ri'i bu'i le'u gnyis bya'o///de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brten rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang
514b3('dul ba): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi tshan go/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ni//rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/da ni khyod kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/de skad
514b4('dul ba): ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//bdag sngon drang srong gyur pa'i tshe//
514b5('dul ba): nags mtha'i dgon par gnas pa na//der ni skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas//bdag la rab byung gsol ba 'debs//bdag gis rgyags nas de'i sku//bregs nas kyang ni chos
514b6('dul ba): gos dag/kha dog brgyu las de la byin//de yid dgra' 'gyur de yi tshe//phyogs gcig tu ni nyer song nas//skyil mo krung bcas 'dug nas des//rang byang chub ni reg
514b7('dul ba): gyur te//de nas mkha' la song bar gyur//bdag gis dad bskyed nyer song spro//de nas thal mo legs sbyar te//de nas rdzu 'phrul mchog gsol zhing //smon lam gdab pa/
515a1('dul ba): /byas pa nA//drang srong tshe 'di ci 'dra ba'o//ba dag gi rdzu 'phrul de 'drung shog/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni//gang dag gang du skyes par ni//bsod nams/
515a2('dul ba): byas pas mdzes pa yi//lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur//bdag gi srid pa tham+bi ni//mi yo stede thob 'di yin te//rdzogs sangs pa na med pa so//deng dpon 'di ni mnyes
515a3('dul ba): par byas//shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la//bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni//mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i//dgra bcom pa ni bdag gis thag/thams cad
515a4('dul ba): gzigs pas rdzu 'phrul can//rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to//dge ba chung ngu byas pas ni//bde ba mang po nyam su myong //mi dge ba yi las shasu yin//
515a5('dul ba): bdag gis lung bstan mnyan par gyis//grong mchog rgyal po'i khab tu ni//bdag ni tshong dpon khye'u gyur nas//khyim gyi phyi rol rtse rtse nas//zan gyi phyir yang zhugs
515a6('dul ba): pa las//de na phra ma gnyis ka ni//dben par 'dug pa bdag gis mthong //de gnyis mthong nus bdag brdegs shi//skyongs pas kyang ni spro ba byas//pha dang me ni
515a7('dul ba): gnyis ka la//yid kyi nyes pa byas pa ni//gang che chen por gyur pa na//'dab bu bcos pa bzhin ngas de snyam//bdag gi yid kyis nyes byas kyis//lus kyi byas
515b1('dul ba): bam yin na//bdag ni dmyal ba thig nag tu//sdug bsngal mi bzad nyan su myong //de lci las kyi lcug ma yin//bdag gi srid pa tha ma 'dring //mu stegs gzhan gyi dge sbyong
515b2('dul ba): gis//'dam bu bcom bzhin bdag gtog 'gyur//bdag ni sdug bsngal de nyid kyis//shi bar gyur te de nas ni//lces rnams kyi ni lhag myi yang //tha ma zad par 'gyur//
515b3('dul ba): ba yin//de bas pa dang ma dag la//sems ni rab tu dad par byis//sems dad pa yi rgyu yis ni//sems can 'gro ba bzang por 'gro/de ltar gnas brtan pade
515b4('dul ba): nas skyes//dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//ma dras pa'i mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan to//pang nas skyes kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o///
515b5('dul ba): de na sngo dge sbyong gnas brtan glanas brtan rnams kyis//tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan/tshe dang ldan pa pa nas skyes kyis//
515b6('dul ba): rlung gri las kyi rgyu ba bstan zin gyis/da ni tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis kyang //rang gi las rgyu ba lung ston cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis//dge slong
515b7('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du/rang gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa/dge 'dun kun dga' ra ba ro bdag son na//khyams de'i phyag dar mthong nas ni//bdag gis
516a1('dul ba): phyag ma blangs nas su//de tshe dga' bas phyag dar byas//de nas bdag gi sems dud pas//khyams de gtsang mar mthong nas ni//ji ltar/
516a2('dul ba): khams de gtsang bar ltar//nyon mongs med par gyur cig smras//dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis na//keng dang gang du skyes par yang //bdug gi gzugs ni bzang ba dang /
516a3('dul ba): blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur//de yi las kyi lhag mas ni//bdag gi lus ni tha ma la//bdag gi pha dang ma gnyis kyis//bdag ming mdzes ldan kho
516a4('dul ba): nur btagis//mdzes ldan pa dag ni btsas gyur te//gang cho gnyen tshogs mdun phyin pa//de tshe gAnyen ni thams cad kyis//mgu zhing yid dga' bkur sti byas
516a5('dul ba): rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi//ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas//mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i//dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob//bdag gis
516a6('dul ba): nyon mongs med gyur ces//smon lam btab pa gang yin pa//bya ba byas te nyon mongs med//dgra bcom zag pa med pa yin//'dzam bu'i gling na thams cad kyang
516a7('dul ba): ka shi'i gos kyis phyag byas pas//gang gi 'dod chags bral ba yi//drang song 'chags gcig phyag pa'o//'dzam bu'i gling na drang srong gi/'chags thams//
516b1('dul ba): tsid phyag pa bsdu//gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi//re k+She tsamra dag phyags pa'o//'dzam bu'i gling na dge 'dun gyi//kun dgra' rab kun phyag pas//glang gis rgyal
516b2('dul ba): pa'i mchod rten ni//khru gang tsom zhig phyag pa'o//bdag nyid kyis ni gang rtogs pa'i//khyad par de dge shes byas nas//bde gshegs mchod rten phyag nas ni//sems
516b3('dul ba): kyang rab tu dang bar gyis//de lhas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis//yon tan mang po shes pa yis//mchod rten rnams la bkur bsti byos//'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur//
516b4('dul ba): btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni//gang byas dran pa 'di lags te//de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang //'dod pa yid 'ong nyamasu myong //de bas rgyal ba'i mchod rten la//
516b5('dul ba): mched pa dag ni bzang po gyis//btsun pa 'di ni bskyod rnams zhing //dam pa bla ni med pa yin//rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa 'om//sangs rgyas rnams kyi
516b6('dul ba): nyan thos la//sems ni rab tu dang byas pa'i//yon ni chung ngur 'gyur ma yin//de ltar glanas brten mdzes ldan gyis//dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//
516b7('dul ba): ma 'dros pa yi mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan te//medzes ldan gyis le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi/
517a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa snga ma'i me tog la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog//tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis//rang gi las kyi rgyu ba
517a2('dul ba): lung bstun zin gyis/da ni tshe dang ldan pas kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/sna mi'i me tog rna rgyan byas//mgo la me tog phyeng bcings nas//ne'u zla rnams
517a3('dul ba): kyis yongs bskor te//bskyes mos tshal gyi gnas su byung //de na thub pa chen po pa//rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la//skye bo'i tshogs chen thams cad nas//
517a4('dul ba): logs par mchod pa bdag gos mthong //de nas na'u zla rnams kyi khrid nas//rang rang gi ni phreng ba kun//sems ni dad par byas nas su//mchod rten de la gdags pa
517a5('dul ba): byas//de na bdag gis de dag dang //skye bo mang po gzhan mthong nas//snu mu rna ba las phral te//de tshe mchod rten bdags pa byas//dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag/
517a6('dul ba): gong dang gang du skye bar yang //bstod namaso byas pas mdzes pa yi//lha dang mi ni rnamasu gyur//rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi//dred dpon dri ni mnyes par byas//mya ngan 'das pa
517a7('dul ba): bsil gyur pa'o//dgra bcom pa ni bdag gis thob//me tog gcig ni btang bas ni//lo ni bye ba brgya phrag tu//bdag gis lha yi yongs spyad naso//de yi lhag mas
517b1('dul ba): myo ngan 'as//btsun pa gal te sangs rgyas kyi//yon tan pal tshor 'tshal gyur nas//sems ni shin tu dang pa yiyas//phyir zhing bsnyen bkur bgyis pa zhig/de ltas
517b2('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi//yon tan mang po shes pa yis//mchod rten rnams la bkur bsti byos//'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur//rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pan//
517b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos la//sems ni rab tu dang byas pa'i//yon ni chung bar 'gyur mo yin//btsun pa dag gi dge ba ni//gang byas dran pa 'di lags te//de
517b4('dul ba): yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang //'dod pa'i yid 'ong nyamasu myong //las kyi rnam par smin pa des//yang srid skye ba zad pa dang //nyon mongs btsom nus bsil gyur pa'i//
517b5('dul ba): bdag ni dgra bcom mya ngan 'das//bdag ni yang srid nyal ba dang //'khor ba gang du 'dra nyal ma yin//bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni//'di yin len pa med par 'gyur//de nyid kyi ni
517b6('dul ba): rgyu yis bdag/sna mi'o mye tog ming 'di bdags//sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol zhing //srid pa'i mtsho las rgal por gyur//de ltar gnas brtan sna ma ni//dge slong dge 'dun
517b7('dul ba): mdun 'dug nas//ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan to//sna ma'i me tog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o////de nas dge slong gnas brten gnas brtan rnams kyis//
518a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa/tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/tshe
518a2('dul ba): dang ldan pas kyang da ni rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pas las ci zhig byas na las des/bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi
518a3('dul ba): mchog tu bstan/des smras pa/rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la//rgyal po'i pho brang ba shos ldan du//bdag gis phyogs bzhi dge 'dun gyi//gnas khang gcig
518a4('dul ba): cig brtsigs nas ni//bdag gis gnas khang de yi bzhir//ras phran rnams kyis sa gzhir g.yogs//sems dga' ba dang yid bde bas//de tshe smon lam btab pa ni//
518a5('dul ba): rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byas te//bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob nas ni//mya ngan 'das pa phyogs bzhi pa//rga med go 'phang reg par shog/bdag gi bsod nams des ni
518a6('dul ba): bdag/bsod nams byas pos mdzes pa yi//bskal pa dgu bcur lha dang ni//mi rnamasu ni 'khor bar gyur//de nas las kyi lhag mas ni//bdag gi lus ni tha ma la//tsam
518a7('dul ba): par tshong dpon mchog gi yang //bu gcig pa ni bdag skyes//bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang //pha yis thos nas mdun gyur pa//gzhon nu la ni bdag gi nor//bye ba nyi shu
518b1('dul ba): sbyin par bya//bdag gnang mthal gnyis ka su//shin tu bla zhing mnyon pa dang //rog na bde zhing 'jam pa yi//shong bal mdab lta'i sor bzhi skyes//'das pa'i bskal pa dag
518b2('dul ba): bcu dang //bskal pa gcig 'di lhag par ni//sa gzhi gding bas mr-i g.yogs pa//rkang pa 'jog ni ma myong ngo //rdzogs sas blan med pa yi//ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byis
518b3('dul ba): mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i//dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/thams cad gzigs pas brtson 'grus can//rnams kyis mchog tu bdage bstan to//zug med sa
518b4('dul ba): po spangs pa yis//go 'phrad ma g.yo ba dag gis thog//gnas brtan bye ba nyi shu pa//dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//de ltar ma dros mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung
518b5('dul ba): bstan to//bye ba nyi shu pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o///de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa dag dbang la 'di skad ces smras//
518b6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag dbang /tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pas/rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/des smras pa/
518b7('dul ba): 'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcur ni//bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yis//lha rnams dang ni mir skyes te//bdag gis ngan 'gro mi shes//bdag gis dge ba ma shes te//
519a1('dul ba): phan tshun zla lhas 'bab zhig gis//rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ni//mthong nas de tshe bsten bkur byas//mgron bu drug cu rnams kyis ni//dri dang drang ba
519a2('dul ba): byug nyos te//mchod rten la ni bdag byas pas//bdag ni log par ltung ma gyur//dge ba chung ngu byas pasngan//bde bo mang po nyam su myong //mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur
519a3('dul ba): po'i//dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob//gal te rdzogs sangs rgyas gyur la//mchod rten de lo bdag gisu//bskur bsti byas par gyur na no//legs pa mang bye
519a4('dul ba): 'gyur ba zhig/de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi//yon tan mang po shes pa yis//mchod rten bkur bsti byos shig dang //'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur//thaMd
519a5('dul ba): gzigs pas mang thos dang //sna tshogs gtam dang dge ba yis//skyobs ldan tshigs bcad byed pa ni//rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to//de ltar gnas brtan ngag
519a6('dul ba): dbang ni//dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//ma dras pa yis mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan to//ngag dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o///
519a7('dul ba): de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa ba ra dra dze bsod snyoms len la 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa ba ra dwa dza bsod snyoms len/tshe dang /
519b1('dul ba): ldan pa dag dbang gis rang gi lus kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi lus kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa bA ra dwa dza bsod snyoms ldan kyis 'di
519b2('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras//bdag ni tshong dpon bur gyur nas//pi yi ljin dbang byed tshe//bdag gis pho ni yid bsrungs shing //ma la log pa mi mthun byas//pheM dang sring mo spun dang
519b3('dul ba): ni//bran dang las byed rnams la yang //zas dang snyoms kyis tshim byas kyang //ma la spyo ba byas na su//bdag ni gser snas zil non pas//ma la zas ni ma byin pa ri//khros
519b4('dul ba): des tshig tu smras pa ni//zlas rdo bzo shig byas//las kyi rnam par smin pa des//rab tu tshe dang thig nag gi/dmyal bar len mang sgred nas ni//sdug bsngal mony-ing thob pa
519b5('dul ba): byugyur//dang myal ba de nas shrI 'dis nas//mAM yi srid pa thob pa nus//las kyi rnam par smin pa des//bdag ni rdzo zla bar gyur//skye ba de dang de dag tu//de dag gi rdo ba ma zlos//
519b6('dul ba): //de bzhin bkres skom sdug bsngal gyis//bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas//bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni//mi skyid thob pa 'di yin to// gas sangs bla na med pa yi//de dpon
519b7('dul ba): 'di ni mnyes par byas//shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la//bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni//mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i//dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob//thaMd gzig
520a1('dul ba): pas seng ge'i sgra//sgra sgrogs pa yi mchog tu bstan//bdag gis nyon mongs thams cad spangs//nyon mongs bral bas zag pa med//da dung du yang btsun//
520a2('dul ba): pa dag/de ltar rdzu 'phrul ldan lags na//phug na bdag gi zas mchis pa//rdo ba nyid du gyur lag so//btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa ni//gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/
520a3('dul ba): las rnams chud mi za bas na//de yis 'bras bu nyam su myong //ba ra dA dza bsod snyoms len//gnas brtan dge slong dge 'dun mdun//'dug nas ma dros mtsho chen
520a4('dul ba): dudarang gi las ni lung bstan to//ba ra dI dza bsod snyoms len gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/
520a5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs/tshe dang ldan pa bA ra dA dza bsodra snyoms len gyis/rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan
520a6('dul ba): zin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi kya de las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi dri'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/rgyal
520a7('dul ba): po'i pho brang ba shes ldan du//tshong dpon bu por gyur nas ni//bdag ni nor dang 'bru mang zhing //skye bo'i tshogs kyis bkur ba dang //rgyal po dang ni grong mi dang //
520b1('dul ba): gsang tshig brjod pa rnams kyi bkur//bag+h+nA na sdug cing mdzes pa dang //dAr la bab pa gzugs kyis brgyags//de nas bdag ni shing rtar zhugs//skyo bo'i tshogs kyis mdun byas nas//
520b2('dul ba): 'dod pa kun dang ldan gyur cing //bskyed mos tshal gyi gnasu byung //bskyed mos tshal der dge sbyong ni//dbang po legs par bsdams pa dang //dbang po zhi bas rgyu byed pa//chos gos
520b3('dul ba): rnying pa can zhig mthong //dge sbyong de mthong bdag gis ni//yid mi bde ba skye gyur te//de skyon med kyang mi sdug nas//smad cing spyo ba byas nas ni//kha dog don cing 'jigs par
520b4('dul ba): snang //mdze can lus ni lus+thA tsa no//sha bri ngan cing rtsa 'thon pa//rab tu byung 'di su yi yin//ngag gi nyes pi spyad pa dang //las kyi rnam par smin pa des//de nas shi 'phor
520b5('dul ba): dus byas nas//dmyal ba rnams skye bar gyur//dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag/kha dog ngan cing sdug bsngal ldan//mdze can lus ni lus rma can//sha b+h+ri ngan cing rtsa 'thon
520b6('dul ba): gyur//lag na gyo mo thogs shing rgyu//sha nI rasa? kyi smad g.yogs gyon//phyag dar phung po'i steng na nyal//gnas med mgon med skyob pa med//zas kyi che du spong ba na//
520b7('dul ba): gang dang gang du song na yang //dbyug pa can gyi phyir ldog cing //de dag bdag la spyod par byed//de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni//gang dang gang du skyes pa der//bkres
521a1('dul ba): dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis//bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byaso//sems can kun gyis bdag gi ming //nyes 'ongs pa zhes smad pa byas//kun gyis yid du mi
521a2('dul ba): 'ongs pas//de tshe smad pa byed par gyur//bdag gi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni//dge slong dge 'dun mdun gyi byas//skye bo'i tshogs ni cheni po lo//dam pa'i gnas ni
521a3('dul ba): ston pa mthong //skye bo'i tshogs de mthong nas ni//ji tsam 'dod pa'i zas dang skom//rnyed par gyur na ster snyam nas//myur du rgyugs te phyin pa dang //skye bo'i tshogs nin
521a4('dul ba): chos kyi phyir//'dug pa de ni mthong nas kyang //zas sbyin pa ni med do zhes//bdag ni re tshad slar log go/de nas thub pa thugs rje can//mgon pos bdag la bka' stsal
521a5('dul ba): pa 'ongs pa legs tshur khyod bde 'am//stan 'di la ni khyod 'dug shig/bdag ni dga' ba thob gyur nas//thal mo legs sbyar de'i 'og tu//ston pa zhabs la phyag byas
521a6('dul ba): nas//phyogs gcig tu ni bdog 'dug/de nas ston pa thugs rje can//go'u ta ma rje su thugs brtse bas//rim pa bzhin gyi gautam gsungs pas//bdag ni bden po
521a7('dul ba): mthong bar bgyis//bden pa mthong nas thub tshon la//de nas bdag gis rab 'byung gsol//go'u tam thugs rje chen pos bdag/rjesu brtse bas rab tu phyung //
521b1('dul ba): rnon ni 'dren ma skyes//bdag ming logs 'ongs zhes bta gas shing //mdo khamasku la snyoms 'jug pa/rnams kyu mchog tu bdag bstan to//de ltar gnas brtan log
521b2('dul ba): 'ongs kyis//dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//ma dros pa'i mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan to//legs 'ongs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//
521b3('dul ba): de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod la 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis/rang
521b4('dul ba): gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis kyang /da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' yid kyis/de'i tshe rang gi las
521b5('dul ba): kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab tu ni//tshong dpon phyug por gyur pa ni//da na mu ge byung gyur nas//drang srong rnams ni gso skal bgros//de nas
521b6('dul ba): bdag gi gas skal du//skal dang ldan pashA rang sangs rgyas//zag pa med pa'i bsil gyur du'i//drang srong mdzes pa gcig cig byin//sems ni ser sna'i skyon can gyis//
521b7('dul ba): bdag gi sdig pa bsams pa ni//de lta'i dus su dge sbyong 'di//lo bdun du ni su zhig gso//khyi mo ga cing ni bskol ba yis//de nas 'bras kyi chen bcos te//den
522a1('dul ba): drang srong za ru bcug/de tshe de ni 'chi dus byas//sdig pa'i las ni de byas pas//bsdus gzhom dang ni ngu 'bod dang //de bzhin tsha bar rab che ba'o//dmyal
522a2('dul ba): ba rnams yun rings btsos//dmyal ba las ni shi 'phos bdug/mi yi srid pa thob na yang //nad bu can la gzhan dbang dang //sdug bsngal gyis ni bdag drus byas//dri
522a3('dul ba): ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar na//gang dang gang du skyes pa na//mi sdug nad dang mi bzad pas//rtag tu bdag ni dus byas//bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni//mi yi srid thob 'di yin
522a4('dul ba): te//rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi//ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas//shAkya seng ge'i bston pa la//bdag gis rab byung thob nus ni//mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa/
522a5('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob//btsun pa de ltar na yang bdag/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing zag med kyang //nad bu can la 'gre ldog pa//de lta bus ni bdag 'tsho'o//
522a6('dul ba): de ltar gnas brtan dga' yod kyis//dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//mo dros pa'i mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan to//ma 'gags pa'i grogs po dga'
522a7('dul ba): yod kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//sdom ni 'od srung shA ri'i bu dang ni//mo'u dgal bu dang mdzes ldan dang //snam gro zhin ngag dbang dang //bsod snyoms
522b1('dul ba): legs 'ongs dga' yod do//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa gragus pa/tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod
522b2('dul ba): kyis/rang gi lu rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston
522b3('dul ba): par byed de/bdag sngon dgon pa'i drang srong gyur//grong du bsod snyoms phyir song na//rnam par sngos pa'i bam pa yi//bud med kyi ni ro zhig mthong //bdag gis tshul bzhin
522b4('dul ba): brtag byas te//skyil mo krung bcas 'dug nas ni//rtse gcig shin tu mnyam gzhag pas//der ni mi sdug bsgom pa byas//bdag 'dug pa las de yi lto//rdol nas 'jigs
522b5('dul ba): pa'i sgra byung ba//thos par gyur nas bdag kyang ni//ting 'dzin las langs par gyur//de yi lto na yod pa yi//nga ni skyugs dang ni khrag dang ni//rul pa'i dri dang ma gtsang ba//
522b6('dul ba): kun+da nis rab tu 'dzag pa mthong //rgyu ma gnyi ma mkhal ma dang //snying dang de bzhi ni glo ba la//srin bu brgya phrag za byed nas//slar yang sems ni mnyam par gzhag/de ci 'dra ba
522b7('dul ba): 'di de 'dra//'di ci 'dra bar de de 'dra//phyi yi ro ni mthong gyur nas//rang gi lus la gtod par byed//de nas ting 'dzin las langs nas//bsti gnasu ni slar log te//de tshe
523a1('dul ba): bsod snyoms ma spyad de//zas kyang bza' ba ma byas//gang tshe bdag yang grong khyer du//zas kyi ched du zhugs pa na//yid 'phrog pa yi gzugs mthong nas//
523a2('dul ba): de la mi gtsang bsgom byas pa//de yi ro ni ci 'dra bar//gzugs gtogs de kun dri 'dra ste//khog pa mi gcing bas gang ba'i//thams cad sman pa yin no zhes//de ltar
523a3('dul ba): yang dang yang bsgoms pas//bdag gis 'dod chags bral ba thob//tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshad med pa//bzhi po legs par bsgom byas pas//de nas 'chi ba'i
523a4('dul ba): dus byas te/tshangs pa yi ni 'jig rten skyes//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten shi 'phos bdag/bA ra na se'i grong du skyes//tshong dpon mchog gi bu gcig par//dpal
523a5('dul ba): dang bdag nyid der skyes te//kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba//mthar phyin gnas ni thob par gyur//bdag ni nyin mo yongs rgyu zhing //mtshan mo dag ni nyal bar byed//
523a6('dul ba): myur bar de nas langs sngon//de na bud med mang po dag/rdza rnga dang ni rnga tshon dang //khar rnga'i pi wang sngas btsugs nas//sgren mor bla rdol byed pa dang //lag brkyang nas na/
523a7('dul ba): gnyid log mthong //de nas bdag gi sngon gyi rgyu//mthu chen ni skyed par gyur//bdag la de nas bud med la//dur khrod me gtsang 'dus shes 'byung //de nas skyo bar
523b1('dul ba): b+h+yang nu r+m+ma//bdag gos bsngags pa chog smras pa//grogs byos bdag ni gnas gyur to//kunanas 'cha bas dag par gyu //du nas m+b+ha m+banas ngas smra'o//'ang shAs/
523b2('dul ba): nas ni shod du babs//lhas ni r+d+he su snying brtse bas//bdag gi sgronani rnam par bya//grong khyer nas ni mngon byung nas//'bab chu ngog su nye bar song//bdab gis pha rol 'gram na /
523b3('dul ba): dge sbyong dbang po bsdams pa mthong //bdag gis dge sbyong de mthong nas//sgra gsang bstod de smras pa ni//dge sbyong dag ni gtses gyur te//grogs po bdag la 'tsho bas rig/de
523b4('dul ba): nas ston pas bdag la yang //de tshe bdud rtsi'i tshigs gsungs pas//gzhon nu ma'i jigs khyod tshur shog/'dir ni khyed la 'tshe ba med//bdag gis nor bu'i lham phude//
523b5('dul ba): 'bri chu yi ni ngogs rgal nas//sangs rgyas gang zug zla med pa//thugs rje can gyi spyan sngar song //de nas bdag sgom thugs chud nas//gang zag zla med ston pa des//skun
523b6('dul ba): ba'i chos ni bka' stsal pa//de na so sor bdag gis rtogs//de nas bdog gis bden mthong nas//thub chen rab byung gsol po btag//gloru t+ya mthugs rje chen po yis//thugs
523b7('dul ba): brtse ba yis rab tu byung //mtshan cig lon nas de nas ni//nyi mtshar ka tsa ma na ni//bdag gi zag pa kun zod cing //bdag ni bsol gyur mya ngan 'das//de ltar gnas gan
524a1('dul ba): grags pa ni//dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan to//gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste bcu
524a2('dul ba): gcig pa'o////de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed/tshe dang
524a3('dul ba): ldan pa grags pas/rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis kyang de rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dang lo skyed kyis/
524a4('dul ba): de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/bA ra na so'i grong khyer du//ston pa 'od srung mya ngan 'das//rgyal po kri kri rin chen las//byas pa'i mchod rten chen po brtsigs///
524a5('dul ba): rgyal po kri kri grags ldan bu//bdag ni thu bor gyur pa na//bdag gis thog mar gdugs kyis ni//rgyal ba'i mchod rten la gdags byas//dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/
524a6('dul ba): gang dang gang du skyes pa na//bsod nams byas pa'i mdzes pa yi//lha dang mi ni rnamasu gyur//skye ba de dang de dag tu//phyug cing longs spyod che ba dang //nor dang 'brur ni ldan
524a7('dul ba): pa yi//bdag ni yon bdag chen por gyur//bdag gis tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni//sbyin pa mi nyung btang byas te//slong ba pa dang dge sbyong dang //bram ze so sor tshim par ba
524b1('dul ba): natu da pa sams smras na//'du rtags rna rdzu ma dag/ kun du 'dzu stsa sa smras//rgyu bad rlom byur smras// kun dubyas pas//spyod pan 'dun
524b2('dul ba): /shAkya drug pa'i rigs skyes//btsas ma theg tu tshig smras pa//khyim 'din ni nor 'bru dag/dge chung zad cig yod dom//'di ltar sbyin pang sa btang ngo //dngul po rnams
524b3('dul ba): rnaMm par bya'o//dbul gyi rnams la zas byin dang //gting bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med//dza~Mg ni r-iH/med dam khyod//bdag la ts+tsha du legs byar smos//de dag bdag ni
524b4('dul ba): tshig posto nas//yid skyo bar ni gyur naso//mam gtugs par phyogs drung ni//phyog sun pa d+h+r-ig par byesatshul rnams pa mas de ci bajig la 'di skad smras/
524b5('dul ba): lha'am mi 'am gnod sbyin nam//khyod su bdag la myur du gas//ma cig khyod kyi bu bdag ni//mi ljags smin pa mi lags to//sbyin bdag tshe rabs dran pas na//ga
524b6('dul ba): sbyin pa gtong la s+ho//bdag gicig drims thos nas//yid ni dga' bar gyi dronas kyang //dbugs 'byin byed cing smras pa ni//drug /basbyin pa med //ye byad ma
524b7('dul ba): rnams kyis kyi//ba ga lams ni gas pa//na ma lda shin tu narkun bcang sa di ni yang //khyim ngon
525a1('dul ba): 'bru rnams dang //gser dang bran dang las byed pa//rnams kyang rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur//dpal skyed khye'u zhig bcas gyur la//bcos ma thag tu/
525a2('dul ba): smras pas na//bdag gi ming ni gnyen rnams kyis//dpal skyed ces ni bya bar btags//de nas bdag gis sbyin btang zhing //dbul po rnams ni tshe ma byas te//rdzogs pa'i
525a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas//khyim med par ni rab tu byung //bdag ni mtsho med 'jigs pa'am//bu lon nyan paso rab 'byung min//de tshe dad pas rab byung nas//mngoni shes drug
525a4('dul ba): po bdag gis thog/bdag ni rgyal po blon po dang //de bzhin grong mi rnams kyis mchod//zas dang btung ba gos dang ni//gnas mal yang ni rnyed par gyur//de ltar gnas
525a5('dul ba): brtan dpal skyed kyis//dge slong gnas brtan mdun 'dug nas//me dros pa'i mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan to//dpal skyed kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o///der
525a6('dul ba): dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang po rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la la 'di skad ces smra so//tshe dang ldan pa bku la/tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis/rang
525a7('dul ba): gi las kyi rgyu ba lung stan zin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa bku las kyang /de rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung stan cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa bku las/de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba
525b1('dul ba): lung ston par byed de/rgyal po'i pho brang ba shes ldan du//bdag sngon spos 'tshong gyur pa la//rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi//dge slong dge 'dun spyan drang na//khyed cag ji snyed//
525b2('dul ba): bzhed pa yis//snyun smon bdag gis dbul bgyis te//shun pa rtsa ba 'bras bu'i sman//dge 'dun bdag gis tshim par bgyis//dge 'dun g.yor ni spyan drangs nas//bdag la
525b3('dul ba): dge slong gcig cig gis//a ru ra gcig ma gtogs par//de nas 'ga' yang slong ba med//bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu//bdag ni log par ltung ma gyur//sman sbyin
525b4('dul ba): pa yi rnam smin ni//mthu chen 'dri la blta bar gyis//dge ba chung ngu byas pas ni//bde ba mang po nyamasu myong //a ru ra ni gcig byin pas//yun ring mthu ris rnam su
525b5('dul ba): dga'//de nis las kyi lhag mas ni//bdag gis mi yi snying thob nas//yul 'khor bsod snyoms len pa dag/slob pa na yang ma myong ngo //nub gsum kho nas rig pa ni//
525b6('dul ba): gsum po dag gis myangon sum byas//ngan ngon gyis ni 'tsho byas shing //phyug dar khrod kyis chos gos 'chang //khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba dang //bdag ni 'dres par mi
525b7('dul ba): gnas te//bdag gi tshe ni lo brgya dang //drug tu lhag cig lon na yang //de tsam bar du'ang bdag gis ni//na bar mngon par mi dran te//btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni//
526a1('dul ba): chung ngu bgyis pa 'di dran te//de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong 'dod//bdab byung ba nyam su myong //de ltar gnas brtan bkulas//dge slong dge 'dun mdun//
526a2('dul ba): 'dug nas//ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni lung bstan to//bku l+le'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas
526a3('dul ba): brtan rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan/tshe dang ldan pa bku las/rang bri las kyi rgyub su
526a4('dul ba): bstan zin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brten zhes bya bas/de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba
526a5('dul ba): lung ston par byed/sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams//bdag ni lham mkhan gyur pa na//mu ge byung nas de ni bdag/ko bi'i ras ma rnams 'tshed do//bza' bar bya ba
526a6('dul ba): kho na'i phyir//ko ba'i risde mi 'tshed pa las//dge sbyong gzhan zhig zas kyi phyir//bsod snyoms la ni byon pa dang //de la bdag gis sems dad pas//ko ras kyi ni thug
526a7('dul ba): pa byin//dge sbyong des ni longs spyad nas//de ni namakhar 'phags par gyur//bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas//thal mo legs par sbyar byas te//de nas gang dang
526b1('dul ba): //na /smya na sgyu // smyon sa smra / na da// byud//smyan ga par//gyu //nganar+m+ma//
526b2('dul ba): ma // na// smin te/rdzog pa/ su ts+tsha//'dug slon sum
526b3('dul ba): mo dros pa yi mtsho chen du//rang gi las ni mr-ing bskrun hU~M//gnas tsun nas kyi ladu ste bcu bzhi ga/de nas de/slong gnas brtan gnas pan
526b4('dul ba): rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa steng rgyas 'od skyi la sogs pa/gnas brten gsum la 'di skad ces sgras//tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas brtan gnas brten zhes bya bas//
527a1('dul ba): rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin+da gyis/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis kyang /da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/de nas de rnams kyis kyang rang gi lus kyi rgyu/
